Unug mi _ ataasigh mi _ qav asim aluki _ , _ anguyag a _ tagi luni _ piitesighagh ke aq _ we ed s -meng _ akule itgun _ wheat -et _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
nunivagseghagh t _ piite yalghiimeng _ , _ wheat -et _ akume luteng _ we ed s -meng _ ayuqe ut _ .
piitesighagh a _ qepghagh tel gh utng an _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ pinigh lghii meng mi _ piitute meng _ piitesigh u aghagh ziin _ piitesighaghvig gpeni _ ; _ naken _ we ed s -et _ pi ut _ ? _ '
yug m _ kii msiigh ke ai _ , _ ' _ anguyag m _ tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ ' _ . _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ W e ed s -et _ iku ul tekii _ ? _ '
kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ ' _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ we ed s -et _ ikugh kufsiki _ qemall _ wheat -etlu _ ila leg qite te lleqe asi _ .
qerngagh ita _ wheat -etlu _ we ed s -etlu _ nagu steki _ kenlanga _ unatagh lleghqagh mun _ . _ enan _ unatagh yaghqaaghtekata _ un atagh tet _ ungipaate naagh anka _ we ed s -et _ sivuk esqelluki _ , _ qep ughluki _ paneghte yaghqaa luki _ . _ enkaam _ wheat -et _ unatagh ste luki _ kagpag ste naagh anka _ kagpag vig mnun _ . _ ' _ "
allameng _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ piitute atun _ m us t ard -em _ ayuqe uq _ . _ piitute m _ mek estaa llegh pig aqaa _ , _ iwernga _ yug m _ piitesighagh nghminigu _ piitesighaghvig mikun _ nunivag segh aghy ag g aghneng _ aange lleghpigagh u kayugu uq _ . _ uqfig ughte nghaani _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ avayagh akun _ unglute yagh u iqe ut _ . _ "
allameng _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ ye ast- atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ aku u tus kanga _ avlawa ghllag mun _ , _ enkaam _ akuutagh ghllag a _ ghhuugh ste ghllag qagh a _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtugh nghminiki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ quunpeng _ atuqe aqe ai _ ungipaghaate t _ . _ ipapestaaq _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ ungipaghaate tgun _ ayuqe uq _ .
tawaten _ pi kau lghii _ apeghiigh na luku _ uuknaliq istem _ pillgha _ , _ " _ ungipaghaate t _ atuqe lleqe anka _ aleghqugh kumki _ . _ ungipaate lleqe anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite tesi ma ite ka aneng _ ima _ ulima yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ unite luki _ yug lghute t _ iteghkagh _ mangteghagh mun _ . _ Maligsaagh tengita _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pis iig wat _ ungipaghaate kekagh ten _ we ed s -et _ piitesighagh vig melnguut _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ yuug _ piitesighagh ke aq _ pinigh lghii meng _ piitute meng _ , _ ighnegh ke a _ yug m _ ;
piitesighaghvig _ nuna u uq _ ; _ pinigh lghiit _ piitute t _ yugu ut _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ pi ke ai _ ; _ we ed s -et _ yugu ut _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ .
anguyag _ piite ste ikagh _ we ed s -meng _ tughneghagh u uq _ . _ unatagh llegh _ nuna m _ kenlet gh uu tel qaa _ , _ un atagh tet _ yaquleg u ut _ .
unatagh llegh mi _ we ed s -et _ qerngughte luki _ paneghte aqe ait _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ kenlet gh uu tellgh ani _ nuna m _ , _ yug t _ tughneghagh m _ pi i _ qerngughte luki _ paneghte yaghqaa ut _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ yaquleg mineng _ kayagte i yaghqaa uq _ iq i tesqelluki _ ataneghpag u llegh mineng _ qamagte luki _ seghleghqe sigh t llu _ , _ seghletun llu _ pis tet _ .
enkaam _ kengh egnun _ miluute lleqe ait _ , _ tawani _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ kuukgute lleqe ut _ siqinegh tun _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ ata meng _ . _ sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ aklungi stun _ ayuqe uq _ iigh nga lghii _ piitesighaghvig mi _ . _ yug m _ naal kell uki _ iiw nqigtekagh i _ . _ Quy am _ angtalanganeng _ , _ aghulaqe luni _ qamagte luki _ saghya ni _ akike luki _ , _ taagken _ taana _ piitesighaghvig _ tukfigh iqe a _ . _ "
" _ whatete uq llu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ : _ tukfightugh a _ ivagh i lghii _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ pe ar l -meng _ tukfigh yaghqagh meng _ .
naalkute nghmini _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ akituqagh meng _ , _ akikugh aqe a _ qamagte luku _ saghya ni _ , _ tukfigh na luku _ taana _ pe ar l -a _ . _ "
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ , _ negaghpag tun llu _ ayuqe uq _ . _ Iq all in iigh tet _ negaghpag eng _ naayvagh mun _ ateghte luku _ aghqella aqe ut _ enkaam _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ iqallugte ghllag aqe ut _ .
negaghpag _ sayug luku _ qute mun _ , _ aqume luteng _ iqallug t _ avugh aqe ait _ , _ pin il ghit _ kanaghte magh ita _ qalta nun _ , _ enkaam _ seghl ellgh i _ egte aqe ait _ .
tawatete yaghqaa uq _ kenlet gh uu tellgh ani _ nuna m _ . _ yaquleg t _ tagi luteng _ avugh lleqe ait _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pinigh lghii neng _ .
enkaam _ seghlegh t _ kengh egnun _ miluute lleqe ait _ , _ tawani _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ " _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ liigike stekagh i _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tamaghhagh mi _ apeghtugh i kayug _ liilightuusagh neng _ apeghtuqagh _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ qilag m _ wh atel nguug uq _ : _ mangteghagh leg _ yuug _ nusug ragh lghii _ kagpag vig mineng _ nutaghagh meng llu _ neghightagh meng llu _ . _ "
Jesus _ taaqe yami _ apeghtugh i nghmeng _ ungipaghaate neng _ aghulaqekagh _ .
aglagh luni _ ne minun _ apeghtugh i yan _ synagogue- ng itni _ , _ yug t _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ . _ Ell meggneng _ aapqugh aagh utkat _ , _ " _ naken _ peghqinellegh nge a _ ? _ naken llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghill enga _ allaaghlluwhaght imun _ ?
ighnegh ke nghite agu _ kaapenta m _ ? _ mary _ naa ke nghite agu _ , _ uuk _ angleg utk enghit ak ii _ James -enkut _ , _ Joseph -enkut _ , _ Sim on -enkut _ , _ Jud as -enkut _ ?
nayag i llu _ mate- te nghite aat _ ? _ naken _ liite lleg nge ghllag a llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eng allu _ ? _ "
enkaam _ tugukligh y un ghit kaat _ . _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nani _ alngunak _ yug t _ sii vag kaqe aat _ uuknaliqe i sta _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ nuna ani llu _ nengllugut ang anillu _ . _ "
tamaani _ allaaghlluwhaght ip ag um angilnguq _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ .
tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ Herod-em _ , _ igleghte te i ste yan _ Galilee- m _ , _ nagaqugh qu a _ Jesus-em _ apeghseghugh u ma llegh a _ .
Herod-em _ qepghagh teni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ una _ John -nguuq _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ unguvagh ma uq _ . _ esghaghhu qun _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elek _ allaaghlluwhaght illegh mun _ . _ "
qavnganghhaq _ Herod-em _ tuqute stekaqe kanga _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ qayughllak _ John-em _ ungipaate kaqe kanga _ , _ " _ qaatke te nghite uten _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ tugu llegh gpegun _ Herod i as _ , _ anglegute gpek _ nulighh a _ . _ " _ ( _ Herod i as-em _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ philip _ , _ Herod-em _ uyughagh a _ . _ ) _ John-em _ ungipaate llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ Herod-em _ tugu sqekagh a _ John _ , _ asighqellug qu _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghte sqellug qu _ . _ Herod-em _ tuqute sug u yagh kanga _ John _ , _ naqam _ alikekagh i _ Jews-et _ seghleliighqagh ii na yu kata _ qayughllak _ ugpeq eq kangat _ John _ uuknaliqe ste u ni luku _ .
taagken _ Herod-em _ allgeghvig an _ aghnegh ani _ , _ Herod i as-em _ panig a _ tuk aleg aqaq _ Herod - emllu _ aqelqagh t llu _ sivu itni _ . _ elngaatall _ herod _ efqugh yug ghllagkagh _ ,
repall _ akeqekagh a _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh kuvek _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ "
naa mi _ kayagte llegh atun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whaa _ maaten _ tagivagh ghhu _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ naas q wa _ John-em _ Paaptaay es tem _ . _ "
umiileg _ qivghuke aq _ iwernga _ akeqe i kau te mineng _ aqelqagh mi _ sivu itni _ piyuke llegh a _ kayagte tke a _ .
enkaam _ Herod-em _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ John-em _ naas q wa _ kepe stekagh a _ .
naasqugh _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ tuunekagh at _ aghnaghagh mun _ , _ enkaam _ naa minun _ aglagh tke a _ .
John-em _ maligsaagh tengi _ tagi luteng _ yugusigh a _ llivegh yaghtugh qu aat _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu aat _ .
Jesus-em _ nagaqugh yamigu _ ungipagh _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aghulaqekagh _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ ellngin aghh aan aluni _ . _ iwernga _ yug lghute t _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ ne meggneng _ maligtekagh at _ piyug meng _ .
Jesus _ qute mun _ uugte luni _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nanglleg yagute ghllagkagh i _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qinuyug teng it _ .
Wh an iku yagu _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Wh an ik waa _ , _ maana _ paaghqite uq _ ; _ aglagh uute sqe ki _ ne nun _ ellngit neng _ neqeng esqelluki _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ M aan ll it _ . _ elpek si _ neghyaghq al iteki _ . _ "
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ whaa _ legan _ tallim ag g aagut _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ iqalluggagh ak llu _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tagite ki _ whavek _ . _ "
taagken _ yug lghute t _ aqume uute sqekagh i _ vegaagh kun _ . _ tugu luki _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ iqalluggagh ak llu _ , _ sivugte luni _ qilag mun _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ . _ iigge mineng _ aavgugh luki _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maligsaaghte minun _ tuunekagh i _ uyeg tesqelluki _ yug lghute nun _ .
qamagte luni _ negh te tke aq _ kepsugh te luni _ . _ taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ tugukagh it _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ paskete t _ esleqnga lghiit _ kagimlegh itneng _ neqekrangllagh t _ siipnegh t _ .
entaqun _ 5 ,000 - nguut _ yug t _ negh te tke aat _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ kesutke gpenaki _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ kayagtekagh i _ angyagh kun _ aghv iq est iisqelluki _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ , _ ellnga n _ aglagh uute tesi ma luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ aglaghtu utes am iki _ ellnginagh mi _ naayghagh mun _ mat- yuqagh _ yughagh na luni _ . _ tawani _ ighivg aghmi _ Jesus _ ellngin aamaluku _ ,
angyagh t _ unÊ¼g a _ naayvagh mi _ awavagh luteng _ , _ elngaatall _ imaghllug ii iqe aat _ qayughllak _ ay gugh nagh us k angi _ .
akule gkeni _ th re e- kell aag enkuk _ , _ si x - ek laag enkuk _ unaangu luku _ Jesus-em _ takukagh i _ maligsaaghteni _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ .
Maligsaagh tet _ esghagh luku _ megh kun _ piyug lghii _ kakave na iqe aat _ . _ enkaam _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ taghneghagh u uq _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ whanga u unga _ ! _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ipa _ el pe ngu kuvek _ tagsigh nga _ elpenun _ aglagh langa _ megh m _ qaye akun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ . _ " _ enkaam _ peter _ ategh luni _ angyagh meng _ , _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ aglaghkagh _ Jesus-mun _ .
iwernga _ anuqe _ elpeg ke yamigu _ alingekagh _ , _ kaleve te kete luku _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ yugu linga _ ! _ "
Tawaninginaq _ Jesus-em _ akuqagh luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Ugpeqillegh qes taa pig uu ten _ ! _ sangavek _ malghukli ziin _ ? _ "
angyagh mun _ uugte aqe uk llu _ ellmaaragtekagh _ .
enkaam _ angy amel nguut _ manigugh qu aat _ Jesus _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke aaten _ ! _ "
taagken _ naayvagh _ aghvigh luku _ tamlagkagh t _ gennesaret- kun _ .
Tamaa kum iit _ liisuqe yamegteggu _ Jesus _ , _ ungipaate yaghtigh sqekagh it _ v i llag e- en ilnguut _ qinuyug tii ghit _ tagi tesqelluki _ Jesus-mun _ .
manigugh ututka ait _ qinuyug lghiit _ waran _ saafte sqellug qu _ kenigh akun _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ saafte i lghiit _ naallghute lleg ngekagh t _ .
taagken _ ila i _ Pharisees-etlu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ Jerusalem-emeng _ tagi luteng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ ,
" _ sangameng _ maligsaaghte ten _ qaatke te igate aat _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ ? _ negh naqe negh meggni _ uughtugh igate ut _ elqughute luteng _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ elpek si _ qaatke igate aqe ste ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ maligte na luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh ke a _ , _ ' _ Quul v agh lukek _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ ' _ . _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ ata ni _ , _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke gkunigu _ , _ tuqute yaghqaa uq _ ' _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i aqe usi _ , _ ' _ yug m _ quulv anghi sagh ng aagu _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ whaten _ pi kagu _ , _ ' _ kayusiite yaghqagh lgu unga _ elpenun _ , _ iwernga _ tuun aanghi taqa _ qayughllak _ akequsagh ke kaqe aqa _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ pakig aqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ apallugh ke luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ .
ukughsi _ piniiyugnegh ni _ ! _ elqughte lusi _ whaten _ Isai ah-m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe aisi _ !
kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ ' _ ukut _ yug t _ akuzite megteggun _ quulv aghaq aatnga _ , _ nakaan _ ilu meggneng _ .
temngi _ manigugh aqe aatnga _ qayughllak _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ , _ katam _ whanga _ liilightuusagh ke pigte lghii stun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute t _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate lunga _ liigike tek _ !
yug m _ sa u a _ qanegh minun _ kanaghtekagh a _ nukeggnaghqe i igate uq _ , _ iwernga _ yug m _ qaangh aneng _ aanekagh _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu uq _ . _ "
taagken _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ Liisimak enghi si guu _ Pharisees-et _ anagtegketen _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpegun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nunivagseghagh _ qamagte luku _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ piitesighagh ma ite kanga _ nusug yaghqaa uq _ .
avelghaqiinagh luki _ Pharisees-et _ ! _ ayaakagh stun _ maghyaghqugh i aqe ut _ . _ yug m _ ayaakagh m _ ila a _ ayaakagh _ taslugh kunigu _ , _ laag waaghmun _ kalef kag taa llequ k _ . _ "
Peter-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ sa meng _ pis iig wa _ ungipagh aaten _ yug t _ nukeggnaghqe igate ni keten _ neghekagh megteggun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si llu _ salin _ liigik igat sii _ ?
Liisimak en ghis teggu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ qanegh minun _ kanaghtekagh a _ aqsaq ghw anun _ pi aqe uq _ , _ taagken _ aane aqe uq _ yugusigh aneng _ ?
iwernga _ sa u a _ qamaken _ aanekagh _ qanegh kun _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu uq _ yug meng _ .
qayughllak _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ seghlegh _ sumeghtaghagh llegh _ pi kau yug u uq _ , _ yugte aq _ , _ gelgaghni ii aagh _ , _ allani ii aagh _ , _ tegleg ni uq _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i _ , _ seghlequ uq _ yug neng _ .
Tamaa ku s ta _ nukeggnaghqe i kayug t _ yug neng _ , _ iwernga _ uughtugh gpenani _ neghe llegh m _ nukeggn aghq en naanghitaa _ yuug _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ tunge gkenun _ T yr e- enkuk _ S id on -enkuk _ .
taawa nguq _ C an aan -eghm ii _ aghnagh _ . _ Jesus _ takukagh a _ akilghuu magh mi _ , _ " _ kaay _ atanegh _ , _ ighnegh a _ David-em _ , _ nangllegyag ute qegh tinga _ ! _ panike a _ tughneghagh m _ itegh ma a _ , _ seghlegh waagh uuq _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ avelghaqiinagh qagh a _ . _ Maligsaagh tengita _ taku luku _ kayag tagh waaq aat _ , _ " _ iqite sqe gu _ ! _ maligsaagh magh emta _ akilghuu uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ Israel-eghm ii ngin aghhagh nun _ , _ penniigh stun _ iflakagh stun _ ayuqe lghii nun _ . _ "
iwernga _ aghnagh _ tagi luni _ Jesus-em _ sivungagh kun _ qungughtu te kete luku _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kayusiite aghte nga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anaggute nga uq _ taghnughhagh t _ neqe it _ tugu luki _ qikmigh nun _ miluute kumeng _ . _ "
aghnagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ atanegh _ , _ talwa _ yug m _ qikmigh a _ ifkagh qellgh aneng _ negh aqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aghnagh _ elpek _ , _ ugpeqe i lleghtu pigte uten _ ! _ apeghiigh li _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ . _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ panig a _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ , _ esne akun _ naayvagh m _ Galilee- m _ . _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ aqumekagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ taku laghate tke aat _ , _ tagite magh ita _ Jesus-em _ sivungagh nun _ piyug pagning ilnguut _ , _ aqnightekagh t _ , _ ayaakagh t _ , _ akuzi igate ngugh t _ , _ ila i llu _ qinuyug lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ esghapag luki _ akuzi igate ngugh t _ akuzi yagute lghiit _ , _ aqnightekagh t _ naallghute lghiit _ , _ piyug pagning ilnguut _ piyug yagute lghiit _ , _ ayaakagh t llu _ esghaate yagute lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh a _ Israel -em _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ maakut _ nanglleg yagute pigte anka _ qayughllak _ whanga mnite ut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ talwa _ neghyaghqagh ite ut _ . _ neghe ste gpenaki _ aghulaqe sug nghite anka _ , _ luuraq _ tumangani _ kayaali na yu kata _ . _ "
Maligsaagh tengita _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ maani _ kilgaa ni _ naken _ neqenge naqe sta _ naama yaghqagh meng _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ uglaghqak aan _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ , _ qafsina t llu _ iqalluggagh at _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qelqe ai _ aqum uu tesqelluki _ nuna kun _ .
taagken _ tugu luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ iqallug t llu _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ . _ aavgugh luki _ tuunekagh i _ maligsaaghte minun _ enkaam _ uyegtekagh it _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ .
qamagte luteng _ negh te tke aat _ kepsugh te luteng _ . _ taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ siipnegh _ qerngughte luku _ maaghraghvinleg _ paskete t _ imaa iqe ait _ esleq aghagh luki _ .
uglaghtala it _ negh te tke aat _ yug t _ 4 ,000 -nguftut _ , _ kesutke gpenaki _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aglagh uute ste luki _ ellngit nun _ ellnga _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ uvit anganun _ M ag ad an -em _ aglaghkagh _ .
taagken _ ila i _ Pharisees-etlu _ Sa dd uc ees -etlu _ tagikagh t _ Jesus-mun _ anag niil qav ig igh naluku _ . _ enkaam _ allaaghlluwhaght is q egkaat _ esghagh sighqagh u luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ siqinegh _ tevigh yaghtugh ngestagh nghaani _ esla _ kavighrug u nghaani _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ unaami _ pinigh naqe uq _ . _ '
siqinegh _ piite kestagh nghaani _ qilag a _ kavighrug u nghaani llu _ qilaga ii nghaani llu _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ aghneghmi _ esla _ seghleghu naqe uq _ . _ ' _ esghapag luku _ qilag a _ liisimak aqaghsi _ esla _ natete naqute anga _ . _ iwernga _ esghapag nghpesiki _ s allgh et _ aghnegh ni _ maani _ liigikepagningite asi _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ .
aghnegh m _ uum _ yug i _ seghleghqe ma u ut _ , _ ataasiigh negh ilnguut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ naqam _ allaaghlluwhaght ites qut _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ Taan angin aghhaq _ allaaghlluwhaght illeq _ esghagh lleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ allaaghlluwhaght illgha _ J on ah -mun _ . _ " _ taagken _ Jesus-em _ unite luki _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ kaate luteng _ , _ maligsaaghtet _ pi yalghiimeng _ puygu ma lghiit _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kelqe gpenateng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ Pharisees-etlu _ Sa dd uc ees -etlu _ ye ast- angitneng _ . _ "
Ell meggneng _ akuzim ghh utk egkaat _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi uq _ qayughllak _ kelqe nghite ngugh u kut _ neqekrangllagh meng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ , _ ugpeqillegh qes taa pig u usi _ ! _ sangafsi _ neqekrangllagh ite ni tsi _ ?
taawa _ liigik igat sii _ ? _ Neqamik en ghis tekii _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ aavgughkagh nka _ 5 ,000 _ yug nun _ , _ qafsin Ê¼ gut angillu _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh kasi _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ ?
taakut llu _ neqamik en ghis tekii _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ 4 ,000 _ yug nun _ neghe stekagh nka _ , _ qafsin Ê¼ gut angit lu _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh kasi _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ ?
naten _ sangan _ liigike nghite steggu _ neqekrangllagh u nghite ngughk _ akuzi tke kegka _ ? _ kelenga lusi _ Pharisees-etlu _ Sa dd uc ees -etlu _ ye ast- angitneng _ ! _ "
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ liigikekagh at _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta a _ . _ Y e ast- ang unghi teftuq _ neqekrangllagh mete ngughk _ kelenga sagh ughte tkekagh a _ , _ iwernga _ kelenga sqe aqe ai _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ Pharisees-etlu _ Sa dd uc ees -etlu _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ kaa sa mi _ tunganganun _ Caesar e a _ Philip pi -em _ , _ aaptekagh i _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ " _ yug t _ kina u niigh katgu _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ila i _ pi aqe ut _ John - ngun iluku _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ ila ita _ elijah _ , _ paninang _ ila ita _ Jer em i ah- ngun iiq aat _ nalighmeng _ naligh t _ uuknaliqistet _ . _ "
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ elpesi mi _ kina u na iqe ste ngnga _ ? _ "
simon _ Peter-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Christ- ang uu ten _ , _ ighnegh a _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ quya ste lleg lgu uten _ , _ simon _ , _ ighnegh a _ J on ah-m _ ! _ qayughllak _ yug meng _ liite mangite an _ , _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ elpenun _ liite stekaqe a _ .
enkaam _ pi amken _ , _ peter- nge te te n _ , _ uyghag _ . _ whagun _ uyghag kun _ nekefte lleqe aqa _ yughaghvig ka _ , _ tuqu llegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh an _ kayaal qesaghq aq enghit ng wh aagh aa _ .
elpenun _ tuune lleqe anka _ key- nge i _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ asightekuvgu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ asighte yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ item us kuvgu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ maligsaaghte minun _ apegh tes nanigh waaq aq _ kitumun _ alngunak _ Christ- angun iluni _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ Jesus-em _ liigike ste naqekagh i _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ Jerusalem - ete p estaagh yaghq aan iluni _ , _ tawani _ aw llaag ghhagh u i nakete te _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ni luni _ Elder -en un _ , _ chief _ priest- enun _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh meng _ . _ ungipagh tke ai _ tuqute yaghqaa ni luni _ taagken _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguvaghsaghqagh u ni luni _ .
Peter-em _ iqitute luku _ aghyuuniigh qagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi snaanghite aaten _ ! _ tawaten _ pi naanghite uten _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ qiive luku _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ , _ iqiten _ whanga mneng _ ! _ Am ig igh aghpenga _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llegh n _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke nghite a _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ maligte yu kuminga _ , _ ellmi _ katam _ piyuke lleg ni _ pegte luku _ , _ qaquuragh ni _ uyamig luku _ maligte linga _ .
qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ ellmi nun _ katam _ pik n i kumigu _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pegtekunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ allgegh lleqe a _ .
sa u a ngam _ yug m _ pinighqe sigh ke lleqe agu _ pi liite luku _ nunaghllag _ , _ ifla kunigu _ unguva sigh gni _ ? _ taawa _ avangite uq _ veghte sighqagh meng _ unguva sigh gminun _ .
apegh anka _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ ata mineng _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eligh luni _ yaqulegtuumagh mi _ . _ taagken _ tea- ma ghhagh a _ yuug _ nallangightugh lleqe a _ apeghiigh te llegh atun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaan lenguut _ ila gpesi _ unguvallegh meggni _ esghagh yaghqaqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ umiileg u luni _ . _ "
aghvinleg _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ , _ Jesus-em _ kelqekagh i _ peter _ , _ James -en ku klu _ , _ John-enkuk _ , _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ mayugh tke ai _ uusqagh lghii mun _ naayghagh mun _ ellnginagh ita _ .
iye itneng _ taagken _ Jesus _ allangughtekagh _ : _ gginagh a _ kuukgute ke aq _ siqinegh tun _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ qategh rak gu ugh tekat _ nighug stun _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ esghaq agket _ Moses -enkuk _ Elij ah- nkuk _ aliigh lutek _ aleghqugh ka ak _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ itagnagh pigte uq _ whaante llegh ut _ ! _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ nekefte langi _ pi nga yu t _ azigutagh t _ , _ elpenun llu _ , _ Moses - munllu _ , _ Elij ah- munllu _ . _ "
salin _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ qilag waaghem _ nighug rak egt am _ saapekagh i _ , _ enkaam _ qilawaagh meng _ me m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ ighnegh ke aqa _ , _ piniqe pigte aqa _ , _ efqugh ke pigte aqa _ , _ nagate aqe teggu _ ! _ "
Maligsaagh tet _ nagate luku _ me _ , _ alingruugh em _ angtalanganeng _ niinghutekagh t _ nuna mun _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ taku luki _ saafte luki _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nekeve tek _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ ! _ "
sivugte yalghiimeng _ Jesus- ngin aghhaq _ esghaghkagh at _ .
ukig te kete luku _ naayghagh meng _ Jesus-em _ inegh tengngwaaq ii _ , _ " _ kitumun _ alngunak _ apegh yaqunaan _ esghaghwaagh llegh _ pi nakesi _ kenlanga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ unguvagh tek an _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtughiste ita _ liilightuusagh t _ pi aqe atgu _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa ni luku _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ elijah _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ nallghusagh nqigte lleqe a _ .
iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ elijah _ tag ing waaq aaguq _ , _ iwernga _ yug t _ kina u ta a _ nalluke kaqe aat _ , _ piyuke llegh megestun llu _ pi kaqe aat _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ikfiqe ste lleqe aat _ . _ "
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ liigikekagh at _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ akuzite kaqe a _ .
yug lghute ghllag nun _ uteghnigh yata _ , _ yug m _ taku luku _ Jesus _ , _ aga _ segesqugh teng ngin aamaghmi _ manu akun _ pi ke aq _ .
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighnegh ka _ nanglleg yagute aghte gu _ ! _ sayugpag ta lgu uq _ , _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe u uq _ . _ awen _ kengh egnun _ ullegh aghte aqe uq _ nalighmeng _ meghquute aqe uq _ .
Malig saag tegpen un _ tagite yagh aqa _ , _ iwernga _ naallghutepag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ , _ ugpeqe i llghite usi llu _ , _ seghlegh waagh uu sillu _ ! _ naten _ tag kaan _ elpesinite naqe zinga _ ugpeq esqell unga _ ? _ mekelghiigh _ whavek _ tagite ggu _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ taagken _ aanekagh _ mekelghiigh meng _ enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ mekelghiigh _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ ellngin aagh san _ malig saag tengita _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta _ aane ste nghmeng _ aghtugh steggu _ tughneghagh _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ qayughllak _ ugpeqillegh q estaaghh aalghii si _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu yagh kufsi _ m us t ard -em _ pii tu tes qughh an _ angtale atun _ , _ una _ naayghagh _ pi kufsigu _ , _ ' _ ingavek _ nuug ten _ ! _ ' _ nuugte nayagh uq _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ alngunak _ aghtugh nay anghi taghsi _ ! _ "
iwernga _ tawatel nguq _ tughneghagh _ yugh aghhiin aghq unllu _ , _ f ast- ellegh q unllu _ aanes aghq aqaghsi _ .
Maligsaagh tet _ qerngughte te yata _ galilee- mi _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tugu luku _ tuune lleqe aat _ yug nun _ ,
enkaam _ tuqu lleqe aat _ . _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh tesaghq aaguq _ . _ " _ taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ qivghu ghllagkagh t _ .
taagken _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ C ap ern a um -emun _ tagi yata _ , _ Temp le -em _ tax -meng _ qerngught isteng ita _ taku luku _ peter _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ apeghtughiste i _ Temp le -em _ tax - nganeng _ llivike ai qaa _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ pi aqe uq _ . _ " _ peter _ itegh yan _ mangteghagh mun _ Jesus-em _ aleghqugh yuwhaagh ke a _ , _ " _ simon _ , _ natete a _ elpek _ sumegh gpeni _ ? _ Kin ku ngwaaq at _ nuna t _ umiileg ita _ llivike i ste aqe kangit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ tax -e meng _ ? _ nunalgute meggneng _ pi aqe aat _ nalighmeng _ n aku mii neng _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ N aku mii neng _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ enkaam _ umiileg t _ yug it _ llivike i naanghite ut _ .
iwernga _ seghleghyugsugh nghite apung _ tax -meng _ qerngught istet _ . _ enkaam _ nulugh yagh a _ naayvagh mun _ iqallugte aqe yuggaagh gpek _ qaan ghani _ naalke lleqe an _ mat- ni _ . _ tugu luku _ lliv iku saghtugh nak ef kung _ . _ "
Taam _ kingu inagh aneng _ maligsaaghtet _ Jesus-mun _ tagi luteng _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ kina _ angegh lleghpigagh u a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ tagsigh luku _ taghnughhagh _ nekeve stekagh a _ qukagh itgun _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ itegh naanghite u aghte usi _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ w et qu kun _ taghnughhagh estun _ lliigh kufsi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ukaligh ughte lghii _ uu tun _ taghnughhagh tun _ , _ angegh lleghpigagh u uq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ategh mkun _ tugukligh nghminigu _ wh atel nguq _ taghnughhagh _ , _ whanga _ tugukligh aqe aanga _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghleghqe stekagu _ naligh t _ mekestaaghhagh t _ ugpeqe i nga lghiit _ whanga mneng _ , _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ yug t _ qaamqaghte vike luku _ uy aq wagh kun _ uyghag ghllag meng _ kalef saqum egteggu _ uusqagh llegh anun _ kellii m _ .
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguut _ yug t _ qayughllak _ nuna mi _ whani _ nanghiiqu lleghtu pigte ut _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ nanghiiqu llegh t _ seghleghq is ti mun _ pi yaghqaa ut _ , _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh unaq nguuq _ kina _ seghleghqe ste i lghii _ yug neng _ !
" _ iigge gpek _ nalighmeng _ itegagh gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ kepe luki _ egte naketen _ ! _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh uten _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ itegh kuvek _ , _ iigge i te ghngaaghpek _ nalighmeng _ itegagh ite ghngaaghpek _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ kenle ite ngugh gnun _ kengh egnun _ , _ inglugtun _ iigge ligh luten _ nalighmeng _ itegagh ligh luten _ .
iye gpek llu _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ ipug luku _ egte naken _ ! _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh uten _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ itegh kuvek _ inglupigagh _ ii- uute kete luku _ , _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ kengh anun _ hell -em _ inglugtun _ iye lgu luten _ .
" _ wataghllak _ , _ ukaligh ke gpenaki _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ ukut _ me ke ta ghhagh t _ . _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ qilag mi _ yaquleg ita _ quunpeng _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ gginagh a _ esghagh aqe aat _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kau uq _ yugul in aluki _ iflakagh t _ .
" _ sumegh gpesini _ sa nayagh a _ yuug _ 1 00 _ penniigh leg _ , _ ataasigh _ aghulaqe yagh kan _ ? _ ivagh yaghtugh nayagh agu _ aghulaqekagh _ unite luki _ 9 9 _ penniigh ni _ qemi nite luki _ ?
ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ naalke gkunigu _ quyake ghllag yaghqaqe a _ pakig gu lluku _ 9 9 -en eng _ aghulaqe ma ite ngugh neng _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ piyuke llegh ke nghite a _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ maakut _ me ke ta ghhagh t _ ifl as qelluki _ .
" _ Ugpeq aalgu teg pek _ seghletun _ pi kangaten _ , _ ellngin aagh ulluku _ ungipaate naken _ anaggute llegh aneng _ . _ nagate kuniten _ taawa _ ilaliigh un neqig llequ tek _ .
iwernga _ nagate yu nghite kangaten _ , _ taku nqigte naken _ kelqellug qu _ ataasigh _ nalighmeng _ maalghug _ ugpeqagh u lgute tek _ liisimake ste u lukek _ sa meng _ pi llegh gpetegneng _ . _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghtuusagh ke aat _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ liisimak istet _ ipapigh qesaghq aqaat _ anaggute llegh _ .
iwernga _ nagate yu nghite kaki _ apegh nakesi _ yughaghvig m _ yug itnun _ . _ nagate yu nghite kaki _ talwa _ yughaghvig m _ yug i _ , _ kiyaghute nakesi _ Gentile- ngul ghii stun _ , _ tax - mengllu _ qerngughte i ste u lghii stun _ .
" _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ sa u a _ alngunak _ asightekufsigu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ asighte yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ item us kufsigu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ qilag mi llu _ .
" _ ila aneng llu _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ , _ nuna mi _ whani _ maalghug u lutek _ itagnagh qu te u kuftek _ aapte na lutek _ sa meng _ alngunak _ , _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ elpetegnun _ .
qayughllak _ maalghug gaat _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yug ggaat _ qerngugh us k ata _ whanga _ ategh mkun _ , _ akulng it n isaghq aagunga _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ugpeqaalgut ma _ seghletun _ pi manginagh kanganga _ naten _ uglaghqak aan _ seghevute yaghqaqe zikun _ ? _ Ket w el l _ maaghraghvin l aak _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ M aaghraghvin leg g iinaq _ seghevute yaghqaqe nghite an _ , _ iwernga _ 7 0 _ x _ 7 _ .
tawaten _ pi amken _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh a _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ whatete uq _ : _ umiileg m _ qepghaghte mi _ igagh it _ yuvghiigh yaghtugh qu ai _ esghagh na luki _ aseng e tul angit _ .
iiwenllu _ igagh it _ yuvghiigh aqe ai _ , _ umiileg mun _ itghutekagh at _ qepghagh a _ aseng elek _ 1 0 ,000 _ mani meng _ .
tawaten _ angka an _ mani ite ngughk _ llivike uute yaghqagh meng _ aseng em inun _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ akike sqekagh i _ ellnga _ , _ nulighh a _ , _ avaquti a _ , _ saghya i llu _ llivike uute yagh u luki _ aseng eng anun _ .
iwernga _ qepghagh a _ sikmuute luni _ umiileg mi _ manu akun _ maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ Utaq iig aghten _ ! _ llivike naagh aqa _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ ! _ '
umiileg m _ nanglleg yagute luku _ puygu sqekagh a _ aseng enga _ enkaam _ aane stekagh a _ .
" _ taagken _ taana _ qepghagh a _ aane luni _ nallagh qagh a _ qepghagh tel gut ni _ 1 00 _ mani meng _ asengekagh _ . _ akuqagh luku _ uy aq wh akun _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ llivike nga _ aseng egpen eng _ ! _ '
Qepgh algut angan _ sikmuute luni _ nanglleg si pig lluni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ Utaq iig aghten _ , _ llivike lleqe amken _ ' _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ nagate ma ite kanga _ , _ yeghlegi _ anusimingllagh stekagh a _ kenlanga _ aseng enga _ llivike llegh anun _ .
ila ita _ qepghagh tet _ esghapag luku _ tawaten _ pillgha _ , _ seghleghyag te ghllag luku _ umiileg meggnun _ apegh yaghtugh qu aat _ .
enkaam _ umiileg m _ qepghagh a _ taana _ tagsiqligh luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ seghlegh pestaagh _ qepghagh a _ ! _ Leg anÊ¼ngam _ seghevute amken _ aseng eghllag peneng _ , _ qayughllak _ nanglleg sil ghii ten _ .
qepghagh lguten _ nangllegyag us aq leg estun _ katam _ whanga _ nanglleg yagute lleg mtun _ elpek _ ! _ '
umiileg m _ sakrite pigte luni _ taana _ qepghagh a _ aglagh te stekagh a _ amyuutk ist enun _ anusimingllaghvig melngughnun _ kenlanga _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ aseng enga _ llivike llegh anun _ .
" _ esgha _ tawateghpigaq _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ qamagte lusi _ piyaghq iisi _ , _ qamaken _ ilu gpesineng _ seghevute nghite kufsiki _ yug lgute si _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh ke nghmeng _ taaqe yamiki _ aghulaqekagh _ galilee- meng _ , _ nuna anun _ Judea- m _ , _ inglung anil ngugh mun _ kiiw m _ J or d an -em _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ malig llegh aat kaat _ enkaam _ tawani _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qinu yuget _ .
ila ita _ Pharisees-et _ taku luku _ anag niil qav ig igh naluku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa _ yug m _ pegtekunigu _ nuliigh ni _ sa u a _ alngunak _ apallugh ke luku _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ At igh t iig as tekii _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pill ghit _ , _ ' _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh mi _ kiyaghnegh _ yungllagh aqngami _ ulima kaqe kek _ yug nkuk _ aghnaa nkuk _ ' _ ? _ "
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ unite lukek _ , _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ qerngughte te lleqe uk _ , _ enkaam _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ yugusigh ak _ .
Enkaangam _ maalghug u nanigh uk _ , _ ataasiighte uk _ yugusigh ak _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te stekakek _ yeqay _ yug m _ pellegh utu te ste nghite likek _ . _ "
Pharisees-et _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan mi _ Moses-em _ Liilightuus al it inkut _ yug mun _ igal i tesqelluku _ nulighh a _ peg tug sighqameng _ , _ aan e sim aan llu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ Moses-em _ pegtesaghqagh ughte stekaqe ai _ nula isi _ qayughllak _ pineghllug u lghiisi _ . _ iwernga _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawatetesaghqagh u nghite ni luku _ pi kaqsagh aa _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ yug m _ pegte yaghqaqe nghite a _ nuliigh ni _ wetku qun _ g elgh aghn iiq an _ . _ pegtekunigu _ sa meng _ alla neng _ apallugh ligh luni _ , _ nulightugh nqigtekuni _ gelgaghniigh u lleqe uq _ nuligh qen ghh amikun _ . _ "
Maligsaagh tengita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Taan angin aghh aak an _ apallugh _ yug m _ pegte sigh qaa _ nuliigh minun _ , _ yuug _ nulightugh nghite ghngaaghmi _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taana _ apallugh _ tamaghhagh mi _ tugukligh naanghite aat _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ila itnun _ tugukligh yaghqaaghte stekaqe a _ .
ila i _ yug t _ nulightugh igate ut _ allgegh kau te meggneng _ e un u ch -ng ngu luteng _ . _ ila i _ nulightugh igate ut _ qayughllak _ yug t _ e un u ch - eng llaq aqiit _ . _ paninang _ ila i _ e un u ch -ng waa qut _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ qepghagh te na luku _ kiyaghnegh _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ taana _ tugukligh yaghqaqe gkunigu _ , _ tugukligh ligu _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi tke ait _ Jesus-mun _ saafte luki _ yughaatk esqelluki _ . _ taawanginaq _ maligsaaghtet _ ineghtekagh it _ tagit isteng it _ taghnughhagh t _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yeqay _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi lit _ whanga mnun _ . _ ineghte gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ taghnughhagh estun _ ayuqe lghiit _ pi ke aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ saafte aqe luki _ quya stekagh i _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
taagken _ yug m _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ pi yaghqaqe zikun _ allgegh te sighqagh u luku _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sangan _ aap singa _ sa u a _ pi niite anga _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ pinigh lghii _ . _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge yu kuvek _ qaatke ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N a kut _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ yugtagh gpenang _ , _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i gpenang _ ,
Quul v agh lukek _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ , _ piniqe luki _ yug lgute ten _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qamagte luki _ taakut _ qaatke aqe anka _ . _ sa u a llu _ pi yaghqaqe zikun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ N aam ig tengngwaagh yu kuvgu _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh a _ elpenun _ , _ aglagh luten _ qamagte luku _ saghya n _ akike luku _ , _ aki a _ tamaa na _ aklumalghii nun _ tunqugh naken _ . _ enkaam _ qilag mi _ aklungi lgu lleqe uten _ , _ taagken _ tagi luten _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ "
nukalpigagh m _ nagate luku _ , _ aghulaqekagh _ iilqe pigte luni _ qayughllak _ aklungite pigte lghii _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ piyaqnagh yaghqaa uq _ aklung ilngugh mun _ yug mun _ itegh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ .
ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ ila aneng _ , _ piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa uq _ c amel -em _ suflughte te lleghqagh a _ sikugh m _ iye akun _ , _ aklung il nguum _ yug m _ itegh lleghqagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
Maligsaagh tet _ nagate yamegteggu _ tawaten _ pi llegh _ saghiigha yug ghllag magh meng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe a _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ taw av egh lluwaaq _ esghagh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug t _ pi yaghqaqe nghite kangit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esghaqagh kut qun _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ unite luku _ maligtekaqe amken _ . _ sa u a ngam _ allgegh lleqe steggu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ nutaghagh mi _ nuna mi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqume lleqe uq _ umiilgusig nekun _ aqumutagh gmikun _ nighugh qellegh mini _ . _ taagken _ elpek si llu _ maligte tekagh ni _ whanga mnun _ aqume lusi _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ umiileg m _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ igleghte te i lleqe usi _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ramke aneng _ Israel -em _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ kinku t _ alngunak _ unite kumegteki _ mangteghagh teng _ , _ anglegute teng _ , _ nayag teng _ , _ ata teng _ , _ naa teng _ , _ avaqutagh teng _ , _ nalighmeng _ piitesighaghvig teng _ , _ nula lleqe ut _ 1 00 - al pag luku _ . _ kenle ite ngugh meng llu _ unguvallegh meng _ allgegh u lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ aange lghii lghute t _ ukaligh igh lleqe ut _ enkaam _ ukav an lenguut _ angegh llegh ughte lleqe ut _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig leg _ . _ unaangu luku _ aane luni _ tugulagh saghtuqagh _ qepghagh tek aghqameng _ piitesighaghvig minun _ .
aghnegh mun _ tawavek _ itagnaq egkii _ akileghtugh na luki _ ataasi kagh taan _ d en ari us -meng _ , _ taagken _ qepghagh yagh stekagh i _ .
N ine- ek laag mi _ aan eq ig lluni _ esghaghkagh i _ yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ sa gpenateng _ akilpegaghvig mi _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ elpek si llu _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ qepghagh yagh tek _ , _ akileghtugh naagh amsi _ qepghagh llegh gpesistun _ ' _ .
Enkaangam _ qepghagh yagh tke aat _ . _ taagken _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni llu _ , _ th re e- k laag millu _ tawaten _ pilagh te aqe aq _ .
iiwenllu _ f iv e- ek laag naq aqaa _ , _ akilpegaghvig mun _ pi ke aq _ , _ taawa nguq _ paninang _ yug m _ ila i _ nekevgh at aagh aqef tut _ . _ aaptekagh i _ , _ ' _ sangafsi _ whaante aqe tsi _ aghn elqusiq _ sa gpenasi _ ? _ '
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ ' _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugu nghite kanginkut _ qepghaghte ngu luta _ . _ ' _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ naqam _ elpek si llu _ qepghagh yagh tek _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ ' _ .
" _ Ighivg aghy agu _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ pi ke aa _ qepghagh tet _ naas quut isteng at _ , _ ' _ Qepghagh tet _ tuqlugh tegh luki _ akileghtugh tegh qi _ kinguligh neng _ sivuligh nun _ . _ '
F iv e- ek laag mi _ qepghagh yagh tke aat _ tagi laghate te yameng _ akileghtuusagh ngekagh t _ d en ari us - kagh taan _ .
enkaam _ sivuligh t _ qepghagh tet _ akileghtuusagh nge aghagh naqe ni luteng _ pi kaayagh lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tagi laghate te yalghiimeng _ ellngit llu _ akileghtuusagh ngekagh t _ d en ari us - kagh taan _ .
akileghtuusagh nge yameng _ qivraagh tke aat _ piitesighaghvig m _ yug a _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ kinguligh u luki _ tugukagh ten _ qepghagh ut _ ataasigh ghhagh mun _ aflu mun _ . _ whangkuta _ ughleghiigh ukut _ puqla ghllag mi _ aghn elqusiq _ , _ iwernga _ akileghtugh aten _ whangkutestun _ angka an _ . _ '
iwernga _ yug m _ pi ke aa _ ataasigh _ , _ ' _ nagate aghten _ , _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ puughte nghite amken _ . _ Itag naq egkaq an _ qepghagh na luten _ ataasigh mun _ d en ari us -mun _ .
enkaam _ tugu luku _ akileghtuusagh n _ aglagh a _ . _ akileghtugh yug anka _ kinguligh t _ yug t _ tugukagh nka _ akileghtuusagh gpetun _ angka an _ .
piyuke lleg mtun _ mani ka _ atugh yaghqaqe aqa _ . _ aqina ziin _ eight- leg ite u te mneng _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ enkaam _ tamaakut _ kinguligh t _ sivulii aghte yaghqaa ut _ , _ sivuligh t _ kinguligh ughte yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ Jerusalem-emun _ mayugh te kete luku _ yug lghute neng _ aafte tke ai _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ aleghqugh nagh u luki _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ , _ Jerusalem-emun _ mayugh naqe ukut _ . _ tawani _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ chief _ priest- en unllu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ enkaam _ nanqigte luku _ tuqute yaghqaa ni lleqe aat _ .
taagken _ Gentile-enun _ tuune lleqe aat _ . _ tawani _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aat _ , _ qaquuragh lleqe aat llu _ . _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh tesaghq aaguq _ . _ "
taagken _ Z eb ed ee- m _ ighnegh gkenka _ naange ak _ tagikagh _ Jesus-mun _ ighnegh gni _ kelqellug kek _ . _ manu akun _ segesqughtekagh _ aapte vike na luku _ .
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi iigh ziin _ ? _ " _ aghnagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ akeqe nga _ ataneghpag u llegh gpeni _ ighnegh gka _ aqume ste nakegken _ aag llegh a _ aghenqignegh gpegun _ , _ ila a _ saghumignegh gpegun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Liigik enghi taghsi _ sa u ta a _ tungsighkagh i _ . _ Megh vik nayagh es teg neg uu _ qayuusigh _ meghyaghqagh ka _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ piyaqleg u ukung _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ qaywa _ qayuusigh mneng _ meghe lleqe utek _ , _ iwernga _ whanga u nghite uq _ nakmiigh yaghqagh _ kinku k _ aqume yaghqaa te kek _ aghenqignegh mkun llu _ saghumignegh mkun llu _ . _ ata ma _ yataaghqe kaqe ak _ taake uk _ aqume vigkagh k _ nakmikegkagh minun _ . _ "
taakut _ ila ita _ qula _ maligsaaghtet _ nagaqugh yamegtekek _ sa mate kek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ ugum iyag utk agket _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ tuqlugh luki _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisima kasi _ Gentile-et _ igleghutisteng ita _ at angh utaqiit _ yug teng _ , _ aangwaagh ugh tek atlu _ yug ita _ yuk egh q utk aqiit _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite usi _ . _ naligh i _ igleghte te i ste u yu kuni _ qepghagh tengugh ll i _ elpesi nun _ .
naligh i _ aange lleghpigagh u yu kuni _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh saghqaaguq _ elpesi nun _ ,
katam _ tawaten _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ pillgh atun _ . _ tagi mangite uq _ qepghaa tesqell uni _ iwernga _ tagi kau uq _ qepghagh te i na luni _ , _ tuun al ukullu _ unguvallegh ni _ nav egh qell i siq naluku _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ yug nun _ . _ "
Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ Jer i ch o -meng _ aghulaqe ma luki _ yug lghute ghllag m _ maligtekagh at _ Jesus _ .
taawa nguq _ tume t _ sani itni _ ayaakagh k _ yug k _ aqume lutek _ . _ nagaqugh yamegnegu _ Jesus _ naghughte ni luku _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ David-em _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte kung _ ! _ "
yug lghute m _ ineghtekakek _ , _ nepiigh sqellug kek _ . _ iwernga _ qevuute aghaghllug qu _ wata _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ David-em _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte kung _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aghuliigh luni _ tuqlugh lukek _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ S as qell utek _ pi aqe stek _ whanga mnun _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ iye pung _ esghagh ste aghte ki _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ nanglleg yagute lukek _ iye ik _ saaftekagh i _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ esghagh u sag u tke ak _ enkaam _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ tugh aagh yalghiimeng _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ kaate tke aat _ Beth ph ag e- mun _ M oun t _ O l iv es - melngugh mun _ . _ tawani _ kayagtekakek _ maalghug _ maligsaagh teg ni _ igleghte kestigh sqellug kek _ .
whaten _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ingavek _ ne nun _ aglagh lutek _ tawaninginaq _ esghagh lleqe aghte tek _ petug nga lghii _ donkey _ nughagh leg _ . _ I tem llukek _ tagite nakegtek _ whanga mnun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ sa meng _ pi ka nge istek _ , _ whaten _ pi naketek _ , _ ' _ Atanghem _ aklukagh ak _ . _ ' _ Tawaninginaq _ tagite ste lleqe ak _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
whaten _ pi kau uq _ apeghiigh na luku _ uuknaliq istem _ pillgha _ ,
" _ ungipaate yaghtugh ki _ , _ Z i on -eghmiit _ , _ ' _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ umiileg gpesi _ taku aqe aisi _ . _ Q us ev eg ng aaq _ d on ke y -kun _ igleghte aqe uq _ , _ d on ke y- m _ nughagh akun _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ maligsaagh tek _ igleghte kestagh lutek _ sivu itni _ , _ Jesus-em _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pikagh k _ .
donkey _ nughaghtuumagh an _ tagi tke ak _ Jesus-mun _ . _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ teghig ke sagh k _ qaye itgun _ llikagh it _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ aqumekagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag m _ tume tgun _ aatkagh teng _ saag tekiit _ , _ enkaam _ ila i _ uqfig m _ avayagh aneng _ ikute aqe luteng _ tume t _ llilaghtugh vikekagh it _ .
Yul ghutegh lag et _ Jesus-em _ sivung anil nguutlu _ kingung anil nguutlu _ akilghuu tke aat _ , _ " _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ ighnegh a _ David-em _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ ! _ usuqe i llegh _ qilagmel ngugh mun _ ! _ "
Jesus _ itegh yan _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ kag ay gun neqeg s aatkat _ whaten _ pi magh meng _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ malig tes tengita _ yug lghute ghllag t _ kiimsigh iqe ait _ , _ " _ Jesus- nguuq _ , _ uuknaliqe i sta _ , _ nazareth- meng _ Galilee- mel ngughmeng _ pi u uq _ . _ "
Jesus _ temple- mun _ itegh luni _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ qamagte luki _ tukfightugh lghiit llu _ , _ akikugh lghiit llu _ . _ taagken _ mani meng _ nav egh qugh tetlu _ t ipel ngit _ ullegh qugh qu ai _ , _ aqumutagh it llu _ qawaag meng _ akilpeg aghtet _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ ' _ mangteghagh ma _ atigh llegh kesaghqagh ke a _ , _ yughaghvig _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ elpek si _ iigh aghvig ugh taghsi _ tegleg niigh tenun _ ! _ "
taagken _ ayaakagh t llu _ , _ igh ullug mel nguutlu _ takukagh at _ Jesus _ temple- mun _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
Chief _ priest-etlu _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ esghapag luki _ allaaghlluwhaght illghi _ Jesus-em _ , _ nagate luki llu _ taghnughhagh t _ temple- mi _ akilghuu lghiit _ whaten _ , _ " _ usuqe i llegh _ ighneghagh nun _ David-em _ ! _ " _ elngaatall _ ugumi yuke aat _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ Nag an negh i sik ii _ taghnughhagh t _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ nagate anka _ . _ At igh t iig as tegguu _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pill ghit _ , _ ' _ Q aanghi tgun _ taghnughhagh t llu _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh t llu _ yataaghqe kaqe an _ usuqe i llegh _ elpenun _ katam _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ unite luki _ , _ Jerusalem-emeng _ Beth an y- t kaq _ qavagh na luni _ tamaani _ .
Jesus _ unaangu luku _ uteghnigh te kete luku _ Jerusalem-emun _ iyataghkagh _ .
tume t _ saaghw itni _ esgha qaa _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ . _ taku luku _ piyaqminigu _ ququngagh raaghinagh u uq _ figs- ngunani _ . _ enkaam _ uqfig _ tawavek _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ piite ste i naanghite uten _ . _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ uqfig _ paligh iqe aq _ .
Maligsaagh tet _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ esghapag luku _ , _ saghiigha yug te kete luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ naten _ uqfig _ sukate pigte luni _ paligh a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ malgh uk l ill ngun aan _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kufsi _ , _ whanga mtun _ pi lleqe usi _ , _ esghapag llegh gpesistun _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ . _ Taw ateng inaq _ pi naanghite usi _ talwa _ una _ naayghagh _ kayagtekufsigu _ , _ ' _ iike luten _ elpeneng _ megh mun _ milugh te n _ ' _ , _ legan _ pi lleqe uq _ .
sa meng _ alngunak _ aaptekufsi _ yugh akun _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu kufsi _ allgegh te yaghqaa usi _ . _ "
Jesus _ kaate luni _ Jerusalem-emun _ temple- mun _ iteghkagh _ . _ apeghtugh i ma luku _ , _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ kitum _ qelegh aten _ tawaten _ pisqell uten _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi u ziin _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ aapte naqe amsi _ . _ kiimsigh kufsinga _ whanga llu _ ungipaate lleqe amsi _ kitumun _ qelegh mate ka _ .
kitum _ qelegh agu _ John _ paaptaay egh is qelluku _ ? _ kiyaghneghtagh u a _ nalighmeng _ yug meng _ pi u a _ ? _ " _ taagken _ ellmeggneng _ akuzim ghh utkat _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi naqe steggu _ ? _ kiimsigh kumteggu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ni luku _ , _ whaten _ pi lleqe ainkut _ , _ ' _ Sang anÊ¼ngam _ ugpeq en ghis teggu _ John _ ? _ '
iwernga _ , _ ' _ yug meng _ pi u ni kumteggu _ ' _ , _ qemall _ yug lghute t _ sa lleqe ainkut _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqekagh at _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luku _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ Jesus _ , _ " _ nallukagh ut _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ ungipaate naanghite amsi _ kitumun _ qelegh lleg nge kau tke a _ tawaten _ pilleg mnun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ una _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleqe steggu _ ? _ yug nguq _ taawa _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh leg _ . _ sivuligh mun _ pi luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ ighnegh mni _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig mnun _ qepghagh yagh ghhaaten _ ! _ '
ighnegh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ wiin _ piyug nghite unga _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ aghneghmi _ taakwani _ avutegh qelluni _ qepghagh yaghkagh _ .
taagken _ tuungligh ghhagh anun _ ighnegh mi _ pi luni _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ pi ke aa _ . _ ighnegh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ aa-a _ , _ pi lleqe unga _ ' _ , _ iwernga _ pi ma ite ngughk _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naligh m _ ighnegh an _ qaatke kaqe agu _ ata ni _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ sivuligh m _ . _ " _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate amsi _ tax -meng _ qerngugh tes tetlu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ akike i kayug t _ yugusigh meggneng _ sivu gpesini _ itegh aat nguut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
John-em _ Paaptaay es tem _ ungipaate yaghtugh kaqe aisi _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ , _ iwernga _ ug pe qumang it aghsi _ . _ naqam _ tax -meng _ qerngught iste tlu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ akike i kayug t _ yugusigh meggneng _ ugpeqe kaqe aat _ . _ talwa _ kingu aneng _ esghapag kaqe ghngaaghpesiki _ ugpeqe kangat _ John _ , _ paninang _ elpek si _ avutegh qell usillu _ seghleghqen nan ill ghi tusi _ , _ ug pe qumang itagh sillu _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ila a _ ungipaghagh an _ nagate ggu _ . _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ piitesighagh ke aq _ grapes- meng _ nuna mikun _ . _ mingllu luku _ , _ laag te gkakek _ grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ , _ nekeftekagh a llu _ uusqagh lghii _ kelengake i vigkagh _ . _ taagken _ nav ghit kaa _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig ni _ piitesighagh tenun _ aflengake sqellug qu _ . _ taagken _ ellnga _ ila anun _ nuna m _ aglaghkagh _ .
saghna yaghqaaghte yata _ grapes -et _ , _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ qepghagh teni _ kayagtekagh i _ nengigh ni _ aqfas qelluki _ .
iwernga _ piitesighagh tet _ akuqagh luki _ qepghagh tet _ , _ ataasigh _ anag ul egh taa kaat _ , _ ila a _ tuqu tke aat _ , _ pi nga yu aat _ milugh pag aat aghhiinaq _ tuqu tke aat _ .
Qepghagh te mi _ ila i _ kayagte laataghkagh i _ , _ sivuligh neng _ uglagh aghagh luki _ , _ ellngit llu _ tawatengwaaq _ pilagh te aqe ait _ .
qenwat _ ighnegh ni _ kayagtekagh a _ ellngit nun _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ sii vag kete lleqe aat _ ighnegh ka _ . _ '
iwernga _ piitesighagh tet _ esghagh luku _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ ighnegh a _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ ' _ U um _ ighnegh an _ pi liite lleqe a _ una _ nuna _ ata ni _ tuqu kan _ . _ tuqute kumteggu _ whangkuta _ pilii lleq aghput _ una _ grapes- meng _ piitesighaghvig _ . _ '
Enkaangam _ akuqagh luku _ , _ piitesighaghvig meng _ miluute luku _ tuqu tke aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ piitesighaghvig leg m _ tagi kuni _ sa lleqe aki _ piitesighagh tet _ ? _ "
Chief _ priest-etlu _ siivanllegh t llu _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ tuqu lleqe ai _ taakut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ . _ taagken _ nav ghi lleqaa _ piitesighaghvig ni _ alla nun _ piitesighagh tenun _ . _ saghna lleghqagh _ kaate kan _ nengigh u lleqe aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ At igh t iig as tekii _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pill ghit _ ? _ ' _ uyghag _ taana _ mangtegh angllagh tet _ ighsakekagh at _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh ughtekau uq _ uyghag _ . _ taana _ Atanghem _ pil qaa _ , _ urang _ pinigh lleghpigagh u uq _ whangkunnun _ ! _ '
" _ Enkaangam _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi neng _ awite yaghqaa uq _ , _ enkaam _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ yug nun _ piite ste i yaghqagh nun _ f ru it - nganeng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ "
" _ kina _ alngunak _ taaggun _ uyghag kun _ iqu kuni _ , _ pelime yaghqaa uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ taam _ uyghag m _ ifkagh vike gkunigu _ si f taagh qelleq aa _ . _ "
Chief _ priest-etlu _ Pharisees-etlu _ nagate luki _ Jesus-em _ ungipaghagh ta i _ liigikekagh t _ Jesus- em nguq _ ellngit _ akuzite kaqe ai _ .
enkaam _ tugu yu kaqsagh kangat _ , _ iwernga _ alingekagh t _ yug lghute ghllag neng _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ Jesus _ uuknaliqe i ste u ni luku _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh laataghkagh i _ taakut _ yug t _ ungipaghaate tgun _ . _ pi ke aq _ ,
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ whatete uq _ , _ umiileg m _ ighnegh ni _ nengughte naqe lghii _ yataaghqe tke a _ neqenghaghqe te na luku _ .
Qepghagh teni _ kayagtekagh i _ ungipaa sagh tiis qelluki _ tagsiqligh iqe aat _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ tagilaghaa tesqelluki _ , _ iwernga _ tag iy un ghit kat _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ pi ke ai _ ila i _ qepghagh teni _ , _ ' _ ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ tagsiqligh iqe anka _ neqenghaghqe lleg mnun _ , _ neghyaghq an Ê¼nguq _ apeghiigh ut _ . _ Tuq ut iigh te sim aanka _ yugtaanegh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ qu w in t alghii nengllu _ nugh aghneng _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ apeghiigh uq _ . _ Tag il in Ê¼nguq _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ ! _ '
iwernga _ aqelqaghqagh t _ tagsiqligh iqe ait _ waa kumang ilnguut _ . _ yeghlegi _ navek _ sa yaghtugh tke aat _ , _ ataasigh _ piitesighaghvig minun _ pi ke aq _ , _ ila a _ estugagh minun _ ,
umiileg m _ qepghagh tengi _ ila ita _ akuqagh luki _ sakusiiqe luki _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ .
umiileg _ sakrite ghllagkagh _ enkaam _ pilluw aght eni _ kayagtekagh i _ . _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ yugtaghkagh t _ , _ kumagh tekaa tlu _ nenge aat _ .
taagken _ qepghagh teni _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ nengughte naqe m _ neqenghaghqe sighqagh i _ apeghiigh ut _ . _ aqelqagh ngllagh kaqsagh kenka _ seghletun _ pi kau te meggneng _ tagipagningite ut _ .
Enkaangam _ aane lusi _ tume nun _ nallagh kasi _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ neqenghaghqesaghtigh sqe teki _ . _ '
Qepghagh tet _ aane luteng _ tume ni _ qamagte luki _ nallaqagh teng _ seghleghu yagh nga a ta _ , _ pinigh yagh nga a ta _ negh yaghtigh sqekagh it _ , _ enkaam _ nengughte te vig _ esleqeaghaghtekagh _ .
" _ umiileg m _ esghagh yaghtugh yaq miniki _ aqelqagh t _ , _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ aate ma ite ngughk _ nengughte naqe lghii m _ aatkagh aneng _ .
enkaam _ aaptekagh a _ , _ ' _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ naten _ itegh ziin _ nengughte naqe lghii m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate gpenang _ ? _ ' _ yug m _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke a _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ qepghagh tet _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ iigge i llu _ , _ itegagh i llu _ asighte luki _ qagavek _ mamleg mun _ miluute ggu _ , _ tawani _ yug t _ qiya lleqe ut _ ggute teng llu _ terqitaagtagh lleqe ait _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus-em _ taaqe nigh ke ai _ akuzillegh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ uglagh pestaagh _ tagsiqligh kau ghngaan _ , _ iwernga _ palaghhagh u ut _ nakmikegkagh t _ . _ "
taagken _ Pharisees-et _ unite luku _ Jesus _ agghi tke aat _ naten _ anag niil qav ig igh naluku _ Jesus _ akuzillegh akun _ .
enkaam _ kayagtekagh it _ ila i _ maligsaaghte teng _ , _ ila i llu _ Herod i an -et _ Jesus-mun _ . _ whaten _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ liisimake amken _ akuzi aqe uten _ ipa u luku _ . _ apeghtuusagh n llu _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh a _ ipa u uq _ . _ aangwaagh u yagh nga a ta _ , _ ukav an sagh ngaata _ paninang _ apeghtugh aqe aten _ tawateghpigaq _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate aghte kut _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpeneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ani _ elqughutngagh a _ llivike i lleghqagh ut _ tax -e meng _ Caesar -mun _ ? _ Ll iv ik il taa -a _ nalighmeng _ pi nghite lta _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimakekagh i _ seghletun _ piyug u kangat _ , _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piniiyugnegh ni _ elpek si _ ! _ sangama _ anag niil qav ig igh naqutk es tengnga _ ?
keleg u vike tengnga _ mani meng _ tax -mun _ llivike i sighqagh meng _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tagi tke aat _ mani meng _ .
taagken _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ gginagh ke agu _ una _ ? _ kitum _ ategh kagu _ una _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Caesar -em _ . _ " _ Enkaangam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tuune teki _ Caesar -mun _ tamaakut _ Caesar -em _ pi i _ , _ tuune teki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi i _ . _ "
nagate yamegteggu _ saghiigha yuke aat _ taagken _ unite luku _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
tawani _ aghneghmi _ Sa dd uc ees -et _ aapte yaghtugh qu aat _ Jesus _ . _ Tamaa kunguut _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh t _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh tekayug utangi _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ yuug _ nulightugh luni _ tuqu kan _ avaquti gpenani _ , _ anglegut angan _ tugu yaghqaqe a _ ugi igh aq _ avaquti tete na luku _ anglegute ni _ tuqukagh _ . _ '
M aan sagh tut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yug t _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ . _ nuyekligh _ nulightugh luni _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ enkaam _ nulighh a _ anglegut angan _ tugukagh a _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a llu _ angleg utanga _ tuqu uq _ avaquti gpenani _ . _ enkaam _ pi nga yu an _ anglegut angan _ tugu a _ taana _ aghnagh _ . _ qamagte luteng _ tugu aqe luku _ tuqu laghate te ut _ avaquti gpenateng _ .
kinguligh u luni _ aghnagh _ tuqu kau uq _ .
ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ unguvagh uute llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kitum _ aghnagh _ nuligh qelleq agu _ , _ qamagte luteng qun _ tugu kaqe kangat _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ anaggute nga usi _ qayughllak _ liigike igate asi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ talwa _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute kumeng _ nengughte te yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ yaquleg stun _ qilagmel ngughestun _ .
At igh t iig as tegguu _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ elpesi nun _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute lleghqagh itneng _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ ,
' _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ Abraham-em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ Isaa c -em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga llu _ Jacob -em _ . _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ nakaan _ tuqukagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nagate luku _ , _ saghiigha yagute ghllagkagh at _ .
Pharisees-et _ nagaqugh yamegteki _ Sa dd uc ees -et _ Jesus-mun _ nepiigh qw aan iluki _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
ataasigh m _ Pharisees -em _ apeghtughiste an _ liilightuusagh t _ aapte qugh aa qaa _ Jesus _ anag niil qav ig igh naluku _ .
whaten _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ n a tung aawa _ angegh lleghpigagh _ liilightuusagh ni _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ' _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ piniqe yaghqaqe an _ qamagte luku _ ilu gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku _ unguva sigh gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku _ umyugagh gpegun _ . _ '
taana _ angegh lleghpigagh u uq llu _ , _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq llu _ liilightuusagh _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ angegh lleghpigagh _ liilightuusagh _ sivuligh tun _ ayuqe uq _ : _ ' _ piniqe yaghqaqe aten _ yug lgute ten _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ katam _ . _ '
taake uk _ liilightuusagh k _ tunemagh u uk _ tamaghh itnun _ liilightuusagh nun llu _ , _ apeghtuusagh itnun llu _ uuknaliqistet _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ Pharisees-et _ qerngughte te nga ma luki _ ,
" _ naten _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe steggu _ Christ-a _ ? _ kitum _ ighnegh ke agu _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke a _ David-em _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ Sang anÊ¼ngam _ David-em _ akuzi aqngami _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ atigh agu _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ ,
' _ Atanghem _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ , _ aqume i _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ lli aghte lleg mnun _ . _ '
David-em _ atigh ma kagu _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ naten _ ighnegh ke agu _ ? _ "
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ Pharisees-et _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke aat _ Jesus _ . _ taagken _ kenle ke luku _ kitum _ alngunak _ tetug yagutekagh at _ aapte nghmeng _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ yug lghute t llu _ , _ maligsaagh ten illu _ ,
" _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees-etlu _ aqumga ut _ Moses-em _ aqumutagh akun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke aqe teki _ qamagte luki _ apeghtuusagh it _ elpesi nun _ , _ iwernga _ ellngit a _ sall ghit _ maligte gpenaki _ . _ sa sqe aqe aisi _ naqam _ ellngit a _ pi igate ait _ .
apeghtugh i llegh it _ liilightuusagh neng _ piyaqnagh pigte ut _ yug nun _ qaatkesaghqagh u luteng _ . _ apeghtuusagh it _ uqigtuqagh stun _ akmag stun _ ayuqe ut _ akmag ste aqe kangit _ yug nun _ , _ naqamllu _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ ighneghwaagh eng _ atuqe igate aat _ kayusiite na luki _ akmagite neng _ .
" _ qamagte luki _ pinitun _ pilleg teng _ pi aqe ait _ esghagh saq naluki _ yug nun _ . _ talligh megteggun llu _ qagugh megteggun llu _ qillghutagh ke ait _ p ategh taagh all uki _ sal ng aw aaghh aat _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ imaleg t _ , _ qaasligh meng llu _ qughalkutagh it _ taake luki _ ulima aqe ait _ .
Neq engh aghq em mi _ , _ aqume yuneghtu ut _ aangwaagh ugh tekat _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ synagogue- nillu _ tawatel ngugh teggun _ aqume yuneghtu ut _ .
Quul v agh tesug aqut _ akilpegaghvig ni _ , _ atigh sqe sug aqe ut llu _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste meng _ ' _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ atigh ste gpenasi _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste meng _ ' _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ apeghtughiste i _ , _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ ayuqe usi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ atigh gpenaan _ , _ ' _ ata meng _ ' _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ .
talwa _ kitumun _ alngunak _ atigh ste gpenasi _ , _ ' _ Igleghut iste meng _ ' _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ igleghutiste z i _ , _ Christ- anguuq _ .
taana _ angegh lleghpigagh _ qepghagh tek aghq aqaghsi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ angli stekuni _ qusevegtesaghqagh u uq _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ qusevegtekuni _ angli ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ .
" _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh unaq nguusi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ umeg te aqe asi _ itegh naqe lghiit _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ elpek si _ katam _ itegh igate usi _ , _ aghula i ughtagh kasi llu _ itegh yug lghiit _ !
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ esghaghlaataqu luki _ ugingighagh t _ mangteghiigh aqe asi _ . _ taagken _ pinigh ni lusi _ pis qellusi _ taake luku _ yughagh aqe usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghyuugh lleg nge ghllag yaghqaa usi _ !
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ iglegha aqe usi _ kellii kun llu _ , _ qute kun llu _ ivagh na luku _ ataasigh _ yuug _ ugpegh h n naluku _ elpesi stun _ . _ taagken _ apeghtuusagh si _ ugpeqe gkaki _ apeghtuusagh gpesi _ aglagh tesaghq aagh lleqaa _ hell- mun _ , _ enkaam _ elpek si _ aghyuugh llegh gpesineng _ malgh ugh qeng ngaan _ aghyuugh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ !
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ elpek si _ , _ ayaakagh ni _ igleghut is teni _ ! _ apeghtugh i aqe usi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ temple- kun _ " _ taana _ pit ngunghituq _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ gold -ng akun _ Temp le -em _ " _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh ke a _ akequsagh ni _ ' _ .
elpek si _ ayaakagh ni _ temngitwh as teni _ ! _ Nal ikek _ megnu nagh aghagh ak _ , _ gold -a _ , _ nalighmeng _ temple- a _ agleghnagh ste i lghii _ gold-meng _ ?
apeghtugh i aqe usi llu _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ aghqefig eg nekun _ " _ , _ taana _ pit ngunghituq _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ whaten _ pikumi _ , _ " _ akeqe i unga _ tunusagh kun _ aghqefig gnite ngugh qun _ , _ " _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh ke a _ akequsagh ni _ . _ '
Ay aang aghh aal ek _ elpek si _ ! _ Nal ikek _ megnu nagh aghagh ak _ , _ tunusagh _ nalighmeng _ aghqefig k _ agleghnagh ste i lghiik _ tunute yameng _ ?
Enkaangam _ kina _ akeqe i kuni _ aghqefig eg nekun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ taaggun llu _ sa kun llu _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ aghqefig gnite ngugh qun _ .
kina llu _ akeqe i kuni _ temple- kun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ taaggun llu _ kiyaghte lghii kun llu _ tawani _ .
kina llu _ akeqe i kuni _ qilag kun _ , _ akeqe i u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aqumutagh gkenkun llu _ aqumga lghii kun llu _ tawani _ .
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuune aqe asi _ qu lagh qellgh i _ neqe mun _ neqnighsaate t _ , _ min t- et _ , _ d ill -et _ , _ cum min -et _ . _ iwernga _ avelghagh aqe asi _ apeghtuusagh t _ megnu nagh aghagh lghiit _ Liilightuus anilnguut _ katam _ : _ tanem ii llghite llegh _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh _ , _ ataasiighmete llegh _ . _ taakut _ atughqagh ke yagh asi _ avelghagh fqiita _ ila i llu _ liilightuusagh t _ .
ayaakagh ni _ igleghut is teni _ ! _ yug tun _ ayuqe usi _ nguuyngaaghagh _ meghyaghqagh mineng _ iqite luku _ taagken _ c amel -a _ tuufte lleqe a _ !
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ qayuusigh si llu _ sagnegh si llu _ qaye i _ sangigte aqe asi _ , _ naqam _ imigh nga ut _ wayagh niighkagh gpesineng llu _ , _ pakigniigh llegh gpesineng llu _ .
ayaa nga lghii _ Pharis e e _ ! _ sivuke lukek _ sangigte kek _ ilu ik _ qayuusigh m llu _ sagnegh m llu _ enkaam _ qaaske te lutek llu _ ukmangite te lik _ !
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ tuqukagh t _ sal ngag istun _ ayuqe usi _ piineqekagh t _ qatelghii meng _ . _ esghaqagh u luteng _ qaye i _ pinighhalek _ , _ iwernga _ qama _ imaqe ut _ neghqughrug meng llu _ aghu llegh meng llu _ .
elpek si llu _ tawatete usi _ . _ qaye gpesineng _ pi nighte yug ni ghllaget _ , _ iwernga _ ilu gpesini _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ , _ apeghtugh te gkasi _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe igate asi _ . _ "
" _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ elpek si _ apeghtugh i kayug ni _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en illu _ ! _ piniiyugnegh u usi _ ! _ mangteghasqwaagh ngllagh aqe asi _ llivegh itgun _ uuknaliqistet _ , _ pinighnaghsagh aqe asi llu _ llivegh it _ tamaakut _ kiyaghtekagh t _ elqughute luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
taagken _ whaten llu _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghtekaayagh kumta _ sivunegh mnni _ , _ tuqu qul gu sigh nay an ghit ngwaagh aput _ uuknaliq ist eneng _ ' _ .
tawaten _ akuzillegh gpesigun _ liigike ste usi _ , _ kingun qen nilusi _ tuququgh teng itnun _ uuknaliqistet _ .
enkaam _ sa aqe tsi _ sivunegh gpesi _ piinlegh iqe aat _ apeghiigh teggu _ .
nemeghyagh ni _ elpek si _ , _ avaqutagh itni _ nemeghyagh t _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa ni lusi _ , _ naten _ anag naqe steggu _ aghyuugh lleghqagh i _ hell- mi _ ?
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ kayagte vike amsi _ uuknaliq ist en engllu _ , _ liisima lghii neng llu _ , _ apeghtughiste neng llu _ . _ ila it _ tuqu qugh lleqe asi _ , _ ila it _ qaquuragh lleqe asi _ , _ enkaam _ ila it _ synagogue- eg pesini _ kagsagmig lleqe asi _ , _ ila it _ t o w n -en eng _ ila itnun _ malighqugh lleqe asi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe aisi _ tuqu qu llegh itnun _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghtekagh t _ elqughute luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ Ab el -meng _ Z e ch ari ah -mun _ , _ ighnegh a _ Bar ach i ah-m _ . _ tuqutekagh i _ akule gkeni _ Temple- emllu _ aghqefig m llu _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ elpek si _ unguva lghii ni _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe aisi _ tamaakunun _ seghletun _ pi llegh nun _ !
" _ kaay _ , _ Jerusalem _ , _ Jerusalem _ ! _ tuqu qu qagh katen _ uuknaliqistet _ , _ milugh agaatagh luki llu _ tuqu qugh katen _ kayagtekagh nka _ elpenun _ . _ uglagh u pigte luku _ qerngughte yug aqe yagh anka _ yug ten _ whanga mnun _ , _ katam _ qawaag m _ qerngughte llegh atun _ amaaghagh ghhagh ni _ yaqugh gmi _ asi anun _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pis tes ugum angit aghpenga _ .
Enkaangam _ mangteghagh n _ paaghqite te lleqe a _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ esgh aghnaanghi tagh pesinga _ alla _ kenlanga _ whaten _ pi llegh gpesinun _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus _ aane luni _ temple- meng _ aghulaqe ma luku _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ keleg tke ait _ mangteghagh t _ Temp le -em _ pi i _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ esghagh asi _ tamaakut _ mangteghagh t _ . _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ talwa _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ nem in in naanghituq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ullegh qugh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus _ aqume yan _ M oun t _ O l iv es -kun _ , _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ ellngin aghh aam aagh luteng _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ , _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqau aat _ ? _ sa u lleqe a _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ tagi lleghqagh gpenun _ , _ nuna m llu _ iqugte lleghqagh anun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ .
qayughllak _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ka _ , _ whaten _ pi aqe luteng _ , _ ' _ whanga _ Christ- ang uunga _ ' _ , _ puughte qughtagh u yaghqaqe aat llu _ yug lghute _ .
nagaqugh u lleqe usi _ pilluw aneng _ , _ akusqaghtagh u tke llegh itneng llu _ pilluw at _ ; _ alinge gpenasi _ qayughllak _ tamaa na _ pi yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ salin _ iqugte naqngu nghite uq _ .
nuna t _ yug it _ pillug utu lleqe ut _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh t llu _ pillug utu lleqe ut _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ neqangisag ghllag lleqe uq _ , _ nuna t _ uvelegtagh ghllag lleqe ut _ .
qamagte luni _ tamaa na _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu kestagh llegh atun _ ayuqe lleqe uq _ .
" _ taagken _ tamaa na _ pi ma luku _ yug t _ tugu lleqe aisi _ , _ amyuqetagh tke lleqe aisi _ , _ tuqu lleqe aisi llu _ . _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ tamaghhagh an _ ramke an _ ugumiite lleqe aisi _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghii m _ ugpeqe nanigh lleqe aatnga _ , _ uveghpag utu sag u lleqe ut _ , _ ugumiite yagute lleqe ut llu _ .
taagken _ uuknaliqiste sigh waal ghutet _ tagi luteng _ puughte qugh lleqe ait _ yug lghute t _ .
seghlegh _ nul am _ angtalanganeng _ apallugh ke luku _ allute luteng _ yug t _ piniqe i nanigh lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nuqete neghtuqagh _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ .
ukut llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa ut _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ramke itnun _ nagaq iisqelluki _ . _ taagken _ nuna _ iqugte lleqe uq _ . _ "
" _ yeqay _ atigh tugh tem _ liigike ligu _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ uuknaliq istem _ D an i el -em _ uuknaliqe tkekagh a _ . _ uuknaliqe tkekagh a _ taana _ agleghnagh ite ngugh u uq _ paaghqite te ste i lghii _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ ne mi _ . _ esghagh kufsigu _ tesqamani _ nekeve lghii _ ,
Judea- melnguut _ anagniigh ghhaat _ naayghagh nun _ .
yuug _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anite ngughk _ ukig luni _ saghyaqu te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
yuug _ piitesigh u aghagh vig mete ngughk _ qaasligh ghqu te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ seghlegh waagh unaq nguut _ qumig leg t _ aghnagh t _ , _ mamaghtagh leg t llu _ !
yughaghte k _ anagniigh fqaafsi _ uksugh mi _ pis qellusi _ nalighmeng _ Sabbath -mi _ ,
qayughllak _ tamaani _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag ughte yaghqaa uq _ . _ Seghlegh atagh aa yaghqaaguq _ seghleliigh aqe llegh neng _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ wh av emun _ kenlanga _ . _ allameng llu _ tawatel nguq _ pi naanghite u aghte uq _ .
tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pal all im angis aq aki _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ unguva nayagh nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ apallugh ke luki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ aghnegh t _ pal all iyaghq aqii _ .
" _ tamaani _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ Christ-a _ whaa _ ' _ , _ nalighmeng _ , _ ' _ Taz ing an tuq _ ! _ ' _ ugpeqe gpenaan _ ,
qayughllak _ Christ- asigh waagh etlu _ , _ uuknaliqiste sighwaagh etlu _ tagi lleqe ut _ . _ All aagh lluwh aght ighllag llequt _ , _ saghiigh an aghq eghllag lleq utlu _ puughhe na luki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ puugh saqleg uku megteki _ .
taawa _ ungipaate amsi _ siv ut gh ulluku _ pi lleghqagh _ .
" _ Enkaangam _ whaten _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ Christ-a _ paaghqagh igh llegh anite uq _ ! _ ' _ taku gpenaan _ ; _ nalighmeng _ whaten _ pika ta _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ mangteghagh m _ ilu anite uq _ ' _ , _ ugpeqe gpenaki _ .
qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kuni _ tawatete yaghqaa uq _ nighugte pagte te te llegh tun _ kuukgute lleqe uq _ asiv aghmeng _ pakfalla mun _ .
" _ qawaagpag t _ qerngughte aqe ut _ nani _ alngunak _ ke meg qw aal g unghani _ .
" _ ' _ kingu ngiighhagh itneng _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ siqinegh _ mamleg ste lleqe a _ , _ tanqigh _ nighugte te nanigh ste lleqe a _ , _ ighaleqetaagh t _ ifkagh qu uute ste lleqe ai _ qilaga meng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh et _ qilag amel nguut _ iglegha llegh it _ allangughte uute ste lleqe ai _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ qilaga kun _ sa u a _ allgegh lleqe uq _ liisimake sighqagh _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ . _ taagken _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ nuna m _ ramke i _ qiv ghu m _ qiya aghte te te ghllagte lleqe ut _ . _ esghagh lleqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ qilag waagh teggun _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh tuum agh millu _ nighughqell eligh llag lun illu _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ qalghightu an _ qalghigh ste ghllag kunigu _ kayagte lleqe ai _ yaquleg ni _ navek _ alngunak _ qerngugh tesqelluki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ liite vike teggu _ uqfig a _ fig s-em _ . _ esghagh kufsiki _ avayagh i _ unite te lugh u i aghagh lghiit _ , _ ququngagh i _ piite kestagh lghiit _ , _ liisimakagh i _ kiig yaghtugh ngestagh aa _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ apeghkagh nka _ tamaakut _ esghagh kufsiki _ , _ liisimak elleq aghsi _ ellnga _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh ma uq _ , _ aaqun _ amig mun _ lliigh ma uq _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maaten _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu laghate te ste gpenaki _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ .
qilag a llu _ , _ nuna llu _ aviighute yaghqaa uk _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ akuzite nka _ aviighute naanghite ut _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ taam _ aghnegh m _ aflu a _ qakun _ kaate yaghqaa ta a _ . _ talwa _ qilag melnguut _ yaquleg t _ nalluke aat _ , _ ighnegh m llu _ nalluke a _ , _ ata inagh ghhagh m _ liisimake a _ .
katam _ tamaani _ N o ah-m _ kiyaghte llegh ani _ , _ yug t _ tawatete yaghqaa ut _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh ani _ .
