taagken _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghte minun _ qafsinkaghte ai ta _ aqume ste sqekagh i _ vegaagh kun _ .
enkaam _ aqume te tke aat _ 1 00 -ng waaq luteng _ 5 0 -ng waaq luteng _ .
Jesus-em _ tugu luki _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maalghug llu _ iqallug k _ , _ qule mun _ sivugte luni _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh t _ iigge mineng _ aavgugh luki _ maligsaaghte minun _ tunqugh qu ai _ uyeg tesqelluki _ . _ iqallug k llu _ ii- gmineng _ aavgugh lukek _ tunqugh stekagh i _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luni _ negh te tke aq _ kepsugh te luni _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ tugulaghkagh it _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ paskete t _ esleqnga lghiit _ kagimlegh ughtekagh neng _ neqekrangllagh neng _ , _ iqallug neng llu _ .
yug t _ negh te tke aat _ 5 ,000 -nguftut _ , _ kesutke gpenaki _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ .
legan _ taaqe ut _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ qelqe ai _ angyagh kun _ iglegh tek est iisqelluki _ Beth s a id a-mun _ , _ naayvagh m _ inglung anil ngugh mun _ . _ taagken _ ellnga n _ yug lghute t _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ ne itnun _ .
Aglagh tu utes am iki _ yughagh yaghtuqagh _ qemi mun _ .
Unug mi _ taakwani _ angyagh t _ naayvagh mete luki _ Jesus _ ellngin aghh aak aq _ qute mi _ .
esghaghkagh i _ maligh saagh teni _ aygugh naqutke lghiit _ y aav uqu meng _ , _ qayughllak _ anuqligh u uute kangi _ . _ akule gkeni _ th re e- kell aag enkuk _ si x - ek ell aag enkuk _ unaangu luku _ , _ takukagh i _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ . _ naghughte naqe aqe ai llu _ 
esghaghkagh at _ megh kun _ piyug lghii _ . _ sumegh meggni _ taghneghagh u ni luku _ aragh ghllagkagh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ alingruugh tke aat _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ilutughte tek _ ! _ whanga u unga _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ . _ "
legan _ angyagh mun _ uugg tuq _ ell maa r agll ug ugh tekaq _ . _ Maligsaagh tet _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ ,
qayughllak _ paninang _ liigike igate kangat _ Jesus _ kina u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ esghapag ghngaaghmegteggu _ neqekrangllagh t _ nula stegkangi _ . _ tawatete kau lghiit _ qayughllak _ salin _ umyugagh it _ reghigh igate ngugh t _ .
taagken _ nagneqe aat _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ enkaam _ gennesaret- kun _ tamlag luteng _ angyagh eng _ petug qu aat _ .
legan _ angyagh eng _ unite aat _ yug t _ lii suq ngin aam aan _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ .
enkaam _ keleg qaghtagh te ragkiighkagh t _ Jesus _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ Jesus _ navek _ pi yagh ghngaan _ qinu yuget _ aglagh te aqe kangit _ allighagh itgun _ ellnga nun _ .
Jesus _ kaate nghmini _ ne ghllag nun llu _ , _ ne nun llu _ , _ esl amel ngughnun _ akilpegaghvig nun _ aglagh aqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagite aqe kangit _ qinu yuget _ akilpegaghvig nun _ Jesus-mun _ naallgh utes qelluki _ . _ Jesus-mun _ manigugh ututka ait _ qinu yu gnun _ waran _ saafte sqellug qu _ kenu i _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ saafte i lghiit _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
Pharisees-etlu _ ila i llu _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ Jerusalem-emeng _ pi t _ , _ Jesus-em _ uvit anganun _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
esghaghkagh it _ maligte yaaghte yan _ ila i _ uughtugh gpenateng _ neghe lghiit _ . _ uughtugh llghite ngugh t _ Pharisees-et _ pisqell ghistun _ .
( _ Pharisees-etlu _ Jews -etlu _ qamagte luteng _ negh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ wetku qun _ sivuke luteng _ uugh tugh waagh luteng _ , _ qayughllak _ sivugh nghmeng _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe u kangit _ .
talwa _ akilpegaghvig meng _ tagi negh meggni _ negh igate ngugh t _ wetku _ sivuke luten _ ukmangigh sagh waagh aqelghiit _ . _ ila i llu _ sivugh nghmeng _ apeghtuus al ghut angit _ atuqe u kangit _ . _ A tuq f agilg am egt iki _ qayuusigh teng _ , _ sagnegh teng _ , _ siilu t _ gaaghusigh teng _ sang igh qugh waagh aqegkangit _ . _ )
enkaam _ Pharisees-etlu _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangameng _ maligsaaghte ten _ uughtugh gpenateng _ negh aqe aat _ ? _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe igate ait _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elqughte lusi _ Isai ah-m _ uuknaliqe tke ma kangisi _ piniiyugnegh ni _ elpek si _ . _ whaten _ igagh kau uq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ akuzite megteggun _ quulv aghaq aatnga _ , _ nakaan _ ilu megteggun _ .
temngi _ manigugh aqe aatnga _ , _ qayughllak _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ katam _ whanga _ liilightuusagh ke pigte lghii stun _ . _ " _ '
enkaam _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pakig luki _ qaatke aqe asi _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pakig i lleg pigu usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh itnun _ qaatke pigesnagh na luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ .
una _ esgha _ uspute aq _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesinun _ : _ Moses-em _ apegh kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ whaten _ pi lghiit _ , _ ' _ Quul v aghluku _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ ' _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ seghlequ uqu mi kek _ tuqute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ '
iwernga _ elpek si _ alla u ut _ apeghtugh i lleg si _ . _ whaten _ pi aqe usi _ , _ ' _ yug m nguq _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ whaten _ pi yagh ghngaaghmigu _ , _ " _ kayusiite sighqagh lgu unga _ elpenun _ iwernga _ tuun aanghi taqa _ qayughllak _ Cor b an -nguuq _ . _ " _ ' _ ( _ Corban _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ siingenllu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ akequsagh ke ma aqa _ . _ )
tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ apeghtugh aqe asi _ yug t _ kayusiite nghite yagh nga atki _ ata it llu _ naa it llu _ pisqelluki _ .
enkaam _ pakig aqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke pigesnagh na luki _ yug nun _ elpek si _ katam _ akuzite si _ . _ tamaakut _ temngi _ usputagh u ut _ , _ uglagh u pigte ut _ sa u aat _ pi aqe kesi _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute t _ ellmi nun _ tagsigh nqigte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Qamagtengngwaagh lusi _ nagate lusi _ liigike teggu _ sa meng _ pi tke a _ .
yuug _ neghekagh an _ nukeggnaghqe igate a _ , _ seghletun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh an _ , _ s allgh anllu _ nukeggnaghqe aqe a _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ unite luki _ yug lghute t _ itegh yan _ maligsaaghtengita _ aaptekagh at _ ungipaghagh an _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si llu _ liigik igat sii _ ? _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ negh aqe kanga _ nukeggnaghqe sighqagh u nghite uq _ ellnga nun _ ,
qayughllak _ neghekagh i _ igh saq ghw anun _ pi naanghite ut _ . _ Aq saq ghw anun _ pi aqe ut _ enkaam _ yugusigh aneng _ aane aqe ut _ . _ " _ ( _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ Jesus-em _ apegh u a _ neqe t _ qamagte luteng _ negh yaghqaa ni luki _ . _ )
pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ yug m _ qamaken _ ilu mineng _ aane stekagh an _ nukeggnaghqe sta qaa _ .
qaamken _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ aane aqe ut _ : _ sumeghtaghagh lleg lug t _ , _ nengughte gpenani _ kitu meng _ alngunak _ atuqe i llegh _ , _ tegleg ni uq _ , _ yugte aq _ ,
gelgaghni ii aagh _ , _ pakig ni uq _ , _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi llegh _ , _ puughte i _ , _ kayngusaghagh te llegh _ , _ aqina _ , _ yug lgute meng _ iqlengiqe tke i _ , _ qukaayug a _ , _ teme it wha _ .
tamaakut _ qamagte luteng _ seghlegh t _ yug m _ ilu aneng _ aanekagh t _ nukeggnaghqe i kayugu ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ T yr e- m _ tunganganun _ , _ kaate luni _ mangteghagh mun _ iteghkagh _ . _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nalluke sug u yagh kanga _ kaate lleg ni _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ liisimakekagh at _ .
aghnagh m _ Gen til e-em _ , _ allgeghkagh m _ Ph o en ic ia- mi _ , _ S y ri a- melngugh mi _ nagaqugh qu a _ Jesus _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ Pan igg aa _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ enkaam _ aglagh ragkiigh luni _ Jesus-mun _ segesqughte luni _ manu akun _ , _ manigugh tke aq _ aane ste aghte sqellug qu _ tughneghagh _ panig mineng _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh t _ sivuke luteng _ neghesaghqagh u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ anaggute nga uq _ taghnughhagh t _ neqe it _ tugu luki _ qikmigh nun _ miluute kumeng _ . _ "
aghnagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ atanegh _ , _ talwa _ qikmigh t _ tipele m _ asing anilnguut _ negh aqe ut _ taghnughhagh t _ ifkagh qell ghitneng _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ naqam qun _ tawaten _ kiim sighagh pe nga _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ tughneghagh _ aane ma uq _ panig gpeneng _ ! _ "
aghnagh _ ne minun _ aglagh yalghiimi _ panig a _ ingaghmete uq _ qavaghvig mi _ , _ taawa _ llaaghan _ tughneghagh _ aane ma lghii _ panig aneng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ T yr e-meng _ . _ S id on- kunllu _ , _ qula _ ne ghllag tgun llu _ aag luni _ naayvagh mun _ galilee- mun _ pi ke aq _ .
yug t _ ila ita _ , _ yuug _ nagaqugh te igate ngughk _ talwa _ akuziyiilngugh _ tagite luku _ Jesus-mun _ nanglleg s iit kaat _ saafte sqellug qu _ .
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aw iitutka a _ yug lghute neng _ . _ sivuke luku _ tekegh gni _ sigute gkenun _ kanaghte lukek _ , _ taagken _ iqite lukek _ qesigh luki _ iigge ni _ , _ ulu a _ saaftekagh a _ .
taagken _ sivugte luni _ qilag mun _ anegh pak aghluni _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Eph ph ath a _ ! _ " _ ( _ taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u lghii _ , _ " _ reghigh tek _ ! _ " _ )
Tawaninginaq _ yug m _ sigute kek _ reghigh iqe ak _ , _ ulu a llu _ piniightekagh _ , _ aga _ akuzi inagh magh mi _ pi ke aq _ akuzi yiilliqe gpenani _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ inegh tengngwaaq ii _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ iwernga _ inegh taat aghy is teng _ wata _ ungipagh kekagh at _ .
nagaqugh te lghiit _ tamaakut _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ , _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U um _ yug m _ sall gha _ qamagte luni _ pi nigh perewaagh u uq _ ! _ talwa _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh t _ nagaqugh te yagute ste ai _ , _ akuz iy iil nguutlu _ akuzi yagute ste ai _ ! _ "
Taam _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ yug lghute ghllag _ qerngughte te laataghkagh _ . _ Negh yaghqaq ragg iigh us ata _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ tagsigh luki _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ ukut _ nanglleg yagute pigte anka _ . _ Whang am nin naq neghmeng _ pingayut ni _ aghnegh ni _ neghyaghqagh igh te ut _ .
ne itnun _ aglagh stekumki _ neghe ste gpenaki _ tume mi _ taakwani _ ullegh aa llequt _ , _ qayughllak _ ila i _ uyavagh neng _ tagi laghate te kau ut _ . _ "
Maligsaagh tengita _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ maani _ paaghqite uq _ naken _ neqenge naqe sta _ whaten _ uglaghqak alghiinun _ naama yaghqagh meng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ uglaghqak aan _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ neqekrangllagh t _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qelqe ai _ aqum uu tesqelluki _ nuna kun _ . _ taagken _ tugu luki _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ kiyaghnegh _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ , _ kagim lluki _ tuunekagh i _ maligsaaghte minun _ uyeg tesqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ maligsaagh tengi _ uyegtekagh t _ .
qafsinkuuragh ghhagh neng llu _ am sak alghii neng _ iqallug leg t _ . _ Jesus-em _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ taakut llu _ maligsaaghte minun _ uyegte sqekagh i _ .
entaqun _ 4 ,000 - nguut _ yug t _ kepsugh te luteng _ negh te tke aat _ . _ taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ qerngugh saq megteggu _ siipnegh _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ paskete t _ imeg iqe ait _ esleqeaghaghte luki _ .
Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aghulaqe uute ste luki _ , _ enkaam _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ angyagh mun _ uugte luteng _ aghulaq ngin aam aghmeng _ pikagh t _ D al man ut h a-mun _ .
Tamaan lenguut _ Pharisees-et _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaghtiiraaghkagh at _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ All aagh lluwh aght ighllag i _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeq elleq aghput _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh en _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi ke aat _ anag niil qav ig igh naluku _ .
Jesus-em _ anegh pag luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangameng _ maaten _ aghnegh m _ yug i _ allaaghlluwhaght illegh meng _ tungsigh aqe aat _ ? _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ allaaghlluwhaght in naanghi tamsi _ . _ "
taagken _ unite luki _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ aghviqagh t _ .
Maligsaagh tet _ puygu ma lghiit _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kelqe gpenateng _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh u uq _ kelqekagh at _ angyagh mete ngughk _ .
Jesus-em _ kelenga sagh uqagh i _ , _ " _ Keleng angwaagh lusi _ ye ast- at angitneng _ Pharisees-et _ , _ ye ast- atang anengllu _ Herod-em _ . _ "
taagken _ ellmeggneng _ aleghqugh tke aat _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi inkut _ qayughllak _ neqekrangllagh ite ngugh u kut _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ akuzit keng nguk angi _ apeghtuusagh it _ Pharisees-et _ , _ apeghtuusagh i llu _ Herod-em _ . _ liisimake kangi _ maligte yaaghte yan _ liigike nghite kangat _ akuzi tkekagh a _ enkaam _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ neqekrangllagh ite ni lusi _ pi tsi _ ? _ paninang _ nalluk aq et si llu u _ , _ liigik ig ate t si llu u _ ? _ Um ugh tak ii _ umyugagh si _ ?
iye lgu lghiisi _ , _ es ghii g at sii _ ? _ sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagaquu sigat sii _ ? _ Neqamik en ghis tekii
tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ kagimtekagh nka _ 5 ,000 -en un _ ? _ qafsina t _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh steki _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ qula _ maalghug _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg _ neqekrangllagh t _ kagimte aqe yamki _ 4 ,000 -en un _ , _ qafsina t _ paskete t _ siipte nghmeng _ imigh steki _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ maaghraghvinleg _ . _ "
aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ paninang _ liigik igat si _ ? _ "
Beth s a id a-mun _ kaa sa ta _ ila ita _ yug t _ Jesus-mun _ tagi tke aat _ ayaakagh _ yuug _ , _ saafte aghte sqellug qu _ .
Jesus-em _ ayaakagh _ tas luq luku _ aghulaqe tke a _ ne meng _ . _ taagken _ qesigh lukek _ iye kek _ saafte lukek _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ esghaate nghite ziin _ ? _ "
yug m _ sivugte luni _ yug sugh aluni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ esghagh anka _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ esghaqagh u luteng _ llangaqa _ uqfig t _ piyug te lghiit _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ allameng _ saaftekakek _ yug m _ iye kek _ . _ maatenllaam _ yuug _ esghaate naqe ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ qemall _ esghaa sag un neqig tuq _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ .
Jesus-em _ agligh sqekagh a _ ne anun _ , _ pi ke aa llu _ , _ " _ aghuliigh fqaavek _ taakwani _ ne mi _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ aghulaqekagh t _ ne nun _ tungang anil ngughnun _ Caesar e a _ Philip pi -em _ . _ tume mi _ taakwani _ maligsaaghteni _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kina u ni lunga _ yug t _ pi aqe atnga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ ila ita _ pi aqe aaten _ John - ngun il uten _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ ila ita _ Elij ah- ngun iiq aaten _ , _ enkaam _ ila ita _ nalug iqe ni luten _ uuknaliqistet _ . _ "
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ elpek si _ king angun iiq es tengnga _ ? _ " _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Christ- ang uu ten _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ inegh tengngwaaq ii _ , _ " _ kitumun _ alngunak _ apegh gpenanga _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh kestaghkagh i _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ ighsake yaghqaqe aat llu _ siivanllegh t _ , _ chief _ priest-et _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ taagken _ tuqu lleqe aat _ iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
Wh ateghlluwaaq _ ungipagh tke ai _ . _ Peter-em _ iqitute luku _ aghyuugh qu a _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ qiive luni _ esghaghkagh i _ maligsaaghteni _ taagken _ peter _ aghyuugh qu a _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ awite te n _ whanga mneng _ , _ tughneghagh _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ten _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke ai _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh ke nghite ai _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ maligsaagh ten illu _ tag sigh tegh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ maligte yu kuminga _ , _ ellmi neng _ katam _ piyuke lleg ni _ pegte luki _ , _ qaquuragh ni _ uyamig luku _ maligte linga _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ yuguligh yu kunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ifla kunigu _ unguvallegh ni _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ yugul iyaghq aqaa _ .
sa u a ngam _ yug m _ pinighqe sigh ke lleqe agu _ pi liite luku _ nunaghllag _ , _ ifla kumikek _ unguva sigh gni _ ?
Sameng Ê¼ngam _ yuug _ veghte sigh ke lleqe a _ unguva sigh gminun _ ?
maaten _ aghnegh m _ yug i _ ataasiighmete nghite ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghleghqe ma u ut llu _ . _ maani _ aghnegh ni _ kitum _ alngunak _ kayngu yagute kanganga _ , _ apeghtuusagh nka llu _ , _ whanga llu _ ighneghagh ni _ yug m _ kayngu yagute lleqe aqa _ tagi kuma _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eligh lunga _ ata mneng _ kel qelluki _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yaquleg t _ . _ "
nagnegh tke ai llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ila si _ nekevgha te lghiit _ whani _ tuqu naanghite ut _ kenlanga _ esghagh llegh meggnun _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi kan _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh tuumaghmi _ . _ "
aghvinleg _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ , _ Jesus-em _ kel qelluki _ Peter -enkut _ , _ James -enkut _ , _ John -enkut _ , _ mat- yuqagh t _ uusqagh lghii mun _ naayghagh mun _ . _ Ellng in aghh aalghiit _ tawani _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ allangughtekagh _ esghagh ma llegh itni _ .
aatkagh i _ qelmeghtekagh t _ qategtu te _ , _ qategh aghagh luteng _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuna mi _ qateghsagh aqe ka aneng _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ esghapak agket _ Elij ah- nkuk _ Moses -enkuk _ aliigh lutek _ aleghqugh ka ak _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ maligsaaghtet _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ repall _ sa meng _ pipag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ itagnagh pigte uq _ whaan le nguukut _ ! _ pi nga yu t _ azigutagh t _ nekefte naqe aput _ , _ elpenun llu _ Moses - munllu _ Elij ah- munllu _ . _ "
taagken _ qilag u aq _ aliigh luni _ saapekagh i _ . _ qilawaagh meng _ me m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Un anguuq _ piniqe pigtegkegka _ ighnegh ka _ ; _ nagate aqe teggu _ ! _ "
taagken _ yugsughagh uaghaghte yalghiimeng _ Moses -enkuk _ Elij ah- nkuk _ aviite uk _ , _ Jesus- ngin aghhaq _ tawan teftuq _ .
ukig te kete luku _ naayghagh meng _ Jesus-em _ ungipaq es nanigh waaq aa _ esghaate llegh at _ kenlanga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguvagh tek an _ .
enkaam _ inegh si s teng _ qaatkekagh at _ , _ iwernga _ ellngin aaghh neghmeggni _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ sa meng tuq _ pi sii wa _ ' _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguvagh telleq _ ? _ ' _ "
taagken _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ pi aqe atgu _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa ni luku _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ipa u uq _ elijah _ sivuke luni _ tagi pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ yataagh qen naluku _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ Aap tagh ll amsi _ , _ naqam _ sangan _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kaqe atgu _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ikfiqe ghllag yaghqaa ni luku _ , _ sasiin ghil ngugh es tunllu _ kiyaghute yaghqaa ni luku _ ?
iwernga _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ elijah _ tagi kau uq _ , _ yug t _ piyuke llegh megestun _ pi kaqe aat _ katam _ tawaten _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pinaq nill ghistun _ . _ "
Taku yaq megteki _ ila i _ maligsaaghtet _ , _ yug lghute ghllag _ tawan tu teftuq _ . _ ila ita _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaghtiiraagh aqe ait _ maligsaaghtet _ .
legan _ yug t _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ saghiigha yug ghllag luteng _ payegh aghte luku _ quyakekagh at _ .
Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa meng _ aaghtiiraagh aqe steki _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ ? _ "
yug lghute ghllag t _ akule itneng _ yug m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ighnegh ka _ tagite yagh aqa _ elpenun _ , _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ . _ Taam _ tughneghagh m _ akuzite igate a _ .
kaate pigte nghminigu _ iqu sta qaa _ , _ qaangh allu _ nuv agll iigh qes taqaa _ , _ ggute i _ terqitaagtagh ste aqe ai _ , _ te vegh qwaa s taq aallu _ . _ Maligsaagh tegpen un _ kayagte te aghte yagh aqa _ tughneghagh _ aane ste sqellug qu _ iwernga _ pipagningite aat _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ yug ni _ ugpeqe i llghite usi _ ! _ naten _ tag kaan _ elpesinite naqe zinga _ ugpeq esqell unga _ ? _ mekelghiigh _ whavek _ tagite ggu _ ! _ "
enkaam _ tagi tke aat _ . _ legan _ tughneghagh m _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ , _ mekelghiigh _ iqu ste luku _ sayugpagtagh stekagh a _ . _ tamaani _ temngi _ ullghitag perewaaghte stekagh a _ , _ qaangh allu _ nuvagllug iigh stekagh a _ .
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ ata a _ , _ " _ qavngaghhaaneng _ tawatete a _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ me ke ta ghhagh u te mineng _ ima _ .
uglagh ghngaan _ kengh eg nunllu _ megh mun llu _ iqu ste aqe yagh aa _ tuqu sqellug qu _ . _ pi yaghqaa kuvek _ nanglleg yagute lutung _ kayusiite aghte kung _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sangavek _ tawaten _ pi ziin _ , _ ' _ pi yaghqaa kuvek _ ' _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pi yaghqaqe a _ yug mun _ ugpegh lghii mun _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ mekelghiigh m _ ata a _ iglagtu luni _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ ugpegh unga _ , _ iwernga _ ugp ellegh tugh tagh aqagh nga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ wata _ yug t _ tagi laghate te lghiit _ qevuute luku _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ " _ uyuq _ tughneghagh _ tuuslagh ste i lghii llu _ akuzi ste i igate ngughk llu _ qelegh amken _ aane i _ mekelghiigh meng _ , _ allameng llu _ itegh fqaavek _ ellnga nun _ pi lghaaten _ . _ "
tughneghagh m _ mekelghiigh _ araghaatagh ste ghllag luku _ , _ sayugpagtagh ste ghllag luku _ , _ aanekagh _ . _ legan _ mekelghiigh _ esghaqaaluni _ tuqukagh _ repall _ esghapag lghiit _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ tuquma uq _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ kayusigh tke a _ nekeve sqellug qu _ enkaam _ nekevekagh _ .
Jesus _ mangteghagh mun _ itegh yan _ ellngin aghh aagh sameng _ maligsaaghtengita _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta _ aane ste nghmeng _ aghtugh steggu _ tughneghagh _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ Tawatel nguq _ tughneghagh _ yugh aghhiin aam _ aanesaghqagh ke a _ , _ saam _ alla _ pi naanghite a _ . _ "
taagken _ ne meng _ aghulaqe luteng _ nagneqe aat _ galilee- kun _ . _ Jesus-em _ kitumun _ alngunak _ liisimake sug ma nge i tke a _ naan tul eni _ ,
qayughllak _ apeghtugh u u kangi _ maligsaaghteni _ tuqu lleghqagh mineng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tugu luku _ tuune lleqe aat _ yug nun _ tuqute sqellug qu _ , _ naqam enraq _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ liigike ma ite kangat _ apeghtuusagh a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ , _ enkaam _ aapte yug ma ite kangat _ tetug luteng _ .
C ap ern a um -emun _ kaate luteng _ , _ itegh aa sameng _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ igleghte te kete luku _ sa u a _ aaghtiiraagh te kaqe steggu _ ? _ "
kiimsigh yug ma ite kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ igleghte te kete luku _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ naligh eng _ angegh lleghpigagh u yaghqaa ta a _ .
Jesus-em _ aqume luni _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ tuqlugh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ sivulii aghte yu kuni _ nekegte li _ kinguligh u luni _ , _ qepghaghte ngul illu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ qukagh itgun _ . _ qete luku _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ taghnughhagh ghhagh _ uu tun _ ayuqe lghii _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ tugukligh aqe aanga _ whanga _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kuminga _ , _ tugukligh lleqe a _ ata ka _ kayagte ikagh _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
mulu gpenateng _ John-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ yuug _ esghaam aagh put _ ategh gpegun _ aane ste qugh lghii _ tughneghagh neng _ . _ I negh sim aagh put _ qayughllak _ whangkunnun _ ilate nga nghite ngughk _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ineghte gpenaan _ ! _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ategh mkun _ allaaghlluwhaght ingu kumi _ seghletun _ akuzi tke lghaghtugh naanghite aanga _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ pi nghite kanginkut _ , _ qepghagh lgutekagh ut _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ meghsi kangisi _ whanga _ pi ku tem neng _ , _ ipapestaaq _ akileghtuusagh nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
" _ ataasigh _ taghnughhagh _ ugpeqe i nga lghii _ whanga mneng _ , _ yug m _ seghleghqe stekagu _ , _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uq _ taana _ yuug _ megh mun _ ateghte yagh kuni _ uy aq ghw akun _ qaamqaghte vike luku _ uyghag ghllag meng _ .
iigge gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ kepe naketen _ . _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ yugusigh gpek _ nalighnegh a _ ifla kuvgu _ unguvallegh gpek _ ifla lleghqagh aneng _ quunperugllag _ . _ taana _ pinigh aghagh uq _ inglugtun _ iigge ligh luten _ hell- mun _ aglagh lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ tawani _ kumaghugh nga lghii _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
itegagh gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ iike naketen _ ! _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ yugusigh gpek _ nalighnegh a _ ifla kuvgu _ unguvallegh gpek _ ifla lleghqagh aneng _ quunperugllag _ . _ taana _ pinigh aghagh uq _ inglugtun _ itegagh ligh luten _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
iye gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ ipug naken _ ! _ pinigh aghagh nayagh uten _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ itegh kuvek _ ing lu pig aghmeng _ ii- uute kete luten _ , _ inglugtun _ iye lgu luten _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh gpeneng _ .
tawani _ ' _ kingug t _ neghe kayug t _ yug meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii llu _ kenegh _ qaame yaghqaa nghite uq _ ' _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ taghyugh ligh lleqe uq _ kenegh meng _ .
" _ taghyugh _ pinigh uq _ iwernga _ taghyughni igh u uute kan _ , _ naten _ elpek si _ tagh yugh nigh ll aat aghnayagh esteggu _ ? _ taghyughni igh te gpenasi _ , _ nekegg me tull usillu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ tamaaken _ nuna meng _ . _ aglagh luni _ nuna mun _ ategh ke lghii mun _ Judea- mun _ , _ aghvigh kakek _ kiiw k _ J or d an - ek _ . _ yug lghute m _ qerngughte vike laatagh qagh a _ enkaam _ apeghtugh qu ai _ pi aqe llegh mitun _ .
ila ita _ Pharisees-et _ taku luku _ anag niil qav ig igh naq utkelluku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegtekunigu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ aap tem meng _ , _ " _ sangaawa mi _ Moses-em _ qelegh sagh a _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Moses-em _ pillegh qal itk aqaa _ yuug _ pegte sigh m _ igagh i _ imigh luki _ pegte sqellug qu _ nulighh a _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tawaten _ Moses-em _ Liilightuus al itk aqiisi _ pineghllug ghllag te gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ nuna ngllagh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ak _ yuug llu _ aghnagh llu _ . _ '
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ unite lukek _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ nuliigh minun _ lliigh waagh yaghqaaguq _ .
enkaam _ maalghug u nanigh lleqe uk _ , _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te stekakek _ yeqay _ yug m _ pellegh utu te ste nghite likek _ . _ "
mangteghagh mun _ itegh aa sameng _ maligsaaghtet _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ tamaaken _ pillgh aneng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegte luku _ alla neng _ nulightugh kuni _ , _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh lleqe uq _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ aghnagh m _ ugi ni _ pegte luku _ alla neng _ ugiigh kuni _ , _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh lleqe uq _ . _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ taghnughhagh t _ Jesus-mun _ saafte luki _ quyas tesqelluki _ , _ iwernga _ maligsaaghtet _ ineghtekagh it _ tagite i lghiit _ .
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ seghleghyag te luki _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh t _ tagi lit _ whanga mnun _ . _ ineghte gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh estun _ ayuqe lghiit _ pi ke aat _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh nghite kunigu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh tun _ , _ itegh naanghite uq _ . _ "
taagken _ taghnughhagh t _ tugu aqe luki _ , _ saafte aqe luki _ quya stekagh i _ .
Jesus _ iglegh h neqig taq uqlu _ , _ yug m _ ketanqusnaq _ taku luku _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ pinigh lghii _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ naten _ sa lunga _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ allgegh h nayagh sikun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sangan _ pinigh ni zinga _ ? _ kina _ alngunak _ pinigh nghite uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ pinigh lghii _ .
liilightuusagh t _ liisima katen _ : _ ' _ yugtagh gpenang _ ; _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ ; _ tegleg gpenang _ ; _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaki _ yug t _ ; _ puughte i gpenang _ ; _ quulvagh lukek _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ ' _ "
yug m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ima _ nukalpigagh u te mneng _ qaat keng ngw aanka _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ piniqe pigte luku _ qiive luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ataasigh u uq _ pi yaghqagh n _ . _ akikugh yaghtugh ghhu _ qamagte luku _ saghya n _ , _ enkaam _ aki a _ tunqugh naken _ aklumalghii nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ aklungite lleqe uten _ qilag mi _ . _ taagken _ maligte yaghtugh nakevnga _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi yatni _ yuug _ nulgiighkagh _ , _ iqitekagh _ iilqe pigte luni _ qayughllak _ aklungite pigte lghii _ .
Jesus _ yug sugh aluni _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ aklung ilngugh ni _ itegh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
tawaten _ piy is teng _ maligsaaghtet _ saghiigha yuke aat _ . _ Jesus-em _ pilagh te aqe ai _ , _ " _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ itegh lleghqagh _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ !
piyaqnagh u i uute yaghqaa uq _ c amel -em _ suflughte te lleghqagh a _ sikugh m _ iye akun _ , _ aklung il nguum _ yug m _ itegh lleghqagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
Maligsaagh tet _ wataqaaghaq _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ enkaam _ ellmeggneng _ aapqugh aagh utkat _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ qiive luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ yug t _ pi yaghqaqe nghite kangit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esghaqagh kut qun _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ unite luku _ malig llegh aat amken _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ unite kumiki _ mangteghagh ni _ , _ anglegute ni _ , _ naa ni _ , _ ata ni _ , _ avaqutagh ni _ , _ nuna ni _ apallugh ke lunga _ whanga _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ ungipagh t _ ,
allgegh utu aghagh yaghqaa uq _ whani _ kiyaghtaallegh mi _ . _ mangteghagh a _ , _ anglegut angi _ , _ naange a _ , _ avaquti a _ , _ nuna a _ , _ nula ghllag yaghqaa ut _ ; _ tamaakunun _ maligte te luku _ amyuutke lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ taagken _ taakw aningani _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ uglagh lghiit _ angegh lleghpigagh at _ ukaligh ughte yaghqaa ut _ taagani _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh lghiit _ uk aligh pig aat _ angegh lleghpigagh ughte yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
Jesus _ aga _ sivu itnite ngughk _ iglegha u luki _ tume tgun _ Jerusalem-emun _ ayuqe lghii tgun _ . _ Maligsaagh tengi _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ yug t llu _ alinge magh meng _ maligtekagh at _ . _ Jesus-em _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ aafte te luki _ ungipaate laataghkagh i _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ , _ Jerusalem -en naq ukut _ . _ tawani _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ chief _ priest- en unllu _ apeghtugh i kayug nun llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ nanqigte luku _ tuqute yaghqaa ni lleqe aat _ , _ enkaam _ tuune lleqe aat _ Gentile-enun _ .
taakut _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ , _ qesigh qu lleqe aat _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aat _ , _ tuqu lleqe aat llu _ . _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
taagken _ James -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ , _ Z eb ed ee- m _ ighnegh gkenka _ taku luku _ Jesus _ pikagh ak _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ elpenun _ sa meng _ pi sqe sug ukung _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ sa sqe sug stek _ whanga mnun _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ N igh ugh qengng alghiimi _ ataneghpag u llegh gpeni _ aqume gkuvek _ aqume lgusigh yug amken _ , _ naligh ung _ aghenqignegh gpenite luku _ , _ naligh ung _ saghumignegh gpenite luku _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ nalluke aghte tek _ sa meng _ tungsigh llegh ek _ . _ meghyaghqagh mneng _ qayuu sim el ngughmeng _ meghe lleqe stek _ ? _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mtun _ paaptaaye lleqe stek _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ pi yaghqaa ukung _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ meghyaghqagh ka _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ qaywa _ meghe lleqe aghte tek _ , _ paaptaaye lleqe utek llu _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mtun _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ nakmike yaghqaqe nghite anka _ kinku t _ aqume yaghqaa ta i _ aghenqignegh mkun llu _ saghumignegh mkun llu _ , _ yataaghqe tke aat _ tamaakut _ aqume yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
taakut _ qula _ maligh saagh tet _ nagaqugh lukek _ James -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ pillgh ak _ , _ ugum iyag utk agket _ .
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ qerngughte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisima kasi _ Gentile-et _ igleghutisteng ita _ at angh utaqiit _ yug teng _ , _ aangwaagh ugh tek atlu _ yuk egh qutaq iit _ .
iwernga _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite usi _ elpek si _ . _ naligh i _ aangwaagh u yu kuni _ qepghaghte ngul i _ ila minun _ ,
naligh i llu _ aange lleghpigagh u yu kuni _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh ll i _ tea- ma anun _ .
talwa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kau nghite uq _ qepghaa tesqell uni _ , _ tagi kau uq _ qepghagh te i na luni llu _ tuun al ukullu _ unguvallegh ni _ yugul in aluki _ yug lghute t _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ Jer i ch o -mun _ kaate luteng _ , _ aghulaqekagh t _ . _ Taa waa nguq _ ayaakagh _ yuug _ , _ ategh a _ Bar t im a e us _ , _ ighnegh a _ Tim a e us-em _ aqume luni _ tume t _ sani itgun _ tungsigh ragh aqe lghii _ .
nagaqugh yamigu _ Jesus _ Nazareth -eghm ii _ , _ tughwaagh ni luku _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ Jesus _ ! _ ighneghagh ni _ David-em _ ! _ nanglleg yagute aghte nga _ ! _ "
uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ aghyuugh qu aat _ nepiigh sqellug qu _ iwernga _ qev uut agh all uni _ akilghuukagh _ , _ " _ ighneghagh ni _ David-em _ , _ nanglleg yagute aghte nga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ aghuliigh luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tagi sqe teggu _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tuqlugh luku _ ayaakagh _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ tuqlugh aaten _ nekeve i _ ! _ "
qaasligh ak _ atkuyaagh gni _ mat-aghaghte lukek _ nekefqaghte luni _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ .
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ S as qell uten _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ " _ ayaakagh m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ esghaa sag un neqig sug tunga _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ igleghte lghaaten _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpek _ naallghute ste aaten _ . _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ esghagh u sag u tke aq _ taagken _ maligtekagh a _ Jesus _ .
Tugh aagh yalghiimeng _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ kaate tke aat _ Beth ph ag e- munllu _ Beth an y- munllu _ , _ M oun t _ O l iv es -mi _ . _ taagken _ Jesus-em _ kayagtekakek _ maalghug _ maligsaagh teg ni _ ne mun _ pi sqellug kek _ . _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ kaate ghesnagh kuftek _ esghagh lleqe aghte tek _ d on ke y- gh aq _ petug nga lghii _ kitum _ alngunak _ igleghte tke ma ite kanga _ . _ iteme te luku _ tagin nak es ek _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aapteka nge istek _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sa naqe stegnegu _ ? _ ' _ ungipaan nak es ek _ , _ ' _ Atanghem _ atuqe yug aa _ . _ taaqe ghesnagh kunigu _ veghute ste naagh aa _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ ne mun _ kaate lutek _ tume nite luku _ esghaghkagh ak _ d on ke y- gh aq _ petug nga lghii _ mangteghagh m _ amig an _ tung angakun _ . _ I tem simaluku
yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ tawani _ aaptekagh gket _ , _ " _ sangan _ iteme te stegnegu _ d on ke y- gh aq _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aik _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh llegh atun _ enkaam _ yug t _ nepiigh tke agket _ .
Jesus-mun _ kaat ute te luku _ d on ke y- gh aq _ , _ qaasligh at _ atkuyaag tek _ teghig ke sagh m _ qaye akun _ lli yagneki _ , _ Jesus _ uugte luni _ igleghtekagh _ .
tamaakut _ yug lghute t _ igleghte te lghiit _ tume tgun _ saul- ghqu qu ait _ qaasligh at _ atkuyaag teng _ , _ ila it _ avayagh meng _ ququngagh leg meng _ ikute aqe luteng _ tume t _ sa aghte qugh vikekagh it _ .
Jesus-em _ sivung anil nguutlu _ kingung anil nguutlu _ akilghuu tke aat _ , _ " _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ !
kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ligu _ tagi lghii _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ sivunegh mta _ David-em _ ! _ usuqnagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ qu lighpig agh melnguq _ qilag mi _ ! _ "
Jesus _ kaate luni _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ aglaghkagh _ temple- mun _ . _ tawani _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ yuvghiigh qagh a _ . _ Wh an iku ngul ghii _ , _ kel qelluki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ aglaghkagh _ Beth an y -mun _ .
unaami ani _ , _ Beth an y-meng _ uteghnigh te kete luku _ Jesus _ iyataghkagh _ .
uyavagh neng _ esgha qaa _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ ququngaghtuqagh _ , _ enkaam _ esghagh yaghtuqagh a _ fig s- elg un ayuk an _ . _ Kaa saqminigu _ ququngagh raaghinagh u uq _ , _ qayughllak _ salin _ fig s -et _ piite yug nigh ite ngugh t _ .
Jesus-em _ uqfig _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ kitum _ alngunak _ fig s -e tugh vik naanghi taa ten _ ! _ " _ Maligsaagh tengita _ nagatekagh at _ .
kaate yameng _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ Jesus _ , _ temple- mun _ pi ke aq _ . _ tawani _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tukfightugh lghiit llu _ akilpegagh lghiit llu _ . _ mani meng _ nav egh qugh tet _ t ipel ngit _ ullegh qugh qu ai _ , _ aqumutagh it llu _ qawaag meng _ akilpeg aghtet _ .
nangaqaghte yaghqaa nanigh stekagh i llu _ kinku t _ alngunak _ sa meng _ tugumiigh leg t _ Temp le -em _ manughagh akun _ .
taagken _ apeghtugh qu ai _ yug t _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ ' _ mangteghagh ka _ , _ yughaghvig u yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug anun _ nuna m _ . _ ' _ iwernga _ elpek si _ iigh aghvig ugh taghsi _ way aghniigh tenun _ ! _ "
Chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ nagaqugh luku _ tawaten _ pillgha _ , _ akuzim ghh utk egkaat _ naten _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ , _ naqam _ alike magh an _ . _ alikekagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yagute u kangit _ apeghiigh llegh i _ .
Ighivg aghy agu _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ aghulaqekagh t _ Jerusalem-emeng _ .
unaangu luku _ igleghte te kete luku _ esghaghkagh at _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ p aligh waagh umalghii _ akugh ghhagh minun _ kenlanga _ .
Peter-em _ esghagh luku _ neqagh tke a _ Jesus-em _ pillgha _ . _ enkaam _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ii-i _ , _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ inegh tengngwaaq an _ p aligh waagh umaaq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ugpeqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ malgh uk l ill ngunani _ ilu mikun _ , _ ugpeqe gkumiki llu _ akuzite ni _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ , _ una _ naayghagh _ whaten _ pi kunigu _ , _ ' _ kellii nun _ ategh i _ , _ ' _ taawa _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ ellnga nun _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ : _ sa u a _ alngunak _ aklukegk aghsi _ yughagh tke gkufsigu _ ugpeqe luku _ allgegh saghqaq ut si _ , _ taawa _ allgegh lleqaghsi _ .
nekeve negh gpesini _ yughagh na lusi _ , _ seghevute aqe teki _ seghletun _ pis tesi _ , _ enkaam _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ seghevute lleqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ "
iwernga _ seghevute i nghite kufsi _ , _ talwa _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ seghevute naanghite ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ kaan neqig tekat _ Jerusalem-emun _ . _ Jesus _ igleghte ma luku _ Temp le -em _ manughagh ani _ , _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Elder -etlu _ taku luku _ 
aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ Saam _ pi lleghqagh akun _ aane ste qugh ziki _ akilpeg aghtet _ ? _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi u ziin _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate lleqe amsi _ kitum _ qel elgh akun _ tawaten _ pi kau tke a _ kiimsigh kufsinga _ .
John-em _ paaptaay egh illgha _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u a _ , _ nalighmeng _ yug neng _ ? _ ungipaate ngnga _ . _ "
Ell meggneng _ akuzim ghh utkat _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pik n ikum teggu _ , _ pi lleqe ainkut _ , _ ' _ Sang anÊ¼ngam _ ugpeq en ghis teggu _ John _ ? _ '
yug neng _ pik n ikum teggu _ yug t _ angu yiite lleqe ainkut _ . _ " _ ( _ alingekagh t _ yug neng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqe u kangat _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste u ta a _ . _ )
enkaam _ Jesus _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ nallukagh ut _ . _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ ungipaate naanghite amsi _ kitum _ qelegh llegh akun _ tawaten _ pi kau tke a _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ ungipaghaate tgun _ aleghqugh qu ai _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ piite tesiigh aqe aq _ grapes- meng _ , _ mingllu sigh ke a llu _ uvit anga _ piitesighaghvig ni _ . _ laag te gkakek _ grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ , _ nekeftekagh a llu _ kelengake i vigkagh _ . _ taagken _ piitesighaghvig ni _ nav ghit kaa _ grapes- meng _ piitesighagh tenun _ neng i tesqell uni _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ natmun _ aghulaqekagh _ .
saghna yaghqaaghte yata _ ataasigh _ qepghagh teni _ keveg aqekagh a _ nengigh ni _ grapes -et _ aqfas qelluki _ .
kaate yan _ taakut _ aflengak istet _ akuqagh luku _ qev ut iigh luku _ ava u na an _ aglagh stekagh at _ .
keveg aqlaatagh qagh a _ ila a _ qepghagh teni _ . _ taana _ naasqw akun _ kiitigh qu luku _ , _ kayngusaghagh te stekagh at _ .
keveg aqe i i laataghkagh _ ila aneng _ qepghaghte mi _ enkaam _ taana _ tuqu tke aat _ . _ ila i llu _ qepghagh tel ghut eni _ kevg aq engh aki _ legan _ tawaten _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ ila it _ qevute i aqe ait _ , _ ila it _ tuqu qugh qu ait _ .
" _ qenwat _ ataasighhaaghte uq _ keveg aqe yaghqagh a _ , _ ighnegh a _ piniqumtaagh a _ . _ keveg aqekagh a _ sumeghtaghagh magh mi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ ighnegh ka _ sii vag kete lleqe aat _ . _ '
iwernga _ taakut _ aflengak istet _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ ' _ U um _ pi liite yaghqaqe a _ una _ piitesigh u aghagh vig _ . _ tuqute lteggu _ enkaam _ piitesigh u aghagh vig _ whangkuta _ pilii lleq aghput _ ! _ '
enkaam _ akuqagh luku _ , _ tuqute luku _ yugusigh a _ egtekagh at _ piitesigh u aghagh vig meng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ S alleq ang Ê¼ngam _ piitesigh u aghagh vig leg _ ? _ tagi luni _ nav ghit iv ik egkaq saqenni _ taakut _ tuqu qugh luki _ , _ enkaam _ piitesigh u aghagh vig ni _ alla nun _ nav ghi lleqaa _ .
At igh t iig as teggu _ una _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ ? _ ' _ uyghag _ mangtegh angllagh tet _ ighsakekagh at _ pi yalghiimi _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ uyghag _ .
taana _ Atanghem _ apeghiigh kaqe a _ , _ All aagh lluwh aghyug napig tuq _ ! _ ' _ "
Jews-et _ igleghutisteng ita _ tugu yu pigtekaqsagh kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ liigike lghiit _ ungipaghaate tgun _ Jesus-em _ ellngit _ akuzite kaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ alingekagh t _ yug lghute neng _ enkaam _ unite luku _ aghulaqekagh t _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Jews-et _ igleghutisteng ita _ kayagtekagh it _ ila i _ Pharisees-etlu _ maligsaagh teng illu _ Herod-em _ anag niil qav ig iisqelluku _ Jesus _ . _ kayagtekagh it _ anag niil qav ig iisqelluku _ akuzillegh akun _ .
kaate luku _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ liisimake amken _ ataasiighmete uten _ . _ waakigate aten _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ , _ talwa _ waakigate aten _ yug t _ sa u yagh nga a ta _ , _ iwernga _ ipapighqell uten _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe an _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ yug nun _ . _ ungipaate aghte kut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ani _ elqughutngagh a _ llivike i lleghqagh ut _ tax -en eng _ Caesar -mun _ ? _ Ll iv ik il taa -a _ nalighmeng _ pi nghite lta _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ seghletun _ pi u kangat _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangama _ anag vig igh naqutke ste ngnga _ ? _ M anil itagh tengnga _ , _ esghaqagh lakun _ . _ "
tuune yatni _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ gginagh ke agu llu _ ategh kagu llu _ una _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Caesar -em _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tuune teki _ Caesar -mun _ tamaakut _ Caesar -em _ pi i _ . _ tuune teki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi i _ . _ " _ enkaam _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ Jesus _ .
taagken _ ila i _ Sa dd uc ees -et _ , _ Jesus-mun _ pikagh t _ . _ ( _ tamaakut _ pi aqe lghiit _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa nghite ni luki _ . _ )
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh ngllagh kaqe ainkut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqu kan _ anglegut angan _ tugu yaghqaqe a _ aghnagh _ avaquti tete na luku _ anglegute ni _ tuqukagh _ . _ '
taawa nguq _ m aagh rag v in lek _ yug t _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ . _ nuyeklighpigagh _ nulightugh luni _ avaquti gpenani _ tuqukagh _ .
enkaam _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ tugukagh a _ aghnagh _ , _ iwernga _ ellnga llu _ tuqukagh _ avaquti gpenani _ . _ pingayut ii ta an _ tugu luku _ aghnagh _ , _ tuqukagh _ avaquti gpenani _ .
qamagte luteng _ tugu aqe luku _ aghnagh _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ avaquti gpenateng _ . _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ aghnagh _ tuqukagh _ .
qamagte luteng _ maaghraghvinleg _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ nuligh q egkaq saq angat _ . _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute llegh itni _ , _ naligh ita _ aghnagh _ nuligh qelleq agu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si _ anaggute nga ut _ qayughllak _ liigike igate kesi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ nalluke kesi llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute kumeng _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ qilagmel ngughestun _ yaquleg stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ nengughte te saghqagh u nghite ut _ .
At igh t iig as tegguu _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ tuqukagh t _ unguva lleghqagh itneng _ tuqu llegh meng _ ? _ Moses-em _ igagh ani _ apegh nga uq _ kumaghugh nga lghii mi _ uqfig llegagh mi _ . _ tawani _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ moses _ , _ ' _ whanga _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ Abraham-em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ Isaa c -em _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aanga _ Jacob -em _ . _ '
taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke nghite aat _ tuqukagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh ke aat _ unguva lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ anaggute pigte ma usi _ ! _ "
apeghtugh i kayug _ liilightuusagh neng _ tagi luni _ nagatekagh i _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ . _ nagate luku _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh i laataqu llegh a _ Sa dd uc ees -en un _ , _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N a tung aawa _ liilightuusagh _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ M eg nun all eg pigaq _ un anguuq _ : _ ' _ nagate tek _ , _ Israel-eghm iini _ ! _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ taan angin aghh aaguq _ atanegh _ .
atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ piniqe yaghqaqe an _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ ilu gpegun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ unguva sigh gpegun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ umyugagh gpegun _ , _ qamagte luku llu _ iknaqe llegh gpegun _ . _ '
Tuunglighh a _ whatete uq _ : _ ' _ piniqe yaghqaqe aten _ yug lgute ten _ , _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ katam _ . _ ' _ alla _ liilightuusagh ite uq _ taa kug etun _ megnu naghtutka lghii meng _ . _ "
apeghtugh i kayug m _ liilightuusagh neng _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ elqughaghte an _ ! _ ipa u uq _ taana _ pillgh en _ , _ atanegh _ taan angin aghh aaguq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ alla _ avangite uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ ilu mi _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ umyugagh gmi _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh akun llu _ iknaqe llegh mi _ . _ piniqe yaghqaqe ai llu _ yug lgute ni _ katam _ ellmi neng _ piniqe llegh mitun _ . _ taake uk _ liilightuusagh k _ megnu nagh aghagh uk _ paneghte luku _ tunusagh kekagh neng _ , _ nalighmeng _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ liigike yamigu _ yug m _ kiimsigh te a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qantaghante uten _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ " _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ kitum _ alngunak _ tetug yagutekagh a _ aapqugh aa neghmeng _ Jesus _ .
temple- mi _ , _ Jesus-em _ apeghtugh i te kete luku _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ pi aqe atgu _ Christ-a _ David -mun _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ ?
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ David _ whaten _ pi stekaqe a _ , _ ' _ Atanghem _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ : _ aqume i _ whagun _ aghenqignegh mkun _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ lli aghte lleg mnun _ . _ '
" _ David-em _ ellnga n _ katam _ atigh kaqe a _ , _ ' _ atanegh meng _ ' _ enkaam _ naten _ Christ-a _ ighnegh ke agu _ David-em _ ? _ " _ yug lghute t _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ nagatekagh at _ Jesus _ .
apeghtugh te kete luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga lusi _ apeghtugh i kayug neng _ liilightuusagh neng _ . _ aate yuneghtu ut _ atkuyaagh meng _ akughtuqagh meng _ , _ igleghte yuneghtu ut llu _ akilpegaghvig ni _ yug nun _ qu ngugh fik esqell uteng _ .
aqume yuneghtu ut _ aangwaagh ugh tekat _ aqumutagh itgun _ , _ synagogue- nillu _ neqenghaghqe lghii ni llu _ .
esghaghlaataqu aqe ait _ ugingighagh t _ mangteghiigh aqe luki _ . _ taagken _ pinigh ni luteng _ pisqell uteng _ taake luku _ yughagh aqe ut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghyuugh lleg nge ghllag yaghqaa ut _ ! _ "
temple- mi _ , _ Jesus-em _ aqumga te kete luku _ tung angakun _ manilghutagh m _ , _ esghapagkagh i _ yug lghute t _ kanaghtagh igh aatagh lghiit _ mani meggneng _ . _ Ak lung ilnguut _ yug lghute t _ mani lghute meng _ kanagh qughkagh t _ .
taagken _ akluma lghii _ ugi igh aq _ itegh luni _ kanaghtekakek _ maalghug _ mani ngiighhagh k _ , _ qerngagh egmek _ penn y -ngu f tuk _ .
Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ tuqlugh luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ uum _ aklumalghii m _ ugingighagh m _ tuune gkakek _ qaayghuti u uk _ aklung ilnguut _ tuune ke ii te neng _ .
yug t _ kanaghte i u ut _ aklungi meggneng _ , _ iwernga _ uum _ aghnagh m _ kanagh a _ qamagte luku _ mani ngiighhagh ni _ , _ akluk ngu yaq anga _ ellmi nun _ kiyagh usigh qaa luku _ . _ "
Jesus _ aane ma luku _ temple- meng _ , _ ataasigh m _ maligte yaaghte yan _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ ii-i _ ! _ esghaqagh ki qun _ maakut _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ mangteghagh t _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag neng _ ulimaagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Esghagh sik ii _ mangteghagh ghllag t _ maakut _ ? _ talwa _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ nem in in naanghituq _ ; _ qamagte luteng _ ullegh qugh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
M oun t _ O l iv es -mi _ , _ Jesus _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ aqumga ma luku _ temple- mun _ ayuqe luni _ , _ Peter -enkut _ James -enkut _ John -enkut _ An dr ew- nkut _ takukagh at _ .
aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ ungipaate kut _ , _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqau aat _ ? _ sa u lleqe a _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ tamaakut _ apeghiigh lleghqagh itnun _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga tek _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ka _ , _ whaten _ pi aqe luteng _ , _ ' _ ellnga u unga _ ! _ ' _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ puughte qugh yaghqaqe aat _ .
nagaqugh kufsiki _ pilluw at _ , _ akusqaghtagh u tke llegh t llu _ pilluw at _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ . _ tamaa na _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ salin _ iqugte naqngu nghite uq _ .
nuna m _ ramke i _ pilluw utu llequt _ , _ nuna m llu _ ataneghpag u llegh i _ sughug aa llequt _ , _ nuna t llu _ nani _ alngunak _ tu y ep egh tagh aqluteng _ pi yaghqaa ut _ , _ neqangisag ghllag aqe luni llu _ pi yaghqaa uq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu kestagh llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ .
" _ iwernga _ elpek si _ kelenga lusi _ . _ tugu lusi _ agghis tenun _ aglagh u lleqe aisi _ . _ S ynagogu e- ni _ kagsagmig lleqe aisi _ . _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ nekeve lleqe usi _ sivu itni _ igleghutiste tlu _ umiileg t llu _ ungipaghte u lusi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa ut _ tea- ma anun _ ramke nun _ sivungagh ni _ iqugte llegh m _ .
tugu lusi _ aglagh u uute kangisi _ nanqigtivig mun _ sumeghtaghagh kestagh gpenasi _ akuzite kaghqagh meng _ . _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate aqe gkan _ akuzi aqe naagh usi _ pi sqe llegh gpesistun _ , _ qayughllak _ elpesi u naanghite ut _ akuzi lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ elpesigun _ akuzi aqe naagh uk _ .
yug t _ anglegute teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ , _ yug t _ avaqutagh teng _ tawateghpigaq _ pi ste lleqe ait _ . _ taghnughhagh t llu _ angayuqagh teng _ kipullgin aagh luki _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ .
whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ qamagte luni _ yug m _ ugumiite lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nuqete neghtuqagh _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
( _ yeqay _ atightugh lghii m _ liigike ligu _ una _ uuknaliqe llegh _ ! _ ) _ " _ esghagh kufsigu _ aglegh niigh te i sta _ paaghqite te ste i lghii _ , _ nekaghqagh ke nghite ke mini _ nekeve lghii _ , _ tamaakut _ Judea- melnguut _ anagniigh ghhaat _ naayghagh nun _ .
yuug _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anite ngughk _ qamavek _ kelqesaghqagh meng _ aqfate te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
yug m _ piitesighagh vig mel nguum _ qaasligh gni _ aqf af qaam ikek _ pi lghaaq _ .
Seghleghwaagh unaq nguut _ tamaakut _ qumig leg t llu _ mamaghti igh lghiit llu _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ !
yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ uksugh mi _ tawaten _ pi fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ !
qayughllak _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ seghlegh atagh aa yaghqaaguq _ seghleliigh aqe llegh neng _ ima _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ nuna _ wh av emun _ kenlanga _ . _ allameng llu _ tawatel nguq _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ pi naanghite uq _ .
Atanghem _ takelli mangite yagh kaki _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ unguva nayagh nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ apallugh ke luki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ aghnegh t _ takelli kaqe ai _ .
" _ taagken _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ esghaghte ggu _ , _ Christ-a _ whaa _ ! _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ esghaghte ggu _ , _ tazigna _ esgha _ ! _ ' _ ugpeqe gpenaan _ .
Christ- asigh waagh etlu _ uuknaliqiste sighwaagh etlu _ allgegh uute yaghqaa ut _ . _ All aagh lluwh aght ighllag aatagh yaghqaag utlu _ , _ saghiigh an aghq eghllag aatagh yaghqaag utlu _ puughte qugh na luki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ puugh saqleg uku megteki _ pi lleqe ait _ .
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ ! _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ungipaate kestagh amsi _ tamaakut _ pi ste gpenaki _ .
" _ ' _ kingu aneng _ taam _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag m _ siqinegh _ mamleg lleqe uq _ , _ tanqigh _ nighugte te nanigh lleqe uq _ ,
ighaleqetaagh t _ ifkagh qu uute lleqe ut _ qilaga meng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh et _ qilag amel nguut _ iglegha llegh it _ alngunaghqe ste lleqe ut _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ yug t _ esghagh lleqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ qil aw aagh teggun _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eligh llag lun illu _ nighughqell eligh llag lun illu _ .
" _ taagken _ yaquleg t _ kayagte lleqe ai _ qerngugh tesqelluki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ liite vike teggu _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ . _ avayagh i _ unite te lugh u i aghagh luteng _ ququngagh i _ piite kestagh kata _ sungaghyug ketu te _ liisimak elleq aghsi _ kiig yaghtugh llegh _ .
F ig s-em _ uqfigagh neng _ liite llegh gpesistun _ esghagh kufsiki _ tamaakut _ qilag amel nguut _ apegh lleg mtun _ pi lghiit _ , _ liisimak elleq aghsi _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh llegh a _ , _ aaqun _ amig mun _ lliigh ma uq _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maaten _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu naanghite ut _ sivungagh ni _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ pi lleghqagh ita _ .
qilag a llu _ nuna llu _ aviighute yaghqaa uk _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ akuzite nka _ aviigh u sagqagh u nghite ut _ .
" _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ nani _ aghneghmi llu _ aflu mi llu _ tagi yaghqaa ta a _ . _ talwa _ yaquleg t _ qilag melnguut _ nalluke aat _ , _ ighnegh m llu _ nalluke a _ , _ ata inagh ghhagh m _ liisimake a _ .
kelenga tek _ , _ waaknanigh gpenasi _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ qakun _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
yug tun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ natmun _ pi lghii tun _ . _ aghulaqe llghite luni _ qepghagh teni _ aflengake i ste ngllagh lleqe ai _ mangteghagh minun _ , _ ungipaate lleqe ai llu _ sa yaghqagh itneng _ . _ Am ig niigh te min unllu _ kelengake sqekagh a _ uteghnigh lleghqagh ni _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ qakun _ mangteghagh leg _ uteghnigh yaghqaa ta a _ . _ walluumllu _ tagi uq lli _ ighivg aghmi _ , _ unug em _ qukaa ni _ , _ aghtagh aq estam i _ , _ nalighmeng _ unaangu luku _ .
Enkaangam _ kelenga tek _ luuraq _ kaate qaghtekuni _ qavaa lusi _ angu na yu kangisi _ .
apegh kegka _ una _ elpesi nun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag anun _ pi u aqa _ : _ kelenga lusi _ ! _ "
neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a _ P ass ov er-em _ , _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a llu _ Y e ast- al ill g il nguum _ neqekrangllagh m _ kaate yaghqagh k _ maalghug _ aghnegh k _ atugh lukek _ . _ Chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ paninang _ agghi te u lghiit _ aksaqe luku _ tugu luku _ Jesus _ tuqute na luku _ .
iwernga _ neq engh aghq em mi _ piyug ma ite kangat _ luuraq _ yug t _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag na yu kata _ .
Beth an y- mi nguq _ taawa _ yuug _ atigh aqe kangat _ , _ simon _ , _ leper- a _ . _ Sim on -en kuni _ Jesus _ negh ma luku _ , _ aghnagh _ iteghkagh _ tugumiiqe lukek _ al ab as ter - ek _ aqimleghutagh k _ akitu pigte lghiik _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ , _ n ard -e pig meng _ ulimaagh k _ . _ sigiqe lukek _ aqimleghutagh m _ paye kek _ kuuve gkakek _ Jesus-em _ naasqw akun _ .
Taw an lenguut _ ila i _ ugumi yug luteng _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ sangan _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ sakusiiqe akek _ ?
akike lukek _ allgegh te kete nayagh uk _ 3 00 _ siipngagh lghii mun _ d en ar ii -mun _ enkaam _ aki a _ tunqugh nayagh uq _ aklumalghii nun _ ! _ " _ taagken _ aghyuugh qu aat _ aghnagh _ .
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ avelghagh teggu _ ! _ sangan _ seghlequugh esteggu _ ? _ pi niigh pigte uq _ whanga mnun _ tawaten _ pillgha _ .
akluma lghiit _ quunpeng _ tamaan saghqaagut _ , _ enkaam _ qakun _ alngunak _ kayusiite aqe naagh asi _ . _ iwernga _ whanga _ quunpeng _ elpesinite naanghite unga _ .
U um _ aghnagh m _ apeghiigh aa _ pi yaghqagh ni _ ; _ tep engll aghq ek estagh aa _ yugusigh ka _ llivegh lleghqagh mnun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke nghmegteki _ , _ apegh aqe naagh aat _ aghnagh m _ tawaten _ pillgha _ yug nun _ neqamike sqellug qu _ . _ "
taagken _ Judas _ iscariot _ , _ ila at _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghtet _ , _ chief _ priest- enun _ pi ke aq _ uvegh ghpagte te yug ni luku _ Jesus _ ellngit nun _ , _ tugu sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ piy is teng _ elngaatall _ efqugh kekagh at _ , _ akeqekagh at llu _ man il illeq niluku _ . _ enkaam _ Judas _ pi lleghqagh nge naqutkekagh _ uvegh ghpagte te na luku _ .
sivuligh _ aghnegh a _ Y e ast- al ill ghil nguum _ neqekrangllagh m _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ kaate tke aq _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ , _ Jews-et _ iiwleng _ tuqute aqe kangit _ pennagh ii aghagh aat _ P ass ov er-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ . _ Maligsaagh tet _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ nani _ yataagh qu llak en _ P ass ov er-em _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh aneng _ ? _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ maalghug _ maligsaagh teg ni _ , _ " _ Jerusalem-emun _ aglagh tek _ , _ yug m _ meghtagh lghii m _ nallagh lleqe i istek _ , _ malig g nak es ek _ .
mangteghagh mun _ itegh kan _ taam _ mangteghagh m _ yug a _ pin ak es ek _ , _ ' _ apeghtughiste m _ whaten _ pi sqe aaten _ , _ nani _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghii ni _ negh naqe steggu _ P ass ov er-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ ? _ '
keleg u vike lleqe i istek _ qem tam el ngughmeng _ ne ghllag meng _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ apeghiigh waagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tawani _ yataaghqe te nakefkut _ . _ "
maligsaagh tek _ aghulaqe lutek _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ kaate yalghiimek _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ Jesus-em _ apegh llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ P ass ov er-em _ neqekagh qaa _ yataaghqekagh ak _ .
Ighivg aghy agu _ , _ Jesus-em _ kel qelluki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ aglaghkagh t _ tawavek _ mangteghagh mun _ .
neghe uute u luteng _ tipele gni _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ naligh gpesi _ neghe lgusigh i lghii m _ whanga mneng _ uvegh ghpagte te naqngu aanga _ . _ "
Maligsaagh tet _ seghleghyug luteng _ kipull g us naq _ aapqugh aaq aat _ , _ " _ whanga u a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ Nal iq aghsi _ elpek si _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngagh lghii ni _ , _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ sagnegh mun _ neptekanga _ neqekrangllagh _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pinaq nill ghistun _ . _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh unaq nguuq _ taana _ yuug _ uvegh ghpagte te i lghii _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ ! _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ allgegh mangite yagh kuni _ ! _ "
neghe uute u luteng _ Jesus-em _ tugukagh a _ neqekrangllagh _ . _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ tunqugh qu ai _ maligsaaghteni _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tugu luku _ neghe teggu _ , _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine- meng _ imaleg _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tuunekagh a _ ellngit nun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ megh vike aataghkagh at _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ aaw kaqe a _ , _ taaggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ tuqu kuma _ aaw ka _ kuuve lleqe uq _ uglaapig llegh iinun _ yug nun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ wine- meng _ alla _ megh naanghite unga _ kenlanga _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ wine- egh ragh aq _ meghe gkumkun _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ ilagaate _ atugh luku _ , _ aane luteng _ M oun t _ O l iv es -mun _ pikagh t _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Un iq agh aa lleq aghpesinga _ qayughllak _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ tuqu lleqe aqa _ penniighniigh a _ enkaam _ penniigh t _ mingug iqe lleqe ut _ . _ '
iwernga _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh stegkanganga _ galilee- mun _ aglagh kestagh lleqe unga _ sivu gpesini _ . _ "
Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Un ite qegh h naanghi tamken _ qaywa _ ila nka _ qamagte luteng _ qimag u utegh ngaata _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ peter _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ unukun _ ro os ter -em _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh ste gpenaan _ nallun qelleq aghpenga _ ket wh el l _ pi nga yu neng _ . _ "
iwernga _ Peter-em _ sagiqe pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qaywa _ tuqu lgusigh yagh ghngaamken _ , _ nallun qen naanghi tamken _ ! _ " _ ila ita llu _ qamagte luteng _ tawaten _ pi ke aat _ .
kaate luteng _ tawavek _ atigh llegh ke lghii mun _ gethsemane- meng _ , _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ " _ aqume tek _ taaggun _ , _ yughagh ma lunga _ . _ "
Peter -enkut _ James -enkut _ John -enkut _ kelqekagh i _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ alingruugh ghllag kestaghkagh llu _ seghleliigh ghllag kestaghkagh llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ unguva sigh gka _ qivghu ghllagu uq _ repall _ tuqu yaghqaaghte lunga _ . _ Taw an llusi _ kelenga lgusigh tengnga _ . _ "
Taz ing apigh qaagh luni _ , _ nuna mun _ sikmuute luni _ yughaghkagh _ pi lleghqagh lgu kuni _ ikfiqe sighqagh ni _ atuqe fqaan _ pi na luku _ .
pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Ab b a _ , _ Ataa y _ , _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pi yaghqaqe an _ . _ awite te gu _ una _ qayuusigh _ whanga mneng _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ piyuke llegh ka _ avelghagh luku _ elpek _ piyuke llegh n _ pi gu _ . _ "
taagken _ taku yaq miniki _ pi nga yu t _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ qavaa ut _ . _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ simon _ , _ qavaa ziin _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh _ aflu _ teghh um at ken neghmeng _ aghtugh si guu _ ? _ "
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kelenga tek _ , _ yughaghte k _ , _ nanghii qull eng enghi tesqellusi _ . _ ipapestaaq _ taghneghagh k _ pi yaghqaa ghngaaghmek _ iwerngaqun _ yugusigh _ kayaate uq _ . _ "
tazingavek _ aglagh nqigte luni _ yughaghkagh _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ akuzite kete luki _ .
T akun qig saq miniki _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ taawa _ qavaa te u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ qavagh m _ sakniqe stegkangi _ . _ kukriqekagh t llu _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh meng _ .
pingayut ii te kun _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ qavagh u aqe tsi _ , _ meghnaali aqe tsi _ ? _ Tawaten Ê¼ngam _ ! _ taawa _ aflu _ kaa tuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ uvegh ghpagte te yaghqaaghte uq _ seghleghq est enun _ .
nekeve tek _ , _ igleghte lta _ . _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ uka _ uvegh p aqut istek a _ ! _ "
Jesus _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ Judas _ kaate tke aq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghtet _ ila at _ . _ yug lghute t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ ila i _ savigpag ligh luteng _ , _ ila i _ anagutagh ligh luteng _ . _ Chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ kayagtekagh it _ maligte sqellug qu _ Judas _ . _ ( _ taana _ Judas _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghtet _ ila ke kangat _ . _ )
U vegh pag ut istem _ pi kaqe kangi _ , _ " _ yuug _ naagh yaghqaqe a _ tugu nakesi _ , _ enkaam _ aghulaqe te nakesi _ kelengak iste ligh luku _ . _ "
Jud as-em _ kaat ute ke llug qu _ nagnegh vike luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ ! _ " _ taagken _ naate qugh a _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ tugu luku _ nuqneghkagh at _ .
iwernga _ ataasigh m _ tawan le nguum _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ high _ p riest-em _ qepghaghtelaagh a _ sigute igh aghtekagh a _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ T ugu yaghtugh es tengng aa _ savigpagtuumagh gpesi _ , _ anagutaghtuumagh gpesi _ nikimqun _ way aghniigh testun _ ayuqe lunga _ ?
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ temple- mi _ tug ung ig atagh pesinga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pill ghit _ apeghiigh ste asi _ . _ "
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ maligsaaghtet _ unite luku _ , _ qimagugh tke aat _ .
nukalpigagh m _ maligtekagh a _ Jesus _ qiipaghagh meng _ saputagh ke i i nagh luni _ . _ tugu kaqsagh kangat _ 
iwernga _ saputagh ni _ unite qaghte luku _ qimagkagh _ amsikagh mi _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aglagh tke aat _ High _ P riest-em _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ Chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ qamagte luteng _ tawan tu llghiit _ .
Uy avaq aan lluni _ Peter-em _ maligsaagh qagh a _ Jesus _ co ur t y ard -ng anun _ High _ p riest-em _ mangteghagh an _ . _ tawani _ kelengak istet _ akule itgun _ aqume luni _ ughugsigh iqe aq _ ken ghem _ manu ani _ .
Chief _ priest-etlu _ qamagte luteng llu _ agghis tet _ tuqute sug pigtegkangat _ Jesus _ . _ enkaam _ tagsiqligh aqe luki _ yug t _ apegh sqekagh at _ Jesus _ sa meng _ anaggute ma ta a _ . _ iwernga _ naalkute ma ite ngugh t _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ ,
qayughllak _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ temngi _ iqlengiqe tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ apeghkagh it llu _ allake te lghiit _ .
taagken _ ila i _ yug t _ nekeve luteng _ iqlengiqe tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ pikagh t _ ,
" _ Nag atk aqaghput _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ una _ temple- a _ yug t _ ulimaagh at _ naafqe lleqe aqa _ . _ enkaam _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ alla neng _ nekefte i lleqe unga _ yug m _ ulima aqe nghite ka aneng _ ! _ ' _ "
talwa _ taakut llu _ apegh llegh it _ allake tke aat _ .
High _ priest- a _ sivu itgun _ nekeve luni _ aaptekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ " _ avutke i llegh itnun _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh ite ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ qalleg kau ma ite ngughk _ , _ kiimsigh ma ite kanga _ . _ High _ p riest-em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ Christ- ang uz iin _ , _ ighnegh a _ manigugh aqe ke mta _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Taan ang uunga _ . _ Esghagh lleqaghsi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh akun _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi ll el gem _ . _ Esghagh lleq agh sillu _ tagi lghii _ qilag m _ qilawaagh itgun _ ! _ "
High _ P riest-em _ aatkagh ni _ piig luki _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Liisimak es teng is agh ngaamta _ lliigh ukut _ !
Nag atagh si _ seghletun _ akuzi lghii _ , _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ . _ naten _ elpek si _ agghi tke steggu _ ? _ " _ agghi llegh at _ ataasiightekagh _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tuqute yaghqaa nikagh at _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ qesigh qukagh at _ Jesus _ , _ gginagh a _ saape luku _ tenglug agaataghkagh at _ . _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ uuknaliqe i ste u kuvek _ , _ ungipaate kut _ kitum _ tenglug aten _ ? _ " _ taagken _ kelengak istet _ tugu luku _ qasaghte aataghkagh at _ .
peter _ paninang _ qakma _ manughagh mete luku _ , _ ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ high _ p riest-em _ qepghaghte nga _ tagikagh _ .
esgha qaa _ peter _ ughugsigh lghii _ . _ liisuqe yamigu _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ elpek llu _ Jesus- met kayug uu ten _ Nazareth -eghm ii mi _ . _ "
iwernga _ mesag igh aqe aq _ , _ " _ nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ talwa _ liigike nghite aqa _ sa meng _ pi ten _ . _ " _ taagken _ peter _ aglagh aqe uq llu _ amig mun _ aan aluni _ , _ ro os ter -a _ qalghigh iqe aq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ qepghagh tem _ esghagh yamigu _ allameng _ tawan lenguut _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ taakut _ ila ke aat _ ! _ "
iwernga _ peter _ mesighagh laataghkagh _ . _ mulunghituq _ nekevgha te lghiit _ pi ke aat _ peter _ , _ " _ mesighaghpagningite uten _ , _ taakut _ ila ke aaten _ qayughllak _ elpek llu _ galilee-kagh mii u uten _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ siing v all aghmeng _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ iqlengiqe u kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh linga _ ! _ nalluke aqa _ yuug _ akuzi tke kesi _ ! _ "
legan _ nepiigh uq _ ro os ter -em _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh iqe a _ . _ tawani _ Peter-em _ neqagh tke a _ Jesus-em _ whaten _ pillgha _ , _ " _ Ro os ter -em _ qalghigh lleg ni _ alghigh ste gpenaan _ nallun qelleq aghpenga _ ket wh el l _ pi nga yu neng _ . _ " _ taagken _ qiyaaghwagh ghllagkagh _ .
aghtaghagh qiinagh yagu _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ agghis tet _ qerngughte tke aat _ agghite na luteng _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ asighqe ste luku _ aglagh te luku _ pilate- mun _ , _ tuunekagh at _ ellnga nun _ .
Pilate-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ Jews-et _ umiil k at aan _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ esgha _ umiileg u ni kevnga _ . _ "
Chief _ priest-et _ uglagh u pigte lghii neng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ anag gun i kaat _ .
Pilate-em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ kiimsigh te kaghqagh ite ziin _ ? _ Nag an negh i sik ii _ uglagh u pigte lghii neng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ anaggute ni kangaten _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ sa meng _ pi ma nge i tke aq _ enkaam _ Pil at e _ saghiigha yuke aq _ .
tea- ma ghhagh ani _ P ass ov er-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ , _ Pilate-em _ aane ste aqe kanga _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ yug t _ nakmikegkagh at _ .
taawa nguq _ Bar abb as _ anusimingllaghvig mete ngughk _ , _ maligte te luni _ ila itnun _ yug nun _ yugte aghagh te aqe aq _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag mi _ .
yug lghute t _ tagi luteng _ pilate- mun _ aane ste sqekagh at _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ tawaten _ pi aqe llegh atun _ .
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ Aan es tesug es tegguu _ Jews-et _ umiileg at _ ? _ "
Pilate-em _ liisimak ngwaaq angi _ chief _ priest-et _ aqinake luku _ Jesus _ tagite u kangat _ ellnga nun _ .
Chief _ priest-et _ aaghqute aqekagh it _ yug lghute t _ Bar abb as _ aane ste sqellug qu _ avelghagh luku _ Jesus _ .
Pilate-em _ yug lghute t _ aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sa naqe zikun mi _ umiil ken niiq egkesi _ Jews-enun _ ? _ "
akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
Pilate-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ , _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ pi ma a _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ iglag taagh all uteng _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Pilate-em _ efqugh sug luki _ yug lghute t _ , _ aane stekagh a _ Bar abb as _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ kagsagmig ste luku _ tuunekagh a _ pilluw aght enun _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ .
Pilluw aghtet _ itghutekagh at _ Jesus _ umiileg m _ mangteghagh anun _ ( _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ P ra et o ri um _ ) _ . _ taagken _ pilluwagh tel ghu te teng _ qerngughtekagh it _ .
Jesus-mun _ aa testek agket _ esnegrukegtagh k _ atkuyaagh k _ . _ sikughllug meng _ qaghpa ngllagh luku _ aate stekagh at _ naasqw akun _ .
taagken _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ , _ " _ Quul v agh amken _ elpek _ umiileg at _ Jews-et _ ! _ "
U nagh siigh w aghmeng _ naasqw akun _ anag ul egh luku _ , _ qesigh qu luku _ , _ manu akun _ segesqughte luteng _ qungughte vikekagh at _ .
legasiighwagh te kete nghmeng _ taaqe yamegteggu _ esnegrukegtagh k _ atkuyaagh kek _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ katam _ aatkagh i _ aate stekagh it _ . _ taagken _ aane tke aat _ qaquuragh na luku _ .
tume ni _ taakwani _ nallaqagh at _ yuug _ , _ ategh ke lghii _ Sim on -meng _ , _ C yr en e- eghm ii _ , _ ata ak _ A le x an der -enkuk _ R uf us-enkuk _ . _ naken _ qantagha neng _ tagi u uq _ Jerusalem-emun _ . _ Pilluw aghtet _ qelegh tke aat _ Sim on -mun _ uyamig sqellug qu _ Jesus-em _ qaquuragh a _ .
Jesus _ aglagh tke aat _ G ol g oth a-mun _ . _ ( _ golgotha _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ yug m _ Naas qw an _ nenge a _ . _ " _ )
tawani _ tuunekagh at _ wine- meng _ m yr r h -meng _ akumekagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ ighsakekagh a _ .
taagken _ pilluwaghtet _ qaquuragh yamegteggu _ ategh ta ii ragh u aghte te luki _ aatkagh i _ tugulaghkagh it _ .
qaquuragh kaqe kangat _ unaangu luku _ 9 - ek laag mi _ .
qaquuragh akun _ nekegtekagh at _ avutke i llegh eng _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ umiileg at _ Jews-et _ .
maalghug llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ qaquuragh ke agket _ , _ ataasigh _ Jesus-em _ aghenqignegh akun _ , _ aag llegh a _ saghumignegh akun _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pillgh at _ apeghiigh uq _ , _ " _ ila leg qite te kaqe kangat _ seghletun _ pis tenun _ . _ "
yug t _ naghughte lghiit _ naasqugh teng _ ufsug te magh ita _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ elpek _ ! _ temple- a _ naafqellug qu _ nekefte yaghqaqe u kuvgu _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ ,
sangan _ yugul il uten _ elpeneng _ qaquuragh meng _ ukig nanigh ziin _ ? _ "
Chief _ priest-etlu _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ yuguligh u iqe i _ ila it _ naqam _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yugulighpag nigh nge i tuq _ !
Christ-a _ , _ umiileg a _ Israel -em _ , _ ukig li _ maaten _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ enkaam _ esghapag luku _ ugpeqe lteggu _ . _ " _ qaquuragh lgute kenka llu _ seghlequ uq aak _ .
taagken _ qamagte luni _ nuna _ mam legh qwaa kaq _ aghnegh m _ qukaa neng _ kenlanga _ 3 - k laag mun _ .
tawani _ 3 - k laag mi _ Jesus _ akilghuu ghllagkagh _ , _ " _ El o i _ , _ El o i _ , _ l ama _ S ab ach th ani _ ? _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ sangama _ unite zinga _ ? _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ nagate luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ nagate aghte tek qun _ , _ elijah _ tuqlughagh aa _ ! _ "
yuug _ ataasigh _ aqfaqughkagh _ mesag igh kayug meng _ . _ taagken _ nepte luku _ qu waal ghii mun _ wine- mun _ unaghsiighwagh qun _ nekegte luku _ nengug tke a _ Jesus-mun _ melugrigh sqellug qu _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ wiintaku _ , _ esghapag kau lteggu _ Elij ah-m _ iike yaghtugh aqe yaaghagh a _ qaquuragh meng _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aragh ghllag luni _ tuqukagh _ .
temple- mete ngughk _ safkaaghute _ malghughqekagh _ , _ pike aq _ pikegken _ kanavek _ .
Pilluw aghtet _ umiil waa ghita _ qaquuragh m _ manung anil nguum _ , _ esghapag yamigu _ Jesus _ tawaten _ tuqu lghii _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ yuug _ ighnegh ke ma agu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
aghnagh m _ ila i _ uyavagh neng _ esghapagkagh t _ . _ Taw an teftut _ mary _ , _ M ag d al a-gh mii _ , _ Sal ome- llu _ , _ mary- llu _ naange ak _ uyuqligh m _ James -em _ , _ Jos es - emllu _ .
Jesus _ , _ galilee- mete luku _ taakut _ aghnagh t _ maligsaagh kaqe kangat llu _ kayusiite kaqe kangat llu _ . _ ila i llu _ aghnagh lghute t _ tawan lenguut _ , _ maligte te luteng _ ellnga nun _ Jerusalem - etk at _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ , _ ategh ke lghii _ Joseph -meng _ , _ Ar im ath ea- gh mii _ , _ sii vag qumtaagh _ ila at _ agghis tet _ . _ ellnga n llu _ utaqa u kanga _ piinligh lleghqagh a _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ Wh an iku yagu _ , _ yataaghqe llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ Sabbath -em _ , _ tetug nanigh luni _ pilate- mun _ pi luni _ tungsigh iqe a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ .
Pilate-em _ saghiigha yagutekagh a _ nagaqugh luku _ Jesus _ tuqu lghaghtugh ma ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ pilluwaghtet _ umiil waagh at _ tagsigh luku _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ lluu aghagh te _ Jesus _ tuqu lghaghtugh ma a _ ? _ "
Umiil waaghmeng _ liigike yamigu _ Jesus-em _ tuqu llegh a _ , _ Joseph -mun _ tugu sqekagh a _ yugusigh a _ .
enkaam _ Joseph _ tukfigh i yaghtuqagh _ qatelghii meng _ qiipaghagh meng _ ll ii vegh yaghq anun _ atuqe aqe ke meggneng _ . _ taagken _ iike luku _ yugusigh a _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ imeg tke a _ qiipaghagh kun _ . _ taawa nguq _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ sani mineng _ ilu te mun _ laag ke aq _ llivegh u luni _ . _ tawavek _ yugusigh _ kanaghtekagh a _ . _ taagken _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ ullghitagh a qaa _ llivegh m _ paye anun _ .
Mar y- m _ M ag d al a-gh mii m _ , _ Mar y- mllu _ Jos es -em _ naa an _ esghapagkagh ak _ nagun _ Jesus _ lli ma ta a _ .
Sabbath -a _ alpag yan _ mary _ , _ M ag d al a-gh mii _ , _ mary- llu _ naange a _ James -em _ , _ Sal ome- llu _ , _ tepe ngllagh sigh ngekagh t _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ angighhe na luku _ .
sivuligh m _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ unaangu pigte luku _ siqinegh _ piite kestagh u luku _ lliveghtekagh t _ .
tume mi _ taakwani _ aapqugh waagh utkat _ , _ " _ kitum ngam _ up- llghite aghtagh te naqe inkut _ uyghag ghllag meng _ llivegh m _ p aayng anil ngughmeng _ ? _ "
taagken _ sivugte yalghiimeng _ uyghag ghllag _ aw it ngwaagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
llivegh mun _ itegh luteng _ esghaghkagh at _ nukalpigagh _ qatelghii meng _ atkuyaag leg _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh ani _ . _ aghnagh t _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yuke aat _ .
nukalpigagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ saghiigha yug gpenasi _ , _ liisimake amsi _ iv aangwaagh si _ Jesus _ , _ Nazareth -eghm ii _ , _ qaquuragh kaayagh lghii _ . _ Wh aan neghituq _ , _ unguvagh stekau uq _ ! _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ , _ whagun _ lli kaqsagh aat _ .
ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ maligsaagh tengi _ , _ peter- llu _ , _ aga _ galilee- mun _ sivullgaagh ma uq _ pi naqe ni llegh mitun _ . _ taagani _ esghagh lleqaghsi _ . _ "
aane luteng _ anag na iqe aat _ llivegh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kukrag yug magh meng _ alingruugh u lghiit _ , _ repall _ ungelegte luteng _ . _ talwa _ kina _ alngunak _ sa meng _ pi ma ite kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ alingruugh u lghiit _ .
sivuligh m _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ unaangu pigte luku _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau lghii _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ aliigh vike yuwhaagh ke a _ mary _ , _ M ag d al a-gh mii _ . _ ( _ aghnagh meng _ taagken _ aane stekaqe kangi _ maaghraghvinleg _ tughneghagh t _ . _ )
ungipaate yaghtugh qu ai _ ellngan isag lghiit _ qivghu ma luki _ , _ qiya ma luki _ .
iwernga _ ungipaa si s teng _ Jesus _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma ni luku _ ugpeqe ma ite kangat _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ alla u luni _ aliigh vike gkakek _ maalghug _ maligsaagh teg ni _ , _ navek _ pi ma lukek _ .
