uteghnigh lutek _ ungipite kaqsagh kangik _ ila tek _ iwernga _ ugpeqe ma ite kegket _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ aliigh vikekagh i _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ neghe uute ma luki _ . _ aghyuugh qu ai _ ugpeqe i nghite llegh itneng llu _ aygughike llegh itneng llu _ esghagh tke aat _ ellmi neng _ unguvagh ste llegh mi _ kingu aneng _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghulaqe lusi _ nunatagh ghhagh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ungipagh qite ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lghii llu _ paaptaaye lghii llu _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i nghite ngughk _ aghyuugh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ allaaghlluwhaght ill equt _ liigike sqellug qu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh teng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ enkaam _ ategh mkun _ aane ste qugh lleqe ait _ tughneghagh t _ yug neng _ ; _ akuzi lleqe ut _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ ;
tugute yagh ghngaaghmeng _ nemegh yameng _ , _ nalighmeng _ megh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ sa naanghite ut _ ; _ qinuyug lghiit _ saafte nghmegteki _ naallghute aqe lleqe ut _ . _ "
Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ aleghqugh nghmeng _ taaqe yaki _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekagh a _ qilag mun _ , _ enkaam _ aqumekagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh akun _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ aghulaqe luteng _ tea- ma anun _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ Atanghem _ qepghagh lgusighkagh i _ , _ ipapigh qes tekaa llu _ ungipagh _ allaaghlluwhaght is tellegh mikun _ . _ amen _ .
Th e o ph il us _ , _ igagh ngllagh kaqe yuwhaagh mkun _ igaqe kaqe aqa _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ Jesus-em _ qepghagh llegh a llu _ apeghtugh i llegh a llu _ , _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qilag mun _ mayugh tes legh anun _ . _ sivuke luni _ nakmiigh kau uq _ apostle- k aghqameng _ enkaam _ apeghtugh ghllag kaqe ai _ uglagh pigte lghii meng _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ . _ Taakw aningani _ anguyag ita _ qaquuragh luku _ tuqute kaqe aat _ iwernga _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ unguvallegh mi _ kingu aneng _ 4 0 _ aghneq _ nuna mete kau uq _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh u pigte luku _ apostle- enun _ esghagh ste aatagh kau uq _ ipapestaaq _ unguvagh ma ni luni _ , _ aleghqugh na luki llu _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ allameng _ qerngughte te yata _ Jesus-em _ liilightugh qu ai _ apostle-et _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ aghulaqe gpenasi _ Jerusalem-emeng _ kenlanga _ allgegh tellegh pesinun _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ ata ma _ akequsagh ke kaqe ak _ tuune lleqe ni lukek _ elpesi nun _ katam _ tawaten _ apegh lleg mtun _ . _ John _ paaptaay egh i kaaguq _ megh kun _ , _ iwernga _ ata ma _ paaptaay e yagh tungestagh iisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ " _ Taaku s ta _ igaqegkagh nka _ igagh ngllagh kaqe yuwhaagh mkun _ .
sivu ngiighhagh ani _ Jesus-em _ mayugh lleghqagh an _ qilag mun _ , _ apostle-et _ qerngughte te yameng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ Israel -em _ at an ghut illgha _ pis neq igg naq si guu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ata inagh ghhagh ma _ liisimake ai _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mikun _ uspeqe kaqe ai _ . _ elpek si _ liisimake yaghqaqe nghite asi _ sa u aat _ qakun _ pi lleghqagh i _ .
iwernga _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eng ellequ si _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ itegh kayek _ ilu gpesinun _ . _ taagken _ ungipaq elleq aghpesinga _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ Judea- mi _ , _ Sam ar ia- mi _ , _ uyav agh pan illu _ nuna ni _ . _ "
akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekagh a _ qilag mun _ . _ esghapag te ma luku _ qilawaagh m _ talughtekagh a _ esghagh ma llegh itneng _ .
Apostle- et _ qule mun _ esghapag uute ma luki _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ qatelghii meng _ aate kaqe lghiik _ aliigh aghtekagh k _ saaghw itgun _ .
pi ke aik _ , _ " _ yug itni _ Galilee- m _ , _ sangafsi _ qule mun _ esghapag uute aqe tsi _ ? _ taagna _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh stekanga _ ukig yaghqaa uq _ esghap allegh pesi s tung waaq _ mayugh llegh atun _ qilag mun _ . _ "
taagken _ apostle-et _ uteghnigh iqe aat _ Jerusalem-emun _ M oun t _ O l iv es -meng _ . _ M oun t _ Olives _ qantagh aghh an lenguq _ Jerusalem-emeng _ .
Peter -enkut _ , _ John -enkut _ , _ James -enkut _ , _ An dr ew- nkut _ , _ Philip -enkut _ , _ Th om as -enkut _ , _ Bar th ol o me w - nkut _ , _ M at th ew- nkut _ , _ James _ , _ ighnegh a _ Al ph a e us-em _ , _ Judas _ , _ ighnegh a _ James -em _ , _ simon _ Z e al o t- a _ , _ kaate luteng _ Jerusalem-emun _ mat- yuqagh t _ qemtagh mun _ nayugh meggnun _ .
taakut _ apostle-et _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ mary- llu _ Jesus-em _ naange a _ , _ Jesus-em _ anglegut angillu _ qerngughte te luteng _ elngaatall _ ipapighqell uteng _ yughagh aqe lghiit _ ataasigh stun _ .
taagken _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte tke aat _ , _ entaqun _ 1 2 0 - nguut _ . _ tawani _ Peter-em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ neqamik aghsi _ qepgh algut fut _ Judas _ , _ Jesus-em _ nakmikegkagh a _ . _ Ayum ir ugllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ David -kun _ . _ taana _ uuknaliqe llegh _ apeghiigh kau uq _ Jud as-em _ uvegh ghpagte te aqe yagu _ Jesus _ . _ Jesus-em _ tug iis tengi _ Jud as-em _ maghyaghqugh kaqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ akileghtuusagh nge kau uq _ mani meng _ . _ taagken _ akileghtuusagh mineng _ nuna nge luni _ qemite kau uq _ ellmi neng _ tawani _ . _ yugusigh a _ ifkagh yalghiimi _ quupaghtekagh _ repall _ ighneghagh i _ aanqaghte luteng _ . _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ tuquma ta a _ tawani _ nuna mi _ , _ ata iqe aat _ taana _ nuna _ A kel d am a-meng _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ ' _ nuna _ aaghwqekagh _ . _ ' _ "
Peter-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ David _ whaten _ igagh kau uq _ psalms- mi _ : _ ' _ mangteghagh a _ paaghqite te li _ , _ allameng llu _ kina _ alngunak _ tawan tef qaa mi _ pi li _ . _ ' _ igaqe kau lghii llu _ whaten _ , _ ' _ qepghaqagh a _ kitumun _ tugute yagh kuni _ . _ '
" _ enkaam _ nakmiigh lta _ apostle- k aghqameng _ tugu sqellug qu _ Jud as-em _ qepghagh kaqsagh kanga _ . _ kina _ nakmike lteggu _ maligsaagh ikagh _ whangkunneng _ iglegha lgusigh aqe yamteggu _ Jesus _ . _ Taw an te kaalghii _ ima _ John-em _ ungipagh ke llegh aneng _ paaptaaye llegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh ste llegh anun _ Jesus _ qilag mun _ . _ enkaam _ whangkunnun _ maligte te luni _ ungipagh li _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh gket _ maalghug _ yug k _ : _ M at th i as-enkuk _ , _ Joseph _ J us tus -enkuk _ , _ allameng _ ategh leg _ Bar s abb as -meng _ .
taagken _ yughaghkagh t _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ simigh i stekaghqagh nge yug aqe ukut _ Jud as -mun _ , _ qayughllak _ unite kanga _ qepghaqagh ni _ nekaghqagh minun _ aglagh lghii _ . _ qamagte luku _ umyugagh _ liisima kan _ . _ enkaam _ naligh _ nakmike zigu _ apostle- nguluku _ qepghagh tek aghqaq _ elpenun _ ? _ "
taagken _ maalghug _ uyghag k _ sa mun _ kanaghte lukek _ aghul as aq megteggu _ aag llegh a _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ M at th i as -nguftuq _ nakmikegkagh _ . _ enkaam _ ila tke aq _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle- enun _ .
Pen te c ost -em _ aghnegh anun _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte tke aat _ ataasigh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ .
taagken _ nuuskagllagan _ anuqe ghllag stun _ sulug ghllag m _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ ukig luni _ i mi qaa _ mangteghagh _ .
taagken _ llangaqa _ ulusugnite ngugh t _ key- nghhagh at _ allgeghkagh t _ , _ esghapagkagh it _ ila meggnun _ nek egh qaa llghiit _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ imeg iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ qamagte luki _ tawan lenguut _ . _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mikun _ akuzi stekagh i _ n akum iistun _ .
tamaa nguq _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ Jews-et _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ . _ naken _ nuna neng _ tagi aqe luteng _ Jerusalem -eghm ii ngugh qu utkat _ .
nagaqugh te yameng _ sulug ghllag meng _ upleg tke ait _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte vig itnun _ . _ kaate yalghiimeng _ n akum iistun _ ugpeqagh t _ akuzite ghllagu ut _ repall _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ .
saghiigha yagute magh ita _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite lghiit _ galilee-kagh mii u ut _ .
naten _ ukut _ qamagte luta _ akuzillegh mtestun _ akuzi ut _ nallukngwaaghkagh meggneng _ ?
whaa _ whaan tu tut _ P ar th ia- ghmiit _ , _ Me d ia- ghmiit _ , _ El am -eghmiit _ , _ M es o p o tam ia- ghmiit _ , _ Judea- ghmiit _ , _ C ap p ad o c ia- ghmiit _ , _ P on tus -eghmiit _ , _ Asi a- ghmiit _ ,
Ph r y g ia- ghmiit _ , _ P am ph y ll ia- ghmiit _ , _ Egypt- eghm iit _ , _ L i b y a- ghmiit _ C yr en e-em _ tung anganeng _ pi t _ , _ C r ete -eghmiit _ , _ A ra b ia- ghmiit _ , _ whaa _ whaante ut llu _ Rome- e meng _ laalighte aat _ Jews-et _ , _ Gentile- etlu _ maniguute kayug t _ Jews- estun _ . _ nagate aput _ akuzillegh mtestun _ ungipagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh ghllag aneng _ . _ "
Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ saghiigha yagutekagh it llu _ kukriqe tkekagh it llu _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ellmeggneng _ aapqugh waagh utkat _ , _ " _ sa aqe aat _ ukut _ ? _ "
iwernga _ ila ita _ nenglaghyugsagh tke magh ita _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ meghe ghllagu ut _ ! _ "
peter- llu _ tawan lenguq _ apostle- el gut mini _ . _ nekeve luni _ iglagtu luni _ yug t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew - lgu temni _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ngnga _ .
meghe ghllagu ni ghngaaghpesikut _ meghe ghllagu nghite ukut _ nutaan qun _ 9 - ek l aak anga _ unaangu luku _ .
una _ whaten _ aneghte llegh _ Jo el -em _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ whaten _ :
' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ ighnegh si _ , _ panig si _ uuknaliqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ nukalpigagh si _ esghaghwaagh yaghqaa ut _ , _ nanevgagh si _ qavangugh yaghqaa ut _ .
talwa _ qepghagh tem nun _ yug nun llu _ aghnagh nun llu _ taghneghagh gka _ kayagte yaghqaqe agka _ uuknaliq esqelluki _ .
yug nun _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke anka _ sa u aat _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ qilag mi llu _ nuna mi llu _ : _ aa kw h _ , _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh ghllag _ ,
siqi i negh _ mamlegte yaghqagh _ , _ tanqigh _ kavighte yaghqagh _ aaw stun _ . _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii _ Atanghem _ nanqigtivigkagh a _ aghneq _ pi yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ aghneq _ taana _ kaate ste gpenaan _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ seghevute sqe lghii _ atanegh mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ Joel _ uuknaliqe kau uq _ .
" _ Israel-eghm iini _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liisimakekagh i _ Nazareth -eghm ii _ Jesus _ , _ uglagh pigte luku _ allaaghlluwhaght ighllag aataq aalghii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi stekaqe a _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mikun _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ ellmi nun _ nakmike kaqe te ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisima llegh mikun _ tuune kaqe a _ Jesus _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh gpesistun _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ taagken _ elpek si _ qaq uu ragh tes taghsi _ tamaakunun _ waa k igal ngughnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqu llegh meng _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ , _ iteme te kaqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ asighqe te llegh aneng _ , _ talwa _ tuqu llegh m _ nuqneghpagningite kaqe a _ .
David-em _ akuzite kegka qaa _ Jesus _ whaten _ : _ ' _ esghagh aqe aqa _ atanegh _ sivu mnite luku _ quunpeng _ : _ unite igate aanga _ , _ enkaangam _ seghlegh mun _ qaprag snaanghite unga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaame na ke _ quya ghllagu uq _ , _ akuzillegh nka _ quya lleg perewaagh meng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tuqu yaghqaa ghngaaghma _ sighimake naqe amken _ atanegh _ ,
qayughllak _ unite naanghite agken _ unguva sigh gka _ tuquma lghii ni _ , _ talwa _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh m _ yugusigh a _ aghu snaanghite an _ .
Apegh tuq aqagh pe nga _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh meng _ , _ whangam n i sim angin allegh pek _ quya ste ghllagu aanga _ . _ ' _ "
Peter-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ Jew - lgu temni _ , _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ apegh yug aqa _ sivunegh ut _ David _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ llivegh a llu _ naan tulanga _ liisimakagh ut _ .
unguva u luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe a _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ king ungh en _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ yug gpeneng _ . _ ' _ David-em _ uuknaliqe i ste u te mineng _ liisimake kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ Christ-a _ tuquma lghiinite naanghite ni luku _ talwa _ yugusigh a _ aghu naanghite ni luku _ , _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Taananguuq _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tekaa _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ , _ tawaten _ quulv aq aqaa _ . _ akeqe llegh mitun _ Jesus _ , _ tuune kaqe ak _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ellnga nun _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ whangkunnun _ tuune ak _ . _ tamaakut _ saghiigha nagh lghiit _ esghagh kesi _ , _ nagate kesi _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ pillgh uut _ .
" _ David _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ Atanghem _ pi a _ atanegh ka _ , _ aqume i _ aghenqignegh mkun _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe ste lleg mnun _ anguyag ten _ . _ ' _ David _ mayugh ma ite u te mineng _ qilag mun _ Jesus -etun _ , _ ellmi neng _ akuzit keng ngunghituq _ , _ akuzit keng ng waa _ Jesus _ .
" _ Ungip aatagh ll amsi _ qamagte lusi _ Israel-eghm iini _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapestaaq _ nakmike kaqe a _ Jesus _ Atangh ul ukullu _ Christ- ang ul ukullu _ . _ Taananguuq _ Jesus _ qaquuraghkagh i _ ! _ "
yug t _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh t _ enkaam _ peter- llu _ apostle- el gut angillu _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ sa naqe sta _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ Av utegh qellusi _ , _ seghleghqen nanigh lusi _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ paaptaay e teklu _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ seghleghqe lleg si _ seghev u telleng esqelluki _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunute yakek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgegh tekek _ .
atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ qayughllak _ akequsagh ke kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ elpesi nun _ , _ kingunegh gpesinun _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ uyav agh pan sagh ngaan _ tuqlughkagh minun _ . _ "
Peter-em _ tawateng inaq _ pi gpenaki _ wata _ sa meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ pi ke ai _ . _ kelenga sagh uqagh i llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ seghletun _ pis tet _ , _ enkaam _ ellngistun _ seghletun _ pi gpenasi _ luuraq _ elpek si llu _ aghyuugh y aagh iisi _ . _ "
taagken _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ ungipagh aneng _ paaptaayekagh t _ . _ enkaam _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ 3 ,000 _ yuug _ ila tke aq _ ugpeqagh nun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ iiwleng _ qerngughte te u lghiit _ liite na luteng _ apostle- eneng _ . _ Christ-akun _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ kiyaghte aaghet _ , _ negh aqe lghiit _ , _ yughagh aqe lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ .
Apostle- et _ uglagh ghngaan _ allaaghlluwhaght i kaal ghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ saghiigha yug kau lghii _ , _ tallugh yagute kaqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ nagneqagh u lghiit _ ataasigh stun _ , _ saghya teng _ atunem _ atuqe luki _ .
akike luki _ nuna teng llu _ saghya teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ tuune aqe kangit _ sa meng _ aklu lghii nun _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ temple- mi _ . _ neghe lgute ngllagh aqe luki _ ila teng _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luki _ neqe teng _ upugha te sigh ke aqe kangit _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ piniqe nigh ghllag t _ , _ usuqe manginagh aqe kangat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ Atanghem _ yugul ing uk angi _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
taagken _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ aglaghkagh k _ temple- mun _ 3 - k laag em _ yughagh te llegh ani _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ piyug igate ngughk _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ , _ aqume luni _ tung angakun _ Temp le -em _ iteghvig ani _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ , _ pinighnagh lghii _ amig ghllag _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ kevegtugh aqe kangat _ tawavek _ naghugh tan eng _ tungsigh naigh sqellug qu _ mani meng _ .
esghagh yamikek _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ itegh lghiik _ temple- mun _ tungsigh vike gkakek _ mani meng _ .
qerngagh egmek _ esghagh luku _ yuug _ tawavek _ , _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ukavek _ qiive i _ whangkutegnun _ . _ "
sighima pigte luni _ tuune aqe ni luni _ qiive gkakek _ .
Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Man iq ragg iit ngwaagh tunga _ iwernga _ sa meng _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ Nazareth -eghm iim _ , _ piyug i _ ! _ "
tugu luki _ aghenqignegh i _ iigge i _ nekev e simaluku _ yug m _ itegagh i llu _ tukughagh i llu _ iknaqugh tekat _ ,
repall _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ nekevekagh _ aga _ piyug inagh magh mi _ pi ke aq _ . _ taagken _ maligte lukek _ iteghkagh _ temple- mun _ piyug magh mi _ , _ qetgegh qaghaqe luni _ , _ usuqe magh an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Temple- me tu llghii m _ esghaghkagh at _ piyug lghii _ , _ usuqe i lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
liisuqekagh at _ tungsigh ragh tengu yalghii _ aqume luni _ tung angani _ iteghvig an _ Temp le -em _ . _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ esghagh yamegteggu _ yuug _ piyug lghii _ .
paninang _ naallghutekagh m _ yug m _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ qete nga ma lukek _ , _ yug lghute m _ saghiigha yug magh meng _ kangllu qaghtekagh it _ S ol om on-em _ P or ch -ng ani _ .
Peter-em _ esghagh yamiki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Israel-eghm iini _ , _ sangafsi _ saghiigha yug tsi _ ? _ sangamta _ esghapag uute ste kut _ ? _ Pi yug tes neghit aghp ung _ una _ yuug _ aghtughyaghqaanghill em teg neg un _ , _ nalighmeng _ pinigh te mtegneng _ . _ piyug igate ngugh m _ yug m _ Jesus _ ugpeq saqminigu _ naallghute uq _ .
Abraham -enkut _ , _ Isaa c -enkut _ , _ Jacob -enkut _ , _ sivunegh mta llu _ qamagte luteng _ manigugh qite te a _ kiyaghnegh m _ quulvagh aa _ Qepghagh teni _ Jesus _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ agl aatk aqaghsi _ pilate- mun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ , _ ighsak egkaq agh sillu _ Pilate-em _ iteme te yug aqe yagu _ .
yeghlegi _ pilate- mun _ yugte aghagh llegh ke aq _ item utes q egkaq aghsi _ ighsake luku _ Jesus _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ , _ qaatke te nga ghllag lghii _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ tuqu testek aqaghsi _ unguvallegh m _ All gegh vig pig aa _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Liisimak ngwaagh aghp ung _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaqaghkagh ung _ unguvallegh an _ kingu aneng _ enkaam _ apegh yaghq aqagh pung _ .
esghagh kesi _ una _ yuug _ nekevgha lghii _ sivu gpesini _ , _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ piyug igate yagh lghii u uq _ ima _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ . _ Ik naq ugh tekaaguq _ ugpeqe luku _ ategh a _ taam _ ataasigh m _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tekaa n _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ aa-a _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ Jesus-kun _ naallgh ut ngwaagh aa _ , _ esghagh kesi _ maaten _ .
" _ Jew - lgu temni _ , _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ uuknaliqiste tgun _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Christ-a _ ikfiqe luni _ tuqu lleqe ni luku _ . _ taana _ uuknaliqe llegh at _ apeghiigh kau uq _ igleghte te i stekete te lghii ni _ tuqute ste aqe yafsigu _ Jesus _ , _ nalluke luku _ Christ- ang utanga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ avutegh qellusi _ , _ seghleghqen nanigh lusi _ qiive tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ugpeqe teggu _ atanegh _ enkaam _ sangigte lleqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ Atanghem _ nutaghte aqe naagh ai _ taghneghagh si _ , _ kayag g neqig lleq aallu _ Jesus _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Christ- ang uluku _ elpesi nun _ .
iwernga _ Jesus _ tagi vagilgami _ qilag mete yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nutaghte llegh anun _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ akeqe i kau uq _ neghigh luku _ uuknaliqiste tgun _ aaftekagh mikun _ ellmi nun _ qepghaghte nguluki _ .
moses _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ Atanghem _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ , _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ Nag at ngwaagh nakesi _ akuzillegh a _ qamagte luku _ .
tamaakut _ nagate nghite ngugh t _ uuknaliqiste mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug aneng _ aafte luki _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ . _ '
" _ sa u a _ maana _ atugh ut _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ Sam u el -em _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ . _ Sam u el -em _ kingu aneng _ ila ita llu _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliq ut qegk aqiit _ .
kingunegh ke aisi _ uuknaliqistet _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ akequsagh t _ ellngitgun _ , _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u ut _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ Abraham - emllu _ kingunegh ke aisi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe aqe yamiki _ sivunegh si _ Abraham -kun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ abraham _ , _ kingunegh gpegun _ quya ste lleqe anka _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ ' _ akequsagh _ taana _ elpesi nun llu _ pi u uq _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ni _ Qepghagh teni _ kayagte yuwhaagh kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ . _ kayagtekaqe a _ quya ste na lusi _ qamagte lusi _ tunute ste llegh mikun _ seghleghqe ma llegh gpesineng _ . _ "
Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ paninang _ ungipagh ma lukek _ S ol om on-em _ P or ch -ng ani _ , _ priest-etlu _ umiileg at llu _ Temp le -em _ kelengak isteng ita _ , _ Sa dd uc ees -etlu _ tagi laghate tke aat _ .
piyuke ma ite kangat _ apostle- ek _ apeghtuusagh ak _ yug nun _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ taam _ ipapigh qegk anga _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ unguvallegh mun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apostle- ek _ tugu lukek _ anusimingll aq agket _ . _ siingenllu _ unug naqe kanga _ unaa qu si t kag ket _ nanqigte gpenakek _ .
iwernga _ tamaa na _ ila a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nagatekagh _ Peter -en kugneng _ John -en kugneng _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ . _ Enkaangam _ yuggagh inagh t _ ugpeqagh t _ entaqun _ 5 ,000 -ngugh tekat _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ ugpeqagh t _ ilate gpenaki _ .
unaami ani _ Jerusalem-emi _ qerngughte tke aat _ Jews-et _ igleghutisteng it _ , _ siivanllegh t _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ ,
High _ priest- a _ An n as _ , _ Ca i ap h as _ , _ John _ , _ alexander _ , _ ila i llu _ high _ p riest-em _ ilakwaagh i _ .
taagken _ apostle- ek _ tagite ste lukek _ aaptekagh gket _ , _ " _ kitum _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ yuug _ piyugte sag u te stegnegu _ ? _ kitum _ ategh a _ atuqe luku _ tawaten _ pi stek _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ , _ " _ Igleghut ist en illu _ siivanllegh ni llu _ ,
aap tagh pesi kung _ aneghneghte i lleg mtegneng _ , _ naten _ naallghute ma ta a _ piyug igate ngughk _ yuug _ .
Enkaangam _ liigike sug amsi _ qamagte lusi _ , _ ila i llu _ Israel-eghmiit _ qamagte luki _ naten _ una _ yuug _ naallghute kau ta a _ . _ naallghute kau uq _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ Nazareth -eghm iim _ . _ ellnga n _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh an _ naallghute kaqe a _ , _ elpek si _ qaquuraghkagh gpesi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ una _ yuug _ piyug igate yagh lghii _ whaa _ maaten _ nekevgha uq _ sivu gpesini _ .
Jesus- nguuq _ ukut _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ uyghag _ ighsakekagh i _ elpek si _ mangtegh angll aght eni _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ uyghag _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ nuna mun _ , _ ellngin aghh aaguq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ . _ alla _ naten _ yuug _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ aatagh akun _ Jesus-em _ . _ "
Jews-et _ agghis tengita _ saghiigh ayag utk agket _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ tetug nghite llegh gkeneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kegket _ igaghyagh ma ite ngugh k _ . _ Liigik saq meg tekek _ Jesus- met kaat meg neng _ tawaten _ akuzi u uk _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaghkagh at _ yuug _ naallgh ut ngwaagh luni _ nekevgha lghii _ Peter -en kug ni _ John -en kug ni _ .
agghi vig meng _ agghis tet _ aane stekagh it _ Peter -enkut _ John -enkut _ naagh llegh u tke aq llu _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit _ agghi te inagh u magh meng _ pikagh t _ .
Aap qugh aagh utkat _ ellmeggneng _ , _ " _ naten _ pi naqe stekek _ yug k _ ? _ seghleghhalek _ ipa u ni naqagh ut _ allaaghlluwhaght illgh ak _ , _ qayughllak _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ qamagte luteng _ liisimake aat _ .
taawanginaq _ ineghte yagh kumtekek _ alla llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ Jesus _ pi sqellug qu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ wata _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nagaqugh na yu katgu _ . _ "
enkaam _ itegh ste lukek _ inegh tengngwaaq agket _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke fqaan _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke fqaan _ Jesus _ pin ak es ek _ . _ "
iwernga _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ kiimsigh iqe ait _ , _ " _ Qaatk ell amsi i _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luku _ ? _ naligh _ efqugh nagh a _ kiyaghnegh mi _ ? _ ataasiighte ki _ umyugagh si _ .
whangkutung _ akuzite kete nghmeng _ taaq naanghi tagh pung _ esghaghkagh ung llu _ nagaqughkagh ung llu _ . _ "
Ag ghis tet _ aghyuughpag nigh nge i tke agket _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ usuqe kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ allaaghlluwhaght illegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ temngi _ alingsequ lukek _ aanes tek agket _ .
taana _ yuug _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ siipngaan _ uksughtutka lghii _ , _ piyugpagningite yagh lghii _ iwernga _ maaten _ naallghute lghii _ .
Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ aan esi s tek _ aglaghkagh k _ ugpeqaalgut meg nun _ . _ ungipagh ke ak _ chief _ priest-etlu _ siivanllegh t llu _ pill ghitneng _ .
nagate lukek _ ataasiighte luteng _ yughaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ ulima kaqe aten _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ megh _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ taa kun ilnguq _ , _ igleghte te u aten llu _ qamagte luki _ .
Ayum ir ugllak _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ akuzi kau uten _ sivunegh mteggun _ David -kun _ qepghagh teg pegun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sangan _ Gentile-et _ temngi _ sakr itu teghllag t at kek _ Atangh enkuk _ Christ- akullghiik _ , _ sangan llu _ yug t _ seghletun _ piyug pigte atkek _ pipagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ ?
nuna m _ umiileg i llu _ igleghutiste tlu _ qerngughte te luteng _ yataaghqe te ut _ pilluw aghnal ukek _ Atangh enkuk _ Christ- akullghiik _ ! _ '
" _ ipapestaaq _ maani _ Jerusalem-emi _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ . _ Herod -enkuk _ P on ti us _ Pilate -enkuk _ ilate kau uk _ Gentile- en unllu _ Israel-eghm iin unllu _ kipullgin aagh naluku _ , _ Jesus _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Qepghagh ten _ , _ nakmike gkan _ Christ- ang uluku _ .
atanegh _ liisimak ngwaaq enllu _ yataaghqe kaqe ken llu _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
nagate aqe aten _ maaten _ whaa _ aling siq uk anginkut _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ni luta _ . _ atanegh _ , _ iknaqugh saq aght ikut _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaamta _ ungipagh lta _ ungipagh gpeneng _ ,
whangkutgun _ naallghute ki _ qinu yuget _ , _ allaaghlluwhaght is ti kutlu _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ , _ seghleghqe ma ite ngugh qun _ Qepghagh teg pegun _ . _ "
yughagh nghmeng _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ qerngughte te vig at _ mangteghagh _ ufsug tke aq _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ imeg iqe ai _ qamagte luki _ , _ enkaam _ tetug gpenateng _ ungipaghyag tke aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
Apostle- et _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eligh llag luteng _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ unguvagh kau ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste ghllagu kangi llu _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ ataasigh stun _ lli aqe aat _ ilu megteggun llu _ unguva sigh megteggun llu _ . _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ pi igate ngughk _ saghya teng _ ellngin agh meggnun _ pik niluki _ , _ atunem _ atuqe aqe kangit _ .
nunaleg t _ , _ mangteghagh leg t _ akike nghmegteki _ nuna teng llu _ mangteghagh teng llu _ , _ allgegh ta teng _ mani t _ apostle- enun _ tuune aqe kangit _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ sa meng _ aklu nghata _ man il it aqegkangit _ , _ tawaten _ kina _ alngunak _ aklu ma ite ngughk _ .
Joseph _ tawan lenguq _ , _ C yp r us -eghm ii _ , _ Lev i -em _ kingun gha _ , _ ellnga n llu _ akike luku _ nuna ni _ tuunekagh a _ allgegh ta ni _ apostle- enun _ . _ Apostle- et _ ata iqe aat _ Barnab as -meng _ whaten _ pi sigh meng _ , _ " _ kayeme sta _ . _ "
taawa nguq _ yuug _ ategh a _ A nan i as _ , _ nulighh a _ sapphire _ . _ akikekagh a _ nalighnegh a _ nuna mi _ .
nuliigh mi _ liisima nghaani _ aksaqekagh a _ ila a _ mani m _ ellmi nun _ pi u luku _ . _ taana _ siipnegh ni _ tuunekagh a _ apostle- enun _ sumegh mini _ qamagte luku _ tuune i luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
yeghlegi _ Peter-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sangan _ qaute kete zigu _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqu llegh a _ iqlengiq esqell uten _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ aksaqe llegh gpegun _ ila a _ mani m _ ?
sangan _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh ma ziin _ ? _ yug nun _ iqlengiqe nghite uten _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iqlengiqe uten _ . _ akike llghite luku _ nuna n _ elpek _ pik sagh an _ , _ enkaam _ aki kaqe yavgu _ mani a llu _ taana _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi yaghqaqe yagh an _ . _ "
legan _ A nan i as-em _ peter _ nagate luku _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh luteng _ qiipagh akun _ imeg te luku _ yugusigh a _ aane te luku _ llivegh ke aat _ . _ ungipagh _ A nan i as-em _ iqlengiqe llegh a llu _ tuqu llegh a llu _ mingitekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nagaqugh tke aat _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
pi nga yu t _ aflu t _ atugh luki _ A nan i as-em _ tuqu llegh aneng _ , _ nulighh a _ iteghkagh _ nalluke luku _ ugi ni _ samatagh nge a _ .
Peter-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ tawaten _ akitutka an _ akik es teg neg uu _ nuna ek _ ? _ " _ S ap ph ir a-m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
Peter-em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ sa yaftek _ ugi ke te lghii gni _ sumeghtaghagh ma stek _ nanghiiqu na lukek _ Atanghem _ taghneghagh kek _ ? _ yug t _ llivegh ikagh t _ ugi gpeneng _ qakma _ manughagh mete ut _ . _ elpek llu _ tawaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ . _ "
Taw anigh llug g iinaq _ ellnga llu _ ullegh aghte luni _ tuqukagh _ . _ nukalpigagh t _ itegh yalghiimeng _ sapphira- llu _ taawa _ tuquma lghii _ , _ enkaam _ aane te luku _ ugi an _ saaghw akun _ llivegh ke aat _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ nagaqugh te lghiit _ A nan i as-enkuk _ S ap ph ir a-nkuk _ tuqu llegh gkeneng _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
yug lghute t _ qung ang itni _ apostle-et _ allaaghlluwhaght ighllag um angin aqat _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t llu _ apostle- etlu _ qerngughte te aqe lghiit _ Temp le -em _ manughagh ani _ ategh ke lghii mi _ , _ S ol om on-em _ P or ch -ng ani _ .
iwernga _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ Jesus-meng _ ilate igate ngugh t _ ugpeqagh nun _ qayughllak _ aling ek anigh aqelghiit _ , _ naqam _ pinigh na iqe kangit _ .
iwernga _ uglapig llegh iit _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe u kangat _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nula ma inagh ke aat _ .
Apostle- et _ allaaghlluwhaght ill ghit _ apallugh ke luki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ qinuyug t iit eng _ allighagh itgun _ tagite luki _ tume tgun _ lli aqe kangit _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ qayughllak _ Peter-em _ naghughtekaki _ luuraq _ taghneghagh nge te llegh an _ naallghute na yu kaki _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
enkaam _ Jerusalem-emun _ qantaghan leng ugh neng _ nuna neng _ tagi laghate tke aq _ yug lghute _ Jerusalem-emun _ . _ Q in u yug tii tengllu _ tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ tagi tke ait _ apostle- enun _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tagi tke ait _ naallghute uute tke aat _ .
High _ priest- enkut _ ila ke te lghiit _ Sa dd uc ees -et _ aqina tke aat _ apostle- neng
enkaam _ tugu ste luki _ kanagh stekagh it _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ .
iwernga _ unug yan _ yaquleg an _ Atanghem _ qelpeghtekagh i _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig i _ . _ enkaam _ aane te luki _ apostle-et _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ aglagh lusi _ temple- mun _ , _ qamagte luku _ apegh teggu _ una _ nutaghagh _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ "
Apostle- et _ qaatkekagh at _ yaquleg _ . _ aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ itegh luteng _ temple- mun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ . _ High _ priest- enkut _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngughtekagh it _ Jews-et _ siivanllegh it llu _ qamagte luki llu _ agghis tet _ , _ agghi te kete na luki _ apostle-et _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiil waa ghitnun _ aqfa stekagh it _ apostle-et _ .
iwernga _ umiileg u aaghet _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ apostle-et _ aviite ut _ . _ enkaam _ agghis tenun _ aglagh luteng _ ungipagh tke ait _ ,
" _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kaate yalghiikut _ amig t _ m aghq aq ugh waagh ng af tut _ , _ kelengak iste tlu _ amignitu te ut _ naqam _ itegh yalghiikut _ paaghqite uq _ ! _ "
Temp le -em _ kelengak isteng ita _ umiileg at llu _ , _ chief _ priest-etlu _ ungipaa si s teng _ kukriqe tkekagh it _ samatagh nge i _ apostle-et _ .
taagken _ kitum _ itegh luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taakut _ yug t _ anusimingllagh kaqsagh kesi _ inga _ temple- mi _ apeghtugh i aqe ut _ . _ "
Keleng ak istet _ umiileg ke te lghiit _ aqfakagh it _ apostle-et _ . _ seghletun _ pi ma ite kangit _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ yug neng _ Temple- melngugh neng _ tuqun nayuk angis teng _ milugh pag aat aghhiinaq _ .
tagite luki _ itghutekagh it _ agghis tenun _ enkaam _ high _ p riest-em _ pi ke ai _ apostle-et _ ,
" _ I negh tengngwaaq aqsagh amsi _ allameng llu _ apeghtugh i fqaafsi _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ pis qellusi _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke ma nge itagh zikut _ ! _ yeghlegi _ allute luteng _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ liite aat _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ whangkuta llu _ av ut ngu s naqutk aghpe kut _ Jesus-em _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ "
Peter-em _ kiimsigh tke ai _ apostle-et _ , _ " _ Qaatk esaghq aqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luki _ yug t _ .
qaquuragh luku _ tuqu testek aqaghsi _ Jesus _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Enkaangam _ quulv aghnaluku _ Jesus _ aghenqignegh mikun _ nekegtekaqe a _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ . _ tawaten _ pika qaa _ Israel-eghmiit _ avutegh qesaghq aagh tesqelluki _ seghleghqen nan iisqelluki _ , _ qiiv esqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute na luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
whangkuta _ ungipaghte u ukut _ tamaakunun _ pi llegh nun _ , _ maligte te luta _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh gkenun _ tamaakunun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
Ag ghis tet _ sakr itu t kaal ghiit _ Peter-em _ kiimsigh y is teng _ tawaten _ , _ repall _ tuqute yu kaqe kangit _ apostle-et _ .
iwernga _ ataasigh _ agghi sta _ nekevekagh _ akuzi na luni _ . _ G amal i el -nguftuq _ , _ Pharis e e _ , _ apeghtughiste at _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh ita _ , _ elngaatall _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaat kum taagh a _ . _ Keleng ak ist enun _ aane te aghte sqekagh i _ apostle-et _ .
taagken _ agghis tel gut ni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Israel-eghm iil gu temni _ , _ piraamsi tete luki _ taakut _ yug t _ pi teki _ .
Neqamik en ghis tegguu _ qavnganghhaq _ Th e ud as _ pi kau lghii _ igleghte te ste ghllagu ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ 4 00 _ yuug _ maligsaagh ikagh _ ellnga neng _ . _ iwernga _ Th e ud as _ tuqute yatgu _ maligsaagh tengi _ qimagugh tke aat _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ allameng llu _ akuzi tke sug ma ite kangat _ .
Taakw aningani _ Jud as -llu _ galilee-kagh mii _ , _ qerngughte ikagh _ yugkagh meng _ kav em a _ keste i ta iqe yan _ yug m _ uglaghtala aneng _ . _ iwernga _ ellnga llu _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ yug i _ mingite kau ut _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ sume mni _ itagnagh nayagh ukut _ sa fqiita _ qakemkut _ yug t _ pi yagh kumteki _ . _ Ell meggneng _ pi u kumeng _ tawaten _ pillgh at _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pil qegk agu _ aghula i aghte naanghite asi _ , _ kipullgin aagh lleq agh sillu _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ " _ enkaam _ agghis tet _ qaatkekagh at _ gamaliel _ .
taagken _ kelengak ist enun _ itghute ste luki _ apostle-et _ kagsagmig stekagh it _ . _ I negh tengngwaaq iitlu _ ungipagh ke nanigh sqellug qu _ Jesus _ . _ apeghiigh yamegteki _ aane stekagh it _ .
Apostle- et _ aan esi s teng _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayngusaghagh te stekaqe kangi _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ temple- mi llu _ kinku ni llu _ ungipagh kaqe kangat _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe kangat _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- angun iluku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ ugpeqagh t _ nula u luki _ Greek - stun _ akuzi kayug t _ Jews-et _ seghleghyugkagh t _ , _ H eb r ew- stun _ akuzi kayug neng _ Jews-en eng _ , _ qayughllak _ ugingigh aght iit eng _ aklukegk iitneng _ tuun l aaghi gal kangit _ . _ enkaam _ yiillgikagh it _ , _ " _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ uy egt istet _ pal as qughh aan _ tuune aqe ait _ whangkuta _ ugingighagh put _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ , _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ anaggute lleqe ukut _ pegtekumteggu _ ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ uy egt isteng ughh naluta _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nakmike teki _ maaghraghvinleg _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ imigh nga lghiit _ , _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ uyegte i ste ngllagh lleqe aput _ .
tawaten _ pi kumta _ whangkuta _ apostle- eni _ yughagh manginagh lleqe ukut _ , _ ungipagh ke i manginagh lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ "
ugpeqagh t _ efqugh kekagh it _ apostle-et _ agghi llegh it _ . _ enkaam _ nakmikegkagh at _ stephen _ , _ elngaatall _ ugpeqe i nga ghllag _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ imigh nga lghii llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ nakmikegkagh it llu _ Philip -enkut _ , _ P ro ch or us -enkut _ , _ N ic an or -enkut _ , _ Tim on -enkut _ , _ P ar men as -enkut _ , _ N ic ol a us -llu _ gentile- a _ Antioch -eghm ii _ Jews- estun _ manigugh u sag u tke aq _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ apostle- enun _ yughaatk esqelluki _ , _ naasqw itgun _ saafte luki _ yughagh tkekagh it _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ nula kau lghiit _ ugpeqagh t _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ priest- el ghutetlu _ ila lghute it _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ maligte te luteng _ .
stephen _ kayusillegh leg ghllag u te mineng llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eleg llag ut min engllu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ allaaghlluwhaght ighllag aataq aq _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ , _ C yr en e- eghm ii ngu yalghii tlu _ , _ A le x and ri a-gh mii ngu yalghii tlu _ aaghtiiraagh yaghtugh qu aat _ stephen _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ synagogue- ng ita _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ iteme tke aat _ Qepghagh te laagh et _ . _ " _ yug t _ C il ic ia- gh mii ngu yalghii tlu _ , _ Asi a-gh mii ngu yalghii tlu _ ila tke aat _ taa kunun _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ peghqinegh pigte luku _ akuzi stekagh a _ repall _ kiimsighpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ila i _ yug t _ aksaqe luku _ akileghtugh qu ait _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ whaten _ , _ " _ Nag atk aqaghput _ seghlequ uq ek _ Moses -enkuk _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ . _ "
siivanllegh t llu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ nagate luteng _ iqlengiqe llegh itneng _ sakr itu t kat _ . _ taagken _ aaghtiiraagh te luteng _ aglagh tke aat _ stephen _ agghis tenun _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ agghis tenun _ iqlengiqe tke sqellug qu _ stephen _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Steph en -em _ quunpeng _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe a _ temple- a _ , _ liilightuusagh t llu _ Moses-em _ tuunekagh i _ whangkunnun _ .
Nag atk aqagh putlu _ pi lghii _ Jesus- em nguq _ Nazareth -eghm iim _ naafqe lleqe a _ temple- a _ , _ allangughte lleqe a llu nguq _ kiyaghtaallegh put _ Moses-em _ apeghtugh tke a _ whangkunnun _ . _ "
qamagte luteng _ tawan lenguut _ esghaghkagh at _ Steph en -em _ gginagh a _ kuukgute lghii _ yaquleg m _ gginagh atun _ .
taagken _ high _ p riest-em _ aaptekagh a _ stephen _ , _ " _ ipa _ tawaten _ akuzi kau ziin _ ukut _ av utk is teg pek _ ap ell ghistun _ ? _ "
Steph en -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ , _ siivanllegh ni llu _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ ungipamsug te naqe amsi _ ! _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ salin _ M es o p o tam ia- m elluku _ , _ nuugte llghite luku _ haran- mun _ , _ N igh ugh qengng alghiim _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh vike luku _ 
pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ unite gu _ allgeghvig n _ nuna _ , _ ilakwaagh ten llu _ , _ aghulaqe i _ maghyaghqugh naagh amken _ . _ '
enkaam _ abraham _ aghulaqekagh _ Ch al d ea- meng _ , _ nuugtekagh _ haran- mun _ . _ ata a _ tuqu yan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ maghyaghqugh qu a _ abraham _ nuna mun _ maaten _ kiyaghfig gpesinun _ .
tagite yuwhaagh aqe yamigu _ natengiighhaq _ nun al i simangit aa _ ellnga nun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ talwa _ salin _ avaquti uute luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ una _ nuna _ ellnga nun llu _ king ungh anunllu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ whaten llu _ pika qaa _ , _ ' _ kingunegh ten _ aghulaqe yaghqaa ut _ nuna ke nghite ke meggnun _ enkaam _ nunatagh u lleqe ut _ . _ tamaani _ qepghaghtelaagh u yaghqaag utlu _ amyuqetagh tkesigh ghllag yaghqaa ut llu _ 4 00 _ ayumiqullegh lghute ni _ .
iwernga _ aghyuugh lleqe anka _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh tes til ghiit _ . _ kingu aneng _ aghyuugh i llegh ma _ kingunegh ten _ tagi lleqe ut _ nuna mun _ akequsagh kekagh mnun _ , _ tamaani _ manigugh lleqe aatnga _ . _ ' _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsagh ngllaghkagh _ Abraham -emun _ nalluniigh tke sqellug qu _ circumcise- elleq _ . _ enkaam _ abraham _ circumcise- ek aq _ . _ ighnegh nge yami _ Isaa c -meng _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ aghneq _ atugh yagu _ circumcise- ek aa _ ellnga llu _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ Isaa c -em _ circumcise- ek aa _ ighnegh ni _ Jacob _ . _ Jacob -em _ circumcise- el aqii _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighnegh ni _ . _ taakut _ piinligh sigh ke ai _ ramke an _ Israel -em _ .
" _ angli laghate te luteng _ Jacob -em _ ighnegh ita _ aqinake pigtekagh at _ anglegut s eng _ Joseph _ , _ enkaam _ akikekagh at _ Egypt- eghm iinun _ qepghaghtelaagh uluku _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh kekagh a _ ,
seghleliigh nghaani _ kayusigh aqe kanga _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqin ell el itk aa _ enkaam _ Ph ar a o h - m _ umiileg an _ Egyp t -em _ , _ efqugh ke luku _ umiilg atagh aagh testekaa _ Egypt- mun _ , _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh a llu _ mangteghagh minun llu _ , _ qepghaghte min unllu _ .
taagken _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ Egypt- millu _ , _ C an aan - millu _ , _ elngaatall _ uglagh _ iyatagh iqe te ghllag ke aq _ . _ sivunegh put llu _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aat _ .
Jacob -em _ nagaqugh yamiki _ Egypt- eghm iit _ g ra in -meng _ kagpag ghllag ma ni luki _ , _ ighnegh ni _ pi keng yagh tiis qegkii _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ alla _ pi yata _ , _ Joseph -em _ anengagh ni _ ungipagh tke ai _ ellngit nun _ uyughagh ke ni luni _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ Ph ar a o h - m _ anglegutku tut angi _ liigikekagh i _ .
taagken _ Joseph -em _ lipeghsagh ke a _ ata ni _ Jacob _ , _ nengllugute lghutagh nge i llu _ nuug tesqelluki _ Egypt- mun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ 7 5 -nguftut _ .
enkaam _ Jacob -enkut _ nuugtekagh t _ . _ tamaani _ Jacob _ tuqukagh _ , _ kingu aneng _ tagtalmi _ taakwani _ ila i llu _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
Taakw aningani _ neghqwaagh it _ aglagh te luki _ S h e ch em -emun _ , _ llivegh nqigtekagh it _ nuna kun _ Abraham-em _ tukfighkagh akun _ H am or -em _ king ungh aneng _ .
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ Abraham -emun _ akequsagh a _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ sivunegh put _ nula ghllagkagh t _ Egypt- mi _ .
taagken _ Egyp t _ nutaghagh meng _ umiileg ngekagh _ , _ taam _ umiileg m _ nallukngwaagh kanga _ Joseph _ .
sivunegh mta _ nula ghllag llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ umiileg m _ peghqiniqe te luki _ ikfiqe stekagh i _ sivunegh put _ , _ talwa _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ aane te ste aqe luki _ pi ke ai _ tuqu s qelluki _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ moses _ allgeghkagh _ , _ y uuk eg tepig llegh ii _ taghnughhagh _ . _ angayuqagh gkenka _ ne megteni _ iigh aghtu meng _ aflengakekagh ak _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ .
iighaghtughpagningite te yamegnegu _ aane tke ak _ . _ umiileg m _ panig an _ naalkellug qu _ allughqi luku _ , _ angli stekagh a _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ .
Egypt- eghm iit _ apeghtugh qu aat _ liitekagh meggneng _ . _ enkaam _ moses _ peghqin ghu ghigh llag yalghiimi _ akuzill gu ugh qaagh llakaq _ , _ aghtugh igate ngughk llu _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ moses _ 4 0 _ uksughtutkaligh yami _ Israel-eghm iil gut ni _ esghagh yug luki _ esghagh yaghtugh qu ai _ .
tawani _ esgha qaa _ Egypt- eghm iim _ amyuutke kanga _ Israel-eghm ii _ . _ enkaam _ Moses-em _ Israel-eghm ii _ igugh luku _ tuqu tke a _ Egypt- eghm ii _ .
tawani _ sumeghtaghagh kaayagh lghii _ Israel-eghm iil gut minun _ liigike lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagte lleg ni _ ellngit nun _ aghulaqe te i ste u luku _ Egypt- meng _ . _ iwernga _ liigike ma ite kangat _ .
unaami ani _ esghagh kakek _ Israel-eghm iik _ pillugute lghiik _ . _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kek _ , _ ' _ pillugute gpenatek _ yug lgu tke te utek _ . _ '
yeghlegi _ amyuqetagh iqe lghii m _ yug m _ ayagaghte luku _ moses _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten _ , _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ whangkunnun _ ?
whanga llu _ tuqute yug zinga _ ighivgaq _ tuqute llegh gpetun _ Egypt- eghm ii _ ? _ '
yug m _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ moses _ qimagkagh _ M id i an -mun _ , _ tamaani _ allaneghtagh ukagh _ . _ qenwat _ nulightugh luni _ ighnegh ngekagh _ maalghug gneng _ .
" _ moses _ , _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh _ M id i an - me tutk elluku _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqekagh _ M oun t _ S in ai -em _ uvit anganun _ . _ tawani _ esgha qaa _ yaquleg _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
All aagh lluwh aghy ag utk aqegkanga _ . _ K enqig tengngwaagh naluku _ takukagh a _ , _ kaate yaghtugh aqe a llu _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ ,
' _ kiyaghnegh u unga _ , _ sivugh nghpek _ Abraham -enkut _ Isaa c -enkut _ Jacob -enkut _ kiyaghnegh ke aatnga _ . _ ' _ moses _ alingruughkagh _ repall _ ungelegtekagh _ talwa _ esghagh yug ma nge i tke a _ .
Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ kameg gken _ mataghte kek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ nekevgha vig n _ .
esghapag anka _ yug nka _ amyuutke kangit _ Egypt- mi _ , _ nagate anka _ ngillegte lghiit _ . _ ukig unga _ yugul in aluki _ Egypt- eghm iineng _ . _ enkaam _ whaa _ kayagte naqe amken _ Egypt- mun _ . _ '
" _ Taananguuq _ moses _ Israel-eghmiit _ ighsa kaqe yamegteggu _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ kitum _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh aten llu _ nanqigte i ste ngllagh aten llu _ whangkunnun _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ uteghnigh stekagh a _ Egypt- mun _ igleghte te i ste u luku llu _ yuguligh i ste u luku llu _ ellngit nun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ yaquleg kun _ kumaghugh lghii mi _ uqfillegagh mi _ .
moses _ allaagh lu wh aght ighllag aatagh luni _ Egypt- mi _ , _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ Egypt- meng _ . _ wata _ allaaghlluwhaght iigh aataq aaguq _ R e d _ S ea- millu _ , _ iglegha llegh meggni llu _ kilgaa ni _ maghyaghqugh aqe yamiki _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
Taananguuq _ moses _ Israel-eghm iinun _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqe i sta _ nakmike lleqe a _ yug gpesineng _ whanga _ nakmike llegh mitun _ uuknaliqe i ste u lunga _ . _ '
Taananguuq _ moses _ sivun em n n itkaq _ qerngughte te aqngata _ kilgaa ni _ M oun t _ S in ai -em _ tungang angi _ . _ tawani _ naayghagh mi _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh yatni _ tugukagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ apeghtuusagh t _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ . _ taagken _ apeghkagh i _ taakut _ sivunegh mnnun _ enkaam _ ellngit a _ nagnegh tek aqiit _ whangkunnun _ .
" _ iwernga _ sivunegh mta _ moses _ qaatke sug mangite aat llu _ , _ igleghte te i steke yug mangite aat llu _ , _ yeghlegi _ uteghte yu kau ut _ Egypt- mun _ .
enkaam _ Moses-em _ anengagh a _ aaron _ pi ke aat _ , _ ' _ Kiyagh neng llagh tegh qut _ magh yaghq iisqell uta _ . _ nallukagh ut _ moses _ samatagh nge a _ , _ legan _ aghulaqe te luta _ Egypt- meng _ unite ainkut _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kaa w aghagh sug nil ngughmeng _ , _ aghqerragh uqagh at llu _ . _ neqenghaghqekagh t llu _ quulv aghnaluku _ ulimaagh eng _ .
" _ tawaten _ pi yata _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunutekagh i llu _ , _ pegtekagh i llu _ elngaatall _ maniguu tesqelluki _ siqinegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ighaleqetaagh nun llu _ . _ atanegh _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqe llegh itni _ , _ ' _ Israel-eghm iini _ , _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ iglegha u lusi _ kilgaa ni _ aghqer raagh um angit aghpesinga _ tuqutagh ii negh gpesini _ teghig ke te yameng _ .
yeghlegi _ kel qut aaq egkaq asi _ tiinta t _ manigugh vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ M ol och -mun _ , _ kel qut aaq egkaq agh sillu _ ighaleqetaagh ngllaghkagh _ maniguute yu i luku _ rephan- mun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ anguyag gpesinun _ aghulaqe te ste lleqe amsi _ naghughte luku _ Babylon _ . _ ' _ "
stephen _ paninang _ akuzikagh _ , _ " _ sivunegh put _ kilgaa nite luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tiinta nglligh sqekagh i _ amigh meng _ manigugh vig u luki _ ellmi nun _ . _ ulima kaqe ait _ tawatengwaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh te llegh atun _ Moses -mun _ . _ K elq ut aaq egkiit _ taakut _ tiinta t _ neqangugh sigh u luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayute te nga llegh anun _ .
Taakw aningani _ moses _ tuqu yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ Jos h u a _ igleghut istek esqelluku _ sivunegh mnnun _ . _ Jos h u a-m _ magh yaghq ugh y is teng _ nuna mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh anun _ taakut _ tiinta t _ kelqekagh it _ . _ takukagh meggnun _ nuna mun _ kaate yalghiimeng _ yug lgu uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivunegh mnnun _ ighllegh stekagh i _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ sivunegh put _ nelikagh t _ taaggun _ nuna kun _ . _ tamaani _ nagnegh tke ait _ taakut _ tiinta t _ maniguute vig u luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kenlanga _ umiileg liite llegh meggnun _ David _ .
David-em _ kiyaghtaa llgha _ elngaatall _ efqugh nagh pigtekau lghii _ kiyaghnegh mi _ . _ enkaam _ David-em _ aaptekaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh a _ Jacob -em _ , _ mangtegh angll aghl ak aan _ ? _ ' _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi te ma ite kanga _ ,
yeghlegi _ David-em _ ighnegh an _ S ol om on-em _ mangteghagh ngllagh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
" _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh ghllag _ kiyaghsigate uq _ mangteghagh ni _ yug t _ ulimaagh itni _ . _ whaten _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ uuknaliq istem _ igaqe llegh ani _ ,
' _ qilag _ aqumutagh ke aqa _ , _ nuna llu _ itegagh iitagh ke aqa _ . _ sangan _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe ste ngnga _ ? _ Megh nal ivig it aa ngunghi tunga _ .
Ulim aaq en ghii siku un _ sa u a _ qam a tengngwaagh luku _ ? _ ' _ "
Steph en -em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pi neghllug ghllag ni _ elpek si _ , _ qaatk esug ig atagh si _ , _ ugpeq sug ig atagh si _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ nagate yug igate asi _ , _ ighsa keraaghagh ke agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ sivunegh pesi s tung waaq _ .
qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliq isteng i _ sivunegh gpesi _ amyuutke kaqe ait _ . _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe te kete yatgu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ tagi yaghqaa ni yatgu _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yan _ , _ uvegh ghpagte te luku _ tuq utk aqaghsi _ .
elpesi u usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg tgun _ tuunekagh i _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ qaatke mangite asi _ . _ "
Ag ghis tet _ nagate luku _ stephen _ sakr itu tegh llakat _ repall _ ggiiste aghagh tke aat _ .
iwernga _ stephen _ , _ imigh nga lghii _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ sivugte yalghiimi _ qilag mun _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqell gha _ , _ Jesus- llu _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ esghaqagh teggu qun _ ! _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ ighnegh a llu _ yug m _ nekevgha lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghenqignegh ani _ ! _ "
Ag ghis tet _ sigute teng _ saape luki _ iigge meggneng _ , _ araghaatagh te magh meng _ qamagte luteng _ sughukagh at _ stephen _ .
S iing v ag aat ameng _ aghulaqe tke aat _ Jerusalem-emeng _ , _ tuqute na luku _ milugh pag aat aghhiinaq _ . _ taagken _ Steph en -em _ av utk isteng ita _ qaasligh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ nukalpigagh m _ Saul -em _ saaghw akun _ lli luki _ milugh agaatagh yuggaagh ke aat _ . _ tamaakut llu _ ila ita _ milugh agaataghkagh at _ .
whaa _ uyghag m _ tekegh igh qagh vike yatni _ stephen _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ taghneghagh gka _ tugukligh kek _ . _ "
segesqughte luni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ seghevute ki _ whaken _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi luni _ tuqukagh _ .
Saul -em _ itagnaq egkaa _ Steph en -em _ tuqute llegh a _ . _ yug t _ piniqe i nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ llivegh ke aat _ stephen _ qiya ke ghllag u magh an _ . _ taagken _ aghnegh meng _ kenlanga _ amyuutke ghllag yagutekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ Jerusalem -em el nguut _ . _ Saul -em _ elngaatall _ amyuutkekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ naang esqelluki _ . _ itegh aqe luni _ ne itnun _ qam ugh siigh meng _ aane te qugh qu ai _ aghnagh t llu _ , _ yug t llu _ anusimingllagh ste qugh na luki _ . _ Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ pelleghmun _ qimagugh tke aat _ nuna nun _ Judea- melngugh nunllu _ , _ Sam ar ia- melngugh nunllu _ , _ apostle- ngin aghhaat _ qimag ma ite ngugh t _ .
tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ qimagugh tke aat _ tea- ma anun _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ naan sagh ngaaghmeng _ .
philip _ Sam ar ia- lluni _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Christ-a _ , _ allaaghlluwhaght ighllag aataq aqlu _ .
enkaam _ yug t _ nagate u aqe aqe kangat _ esghapag luki _ allaaghlluwhaght illghi _ .
uglagh pigte lghii neng _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh t _ akilghu ung itgun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ piyug igate ngugh t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ .
Enkaangam _ Sam ar ia- ghmiit _ elngaatall _ quya ghllagkagh t _ .
Sam ar ia- mi nguq _ taawa _ alignagh lghii _ yuug _ , _ ategh a _ simon _ . _ salin _ philip _ kaate llghite luku _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ saghiighayug taq egkangi _ yug t _ , _ qukaayug taq elghii llu _ aghtugh igate ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ tamaan lenguut _ , _ pingwaagh ghllag neng _ , _ ukav anllegh pig aghnun _ nagate yu kestagh luku _ ayuqe kangat _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eng eghllak aaguq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ "
yug t _ nagate yu pigte luku _ ayuqe kangat _ , _ qayughllak _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ allaaghlluwh aghyug tekayug uk angi _ alignaghtaagh llegh mikun _ .
iwernga _ Philip -em _ ungipagh ke yaki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ ategh aneng llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ugpeqekagh it _ ungipagh i _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t llu _ , _ aghnagh t llu _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
talwa _ Sim on- emllu _ ugpeqekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ paaptaaye llegh mi _ kingu aneng _ maligsaagh qagh a _ philip _ . _ esghapag luku _ philip _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ allaaghlluwhaght iigh aat alghii _ saghiigha yuke aq _ .
Apostle- et _ Jerusalem -em el nguut _ nagaqugh luki _ Sam ar ia- ghmiit _ ugpegh ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ kayagtekagh gket _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ ellngit nun _ .
Sam ar ia- ghmiit _ ugpeqe ait _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh inagh ghhagh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ , _ naqam _ salin _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ allgegh sigal keg ket _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ Sam ar ia- mun _ kaate lutek _ aglaghkagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ taagken _ saafte aqe luki _ yughagh te kau uute aqe aik _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgegh tek agket _ .
Sim on-em _ esghapag kakek _ apostle- ek _ , _ saafte nghmegneki _ ugpeqagh t _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
enkaam _ apostle- ek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ tukfigh i aghte langa _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleghmeng _ whanga llu _ saaftekumki _ yug t _ allgegh utes qelluki _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
iwernga _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ naaf qell i ten _ manituumagh gpek _ . _ Sumegh pen ii- i _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ tukfigh lleqe ni luku _ pi zigu _ ?
qepghagh lgusigh i naanghite uten _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llegh n _ anaggute nga uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ .
Av utegh qell uten _ seghleghqe sigh ke nanigh ghhu ngam _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ piyuke llegh n _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh a _ atanegh mun _ luuraq _ seghevute na yu kagu _ taana _ seghlegh pestaagh _ seghleghqe llegh n _ .
taawa _ liigike amken _ aqina lleg leg ghllag u uten llu _ asigh qeng ngaat enllu _ seghleghqe llegh gpeneng _ . _ "
Sim on-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ yughagh te kaghte gnenga _ atanegh mun _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesistun _ pi fqaama _ pisqell unga _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ t is tem un il utek _ , _ ungipagh ke i lutek _ Atanghem _ ungipagh aneng _ aghulaqekagh k _ Jerusalem-emun _ . _ Sam ar ia- mi _ iglegha u lutek _ , _ ne nun _ kaate negh megteni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghiik _ .
taagken _ yaquleg an _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ Y at aagh qell uten _ i kev aam _ tungang anil eng ugh nun _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ paaghq illgh anil ngughnun _ , _ Jerusalem-emeng _ gaza- mun _ ayuqe lghii nun _ . _ "
enkaam _ yataagh qelluni _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ taakwani _ tumangani _ esgha qaa _ E th i o pi a-gh mii _ e un uc h _ , _ E th i o pi a-m _ queen- nge an _ C and ac e-em _ , _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste nga _ . _ Jerusalem-emeng _ uteghnigh aqe uq _ ne minun _ maniguute yaghtugh luni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Ch ari o t- mikun _ igleghte te kete luku _ atightugh aqe ai _ uuknaliq es tem _ Isai ah-m _ igaqegkagh i _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ philip _ , _ " _ Ch ari o t- ngan _ saaghw anun _ aglagh luten _ maligsaagh ghhu _ . _ "
enkaam _ malighqagh luku _ nagatekagh a _ atightugh lghii _ uuknaliq es tem _ Isai ah- am _ igaqegkagh aneng _ . _ Philip -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ Liigik sik ii _ atightuqagh ten _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ naten _ liigik esqelluki _ pi ziki _ , _ wetku qun _ kitum _ liigike stekaki _ whanga mnun _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta i _ . _ " _ taagken _ uugte ste luku _ saaghw mikun _ aqume sqekagh a _ .
E un u ch -em _ atightugh aqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ whaten _ pi lghiit _ : _ " _ penniigh t _ tuqu sagh tun ghis teng _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aat llu _ qig un ghis teng _ qalghigh igate ut _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ ellnga llu _ sa meng _ pi aghte ma ite ngughk _ .
Kay ngu s aak estaq ng atgu _ igu ghis teng itkaq _ . _ unguvallegh a _ kenlet gh uu testek aq _ nuna mi _ . _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ apegh u aghte lleqe aki _ seghleghtu langi _ yug lgu ta an _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ ? _ "
E un u ch -em _ aaptekagh a _ philip _ , _ " _ ungipaate aghte nga _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ellmi neng _ akuzite kaqe a _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ alla _ pi aqe agu _ ? _ "
Philip -em _ piinligh sigh ke luki _ Isai ah- am _ igaqegkagh i _ , _ ungipagh tke a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ Jesus-meng _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ megh mun _ kaate yamek _ e un u ch -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ esgha _ taana _ megh _ ! _ sa u a ngam _ eltugh sigh ke lleqe zikun _ paaptaaye lleghqagh mnun _ ? _ "
Philip -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Ip apigh qell uten _ ugpegh kuvek _ paaptaaye lleqe amken _ . _ " _ E un u ch -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa _ , _ ugpeqe aqa _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ ighnegh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
enkaam _ e un u ch -em _ igleghut is teni _ aghuliigh sqekagh a _ . _ ategh lutek _ ch ari o t- meng _ megh mun _ ategh ke ak _ , _ enkaam _ Philip -em _ tawani _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
megh meng _ uugte yayek _ Atanghem _ taghneghagh gkenka _ aghulaqe tke a _ philip _ , _ enkaam _ e un u ch -em _ alla _ esgh amang itk aa _ , _ iwernga _ nagneqe aq _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luni _ .
taana _ philip _ pi yalghiimi _ A z o tus - me teftuq _ . _ Caesarea- mun _ aglagh te kete luku _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ .
Saul _ Jerusalem -em elluni _ taawa _ paninang _ aling siq uk ii _ tuqu qugh naqe ni luki _ maligsaagh tengi _ Atanghem _ . _ qenwat _ Damascus - es ukaq _ , _ luuraq _ Jesus-em _ maligsaagh tengi _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tamaa uute na yu kata _ . _ esghagh kumiki _ tagite na luki _ Jerusalem-emun _ anusimingll iisqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ high _ priest- mun _ pi luni _ lata ngllagh te sqekagh _ pillegh qal i tesqell uni _ igleghutisteng itnun _ synagogue- et _ Damascus - melngughnun _ , _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ .
enkaam _ Saul _ aghulaqekagh _ Damascus -mun _ . _ iiwenllu _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ , _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag m _ kukegtekagh a _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ nagaqugh qu a _ me _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Saul _ , _ Saul _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke manginagh zinga _ ? _ "
Saul -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ " _ me m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Jesus -ngu unga _ amyuutke gkan _ .
makete luten _ aglagh a _ Damascus -mun _ , _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
yug t _ iglegh algut angi _ aghula i iqe aat _ tawani _ , _ akuzipag nigh ngunateng _ nagatekagh at _ me _ , _ naqam _ kina _ alngunak _ esghagh ma ite kangat _ .
Saul _ makete yalghiimi _ esghaate nghite uq _ qayughllak _ ayaa ma lghii _ . _ enkaam _ tas luq luku _ aglagh tke aat _ Damascus -mun _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ ayaa ngakagh _ , _ talwa _ negh ma ite ngughk llu _ , _ megh ma ite ngughk llu _ .
taawa nguq _ Damascus -mi _ , _ yuug _ ugpeqe i nga lghii _ Jesus-meng _ , _ ategh a _ A nan i as _ . _ Esgh aagh waa llegh qun _ Atanghem _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ A nan i as _ . _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ay _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ "
Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tume nun _ aglagh a _ ategh ke lghii nun _ , _ ' _ taklaghrukegte aq _ ' _ taagken _ Jud as -en kunun _ aapte yaghtugh ghhu _ yuug _ , _ Saul -nguuq _ , _ tarsus- meng _ pi u uq _ , _ yughagh aqe uq _ .
Esghagh waagh qun _ esgh am aa _ yuug _ itegh lghii _ , _ ategh a _ A nan i as _ , _ saaf saqminigu _ esghagh yag un neqig tuq _ . _ "
iwernga _ A nan i as-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ uglagh pigte lghii neng _ , _ apegh naqe pigte aqe aat _ seghletun _ pi llegh ghllag a _ yug gpenun _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
pi lleghqagh nge kau uq _ chief _ priest- eneng _ tagi luni _ Damascus -mun _ tugulagh na luki _ qamagte luki _ yughagh kayug t _ ategh gpegun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ aglagh a _ , _ taku gu _ qayughllak _ nakmike ma aqa _ ungipaq esqell unga _ Gentile-enun _ , _ umiileg nun _ , _ Israel-eghm iin unllu _ .
liigike ste naqngu aqa _ aange luku _ ikfiqe llegh meng _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ . _ "
enkaam _ A nan i as-em _ takukagh a _ Saul _ . _ itegh luni _ saafte magh an _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anglegute mni _ Saul _ , _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ esghaghkagh gpek _ tume ni _ tagi u luten _ , _ kayagte aanga _ elpenun _ . _ kayagte te aaten _ saaf tesqell uten _ esghaa sag un neqig tesqell uten _ , _ im iisqell ut enllu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ iqallug m _ qal tesug ning i _ iye gkeneng _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ , _ enkaam _ esghagh sag u tke aq _ . _ taagken _ makete luni _ paaptaayekagh _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ negh yalghiimi _ iknaqsuugtekagh _ . _ Saul _ ugpeq an itkaq _ Damascus -mi _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ .
mulu gpenani _ synagogue- ni _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Nag atu llghii m _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ repall _ ellmeggneng _ aapte qugh aghte tke aat _ , _ " _ Unang unghi taa -a _ yuug _ Jerusalem-emi _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aq _ yughagh kayug neng _ Jesus-em _ ategh akun _ ? _ maavek _ tagi u yagh lghii _ tawaten _ pi na luni _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ tugulagh na luki _ , _ agl an naluki _ chief _ priest- enun _ . _ "
Saul -em _ ungipagh ke i llegh mikun _ wata _ liigik estagh aqaa _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang utanga _ repall _ Jews-et _ Damascus - melnguut _ aaghtiiraaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ .
Saul _ ungipagh ke i lqinagh yan _ tawaten _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ Jews-et _ wataqaaghaq _ ugumi yagutekagh at _ , _ repall _ qerngughte te luteng _ agghi tkekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ .
enkaam _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ Damas c us-em _ amig ghllag lghute ani _ kelengakekagh at _ tuqute na luku _ . _ iwernga _ Saul -em _ nagaqugh qu a _ tawaten _ agghi llegh at _ .
enkaam _ unugmi _ ataasigh mi _ , _ Saul -em _ maligsaaghtengita _ pas ke t- egh rug llag eg nekun _ mingllute meng _ eslate mun _ ukig tekaat _ .
taagken _ Saul _ kaa sa mi _ Jerusalem-emun _ ilate naqe kau yaag lghii _ Jesus-em _ maligsaagh teng itnun _ . _ taawanginaq _ iingun aghhaghmeng _ alikekagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ aygughikekagh at _ ellnga llu _ maligte yaaghte ngughsi ma ta a _ .
iwernga _ Barnab as-em _ Saul _ aglagh te luku _ apostle- enun _ aapte qugh a _ Saul -mun _ tume mi _ esghagh ma ni luku _ atanegh _ , _ aleghquute kau ni lutek llu _ . _ aapte qugh a llu _ Damascus -mi _ ungipagh kau ni luku _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ .
enkaam _ tugukligh iqe aat _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ Saul _ ugpeq an itkaq _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ Greek - estun _ akuzi kayug t _ aaghtiiraaghkagh an _ tuqute yu kaqe kangat _ .
ugpeqagh t _ liigike yamegteggu _ Jews-enun _ tuqute naqe ni luku _ Saul _ , _ aglagh tke aat _ Caesarea- mun _ , _ taagken _ kayagtekagh at _ tarsus- mun _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ Judea- mi _ , _ galilee- mi _ , _ Sam ar ia- millu _ amyuutk es teng ngun ateng _ kiyaghtekagh t _ . _ ugpegh llegh it _ iknaqugh tekat _ , _ alinge aqe lghiit _ qaatke te nghite lleghqagh meggneng _ atanegh mun _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ kayusi i u kangi _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nulakagh t _ .
Peter-em _ iglegha te kete luku _ laalighfike te qugh u i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ naan sagh ngaata _ . _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ laalightekagh _ Ly dd a- melngughnun _ .
tamaani _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ ategh a _ A en e as _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ ayumiqullegh _ makete igate ngughk _ uniigh nga te mii neng _ .
Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ A en e as _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ naallghute aaten _ , _ makete luten _ allighagh n _ imeg ggu _ . _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ A en e as _ maketekagh _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ Ly dd a-gh m iitlu _ S h ar on -eghm iitlu _ esghagh yamegteggu _ A en e as _ naallghute luni _ , _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ atanegh kun _ .
Jo pp a- mi nguq _ taawa _ ugpeqe aq _ aghnagh _ ategh a _ tabitha _ , _ ( _ Greek - stun _ Dorcas _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ quyngigh _ ) _ , _ quunpeng _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakunun _ aklumalghii nun _ .
taagken _ qinuyug luni _ tuqukagh _ enkaam _ ughvughqellug qu _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ .
Jo pp a- ghmiit _ ugpeqagh t _ nagaqugh qu aat _ peter _ Ly dd a- men niluku _ . _ lydda _ , _ Jo pp a-meng _ qantagh aghh an lenguq _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ kevg aqegk agket _ maalghug _ yug k _ peter- mun _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ Jo pp a-mun _ .
Peter-em _ yataagh qelluni _ maligtekakek _ . _ kaate yan _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ . _ legan _ itegh uq _ ugingighagh t _ qiya magh meng _ kangllu qaghte luku _ keleg u vikekagh at _ aatkagh neng _ D or c as-em _ ulimaagh aneng _ .
Peter-em _ aane ste qugh luki _ segesqughte luni _ yughaghkagh _ . _ taaqe luni _ yughagh nghmeng _ qiive luku _ yugusigh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tabitha _ , _ maketen _ . _ " _ tabitha _ esghaate kete luku _ esghagh yamigu _ peter _ aqumekagh _ .
Peter-em _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ tuqlugh qu ai _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvagh ma ta a _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ Jo pp a- ghmiit _ nagaqugh qu aat _ T ab it h a-m _ unguvallegh a _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
peter _ mulukagh _ Jo pp a-mi _ , _ Sim on -en kun itkaq _ san aght iste mi _ .
Caesarea- mi nguq _ taawa _ yuug _ ategh a _ Cor neli us _ . _ umiileg at _ Rome-em _ pilluwagh tengita _ italy- meng _ pi t _ .
yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ yughaghtuqagh llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ qepghaghte kullghiit _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ 3 - k laag mi _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ . _ Wh ateghlluwaaq _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg a _ itegh lghii _ , _ yaquleg m _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ Cor neli us _ ! _ "
alingruugh magh mi _ esghapagtugh luku _ yaquleg _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ sa meng _ pi ziin _ ? _ " _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma ai _ yughagh llegh ten _ , _ efqugh ke pigte a llu _ kayusigh i llegh n _ aklumalghii nun _ enkaam _ neqamike aaten _ .
Jo pp a-mun _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
Sim on -en kun ituq _ san aght iste mi _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ tawaten _ pi luku _ unitekagh a _ . _ taagken _ Cor neli us-em _ tuqlugh kakek _ maalghug _ qepghagh teg ni _ , _ pill ugw aght allu _ . _ taana _ pilluwagh ta _ Cor neli us-em _ kayute anga _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tagi yata _ ungipaate u aqe ai _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ , _ taagken _ keveg aqekagh i _ Jo pp a-mun _ .
unaami ani _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ kevg at _ kaate yaghtugh aqe ut llu _ Jo pp a-mun _ , _ peter _ mat- yuqagh _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ yughagh na luni _ .
taagken _ iyataghkagh _ , _ sa meng _ neghyuke aq _ . _ sama _ neqe meng _ yataaghqe ma luki _ peter _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ .
esgha qaa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taagken _ esgha qaa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ ukig tek angat _ nuna mun _ estam atgun _ tekerqagh akun _ .
taawa nguq _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ rep tile- eneng _ , _ qawaag neng llu _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeghlegi llu _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate unga _ iinghutekagh meng _ ukmangite nghite ngugh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ "
me m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ taakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ pi gpenaki _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ pi nga yu neng _ ket wh el l _ . _ taagken _ tawaninginaq _ taana _ iingunagh mi _ qilag mun _ mayugh tke aq _ .
Peter-em _ kukriqe tkekagh a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ . _ tawaten _ pi ma luku _ Cor neli us-em _ keveg ai ta _ liite tke aat _ Sim on-em _ mangteghagh a _ naan tulanga _ , _ enkaam _ manughagh anun _ kaate tke aat _ .
qamavek _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ whani _ aqelqagh u nghite a _ yuug _ ategh a _ simon _ peter _ ? _ "
Peter-em _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ , _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ , _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ ivagh aqe aaten _ .
ukig luten _ qaqilqa fqaavek _ maligte ki _ , _ qayughllak _ whanga _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ . _ "
enkaam _ Peter-em _ ukig luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ ivaghkagh i _ . _ sa meng _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Cor neli us-em _ keveg aqe ainkut _ , _ umiileg u uq _ Rome-em _ pilluwagh teng itnun _ . _ yuug _ pinigh ghllag uq _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ Jews-et _ sii vag ke pigte aqe aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ pika qaa _ Cor neli us _ , _ ' _ aqfa ste gu _ peter _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh a _ elpenun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ itegh sqekagh i _ , _ tawani llu _ qavigh sqekagh i _ . _ unaami ani _ yataagh qelluni _ maligtekagh i _ Cor neli us-em _ keveg ai _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ila i _ Jo pp a-meng _ maligte tke aat _ .
taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate tke aat _ Caesarea- mun _ . _ Cor neli us-em _ ilakwaagh ni llu _ ilakumtaagh ni llu _ tagi laghate te ste luki _ ellmeggnun _ utaqakagh at _ peter _ .
peter _ itegh aqe uq llu _ Cor neli us-em _ payegh luku _ segesqughte vikekagh a _ manigugh na luku _ .
iwernga _ Peter-em _ nekev es tutk elluku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nekeve i _ , _ whanga llu _ yugu unga _ . _ "
iitghute kete luku _ Peter-em _ aleghqugh qu a _ Cor neli us _ . _ itegh yalghiimi _ taawa _ yuug _ qerngughte te ghllag ma lghii _ tawani _ .
Peter-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Liisimak ngwaagh aghsi _ whangkuta _ Jews-en i _ liilightuusagh mta _ ineghtekaqe ainkut _ ilate fqaamta _ pisqell uta _ Gentile-enun _ , _ talwa _ laalighfike snanigh kaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kina _ alngunak _ ukmangite nghite ni luku _ sumeghtaghagh tke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
aqfate yafsinga _ tagi unga _ qaqilqa gpenanga _ . _ sangama _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ "
Cor neli us-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whaten _ lliigh magh an _ aku waaq _ pi aqe lleg mtun _ yughagh ma lunga _ 3 - kell aag mi _ , _ yuug _ manu mkun _ nekeve uq _ aatkagh i _ nighug ghllag t _ .
whaa _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ Cor neli us _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ yughagh llegh ten _ nagaqugh ma ai _ , _ neqamike ai llu _ aklumalghii nun _ kayusigh i llegh ten _ .
Jo pp a-mun _ kina _ keveg aqe gu _ aqfa sqellug qu _ simon _ peter _ . _ Sim on -en kun ituq _ san aght iste mi _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ '
enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ aqfa sqe amken _ , _ quyake amken _ tagi lghiiten _ . _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh ke llegh a _ qamagte luta _ whaan leng ugh ni _ nagaqugh yug aghput _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ Atanghem _ elpenun _ apegh sqekagh a _ whangkunnun _ . _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa _ liigike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pikayug u a _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag an _ yuug _ ataasigh stun _ .
tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ kina _ alngunak _ n aku mii nguyagh ngaan _ alike i lghii _ ellmi neng _ , _ pinitun llu _ pikayug _ .
liisimakagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ungipagh kekagh _ Israel-eghm iinun _ , _ taana _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ yug t _ nekeggmellegh nge sighqagh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ atanegh ke a _ tamaghh agh waagh mi _ yug m _ .
liisimakagh i _ taana _ ungipagh _ mingite kau uq _ Judea- l qaagh aghmi _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ galilee- mi _ John-em _ ungipagh kaqe yagu _ paaptaaye llegh _ .
liisimakagh i _ Jesus _ Nazareth -eghm ii _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ i mi qaa _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mengllu _ . _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ pinitun _ pi aqe kangi _ yug t _ , _ naallghute qugh qu ai llu _ tamaakut _ tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ Jesus- melnguq _ .
whangkuta _ apostle- eni _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ tawaten _ pillgh anun _ Jews-et _ nuna itni _ , _ Jerusalem -em illu _ . _ tuqute kaqe aat _ tuquuqagh te luku _ qaquuragh kun _ .
iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ esghagh stekaqe a llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ qamagte luni _ yug m _ esghagh mangite a _ . _ whangkuta _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ liisimake i ste u luta _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ meghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh ste llegh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ , _ apegh sqe kau uq llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nakmike kaqe ni luni _ nanqigte i ste u luni _ unguva lghii nun llu _ tuqukagh nun llu _ .
qamagte luteng _ uuknaliqistet _ pi kau ut _ , _ kitum nguq _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ategh akun _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ . _ "
peter _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ qamagte luki _ nagate lghiit _ ungipagh meng _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ iteghkagh i _ , _ enkaam _ allaaghlluwh atun _ akuzi stekagh i llu _ usuqe i stekagh i llu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ C ircumcise- ek at _ ugpeqagh t _ Jo pp a-meng _ maligte tke aat _ peter- mun _ saghiigha yuke aat _ nagate yamegteki _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ . _ liigikekagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ tunusagh ke kek _ talwa _ Gentile-enun _ . _ taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ ukut _ yug t _ allgegh te ut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ whangku tegh pig agh estun _ . _ kitum ngam _ paaptaaye snanigh nagh kaki _ megh kun _ ? _ "
taagken _ qelqe ai _ paaptaay esqelluki _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ ell megg n itagh iis q egkaat _ peter _ .
Apostle- etlu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ Judea- melnguut _ nagaqugh qu ait _ Gentile- en unllu _ ugpeqe ma ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
peter _ kaate yan _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ Jews-et _ ugpeqagh t _ circumcise- egh iy ukat _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqagh itneng _ seghlequ uq aat _ peter _ , _ pi ke aat _ ,
" _ sangan _ c ircum c iz e- em angil nguut _ itegh vike luki _ ne itnun _ neghe lgusigh ziki _ ? _ "
Liigik esqelluki _ Peter-em _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ kenlanga _ aapte qugh a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ apeghiighkagh _ .
" _ Jo pp a-mi _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh kau unga _ . _ esghagh aqa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gni _ estam atgun _ tekerqagh akun _ ukig tek angat _ qilag meng _ whanga mnun _ .
tawavek _ yuvghiigh waagh y aqegka _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ rep tile- eneng _ , _ qawaag neng _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ '
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ yeghlegi llu _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate anka _ tamaakut _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ neqe t _ iinghutekagh t _ . _ '
" _ me m _ pi laatagh aanga _ qilag meng _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ sumeghtaghagh te kete yaghqaqe nghite aten _ . _ '
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ pi nga yu neng _ ket wh el l _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ taakut _ aga _ qilag mun _ mayugh te aqe ut llu _ ,
whaa _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ kaate ut _ tukugh mnun _ , _ kevg aaf tut _ whanga mnun _ Caesarea- meng _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ qaqilqa fqaama _ maligte sqe ai _ . _ ukut llu _ aghvinleg _ yug t _ ugpeqaalgu te put _ maligte te ut _ Jo pp a-meng _ Caesarea- mun _ . _ kaa llu ta _ Cor neli us -en kunun _ itegh aa tukut _ .
Cor neli us-em _ apegh aa _ yaquleg meng _ esghaate lleg ni _ ne mini _ , _ yaquleg m nguq _ whaten _ pi a _ , _ ' _ Jo pp a-mun _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
ungipaate lleqe aisi _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ . _ '
enkaam _ akuzi aqe unga llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ itegh ai _ tawatengwaaq _ whangkunnun _ itegh llegh mitun _ Pen te c ost -em _ aghnegh ani _ .
taagken _ neqangugh aqa _ Atanghem _ pillgha _ whaten _ , _ ' _ John _ paaptaay el aq aaguq _ megh kun _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ paaptaaye lleqe usi _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ . _ '
