neqamike luku _ gentile- ngugh lug si _ allgegh kau usi _ . _ Jews-et _ atigh aqe aisi _ " _ circumcise- ell ghilnguut _ " _ , _ ellmeggneng _ atigh kayugu ut _ " _ circumcise- ek at _ " _ . _ ( _ C ircumcise- ellgh at _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh itnite uq _ . _ )
neqamike luku _ tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ nalluk sagh aghsi _ Christ-a _ kina u ta a _ . _ nunatagh u yagh usi _ Israel-eghm iinun _ enkaam _ ilate llghite yagh usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh anun _ ellngit nun _ . _ nuna mi _ whani _ kiyaghteng nguyagh tusi _ sighim all ngun asi llu _ kiyaghnegh ngunasi llu _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ pi llegh mi _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ ilate ma usi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ aw av an sagh tusi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ pi llegh mi _ tugh aagh usim aasi _ ellnga nun _ Christ-am _ aaw akun _ .
Christ-a _ ellnga _ katam _ nekegg mel qaghput _ . _ ellnga u uq _ ataasiighte ste i lghii _ Jews-en engllu _ Gentile- en engllu _ . _ naafqe kaqe a _ mingllu te a _ aafte i lghii _ whangkunneng _ , _ enkaam _ anguyag ke te nanighqe kaqe ainkut _ .
Christ-am _ tuqu llegh mikun _ atugh u nanighqe kaqe ai _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it llu _ qelegh sagh it llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ Jews -etlu _ Gentile- etlu _ ataasiigh tesqelluki _ ellmi kun _ . _ enkaam _ nekeggmellegh nge stekaqe ai _ .
tuqu llegh mikun _ qaquuragh kun _ , _ Christ-am _ ugumi ke te nanighqe ai _ Jews -etlu _ Gentile- etlu _ . _ taagken _ ataasiighte ste ai _ , _ ilaliigh te ste ai llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Christ-a _ tagi luni _ ungipagh ke i kau uq _ nekeggmellegh meng _ elpesi nun _ Gentile-enun _ , _ aw av an teng ngu yalghii si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ungipagh ke i kau uq llu _ nekeggmellegh meng _ Jews-enun _ , _ qantaghan teng ngul ghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
enkaam _ Christ-akun _ Jews-en illu _ Gentile- en illu _ tag iyaq leg ugh tukut _ ata mun _ ataasigh kun _ taghneghagh kun _ .
Enkaangam _ elpek si _ Gentile- eni _ nunatagh u nanigh usi _ . _ itupill _ nuna lgu te kau aghte aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ , _ ilate usi llu _ nengllugut anganun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
mangteghagh atun _ ayuqe usi _ nekeftekagh t _ tunemagh ngllaghkagh itgun _ apostle- etlu _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ . _ Christ _ Jesus _ ellnga _ katam _ kangighagh m _ uyghag ke a _ .
qamagte luteng _ mangteghagh m _ nalighnegh i _ nek egh qu utng aat _ qerngagh meng _ Christ-akun _ . _ taakut _ nalighnegh t _ nula yalghiimeng _ tem p le- ngugh teng nguut _ atanegh mun _ . _ taana _ temple- a _ agleghnagh uq _ .
ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ Christ-amun _ , _ maligte te lusi _ ila itnun _ ugpeqagh nun _ nekef teng nguusi _ mangteghagh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghfig anun _ taghneghagh gmikun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ anusimingllaghvig mete unga _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uute kegka _ Christ _ Jesus _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ Gentile- eni _ .
entaqun _ nagaquum aagh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ qepghaq al itk aqaanga _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liite sta _ whanga mnun _ qayvighte llghite ngughk _ uspeqe lleg ni _ . _ qavnganghhaq _ lata te kaghtekaqe aqa _ taana _ .
atightugh kufsigu _ lata tke kaqe a _ lii lleqaghsi _ liigike llegh ka _ qayvighte llghite ngughk _ uspeqe llegh _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate llghite ai _ yug t _ qayvighte llghite ngugh meng _ uspeqe llegh mineng _ . _ iwernga _ up-uni _ aghnegh ni _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ qayvighte a _ uspeqe lleg ni _ agleghnagh lghii nun _ apostle- min unllu _ uuknaliqiste min unllu _ .
whatete uq _ uspeqe llegh a _ : _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ilate ma ut _ Jews-enun _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste llegh anun _ . _ Naligh neq aagh sim ii _ ataasigh m _ yugusigh m _ , _ enkaam _ ilate ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh anun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mi kunllu _ tunusagh lightu aanga _ qepghaghte ngulunga _ ungipaq esqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
Uk aligh pig aagunga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug aneng _ . _ Taw all iim a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tunusagh lightu aanga _ whaten _ : _ nakmike aanga _ Gentile-enun _ ungipaq esqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Christ-am _ aklungi aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ aklungi i _ ingyagh te nga ut _ yug t _ liigike llegh itneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga llu _ liigikes tesqelluki _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ uspeqe llegh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ulim agh ik am _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ , _ qayvighte llghite a _ uspeqe lleg ni _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ maa te mun _ .
taagken _ qilag nilnguut _ : _ igleghte te i lghiit llu _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elg etlu _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite ste lleqe ai _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ peghqinellegh mineng _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ yug mikun _ yughaghvig nil ngugh teggun _ .
Tamaa kunguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh i _ salin _ nun angll al ghi lluni _ . _ apeghiigh ma ai _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ Christ-akun _ aglagh yaghqaaghte ma ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ te tull ngun aam tallu _ aling ell ngun aam tallu _ .
Enkaangam _ iilqayagute gpenaan _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ apallugh ke luku _ ikfiq ut keng nguk em si _ . _ ikfiqe llegh ma _ quulvagh tesleq iisi _ .
enkaam _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ segesqughte unga _ sivungagh ni _ ata m _ .
ellnga u uq _ atigh i lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ nengllugute neng _ qilagmel ngugh nengllu _ nunamel ngugh nengllu _ .
yughagh unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aklungi ghllag aneng _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eli tesqellusi _ iknaqugh s iis qel uki _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ .
yughagh tke amsi _ Christ-a _ kiyaghte sqellug qu _ ilu gpesini _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ yughagh tke amsi _ akul g us qell usillu _ , _ tunem alg us qell usillu _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
yughagh tke amsi _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ liigik saqleg us qelluku _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh an _ , _ iqetu langa _ , _ tagtala a _ , _ uusqaghtu langa _ , _ sam av negh tul ang allu _ .
elpesi nun _ liisimake sqe sug aqa _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh a _ , _ qaywa _ piyaqnagh ghngaan _ liigik ngwaa llegh qaa _ . _ taagken _ piniqe llegh akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh atun _ wata _ lliigh lleqe usi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ qepghagh lghii kun _ ilu mnni _ , _ ellnga n _ piyaq leg waa _ qaayghute luku _ sa u a _ alngunak _ aaptekagh ut _ nalighmeng _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh ut _ .
kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge li _ ugpeqagh tgun _ yughaghvig nil ngugh teggun _ , _ Christ _ Jesus- kunllu _ . _ usuqe teggu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uute kegka _ atanegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kayeme amsi _ kiyagh tesqellusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ .
iiwleng _ qusevegte lusi _ , _ yakumangighlliqe gpenasi _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi _ , _ tugukligh utu tete lusi _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ qerngughte te kaqe aisi _ nekeggmellegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ nanghiiqu ghllag tek _ iiwleng _ kiyaghte tek _ tawaten _ .
ataasigh u uq _ yugusigh _ , _ ataasigh u uk llu _ taghneghagh k _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ ataasigh mun _ sighima llegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh aisi _ .
ataasigh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ ataasigh u uq _ ugpeqe i llegh _ , _ ataasigh u uq _ paaptaaye llegh _ .
ataasigh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata ke aat _ saam _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ ellnga n _ igleghte te u a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh anite uq _ , _ sa mete uq llu _ alngunak _ .
Christ-am _ tamaghhagh emta _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ tunute yameng _ qepghaqagh ni _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ tuune kaqe ai _ taakut _ tunusagh t _ tuune yu ke llegh mitun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ mayugh aqngami _ uusqagh llegh mun _ tugu kaqe ai _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ wayagh ke aat _ , _ yug t llu _ tunusagh ligh quqagh ke ai _ . _ "
sa meng _ pi sii wa _ , _ " _ mayugh kau uq _ " _ ? _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ sivuke luni _ uki kau uq _ samavek _ asi ligh negh anun _ nuna m _ .
enkaam _ ellnga _ taana _ ukikagh _ samavek _ , _ ellnga u uq _ ataasigh _ taana _ mat- yuqagh _ pamavek _ ingyagh luki _ qilag t _ , _ imigh na luku _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nayute te nga llegh mineng _ .
ellnga u uq _ tunusagh ligh quqagh _ yug nun _ : _ ila i _ apostle- nguluki _ , _ ila i _ uuknaliqe i ste u luki _ , _ ila i _ evangelist- ngugh lug ke i _ , _ ila i _ yughaghte u luki _ , _ apeghtughiste u luki llu _ .
taakut _ tun usal itk aqii _ apegh tiis qelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ellngit nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ ellnga _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ nekefte sqellug qu _ Christ-am _ yugusigh a _ .
taana _ qepghaqagh _ nagnegh lleqe uq _ kenlanga _ ataasiighte lleg mnnun _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ , _ liisimake lleg mteggun llu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taagken _ ang tan iit ngwaagh luta _ Christ- atun _ lliigh lleqe ukut _ .
enkaam _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u nanigh lleqe ukut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ puughte snaanghite ukut _ yug nun _ temng imeng _ apeghtugh i llegh itgun _ . _ apeghtugh i llegh it _ anuqe stun llu _ imaghllug stun llu _ ayuqe ut _ nuugte aatagh lghiit _ yug neng _ . _ tamaakut _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ iqlengagh lghiit _ yug t _ , _ iqleng ateng _ ipate yug nighte yagh aqe ait _ maghyaghqugh neghllugte na luki _ yug t _ .
itupill _ akuzi tke lteggu _ ipapilleq _ piniqe llegh kun _ , _ enkaam _ wata _ Christ- atun _ lliigh lleqe ukut _ salleg mteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ . _ Christ-a _ naasqugh ke aat _ ugpeqagh t _ .
ugpeqagh ni _ yugusigh ke ainkut _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga kun _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh _ qerngughte te kau uq llu _ nuverragh te kau uq llu _ yugusigh m _ ivalu akun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nalighnegh t _ qepgh an neghmeggni _ qepghagh lleghqagh megestun _ , _ taawa _ yugusigh _ nag waa quq _ , _ iknaqugh sagh aq uqlu _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
Enkaangam _ Atanghem _ ategh akun _ whaten _ pi amsi llu _ kelengas aagh am sillu _ : _ kiyaghte gpenasi ngam _ Gentile-et _ kiyaghtaall ghistun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ sasii nghite ngugh u ut _ ,
umyugagh it llu _ liigike i igate ngugh u ut _ . _ ilate nga nghite ut _ unguvallegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh anun _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukngwaagh aat _ , _ pineghllug u ut llu _ .
talwa _ kayngu yug yaghqaa nanigh ma ut _ ; _ atuqe aqe ait llu _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ seghlegh t _ yugusigh meng _ piyukekagh it _ . _ nagnegh te yug aqe ait _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ nuqe tu tegpenaki _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ liite llghite asi _ Christ-am _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ !
nagaqugh pestaagh qaghkagh i _ ellnga _ , _ qayughllak _ maligsaagh tek egk angisi _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtugh kau usi _ ipa _ apeghtuusagh aneng _ Jesus-em _ .
whaten _ apeghtugh kaqe aisi _ : _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ puughte lleqe aisi llu _ naafqe lleqe aisi llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pegte ki _ nangaghnegh lug si llu _ kiyaghtaa l qes aq e sillu _ .
itupill _ taghneghagh m _ nutaghte liki _ umyugagh si _ .
enkaam _ atuqe teggu _ nangaghneghraghagh i _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ ellmi tun _ ayuqe luku _ : _ elqughutng ap iig luku _ , _ agleghnagh luku llu _ .
enkaam _ iqlengiq nanigh teg ngam _ ! _ itupill _ iiwleng _ apegh teggu _ ipapilleq _ ila gpesinun _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luta _ naligh neq ugh iinkut _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ .
sakrite tek _ iwernga _ seghleghqe gpenasi _ . _ siqinegh _ tevigh ste gpenaan _ paninang _ sakrite u lusi _ .
talwa _ tughneghagh _ pillegh qal i tegpenaan _ nanghii qus qellusi _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
T eg legh niigh ta _ tegleg nanigh li _ . _ itupill _ qepghagh li _ allgegh te yaghqaa luni _ aklukegk amineng _ , _ tuune i yaghqaaghte lleqe uq llu _ aklu ke igh lghii nun _ .
akuzi tke i gpenasi _ seghlegh meng _ . _ itupill _ aleghqugh teki _ pinitun _ yug t _ aklu ke igh llegh itni _ . _ pinigh lghiit _ akuzite t _ kayeme yaghqaqe ait _ , _ aneghnegh qesaghq aqiit _ nagate lghiit _ .
qivghu ste gpenakek llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taghneghagh gmineng _ nalluniigh kaqe aisi _ ellmi _ pik nalusi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ iteme te lleqe aisi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ iteme te llegh m _ aghnegh a _ kaate kan _ .
pegte ggu _ ugum i ker aaq _ , _ sakr aa _ , _ sakraa ghllag _ , _ yu pigh qagh aat aq _ , _ seghlequ uq _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ seghlegh t _ .
yeghlegi _ nangllegtagh tek _ , _ nafughtagh tek _ ila gpesinun _ , _ seghev u tull usillu _ , _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute kaqe kangisi _ Christ-akun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ elpek si _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ piniqe pigtekagh i _ , _ ayuqesighagh teggu _ .
Kiyaghtaa ll esi _ aaghqute aqe steki _ piniqe llegh mun _ , _ katam _ Christ-am _ piniqe kanginkut _ , _ tuquma tke kaqe kanginkut llu _ . _ tuqu llegh a _ tepkegtagh tun _ tunusagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ aghqe te u uq llu _ ellnga nun _ .
elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke kangisi _ , _ enkaam _ kitumun _ alngunak _ allaniigh ste u ni fqaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe ste u ni fqaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakig nigh ughte u ni fqaafsi _ . _ tamaakut _ seghleghu ut _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pi yaghqaqe nghite ait _ .
kayngusaghagh te gpenasi _ , _ temngitwh ameng _ akuzi tke gpenasi _ sex -meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ amyughaagh tke gpenasi _ sex -meng _ . _ itupill _ iyamsiqayugvik saghqaq aghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Nall un eq n aghh ii tuq _ una _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ pagite yaghqagh ite uq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ Christ- amllu _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ seghleghqe lghii _ all an iigh meng _ , _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakig niigh meng _ . _ ( _ pakignegh t _ manig ughte u ut _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ )
yug nun _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ungipaate kangisi _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ seghleghu nghite ni luki _ . _ iwernga _ tawatel nguut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ kiyaghnegh _ sakraa ste ghllag aqe aat _ qaatke te nghite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilate gpenasi _ tawatel ngughnun _ yug nun _ .
yug stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ mamleg mi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ kiyaghteng nguusi _ nighug mi _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ pike kangisi _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte tek _ yug stun _ nighug mel ngughestun _ .
( _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte negh gpesini _ nighug mi _ pinigh ste aqe aisi _ , _ elqughute nga ste aqe aisi _ , _ ipa u ste aqe aisi _ . _ )
liite naqe teggu llu _ sa u a _ efqugh nagh lghii _ atanegh mun _ .
ilate qaghtagh gpenasi _ yug nun _ sea-te u nghite ngugh meng _ pi lghii nun _ mamleg mi _ . _ itupill _ liigike steki _ tawaten _ pill ghit _ seghleghu ut _ .
kayngu nagh pigte ut _ talwa _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luteng _ tamaakut _ pi aqe kangit _ aksaqe luku _ .
iwernga _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ aliightekumeng _ nighug mun _ , _ taawa _ nate tegh pig aatangi _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ aliigh lleqe ut _ , _ qayughllak _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ nighug m _ esghagh yaghqaaghte ste lleqe a _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ qavagh lghii mi _ , _ taghtugh ghhaaten _ . _ unguva a _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ Christ-am _ kukegte lleqe aaten _ . _ "
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ . _ Pegh qin gh unghil ngughestun _ kiyaghte gpenasi _ ; _ itupill _ peghqin gh estun _ kiyaghte tek _ .
pinitun _ atuqe teggu _ tamaghhagh an _ pi lleghqagh i _ qayughllak _ aghnegh ni _ maaten _ yug t _ seghletun _ pi aqe ut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nallu fqaafsi _ , _ iwernga _ liigike teggu _ sa u a _ Atanghem _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ elpesi nun _ .
suume gpenasi _ wine- meng _ qayughllak _ naafqe lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ imigh tek _ taghneghagh gneng _ ,
aleghquute aqe lusi _ akuzi ta itneng _ p sal m s -et _ , _ ilagaate t _ , _ taghneghagh kun llu _ ilagaate neng _ . _ ilagagh aqe tek _ ilagaate neng llu _ p sal m s -en engllu _ atanegh mun _ , _ usuqe i lleg ligh lusi _ ilu gpesigun _ .
ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike manginagh teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata a _ saam _ tamaghhagh an _ .
malighqutagh ke nga lusi _ ila gpesinun _ qayughllak _ siiv ak nguk esi _ Christ-a _ .
nuliigh ni _ , _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ katam _ atanegh mun _ pi lghii stun _ .
qayughllak _ ugi _ naasqugh ke a _ nulighh an _ katam _ Christ-a _ naasqugh ke kangat _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ Christ-a _ yuguligh i stekagh at _ ugpeqagh t _ ; _ ellnga n _ yugusigh ke ai _ .
katam _ ugpeqagh t _ malighqutaq ell ghistun _ Christ-amun _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ sa llegh kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ nulighh t _ malighqutagh ke yaghqaa ut _ ugi meggnun _ .
ugi ni _ , _ piniqe luki _ nula isi _ katam _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh atun _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ piniqe pigtekaqe ai _ repall _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ .
ugpeqagh t _ agleghnaghsagh kaqe ai _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ akuzite mi _ , _ pelungighsagh kaqe ai llu _ aghvig luki _ megh kun _ .
Christ-a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aang Ê¼gh un naluki _ ugpeqagh t _ ellmi nun _ katam _ pinighnagh lghii tun _ ugiigh naqe lghii tun _ . _ tuqu kau uq _ ugpeqagh t _ tag neq r ii tesqelluki _ , _ ung ll ev reg ii tesqelluki _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ af kuy ii tesqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ nuliighqagh a _ agleghnagh lleqe uq _ , _ avute ite lleqe uq llu _ .
ugi m _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ nuliigh ni _ piniqe llegh mitun _ yugusigh ni _ . _ ugi _ piniqe i lghii _ nuliigh mineng _ ellmi neng _ piniqe u uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke igate a _ ellmi _ katam _ yugusigh ni _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ negh sta qaa llu _ aflenga kaqe a llu _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ Christ-am _ pi aqe llegh atun _ ugpeqagh nun _ ,
qayughllak _ naligh neq ugh iinkut _ ellnga n _ yugusigh an _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ unite lleqe ak _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ ilate na luni _ nuliigh minun _ . _ enkaam _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ . _ "
Taam _ akuzite m _ igaqegkagh m _ qayvighte a _ megnu nagh pigte lghii _ ipapilleq _ : _ Christ- allu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ataasigh u ut _ .
iwernga _ taana _ elpesi nun llu _ ayuqe uq _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugi m _ piniqe pestaagh yaghqaqe a _ nuliigh ni _ ellmi neng _ katam _ piniqe lghii stun _ . _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ nulighh m _ sii vag ke yaghqagh ke a _ ugi ni _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ qaatke te lusi _ angayuqagh gpesinun _ Atanghem _ pi sqe sug llegh atun _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ elqughute nga uq _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh _ qelegh i kau uq _ , _ " _ Quul v aghluku _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ " _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ sivulii uq _ akequsagh leg _ .
whaten _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Kiyaghtaa llgh en _ itagnagh lleqe uq _ , _ taake luku llu _ kiyaghte lleqe uten _ nuna mi _ . _ "
angayuqagh ni _ , _ sakrite ste gpenaki _ taghnughhagh si _ . _ yeghlegi _ angli steki _ peghqigsagh luki llu _ apeghtugh aghl ukillu _ Atanghem _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
Qepghagh te laagh ni _ , _ alinge lleg ligh lusi llu _ ung el egll eligh l usillu _ qaatke teki _ piliit iste si _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ Ip apigh qellusi _ qepghagh ta qite ki _ , _ katam _ Christ-a _ qepghagh te llegh gpesistun _ .
Pil iit iste si _ qaatke teki _ qaywa _ esghapag nghite ghngaisi _ . _ qepghagh tek _ efqugh h naluki _ piliit iste si _ katam _ efqugh tellegh pesistun _ atanegh _ . _ ilu gpesineng _ atuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ Christ-amun _ qepghagh tel aaq elghiistun _ .
enkaam _ qepghagh tek _ sagiqe lusi _ atanegh mun _ pi lghii stun _ , _ nakaan _ yug nun _ .
neqamike luku _ Atanghem _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ , _ pinitun _ pill ghitnun _ . _ atanegh _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ qepghaghtelaagh nunllu _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil ngugh nunllu _ .
Pil iit is teni _ , _ pinitun _ pi teki _ qepghagh tel aasi _ katam _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ ellngit _ pinitun _ pis qellusi _ . _ alingsequ gpenaki _ . _ neqamike luku _ elpek si llu _ qepghagh tel aa sillu _ ataasigh meng _ atanegh lgu usi _ qilagmel ngughmeng _ . _ ellnga n _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ tan iill ngun aki _ .
kinguligh _ apegh yaghqaqe a _ un anguuq _ , _ iknaqe lleg nge tek _ atanegh meng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh llag anengllu _ .
aate kek _ iingun aag kenka _ akul gh aagh ek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe gkakek _ elpesi nun _ . _ taagken _ teng v imun _ nekevgha saghqagh ughte lleqe asi _ tughneghagh m _ puughte i llegh i _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ pi llu waa ngun ghit aput _ yug t _ . _ itupill _ pilluw aang w aap ut _ igleghte te i lghiit _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elget _ , _ igleghte te i lghiit _ nuna m _ mamleg aneng _ , _ seghlegh t llu _ tughneghagh t _ qilag anilnguut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aate kek _ iingun aag kenka _ akul gh aaghq ek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe gkakek _ elpesi nun _ ! _ enkaam _ seghleliigh em _ aghnegh ani _ pilluwagh yaqleg ulleq asi _ anguyag m _ sughug allghi _ . _ taagken _ pilluw aneghmeng _ apeghiigh kufsi _ , _ elpek si _ paninang _ nekevgha u lleqe usi _ .
enkaam _ nekevgha manginagh tek _ . _ Ip api lleq _ tafsi uute ggu _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ sakimag iitagh ite ggu _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nekeggmellegh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ kameg ii teki _ .
tamaakut _ saaghw itgun _ , _ atuqe teggu _ ugpeqe i llegh _ amiigigh aghtagh sigh u luku _ qaam saghq aaluki _ kumang alghiit _ aaygu i _ tughneghagh- m _ .
aate ggu _ yuguligh llegh _ naasqughiitagh u luku _ , _ taghneghagh m llu _ savigpag a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi tke a _ .
iiwleng _ yughaghte k _ taghneghagh m _ maghyaghqugh te llegh akun _ . _ atuqe luki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ yughagh llegh t _ , _ aapte niigh tek llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kelenga lusi _ , _ iilqayug gpenasi _ . _ iiwleng _ yughagh te kete luki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
whanga llu _ yughagh tke tengnga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ akuzi tel i tesqell unga _ . _ taagken _ tetug gpenanga _ apegh lleqe aqa _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ salin _ liigike ste llghite kanga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ akuzi ste u lunga _ ellmi nun _ . _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qiipragh usigh lunga _ . _ yughaghte k _ ungipagh ke i na lunga _ tetug gpenanga _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ .
liisimake sug amsi _ nate tul em nengllu _ sa aqe te mneng llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kayagte ma aqa _ T y ch ic us _ elpesi nun _ . _ piniqekagh ut _ ugpeqaalgut fut _ , _ ataasiigh mel nguug uqlu _ qepghaghte nga _ Atanghem _ . _ kaate kuni _ ungipaate lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ whanga mneng _ , _ kayeme lleqe aisi llu _ .
kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ atanegh meng llu _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ elpesi nun _ pi u uk _ nekeggmellegh llu _ , _ piniqe llegh llu _ ugpeqe i lleg leg _ .
nangllegtagh llegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ pi u uq _ piniqe i lghii ni _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ piniqe lleg ligh luku _ naange yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul - mengllu _ Timoth y- mengllu _ pi u ut _ , _ qepghagh tek iinkung _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ lata aqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ yughaghvig m _ igleghutisteng itni _ , _ d e ac on -en illu _ Philip pi - melngugh ni _ , _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmell elg us li sillu _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ elpesi neng _ sumeghtaghaat ken nem si _ .
Yugh aat ken nem si _ quya pigte aqe unga _ ,
qayughllak _ neqamike aqa _ ungipagh ke i lgusigh qagh qagh zinga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ kayusigh qagh qagh zinga _ ugpeqe i yuggaagh llegh gpesineng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ wh av emun _ kenlanga _ .
Liisimak ngwaagh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ piinligh ikagh _ pinigh lghii meng _ qepghaqagh meng _ ilu gpesini _ , _ ellnga n _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ Christ _ Jesus _ uteghnigh kan _ .
itagnagh pigte uq _ whanga mni _ sumeghtaghaat ken nem si _ tawaten _ qayughllak _ ilum nit aq usi _ . _ ungipagh ke i u lunga llu _ ipapigh q ingu lung allu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ipa u ni luki _ , _ maaten llu _ anusimingllaghvig mete lunga _ , _ qamagte lusi _ allgegh tengngwaagh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ whanga mnun _ maligte te lusi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekaqe a _ esghagh yug pigte aqe amsi _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte lusi _ piniqe amsi _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ piniqe llegh atun _ elpek si _ .
yughagh te kaqe amsi _ piniq ighllag esqellusi _ , _ liisim alleng atagh iis qellusi _ , _ liigik elleng atagh iisqell usillu _ .
tawaten _ lliigh kufsi _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ sa u a _ pinigh lleghpigagh _ nak mi ku mangin aghy ag ulleq aghsi _ . _ taagken _ Christ-a _ tagi nqigtekan _ pelungite lleqe usi llu _ anaggute llghite lleqe usi llu _ .
enkaam _ unguvallegh si _ imigh lleqe ut _ ipapestaaq _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ Jesus _ Christ- angin aghhaam _ piite stekagh aneng _ . _ taagken _ yug t _ quulvagh lleq aatlu _ , _ usuqe lleqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sug aqa _ anusimingllaghvig mete llegh ma _ ipapestaaq _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ nagate sta _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qamagte luteng _ umiileg m _ mangteghagh an _ kelengak isteng ita _ liite aat _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qayughllak _ qepghagh tek egk anganga _ Christ-am _ .
anusimingllaghvig mete llegh ma _ allute luteng _ ugpeqagh lghute t _ ugpeqagh igh aghagh ste ai _ atanegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ wata _ tetug nanigh aghagh ut _ ungipagh ke nghmegteggu _ Christ-a _ .
ipa u uq _ ila i _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ qayughllak _ aqinake u kangatnga llu _ aaghtiiraagh u kangatnga llu _ . _ iwernga _ ila i _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ elqughute luteng _ .
ungipagh ke i u ut _ qayughllak _ piniqe kangatnga _ . _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi stekaqe aanga _ whavek _ nekevgh a tesqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ anguyag mnneng _ .
iwernga _ ila it _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ ellngin aayug tem _ , _ ipapigh q egpen ateng _ . _ sumegh meggni _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ seghleliigh q atagh aghn ilunga _ pi atnga _ anusimingllaghvig mete ma lunga _ .
itagnagh uq _ , _ ungipagh ke i llegh at _ elqughute nga yagh ghngaan _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ alla neng _ apallugh lgu yagh ghngaan _ , _ ungipagh ke i llghite a _ quya ste aqe aanga _ , _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ uglapig llegh iinun _ .
aa-a _ quya nga lleqe unga _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake aqa _ aane yaghqaa unga _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ yughagh tke llegh gpesigun _ , _ kayusillegh akun llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ taghneghagh an _ .
piyuke llegh ghllag ka llu _ , _ sighimake llegh ghllag ka llu _ esgha _ taana _ , _ kayngusaghagh te fqaama _ pi na lunga _ Christ-amun _ . _ itupill _ kiyaghte yug aqe unga _ ilutu lunga _ wataqaaghaq _ maaten _ anusimingllaghvig mete lleg mni _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-a _ quulv alleng ellequq _ unguva ghngaaghma _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghma _ .
whanga mni _ unguvallegh _ Christ- anguuq _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu llegh _ allgegh utagh allgh uuq _ .
iwernga _ unguva naqngu kuma _ qepghagh aghagh lleqe unga _ Christ-amun _ . _ Nal ikek _ nakmike lleghqagh ka _ nalluke aqa _ , _ unguvallegh _ nalighmeng _ tuqu llegh _ .
kukriqe u unga _ nal ig ken eng _ nakmiigh lleghqagh mneng _ . _ aghulaqe yu pigte aqe yagh unga _ Christ- amen nalunga _ , _ qayughllak _ pinigh aghagh yaghqaa uq _ taana _ .
iwernga _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ unguva u unga _ .
Ip apigh qut kum aaqa _ taana _ , _ liisimake aqa _ wiin _ unguva naqngu unga _ . _ elpesinite naqngu unga _ kayusiite na lusi _ nag us qellusi _ , _ quy am alleng esqellusi _ ugpegh llegh gpesigun _ .
elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ , _ usuq ataghagh lleqaghsi _ Christ _ Jesus _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
sa yagh ghngaatnga _ nagnegh te ki _ kiyaghtaall esi _ Christ-am _ apeghtugh llegh atun _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ . _ enkaam _ esghagh yaghtugh kumsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ aviite ghngaaghma _ nagaqugh kumsi _ , _ liigike lleqe aqa _ ataasigh stun _ pi llegh i _ . _ liigike lleqe aqa llu _ qerngagh gpesi _ nekevgha tete naqutke lleg si _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ anguyag gpesineng _ .
alike gpenaki _ angu yasi _ , _ quunpeng _ ilutu tete lusi _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesi _ ipapigh qelleq aat _ ellngit _ kayaalqe i i naanghite ut _ . _ elpek si _ kayaalqe i uute lleqe usi _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ kayaalqe i i ste i lghii _ elpesi neng _ .
elpesi nun _ qepghaa saqleg ugh testekaqaa _ Christ-a _ , _ ugpeq ngin agh penaan _ , _ ikfiqe lgusigh kesi llu _ .
Pilluw algu sigh tengnga _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ esghapag qagh qagh zinga _ piyaqli i lghiinga _ , _ nagaqugh kaqe asi llu _ piyaqli i llegh nka _ maaten _ . _ elpek si llu _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ piyaqleg iigh te kete naqngu asi _ .
Kiyaghtaa llegh pesi _ Christ-akun _ iknaqugh ti sii _ ? _ piniqe llegh an _ ilutughte i sagh i _ ? _ quya aqe tsi _ ataasigh stun _ lliigh lghiisi _ ugpeqagh u lgutke te lghii ni _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ ? _ pinitun _ pi aqe stekagh i _ , _ nanglleg ke aqe stekagh i _ ila si _ ?
tawatete u kufsi _ , _ quya ma ste ghllag tengnga _ piniqe te llegh gpesigun _ , _ ataasigh stun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ ataasigh stun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ .
Ellng in aayug negh ug penasi _ , _ aangaayug negh ug penasi _ . _ yeghlegi _ qusev gu tull usi _ , _ ila gpesineng _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ .
sumegh ke gpenaki _ piyukell ghii n asi _ , _ yeghlegi _ piyuke lleg si _ pakig qagh luki _ kayusiite aqe luki _ ila si _ .
sumeghnegh si _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ sumeghnegh atun _ ayuqligh t _ .
Jesus _ kiyaghnegh tun _ ayuqe yagh ghngaaghmi _ sumeghtaghagh mangite uq _ kiyaghnegh _ inglu ke yaghqaa luku _ .
yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh u lleg ni _ pakig luku _ , _ qepghagh testun _ lliigh kau uq _ . _ yug stun _ lliigh kau uq _ , _ allgegh kau uq llu _ yug stun _ .
yugughte yami _ qusevegtekau uq _ enkaam _ qaatke te kau uq _ tuqu llegh mun _ , _ talwa _ tuqu kau uq _ qaquuragh kun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ Jesus _ aange lleghpigagh u luku _ , _ atigh kaqe a llu _ atanegh meng _ aang elleghpig aghmeng _ ategh yag g aghneng _ .
Enkaangam _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ qilagmelnguum _ , _ nunamel nguum _ , _ nuna m _ asing anil nguum _ quulvagh lleqaat _ Jesus _ qungughte uute llegh megteggun llu _ apegh llegh megteggun llu _ , _ " _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ Atangh uuq _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ quulvagh lleqaat _ kiyaghnegh _ a ta _ .
Enkaangam _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ elpesi nite lunga _ qaatke manginagh qagh qagh zinga _ , _ maaten _ aviillegh mni _ qaatke aghagh tengnga _ . _ I igh w igh tesqelluku _ yuguligh llegh i _ qepghagh manginagh tek _ alinge lleg ligh lusi llu _ ungelegte lleg ligh lusi llu _ ;
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ quunpeng _ qepghagh u uq _ elpesi ni _ atuqe yagute sqellug qu _ piyuke lleg ni _ , _ qaatku sag u tesqell usillu _ piyuke llegh minun _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi aqe teggu _ akuz ilg af qaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ aaghtiiraagh te fqaafsi _ .
enkaam _ avute ite lleqe usi llu _ pelungite lleqe usi llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaquti a _ avute ite yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghteng ngu luteng _ akule itni _ puugh t ingh etlu _ seghleghqes tetlu _ . _ kuukgute pestaagh yaghqaa usi _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ nuna mi _ ,
ungipagh ke i u lusi _ ellngit nun _ Christ-ameng _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug meng _ . _ enkaam _ tagi nqigtekan _ quyas leq aghpesinga _ elngaatall _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghtaallegh pesi _ kelgute yaghqaqe a _ qepghagh llegh ka _ temngingu nghite ngughk _ .
ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqe te stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tuqute kangatnga _ whani _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ quya lleqe unga _ , _ qayughllak _ tuqu llegh ka _ aghqe te stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ tuune lghii _ elpek si _ aghqe te gpesinun _ iighwigh sigh u luni _ . _ Taam _ qamagte luta _ quya ste lleqe ainkut _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ elpek si llu _ quya yaghqaa usi _ , _ quy algu sigh llag yaghq aqagh pesinga _ .
Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ Timoth y _ kayagte yaghtugh ngestagh aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ quya lleqe unga _ ungipange gkuma _ elpesi neng _ .
Timoth y- ngin aghhaam _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aisi _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleg mtun _ .
tamaakut _ ila i _ kiyang _ ellmeggneng _ katam _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ut _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qepghaqagh a _ avelghagh luku _ .
iwernga _ Timoth y _ liisimakngwaagh aghsi _ nateghtu langa _ . _ ighnegh stun _ kayuute yiite kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i u lunga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
liigike ghesnagh kumkun _ aanesaghqagh u tke a _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ kayagte lleqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ .
neghyuke aqa _ atanegh _ whanga llu _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh unga _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aqa _ ugpeqaalgut fut _ epaphroditus _ elpesi nun _ uteghnigh ste na luku _ . _ kayute kaghqagh yug ma lunga _ tagi stekaqe kesi _ kayusii tesqell unga _ . _ qerngagh emtung _ qepghaqagh u ukung llu _ ungipagh ke i kau ukung llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ nekevgha te kaqe apung llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kipullgin aalghii neng _ .
aglagh ste naqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ aghyuqe u uq _ . _ P eng Ê¼g aqiisi _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh kaqe kesi _ qinuyug llegh aneng _ .
ipa u uq _ qinuyug ghllag kau uq _ repall _ tuqu vzigh kau uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kaqe a _ , _ whanga llu _ nanglleg yagute kaqe aanga _ . _ tuquma yagh kan _ wataqaaghaq _ qivghu lleg nge aghagh nayagh unga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ wataqaaghaq _ aglagh sug aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ kaate kan _ esghagh kufsigu _ quya lleqe usi _ , _ enkaangam _ itagnaghi lleqe unga _ whanga llu _ .
epaphroditus _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghmi _ qepghaqagh u uq _ Christ-amun _ , _ aaqun _ tuqu vzigh kau uq _ . _ kayusiite kaqe aanga _ qayughllak _ elpek si _ kayusii te pagning itk aqagh pesinga _ , _ av iil nguusi _ . _ quyake sigh ke luku _ upugha tete nakesi _ qayughllak _ angleg utk aghsi _ atanegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ quulvagh luki _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ E pap h r od itu s -etun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ naange niite te kun _ ungipaa su w amsi _ , _ " _ quya ma aqe tek _ atanegh kun _ ! _ " _ qinuyagute igate unga _ ungipaan neq igg nem si _ lata tgun _ igaqegkagh mneng _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ enkaam _ ila lleqe uq _ paqniite llegh gpesinun _ .
kelenga lusi _ seghletun _ pikayug neng _ , _ tamaakuneng _ qikmigh neng _ , _ yugu ut _ sagiqe te i lghiit _ kep fik esqelluki _ yugusigh t _ .
whangkuta u ukut _ ugpeqagh ni _ circumcise- ep ii waaq ani _ qayughllak _ manigugh aqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ , _ usuq aqagh putlu _ Christ _ Jesus _ . _ neghyu igate ukut llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pilii tesqelluta _ whangkuta _ katam _ salleg mteggun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi liite yaghqaqe yagh kagu _ ellnga n _ katam _ s allghakun _ , _ whanga _ pi yaghqaa yagh unga _ . _ yug t _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa yagh kata _ whanga _ wataqaaghaq _ pi nayagh unga _ ukut _ apallugh ke luki _ :
C ircumcise- ek aqaatnga _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ aghneq _ atugh yamkun _ kingu aneng _ allgellegh ma _ . _ Israel-eghm iineng _ pi u unga _ , _ ramke aneng _ B en j amin -em _ . _ H eb r ew- piig uunga _ , _ angayuqagh gka llu _ H eb r ew -ngu uk _ . _ malighqutagh ke nga ghllag unga _ Jew is h -et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pharisee- ngughte unga _ .
sagiqe pigte lunga _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe anka _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ Qaat keng ngwaaq aqanka _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it _ repall _ anaggute llegh mun _ av utng it kaagunga _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ allgegh tekaq nik aqsaq enka _ ifla ma anka _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-a _ .
ipa _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ifla ma anka _ apallugh ke luku _ megnunagh tul nga _ liit ngwaa ll emneng _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ atanegh ka _ . _ ellnga _ apallugh ke luku _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ egte ma anka _ . _ esghagh anka _ mallagh stun _ ayuqe luki _ allgegh te qegh naluku _ Christ-a _ ,
ilate u aghte unga llu _ ellnga nun _ . _ ugpeqe nanigh ma aqa _ whanga mneng _ pinigh naqe llegh _ qaatke te lleg mkun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ yeghlegi _ liisimake aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh ste aqe aanga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kegka _ Christ-a _ . _ una _ pinigh llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe uq _ , _ yug t _ allgegh taqagh at _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ Christ-ameng _ .
piyuke llegh ghllag ke aqa _ , _ liite na luku _ Christ-a _ , _ nanghiigh na luku llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ unguvagh tellgh an _ ; _ ilate na lunga llu _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ , _ ellnga tun llu _ lliigh yaghqaa lunga _ tuqu llegh ani _ .
tawaten _ pi kuma _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ sighimake aqa _ whanga llu _ unguvagh tesqell unga _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
whaten _ pi u nghite unga _ , _ " _ Christ- atun _ lliigh ma unga _ nalighmeng _ Christ- atun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ quunpeng _ . _ " _ iwernga _ pinaq ellgh aqa _ qamagte luku _ atuqe u aqa _ Christ-am _ piyuke llegh atun _ lliigh na lunga _ atuqe na luku llu _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ whanga mnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh igate unga _ kayaal qelgh ag tuum aniluku _ . _ iwernga _ ataasigh _ pi aqe aqa _ , _ puygu luku _ sa u a _ tun utem nilnguq _ siv ut miigh naqutk aqunga _ kaate na luku _ sa u a _ sivu mnite ngughk _ .
enkaam _ taklaghruketun _ kilgaaqu u unga _ kayaalqe i i sigh ke na luku _ akileghtuusagh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh tekagh anun _ pamavek _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh nghite kufsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike ste naagh ai _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si _ anaggute nga lghiit _ .
una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ , _ nagnegh te lteki _ kiyaghtaall eput _ maligte luku _ ipapighqell eq _ liitekagh ut _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ uspute aqe lunga _ maligte ngnga _ . _ esghapag luki _ ila i llu _ kiyaghte lghiit _ whanga mtun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ uglagh ghngaan _ ungipaate aatagh kaqe amsi _ , _ maaten _ ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ qunituumagh ma _ . _ uglagh u pigte ut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ anguyag u luteng _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh aneng _ qaquuragh kun _ .
suumqagh ke ait _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh it _ kiyang _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luku _ . _ kayngu yug sighqagh ke yagh ke teng _ aang aa yugusi q aqiit _ . _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aat _ nunamel ngugh hiin aq _ kiyaghtaallegh teng _ enkaam _ naafqe lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ hell- mi _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh ni _ whangkuta _ qilag mii u ukut _ . _ enkaam _ utaq angwaagh put _ yuguligh i sta _ , _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ ukig yaghqagh _ whangkunnun _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ .
tagi kuni _ allangughte yaghqaqe ai _ kayaal nguut _ , _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ yugusigh put _ . _ Unguv agh tek atun _ yugusigh mitun _ lli aghte yaghqaqe ai _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mikun _ . _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh qun _ igleghte te yaghqaaghte lleqe a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ .
Enkaangam _ piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ esghagh yug pigte amsi _ , _ quya ma sigh ke amsi _ , _ akileghtuusagh ke amsi llu _ qepghagh lleg mnun _ . _ tawaten _ aghula i te kestagh tek _ atanegh kun _ .
E u od i a _ , _ S y n t y ch e _ , _ qevuute lunga _ qelegh naqe amtek _ , _ taaqe tek _ aghiva tete nghmeng _ . _ ataasigh stun _ lliigh tek _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke te utek _ atanegh kun _ .
Qepgh algu temni _ S y z y gu s _ , _ elpek llu _ kayuute yiite aghte kek _ aghnagh k _ taake uk _ taaqe sqellug kek _ aghiva tete nghmeng _ . _ El k egkenka _ qevuute lutek _ qepghagh lgusigh kaqe ainkut _ C l em en t- lu _ ila i llu _ qepgh algut enka _ , _ qamagte luta _ ungipagh ke i u luta _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ . _ Qepgh algut ma _ qamagte luteng _ ategh it _ igaqe nga ut _ igagh akun _ unguvallegh m _ . _ Taw an tut _ igagh ni _ ategh it _ qamagte luteng _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh ngekagh t _ .
iiwleng _ quya ma aqe tek _ atanegh kun _ . _ pi naqlaatagh amsi _ , _ quya ma aqe tek _ !
nuqete neghtu llegh i _ yug m _ qamagte luni _ liite ligu _ . _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ .
sumeghyali tke gpenaan _ sa u a _ alngunak _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ sa meng _ aklu kufsi _ yughagh negh gpesini _ tungsigh aqe tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuun esqellusi _ . _ iiwleng _ tungsigh aqe tek _ igamsiqa yug lleg ligh lusi _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilu si llu _ umyugagh si llu _ nekegg me tes naa ghii _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a _ aange ghllag uq _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigikngwaagh naanghitaa _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ naange niite ta akun _ lata ma _ ungipaa su w amsi _ sumeghtaghaat ku mangin iisqelluki _ pinigh lghiit llu _ usuqe yaghqagh t llu _ wh atel nguut _ : _ tamaakut _ ipa pig t _ , _ quulvagh yaghqat _ , _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ pelung ilnguut _ , _ piniqe yaghqagh t _ , _ tamaakut llu _ pinitun _ akuzite kete yaghqagh t _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nagnegh te ggu _ liitekagh i _ whanga mneng _ apeghtugh i lleg mkun llu _ kiyaghtaall em kunllu _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ nekeggmell elit ikayuk _ elpesinite lleqe uq _ .
elngaatall _ quya pigte unga _ atanegh kun _ qayughllak _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ whaa _ allameng _ kayusiite laatagh kefsinga _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ kayusiite yukagh qagh zinga _ , _ iwernga _ pipagningite kau usi _ .
aklu u ni lunga _ pi u nghite unga _ qayughllak _ natete yagh ghngaaghma _ itagnagh aqe unga _ .
ilangani _ nuugh ng aghma _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ , _ ilangani _ siipte i i lunga _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ . _ itagnagh yagute ma unga _ nani _ alngunak _ s atu l emtun _ kiyaghte negh mni _ . _ itagnagh aqe unga _ kep sugh ng aghma _ kiyaghte negh mni _ , _ iyatagh ghngaaghma llu _ kiyaghte negh mni _ , _ talwa _ akluma ghngaaghma llu _ , _ aklu nghite ghngaaghma llu _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ pi yaghqaqe aqa _ Christ-akun _ iknaqugh sagh tem kun _ .
paninang _ elpek si _ pinitungwaaq _ kayusigh u aatagh qagh zinga _ seghleliigh negh mni _ .
elpek si _ Philip pi - y eghm iini _ , _ liisimakngwaagh aghsi _ aghulaqe aqngama _ Macedonia- meng _ , _ ungipagh ke i yuwhaagh aqngama _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ ellngin aagusi _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayusigh ikagh t _ whanga meng _ . _ Ellng in aagusi _ ilate nga lghiit _ allgegh te lleg mnun llu _ iflii lleg mnun llu _ .
ataasigh ghhagh u gpenaan _ ak lu pig nemni _ mani meng _ Th es sal onic a- mell unga _ , _ tu yugh aqagh pesinga _ .
iwernga _ liigike sug amsi _ tunute yasi _ mani t _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u nghite ut _ whanga mni _ . _ M eg nun alleghpig aq ta _ esgha _ una _ : _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh _ allgeghsaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pinitun _ pilleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ .
whaa _ maaten _ naama unga _ , _ aa-a _ , _ talwa _ siipte i i lunga _ ayuqe unga _ . _ tuyuusagh si _ E pap h r od itu s -kun _ qamagte luteng _ kaate ma ut _ , _ enkaam _ whaa _ aklu igate unga _ . _ tunute yasi _ whanga mnun _ aghqe tkekagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ efqugh tin apig lleghhiit _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghnegh ma _ yataaghqe te naagh aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aklukegk agh pesineng _ aklungite llegh ghllag mikun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh mnnun _ , _ ata mun _ usuqe i lta _ , _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
ungipagh u aatagh nakesi _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ . _ Ugpeq aalgu tet _ whangam nilnguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ , _ kiyang _ taakut _ Caesar -em _ mangteghagh mii ita _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ taghneghagh gpesinite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ apostle- ngugh te kaagunga _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ . _ Timoth y- mengllu _ pi u ut _ ugpeqaalgutem nneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ pi u ut _ C ol os s a e- melngughnun _ , _ ataasiigh melnguut _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ Christ-akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmell eli si ll illu _ .
iiwleng _ iyamsiqayugvik aqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ yugh aat ken nem si _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ nagaquum aagh put _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ Christ _ Jesus-meng _ , _ piniqe i llegh i llu _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh pigu ut _ . _ nagaqugh yuwhaagh aqe yafsiki _ , _ liite kau usi _ sighima llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ sigh m allegh pesi _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ste aqe aisi llu _ piniqe i lleg lgu ste aqe aisi llu _ . _ qilag mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kagpag ma a _ elpesi nun _ sa u a _ sighimakekagh i _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ quya ste i manginagh u ut _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ mingite u ut _ iingun aghh aanun _ nuna m _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ quyas t ill ghistun _ elpesi nun _ nagaqugh yuwhaagh aqe yafsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ legh igh iitagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
L iitk aqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nang llegh tall gha _ epaphras- meng _ , _ piniqekagh mnneng _ qepgh algu tem nneng _ . _ ataasiighmete luni _ qepghagh u uq _ Christ-amun _ , _ qepghaqagh ke a _ whangkuta _ qepghagh yuk aqsaq efut _ .
ellnga n _ ungipaate ma ainkut _ piniqe i llegh meng _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
aghnegh meng _ taagken _ nagaqugh te mnneng _ tamaakut _ , _ yughagh te kete nanigh igate amsi _ . _ tungsigh te u amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ qamagte luku _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ yughagh te kaqe amsi llu _ peghqin ghus qellusi _ , _ liigik esqell ukillu _ sa u aat _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtugh tke ai _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe usi _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh atun _ , _ iiwleng _ atuq aq elleq aghsi _ sa u a _ efqugh nagh lghii _ ellnga ni _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ pinigh lghii _ qepghagh lleqaghsi _ enkaam _ wata _ lii lleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yughagh te kaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iknaqugh s iis qellusi _ ilu gpesigun _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh llag mikun _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ nuqennegh tugh teghllag esqellusi _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
enkaam _ quya ma lleg ligh ghllag lusi _ iyamsiqayugvik elleq aghsi _ a ta _ . _ ellnga u lghii _ elpesi nun _ nengigh lgute ste ikagh _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ tuune lleqe ni luki _ yug ni _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nighug mi _ .
ellnga n _ yugul ik aqiinkut _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh aneng _ mamleg m _ enkaam _ tagite kaqe ainkut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ pinigh kegka mi _ ighnegh mi _ .
ellnga n _ tukfigh kaqe ainkut _ , _ seghevute kaqe ai llu _ seghleghqe lleg put _ .
Christ-a _ tawatete u aghte uq _ aliite nghite ngugh tun _ kiyaghnegh tun _ . _ kiyaghte u uq _ sivungagh ni _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ulima llghite luku _ , _ enkaam _ qu lighpig aaguq _ ulimaagh yag g aghneng _ .
ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ qilagmel nguutlu _ nunamel nguutlu _ . _ ulima kaqe ai _ esghaqagh yu put _ , _ esghagh igate ke put llu _ tamaakut llu _ umiileg t _ , _ at an ghet _ , _ igleghutistet _ , _ pi lleghqagh leg t llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ Christ-akun _ , _ Christ- am unllu _ .
Christ-a _ tawan tekaaguq _ sivu itni _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh akunllu _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ellnga n _ nek aghq agh llu waa ghit n i testaq ii _ .
ellnga _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvig melngughnun _ , _ ellnga n _ yugusigh ke ai _ . _ ellnga n _ yugusigh _ unguv ang us tengng waa _ . _ ellnga u uq _ unguvagh yuwhaagh ke aq _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ enkaam _ qu lighpig aaguq _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke a _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ ellmi _ katam _ kiyaghte na luni _ ighnegh mi _ ilu ani _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh mikun _ veghute stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ nuna mi llu _ qilag mi llu _ . _ enkaam _ aaw akun _ ighnegh mi _ tuqu aqngan _ qaquuragh mi _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ .
ataasigh meng _ pellegh nga yagh usi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ anguyag ke yagh aisi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ seghletun llu _ pi llegh gpesigun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilaliigh un neqig test iisi _ ellmi nun _ ighnegh mi _ yugusigh an _ tuqu llegh akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tagite na lusi _ nayute te nga llegh minun _ agleghnagh lusi _ , _ pelungite lusi _ , _ av utng ill usillu _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ nagnegh kufsi _ ugpeqe luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ay gu ghi kell ngun aki _ . _ iqite gpenasi _ sigh m allegh meng _ allgegh tek agh pesineng _ nagaqugh aqe yafsiki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke u ut _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nuna m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ , _ whanga _ Paul _ , _ qepghaghte ngulunga _ ellmi nun _ ungipaq esqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
ikfiqe llegh ma _ yugusigh mkun _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ quya ste ghllag aanga _ . _ tawaten _ kayusigh i u unga _ apeghiigh na luki _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh i _ yugusigh minun _ . _ ellnga n _ yugusigh a _ ugpeqagh u ut _ yughaghvig melnguut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ qepghagh teng llaq aqaanga _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ tagivagh kaqe a _ una _ qepghaqagh _ kayusii tesqellusi _ , _ elpesi nun _ liigikngwaagh esqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte mangite a _ una _ ipapilleq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ qayvigh tengng waa _ ellmi _ yug minun _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ nakmiigh lghii _ yug minun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ sa u a _ qayvighte llghite kete ni _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ nakmike kaqe a _ liisimake sqellug qu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ uum _ ipapi llghem _ akule itni _ Gentile-et _ . _ Ip api lleq _ qayvightekagh a _ un anguuq _ : _ Christ-a _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ ilu gpesini _ . _ Christ- anguuq _ sa igh i ma ut _ kiyagh tesqelluta _ kiyaghnegh mi _ ellnga n _ nighughqell ghani _ .
enkaam _ ungipaq ngwaagh put _ Christ-a _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ qamagte luku _ peghqinellegh kun _ , _ kelenga sagh u aghaghkagh put llu _ apeghtugh aqe aput llu _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ tagite na luki _ ataasi k aght iita _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayute te nga llegh anun _ ang tan iit kaa luki _ Christ-akun _ .
taana _ pi na luku _ taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ ughleghiigh unga _ atuqe luku _ Christ-am _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ qepghagh lghii _ iknaqe pigte luni _ ilu mnni _ .
Ungip aatagh ll amsi _ taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ qepghagh te i lleg mneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ ugpeqagh nun llu _ L a od ic ea- melngughnun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh anun llu _ esghaate igate ngugh neng _ whanga mneng _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ ilu it _ ilutugh lleng esqelluki _ , _ ataasiigh tesqell ukillu _ piniqe llegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aat _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma ite kanga _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvightekagh a _ Christ- anguq _ .
qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh i llu _ liigike i nga llegh i llu _ Christ- am e tut _ . _ taake uk _ aklungi stun _ ayuqe uk _ iigh nga lghiik _ Christ- ami _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ tem ngin eng _ apeghtugh all ghitneng _ , _ qaywa _ ip asug n itegh ngaata _ .
qaywa _ uyav an sagh ngaaghma _ elpesi neng _ , _ umyugagh mkun _ elpesinite aqe unga _ . _ quya unga _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte lghiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ Christ-akun _ aghul iilnguq _ .
tugukligh llegh gpesistun _ Christ _ Jesus _ Atangh uluku _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghte tek _ ellnga kun _ .
ellnga kun _ akugh lgute k _ asivagh nun _ samavek _ , _ ellnga kun _ nekefte ki _ kiyaghtaall esi _ enkaam _ iknaqugh tek _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ apeghtugh llegh gpesistun _ . _ iyamsiqa yug manginagh tek _ .
kelenga lusi _ ! _ kitumun _ alngunak _ aghulaqe te ste gpenasi _ temngitwh atgun _ apeghtugh all ghitgun _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtugh allgh et _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itneng _ pi u ut _ , _ tughneghagh neng llu _ pi u ut _ , _ igleghte te i lghiit _ whani _ nuna mi _ . _ Christ-ameng _ pi u nghite ut _ ,
qayughllak _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ Christ-am _ yugusigh ani _ .
Christ-a _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ igleghut ist en unllu _ pi lleghqagh leg nun llu _ . _ ilate ste lusi _ Christ-amun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe aisi _ unguvallegh pig meng _ .
ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ Christ-amun _ circumcise- e kaagusi _ . _ C ircumcise- ellegh si _ yug t _ pi ste llghite aat _ , _ iwernga _ Christ-am _ pi stekaqe a _ . _ enkaam _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh aneng _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh itneng _ .
Paaptaay aaq ng afsi _ qungugh te kau usi _ Christ-akun _ . _ taagken _ makete kau usi _ unguvallegh mun _ Christ-akun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ makete kaqe a _ Christ-a _ tuqu meng _ .
tuqu kau usi _ qayughllak _ seghleghqe ste u yalghiisi _ , _ qayughllak llu _ circumcise- el ghil nguusi _ yugusigh gpesigun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe aisi _ Christ-akun _ qayughllak _ seghevute kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ .
qaatke nghite aqe yamteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ Liiligh tu usi _ seghleghqe llegh t _ pi ke aput _ igaqe kau ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite kaqe ai _ igaqughkagh t _ seghleghqe lleg put _ tuqu qagh te luki _ Christ-am _ qaquuragh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ wayaghteqagh ke ai _ guu tut angit _ igleghte te i lghiit llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elg etlu _ tughneghagh t _ . _ tawaten _ tea- ma anun _ esghagh stekagh a _ kayaalqe i i lleg ni _ tamaakuneng _ tughneghagh neng _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ nanqigte ste gpenasi _ neghe llegh meng llu _ meghe llegh meng llu _ , _ neqenghaghqe llegh t _ aghnegh itneng _ , _ nutaghagh t _ tanqigh t _ aghnegh itneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ Sabbath -et _ aghnegh itneng _ .
taakut _ taghneghagh nge te lghii stun _ ayuqe ut _ taa kunun _ pi yaghqagh nun _ aga _ siv um el ngughnun _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ ipa pig t _ Christ- am e tut _ .
ila i _ yug m _ quseveg ng asug nigh qes uneghtu ut _ , _ manigugh aqe ait llu _ yaquleg t _ . _ iiwleng _ akuzite kaqe ait _ esghaghwaagh lleg teng _ esghaghkagh teng _ . _ ellngit nun _ ungipaate ste gpenasi _ anaggute nga ni lusi _ . _ ellngit _ esleqnga ut _ temngitwh ameng _ qukaayug lleghmeng _ qayughllak _ sumeghnegh it _ yug m _ sumeghnegh ke ai _ .
ellngit _ ilate nanigh ut _ Christ-amun _ naasqugh u te i lghii meng _ yugusigh mun _ . _ igleghte te u a _ iingunagh an _ yugusigh _ , _ iknaqugh sagh aqaallu _ neghqe aqe luku _ . _ Qer ng aghme testaq aa _ yugusigh _ atuqe ste luki _ naflugh i llu _ ivalu i llu _ . _ enkaam _ yugusigh _ nagu u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagu ste sqe sug llegh atun _ .
Christ-a _ tuqu aqngan _ tuqu lgu siq all ghu uq aqaghsi _ . _ enkaam _ iteme te kau usi _ tughneghagh neng _ igleghte te i lghii neng _ whani _ nuna mi _ . _ Sang anÊ¼ngam _ kiyaghte aqe tsi _ nuna mun _ pike pigte lghii stun _ ? _ sangan _ qaatke aqe steki _ liiligh tugh allghit _ wh atel nguut _ ,
" _ safleg gpenaan _ , _ naasiigh gpenaan _ , _ saafte gpenaan _ ? _ "
taakut _ liiligh tugh allgh et _ yug t _ neghe ke ii te neng llu _ meghe ke ii te neng llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ neghekagh it llu _ meghekagh it llu _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ liiligh tugh allgh et _ taaw angin aghhaq _ yug t _ liiligh tugh alq iitlu _ apeghtuusagh ke ait llu _ .
tamaakut _ liiligh tugh allgh et _ apeghtugh ait _ yug t _ peghqin e sighwaagh esqelluki _ . _ apeghtugh ait llu _ amyuutk esqelluki _ yugusigh at _ , _ atuq nan iisqelluki _ yugusigh ita _ pik yuk ell ghit _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi llghite a _ aghula i aghte igate ait _ atuqe nanigh lleghqagh meng _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ . _ tamaakut _ liiligh tugh allgh et _ ipate yu gnite ut _ iwernga _ temngingu ut _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
Unguv agh tekaa tegpesineng _ maligte te lusi _ Christ-amun _ , _ piyuke aqe teki _ sa u aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi nun _ pik esqelluki _ qilag melnguut _ . _ tawani _ Christ-a _ aqumga uq _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
suumqagh qite ki _ tamaakut _ qilag melnguut _ , _ nakaan _ tamaakut _ nunamel nguut _ .
tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tek _ qayughllak _ tuqu kau usi _ . _ unguvallegh i _ iigh nga uq _ Christ- ami _ kiyaghnegh kun _ .
Christ-a _ unguv al qaghput _ . _ aliigh kan _ , _ elpek si llu _ al iil gu sigh lleqaghsi _ nighughqell ghani _ .
taaqe teki _ atuqe nghmeng _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh it _ , _ katam _ allani ii aagh _ , _ ukmangite nghite ngughk _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ , _ atuqe yu llegh a _ seghlegh m _ , _ pakig ni uq llu _ . _ pakig ni uq _ maniguute lghii stun _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ayuqe uq _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag a _ tagi u uq _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun _ ellnga nun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ tawaten _ kiyaghteng nguyagh tusi _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ atuqe nanigh teki _ qamagte luki _ ukut _ : _ sakr aa _ , _ sakraa ghllag _ , _ ugum i ker aaq _ , _ seghlequ uq _ , _ seghlegh meng llu _ akuzi tke i llegh _ .
iqlengiqe te gpenasi _ qayughllak _ taa qum aagh si _ kiyaghtaall el ug si _ , _ ayghigh te kaqsagh kesi llu _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghtaallegh ragh aq _ atuq aagh sim aagh si _ . _ N utagh teng nguusi _ , _ Ulim agh is teg pesi s tunllu _ lliigh u usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apalluq uku _ liig i ke k estagh aghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ kin agh pig aatanga _ .
Kiyaghtaa llegh ragh aghmi _ , _ allangughte te ite ut _ akule itni _ Gentile- etlu _ Jews -etlu _ , _ akule itni _ circumcise- ek atlu _ circumcise- ell ghil nguutlu _ , _ akule itni _ b ar b ari an -etlu _ , _ S c y th i an -etlu _ , _ akule itni llu _ qepghaghtelaagh etlu _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil nguutlu _ . _ iwernga _ Christ-a _ qu lighpig aaguq _ , _ kiyaghteng ngu uqlu _ tea- ma ghhagh mnni _ ugpeqagh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke aisi _ agleghnagh lghiit _ , _ piniqe pigte aisi llu _ . _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ . _ enkaam _ nangllegtagh lusi _ , _ nanglleg ke i lusi _ , _ qusevegte lusi _ , _ yakugh ke lusi _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi llu _ .
Sak r itu tegpenasi _ iwernga _ seghev u tull usi _ . _ kinku t _ anagtegkangisi _ seghevute nakesi _ katam _ Atanghem _ seghev utell ghistun _ elpek si _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ megnu nagh ut _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ . _ piniqe te llegh m _ ataasiigh tengngwaagh iinkut _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ nalighnegh ke aisi _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ , _ enkaam _ nakmike kau usi _ kiyagh tesqellusi _ qerngagh gpesi _ nekeggmellegh kun _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-am _ nekeggmellegh an _ igleghte te liki _ ilu si _ . _ iyamsiqa yug nga tek llu _ .
yeqay _ Christ-am _ apeghtuusagh i _ kemnagh luteng _ kiyaghte lit _ ilu gpesini _ . _ apeghtugh utu te aqe lusi _ , _ kelengas aagh utu taq l usillu _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ peghqinellegh kun _ . _ ilagagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iyamsiqa yug lleg ligh lusi _ ilu gpesigun _ , _ ilagagh tek _ psalms- neng _ , _ ilagaate neng _ , _ manigugh te mun llu _ ilagaate neng _ .
enkaam _ sa u a _ pikagh i _ , _ akuzite kun _ nalighmeng _ qepghagh llegh kun _ qamagte luku _ pi aqe teggu _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ . _ ellnga kun _ iyamsiqa yug vike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ a ta _ .
nuliigh ni _ , _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ Atanghem _ pis qes uw iisi _ .
ugi ni _ , _ piniqe luki _ nula isi _ , _ yakugh ke luki _ pi aqe teki _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ qaute kete luki _ angayuqagh si _ sa llegh kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi llghem _ efqughtagh ke a _ atanegh _ .
ata ni _ , _ sakraa uute yaghagh gpenaki _ taghnughhagh si _ luuraq _ iil qen nayuk ata _ .
Qepghagh te laagh ni _ , _ iiwleng _ qaute kete luki _ piliit iste si _ . _ iiwleng llu _ efqugh hnaq luki _ esghapag ugh ngaata _ nalighmeng _ esghapag unghi tegh ngaata _ . _ qepghagh te ki _ ipapigh qellusi _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ quulv aangwaagh si _ atanegh _ .
sa llegh gpesini _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ qepghagh aqe tek _ pinaq ell ghagh si _ qamagte i i luku _ qepghagh te pigte lghii stun _ atanegh _ , _ nakaan _ yug nun _ .
neqamike luku _ Atangh uuq _ Christ-a _ qepghagh tekagh i _ . _ All gegh lleqaghsi _ akileghtuusagh i _ ellnga neng _ . _ akileghtuusagh _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ yug minun _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi sta _ nallangigh yaghqaa uq _ seghletun _ pillgh anun _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe a _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ taw ateghlluwaaq _ .
Qepghagh te laagh et _ piliit isteng itni _ , _ pinitungwaaq llu _ atu neng waaq lu _ pi aqe teki _ qepghagh tel aasi _ , _ liisimake luku _ elpek si llu _ Pil iit is telgu usi _ qilag mi _ .
yughagh manginagh tek _ , _ iilqayug gpenasi llu _ yughagh aqe tek _ iyamsiqa yug vike magh an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yughagh kufsi _ , _ yugh aat ken nak ef si kutlu _ . _ yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qelpegh u tesqelluta _ amig meng _ ming i tesqelluki _ akuzi ta i _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte mangite a _ ipapilleq _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate aanga _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ taana _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ ipapilleq _ . _ ungipagh ke kaqe te mneng _ taana _ ipapilleq _ anusimingllagh aatnga _ .
enkaam _ yughagh tke tengnga _ una _ ungipagh _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa luku _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ whanga mnun _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
Pegh qin gh waaq itek _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughnite negh gpesini _ . _ atuqe aqe teggu _ tamaghhagh an _ pi lleghqagh i _ ungipaate yaghqaa luki _ Christ-ameng _ .
aleghqugh nghpesiki _ iiwleng _ nangllegtagh lusi _ , _ akuzi aqe lusi _ itagnagh yugnagh lusi _ , _ nagate yugnagh lusi llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe tek _ liisimak esqellusi _ naten _ kiimsigh lleghqagh it _ aapqugh aall ghit _ .
T y ch ic us _ ugpeqagh u lgutke aqa _ , _ piniqe pigtekaqe a _ . _ qepghagh lgutke aqa _ , _ qepghagh te aqe a llu _ atanegh _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ .
kayagte aqa _ elpesi nun _ , _ liisimake sqellug qu _ nate tul v ut _ enkaam _ kayem elleng esqellusi _ . _ ungipaate naagh aisi _ whanga mneng _ .
kayagte aqa llu _ Onesimus _ elpesi nun _ . _ piniqe kau uq _ ataasiigh melnguq _ ugpeqaal gun _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi u uq _ . _ T y ch ic us-enkuk _ ungipaate lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ sa llegh neng _ maani _ .
A ris t ar ch us-em _ anusimingllaghagh lgute ma _ , _ Mar k - emllu _ ata lgu ta an _ Barnab as-em _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ ( _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ lata tgun _ mark- meng _ , _ kaate ma kan _ elpesi nun _ upugha te sqellug qu _ . _ )
Jesus- emllu _ , _ alla _ ategh leg m _ J us tus -meng _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ Taaku ngin aagut _ Jews-et _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ qepghagh lgusigh aqe aatnga _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ilutu qu tke anka _ elngaatall _ .
epaphras _ , _ qepghaghte nga _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga n llu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ iiwleng _ taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ yughagh te kaqe aisi _ ang tan ii tesqellusi _ , _ liisimak ng ngwaagh esqelluku _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ elpesi nun _ , _ elpesi nun llu _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ piyuke llegh a _ pike sqellug qu _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ epaphras _ qepghagh ghllag kau uq _ kayusiite na lusi _ , _ kayusiite na luki llu _ L a od ic ea- gh m iitlu _ H i er ap ol is -eghm iit llu _ .
L uk e- emllu _ piniqe pigtekagh mta _ aghallegtagh m _ , _ D em as - emllu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
Ugpeq aal gut nun _ L a od ic ea- melngughnun _ , _ nympha- mun llu _ , _ ugpeqaalgut nunllu _ qer nugh ut kayug nun _ maniguute na luteng _ mangteghagh ani _ , _ ungipaate nakesi _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
atightugh nakesi _ ukut _ lata t _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ C ol os s a e- m _ . _ wataghllak llu _ atightugh nakesi _ ukut _ lata t _ L a od ic ea- ghmiit _ ugpeqagh itnun _ . _ atightugh nakesi llu _ lata t _ L a od ic ea- ghmiit _ ugpeqagh ita _ tuyugh yaghqagh it _ elpesi nun _ .
archippus _ ungipaat aghn nakesi _ whaten _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ apeghiigh naken _ qepghaqagh _ Atanghem _ qelegh tke a _ elpenun _ . _ "
whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ una _ igaqe aqa _ . _ neqamike lunga _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ , _ qiipragh usigh lunga _ ayuqe unga _ . _ qamagte lusi _ suumqagh ke amsi _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh li _ elpesi nun _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ , _ silas- meng _ , _ Timoth y- mengllu _ pi u ut _ , _ Th es sal onic a- ghmiit _ ugpeqagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ pi i _ Atangh emllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke i llegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ elpesi nite lik _ .
quunpeng _ iyamsiqayugvik aqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ , _ iiwleng llu _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ .
yughagh negh mta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata mnnun _ neqamik aqaghput _ qepghagh llegh i _ ugpegh llegh gpesigun _ , _ qepghagh llegh i _ piniqe llegh gpesigun _ . _ Iyamsi qayugvik aqagh putlu _ ugpegh llegh i _ nagnegh us k esi _ iknaqe luku _ qayughllak _ sighima u lghiisi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqekagh ani _ , _ liisimakagh ut _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ 
qayughllak _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tagite aqe yamsi _ , _ akuzite raaghinagh tgun _ pi mangite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh q unllu _ , _ Agleghnalghiig ne kunllu _ Taghneghagnekun _ pi kau ukut _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqe asi _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ipa u ta i _ . _ liisimakagh i llu _ naten _ kiyagh te kaat fut _ elpesi nite luta _ , _ tawaten _ kayusiite na lusi _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ .
enkaam _ whangkutestun llu _ atanegh tun llu _ lliigh tek _ . _ qaywa _ ikfiq eghllag ngaagh pesi _ , _ tugukligh asi _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ quya ma lleg ligh lusi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
enkaam _ usputagh ughte usi _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ ugpeqagh nun _ Macedonia- millu _ A ch a ia- millu _ .
Atanghem _ ungipagh a _ mingite u uq _ elpesi neng _ Macedonia- millu _ A ch a ia- millu _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ liite aat _ tea- ma ani _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ pi nghite yagh ghngaamteggu _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ qayughllak _ siingenllu _ yug t _ nagaqugh ma ut _ .
tea- ma ani _ apegh aqe aat _ upugha te i llegh ghllag i _ whangkunneng _ elpesinite u luta _ . _ qiive ma ni lusi llu _ unguva lghii mun _ kiyaghnegh pig mun _ qepghagh te na luku _ , _ pegte luki _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ .
Utaq aaq agh si llu nguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ Jesus _ , _ tagi yaghqagh _ qilag meng _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tekaa _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ yuguligh u iqe ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ kaate yaghqagh meng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ elpesi nun _ pi llegh ut _ temng ingun ghit kaaguq _ .
iwernga _ sivugh nghaani _ elpesi nun _ pilleg mta _ , _ liisimakagh i _ philippi- mi _ ikfiq liigh testek aqiin kutlu _ seghlequ uq aqiin kutlu _ . _ tea- magh an llu ta _ qaywa _ uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ aghula i aghte naqutke ghngainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutu stekaqe ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ ungipaate yaghtugh amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ ipa u uq _ . _ iqlengiqe u nghite ukut _ elpesi nun _ , _ seghlegh meng _ piyuke ke ii te ukut _ elpesi nun _ , _ puughhe naqutke igate amsi _ .
yeghlegi _ , _ ungipagh kaqe aput _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ itagnaq luta _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ whangkunnun _ . _ akuzillegh mteggun _ efqugh hnaq ut keng ngun ghit aput _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ efqugh suk aghput _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ , _ nanqigte i nga lghii _ ilu mta _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng _ .
liisimakagh i _ us uqu ugh sagh tuun ghi tamsi _ nalighmeng _ sakenge vike yaghtugh u nghite amsi _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekagh ut _ .
Usuq es aayug teng ngunghi tukut _ yug neng _ , _ elpesi neng _ , _ nalighmeng _ kinku neng _ .
Apostle- ngu tem nneng _ Christ-amun _ , _ tungsigh niigh vike yaghqaqe yagh amsi _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ iwernga _ elpesi nite luta _ yakumangighlliqe tke mangite amsi _ , _ yeghlegi _ mamaghti kayug stun _ naa stun _ aflengake i lghii stun _ taghnughhagh meggneng _ ayuqe kau ukut _ .
piniqe pigte amsi _ , _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sug aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh i _ . _ pinigh lghii inagh t _ ungipagh t _ pi gpenaki _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ kayusigh yug lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ , _ qayughllak _ piniq sal iitk aqamsi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ neqamik aghsi _ naten _ angka an _ qepghagh llegh ut llu _ ughleghiigh llegh ut llu _ ! _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ qayughllak _ elpesi nun _ uqig tuqut ngu y unghil nguukut _ ; _ elpesinite ma luta _ ungipagh ke i kau ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
elpek si llu _ kiyaghnegh llu _ liisimak istek amsi _ . _ elpesi ni _ ugpeqagh ni _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ pelungite luta _ , _ ipapighqell uta _ , _ anaggutell ngun aamta _ .
liisimakagh i _ katam _ ata m _ aflengake i llegh atun _ taghnughhagh mineng _ , _ whangkuta llu _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ tawaten _ katam _ aflengake kaqe amsi _ . _ kayeme kaqe amsi _ , _ ilutughsagh kaqe amsi _ , _ qelegh te aatagh qaghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ atuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ efqugh nagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mi _ . _ Tuq lu ung w iisi _ ila tesqellusi _ ellmi _ katam _ ataneghpag u llegh minun llu _ pinighnagh llegh ghllag minun llu _ .
Iyamsi qayug v iku mangin aangwaagh putlu _ kiyaghnegh _ una _ apallugh ke luku _ : _ whangkunneng _ nagaqugh luku _ tugukligh aghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ . _ elpek si _ tugukligh aghsi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ungipagh u luku _ , _ nakaan _ yug neng _ ungipagh u luku _ . _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh pig aa _ qepghagh lghii _ elpesi ni _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ elpek si _ tawatete usi _ ugpeq isteng istun _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig itni _ kiyaghnegh m _ Judea- mi _ . _ nunalgute gpesi _ ikfiqe stekaqe aisi _ katam _ Jews-et _ ikfiq es tell ghistun _ ugpeqagh t _ Judea- mi _ .
Jews- nguut _ tuqute ikagh t _ atanegh meng _ Jesus-meng _ , _ uuknaliq ist en engllu _ , _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe ainkut llu _ . _ E f qughh neghit aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kipullgin aagh uut lu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ 
aghula i aghte naqutke llegh megteggun _ ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ Gentile-enun _ yuguligh lleg nge na yu kata _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ ila manginagh ait _ seghleghqe lleg teng _ enkaam _ qenwat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ugumi yagute ghllag luki _ qantaghaqun _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ amyuqetaatk is tem ta _ aghulaqe ste aqe yamikut _ Th es sal onic a-meng _ , _ pellegh utu te ste aghte ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ sumeghmike aqe amsi _ . _ esghagh yug pigte aqe yagh amsi _ gginasaghqugh lusi _ 
enkaam _ taku naqute kaqsagh amsi _ . _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ taku naqutke aatagh aqe yagh amsi _ iwernga _ tughneghagh m _ amig igh aghte aqe ainkut _ .
elpek si _ sighima llegh ke amsi _ , _ quya sigh ke amsi _ , _ qaghpa ke amsi llu _ . _ taana _ qaghpa _ whangkuta _ quk aa yugusi qelleq aghput _ manu ani _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ tagi kan _ .
ipapestaaq _ elpek si _ qukaayug sigh ke amsi llu _ quya sigh ke amsi llu _ !
iwernga _ esghaa tu sig atu tem nneng _ qavngaghhaaneng _ pellegh ngatu te llegh ut _ nuqe tu te pagning ii taghput _ . _ enkaam _ agghi te kau ukut _ whanga _ ellnginagh ma _ athens- mete na lunga _ ,
kayagtek aqagh p ung llu _ Timoth y _ elpesi nun _ . _ ugpeqagh u lgutekagh ung _ , _ qep g algu sigh aqiin kung _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ungipagh ke i lgusigh aqe ainkung _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii neng _ . _ Kayag tek aqagh pung _ iknaqugh sagh yagh tiis qelluki _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ , _ kayem esqell usillu _ ,
qayughllak _ iilqayug sug nghite kemsi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesineng _ seghleliigh lleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ . _ iwernga _ liisimakagh i _ ugpeqagh ni _ whangkuta _ seghleliigh yaghqaa ukut _ .
elpesi nite luta _ ungipaate u aqe aqe amsi _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge lleqe ni luta _ ; _ enkaam _ liisimakagh i _ taawa _ ipa _ ikfiq utk egkaq aghput _ amyuqetagh tke llegh _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghtugh yagute yama _ nuqete nghmeng _ , _ kayagtekaqe aqa _ Timoth y _ elpesi nun _ liigike na luku _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ natete aqe ta a _ . _ pengke aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqu ma na yu kangisi _ ugpeq in an iis qellusi _ , _ enkaam _ qepghagh llegh ut _ teme isug nighsi ma na yu kan _ .
iwernga _ Timoth y- m _ uteghnigh luni _ ungipaate ainkung _ quyanagh lghii meng _ ungipagh meng _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesineng llu _ piniqe llegh gpesineng llu _ . _ ungipaate aqe ainkung llu _ iiwleng _ neqamike aqe ni lutung _ pinitun _ , _ esghagh yug aqe ni lutung llu _ katam _ whangkutung _ esghagh y ull em tes teg etun _ elpek si _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ seghleliigh ghllag ma luta _ , _ ikfiqe ghllag ma luta _ ilutughte ukut _ qayughllak _ nagnegh te u kesi _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ .
whaa _ aneghte aghagh ukut _ qayughllak _ aghul iil kaal ghii si _ atanegh kun _ .
enkaam _ iyamsiqayugvik ngwaagh put _ kiyaghnegh _ elpesi neng _ . _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ quya ghllagu ukut _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mta _ .
Taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ yugh aat keng ngw aam si _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ alla _ esghagh yaghqaa lusi _ , _ ila yaghqaa luki _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ aklukegk iit _ .
kiyaghnegh mta _ , _ ata m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus-em _ qantaghaqun _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghqaaghte ste likut _ !
Atanghem _ , _ piniq sal ii tu tes tagh aghl isi _ . _ piniqe llegh i llu _ tevugha ste ligu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ katam _ whangkuta _ piniqe lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
tawaten _ ayepsugighsagh lleqe ai _ ilu si _ av utng i tesqell usillu _ pelung i tesqell usillu _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mta _ ata m _ , _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ tagi llegh ani _ . _ tawani _ kelqe lleqe ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ ellmi _ yug ni _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ alaghrang _ whaten _ pi naqe amsi _ , _ liit iv ik egkaq aghpe kut _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ efqugh nagh lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ esgha _ tawaten _ kiyaghte lghiisi _ . _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ kayeme amsi _ wataqaaghaq _ tawaten _ pis qellusi _ .
liisima kasi _ sa u aat _ qelegh tke aput _ elpesi nun _ pisqelluki _ atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ .
whatete uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ elpesi nun _ : _ pelungite sug aisi _ seghleghqe ste sug nghite aisi _ atuqe te llegh kun _ .
liite sug aisi llu _ tam aghagh pesi _ nuqe tu tesqelluki _ yugusigh si _ pinigh llegh mun _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lleqe usi _ pelungite lusi _ , _ efqugh nagh lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ .
ilapga te gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ atuqe i yu llegh anun _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ pill ghistun _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ sakusiiqe fqaan _ pi ligu _ ugpeqaalgut mi _ inglu a _ atuqe i llegh mun _ . _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh ghllag lleqe ai _ tawaten _ pikayug t _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ kelenga sagh u ghllag kaqe amsi _ tamaaken _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ kiyagh tesqelluta _ pelungite luta _ , _ seghleghqell ngun aamta _ .
Enkaangam _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ qaatke nghite kanga _ nakaan _ yuug _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuun iste z i _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ lata nghite yagh ghngaaghmisi _ ayuqe aisi _ ungipaate na lusi _ piniq esqelluki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh kaqe aisi _ piniqu tesqellusi _ .
ipa u uq _ piniqe asi _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ Macedonia- mi _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqaalgutem nni _ , _ qelegh amsi _ piniq utagh iis qellusi _ .
Pin aq ell ghagh si _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghte tek _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ , _ elpek si _ sa yaghqagh si _ pi aqe teki _ , _ avelghagh luki _ ila gpesi _ sa yaghqagh it _ . _ qepghagh tek _ allgegh te yaghqaa lusi _ aklukegk agh pesineng _ katam _ whangkuta _ qelegh lleg mtestun _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ neghyuke naanghite asi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ aklukegk agh pesinun _ , _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t llu _ sii vag kete lleqe aisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ liisimake sug amsi _ ugpeqagh neng _ qavagh lghii neng _ qivghuke fqiita _ pisqelluki _ sighim all ghil ngughestun _ .
ugpeqagh ut _ Jesus _ tuqu luni _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi lleqe ai _ Jesus-kun _ tamaakut _ qavagh ke aat _ ugpeqe i luteng _ ellnga neng _ .
Ungipaat ngwaagh amsi _ Atanghem _ apeghtugh tekagh aneng _ . _ atanegh _ tagi kan _ , _ whangkuta _ paninang _ unguva lghii ni _ ing yagh aghnaanghi t aput _ tamaakut _ qavagh ke aat _ .
atanegh _ ellnga _ katam _ qilag meng _ ukig lleqe uq _ , _ yug t _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ iglagtuqagh _ qelegh llegh _ , _ me a _ ar ch ang el -em _ , _ qalghightaute anga llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i luteng _ Christ-ameng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ unguvagh yuggaagh lleqe ut _ .
taagken _ whangkuta _ unguva lghii ni _ unegtekagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te ste luta _ , _ ellngit nun _ , _ ghhatagh aghtagh te ste lleqe ainkut _ qilag waagh nun _ payegh sqellug qu _ atanegh _ esla mi _ . _ enkaam _ atanegh mete lleqe ukut _ quunperugllag _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilutughsagh sigh ke aqe teki _ taakut _ akuzite t _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ elpesi nun _ lata te kete niite ut _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
qayughllak _ elpek si _ liisimakngwaagh aghsi _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ waakenghillghaghte te luni _ tagi llegh atun _ tegleg niigh tem _ unugmi _ .
yug t _ whaten _ pi ma luki _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut llu _ paqniite ukut llu _ , _ " _ naafqe llegh m _ kaate qagh lleqe ai _ katam _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu llegh an _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ . _ yug t _ anag naanghite aat _ taana _ naafqe llegh _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ ugpeqaalgutem nni _ , _ mamleg ghllag mete nghite usi _ enkaam _ aghnegh an _ aghnegh m _ waakenghillghaghte naanghite aisi _ teg legh niigh te tun _ .
qamagte lusi _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ nighug m _ , _ avaqutagh ke aisi llu _ aghnegh m _ . _ Unug em _ pike nghite ainkut _ nalighmeng _ mamleg ghllag m _ .
enkaam _ qavaa fqaamta _ pi lta _ ilang istun _ , _ itupill _ tegh u ma lta _ , _ liisima luta _ .
tamaakut _ qavagh lghiit _ qavagh aqe ut _ unugmi _ , _ tamaakut _ meghe lghiit _ suume aqe ut _ unugmi _ .
iwernga _ Atanghem _ pi ke ainkut _ enkaam _ liisima luta _ kiyaghte lta _ . _ P aq niigh saa si llegh qam nnun _ sakimag mteggun _ aate lteggu _ sighima llegh _ yuguligh llegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke nghite a _ ikfiq esqell uta _ sakraa llegh meng _ , _ iwernga _ yuguligh lleg nge sug ainkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Jesus-em _ tuquma tke kaqe ainkut _ ell min i tesqelluta _ unguva yagh ghngaamta _ , _ tuqu kaayagh ghngaamta _ tagi kuni _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ kayemughtu te aqe tek llu _ kayute ke te aqe tek llu _ whaa _ maaten _ pi llegh gpesistun _ .
