Jos h u a-m _ maghyaghqugh llghite ai _ yug t _ tawavek _ meghnaali vig mun _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ qayughllak _ taam _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ ila a _ aghnegh a _ meghnaali llegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ taawa _ Sabbath -a _ aghula i tuq _ , _ meghnaali vig _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ itegh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ , _ meghnaali lleqe uq _ qepghaqagh mineng _ katam _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali llegh atun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ itegh naqe ghllag lta _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ qaatke nghite fqaan _ pi lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ sivunegh mta _ pill ghistun _ .
akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguva ut _ qepghagh u ut _ . _ ipeg aghagh ut _ alngunak _ inglugtun _ ipegsaghkagh neng _ savigpag neng _ . _ kaapute kayugu ut _ qam av erugllak _ unguva sigh m llu _ taghneghagh m llu _ kaat ute nga llegh gkenun _ , _ naflugh t llu _ pategh t llu _ kaat ute nga llegh itnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ nanqigte i kayugu ut _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng llu _ sa naqe llegh aneng llu _ .
sa u a _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh a _ iigh nga nghite uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ aliite ut _ , _ wh ategh llu waagh uut lu _ iye gkeni _ . _ ellnga nun _ qayvighqesaghqagh ke aput _ salleg put _ qamagte luki _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ High _ Priest- eleg llag uukut _ qilag mun _ mat- yuqagh meng _ . _ Jesus- nguuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh mete kestagh lta _ apeghkagh mnni _ yug nun _ .
High _ Priest- emta _ liigike u aqe aqe ai _ kayaaghlliqe sigh put _ , _ qayughllak _ nuna mete luni _ nanghiiqu lleg nge kau uq _ whangku tes tung waaq _ . _ naqamllu _ seghleghqe mangite uq _ .
enkaam _ te tull ngun aamta _ aglagh lta _ umiileg u sigh gnun _ aqumutagh gkenun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ allgegh us egh q aaluta _ nangllegtagh llegh anun _ . _ tawani _ nanglleg ke lleqe ainkut _ , _ kayusigh lleqe ainkut llu _ aklu ke igh lleg mnni _ .
tamaghhagh an _ high _ priest- a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ yug lgu ta aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aglagh aqe uq _ yug t _ apallugh ke luki _ tuun aluki _ tunusagh it _ aghqerragh u aghte te na luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ .
High _ priest- a _ kayaaghlliqe kayugu te mineng _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa uq _ tamaakunun _ nalluke lghii nun llu _ ugpeqe i nanigh lghii nun llu _ ipapi llegh mun _ .
qayughllak _ kayaaghlliqe kayugu te mineng _ , _ high _ priest- a _ aghqer raagh yaghqaaguq _ ellmi _ katam _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ seghleghqe llegh itnun llu _ yug t _ .
kina _ alngunak _ nakmike igate uq _ ellmi neng _ high _ priest- ngugh h naluni _ quulvagh yaghq aaluni _ . _ iwernga _ yuug _ high _ priest- ngughte aqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmik engh atni _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ nakmike llegh atun _ aaron _ .
tawaten llu _ Christ-a _ quulv all ghituq _ ellmi neng _ nakmike luni _ high _ priest- ngughte llegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ . _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ ; _ aghneghmi _ whani _ A tal ii tagh pe nga _ . _ "
nalighnegh itni _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ priest- nge te lleqe uten _ quunperugllag _ , _ Melchized ek -em _ priest- ngu llgh atun _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elgu uq _ yugul iyagh qaa luku _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ Jesus _ nuna mete u luni _ , _ iglagtu luni _ qunituumagh mi _ yughagh kau lghii llu _ tungsigh kau lghii llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ yugul is qelluni _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagate kaqe ai _ yughagh llegh i _ , _ qayughllak _ qusevegte luni _ qaatkekagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ .
qaywa _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke ghngaatni _ , _ paninang _ liite kau uq _ qaatke te ma llegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh mikun _ .
apeghiigh yagu _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh a _ , _ Jesus- ngugh tuq _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ yuguligh lleg nge ste i yaghqagh _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ ellmi nun _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ high _ priest- nguluku _ , _ Melchized ek -em _ high _ priest- ngu llgh atun _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u ukut _ tamaakuneng _ . _ iwernga _ apeghtugh neghllug pigte usi _ tamaakuneng _ qayughllak _ liigik aghagh sigal nguusi _ .
neghigh pigte lusi _ ugpeqagh u lghiisi _ enkaam _ apeghtugh i yaghqaaghtekau usi _ ila gpesinun _ . _ yeghlegi _ paninang _ aklu aqe usi _ kitumun _ apegh tun qig tesqellusi _ ugpegh nghhagh t _ liite yuwhaagh yaghqagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ katam _ taghnughh aghhagh estun _ mamaghtugh yug aqe usi _ , _ neqe pig yug gpenasi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ mamaghtuqagh yu k _ paninang _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u uq _ . _ salin _ nalluke a _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ anaggute nga llegh llu _ .
iwernga _ neqe pig _ ang tan iitk anun _ pi u uq _ . _ peghqigsagh kau ut _ liigike yaghqaa lukek _ pinigh lghii nkuk _ , _ seghlegh nkuk _ .
enkaam _ liite lteki _ apeghtuusagh t _ ang tan iitk anun _ ugpeqagh nun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ liite u aqe aqe asi _ apeghtugh te yuwhaagh ke aat _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ enkaangam _ l iin neqig saghqaq enghit asi _ . _ L iit ngwaagh um aasi _ atuqe yaghqaa fqiita _ pi na luki _ tamaakut _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ L iin neqig saghqaq enghi tagh sillu _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ kiyaghnegh kun _ ,
paaptaaye llegh neng _ , _ iig t illegh neng _ , _ unguv aght illegh neng _ tuqukagh neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh aneng _ yug neng _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ kenle u na an _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi stegkanginkut _ , _ apeghtugh lleqe amsi _ ang tan ii tesqellusi _ ugpeqagh t _ .
tamaa _ ila aneng _ yug lgu uq _ allgegh te kaayagh lghii neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighug aneng _ , _ naasiigh kaqe aat llu _ qilag m _ tunusagh a _ . _ allgegh te kau ut llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ nanghiigh kaqe ait _ pinightu langi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ nanghiigh kaqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ nuna kaghqagh mete ngughk _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqe nanigh kumegteggu _ Christ-a _ , _ avuteghqe nqigtepagningite te lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaquuragh nqigtegkangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ kayngu s aak egk ang atlu _ yugtuqagh mi _ .
nuna _ megh aqe uq _ eslallug ugh n neghani _ , _ piite ta iqe uq llu _ nunivagseghagh meng _ atughqagh meng _ tamaakunun _ pek sigh qik anun _ nuna meng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighqe sta qaa _ nuna _ .
iwernga _ nuna _ piite ste i ma kuni _ sikughllug neng llu _ we ed s- nengllu _ sea-te u nghite uq _ . _ yakugh nagh anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghu ni lleghqagh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ paneghte yaghqaa uq _ .
piniqekagh mnni _ , _ qaywa _ elpesi nun _ lata tke ghngaamteki _ tamaakut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke igate amsi _ tawatete lusi _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ yuguligh llegh gpesigun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ elqughute nga an _ nanqigte i aqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ puygu naanghite a _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ , _ piniqe i llegh i llu _ ellmi nun _ kayusiite llegh gpesigun _ yug i _ . _ neqamike lleqe a llu _ paninang _ kayusiite u kesi _ .
nagnegh sug amsi _ sagiqe lusi _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale atun _ . _ enkaam _ allgegh tep estaagh lleqaghsi _ sighimakekagh i _ .
ighsanitagh lghii ughte sug nghite amsi _ . _ yeghlegi _ tamaaku stun _ ayuqe ste sug amsi _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ , _ nuqe tut illegh meg teggunllu _ allgegh te yaghqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe aqe yamigu _ abraham _ , _ akeqe kaqe a _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku _ . _ ava ite u ta aneng _ aange aghagh lghii meng _ ellmi neng _ , _ atuqe luku _ ellmi _ katam _ ategh ni _ akeqe i kau uq _ .
abraham _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ quya ste pestaagh luten _ , _ uglagh u pigte luku _ kingun el illeq amken _ . _ "
abraham _ qelanegh gpenani _ utaqa i kau uq _ , _ enkaam _ allgegh tekaqaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ .
kitum _ neklegsugh nghminigu _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh _ , _ akeqe i aqe uq _ sa meng _ pilleg ni _ ipa u ni luku _ atuqe luku _ kitum _ ategh a _ ellmi neng _ aange aghagh lghii m _ .
allgegh te yaghqagh t _ akequsagh mineng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigikes tes ugw ii _ all aa ngugh saghqaq enghit ngwaagh niluki _ agghi lleg ni _ . _ enkaam _ akeqe i kau uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ kayeme ainkut _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqe igate uq _ akeqe i nghmini _ , _ iqlengiqe naanghite uq llu _ akeqe i kuni _ atuqe luku _ ategh ni _ ipapigh qen naluku _ pi yaghqaqe te ni _ . _ taake uk _ allangughte qaghte naanghite uk _ . _ whangkuta _ anagniighkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ paqniite na luta _ , _ kayeme lleg nge ghllag ukut _ sighimake na luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ .
taana _ sighima llegh _ uyghiite u uq _ unguva sigh mnnun _ , _ paqna nagh igh te ste ainkut llu _ ayepsugite ste ainkut llu _ . _ taana _ sighima llegh _ itegh uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ safkaaghute m _ aw atang anil ngugh mun _ .
tawavek _ Jesus _ itegh kau uq _ sivu mnni _ whangkuta _ apallugh ke luta _ . _ High _ priest- ngughte kau uq _ quunp er ug llagmun _ , _ Melchized ek -em _ priest- nge ma llegh atun _ .
taana _ melchizedek _ umiileg kesagh aa _ Sal em -em _ , _ priest- e kaa llu _ Qul igh pig aam _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ abraham _ uteghnigh ma luku _ pilluw ameng _ kayaal qugh luki _ umiileg t _ , _ Melchized ek -em _ nallagh luku _ quya stekaqe a _ .
taagken _ Abraham-em _ tuunekagh a _ qu lagh qellgh aneng _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ tugukagh mineng _ pilluw ami _ . _ Melchized ek -em _ ategh a _ maalghug gneng _ sa meng _ pi sigh lgu uq _ , _ sivuligh _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ umiileg a _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ . _ " _ umiileg ke kau ta aneng _ Sal em -em _ , _ ategh an _ aag llegh a _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ umiileg a _ nekeggmellegh m _ . _ "
igagh ite uq _ igaqe vikekagh meng _ Melchized ek -em _ ata aneng llu _ naa aneng llu _ nalighmeng _ sivun gh aneng _ , _ talwa _ allgellegh aneng llu _ tuqu llegh aneng llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighneghagh tun _ aghula i tuq _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ quunperugllag _ .
taawa _ liigikagh i _ Melchized ek -em _ aange ma llegh ghllag a _ . _ talwa _ sivun eq suwh aamta _ Abraham-em _ tuunekagh a _ melchizedek _ qu lagh qellgh aneng _ tugulaghkagh mineng _ pilluw ami _ .
Priest- et _ kingunegh ke ai _ Lev i -em _ . _ liilightuusagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelqe aqe ai _ priest-et _ qerngught is qelluki _ yug lgu ta itneng _ qu lagh qellegh meng _ allgegh tek iitneng _ . _ Priest- et _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ priest-etlu _ yug t llu _ Abraham-em _ kingunegh ke ghngaisteng _ .
melchizedek _ kingunegh ke nghite a _ Lev i -em _ , _ iwernga _ tugukligh kaqe a _ qu lagh qell eq _ Abraham-em _ tuune yagu _ . _ quya stekaqe a llu _ abraham _ , _ allgegh te kau lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ .
Nall un eq nii tuq _ taana _ quya ste i lghii _ aange aghagh uq _ taagken _ quya stekagh meng _ .
Priest- et _ yugu ut _ tuqu kayug t _ naqamllu _ allgegh te kau ut _ qu lagh qellegh meng _ . _ Melchized ek -llu _ allgegh te kau uq _ qu lagh qellegh meng _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ , _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ ap ell ghistun _ .
levi _ allgegh te kau uq _ yug neng _ qu lagh qellegh meng _ . _ pi na yalghiikut _ talwa _ ellnga llu _ llivike i kau uq _ qu lagh qellegh meng _ Melchized ek -mun _ Abraham -kun _ .
qaywa _ levi _ allgegh llghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ sivunegh mi _ Abraham-em _ yugusigh u ni te kau uq _ Melchized ek -em _ nallagh aqe yagu _ abraham _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ priest-et _ kingunegh kesaghqagh ke ai _ Lev i -em _ . _ ellngit a _ liilightuusagh t _ apeghtugh te kaqe ait _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ qepghaqagh at _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nuughhute kau uq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ aklu kau ut _ priest- meng _ Melchized ek -etun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ , _ A ar on -etun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ .
Lev it e _ priest-et _ simigh nghmegteki _ alla neng _ priest- eneng _ , _ taawa _ liilightuusagh t llu _ allangughte yaghqaa ut _ .
Priest- et _ quunpeng _ Lev i -em _ ramke aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ iwernga _ atanegh ut _ ramke aneng _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ atanegh mta _ ramke aneng _ pi _ qepghagh igate u aghte uq _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ aghqefig gni _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ liisimake aat _ atanegh ut _ allgegh kau uq _ ramke anun _ Jud ah-m _ . _ Moses-em _ pi mangite ai _ king ungh i _ Jud ah-m _ priest- ngu yaghq aan iluki _ .
enkaam _ tamaakut _ liigike aghagh aput _ wh a teg lluwaaq _ qayughllak _ ila a _ p riest-em _ Melchized ek -etun _ ayuqe lghii _ tagi ma uq _ .
liilightuusagh t _ qelegh te kaqe aat _ priest- a _ kingunegh kesaghqagh ke ni luku _ levi- mun _ . _ atanegh ut _ priest- ngughte kau nghite uq _ liilightuusagh t _ pi sqe llegh itgun _ , _ iwernga _ priest- ngughte kau uq _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh qun _ unguvallegh mikun _ kenlet ghu usaghq aanghil ngugh qun _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau lghiit _ , _ " _ priest- nge te te n _ quunperugllag _ , _ Melchized ek -em _ priest- ngu llgh atun _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ simigh kaqe a _ liilightuusagh _ priest- eneng _ ayuqe lghii _ qayughllak _ kayaal ngu qlu _ atugh u nghite ngughk llu _ .
liilightuusagh t _ kina _ alngunak _ pis te simangit aa _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma ainkut _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ taaggun _ sighima llegh kun _ aglagh yaghqaaghte ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Taam _ sighima llegh m _ saaghw akun _ kiyaghnegh _ allangughte naagh nghite ngugh meng _ akeqe i ma uq _ .
iwernga _ tawatel ngughmeng _ akeqe i llghite uq _ Lev i -em _ king ungh i _ priest- ngughte aqngata _ . _ Jesus- ngin aghmun _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ akeqe i ma uq _ , _ allangughte naanghite ak llu _ umyugagh gni _ ; _ ' _ elpek _ priest- nge te te n _ quunperugllag _ . _ ' _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus- nguuq _ ipapighqell eq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ni _ pi pestaagh lleqe a _ . _ taana _ akequsagh _ pinigh aghagh uq _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ Moses -kun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ priest- e tu yaghtuq _ . _ tuqu nghata _ ila ita _ priest-et _ nagnegh te aqe aat _ qepghaqagh at _ .
iwernga _ Jesus _ priest- nguuq _ quunperugllag _ qayughllak _ unguva lleqe uq _ quunpeng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus-em _ iiwleng _ yugul iyaq leg w ii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aglagh lghiit _ ellmi kun _ , _ qayughllak _ quunpeng _ unguva u uq _ manigugh utu tete na luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Jesus _ High _ Priest- nguuq _ tuune i kayug _ sa meng _ akluk egkam nneng _ . _ agleghnagh uq _ , _ avute ite uq _ , _ pelungite uq _ , _ aaf tengng aaq _ seghleghq est eneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ quulv aq aqaa _ qu lighpig aghmun _ qilag mun _ .
Jesus _ ilang istun _ high _ priest- estun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ high _ priest- a _ aghqer raagh yaghqaaguq _ , _ sivuke luni _ ellmi _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ taagken _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ . _ Jesus _ tuune aqngami _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ yug t _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ yug t _ nakmiigh yaghqaa ni luki _ high _ priest- ek aghqameng _ seghleghqe kayugu ghngaan _ alngunak _ yug stun _ . _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh an _ liilightuusagh t _ Moses -mun _ , _ tagtalmi _ taakwani _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ akeqe i kau uq _ . _ taaggun _ akeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ni _ High _ priest- ngughte stekaqe a _ , _ afkuyagh ngunaan _ , _ quunperugllag _ .
apeghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ : _ tawatel ngughmeng _ high _ priest- elg uukut _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh ani _ saaghw akun _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi tellegh pig aam _ qilag mi _ .
qepghagh te i u uq _ high _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ san c tu ar y -mi _ . _ taana _ tab ern ac le- epig uuq _ Atanghem _ nekeftekaqe a _ , _ yug m _ nekeftekaqe nghite a _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ high _ priest- a _ nakmike kau uq _ tuune i sqellug qu _ tunusagh neng _ , _ teghig ke sagh neng llu _ aghqer raagh esqelluku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ High _ priest- ev utlu _ sa meng _ tuune yaghqagh lgu yaghqaa uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Jesus _ nuna mete yagh kuni _ priest- ngun ay an ghituq _ , _ qayughllak _ priest- elgu uq _ nuna mi _ tuune i kayug neng _ tunusagh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqell ghistun _ .
Priest- et _ qepghaqagh u ut _ san c tu ar y -mi _ , _ qilagmel ngugh tun _ ayuq esug nil ngugh mi _ . _ salin _ Moses-em _ tab ern ac le- a _ nekefte llghite luku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ apaqu te kaqe a _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ ulima naken _ tawatengwaaq _ uspeqe lleg mtun _ kelgutekagh mtun _ elpenun _ naayghagh mi _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus _ qepghaq al itk aqaa _ priest- nguluku _ . _ qepghaqagh a _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ Lev ite -et _ priest-et _ qepghagh llegh itneng _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pinigh aghagh lghii u uq _ akequsagh lug meng _ qayughllak _ taaggun _ Jesus-em _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh llu _ yug t llu _ . _ pinigh aghagh uq _ qayughllak _ tunemagh ite nga uq _ akequsagh tgun _ pinigh aghagh lghii tgun _ .
sivuligh _ akequsagh _ afkuyagh ite yagh kan _ , _ taawa _ tuungligh ite nayagh uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ afkuyagh lgu ni kaqe ai _ yug ni _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ aghnegh t _ kaate lleqe ut _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ , _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pi lleqe aqa _ Israel-eghm iin unllu _ Jud ah- gh m iin unllu _ .
akeqe te yagh ragh aqa _ tawatete naanghite uq _ akequsagh kekagh mtun _ sivun ghitnun _ tas luq luki _ aghulaqe te aqe yamki _ Egypt- meng _ . _ qaatke te mangite ut _ akequsagh ma _ pi sqe llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ avelghaqiinagh kaqe anka _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ .
aghnegh t _ taakut _ kingu itneng _ una _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pi lleqe aqa _ Israel-eghm iinun _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ : _ liilightuusagh nka _ umyugagh itnun _ kanagh lleqe anka _ , _ igaqe lleqe anka llu _ qamagun _ ilu itgun _ . _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ , _ ellngit _ yug ke lleqe anka _ .
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ apeghtugh yaghqaqe nghite a _ nunalgute ni _ , _ nalighmeng _ nengllugute ni _ liite sqellug qu _ atanegh _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ liisimake lleqe aatnga _ , _ uk aligh pig aghh aghneng _ pingwaagh ghllag nun _ .
seghevute lleqe anka _ anaggute llegh it _ , _ allameng llu _ neqamike naanghite anka _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kaqe yamigu _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ , _ sivuligh _ akequsagh _ atugh u nanigh stekaqe a _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ alngunak _ atugh u nanigh luni _ aghyugh luni _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute lleqe uq _ .
akequsagh ke yuwhaagh mini _ kiyaghnegh m _ igaqe kaqe ai _ qelegh sagh t _ naten _ maniguute lleghqagh meng _ ellmi nun _ , _ naten llu _ nekefte lleghqagh a _ san c tu ar y _ nuna mi _ .
taana _ san c tu ar y _ yug t _ ulimakagh at _ tiinta u uq _ maalghug gneng _ ne leg _ . _ sivuligh m _ ne m _ ategh ke a _ agleghnagh lghii _ na _ . _ ilu nga ni te ut _ kenelghutag lghutagh k _ , _ tipele k _ neqekrangllagh leg k _ tuunekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
awalighnegh ani _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ safkaaghute m _ ila a _ ne m _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh _ na _ .
ilu ani _ taawa _ gold - ek _ aghqefig k _ panegh regh aasi k _ in c en s e- mun _ . _ taawa llu _ salngag k _ qaspeghagh iqe ak _ gold-meng _ , _ ategh kek _ ark- ek _ , _ neqangugh sighqagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh anun _ . _ Ar k -em _ imaqe ai _ gold - ek _ aqimleghutagh k _ manna- meng _ imaleg k _ , _ A ar on-em _ ayaviigh a _ piitqughvikekagh _ , _ maalghug llu _ lliivneqegtagh k _ uyghag k _ igaqugh vike nga lghiik _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh aneng _ .
qule ani _ ar k -em _ taawa _ gold - ek _ ch er u b im - ek _ , _ yaq ghw ik _ taghneghagh nge te lghiik _ m er c y _ se at -kun _ . _ iwernga _ uumi _ pi llegh mi _ akuzi tkepagningite aput _ tamaakut _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ tiinta nite ngughk _ apeghiigh luku _ , _ taagken _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ priest-et _ itegh aqe ut _ sivuligh mun _ ne mun _ qepghagh na luteng _ .
iwernga _ high _ priest- ngin aghhaq _ itegh yaghqaa uq _ tuungligh ghhagh anun _ ne anun _ tiinta m _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ayumiqullegh mi _ . _ itegh nghmini _ tawavek _ ne mun _ iiwleng _ kelqesaghqagh u uq _ aaw aneng _ aghqe tkekagh m _ teghig ke sagh m _ . _ tuune i aqe uq _ aaw meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ellmi _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ yug t llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ . _ taana _ aaw k _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ pi u uq _ nalluke luteng _ pi ke ii te nun _ .
Tamaa kutgun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liigike ste ainkut _ iteghvig _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ salin _ qelpeghte igate ngughk _ tab ern ac le- a _ atuqe u luku _ .
taakut _ usputagh u ut _ maa te mun _ . _ liigike ste ainkut _ tunusagh t llu _ aghqe tkekagh t llu _ teghig ke sagh t _ nallghusaghpagningite aat _ maniguut istem _ sumeghnegh a _ .
tamaakut _ tunusagh t llu _ aghqe te t llu _ atuqe kau ut _ qaatkesaghqagh u luki _ qelegh sagh t _ negh ke neng llu _ , _ meghyaghqagh neng llu _ , _ pelungighsagh lleghqagh neng llu _ yugusigh itneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ tamaakut _ qelegh sagh t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh mun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ qaatkesaghqagh u ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe te yagh ragh aa _ atugh ughte llegh anun _ .
Christ-a _ tagi aqngami _ High _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ , _ tagite kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ pinigh lghiit _ quya ste i llegh t _ whaa _ maaten _ whaan lenguut _ . _ itegh kaqe a _ tab ern ac le- a _ qilag mete ngughk _ , _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii llu _ pinigh aghagh lghii llu _ nunamel ngughmeng _ tab ern ac le- meng _ . _ qilag mete ngughk _ tab ern ac le- a _ yug t _ ulima aqe nghite aat _ enkaam _ nuna m _ pike nghite a _ .
taagken _ Christ-a _ itegh kau uq _ ataasigh meng _ quunperugllag _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ iteme te na luta _ kenle u na an _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuune llegh mikun _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw ni _ , _ atugh gpenaki _ aaw it _ g o at -etlu _ , _ kaa wagh aatlu _ .
legh iightugh sagh t _ qelqe aqe ait _ priest- enun _ siv i llag tiis qelluki _ yug t _ aaw itneng _ g o at -et _ , _ b ull -et _ , _ panellegh aneng llu _ kaa wagh aam _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ pelungighsagh na luki _ yug t _ yugusigh at _ tugukligh yug nagh tesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tamaakut _ pelung ighi yaqleg uk ata _ yug t _ yugusigh itneng _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ aaw an _ wata _ pi lleqe ai _ . _ pelungigh lleqe ai _ umyugagh si _ sea-te u nghite ngugh neng _ ugpeqe i llegh neng _ elpesi nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ unguva lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Ken leng il nguug nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ Christ-a _ seghleghqe llghite ngughk _ , _ tuune kau uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqe te u luni _ .
enkaam _ Christ-am _ tagite kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe te yagh ragh aa _ yug nun _ tuqlughkagh anun _ . _ Christ-a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ allgegh tesqelluku _ kenle ite ngughk _ pagite aq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ allgegh lleqe ait _ pagitagh t _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe kangi _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ kiyaghtekagh t _ akequsagh ke yuwhaagh mi _ , _ iteme ma ut _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ .
igagh kun _ yug m _ igaqugh lleqe ai _ saghya ni _ kitumun _ pagite yaghqaa ni luki _ tuqu kuni _ . _ pagite i yaghqagh m _ allgegh h naanghi tii _ pagite yaghqagh ni _ wetku _ kitum _ ipapigh qegk agu _ yuug _ tuquma ta a _ .
Taam _ yug m _ igaqugh qu ai _ pit ngun aanghitut _ salin _ kiyaghteng nguluku _ . _ igaqugh qu ai _ pit ngugh llequt _ kingu aneng _ tuqu kan _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ talwa _ akequsagh ke yuwhaagh _ pit ngu mang ituq _ aaw ngunani _ .
Moses-em _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ qamagte luki _ qelegh sagh t _ L iigh tuus anilnguut _ . _ taagken _ kaa wagh aatlu _ , _ g o at -etlu _ aaw itneng _ tugu tete luni _ megh meng _ akumekagh a _ . _ tugu tete luni _ kavilngugh meng _ w o ol -meng _ , _ avayagh aneng llu _ h y s s o p -em _ neptekagh i _ aaw mun _ . _ taagken _ sivillagte aqe ai _ igagh t _ liilightuusagh lghutagh t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Un anguuq _ aaw k _ apeghiigh i lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ qelghus kanga _ elpesi nun _ qaatke sqellug qu _ . _ "
Taw a tengng waaq _ Moses-em _ sivillagte aqe aqe ai _ aaw meng _ tab ern ac le- a _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ saghya t _ atuqekagh t _ maniguute llegh mun _ .
ipapestaaq _ liilightuusagh t _ pill ghitni _ , _ qamag tev z ig luni _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ pelungigh kau uq _ aaw kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute naanghite ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ wetku qun _ aaw k _ maaqe gkan _ .
nuna mete ngughk _ tab ern ac le- a _ , _ ilung anil nguutlu _ saghya t _ qilagmel ngughestun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ nunamel nguut _ saghya t _ pelungigh yaghqaa ut _ aaw itgun _ teghig ke sagh t _ . _ iwernga _ qilag melnguut _ saghya pig t _ pelungigh yaghqaa ut _ aghqe te tgun _ pinigh aghagh lghiit _ nuna mi _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ .
Christ-a _ itegh mangite uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ yug t _ ulimaagh itnun _ . _ taana _ ipa pig tun _ qilagmel ngugh tun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ yeghlegi _ qilag mun _ itegh kau uq _ enkaam _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh mete uq _ High _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ whangkunnun _ .
Christ-a _ nuna m _ high _ priest- ngatu te _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ayum iq unghani _ high _ priest- a _ itegh aqe uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ kel qelluni _ aaw meng _ ellmi _ pike nghite ke mineng _ . _ iwernga _ Christ-a _ aghqe tke mangite uq _ ellmi neng _ utegh pag tiin aq _ ,
qayughllak _ ikfiqe nayagh uq _ uglagh inagh luku _ ima _ ulima llegh aneng _ nuna m _ . _ iwernga _ up-uni _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ tagi kau uq _ ataasigh meng _ quunperugllag _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe llegh t _ aghqe tke llegh mikun _ ellmi neng _ .
Tam agh aghh mi _ tuqu yaghqaa lghii _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ , _ enkaam _ taam _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ Christ-a _ aghqe tke kau uq _ ellmi neng _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ yug lghute t _ . _ iwernga _ alla _ tagi kuni _ , _ aghqe tkesaghtugh u nghite uq _ ellmi neng _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ yugul iyaghtugh lleqii _ qelanqe i lghiit _ ellmi neng _ .
liilightuusagh t _ taghneghagh nge te lghii stun _ ayuqe ut _ pinigh lghii nun _ kaate yaghqagh nun _ , _ iwernga _ liilightuusagh t _ taa kugh pig aanghitut _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ qel ell ghistun _ Jews-et _ aghqer raagh um angin aghaqut _ ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ aghqerragh u llegh t _ ukmangigh waagh pagningit iit _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ manigugh yaghtugh nghmegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yug t _ maniguu tes tengi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmang ip iig um aku meng _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ , _ seghleghni nanigh nayagh ut _ . _ enkaam _ aghqe tke i nanigh nayagh ut _ .
iwernga _ ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tamaakut _ aghqerragh u llegh t _ neqangugh ste aqe ait _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ ,
qayughllak _ aawite a _ b ull -etlu _ g o at -etlu _ seghleghqe llegh ighpagningite ait _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ Christ-a _ tagi aqngami _ nuna mun _ pika qaa _ kiyaghnegh _ : _ " _ Agh qu te yug um angitu t enllu _ tunusagh yug mangite uten llu _ , _ iwernga _ yataaghqe kaqe an _ yugusigh _ whanga mnun _ .
efqugh ke mangite aten _ teghig ke sagh t _ iingunagh ita _ paneghtekagh t _ aghqefig gni _ nalighmeng _ aghqe te t _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
taagken _ whanga _ pi aqa _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tagi unga _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi na lunga _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ igaqugh kaqe kangatnga _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ . _ ' _ "
Christ-a _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ Agh qu te yug um angitu t enllu _ tunusagh yug mangite uten llu _ . _ Agh qu te yug um angitu ten _ teghig ke sagh neng _ iingunagh meng _ paneghtekagh neng _ aghqefig gni _ nalighmeng _ aghqe te neng _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ tamaakut _ efqugh simangit aaten _ . _ " _ Christ-a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liilightuusagh t _ qelgh utk aq egh ngaat ki _ tamaakut _ aghqe te t _ pisqelluki _ .
taagken _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ tagi unga _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi na lunga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ qamagte luki _ iqite qugh luki _ aghqe te lug t _ nengigh tgun _ nekegtekaqe a _ Christ-a _ aghqe te u luku _ .
Jesus _ Christ-am _ qaatk es aq minigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ pelungigh kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ tuune llegh mikun _ yugusigh ni _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ quunperugllag _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ priest-et _ nekevghagh meng _ qepghaqagh teng _ pi aqe ait _ . _ Utegh pag tiin aq _ tuune i aqe ut _ tawatel ku llghii neng _ aghqe te neng _ . _ Taw all iim a _ tamaakut _ aghqe te t _ seghleghqell ghi ghi yaghq aghh aanghitut _ .
iwernga _ Christ-am _ tuune kaqe a _ ataasigh _ aghqe te _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ quunp er ug llagmun _ . _ taagken _ aqumekagh _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tawani _ Christ-a _ utaqa i aqe uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegte lleghqagh anun _ anguyag i _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ .
taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ aghqe tke llegh kun _ , _ Christ-am _ quunperugllag _ naamigte stekaqe ai _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ .
agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaate ainkut _ tamaakuneng _ . _ sivuke luni _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ ,
" _ Un anguuq _ akequsagh ka _ yug mnun _ , _ kingu itneng _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ , _ liilightuusagh nka _ kanagh lleqe anka _ ilu itnun _ , _ igaqe lleqe anka llu _ um yu w iitgun _ . _ "
taagken _ pi uq _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ neqamike naanghite anka _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ seghletun llu _ pill ghit _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute kaki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ aghqe te t _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh lleqe ut _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ aling ill ngun aamta _ itegh lleghqagh nge ukut _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ aaw akun _ Jesus-em _ .
qelpegh te ma ainkut llu _ tu megh ragh aghmeng _ unguvallegh mun _ safkaaghute kun _ ; _ taana _ safkaaghute _ yugusigh ke a _ .
Priest- el egll aag uu kutlu _ igleghte te i lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh aneng _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ tugh aagh el teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ipapighqell uta _ , _ neghyuk ngwaagh luku _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh nge ukut _ qayughllak _ umyugaghllug put _ siv i llag taq aagut _ Christ-am _ aaw aneng _ ukmang iigh tesqelluki _ , _ yugusigh put llu _ ughvughqe kau ut _ pelung ilngugh qun _ megh kun _ .
yeqay _ ataasiighmete luta _ sighima llegh mete kestagh lta _ whangkunnun _ pik nik amnnun _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ enkaam _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ akequsagh ni _ .
yeqay _ sumeghtaghagh lta _ naten _ qiilngumighte te yaghqaa luta _ piniqe yaghqaa luki _ ila t _ , _ pinitun llu _ pi yaghqaa luta _ .
yeqay _ taaqe fqaamta _ qerngughte te nghmeng _ pi lta _ manigugh na luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ila ita _ pii qell ghistun _ . _ yeghlegi _ qerngughte te manginagh lta _ kayemughtu tete na luta _ . _ wata _ kayeme te manginagh lta _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ aghnegh a _ tugh aalghii _ .
seghleghqe sug aatagh kumta _ kingu aneng _ liite luku _ ipapilleq _ , _ taawa _ aghqe te kaghqagh ite uq _ iqite sighqagh meng _ tamaavek _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
tamaakut _ tawaten _ pi lghiit _ alingruugh meng _ utaqa i lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh aneng _ . _ atuqe lleqe ak _ uguqnagh ghllagek _ kengh ek _ naaf qen naluki _ tamaakut _ kipullgin aalghiit _ ellmi neng _ .
maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ liisimak istet _ apegh katgu _ yuug _ qaatke te mangite ni luku _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ , _ nanqigt istem _ nanglleg ke gpenaan _ tuqute ste lleqe a _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu _ naten mi _ ang k as lug an _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe agu _ yuug _ tut m aas gh aq iiq elghii _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ pi aqe lghii _ sea-te u nghite ni luku _ aaw k _ apeghiigh tke aq _ akequ sagh ragh aghmeng _ ( _ qaywa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangiisigh ke kaqe ghngaagu _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ ) _ , _ seghlequugh iiq elghii llu _ nangllegtagh lghii gnun _ Tag negh agnun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ ellnga u lghii _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ aghyuugh i yaghqagh _ , _ akite yaghqaqe anka _ seghletun _ pill ghit _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ ellmi _ yug ni _ . _ "
tatame aatagh na pigte uq _ kina _ alngunak _ iigg an isaghq aq _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ !
neqamike kesi _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ sivugh nghaani _ liite yuwhaagh aqe yafsigu _ ipapilleq _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ aghula i te kau usi _ ataasiighmete lusi _ qaywa _ ikfiq egh llagh ngaagh pesi _ .
ilangakun _ yugtuqagh mi _ yug t _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe aisi llu _ amyuqetagh te kaqe aisi llu _ . _ ilangani _ nekevgha lgusigh aqe asi _ tamaakut _ amyuqetagh tkesigh lghiit _ .
nanglleg ke aqe asi _ anusimingllaghvig melnguut _ . _ talwa _ quya nga aqe usi _ yug t _ tugulagh nghatki _ saghya si _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ paninang _ sa lgu usi _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ quun pek aghqameng _ .
Enkaangam _ iilqayug gpenasi _ qayughllak _ ilutu manginagh kufsi _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ akileghtuusagh ghllag meng _ .
Ak luk ngwaagh si _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ atuqe yaghqaa luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ taagken _ allgegh lleqe asi _ akequsagh kekagh i _ .
katam _ igaqe nga lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ qantaghaqun _ taana _ tagi yaghqagh _ kaate lleqe uq _ ; _ kimaawi naanghite uq _ .
elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug nka _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ pegtekunigu _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ , _ unguva sigh gma _ efqugh ke naanghite aqa _ . _ "
iwernga _ whangkuta _ pegte ikagh stun _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ , _ naafqe lleg nge yaghqagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ukut _ enkaam _ unguva sigh put _ yugul i kaagukut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh m _ liisimak es tengngwaagh iinkut _ allgeghsaghqagh ke ni luku _ sigh mak egk aghput _ , _ ipapigh qu sig uq _ esghagh yaghqaqe nghite ke mnnun _ .
ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ ayumigh m _ yug i _ itagnaq elleng egkaagut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ liigik egkaq aghput _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe a _ nuna _ akuzite mikun _ . _ tamaakut _ aligh ite ngugh t _ ulimaagh u ut _ esghagh yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ abel _ tuune i kau uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tugukligh yugnagh aghagh lghii meng _ aghqe te meng _ Ca in -em _ aghqe tkekagh aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ abel _ elqughutngagh lghii u ni luku _ yuug _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapigh qegk aqaa _ abel _ elqughute nga ni luku _ tugukligh llegh mikun _ tunusagh i _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh mikun _ abel _ paninang _ akuzi u uq _ , _ tuqu kaayagh ghngaaghmi _ .
U peq illegh qun _ enoch _ mayugh te stekau uq _ qilag mun _ enkaam _ nanghiigh llghite a _ tuqu llegh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ naalke llghite a _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugu kaqe kanga _ . _ mayugh llghite luni _ qilag mun _ , _ igaqe nga kau uq _ En och -em _ efqugh tekaqaa _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Ugpeq ill ngunani _ kitum _ alngunak _ efqugh te pagningit aa _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ tagi yu kuni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpeqe pestaagh yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh lgu ni luku _ , _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ai llu _ ivagh ip iil ghiit _ ellmi neng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ N o ah-m _ nagate kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelenga sagh ughte tke ai _ tamaakut _ salin _ pi igate luki _ . _ enkaam _ qaatkellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ angyaghpag ngllagh kau uq _ nengllugute ni _ yugul in aluki _ uleve llegh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ N o ah-m _ nuna m _ yug i _ nanqigte stekaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuugh esqelluki _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ apallugh ke luku _ N o ah-m _ allgegh tekaqaa _ elqughutngagh llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Abraham-em _ qaatke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqlugh aqe yatni _ aghulaqe sqellug qu _ ila anun _ nuna m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke a _ taana _ nuna _ ellnga nun _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ unite kaqe a _ ellmi _ nuna ni _ nalluke luku _ navek _ pi naqe te ni _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghtekau uq _ nunatagh u luni _ nuna mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh ani _ . _ tiintanite kau uq _ katam _ Isaa c -enkuk _ Jacob -enkuk _ pillgh eg ke tun _ . _ El k egk en k allu _ allgegh tekaq aak _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ taana _ nuna _ .
abraham _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ utaqa i u lghii _ kiyaghte na luni _ ne ghllag mi _ tunemaghtuqagh mi _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ uspeqe i ste nga llu _ ulim agh isteng allu _ ne ghllag m _ .
abraham _ nanevg agh llagh ngaaghmi _ , _ sarah- llu _ quminge yaghqaa nghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ paninang _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ sarah _ quminge kau uq _ , _ qayughllak _ neghyuke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pi lleqe ni luku _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ abraham _ tuqu yaghtugh ngestagh kau ghngaaghmi _ , _ paninang _ kinguneghtughqagh u ghllag kau uq _ . _ ellngit a _ uglagh tal ngit _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ qilag amel ngughestun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ kes tek aanghil ngugh es tunllu _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ esnagh m _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ yug t _ paninang _ kiyaghtekau ut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ tuqu llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tuqu laghate te kau lghiit _ allgegh tegpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ ellmeggnun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ esghagh kaqe ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ uyav an lluki _ sivu meggnite luki _ quyake kaqe ait llu _ . _ Enkaangam _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ yug t _ nunatagh u ni luteng _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ nuna mun _ pike nghite ni luteng _ .
tamaakut _ tawaten _ akuzi lghiit _ , _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ apegh u aat _ nuna kaghqagh yug ni luteng _ ellmeggnun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ .
sumegh ke kaqsagh kumegteggu _ taana _ nuna _ unitekagh eng _ , _ uteghte lleghqagh lgu nayagh ut _ .
yeghlegi _ piyuke aghagh kaqe aat _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ nuna _ , _ qil agh melnguq _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ kayngu yug igate uq _ kiyaghnegh ke ni nghatni _ . _ talwa _ yataaghqe te kaqe ai _ ne ghllag meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe kanga _ abraham _ , _ " _ Isaa c -e kun _ kingunegh ghllag u lleqe uten _ . _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Abraham-em _ neghyuke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ nanghiiqu aqe yatni _ . _ enkaam _ aghqe te kete yaghqaaghtekagh a _ kezemagh ghhagh _ ighnegh ni _ , _ isaac _ .
Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ unguv aght iyaq leg uniluku _ tuqukagh neng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqute snanigh aqe yagu _ isaac _ , _ Abraham-em _ vegh tek all ghu uq aqaa _ isaac _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Isaa c -em _ quya stekaqe ak _ Jacob -enkuk _ Es a u- nkuk _ , _ tungsigh te kaqe ak _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quya ste sqellug kek _ aag naqe kaghqagh ik _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Jacob -em _ , _ tuqu naqngu luni _ quya stekaqe ak _ allak aq aght aag kenka _ ighnegh kek _ Joseph -em _ . _ taagken _ qungughte luni _ ayaviigh mikun _ manigugh kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Joseph -em _ , _ kenlet ghu unnaq ell ghani _ unguvallegh mi _ , _ akuzite kegka qaa _ aghulaqe lleghqagh at _ Israel-eghmiit _ Egypt- meng _ . _ apeghtugh te kaqe ai llu _ neghqwaagh ni _ naten _ sa lleghqagh i _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Moses-em _ angayuqagh gkenka _ iighaghtugh kaqe ak _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ allgellegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ esghagh ka ak _ y uuk eg tepig llegh ii _ , _ alinge ma ite ngugh k llu _ qaatke te nghite yaghqaa lutek _ umiileg m _ qelegh te llegh anun _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ moses _ , _ yugughte yami _ ighsa kau uq _ ighnegh ke ste nghmeng _ Ph ar a o h - m _ panig anun _ .
yeghlegi _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ikfiqe lgusigh na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ avelgh ag luku _ efqugh yug na llegh a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ mulu yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
itupill _ sumeghtaghagh tke kaqe a _ ikfiqe lleghqagh ni _ Christ-amun _ itagnagh aghagh ni luku _ aklung il ghut anganeng _ Egyp t -em _ . _ Sumeghtagh aat keng ngw ii _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh t _ aga _ siv um el nguut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Moses-em _ unite kaqe a _ Egyp t _ aling ell ngunani _ umiileg m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ . _ iilqayug mangite uq _ qayughllak _ esghagh lghii stun _ pi kaqe kanga _ aliite nghite ngughk _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Moses-em _ qelqe aqe ai _ yug t _ P ass ov er- esqelluki _ , _ qelegh te kaqe a llu _ aaw _ siv i llag taa tesqelluku _ amig tgun _ . _ enkaam _ yaquleg an _ tuqu llegh m _ tuqute llghite ai _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh it _ Israel-eghmiit _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Israel-eghmiit _ aghviqagh ke aat _ R e d _ S e a _ nikimqun _ qute stun _ . _ iwernga _ Egypt- eghm iit _ , _ aghvigh naq ut keng ngu luteng _ pekagh qu te kau ut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Israel-eghmiit _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ aghnegh ni _ uzivgagh kaqe aat _ Jer i ch o - m _ mingllu ta a _ . _ taagken _ mingllu te a _ ullegh aat kaaguq _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ R ah ab -em _ , _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ upugha te kaqe ak _ Israel-eghmiit _ riirngi steke t _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llghite uq _ maligte te luni _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
wataqaaghaq _ ungipamsug ull amsi i _ yug neng _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ? _ taake ghllag yaghqaa ut _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luki _ G id e on -enkut _ , _ Bar ak -enkut _ , _ Sam s on -enkut _ , _ J ep h th ah- nkut _ , _ David -enkut _ , _ Sam u el -enkut _ , _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ ila i _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ : _ kayaalqe kaqe ait _ ataneghpag u llegh t _ , _ elqughute nga luteng _ igleghte te i kau ut _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh i _ tugu kaqe ait _ . _ ila ita _ li on -et _ q aanghi t _ meqete ste aqe ait _ .
kumaghugh ghllaget _ ken ghet _ qaamte aqe ait _ , _ anag aqe luki llu _ tuqute i stekaghqagh teng _ savigpag kun _ . _ kayaate aqe ut _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i llghite a _ iknaqe ughtaghkagh it _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ pilluwagh teng it _ iknaqugh teghllag aqut _ enkaam _ kayaalqe aqe ait _ ila ita _ nuna t _ pilluwagh teng it _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ aghnagh t _ tuqum as lii teng _ veghte aqe ait _ tuqu llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv aghh negh aki _ . _ ila i _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe ste ghllag aqe ait _ pegte sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ . _ iwernga _ tuqu na luteng _ pi aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguvagh tesqell uteng _ pinighatagh al ghi mun _ unguvallegh mun _ .
ila i _ legasiighwagh te kaqe luki _ , _ ila i _ kagsagmig aqe luki _ , _ ila i _ qiipragh usigh luki _ anusimingllagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ milugh pag aat ameng _ tuqute aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ yugusigh at _ pilagtugh luki _ malghughqe aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ tuqute aqe ait _ savigpag kun _ . _ ila i _ tem gi _ tamaani _ igleghte aqe ut _ aate luteng _ penniigh m llu _ g o at - emllu _ amigh aneng _ . _ ila i _ akluma pigte lghiit _ , _ yug t _ amyuqetagh tkekagh it _ , _ seghletun llu _ kiyaghute ke ait _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ pinighpagunghite ut _ kiyaghte lgusigh yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ ! _ ila i _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ temngi _ tamaani _ iglegha kau lghiit _ paaghqagh igh llegh ani _ , _ naayghagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte aqe luteng _ qaye ni _ , _ laawaagh ni llu _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ itagnaq egkaqii _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ ! _ naqamllu _ allgegh simangit aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh a _ whangkunnun _ pinigh aghagh lghii u uq _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ whatete uq _ : _ akequsagh ni _ pi naanghite ai _ ellngit nun _ whangku ngun aki _ . _ qerngagh emta _ qamagte luta _ iighwigh lleqe ainkut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liigike ste ainkut _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ naten _ kiyaghte llegh megteggun _ . _ maaten _ uvitangigh luta _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ kilg aa qus testun _ iqite lteki _ qamagte luki _ uqigkutagh t _ , _ seghleghqe llegh t llu _ iglagute lghiit _ whangkunnun _ . _ sagiqe luta ngam _ kilgaaqu lta _ siv um n nil ngugh mun _ ,
esghagh ma ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ piinligh i ste nga llu _ apeghiigh i ste nga llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mta _ . _ kayngu nagh uq _ tuqu lleghqagh _ qaquuragh kun _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi tke mangite a _ kayngusaghagh te llegh _ . _ yeghlegi _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ikfiqe na luni _ qaquuragh kun _ apallugh ke luku _ quya llegh _ allgeghsaghqagh ni _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ aqumga uq _ aghenqignegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ Jesus _ . _ iilqayug mangite uq _ qaywa _ seghleghqes tet _ ugum i ke raagh llagh ngaat ni _ . _ tawaten _ elpek si llu _ ilutu llghite te naanghite usi llu _ iilqayug naanghite usi llu _ .
seghleghqe nghite naqutke llegh gpesi _ salin _ yug nun _ tuqute sigate aisi _ .
puygu stekagh i _ ilutughsagh sigh t _ akuzite t _ ungipaate i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ighnegh ke ni lusi _ ? _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ avelghaqiinagh gpenaan _ Atanghem _ nallghusagh nghaten _ , _ iilqayug gpenang llu _ aghyuugh nghaten _ .
qayughllak _ qamagte luki _ piniqekagh ni _ Atanghem _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ qaatk esqell uni _ , _ aghyuugh aqe ai llu _ tuguklighkagh ni _ avaqutagh u luki _ . _ "
tugukligh aqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ pi aqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ avaqutagh teng _ ata ita _ aghyuugh aqe ait _ nall gh ugh qen naluki _ .
qamagte luteng _ avaqutagh t _ aghyuugh lleg nge aqe ut _ . _ aghyuugh lleg nge nghite kuvek _ taawa _ ata ite ngugh u uten _ enkaam _ avaqutagh pig ke nghite aaten _ .
Taam _ saaghw akun _ , _ ata mta _ nunamel nguut _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ apeghtugh na luta _ qaatk esqell uteng _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ quulv aghaq aput _ . _ enkaam _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ qaatk ataghagh yaghq aqaghput _ unguva na luta _ .
ata mta _ nunamel nguut _ aghyuugh aqe inkut _ natengiighhaq _ , _ sumegh meggni _ elqughte luku _ aghyuugh i u ni luteng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ pinighqe lleghqagh mnnun _ pelung iigh tesqelluta _ ellmi tun _ .
quya niite uq _ aghyuugh lleg nge negh mta _ qayughllak _ aqnighte aqe kanginkut _ . _ iwernga _ tagtalmi _ , _ liit fik nem teggu _ , _ nekeggmellegh nge aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yagute aqe ukut _ elqughute luta _ .
keveg teki _ iigge si _ qughagh nga lghiit _ , _ taagken _ iknaqugh sagh teki _ kayaal nguut _ segesqugh si _ !
taklaghte ki _ tume i _ tutmagh llegh gpek _ , _ taagken _ kayaal nguq _ ighu n _ aane qagh naanghite uq _ naflugh mineng _ , _ iwernga _ naallghute lleqe uq _ .
kiyaghte naqe tek _ nekegg me tull usi _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ kiyaghte naqe tek llu _ seghleghqell ngun asi _ . _ kinku t _ alngunak _ pelungite nghite ngugh t _ esghagh naanghite aat _ atanegh _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ luuraq _ allgegh h negh is aagh aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ nagu tete yaqunaan llu _ sungagh nite ngughk _ akugh _ seghleliighqagh ii luni _ naafqii yaghqagh _ yug lghute meng _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ seghleghqesagh u aghte ut _ sex-kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ kinku t _ alngunak _ quulvagh in ghi saagh tut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ Es a u- tun _ . _ akike kaqe kanga _ pagitaghqagh ni _ ataasigh ghhagh mun _ neghyaghqagh mun _ .
liisimakagh i _ taam _ kingu aneng _ , _ allgegh sug aqngam igu _ a ta mi _ quya ste llegh a _ , _ ata an _ ighsake kaqe a _ . _ Es a u- m _ allangughtepagningite kaqe a _ apeghiighkagh ni _ , _ qaywa _ qunituumagh mi _ tungsigh ghngaaghmigu _ a ta mi _ quya ste i llegh a _ .
sivunegh gpesistun _ ayuqe nghite usi _ M oun t _ S in ai -mun _ pikagh stun _ . _ esghagh yaghqagh at _ , _ saafte yaghqagh at llu _ . _ tawani _ mamleg ghllagukagh _ , _ naafte ghllagukagh _ , _ naayghagh llu _ kumaghugh ghllagu lghii _ .
nagaqugh qu aat _ qalghightu an _ qalghigh lleghhii _ , _ nagaqugh qu aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ . _ iwernga _ nepiigh qigh sqekagh at _ ,
qayughllak _ tugukligh yug nghite kangat _ qelegh i llegh a _ wh atel nguq _ , _ " _ taana _ naayghagh _ , _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ teghig ke sagh m _ saaftekunigu _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh pestaagh u uq _ milugh pag aat ameng _ . _ "
Moses-em _ esgha qaa _ kakavaatagh na pigte lghii _ repall _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ Ell ngaatall _ ungelegte unga _ alingruugh em _ . _ "
iwernga _ katam _ elpek si _ tagi kau usi _ M t _ . _ Z i on -mun _ , _ qilag m _ Jerusalem -ng anun _ , _ ne ghllag anun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kestekau nghite ngugh nun _ yaquleg nun _ qerngughte tekagh nun _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luteng _ .
tagi kau usi _ qerngughte te llegh itnun _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ qilag mi _ ategh it _ igaqe nga ut _ igagh tgun _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nanqigt isteng itnun _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ yug t _ , _ taghneghagh itnun llu _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ iighwigh stekagh nun _ .
tagi kau usi _ Jesus-mun _ , _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsaghraghagh ngllagh kau uq _ . _ tagi kau usi llu _ siv i llag t aatk amun _ aaw anun _ Jesus-em _ . _ pinigh aghagh uq _ Ab el -em _ aaw aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute ai _ seghleghqe llegh t _ Jesus-em _ aaw akun _ .
enkaam _ kelenga tek _ , _ nagate yu nghite gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi lghii _ . _ sivunegh mta _ nagas un ghit k aqaat _ kelengas aaghi llgha _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ enkaam _ anag mangite aat _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ . _ whangkuta _ aghyuugh aghagh lleqe ainkut _ nagate yu nghite kumteggu _ kelenga sagh u llegh a _ qilag meng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqngami _ M oun t _ S in ai -meng _ , _ me an _ ufsugute ka qaa _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ akeqe i ma uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ufsug un neqig lleqaqa _ nuna _ , _ iwernga _ qilag llu _ ufsug u lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ akuzillegh an _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ufsug un neqig lleqaqa _ nuna _ , _ " _ liigikes tengngwaagh iinkut _ whaten _ , _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ulimaagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ ufsug te yaghqagh t _ . _ Tamaa ku ngin aghhaat _ ufsug ute pagning ilnguut _ tamaan llequt _ quunperugllag _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ tuune kanginkut _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ufsug te yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ Enkaangam _ manigugh lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ efqugh nagh leg kekagh atun _ alinge lleg ligh luta llu _ quulvagh ill eligh l ut allu _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ut _ naafqii lghii u uq _ kenegh _ .
piniqe kestagh teki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ .
upugha manginagh tek _ aqiiyag nun _ qayughllak _ ila ita _ upugha te aqe ait _ nalluke luki _ yaquleg u ta i _ .
neqamike luki _ anusimingllaghvig melnguut _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ anusimingllaghvig me tell ghistun _ . _ neqamike luki _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ ikfiqe lghii stun _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sii vag qite ggu _ nengughte te llegh _ enkaam _ ugi t llu _ nulighh t llu _ ataasiighme tull it _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ gelgaghniigh lghiit _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila aneng _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ pakignegh u gpenasi _ mani mun _ , _ itagnagh aqe tek llu _ seat- ta leg gpesistun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Un in naanghit ngwaagh amsi _ ; _ p egg naanghit ngwaagh amsi _ . _ "
enkaam _ te tull ngun aamta _ whaten _ pi lta _ , _ " _ atanegh _ kayute ke aqa _ ! _ alinge naanghite unga _ yug t _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
neqamike luki _ igleghutiste si _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ neqamike luki _ naten _ kiyaghtekau ta i _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg lgu naqe tek _ ellngistun _ .
Jesus _ Christ-a _ almesiqe aqe a _ ighivgaq _ , _ aghneghmi _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ .
iqitute ste gpenasi _ ipapi lleghmeng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh nun llu _ allakaayagh gnun llu _ apeghtuusagh nun _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh teki _ ilu si _ , _ nakaan _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh t _ negh ke neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ taakut _ neqe t _ liilightuusagh it _ qaatke gkufsiki _ ayepsugighsagh naanghite ait _ ilu si _ .
Priest- et _ qepghagh lghiit _ tab ern ac le- mi _ ineghtekau ut _ neghe lleghqagh itneng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ aghqefig mteggun _ .
High _ P riest-em _ tagite aqe ai _ aaw it _ teghig ke sagh t _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ aghqe te kete na luki _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ iwernga _ kemegkwaagh it _ teghig ke sagh t _ ne ghllag meng _ iqitute luki _ paneghte aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus- llu _ iqitute kau uq _ ne ghllag meng _ . _ tawani _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ pelungighsagh na luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mineng _ .
Enkaangam _ ne ghllag meng _ whangkuta llu _ aglagh lta _ Jesus-mun _ , _ seghletun _ akuzitk esqell uta _ katam _ ellnga _ seghletun _ akuzitk ell ghistun _ .
nuna mi _ whani _ quun pek aghqameng _ ne ghllag ite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ utaq angwaagh put _ negh ghllag _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
Jesus-kun _ iiwleng _ aghqe tke i lta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ aghqe te put _ usuqe i llegh ke aput _ ap en em teggu _ Jesus _ Atangh uniluku _ .
puygu gpenaan _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ , _ tuune te aqe tek llu _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ aghqe te u ut _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qaatke teki _ igleghutiste si _ atuqe luki _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ kelengake i u ut _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nanqig saghq aat s eng _ . _ quya nghite ste gpenaki _ igleghutiste si _ , _ itupill _ qaatke llegh gpesigun _ qepghaqagh teng _ pi lleqe ait _ quyake sigh ke luki _ . _ qaatke nghite kufsiki _ kayusiitepagningite aisi _ .
yughagh tke tekut _ . _ liisimake ukut _ umyugagh mta _ anaggute llghite na ainkut _ , _ qayughllak _ iiwleng _ piyuk el qaghput _ elqughutngagh lghii _ pi yaghqaa luku _ .
Taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ kayagte amsi _ yughaatk esqell unga _ qantaghaqun _ elpesi nun _ uteghnigh na lunga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmell elit istem _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ aaw mikun _ Penniigh niigh teghllag ugh tekaaguq _ penniigh nun _ . _ aaw an _ atugh u yaghqaaghte stekaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ quun pek aghqaq _ akequsagh a _ .
yughagh unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuun esqellusi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pinigh lghii meng _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh a _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ Jesus _ Christ- akunllu _ ilu gpesinun _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ligu _ efqugh nagh lghii _ ellmi nun _ . _ Christ _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ki _ lata nka _ qayughllak _ kayeme yug aqe amsi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ takestaaghhaa luku _ lata amsi _ .
liisimake sug amsi _ ugpeqaalgutem nneng _ , _ Timoth y-meng _ , _ aan e simaaq _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ Kaa tel ghagh tugh yaq an _ qerngagh emtung _ esghagh yaghtugh lleqe amsi _ .
quyake aghte nakesi _ qamagte luki _ igleghutiste si _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ . _ Ugpeq aalgu tetlu _ italy- meng _ pi t _ quyake aghte na ke ii sigh nge uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii _ kayusillegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ James -meng _ pi u ut _ qepghagh teng aneng _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ Atangh emllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ lata aqe unga _ Jews-et _ ugpeqagh itnun _ mingite nga lghii nun _ tea- ma ani _ . _ quyake amsi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ quya aqe tek _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh negh gpesini _ ,
qayughllak _ liisima kasi _ seghleliigh llegh gpesi _ nanghii qung waat _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nuqete neghtughsagh na lusi _ .
taagken _ nuqete neghtu llegh i _ nagnegh nga steggu _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ ang tan ii llequsi _ , _ iighwigh lleqe usi _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenasi _ .
naligh i _ peghqinellegh nge yu kuni _ tungsigh li _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ighlegite ghllag uq _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ tuunegk ay u waa _ qamagte luku _ yuug _ aapte lghii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe aisi _ tungsigh kufsi _ .
enkaam _ aapte tek _ ugpeqe i lleg ligh luku _ malgh uk l ill ngun aan _ . _ malghukli nga lghii _ imaghllug stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ anuqe m _ tenge qagh te aqe kanga _ .
malghukli nga lghii _ ataasiighte igate uq _ sa llegh mikun _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ Tawatel nguq _ yuug _ talwa _ sumeghtaghagh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh u lleqe ni luni _ atanegh meng _ .
yeqay _ akluma lghii _ ugpeqaal gun _ quya li _ quulvagh tes tengng allegh mineng _ .
yeqay _ aklung ilnguq _ ugpeqaal gun _ quya li _ quseveg tes tengng allegh mineng _ , _ qayughllak _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ piitesighagh estun _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghmini _ maat negh qwaagh llag aqelghii _ , _ piitesighagh at _ paligh ste luki _ . _ taagken _ piitesighagh at _ ifkagh qu uute aqe ut _ , _ pinigh niigh te aqe ai _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ aklung ilnguq _ yuug _ sa kestagh ghngaaghmi _ aviighute lleqe uq _ .
quyanaghhalek _ yug m _ nanghiiqu lleg ni _ nuqe tut kayug i _ . _ suflughtekumiki _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ akileghtuusagh ni _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ piniq iste minun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ nanghiiqu lleg nge gkuni _ whaten _ pi te qugh a mi _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe ste naqutke aanga _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ nanghiiqu lleg nge yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe ste naqute kete yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ piyuke lleg lug an _ nanghiiqu lleg nge sta qaa _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ sivuke luku _ piyuke lleg lug an _ sayug aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh m _ naapte aqe a _ .
piyuke lleg lug m _ allgegh ste aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh _ angli nghmini _ tuqu llegh ughte aqe uq _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ puughtesigh gpenasi _ .
qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit llu _ , _ s allgh waaghh iil nguutlu _ tunusagh t _ qilag meng _ pi u ut _ . _ tamaakut _ ata meng _ pi u ut _ ulim agh isteng aneng _ qamagte luni _ nighug m _ ; _ allangughte igate uq llu _ , _ mamleg ste i igate uq llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ piyuke llegh ke a _ , _ tuun aluta _ nutaghagh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ungipagh akun _ ipapighqell ghem _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ whangkuta _ megnun alleghpig aas qell uta _ ulimaagh yag g agh mineng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ neqamike luku _ una _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ nagate yu kestagh luni _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ akuz iigh aght af qaam illu _ sakr aag agh aght af qaam illu _ ,
qayughllak _ sakr aam _ kayusiite igate aisi _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaallegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyukekagh anun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pegte ggu _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqe aqe kesi _ . _ Q us ev eg ng aghpesi _ tugukligh teki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piite tesiigh aqe ai _ ilu gpesigun _ , _ qayughllak _ yugul iyagh qaq iisi _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ .
nagate ghesnagh gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ itupill _ atuqe teki _ . _ puughte aqe usi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ nagate ghesnagh nghpesiki _ atuqe gpenaki _ .
yuug _ nagate ghesnagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ atuqe gpenaki _ , _ taghneghaghqugh lghii stun _ ayuqe uq _ 
tunute kuni _ tawaninginaq _ puygu lleqe a _ nate tul eni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh i _ iteme te ta iqe ut _ yug neng _ . _ yug m _ liinnaquma inagh kumiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ puygu gpenaki _ atuqe gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya saghqagh ke a _ s allghakun _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh yu k _ ugpeqagh ghllag u ni luni _ , _ naqam _ akuzitk esaghq aq enghil kem mineng _ akuzi kayug _ temngi _ puugh teng nguuq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ ugpegh llegh a _ sea-te u nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ pillgh ani _ yuug _ ugpell ep iil gu kumi _ , _ kayusigh yaghqaqe ai _ yaywaali t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ seghleliigh nghata _ , _ nuqete yaghqaa uq llu _ seghlegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ugpeqe i u te gpesineng _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ , _ Atangh aneng _ nighughqell ghem _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaki _ ila i _ yug m _ megnu nagh aghagh ni luki _ ila meggneng _ .
maalghug _ yug k _ itegh yagh kayek _ qerngughte te vig gpesinun _ , _ aag llegh a _ aarragh luni _ , _ gold-meng _ alangqughiitagh ightugh luni _ , _ aag llegh a _ aatkagh lug kaghte luni _ ,
taana _ aarragh nga lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ whagun _ aqume i _ pinigh llegh akun _ aqumutagh m _ , _ " _ naqam _ akluma lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ tawani _ nekevgha _ , _ " _ nalighmeng _ , _ " _ aqume i _ itegagh ma _ saaghw akun _ , _ "
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ pakig gu lleq asi _ ila i _ yug t _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ nagate aghte tek qun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ aklum aalghiit _ nuna mi _ whani _ ugpeqillegh tus qelluki _ . _ nakmike kaqe ai _ tugukligh tengu luki _ ataneghpag u llegh mineng _ , _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ yug minun _ , _ piniqe i nga lghii nun _ ellmi neng _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ aklum aalghiit _ yug t _ ukaligh u ste aqe asi _ . _ liisima kasi _ aklung ilnguut _ piyaqleg iighqagh ke aisi _ , _ aglagh te aqe lusi _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
Ellng inguut _ seghletun _ akuzi tke i lghiit _ quulvagh ng alghiimeng _ ategh aneng _ Jesus-em _ , _ ategh _ tuunekagh _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ pike kangisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ Liiligh tus aa _ unaagh nge uq _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ katam _ . _ " _ Q aatq eg kufsigu _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ , _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi usi _ .
iwernga _ pak igg us kufsiki _ ila i _ yug t _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ , _ qaatken naanghi tagh sillu _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ .
kitum _ qaatkesagh ghngaaghmiki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ ataasigh _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ , _ qamagte luki _ qaat keng ngun ghit ii _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ yugtagh gpenang _ . _ " _ gelgaghniigh nghite yagh ghngaaghpek _ yugtagh kuvek _ taawa _ qaat keng ngun ghit aten _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ sa llegh gpesigun _ piraamsi lusi _ qayughllak _ elpesi u usi _ nanqigte yaghqagh t _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh qun _ liilightuusagh kun _ . _ Taam _ liilightuusagh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ atuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekunisi _ nanglleg yagute naanghite aisi _ , _ nanglleg yagute nghite kufsiki _ yug lgute si _ . _ iwernga _ nanglleg ke gkufsiki _ yug lgute si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute lleqe aisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kina _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu unga _ , _ " _ iwernga _ taam _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ yugul in aanghi taa _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun _ . _ sasii lleqe a ngam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ aneghneghq ill ngunani _ ?
sa nayagh tsi _ ugpeqaalgut si _ aatkagh isag yagh kan llu _ , _ neqangisag yagh kan llu _ ?
tuune gpenaan _ aklukegk aaneng _ temngi _ whaten _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste naagh aaten _ ; _ sunanguq _ neghyaghqagh nge i llu _ aate kangi llu _ maqagh lghii meng _ , _ " _ sas ii lleq anÊ¼ngam _ akuzite si _ aneghneghq ill ngun ateng _ ?
ugpeqe i llegh llu _ tawatete uq _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh kun _ atuqe nghite kuni _ sasii nghite uq _ .
kina _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ elpek _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu uten _ , _ whanga _ aneghnegh qell elg uunga _ . _ " _ keleg u vike nga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpeneng _ aneghneghqagh igh llghite ngugh meng _ , _ keleg u vike lleqe amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mneng _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mkun _ .
ugpegh kan _ ataasigh ghhagh u ta a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taana _ pinigh uq _ ! _ tughneghagh t llu _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ taana _ enkaangam _ alingruugh aqe ut _ , _ ungelegte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe kangi _ .
uyuq _ nall uuq aq _ yuug _ , _ paninang _ liigik ig asi guu _ ugpeqe i llegh _ aneghneghq ill ngunani _ sasii nghite u langa _ ?
sangan _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh qagh kagu _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ seghlegh qumang ilngugh estun _ ? _ tugukligh kaqe a _ abraham _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ atuqe kaqe a _ aneghnegh qellegh mikun _ aghqe te kaqe yamigu _ ighnegh ni _ isaac _ aghqefig eg nekun _ .
Liigik si guu _ ? _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh llu _ qerngagh egmek _ qepghagh kayugu uk _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ iighw igh tekaqaa _ aneghnegh qellegh qun _ .
enkaam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pill ghit _ Abraham -e meng _ apeghiigh kau ut _ , _ " _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ abraham _ seghlegh qumang ilngugh estun _ . _ " _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ ilakumtaagh ke ni luku _ pika qaa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh aqe a _ yuug _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh akun llu _ ugpeqe i llegh akun llu _ ; _ tugukligh igate a _ ugpeqe i lleg raaghinagh akun _ .
R ah ab -llu _ usputagh u uq _ . _ akike i kayugu yagh lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ seghlegh qumang ilngugh estun _ apallugh ke luku _ kayusigh i llegh a _ . _ Jos h u a-m _ kayagtekaqe kek _ maalghug _ yug k _ aksaqe luku _ nuna at _ yuvghiigh sqellug qu _ . _ yug t _ ivagh yatkek _ , _ R ah ab -em _ alla kun _ tume kun _ anag stekakek _ .
Enkaangam _ yugusigh _ taghneghagh ngunani _ tuqu nga uq _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ aneghneghq ill ngunani _ tuqu nga uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ allute lusi _ apeghtughiste ughte fqaafsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ whangkuta _ apeghtughiste ni _ nanqig tengngwaagh ataghagh yaghqaag ukut _ .
qamagte luta _ anaggute aghagh neghtu ghllag ukut _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yuug _ akuzillegh mikun _ anaggute igate ngughk _ elqughutngagh pestaagh u uq _ . _ yug m _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ talwa _ yugusigh ni llu _ agghi te kete luku _ ayuqe yaghqaqe a _ .
savikenghaagh ghhagh t _ sa ni te mun _ ayuqe luki _ kuuni t _ q aanghi t nun _ kanaghte aqe aput _ qaatk esqell uta _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ igleghte te aqe aput _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun llu _ angyaghpag ghllag t _ ; _ aq uut as qu veg aghhaam _ qiifte aqe ai _ angyaleg m _ piyuke llegh anun _ talwa _ anuq ategh llag yagh ngaan _ .
ulu llu _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ iwernga _ aangaayug neghllag uuq _ . _ K enghh aam _ uqfig lghute ghllag t _ kumaghsaghqagh ke ai _ !
ulu llu _ kengh estun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ esleqnga uq _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ enkaam _ seghleghqe ma llegh a _ mingite kayugu uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ enkaam _ naafqii kayugu uq _ kiyaghtaall emnneng _ qayughllak _ hell -em _ kengh an _ kumagh a qaa _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ nemeghyagh t _ , _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh i _ qimugtekayugu ut _ , _ aaqun _ yug m _ qimugtaghkagh i _ 
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qimugte naanghite a _ ulu _ . _ nekleg igate ngugh u uq _ , _ seghleghu uq _ , _ esleqnga uq _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ p o is on -meng _ .
ulu _ us uqu siq aqaghput _ atanegh mnnun _ ata mun _ . _ naqam _ seghlegh meng _ neghyugtaghagh usigh qaghkagh ut _ yug lgute mnnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh itnun _ ellmite yu gnite luki _ .
usuqe i llegh llu _ , _ seghlegh meng llu _ neghyugtaghagh llegh _ aane kayugu uk _ ataasigh meng _ qanegh meng _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite yagh uq _ .
pinigh lghii llu _ seghlegh llu _ megh _ maaq egk ay uw aak _ ataasigh meng _ sengngugh meng _ ?
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ ol iv es -meng _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ grapes -em _ vine- nga _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ figs- meng _ . _ talwa _ meghtaghvig _ tagh yugh nil ngughmeng _ meqe lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ megh ite uq _ .
kina _ akule gpesinite a _ peghqinegh lghii _ , _ liigike i ma lghii llu _ ? _ tawatete lleg ni _ kelgute ligu _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaallegh mikun _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun llu _ quseveg ng aghmi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ aqina nga kufsi llu _ , _ ellng iin aayug neghu kuf sillu _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaan _ ipapighqell eq _ , _ qaghya llegh gpesigun _ liisima ni lusi _ .
Tawatel nguq _ peghqinellegh _ qilagtagh u nghite uq _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u uq _ .
nani _ alngunak _ aqina lleg lgu nghaani llu _ , _ ellngin aayug ll elg ungh anillu _ taawa _ kipullgin aall el waa quq _ , _ sa u aat llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ tawan taqut _ .
iwernga _ peghqinellegh _ qilagte aq _ kiyang _ pelungite uq _ . _ Am alleq aa _ nekegg me tuq _ , _ kavyugite uq _ , _ malighqutagh ke i nga uq _ , _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ pikayug u uq _ , _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ yu piin gh uuq _ .
nekeggmellegh _ piitute stun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh mun _ qepghagh kayug t _ piitesighagh aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ saghna aqe ut _ elte qugh nga lghii meng llu _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ kiyaghtaallegh meggni _ .
Saam _ aaghtiiraagh te ste aqe isi llu _ , _ pillugute ste aqe aisi llu _ ? _ apate lugh qaghkagh i _ , _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ pilluwagh aqii _ pinigh lghiit _ piyuke lleg si _ .
qiliigh aqe usi _ avangite negh gpesini _ enkaam _ yugtagh yaghqaghte aqe usi _ allgegh h naluki _ qiliigh ke gkasi _ . _ qiliigh ghllag aqe usi _ taawanginaq _ allgegh te pagningit aqasi _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe usi _ , _ pilluw utaq usi _ . _ allgegh te igate usi _ kiyaghnegh _ aap sig atu tegpesineng _ .
talwa _ aapte ghngaaghpesigu _ kiyaghnegh _ allgegh sigat asi _ qayughllak _ seghlegh mun _ atughqagh u luki _ aapte aqe lghiisi _ . _ piyukekagh i _ elpek si _ katam _ piyukekagh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ .
ukughsi _ ataasiigh negh ilngugh ni _ ! _ Liisimak en ghis tegguu _ piniqe gkufsigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ , _ ugumik aghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ anguyag u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ temngingu ni luku _ whaten _ pillgh at _ , _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ aqina naqe neghtu uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aghagh aqe ainkut _ nuqe tu tesqelluki _ piyuke lleg lug put _ . _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusigh aqe ai _ quseveg ngalghiit _ puuru _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe ai _ qukaayug neghet _ . _ "
tuune lusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ , _ anagniigh lleqe uq _ elpesi neng _ .
qantaghalli i aghagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qantaghalli i aghagh lleqe uq _ elpesi nun _ . _ Seghlegh q est eni _ , _ uughtugh tek _ ! _ elpek si _ ataasiighte llghite ngugh ni _ , _ ukmangigh teki _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ .
quya nghite tek _ , _ asemeghqe tek _ , _ qiya tek _ ! _ nenglaghqagh iqe lleg si _ qiya llegh ughte ki _ , _ quya lleg si _ quya nghite ngugh ughte steki _ .
qusevegte tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ quulvagh lleqiisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ seghlequugh u tegpenasi _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequ uqu m igu _ ugpeqaalgut eni _ , _ seghlequugh lleqii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekunigu llu _ ugpeqaalgut eni _ nanqig tengng w ii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekufki _ liilightuusagh t _ qaat keng ngun ghit aten _ . _ yeghlegi _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte i stekau te n _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ liilightuusagh ngllagh a _ , _ nanqigte i sigh u luki _ atuqe aqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ sang anÊ¼ngam _ nanqig sigu _ yug lgute n _ ? _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ , _ naafqe i yaghqagh _ .
ila si _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ unaami _ tawavek _ nuna mun _ aghulaqe lleqe unga _ . _ Tamaan llequnga _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ mani ngllagh lleqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallukagh i _ unaami _ sa lleghqagh i _ ! _ talwa _ nallukagh i _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale kaghqagh a _ . _ unguvallegh i _ tan- squghhagh u uq _ , _ agep sugh rug g agh estun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute kayug _ .
itupill _ whaten _ pi aqe tek _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ unguva kestagh lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ apeghiigh te aqe lleqe ukut _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ aangaayugte lleqe usi llu _ qan ang ull equ sillu _ . _ tamaakut _ aangaayugte llegh t _ seghleghu ut _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liisimake ghngaaghmigu _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ , _ seghleghqeng nguuq _ .
nagate tek _ aklung ilngugh ni _ ! _ qiya kestagh tek _ , _ iilqe kestagh tek _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh naqngu usi _ .
aklungi si _ aghu ma ut _ , _ aate kasi _ m oth -em _ negh ma ai _ .
G old -e sillu _ silv er -e sillu _ anaghtaa ma ut _ . _ anaghtaa llghite a _ ipapigh qen naq ng waa _ ellngin aayug negh ullegh sillu _ , _ pakignegh u llegh i llu _ nanqigte lleg nge gkufsi _ . _ taagken _ anaghtaa llegh m _ yugusigh si _ naafqe lleqe ai _ katam _ kengh estun _ . _ qaywa _ kinguligh nun _ aghnegh nun _ lliigh ngaagh pesi _ , _ qerngughte i manginagh u usi _ wata _ aklungi igh i na lusi _ .
talwa _ akileghtugh llghite asi _ qepghaghte si _ unatagh ke aat _ piitesigh u aghagh vig gpesini _ . _ nagate ki _ akuz ilg allghit _ . _ Atanghem _ aghtughyaghqaanghi teghllag em _ nagaqugh ma ai _ akilghuu llegh it _ .
Kiyaghtaa llegh pesini _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ aklungitu te gpesineng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyukekagh i _ allgegh taqagh i _ efqugh h nalusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe usi _ . _ penniigh t _ q ug il i sigh at _ nalluke aat _ qantaghaqun _ tuqute lleghqagh eng _ . _ Nalluk es tegguu _ qantaghaqun _ Atanghem _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ ?
elpesi u ut _ nanqigte i ste ikagh t llu _ tuqute i ste ikagh t llu _ anaggute ma ite ngugh neng _ yug neng _ , _ ellngit a _ ayag qligh u mangite aisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ qelanegh gpenasi _ kenlanga _ Atanghem _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh anun _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh a _ usputagh qite ggu _ . _ nuna mi _ piitesigh u aghagh luni _ qelanegh yukagh gpenani _ utaqa i aqe uq _ uksaagh m llu _ upengh aam llu _ esl all uw aneng _ nagu ste i kayug meng _ piite yaghqagh neng _ .
elpek si llu _ qelanegh neghllug te k _ neghyu manginagh lusi _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ seghlequugh penaki _ ila si _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ nanqig g negh ill isi _ . _ ellnga u uq _ nanqigte i sta _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh lghii _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ neqamike luki _ uuknaliqistet _ akuzikagh t _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ usputagh qite ki _ qelanegh gpenateng _ nuqete neghtu luteng _ ikfiqe llegh mi _ pikagh t _ .
quya nga na iqe aput _ uuknaliqistet _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghmeng _ paninang _ neghyuke manginagh kaqe aat _ atanegh _ . _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ Jo b -em _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ , _ quya ste llegh a llu _ atanegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh a _ alpag yan _ . _ enkaam _ Jo b -kun _ Atanghem _ liite ste aisi _ nafughtagh llegh mineng llu _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng llu _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ apegh naqe kegka _ una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ . _ akeqe i negh gpesini _ , _ akeqe i gpenasi _ qilag kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ pi yaghqaa kufsi _ legan _ aang Ê¼ ghh aasi _ , _ pi yaghqaa nghite kufsi _ legan _ nak aaghh aasi _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe teki _ akequsagh si _ , _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ Atanghem _ nanqigte naanghite aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
kina _ akule gpesini _ ikfiqe u a _ ? _ yughagh li _ . _ kina _ quya nga a _ ? _ ilagagh li _ usuqe i llegh meng _ .
kina _ qinuy u waa _ ? _ tuqlugh liki _ Elder -et _ enkaam _ yughagh te kete litgu _ mesiighqellug qu _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ .
yughagh llegh m _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ naallghute yaghqaqe a _ qinuyug lghii _ yuug _ . _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ yug un qw uugh tes neqig lleqaa _ , _ seghleghqe llegh i llu _ seghevute lleqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apegh aqe luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ ila gpesinun _ , _ yugh aat ku tu taq lusi _ naallgh u telleng esqellusi _ . _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ yug m _ yughagh llegh i _ iknaqe ghllag ut _ , _ allgegh te kayugu ut _ .
elijah _ yugu uq _ whangkutestun _ ayuq elg ii _ . _ Taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte ma ite ngughk _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh _ ilate luku _ .
taagken _ alla _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte yalghiimi _ nuna _ piite ste ikagh _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una _ kinguligh u uq _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ . _ naligh i _ ugpeqe i nanigh kan _ apeghtuusagh pig neng _ , _ kitum _ kayusigh ligu _ ugpeqe i nqigte llegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kunigu _ yugul is leq aak _ seghleghqes tem _ unguva te zikek _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ segh uv ulleq ii _ taam _ seghleghqes tem _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag i _ .
ukut _ lata t _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ apostle- nganeng _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ yug nun _ aghulaqe uute stekagh t _ P on tus -mun _ , _ Gal at ia- mun _ , _ C ap p ad o c ia- mun _ , _ Asi a-mun _ , _ B it h y n ia- munllu _ .
neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ pelungighsagh kaqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uk _ qaatku tesqellusi _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ , _ ukmang iigh tesqell usillu _ aaw akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi nun _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ! _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni _ allgegh nqigte ste ainkut _ unguvagh tellegh mikun _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Taam _ sighima lleg nge ste ghllag ainkut _ nallun eq niil ngughmeng _ .
enkaam _ utaqa u aput _ pi liite yaghqagh put _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kangi _ yug minun _ . _ aflengake u ai _ qilag mi _ elpesi nun _ enkaam _ aghu naanghite ut _ , _ naave naanghite ut _ , _ gheve naanghite ut llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mikun _ p aq niigh sagh lleqiisi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ kenlet gh uu tellegh mi _ aliigh lleqe a _ yuguligh llegh _ yat aghq egkaq _ elpesi nun _ .
Taam _ quya ma ste aisi _ , _ qaywa _ maaten _ natengiighhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh yagh ngaagh pesi _ .
tamaakut _ seghlegh ligh u aaghet _ nanghiiqu sigh u ut _ ipapigh qen nalusi _ ugpeqill ep iil gut si _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii nguq _ gold - nneng _ . _ G old -et _ nanghiiqu nghmegteki _ kenegh kun _ naafqe kayugu ut _ . _ paninang _ ken ghet _ atuqe aqe ait _ pelungigh na luki _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ nanghiiqu yaghqaa uq _ . _ aghula i uute kan _ pelungite luni _ , _ allgegh lleqaghsi _ usuqe llegh _ , _ nighughqell eq _ , _ quulv alleq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aliightekagu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ .
esghagh igate ghngaaghpesigu _ pinighkagh i _ , _ esghagh nghite ghngaaghpesigu _ maaten _ ugpeqagh i _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu usi _ repall _ aapgh waagh pagningit aghsi _ angtal anga _ quya llegh gpesi _ ,
qayughllak _ allgegh tengng uk esi _ yuguligh llegh a _ unguva sigh gpesi _ . _ Taananguuq _ apallugh a _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ Christ-akun _ .
