liisimake amsi _ naan tut si _ , _ tawan tusi _ tughneghagh m _ umiileg u te i vig an _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ whanga mnun _ ataasiighmete usi _ , _ ugpeq nan ill ghi tagh pesi ngallu _ . _ tawatete kau usi _ talwa _ An t ip as _ , _ ataasiigh melnguq _ ungipaghteke _ , _ kiyaghteng nguluku _ . _ tawani _ tughneghagh m _ kiyaghfig ani _ tuqute kaqe aat _ .
iwernga _ piyuke nghite sigh nka _ elpesi nun _ uku nguut _ : _ taawa _ elpesi nite ut _ ila i _ qaatke te lghiit _ B al aam -em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe a _ Balak _ naten _ seghleghqes tesqelluki _ Israel-eghmiit _ . _ enkaam _ B al ak -em _ apeghtugh kaqe ai _ negh yagh ghngaita _ pisqelluki _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe ai llu _ itagnagh ni luku _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe lleghqagh _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ ila si _ qaatke te ut _ N ic ol a us-em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ .
Av utegh qellusi _ seghleghqen nanigh tek _ ! _ pi nghite kufsi _ qantaghaqun _ taku lleqe amsi _ . _ taagken _ pilluwagh lleq anka _ tamaakut _ yug t _ savigpag meng _ qan em nil ngughmeng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ ! _ manna- meng _ iigh nga lghii meng _ , _ man n a- l illeq aqa _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ ellnga nun llu _ tuune lleqe aqa _ qategh lghii _ uyghag _ , _ ategh ragh aghmeng _ igaqe vikekagh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nallukekagh a _ ategh _ iwerngaqun _ allgegh t ik aghhiin aam _ uyghag meng _ liisimake a _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Th yat ir a-m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi u uq _ . _ iye kek _ kumaghugh u uk _ kengh estun _ , _ itegagh i _ qelmeghtutka ut _ siilu m _ qel megh sal gh atun _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ liisimake aqa _ piniqe llegh i _ , _ ugpeqe llegh i _ , _ qepghagh te i llegh i _ , _ nuqe tut illegh sillu _ . _ liisimake anka _ tamaakut _ wata _ pi aqe asi _ sivugh nghaani _ pi aqe llegh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ uku nguut _ teng v imun _ ayuqekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ : _ Aghul iigh n neghit aghsi _ aghnagh _ Jezebel _ apeghtugh i lghii _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ . _ uuknaliqe ste u na iqe uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ puughte aqe ai _ yug nka _ seghleghqes qelluki _ sex-kun _ , _ negh esqell ukillu _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
P illegh qal itk aqsagh aqa _ avuteghqe sqellug qu _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe yu nghite uq _ allaniigh nghmeng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ miluute naqe aqa _ qavaghvig mun _ tawani _ ikfiqe sqellug qu _ . _ maligte te luki _ ellnga nun _ miluute lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ g elg aghn iil gut angi _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe anka _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe unga _ wetku qun _ avutegh k egk ata _ seghletun _ pill ghitneng _ .
tuqu lleqe anka llu _ avaquti a _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ yughaghvig nilnguut _ liite lleqe aatnga _ whanga u uq _ liisimake i lghii _ yug m _ tam agh aghh mi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itneng llu _ ilumike ke ii te neng llu _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe amsi _ tam aghagh pesi _ seghlegh qe tu leg pesistun _ .
iwernga _ ila gpesi _ Th yat ir a-mi _ , _ maligte llghite asi _ J e z eb el -em _ seghlegh t _ apeghtugh i llegh i _ . _ liite llghite asi llu _ tughneghagh m _ aksaqumtaagh ghllag i _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qelegh aghagh naanghite amsi _ ,
iwerngaqun _ ugpeqe manginagh teggu _ apeghtugh lleg si _ kenlanga _ uteghnigh lleg mnun _ .
ellnga _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ , _ atuqe i lghii llu _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mneng _ kenle mun _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill el illeq aqa _ iglegh utes qelluki _ nat i on -et _ .
igleghte te sqe luki _ ir on -meng _ r od - eligh luki _ enkaam _ kagim n nak angit _ qiku meng _ qulmesiite ngllaghkagh stun _ .
tuune lleqe anka llu _ unaa ngu m _ ighaleqetaagh aneng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ S ard is -em _ . _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh aneng _ pi leg _ m aagh rag v in l eklu _ ighaleqetaagh leg _ , _ pi uq _ , _ liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ yug t _ pi aqe aisi _ unguva ni lusi _ iwernga _ tuqu nga usi _ .
taghtugh lusi _ , _ iknaqugh sagh teggu _ sa u a _ salin _ elpek si _ pi i _ tuqu naqe lghii _ . _ liite anka _ ukav an tut _ sa u aat _ pi aqe kesi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ pi sqe sug llegh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
neqamike luki _ apeghtugh tke aat _ elpesi nun _ , _ nagaqugh kasi llu _ . _ qaatke teki _ , _ avuteghqe tek llu _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ taghtugh nghite kufsi _ , _ taku lleqe amsi _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ Nalluk elleq aghsi _ qakun _ tagi lleghqagh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
paninang _ qafsi ng g aagut _ yug t _ S ard is -mi _ aatkagh teng _ nukeggnaghqe llghite kangit _ . _ igleghte lgusigh lleqe aatnga _ aate luteng _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ qayughllak _ itagnagh lghii u ut _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ , _ ellngistun _ aate lleqe uq _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ . _ ategh a llu _ gheve snaanghite aqa _ kenle ite ngugh m _ unguvallegh m _ igagh aneng _ . _ ata ma llu _ yaquleg an llu _ sivu itni _ whanga mnun _ pik nill eq aqa _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ Phil ad el ph ia- m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ agleghnagh lghii meng _ , _ ipa pig meng _ pi u uq _ . _ ellnga nite uq _ David-em _ key- nga _ . _ qelpeghtekunigu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg naanghite a _ . _ umeg kunigu llu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ qelpeghte naanghite a _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ , _ liisimake amsi llu _ kayaate usi _ . _ naqamllu _ qaatke asi _ apeghtuusagh nka _ , _ mesighagh igate usi llu _ whanga mnun _ maligsaagh tek nilusi _ . _ ii-i _ , _ qelpegh te ma amsi _ amig meng _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg yaghqaqe nghite ka aneng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ tamaakut _ qerngughte te lghiit _ tughneghagh m _ synagogue- ngani _ , _ Jews- ngun ii qut _ . _ iwernga _ iqlengiqe ste u ut _ ; _ Jews- ngunghi tut _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi ste luki _ qungugh ste naqe anka _ sivu gpesigun _ . _ taagken _ liite lleqe aat _ piniqe kemsi _ .
qelqe aqe amsi _ nuqe tesqellusi _ . _ qaatke kaqe te gpesineng _ qelegh i llegh ka _ p aq niigh sagh lleqamsi _ seghleliigh llegh neng _ kaate naqe lghii neng _ nunataghh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh t _ nanghiiqu lleqe ait _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ .
tagi yaghtugh unga _ . _ ayepsugite lusi _ ugpeqe manginagh tengnga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ way anghi tesqelluki _ qaghpa si _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ aghveghaqetagh ughte ste lleqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ma _ temple- nga ni _ , _ allameng llu _ aan aanghituq _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh ma _ , _ ategh a llu _ kiyaghnegh ma _ ne ghllag an _ , _ Jerusalem - egh ragh aq _ , _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh mneng _ . _ ellnga kun llu _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh ragh aqa _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ L a od ic ea- m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ amen- meng _ pi u uq _ . _ Ataa siigh mel nguug uq _ , _ ipapigh qengng alghii nguuq _ liisimake i sta _ . _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ : _ isekinagh nghite usi _ , _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh nghite usi _ . _ isekinagh lghiisi tuq _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh lghiisi tuq _ !
enkaam _ m aqagh raag g aa tegpesineng _ , _ is ek in an ghil nguusi _ nalighmeng _ ug uq nan ghil nguusi _ , _ qesiite naqe amsi _ qanegh mneng _ !
pi aqe usi _ aklungite ni lusi _ , _ allgegh te ghllag aqe ni lusi _ , _ aklu igate ni lusi llu _ . _ iwernga _ nalluke usi _ seghlegh waagh u usi _ , _ nanglleg nagh usi _ , _ akluma usi _ , _ ayaa nga usi _ , _ amsikaghmete usi llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ aklung ighis qellusi _ gold - teng yaghtugh tek _ whanga mnun _ qig egh tengngwaaq ameng _ kenegh kun _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ qatelghii neng _ aatkagh neng _ saap esqelluki _ kayngu nagh lghiit _ amsikaghmete lleg si _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ agha kaghqagh meng _ iye gpesinun _ esghaa sag u tesqellusi _ .
tamaakut _ piniqekagh nka _ nallghusagh aqe anka _ , _ aghyuugh aqe anka llu _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqnegh ughte tek _ , _ avutegh qellusi _ seghleghqen nanigh tek _ .
ii-i _ ! _ nekeve lunga _ amig mi _ tenglugtugh unga _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh kunigu _ me ka _ , _ amig meng _ qelpegh te ma kanganga _ itegh lleqe unga _ ellnga nun _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aqa _ , _ ellnga n llu _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aanga _ .
kayaalqe i i lunga _ enkaam _ aqumga unga _ saaghw ani _ ata ma _ umiileg u sigh akun _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ aqume ste lleqe aqa _ saaghw mkun _ umiilgusig nekun _ aqumutagh mkun _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ "
taagken _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ amigh k _ qel pal nguq _ ! _ me _ nagate kaqe a _ qalghightautetu te _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ mayugh a _ whavek _ . _ elpenun _ esghagh ste naqe anka _ sa u aat _ pi yaghqagh t _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ taghneghagh gnite unga _ . _ taawa _ qilag mi _ es g agh agka _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh k _ , _ kina _ aqumga uq _ .
aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gni _ esghaqaaluni _ iqeghta gketun _ j as p er -enkuk _ c ar neli an -enkuk _ ayuqe uq _ . _ Uv it angani _ umiileg u sigh m _ taawa _ aglu k _ iqeghta kek _ em er al d -etun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
Uv it angani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh lghute t _ . _ Taa kutgun _ aqumga te nga ut _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ el der -et _ qatelghii meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ , _ gold - mengllu _ qaghpa lug teng _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkeneng _ kallug m _ nighwaagpagtagh u i _ , _ leveklugti a _ , _ tengngaagti a llu _ pi ut _ . _ sivu gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ t or ch -et _ kumang alghiit _ , _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ taghneghagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ sivu gkeni _ taawa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ qergese _ , _ megh r aak egh taq _ c r y s tal - estun _ . _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ uvit angani _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ sani gkeni _ , _ taawa _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ iye ghllag u ut _ saye megteggun llu _ aq sag em eg teggunllu _ .
sivuligh _ unguva lghii _ li on- esug n iteftuq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ o x - esug n iteftuq _ , _ pi nga yu aat _ sa u a _ unguva lghii _ gginagh lgu uq _ yug m _ gginagh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ tengaa kayug tun _ qawaagpag tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ tamaghhagh meng _ aghvinleg neng _ yaquleg utu te ut _ , _ elngaatall _ yugusigh at _ iye ghllag u ut _ talwa _ qamavek _ yaq ghw ita _ asi itnun _ . _ aghneghtugh ma n _ unugtugh magh an _ taaqe igate ngugh t _ ilagagh nghmeng _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ Atangh uuq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ ellnga u uq _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ ! _ "
taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ ilagagh ut _ ilagaate itneng _ usuqe i llegh m _ , _ quulvagh illgh em _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh m _ aqumga lghii mun _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh ghllag gni _ , _ kiyaghte lghii mun _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ tawaten _ pi nghata _ 
yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ el der -et _ niinghute aqe ut _ sivungagh kun _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenun _ , _ manigugh aqe aat _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ taakut _ el der -et _ qaghpa teng _ mat- aghte luki _ lli aqe ait _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenka _ , _ enkaam _ ilagagh aqe ut _ ,
" _ whangkuta _ atanegh ut _ kiyaghnegh ut _ ! _ elpek _ tugu pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ usuqe llegh ghllag t _ , _ quulv allegh llaget _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag t _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh penun _ . _ ulima kaqe te gpeneng _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ , _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ enkaam _ allgegh u lleqe ut llu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ iimg at _ igagh t _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh nite luki _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ taakut _ iimg at _ igagh t _ igagh vike kau ut _ inglugtun _ , _ umeg luteng _ maaghraghvinleg _ se al -en eng _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ yaquleg _ . _ iglagtu luni _ aapte i lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ se al- ellgh et _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimg at _ igagh t _ ? _ "
taawa _ avangite uq _ kitu meng _ alngunak _ qilag mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna m _ asi ani _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimg at _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
enkaam _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag unga _ qayughllak _ naalke nghite kangat _ kina _ alngunak _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimg at _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ el der -en eng _ pi unga _ , _ " _ qiya gpenang _ ! _ ii-i _ , _ li on -a _ . _ Jud ah-m _ ramke aneng _ pi u uq _ , _ David - emllu _ kingunegh ke a _ . _ kayaalqe i i ste u uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ itagnagh uq _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ se al- ellgh et _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ iimg at _ igagh t _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ saaghw ani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ . _ Quk iit n iteftuq _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ el der -etlu _ . _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ esghaqaaluni _ nikimqun _ tuqu tke aq _ . _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ , _ maaghraghvinleg neng llu _ iye lgu uq _ . _ taakut _ iye t _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh ke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayagtekagh i _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ nuna m _ .
Penniighaghaam _ taku luku _ umu i llgu sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh neng _ tu w ii _ iimg at _ igagh t _ .
tugu yaki _ iimg at _ igagh t _ , _ taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ yuginagh llu _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ el der -et _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ Penniighaghaam _ . _ Tam agh aghmeng _ tugumiiqe luteng _ harp- meng _ , _ gold - mengllu _ sagnegh ghhagh neng _ esleqnga lghiit _ in c en s e-meng _ . _ I n c en s e- et _ yughaghkagh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ .
ilagagh ut _ nutaghagh meng _ ilagaate meng _ whaten _ : _ " _ itagnagh uten _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ iimg at _ igagh t _ , _ ikugh yaghqaa luki llu _ se al -ng it _ . _ tuqute kau lghiiten _ , _ aaw pen engllu _ tukfigh kaqe aten _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellngit _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ ramke neng _ , _ ulu neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ nunatagh aneng llu _ .
enkaam _ Ataneghpagullgh an i test aten _ , _ priest- ngughte ta ten llu _ kiyaghnegh mnnun _ , _ umiileg stun llu _ igleghte te i lleqe ut _ nuna mi _ . _ "
esghapag ma lunga _ nagaqugh anka _ me it _ yaquleg lghute ghllag t _ . _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ kes te pagning ilnguut _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ uvit angani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ el der -etlu _ .
iglagtu luteng _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ tuqu tke aq _ , _ itagnagh uq _ allgeghsaghqagh u luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleq _ , _ aklungi _ , _ peghqinellegh _ , _ iknaqe llegh _ , _ quulv alleq _ , _ nighughqell eq _ , _ usuqe llegh llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ tamaghhagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ qilag melnguut _ , _ nunamel nguut _ , _ nuna m _ asing anilnguut _ , _ kell iin il nguutlu _ . _ qamagte luteng _ pi lghiit _ aqumga lghii mun llu _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ , _ Penniigh aghagh munllu _ , _ " _ usuqe i lleg nge tek _ , _ quulv alleng itek _ , _ nighughqell eng itek _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elgu teklu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ , _ " _ el der -etlu _ sekete uute luteng _ nuna mnun _ , _ manigugh agket _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ , _ Penniighagh aankuk _ .
taagken _ esghapag aqa _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghtekanga _ sivuligh _ se al- elleq _ taaku neng _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ se al- ellegh neng _ . _ Taw an teftut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ ataasigh _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ me a _ kallug stun _ tengng aalghii _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ ughluvegh lgu uq _ , _ qaghpa lightu aat llu _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kayaalqe i ikagh _ anguyag mineng _ , _ enkaam _ aane uq _ kayaalqe i i manginagh na luni _ .
Penniighaghaam _ qelpegh saqminigu _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ se al- ell ghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
ila a _ kuuni m _ aane uq _ , _ kavilngugh u uq _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ pi lleghqagh lightu aat _ yug t _ nekegg me tun nan ii tesqelluki _ tuqu qu utes qelluki _ . _ tuunekagh at llu _ savigpag ghrugllag meng _ .
taagken _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpegh saqminigu _ pi nga yiite anga _ se al- ell ghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ pingayut ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ esghagh aqa _ tagnegh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ apegh kau sigh lgu uq _ iigge mini _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me stun _ ayuq esug nilnguq _ akule itni _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Qu ar t -em _ imagh a _ wheat -a _ akike a _ ataasigh m _ d en ari us-em _ . _ pi nga yu t _ qu ar t -em _ imigh a _ b ar le y- t _ akike ai _ ataasigh m _ d en ari us-em _ . _ iwernga _ naafqe gpenakek _ ol iv e-em _ mesiigh a _ , _ wine- a llu _ . _ "
taagken _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpegh saqminigu _ estamat ii ta a _ se al- ell ghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
esghagh aqa _ aghs aall aak _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste yan _ ategh ke a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ H ad es -em _ maligte a _ . _ P illegh qal it kaa f tuk _ tuqu q iisqelluki _ estam agh qellgh an _ nuna m _ yug i _ savigpag kun _ , _ panegh aa tellegh qun _ , _ aqnighnegh kun _ , _ ugw ighs alghii t gunllu _ teghig ke sagh itgun _ nuna m _ .
taagken _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpegh saqminigu _ tallimat ii ta a _ se al- ell ghem _ , _ esghagh anka _ asi anite luki _ aghqefig m _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu quqagh t _ . _ tuqute kaqe kangit _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kaqe kangit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ ungipagh qu ma inagh ke ait llu _ .
akilghuu ghllag ut _ , _ " _ kaay _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ atanegh _ , _ agleghnagh uten llu _ , _ ipa pigu uten llu _ ! _ tamaakut _ nuna m _ yug i _ tuqu quqagh t _ whangkunneng _ , _ naten _ tag kaan _ utaqa i uute naqe ziki _ nanqigte yaghqaa luki llu _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki llu _ ? _ "
taagken _ ataasi k aght iita _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu tke aat _ qatelghii meng _ atkuy aal itk iit _ , _ meghnaali aghte sqekagh it llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ ila i _ ugpeqaal gutng it _ , _ Christ- amllu _ qepghagh tengi _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ ellngit a _ tuqu tell ghistun _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali naqe ut _ kenlanga _ uglagh tal ngit _ naamigtekata _ tamaakut _ tuqute yaghqagh t _ .
esghapag aqa _ Penniighaghaam _ qelpegh saqminigu _ aghvinleg ii ta a _ se al- ell ghem _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ siqinegh _ tagnegh a _ suvinagh lghii tun _ qiipaghagh tun _ ulimakagh tun _ g o at -em _ melqw aneng _ . _ Tan q iq llu _ esleqnga lghii _ aaw stun _ lliigh uq _ .
ighaleqetaagh t _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ nuna mun _ katam _ tawaten _ qig um angil nguut _ fig s -et _ ifkagh qu uute lghiit _ uqfig meng _ anuqe ghllag m _ ufsug te llegh atun _ .
qilag a _ aviighute uq _ iimg at _ igagh t _ im ell ghistun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ naayghagh t llu _ qiighqagh t llu _ nuugh qugh te ut _ ne meggneng _ .
taagken _ nuna m _ umiileg i _ , _ igleghutisteng i _ , _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg it _ , _ aklung ilnguut _ , _ qiilngumighte i kayug t _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ qepghaghtelaagh et _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil nguutlu _ iigh uute ut _ qaye ni _ , _ akule itni llu _ uyghag t _ naayghagh ni _ .
naayghagh nun llu _ uyghag nun llu _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ ullegh vike kut _ iigh esqell uta _ gginagh aneng _ aqumga lghii m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ , _ sakraa llegh ghllag aneng llu _ Penniighaghaam _ !
kaa tuq _ aghneq _ aghyuugh i lleghqagh ghllag ak _ whangkunnun _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ anag lleqe agu _ ! _ "
tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ esghagh anka _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ estamat ni _ kangighagh itni _ nuna m _ . _ yaquleg t _ nuq neq ef tiit _ estamat _ anuqe t _ anuqligh nghite sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ nalighmeng _ kellii ni _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig ni _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ mayugh lghii _ asiv aghmeng _ tugumiigh leg _ nalluniigh ta aneng _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ yaquleg m _ akilgh uug ii _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleghmeng _ naafqe sqellug qu _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a llu _ .
yaquleg m _ pi a _ , _ " _ naafqe gpenaan _ nuna _ nalighmeng _ kellaag igh a _ nalighmeng _ uqfig t _ ! _ utaqa itek _ kenlanga _ se al- ell emnnun _ qagugh itgun _ qepghagh tengi _ kiyaghnegh mta _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ qafsig nge ta i _ yug t _ se al- el agh tuq iit _ qagugh itgun _ . _ yug t _ uglaghtala it _ 1 4 4 ,000 -nguftut _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ ramke aneng _ Israel -em _ .
Jud ah-m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ R e u b en -em _ ramke aneng _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ G ad -em _ ramke aneng _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ ,
A s her -em _ ramke aneng _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ Nap h tal i- m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ Man as se h - m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ ,
Sim e on-em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ Lev i -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ Is s ach ar -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ ,
Z eb ul un -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ Joseph -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ , _ B en j amin -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2,000 -nguftut _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ esghagh anka _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ yug lghute ghllag t _ kitum _ alngunak _ kes te pagning il k angi _ ! _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ nunatagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ ulu neng llu _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ Penniighagh aam llu _ sivu gkenkun _ . _ qiipaghagh u uute luteng _ qatelghii neng _ , _ tugumiigh iigh luteng llu _ pal m -em _ uqfig an _ avayagh itneng _ .
akilghuu te ghllag ut _ , _ " _ yuguligh llegh _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ Penniighagh aam llu _ ! _ "
qamagte luteng _ yaquleg t _ nekeve uute ut _ uvit ang itni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ el der -etlu _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ . _ taagken _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tamaghhagh mi _ usuqe ligu _ , _ nighughqell igu _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike ligu _ , _ quulv aghl igu _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ peghqinellegh leg _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elek _ , _ iknaqe lleg leg llu _ . _ ellnga _ tawatete uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ ! _ "
taagken _ ataasigh m _ el der -en eng _ aapte aanga _ , _ " _ kinkungaawa t _ qatelghii meng _ qiip aghagh ngalghiit _ , _ naken llu _ pi u aat _ ? _ "
kiimsigh aqa _ , _ " _ yugu ni uq _ , _ elpek _ liisima katen _ . _ " _ Elder -em _ pi unga _ , _ " _ Taaku nguut _ suflughte tke aat _ seghleliigh rukutaagh llagmeng _ . _ Penniighaghaam _ aaw akun _ aghvig luki _ qiipaghagh teng _ , _ qategh stekaqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivu gkeni _ kiyaghnegh m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ temple- nga ni _ . _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ azigutigh lleqe ai _ nayute te nga llegh mineng _ .
iyatagh iqe nanigh lleqe ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ meqsug yug nanigh lleqe ut _ . _ Siqin ghem _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uguqnagh ghllag lghii m _ ugute naanghite ai _ .
pennagh ii aghagh aq _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ saaghw anite ngughk _ pennagh igh nigh ughtekete lleqe aat _ . _ maghyaghqugh lleqe ai _ sengngugh lghii nun _ megh nun _ unguvall elit ikayug nun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ quni ightugh lleqe ai _ . _ "
Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghte aqe yamigu _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta a _ se al- ell ghem _ , _ qilag mi _ qall eg nanigh waagh utut _ entaqun _ aflu m _ aveg llegh atun _ tag kaan _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh kun _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ qalghightaute ngugh u te ut _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ , _ tugumiigh leg _ gold-meng _ sagnegh meng _ , _ tagi luni _ nekeve uq _ aghqefig gni _ . _ tuunekagh at _ in c en s e- elghut meng _ ila tesqelluki _ qamagte luki _ yughagh u i te nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ . _ yaquleg m _ lli a _ gold - egnun _ aghqefig gnun _ sivung anil nguuk _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ .
I n c en se -em _ agepsugh a _ mayugh uq _ maligte te luni _ yughagh llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ . _ mayugh ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ sagnegh meng _ yaquleg m _ tugumiigh aneng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ , _ tugu luku _ sagnegh _ , _ imigh aa _ kengh aneng _ aghqefig m _ . _ sagnegh m _ imigh a _ miluute ai _ nuna mun _ . _ enkaam _ kallugughte ghllag uq _ , _ kavlegtagh ghllag uq _ , _ nigh waagh pag tagh llagtuq _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ qalghightate te leg t _ yataaghqe ut _ qalghigh tin al uteng _ .
sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ kaftekrag nkuk _ , _ kengh enkuk _ akume lutek _ aaw meng _ nuna mun _ miluute agket _ . _ enkaam _ pingayugh qell gha _ nuna m _ panegh uq _ , _ pingayugh qell ghit lu _ uqfig t _ panegh ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ sungaghyug lghiit _ vegaagh t _ panegh ut _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ sa u a _ naayghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ kumagh ug ngalghii _ , _ miluute aat _ kellii nun _ . _ enkaam _ pingayugh qell gha _ kellii m _ aaw gugh tuq _ .
Pingay ugh qell ghit _ kell iin ilnguut _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu ut _ , _ pingayugh qell ghit lu _ angyaghpag t _ naaf qengng waa ghii _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii _ t or ch -etun _ , _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh uq _ pingayugh qell ghitgun _ kiiw t llu _ sengngugh lghiit llu _ megh t _ .
ategh a _ ighaleqetaagh m _ " _ sungagh ni _ " _ . _ Pingay ugh qell gha _ megh m _ sung aghn igh tekaq _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ megh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ qayughllak _ megh _ sung aghn igh te kaalghii _ .
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ saam _ tenpe ai _ siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ ighaleq at aagh etlu _ , _ enkaam _ pingayugh qellgh i _ mamlegte ai _ . _ Pingay ugh qell gha _ aghnegh m _ mamleg a _ , _ pingayugh qellgh allu _ unug em _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ nagaqugh aqa llu _ qawaagpag _ tengaa lghii _ quulvani _ , _ iglagtu luni _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguuq _ ! _ kinguligh t _ pi nga yu t _ yaquleg t _ qal ghi ghh naq eg ku megteki _ qalghightate te teng _ , _ taagken _ elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh u naqngu uq _ yug nun _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ ! _ "
taagken _ tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ esghagh aqa _ ighaleqetaagh _ ifkaghkagh _ qilaga meng _ nuna mun _ , _ ke y- lit kaa f tuqlu _ qelpeghte sqellug qu _ asi ligh negh ilnguq _ laag u aq _ .
ighaleqetaagh m _ qelpegh a _ asi ligh negh ilnguq _ laag u aq _ . _ Tes am aken _ agepsugh _ aane uq _ katam _ agepsugh atun _ egllu ghllag m _ repall _ siqinegh llu _ qilag a llu _ mamleg a _ agepsugh m _ .
taagken _ agepsugh meng _ aanleghaate ut _ lo cus t- el ghutet _ , _ nuna mun llu _ ukig uute ut _ . _ Kaa pig aq legh u tekat _ yug neng _ , _ katam _ s c or pi on -et _ kaa pii qell ghistun _ .
ungipaate kau lghiit _ lo cus t- et _ naafqe fqiita _ vegaagh t _ pisqelluki _ nalighmeng _ sungaghyug t _ nunivagseghagh t _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig t _ . _ aqnighte sqekagh i llu _ tamaaku ngin aat _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nalluniigh llghite kangi _ qagugh itgun _ .
L o cus t- enun _ tuqu qugh ste na nigh ke ai _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ taawanginaq _ ikfiq es teghllag es tes qegkii _ tallim anun _ tanqigh nun _ . _ S c or pi on -et _ kaa pell ghistun _ yug t _ ikfiqe ghllagkagh t _ .
Taaku ni _ tallimat ni _ tanqigh ni _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuquyug pigte lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqupagningite lleqe ut _ . _ yug t _ tuqu naqe ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu naanghite ut _ .
L o cus t- et _ esghaqagh u luteng _ kuuni stun _ ayuqe ut _ pilluw amun _ yataaghqekagh t _ . _ Naas qw it n ite ftut _ llangaqa _ gold -et _ qaghpa t _ , _ gginagh it llu _ yug t _ ggin iistun _ ayuqe luteng _ .
nuyagh it _ aghnagh t _ nuy iistun _ ayuqe luteng _ , _ ggute it llu _ li on -et _ ggu utng istun _ ayuqe luteng _ .
yugusigh megteggun _ qal telgu ftut _ esghaqagh u luteng _ savikenghaagh t _ sakimag iitagh t _ . _ Yaq w ghit allu _ sulugtagh llegh it _ llangaqa _ ch ari o t- et _ kuunituqagh t _ sukera lghiit _ pilluw amun _ .
papeg lgu ut _ s c or pi on- estun _ kaape i kayug meng _ . _ enkaam _ tallim anun _ tanqigh nun _ yug t _ ikfiqe ste ghllag ait _ papeg meggneng _ kapugh luki _ .
umiileg lgu ut _ igleghte te i lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ yaquleg u uq _ esghagh ma ke i ste nga _ asi ligh negh il nguum _ laawaagh m _ . _ H eb r ew- stun _ ategh a _ Ab ad d on _ , _ Greek - estun _ Ap oll y on _ , _ ( _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ naafqii sta _ " _ ) _ .
sivuligh _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag _ alpag uq _ , _ taam _ kingu aneng _ paninang _ maalghug _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag k _ pi yaghqaa uk _ .
taagken _ aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ gold - egneng _ aghqefig gneng _ estam aneng _ sighunegh leg gneng _ te ker qam eg nekun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivung anil nguuk _ .
Taam _ me m _ aleghqugh aa _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ yaquleg t _ qalghightate te leg _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iteme te ki _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ asigh qeng ngalghiit _ kiig w llag egni _ E up h ra tes - egni _ ! _ "
enkaam _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ iteme tke ai _ . _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tea- mete te _ aflu mun _ , _ aghnegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mun llu _ tuqu q iisqelluki _ pingayugh qellgh i _ yug t _ .
ungipaate aanga _ uglaghtala itneng _ kuuni tgun _ igleghte lghiit _ pilluwaghtet _ , _ 2 00 _ m ill i on -nguftut _ .
esghaghwaagh lleg mkun _ esghagh anka _ kuuni t _ , _ igleghutisteng itlu _ . _ sakimag iitagh it _ kengh estun _ kavite ut _ , _ s ap ph ir e- estun _ sungaghyukegte ut _ , _ s ul ph ur - estun _ , _ y ell o w -nguftut _ . _ kuuni t _ naasqw it _ li on -et _ naasqw istun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ q aanghi t neng _ aane ut _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
Taa kutgun _ pi nga yu tgun _ naafqii llegh ghllag tgun _ tuqu qugh ait _ pingayugh qellgh i _ yug t _ . _ kuuni t _ q aanghi t neng _ aanleghaate ut _ kenegh _ , _ agep es uq _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
kuuni t _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elgu ut _ q aanghi t nillu _ papeg itni llu _ . _ papeg it _ nemeghyagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ naasqugh leg t _ kiitigh qu sagh it _ yug nun _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuqute llghite kangit _ tamaakut _ naafqii llegh ghllag t _ , _ avuteghqe ma ite ngugh t _ pegte yug ma ite kangit _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ . _ manigugh nanigh mangite ait _ tughneghagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t llu _ ulimaagh t _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ siilu meng _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng llu _ . _ tamaakut _ esghaate yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nagaqugh te yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ piyug yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ .
talwa _ avuteghqe tke ma ite kangit _ yugtagh lleg teng _ , _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te llegh eng _ , _ nalighmeng _ tegleg niigh lleg teng _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ aghtugh igate ghllag _ yaquleg _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ . _ pilugug nga uq _ qilag waaghmeng _ , _ naasqw an _ qula ani _ aglu k _ , _ gginagh a _ siqinegh tun _ kuukgute luni _ , _ ighu kek llu _ kumaghugh lghii stun _ pill ar - estun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
tugumiiqe ai _ iimg at _ igagh ghhaat _ qel pal nguut _ . _ aghenqignegh t _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ kellii m _ megh an _ qaye akun _ , _ saghumignegh t llu _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ qute kun _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ akilghuu uq _ li on-em _ uw ighh nii llgh atun _ . _ akilghuu ghllag yan _ maa r aghvin leg yag et _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh ut _ .
maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh yata _ igaqe naqe yagh anka _ sa meng _ pill ghit _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aksaqe ki _ maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ sa meng _ pill ghit _ , _ igaqe gpenaki _ ! _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ qilag mun _ nengug te ai _ aghenqignegh t _ iigge ni _ ,
akeqe i uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ellnga u lghii _ ulim agh ikaq _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ taa kun ilngugh neng _ . _ yaquleg _ pi uq _ , _ " _ pi lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ .
iwernga _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qal ghi ghh naq egkumigu _ qalghightate te ni _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ uspeqe i lleg ni _ qayvighte ma ite kete ni _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ ataasigh u uq _ aapte qugh a _ qepghaghte minun _ uuknaliq ist enun _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqughkagh ma _ me m _ qilag meng _ aleghqugh laatagh aanga _ , _ " _ aglagh luten _ tugu ki _ qel pal nguut _ iimg at _ igagh t _ iigg anilnguut _ yaquleg m _ nekevgha lghii m _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ "
yaquleg mun _ aglagh lunga _ tungsigh anka _ imeg nga lghiit _ igagh ghhaat _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tugu luki _ neghe ki _ ; _ aqsaqugh gpeni _ qugaagte lleqe ut _ iwernga _ qanegh gpeni _ muugate lleqe ut _ ho ne y- stun _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ iiggagh neng _ tugu luki _ iimg at _ igagh ghhaat _ negh anka _ , _ imani _ qanegh mni _ muugate ut _ ho ne y- stun _ . _ iwernga _ tuufte yaqenka _ aqsaqugh ka _ qu waag taa _ .
taagken _ pi atnga _ , _ " _ allameng _ uuknaliqe tke pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ yug lghute t _ , _ nunatagh lghute t _ , _ al aaghhiin aat _ ulu lghute t _ , _ umiileg lghute t llu _ . _ "
taagken _ kitum _ ayaviigh lightu aanga _ usputagh sigh ke sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ kayagte aanga _ , _ " _ usputagh yaghtugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ aghqefig k llu _ , _ keste naketen llu _ yug t _ maniguute lghiit _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ usputagh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nge an _ court-nga _ eslatagh anite ngughk _ , _ qayughllak _ tuune kau uq _ Gentile-enun _ . _ Tutm aas gh aq naq ng waat _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ f or t y _ t w o - gh yag ni _ tanqigh ni _ .
ungipaghteke _ pilugug nga lghiik _ s ac k c l oth -meng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill el elleq agka _ uuknaliqe sqellug kek _ 1 , 2 6 0 _ aghnegh nun _ . _ "
maalghug _ ungipagh tek _ maalghug u uk _ ol iv e-em _ uqfig k _ , _ maalghug u uk llu _ kenegh lghutagh m _ tunemagh kek _ nekevgha lghiik _ sivungagh ni _ Atangh an _ nuna m _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ , _ qaangh egk eneng _ ken ghem _ aane luni _ tuqu qugh lleqe aik _ anguyag ik _ . _ kitum llu _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ taawa _ tuqute yaghqaaghte lleqe uq _ .
Aghtugh yaghqaanghi ll elg uuk _ qilag a _ eslallug ugh nan iisqelluku _ uuknal iqellgh egk egni _ . _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi ll elg uuk _ megh t _ aaw ugh tesqelluki _ . _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi ll elgu uk lu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ikfiqe na lghii neng _ seghleliigh llag neng _ , _ awen _ tawaten _ pi aqe lleqe uk _ piyukellegh meg etun _ .
apeghiigh kayek _ ungipagh nghmeng _ , _ asi ligh negh ilngughmeng _ laawaagh meng _ aane lleqe uq _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ Pilluw agh lleq aak _ enkaam _ kayaalqe gkumikek _ tuqu lleqe ak _ .
kemegkwaagh ik _ tamaan llequ k _ tume ani _ ne ghllag m _ , _ Atan ghita _ qaquuragh vig ani _ . _ taana _ negh ghllag _ ategh ke uq _ S od om -em engllu _ Egypt- mengllu _ qayughllak _ yug i _ S od om -eghm iis tunllu _ E y g p t- eghm iis tunllu _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ulu neng _ , _ nunatagh neng llu _ tagi lleqe ut _ esghagh na lukek _ kemegkwaagh ik _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe ut _ pi nga yu nun _ aghnegh nun _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ qungugh snanigh lleqe agket _ .
taake uk _ uuknaliqe istek _ ikfiqe ste i ghllag kau lghiik _ nuna m _ yug itnun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ quya ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ tunqugh u lleqe ut llu _ tunute yameng _ ila meggnun _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llegh gkenun _ .
iwernga _ kingu itneng _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aneghnegh ni _ itegh stekagh a _ uuknaliq is teg nun _ . _ enkaam _ nekeve yayek _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ esghagh lukek _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
taagken _ uuknaliqe istek _ nagaqugh aak _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ mayugh tek _ whavek _ ! _ " _ anguyag ik _ esghapag ma luki _ mayugh uk _ qilag mun _ qilawaagh kun _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ qevuute pigte luni _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ ; _ qu lagh qell gha _ ne ghllag m _ naave uq _ . _ enkaam _ seven _ th o us and _ yuug _ tuqu qugh aa _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag an _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ yaywaasekagh t _ kakavaatagh te ghllag luteng _ us uqu ugh taat _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ alpag uq _ , _ iwernga _ esghaghte ggu _ pi nga yu a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ iglagtu pigte luteng _ me t _ qilag mi _ pi ut _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ nuna m _ atanegh pag ul qaagh taak _ atanegh mta llu _ Christ- ang anllu _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ igleghte te i lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ siivanllegh t _ aqumga lghiit _ umiileg u sigh tgun _ aqumutagh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ , _ gginagh teng _ sekete luki _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ke aat _ : _ " _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ iiwleng llu _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ tugu magh an _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite llegh ghllag n _ enkaam _ piinligh uten _ igleghut imun _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ sakrite ghllag ut _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ sakraa lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ . _ tuqukagh t _ nanqigte yaghqaaghte ut _ . _ akileghtugh yaghqaaghte aten _ qepghaghte ten _ uuknaliqistet _ , _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yug ten _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ sii vag ke igh lghiit _ elpeneng _ , _ ukav an le nguutlu _ apeghseghugh t llu _ . _ tuqu qu lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ tamaakunun _ tuqu quqagh neng _ yug neng _ nuna mi _ . _ "
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ qilag mete ngughk _ qelpate uq _ . _ tawani _ temple- nga ni _ esghagh agka _ ark- ek _ kiyaghnegh m _ C ov en an t- elghut akek _ . _ taagken _ nighwaagpagtagh uk _ , _ eftughtagh uk _ , _ tengngaagtagh uk llu _ kallug k _ ; _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ , _ kaftekrag ughte ghllag aa llu _ !
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ : _ aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ itegagh i _ tanqigh kun _ nekegte luteng _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lug ni _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ .
qumig lgu uq _ , _ ighn i yugem _ aqnighqellug qu _ lliigh aa _ , _ aane aqe llegh an _ taghnughhagh m _ aragh qugh a _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ ila a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ apeghiigh naqe lghii mun _ : _ taawa _ kavite ngughk _ d rag on- eghllak _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ , _ qula _ sighunegh leg _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ naasqw i _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ .
papeg mineng _ saqipeg te ai _ nuna mun _ pingayugh qellgh i _ qilaga m _ ighaleqetaagh i _ . _ taagken _ d rag on -a _ nekevekagh _ manu akun _ aghnagh m _ negh na luku _ taghnughhagh a _ ighni i ghesnagh kagu _ .
aghnagh _ ighnegh nge uq _ , _ igleghte te yaghqagh i _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nuna m _ yug i _ ir on -meng _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh a _ akuqagh luku _ aglagh te aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ umiileg u sigh gkenun llu _ aqumutagh gnun _ .
aghnagh _ qimag uq _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe kanga _ nekaghqagh meng _ , _ aflengake yaghqaqe kangat _ 1 , 2 6 0 _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qilag mi _ pillugute ut _ . _ M i ch a el -enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ pilluwagh aat _ d rag on -a _ . _ D rag on -enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ pilluwagh iit _ M i ch a el -enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ ,
iwernga _ M i ch a el -enkut _ kayaalqe aat _ d rag on -a _ . _ enkaam _ d rag on -enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ qilag mete yaghqaa nanigh ut _ .
qilag meng _ miluute aat _ d rag on- eghllak _ . _ ( _ neghightagh lug _ nemeghyagh _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh _ , _ puugh qugh te nga _ nuna m _ yug an _ . _ ) _ miluute aat _ nuna mun _ yaqulegtuumagh an _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu luni _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ whaa _ kaate ma ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuguligh i llegh a _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ Christ- ang anllu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ . _ salin _ tughneghagh _ miluute llghite luku _ qilag meng _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ anaggute nga na iqe ai _ ugpeqaalgu te put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutem ta _ kayaalqe ma ut _ aaw akun _ Penniighaghaam _ , _ ungipagh ke llegh megteggun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapighqell gha _ . _ talwa _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ .
enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ qilag mi _ , _ quya te ghllag tek _ ! _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh unaq nguusi _ nunamel ngugh nillu _ kell iin ilngugh nillu _ ! _ tughneghagh m _ ukig vike ma aisi _ , _ sakrite ghllagu uq _ qayughllak _ liisimake a _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghtugh uq _ . _ "
D rag on-em _ liigike yamigu _ nuna mun _ miluute lleg ni _ , _ malighqagh aa _ aghnagh _ ighnegh ngekagh _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh _ tuunekagh at _ qawaagpag ghrugllag m _ yaqugh gkeneng _ tengaa sqellug qu _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ paqniite lleqe uq _ nemegh yameng _ , _ aflengake lleqe aat llu _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
taagken _ nemeghyagh m _ ughyugh te a _ megh _ kiiw stun _ ayuqe lghii _ aghnagh _ maaqute sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ nuna m _ kayusiite a _ aghnagh _ . _ nuna m _ agitaghte te luku _ tuufte a _ megh ghllag _ d rag on-em _ ughyugh tke a _ .
taagken _ d rag on-em _ ugumi yagute ghllag luku _ aghnagh _ , _ enkaam _ pilluwagh yaghtu ghii _ qamagte luki _ ila i _ king ungh i _ . _ Tamaa kunguut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh itnun _ , _ ataasiigh mel nguutlu _ ip allegh mun _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ Jesus-em _ .
taagken _ d rag on -a _ nekeve uq _ kellii m _ esnagh akun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ teghikusalluuk _ aane lghii _ kellii meng _ . _ qula u ut _ sigh ungh i _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ . _ qamagte luteng _ sigh ungh i _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ naasqugh t _ igaqugh vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ seghlequ ulghii meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
taana _ teghikusalluuk _ le o p ard - esug n ituq _ , _ itegagh i _ kaynge m _ itegagh atun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ qaan gha _ li on-em _ qaangh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ D rag on-em _ tuune a _ teghikusalluuk _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mineng _ , _ umiileg u sigh gmineng _ aqumutagh gneng _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqaaghte sta llu _ ategh ni _ atuqe luku _ .
ataasigh _ naas q wa _ teghikusalluug em _ tuqute sug ni tke aq _ kiitigh luni _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ kii yagh llegh a _ maame kau uq _ . _ I ingun aghhaghmeng _ nuna m _ yug ita _ saghiigha yagute luku _ maligte aat _ teghikusalluuk _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ manigugh aat _ d rag on -a _ qayughllak _ teghikusalluug mun _ tuune kanga _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eni _ . _ manigugh aat llu _ teghikusalluuk _ , _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ teghikusalluug tun _ ayuqe a _ ? _ kitum ngam _ pilluwagh lleq agu _ ? _ "
taagken _ teghikusalluuk _ akuzi yaghqaaghte uq _ . _ aangaayugte ghllag uq _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ akuzi tke a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi ll enguq _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luni _ 4 2 - nun _ tanqigh nun _ .
piinligh aa _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke i lleg ni _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ ategh aneng _ , _ kiyaghfig aneng _ , _ tamaaku nengllu _ kiyaghte lghii neng _ qilag mi _ .
Aghtugh yaghqaanghi ll elit aa _ pilluw iisqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ kayaal qes qell ukillu _ . _ igleghte te yaghqaaghte ste ai _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ , _ yug t _ , _ ulu t _ , _ nunat aan il nguutlu _ yug t _ .
qamagte luni _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii m _ manigugh lleqe aat _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ manigugh naanghite aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ igaqe kaqe ai _ ategh it _ nuna ngllagh llghite luni _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ pi ke ai _ Penniighaghaam _ , _ yug t _ tuqu tke ai ta _ .
" _ nagate tek _ , _ sigute lgu kufsi _ :
kina _ alngunak _ tugu yaghqaa kuni _ , _ tugu lleqe aat _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ tuqute yaghqaa kuni _ savigpag kun _ , _ tuqu lleqe aat _ savigpag kun _ . _ taake uk _ whaten _ pi sigh u uk _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa ut llu _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ teghikusalluuk _ nuna meng _ aane lghii _ . _ maalghug gneng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ penniigh agh aam _ sigh ungh atun _ , _ akuzi uq llu _ d rag on -etun _ .
sivuligh _ teghikusalluuk _ tawan lluku _ tung lighh aan _ teghikusalluug em _ atuqe a _ qamagte luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ . _ taaggun _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh qun _ maniguute ste ai _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ sivuligh mun _ teghikusalluug mun _ . _ ( _ kii yagh llegh an _ tuqute sug ni tke a _ , _ iwernga _ kii yagh llegh a _ maamekagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ teghikusalluuk _ allaaghlluwhaght ighllag aataghtuq _ , _ talwa _ qilag meng _ nuna mun _ kenegh _ ukig ste a _ yug t _ esghaam an ghitni _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ teghikusalluuk _ aghtughyaghqaanghill enguq _ allaagh lluw aght iyaghq aaluni _ tawan tellgh ani _ sivuligh m _ teghikusalluug em _ . _ tamaagun _ allaaghlluwhaght illegh teggun _ puughte ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ . _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ nang aghn engll iisqelluki _ quulv iisqelluku _ sivuligh _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ ( _ taana _ tuqute kaayagh lghii _ savigpag kun _ iwernga _ unguvaqagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ teghikusalluuk _ aghtughyaghqaanghill enguq _ aneghnegh nge ste i yaghqaa luni _ unguvallegh meng _ nangaghnegh anun _ teghikusalluug em _ . _ enkaam _ nangaghnegh _ akuz iyaq leg ugh tuq _ . _ taagken _ nangaghnegh m _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ tuqu q iisqelluki _ tamaakut _ maniguute yu nghite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ teghikusalluug em _ nalluniigh ta ii sqe ai _ n um b er -meng _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ aghenqignegh itgun _ iigg itgun _ nalighmeng _ qagugh itgun _ . _ tawaten _ qelegh ai _ aangwaagh ugh ngaata _ , _ ukav an sagh ngaata _ , _ aklung itegh ngaata _ , _ aklum agh ngaata _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh unghi tegh ngaata _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh ngaata _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tukfigh i yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akike i yaghqaa nghite uq _ wetku qun _ nalluniigh lleg lgu kuni _ . _ taana _ nalluniigh lleg ke te aq _ teghikusalluug em _ ategh ke a _ nalighmeng _ ategh an _ n um b er- kaa _ .
peghqinellegh leg m _ liigike naagh aa _ una _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mikun _ liigike lleqe a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ teghikusalluug em _ number-nga _ . _ taana _ n um b er -a _ yug mun _ ategh u uq _ , _ 6 6 6 -nguuq _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ naayghagh mi _ Z i on -mi _ . _ ellngan ite u te ut _ 1 4 4 ,000 _ yug t _ , _ qagugh megteggun _ igaqe vikekagh t _ ategh aneng _ , _ ata an llu _ ategh aneng _ .
nagaqugh aqa llu _ me _ qilag meng _ . _ nagate kau luni _ llangaqa _ qalla atun _ meghllag t _ , _ tengngaag atun llu _ kallug m _ . _ nagate kaqe a _ me _ llangaqa _ h ar p - es tet _ ayngananga te lghii stun _ h ar p - et gun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
1 4 4 ,000 _ yug t _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ el der -etlu _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ ilagagh aqe ut _ ilagaat egh ragh aghmeng _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ taana _ ilagaate _ liite yaghqaqe nghite kanga _ iwerngaqun _ 1 4 4 ,000 _ yug t _ . _ Ellng inguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugul ik ii _ qung angitneng _ nuna m _ yug aneng _ .
taakut _ yug t _ nukeggnaghqe ma ite ngugh u ut _ aghnagh meng _ atuqe i llegh kun _ . _ maligte aqe aat _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghaani _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugul ik aqii _ akule itneng _ nuna m _ yug an _ , _ tunusagh ke yuwhaagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ Penniigh aghagh munllu _ .
iqlengiqe igate u aghte ut _ . _ apallugh ite ut _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ tengaa lghii _ quulv aghp ani _ . _ apegh ai _ kenle ite ngugh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ nunat aan il ngughnun _ yug nun _ , _ ramke nun _ , _ ulu nun _ , _ yug nun llu _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ usuqe teggu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ ! _ yug neng _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ kaawtu uq _ . _ manigugh teggu _ ulim agh ikaq _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sengngugh lghii neng llu _ megh neng _ ! _ "
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ maligte a _ sivuligh _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ Babyl on- eghllak _ naavuma uq _ ! _ Babyl on-em _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ sex -meng _ wine- etun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wine- mineng _ megheg squgh igh a _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit a llu _ seghletun _ sex _ atuqe yagute aat _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuugh ste lleqe ut _ . _ "
pi nga yu ak _ yaquleg m _ maligte te uq _ sivuligh gnun _ . _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ manigugh kunigu _ teghikusalluuk _ , _ nangaghnegh a llu _ , _ allgegh sim akum igu llu _ nalluniigh llegh _ qagugh mikun _ nalighmeng _ iigge mikun _ 
megh yaghqaqe a _ wine- nga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh an _ . _ taana _ wine- a _ me ligh ma ite ngughk _ kuuvekagh _ qayuusigh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ke a _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ manigugh tke aq _ taa kugnun _ ikfiqe ghllag yaghqaa uq _ kenegh mi llu _ , _ sulphur- mi llu _ , _ sivu itni _ agleghnagh lghiit llu _ yaquleg t _ , _ Penniighagh aam llu _ .
Ken ghem _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe ai _ , _ agepsugh a _ mayugh lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ikfiqe nanigh naanghite ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtu magh an _ , _ maniguute kau te meggneng _ teghikusalluug mun _ , _ nangaghnegh anun _ , _ nalluniigh kau te meggneng llu _ ategh aneng _ . _ "
tamaakut _ qamagte luteng _ whaten _ pi sigh u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ Tamaa kunguut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh anun _ , _ ataasiighmete luteng llu _ Jesus-mun _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ qilag meng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ igaqe gu _ una _ : _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ quya saghqagh u ut _ tuqu yaghqagh t _ qepghagh te ma luku _ atanegh _ ! _ " _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ " _ quyanagh pestaagh ut _ ! _ meghnaali lleqe ut _ ughleghiigh llegh meggneng _ , _ yug t _ neqamike lleqe ait _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh it _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ qilag u aq _ , _ qil aw aghqun _ aqumga uq _ llangaqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ . _ naasqugh mikun _ gold-meng _ qaghpa lgu uq _ , _ tugumiiqe a llu _ ipeg lghii _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ aqumga lghii _ qilag waagh mi _ , _ " _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig n _ atuqe luku _ unatagh a _ , _ qayughllak _ unatagh lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuna m _ piite stekagh a _ un atagh yaghqaagh teng nguuq _ ! _ "
enkaam _ qilawaagh mi _ aqumga lghii m _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ unatagh sigh ke a _ nuna mun _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ qilag mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ ipeg lghii meng _ pak reg mel ngughmeng _ savig lgu uq _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ aghqefig gneng _ aflengake i ste nga _ kengh an _ aghqefig m _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ yaquleg _ ipeg lghii meng _ pak reg mel ngughmeng _ savileg _ , _ " _ savig gpeneng _ kepugh ki _ grapes -et _ nuna m _ v ine- nganeng _ , _ qayughllak _ grapes -et _ qig um aat _ ! _ "
enkaam _ yag ul gem _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ saqipeg te a _ nuna mun _ , _ kepugh ai _ grapes -et _ nuna m _ v ine- nganeng _ . _ taagken _ miluqutagh ke ai _ grapes -em _ qageghqugh sigh ghllag anun _ . _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakrite vig ghllag a _ .
grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ esl at aan il nguuk _ ne ghllag m _ . _ G rapes -et _ qageghqugh yalghiimeng _ aaw k _ maaqe uq _ qageghqugh sigh neng _ 1 8 0 _ mil es _ tagtale kellug qu _ , _ 5 _ feet _ uusqaghtu lleg kellug qu _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ aliigh uq _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ . _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ tagite i lghiit _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ taakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ taaqe niite tke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ meghraag kegte aq _ siqin waagh estun _ , _ akume nga lghii _ kenegh meng _ . _ esghagh anka llu _ kayaalqe i ikagh t _ teghikusalluug meng _ , _ nangaghnegh aneng _ , _ ategh an llu _ n um b er- nganeng _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ saaghw aghni _ kellii m _ , _ h ar p - eligh tu ulluteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ke ii te neng _ ellngit nun _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ ilagagh ta aneng _ Moses-em _ , _ ( _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaghte nga _ ) _ , _ ilagagh ta aneng llu _ Penniighaghaam _ : _ " _ kaay _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ qepghagh llegh ten _ seghlegh ghllag u ut _ , _ allaaghlluwh aghllag uut _ ! _ kaay _ , _ umiileg at _ nuna m _ yug ita _ , _ elpek _ sa llegh ten _ elqughute nga ut llu _ ipa u ut llu _ !
atanegh _ , _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ yug t _ alike lleqe aaten _ , _ quulvagh lleq aatlu _ ategh n _ ! _ Ellng in aag uten _ agleghnagh lghii _ ! _ Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ nunatagh t _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aaten _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ nanqigte i llegh ten _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ ! _ "
Taam _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ qelpeghtegkangat _ temple- a _ . _ ( _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh u uq _ na _ , _ ellnga n _ yug ita _ liisimake sigh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ tawan niluku _ . _ )
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ aanleghaate ut _ temple- meng _ kel qelluteng _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ nighugh lghii meng _ , _ sakimag megteggun _ gold-meng _ tafsi luteng _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ unguva lghii m _ estam aneng _ taaku neng _ , _ gold-meng _ sag nel iqu ghii _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ . _ taakut _ sagnegh t _ imigh nga ut _ sakr aallegh ll aag aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
Temp le -em _ ilu a _ agep sugh q aag aa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighugh qellgh anengllu _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh anengllu _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh naanghite uq _ temple- mun _ kenlanga _ maaghraghvinleg _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ kenlet gh uu tell ghitnun _ , _ tagi tke ait _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ .
taagken _ temple- meng _ nagaqugh aqa _ iglagtu lghii _ me _ , _ ungipaate kangi _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ " _ kuuve yaghtugh teki _ nuna mun _ maaghraghvinleg _ sagnegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag i _ ! _ "
enkaam _ sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve yaghtugh aa _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag t _ aqnighnagh pigte lghiit _ pupig t _ piit qu utut _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh nun _ teghikusalluug meng _ . _ Tamaa kunguut _ manigugh tke aat _ nangaghnegh anun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kellii nun _ . _ taagken _ kellaag igh a _ aaw atun _ tuqukagh m _ yug m _ lliigh luni _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ unguva lghiit _ kellii ni _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kiig w nunllu _ , _ sengngugh nun llu _ megh nun _ enkaam _ aaw ughte uute ut _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ igleghte te i lghii _ megh neng _ yaquleg _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ kaay _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ el pe nguuq _ maaten _ kiyaghte lghii _ , _ el pe nguuq _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ nanqigte i llegh ten llu _ aghyuugh i llegh ten llu _ elqughute nga ut _ .
yug t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ yug ten _ , _ uuknaliqiste t enllu _ , _ enkaam _ megh yaghq al it aten _ aaw meng _ . _ tawaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ ellmeggneng _ allgegh tek aqaat _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ aghqefig gneng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ ! _ ipa u ut llu _ elqughute nga ut llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ten _ ! _ "
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ saghn eni _ kuuve a _ siqinegh kun _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ siqin ghem _ kengh anun _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ .
Siqin ghem _ uguqnagh ghllag an _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ igleghte te i ste u ta aneng _ tamaavek _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag nun _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ , _ usuqe nghite aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ teghikusalluug em _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ , _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ mam legh qw aag aa _ . _ yug t _ ikfiq em _ ulu teng _ amqeghqugh ait _ .
sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ apallugh ke luku _ aqnighqe llegh meggneng llu _ pupigtaa llegh meggneng llu _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ seghletun _ pi llegh meggneng _ .
aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kiiw llag egnun _ E up h ra tes - egnun _ . _ kiiw k _ pategh uk _ yataaghqe te na luki _ tume kaghqagh meng _ umiileg t _ tagi lghiit _ asiv aghmeng _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ pi nga yu t _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ f ro g - esug nilnguut _ . _ aane ut _ q aanghi t neng _ d rag on-em _ , _ teghikusalluug em _ , _ uuknaliqiste sighwaagh emllu _ .
taakut _ tughneghagh t _ allaaghlluwhaght ikayug uftut _ . _ aghulaqe ut _ umiileg itnun _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte na luki _ pilluw amun _ aghnegh ghllag ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atanegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate aghte tek _ ! _ tagi u unga _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ ! _ quyanagh uq _ teghh umalghii _ , _ aatkagh ni _ pii f tengngwaagh luki _ ayuqe kangi _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte naanghite uq _ amsikagh mi _ , _ kayngusaghagh te naanghite uq llu _ tesqagani _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ ! _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ qerngughte ait _ umiileg t _ Ar m ag ed d on -mun _ . _ tawaten _ H eb r ew- gh m iistun _ atigh llegh a _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ esla kun _ . _ temple- mi _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ iglagtu pigte luni _ me _ pi uq _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ "
taawa _ nighwaagpagtagh uq _ , _ tengngaagtagh uq _ , _ ka lli tuq _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ taana _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag a _ seghl elleghpig aaguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ yung llagh yugg allgh aneng _ .
negh ghllag _ pellegh uq _ pingayugh qelluni _ . _ nuna t llu _ ne ghllag it _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ naave uute ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ Babyl on- eghllag em _ seghleghqe llegh i _ . _ enkaam _ megh sta _ wine- a _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ sakrite llegh ghllag mineng _ imaqe lghii _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiighqagh t _ aviighute uute ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ naayghagh t _ kaave uute ut _ .
kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ 1 00 _ uqigtutka vzigh lghiit _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ tamaakut _ yug t _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh _ apallugh ke luki _ kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ . _ taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ seghlegh pigu lghii _ .
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ , _ taaku neng _ ataasigh m _ taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ aghyuugh lleghqagh aneng _ apegh segh uum _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ aqumga lghii _ meghllag tgun _ .
nuna m _ umiileg i _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ atuqe aqe luku _ aghnagh _ . _ seghlegh t _ atuqe i ste i llegh i _ wine- etun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug i _ suume aqe ut _ megh nghmegteggu _ wine- nga _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ Taghneghagnekun _ aglagh te aanga _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tawani _ esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ aqumga lghii _ kavirrakegtagh kun _ teghikusalluug kun _ . _ Tegh iku sall uuk _ igaqugh vike nga uq _ uzimun _ sa ngugh ughte sigh neng _ ategh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh lgu uq _ , _ qule u ut llu _ sigh ungh i _ .
aghnagh _ pilugug nga uq _ esneyaagh meng llu _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ enkaam _ ull ng aqluni _ gold-meng _ , _ aki tugh llagmeng _ uyghag meng _ , _ pe ar l - mengllu _ . _ tugumiiqe a _ gold -a _ qayuusigh _ esleqnga lghii _ seghlegh n alghii neng _ kiyaghtaallegh neng _ , _ nukeggnagh lghii neng llu _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ .
qawaag ni _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ apeghseghugh _ Babylon _ , _ naa ke aat _ yugusigh meggneng _ akike i kayug t _ aghnagh t _ , _ seghlegh nall gh anengllu _ nuna m _ .
esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ suume lghii _ aaw itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ , _ aaw itneng llu _ tuqu quqagh t _ qayughllak _ ataasiigh melnguut _ Jesus-mun _ . _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ saghiigha yug ghllag unga _ .
iwernga _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ sangavek _ saghiigha yug ziin _ ? _ ungipaate naqe amken _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi sigh u te kek _ aghnaa nkuk _ , _ teghikusalluug enkuk _ . _ taana _ teghikusalluuk _ igleghte te i lghii _ aghnagh meng _ , _ naasqugh lgu uq _ maaghraghvinleg _ , _ sighunegh lgu uq llu _ qula _ .
Tegh iku sall uuk _ esghagh kan _ unguva yagh lghii u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ mayugh lleqe uq _ Saam n angil ngughmeng _ L aag waaghmeng _ naafqe lleg nge na luni _ . _ yug lgu uq _ nuna mi _ ategh it _ igaqe llghite ngugh t _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ nuna _ piinligh llghite luku _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ teghikusalluuk _ saghiigha yug lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ unguva yagh lghii _ , _ tuqukagh _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh yuqagh m _ liigike lleqe a _ una _ : _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ qemi t _ aghnagh m _ aqumga vig i _ .
taakut _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut llu _ umiileg t _ . _ tallimat _ tuqu kau ut _ , _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i u uq _ , _ enkaam _ ataasigh _ salin _ tagi igate uq _ . _ tagi kuni _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
Tegh iku sall uuk _ unguva yagh lghii _ iwernga _ tuqukagh _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite u uq _ umiileg _ . _ taana _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite a _ umiileg _ ila ke aat _ sivuligh t _ maaghraghvinleg _ umiileg t _ , _ naafqe lleg nge yaghtugh u uq _ .
" _ esghaghkagh ten _ qula _ sigh ungh et _ , _ qula u ut _ umiileg t _ salin _ igleghte te i igate ut _ . _ iwernga _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eng ellequ t _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luteng _ ataasigh _ aflu _ maligte te luteng _ teghikusalluug mun _ .
taakut _ ataasigh _ umyugagh ke luku _ tuune lleqe ait _ teghikusalluug mun _ aghtughyaghqaanghill e tengllu _ pi lleghqagh teng llu _ .
enkaam _ pilluwagh lleqaat _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ . _ iwernga _ Penniighaghaam _ kayaalqe lleqe ai _ qayughllak _ atanegh ke kangat _ at an ghet _ , _ umiileg ke kangat llu _ umiileg t _ . _ Penniigh aghagh melnguut _ tuqlugh kau ut _ , _ nakmike kau ut _ , _ ataasiigh mel nguug utlu _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ esghagh aten _ megh t _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ aqumga vig i _ . _ taakut _ megh t _ yug lghute ghllag u ut _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ ulu ke lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
esghaghkagh gpek _ qula _ sigh ungh et _ , _ teghikusalluug emllu _ , _ ugumiite lleqe aat _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ . _ S aq ragg iigh ulluku _ , _ amsi qagh qelluku _ , _ kemeg a _ negh luku _ , _ taagken _ siipnegh a _ kumagh lleqe aat _ .
taakut _ qula _ sigh ungh et _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellngit nun _ atuqe stekaqe a _ piyuke lleg ni _ . _ angeghqe ma te kau ut llu _ tuun aluki _ ataneghpag u lleg teng _ teghikusalluug mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh llegh anun _ .
taana _ aghnagh _ esghagh kan _ negh ghllagu uq _ igleghte te i lghii _ umiileg itneng _ nuna t _ . _ "
Taam _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ . _ Aghtugh yaghqaanghi ll eleg llaguftuq _ , _ nighugh qellegh mineng _ iingun aghh aan _ nuna _ nighugte a _ .
akilghuu ghllag uq _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ naavuma uq _ Babyl on- eghllak _ ! _ nekagh ughte ma ut _ tughneghagh t _ , _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ , _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ kusge nagh lghiit _ qawaag t _ .
Babyl on-em _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ sex -meng _ wine- etun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ nunataghh an _ tamaghhagh an _ meghe a _ . _ nuna m _ umiileg ita _ atuqe aqe aat _ , _ nuna m llu _ akilpeg agh tengita _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u aat _ nuqete saghqagh u nghite ngugh qun _ sex-kun _ atuqe i yu llegh akun _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ ila a _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ yug mni _ , _ aanleghaate tek _ Babyl on -meng _ ! _ ilate gpenasi _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ aghyuu lleng nayuk afsi _ ellnga nun _ maligte te lusi _ .
seghleghqe llegh i _ may- ughte ghllag nga ut _ uus qagh tutk aghmeng _ qilag tun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ seghleghqe llegh i _ .
seghletun _ pi teggu _ Babylon _ katam _ ellnga n _ seghletun _ pillgh atun _ . _ malghughqellug qu _ seghletun _ pillgha _ pi teggu _ . _ qayuusigh akun _ kuuve teggu _ wine- a _ iknaq e tul nga _ malgh ugh qeng ngaan _ ellnga n _ atuqe aqe ka aneng _ .
ellmi neng _ usuqe ghllag aqe uq _ , _ aklungi ghllag ni llu _ atuqe aqe a _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyukekagh minun _ . _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag teggu llu _ qivghu ste ghllag teggu llu _ atunekiite ste luku _ qaghya llegh ghllag anun _ . _ ellmi neng _ pi aqe uq _ , _ ' _ queen- ngugh u nga _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh mkun _ . _ ugingighagh u nghite unga _ enkaam _ qivghu naanghite u aghte unga _ ! _ '
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnegh ghhagh inagh mi _ kaate lleqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ , _ qivghu llegh m _ , _ negh ke igh sag ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ ken ghem _ panegh lleqe a _ qayughllak _ aghyuugh i ste nga _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ . _ "
nuna m _ umiileg i _ ila tke aat _ atuqe i llegh anun llu _ qiliigh yug llegh anun llu _ , _ esghagh kumegteggu _ agepsugh a _ panellegh an _ qiya kete lleqe aat _ , _ iglagtu pigte luteng llu _ qiya ke ghllagte lleqe aat _ .
Uy av an lluteng _ nekeve lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ellmeng llu _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ ! _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ elpek _ aange ghllag _ aghtugh igate ngughk _ negh ghllag _ , _ Babylon _ ! _ aghyuugh lleg nge uten _ ataasigh ghhagh mi _ aflu mi _ ! _ "
nuna m _ akilpeg agh tengita _ qiyaaghwagh tke aat _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ tukfigh nanigh kangit _ saghya it _ .
Babyl on -mi _ akilpeg aghtet _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ gold -et _ , _ silv er -et _ , _ akitu ghllaget _ uyghag t _ , _ pe ar l -etlu _ ; _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ qiipaghaghqagh t _ ulimaagh t _ linen- meng _ , _ silk- meng _ , _ qiipaghaghqagh t llu _ iqeghte aqe lghiit _ esneg yagh u aaghet _ , _ kavirrakegtagh t llu _ . _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ unaghsigh t _ , _ ulimaagh t _ naangqugh neng _ , _ aki tughllag neng _ unaghsigh neng _ , _ siilu neng _ , _ savikengh aag neng _ , _ m ar b le- en engllu _ .
aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ c in n am on -et _ , _ s pi ce- et _ , _ in c en s e- et _ , _ m yr r h -et _ , _ f r an kin c en s e- et _ ; _ wine- et _ , _ ol iv e-em _ mesiigh i _ ; _ avlawa t _ , _ wheat -et _ ; _ c at t le- et _ , _ penniigh t _ , _ kuuni t _ , _ w ag on -et _ ; _ talwa _ yug t _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ qepghaghtelaagh uluki _ .
Akil peg aghtet _ Babylon _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit _ allgegh suk eghllak aghten _ aviighute ut _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ aklungi ghllag ten _ qelmegh ghllaget _ aviighute ut _ , _ allameng llu _ allgeghsaghqagh u nanigh aten _ ! _ "
Akil peg aghtet _ aklungi igh ikagh t _ akike i luteng _ Babyl on -mun _ , _ nekevgha lleqe ut _ uyav an lluteng _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ qiya lleqe ut _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ ,
whaten llu _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ ' _ Seghleghwaagh uuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaagh uuq _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aate kayugu yagh uq _ linen- meng _ , _ esneyaagh meng _ , _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ ull ng aqegk ayug uyagh tuqlu _ gold-meng _ , _ aki tugh llagmeng _ uyghag meng _ , _ pe ar l - mengllu _ !
ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ " _ qamagte luteng _ angyaleg t _ , _ yug it _ , _ passenger-ngit _ , _ akilpeg agh tetlu _ iglegha kayug t _ angyaghpag tgun _ allgegh te na luteng _ kiyagh usigh qam eggneng _ , _ angyaghpag it _ aghula i iqe aat _ uyav an lluteng _ Babyl on -meng _ kumagh aqngan _ .
esghagh luku _ agepsugh a _ kumagh llegh an _ , _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ alla _ ne ghllag ite uq _ wh atel ngughmeng _ ! _ '
naasqugh teng _ pagula lightugh ait _ qiya te kete luku _ , _ qivghu te kete luku _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ Seghleghwaagh uuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaagh uuq _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aklungi ghllag aneng _ qamagte luteng _ angyaghpag leg t _ aklungi igh i kayugu yagh ut _ ! _ iwernga _ ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ qilag meng _ kina _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kaay _ qilagmel ngugh ni _ , _ quyake teggu _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe a _ Babylon _ ! _ quya tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ apostle- eni _ , _ uuknaliq ist en illu _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aa _ qayughllak _ seghletun _ pi kaqe kangisi _ ! _ "
taagken _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ keveg aa _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ , _ g ra in -mun _ kagimte i sigh stun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ miluute a _ kell imun _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ Tawateghpigaq _ negh ghllag _ Babylon _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ miluute ghllag lleqe a _ asitmun _ enkaam _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite aat _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh naanghite ai _ h ar p - este ten _ , _ pill gu ghi kat _ ay ng an ang as te ten _ , _ f lu te - este ten _ , _ qalghigh tagh te t enllu _ ! _ qamagte luteng _ pill gu ghi kat _ qepghaghte ten _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ , _ g ra in -meng _ kagim tes te ten _ alla llu _ nagaqugh naanghite ait _ !
kenegh lghutagh m _ nighug a _ kuuk gun naan igh naq uq _ elpek ni _ . _ me ik _ nulightugh naqe lghii m llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii m llu _ nagaqugh nanigh naqe uk _ elpek ni _ . _ Akil peg agh te ten _ aght iig at ngwaagh yagh tut _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ alignaghtaagh llegh gpegun _ puu ghqu qagh katen _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nuna m _ yug i _ !
Babyl on -mi _ taawa _ aaw it _ uuknaliqistet _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ tuqu tke aat _ nuna mi _ . _ "
kingu aneng _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ akuzillegh an _ , _ qilag mi _ nagaqugh anka _ yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu lghiit _ , _ " _ H all el u j ah _ ! _ yuguligh llegh _ , _ quulv alleq _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleq lu _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke ai _ !
ellnga n _ nanqigte i llegh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ elqughute nga ut _ ! _ ellnga n _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ apeghseghugh _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ qayughllak _ nuna m _ yug i _ seghletun _ pi stegkangi _ sex-kun _ atuqe ste aqe luni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akite kaqe a _ qayughllak _ qepghagh tengi _ tuqu qugh stegkangi _ . _ "
yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu laatagh ut _ , _ " _ H all el u j ah _ ! _ ne ghllag m _ kumagh lghii m _ agepsugh a _ mayugh u uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ el der -et _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ niinghute uute luteng _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gmikun _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ H all el u j ah _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ me _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ usuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ qamagte lusi _ qepghagh teng ani _ alike i lghii ni _ ellnga neng _ , _ ukav an leng ugh nillu _ aangwaagh ni llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ llangaqa _ me it _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ nagate kau luteng _ suk sug istun _ tevlughte ghllag lghiit _ megh t _ , _ kallug m llu _ tengngaagtagh llegh atun _ ayuqe luteng _ . _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ H all el u j ah _ ! _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ igleghte te i uq _ !
quya te lta _ , _ elngaatall _ quya ghllag lta llu _ usuqe lteggu llu _ ! _ Penniighaghaam _ nengughte lleghqagh a _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuliighqagh a llu _ yataaghqe ma uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh ma a _ ugiigh naqe lghii _ pinigh rakeg tameng _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ . _ " _ ( _ " _ linen- a _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ )
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ una _ igaqe gu _ : _ Penniighaghaam _ nengughte llegh an _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ negh yaghtigh sqekagh t _ quya stekau ut _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh akun _ manigugh na luku _ , _ iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ elpetun _ , _ ugpeqaalgu teg pe tunllu _ . _ Ellng inguut _ ataasiigh melnguut _ ip allegh mun _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ . _ Ip alleq _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ taan anguuq _ ip alleq _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ uuknaliq ist enun _ ungipagh ke stekagh a _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ ! _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ ategh a _ " _ Ataa siigh melnguq _ , _ ipapik _ " _ . _ elqughute nga ut _ nanqigte i llegh i _ , _ pilluw aq angillu _ anguyag ni _ .
iye kek _ kumaghugh llegh atun _ ken ghem _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lghute lgu uq _ . _ ategh a _ ellnga kun _ igaqe nga uq _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke kanga _ iwerngaqun _ ellnginagh an _ .
atkuyaagh k _ atugh kek _ neptekau uk _ aaw kun _ . _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite anga _ " _ .
qilag meng _ pilluwagh tengita _ maligsaagh aat _ uugte luteng _ qatelghii tgun _ kuuni tgun _ , _ atkuy aagh luteng _ iqa ite ngugh meng _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ .
Q aan gh aneng _ aane uq _ ipeg lghii _ savigpag _ , _ taaggun _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ n aku miit _ kayaal qugh lleqii _ . _ igleghte te lleqe ai _ ir on -meng _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ taagken _ tutmagh lleqe ai _ anguyag ni _ katam _ yug t _ tut m aghaq ell ghistun _ grapes -et _ qag egh qu usi g nilnguut _ . _ taana _ tutmagh llegh _ sakraa llegh ghllag ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atkuyaagh akun llu _ qugtuqagh akun llu _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ whaten _ ; _ umiileg a _ umiileg t _ , _ Atan gha _ at an ghet _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ siqinegh kun _ . _ qamagte luki _ qawaag lghute t _ quulvani _ tengaa lghiit _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi a _ , _ " _ tagi laghate te lusi _ qerngughte te k _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ghllag anun _ !
tagi tek _ , _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ umiileg t _ , _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg it _ , _ pilluwagh tetlu _ . _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ kuuni t _ , _ kuuni kun _ iglegh tes tet _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh et _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil nguut _ , _ ukav an lenguut _ , _ aw nge aaghet llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ teghikusall uuk lu _ , _ nuna m llu _ umiileg i _ , _ pilluwagh te kullghiit _ qerngughte te ut _ pilluw aghnaluku _ igleghte lghii _ kuuni kun _ , _ pilluwagh teng illu _ .
T ugw aag ket _ teghikusalluug enkuk _ , _ uuknaliqiste sighwaagh enkuk _ allaagh lluw aght iigh aataq aq _ tawan lluku _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ ( _ All aagh lluw aght ii qellegh mikun _ puu ghqu qu ai _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh t _ teghikusalluug meng _ , _ manigugh qu aat llu _ nangaghnegh a _ . _ ) _ Tegh iku sall uug enkuk _ , _ uuknaliqiste sighwaagh enkuk _ unguv aag kenka _ miluute ak _ naayvagh m _ kengh anun _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ sulphur- meng _ .
Pilluw agh teng ik _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ tuqu qugh ai _ savigpag kun _ qanegh mineng _ aanekagh kun _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ qawaag t _ negh ait _ kemegkwaagh it _ kepsugh qiinagh llegh meggnun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ tugumiiqe luni _ ke y- nganeng _ Saam n angil nguum _ laawaagh m _ , _ qiipraghute ghllag neng llu _ .
kayaalqellug qu _ d rag on -a _ tu waa _ . _ ( _ D rag on -a _ taan anguuq _ ayumightagh _ nemeghyagh _ , _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ tughneghagh _ . _ ) _ taagken _ yaquleg m _ asighte qugh a _ qiipraghute neng _ th o us and _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
miluute luku _ laawaagh mun _ , _ taagken _ amig meng _ umeg te luku _ m aghq a tut kaa _ se al- el uku _ . _ enkaam _ D rag on-em _ puughte yaghqaa nanigh ai _ yug t _ kenlanga _ th o us and _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ alpag kata _ iteme te aghte lleqe aat _ .
