taagken _ esghagh anka _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh t _ , _ aqumga lghiit llu _ taa kutgun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i yaghqaaghte stekagh i _ yug neng _ . _ Es h agh ank allu _ unguva sagh it _ tamaakut _ naasqw igh tuq iit _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ . _ ungipagh ke kaqe kangat _ ip alleq _ Jesus-em _ qayvighqekagh a _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taakut _ maniguute mangite ut _ teghikusalluug mun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nangaghnegh anun _ . _ talwa _ qagugh megteggun _ , _ nalighmeng _ iigge megteggun _ allgegh tellghi taat _ nalluniilkutagh a _ teghikusalluug em _ . _ unguvagh uute luteng _ igleghte te i lgusigh aat _ Christ-a _ th o us and _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
taana _ sivulii uq _ unguvagh qugh llegh _ . _ ( _ ila i _ tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute naanghite ut _ kenlanga _ th o us and _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ )
tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tekii _ unguvagh uute yuwhaagh llegh mi _ quya stekau ut llu _ agleghnagh ut llu _ . _ tuqu naanghite ut _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ priest- ngun aq nguut _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ Christ- am unllu _ . _ igleghte te i lgusigh lleqe aat llu _ Christ-a _ th o us and _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
Th o us and _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag kata _ , _ tughneghagh _ anusimingllaghvig aneng _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ .
enkaam _ aane luni _ puughte qugh lleqe ai _ nunatagh t _ mingite nga lghiit _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tamaakut _ nunatagh t _ ategh ke ait _ G o g -enkuk _ M ag o g -enkuk _ . _ yug ik _ uglagh ghllag ut _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ esne m _ . _ taagken _ tughneghagh m _ qerngughte lleqe ai _ pilluw amun _ .
tughneghagh m _ pilluwagh tengi _ iqelmun _ mingite luteng _ igleghte lleqe ut _ nuna kun _ . _ kaate luteng _ kangllu lleqe agket _ nunaagh llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ nayugh at _ , _ negh ghllag llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqekagh a _ . _ taagken _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenegh _ ukig ste luku _ paneghtekagh i _ pilluwaghtet _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh _ puughte ikagh _ nunatagh neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ita _ miluute lleqe aat _ naayvagh mun _ kumaghugh lghii _ sulphur- meng _ . _ tawavek _ miluute kaqe kegket _ teghikusalluug enkuk _ , _ uuknaliqiste sighwaagh enkuk _ . _ tawani _ ikfiqe ghllag lleqe ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ aqumga lghii _ qatelghii g nekun _ umiilgusig nekun _ aqum utagh llag eg nekun _ . _ nuna llu _ qilag a llu _ qim aag uu tuk _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawan tellgh aneng _ , _ alla llu _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenatek _ .
esghagh anka llu _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ , _ uk al iiw aq lu tengllu _ aangwaagh u aqe luteng llu _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ igagh t _ qelpeghte ait _ , _ igagh i _ unguvallegh m _ , _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ ategh itneng _ tamaakut _ unguva yaghqagh t _ quunperugllag _ . _ ila i llu _ igagh lghute t _ qelpeghte ait _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ tuqukagh t _ kiyaghtaall ghitneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ atuqe luki _ igaqughkagh t _ igagh tgun _ .
taagken _ kellii m _ tuquma ste lugh u i ni _ pegte ai _ . _ tuqu llegh m llu _ H ad es - emllu _ tuquma ste lugh u i tek _ pegte aik _ . _ Qamagtengngwaagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ kiyaghtaall ghistun _ .
taagken _ tuqu llegh llu _ H ad es - lu _ miluute agket _ naayvagh m _ kengh anun _ . _ naayvagh m _ ken gha _ tuungligh ke a _ tuqu llegh m _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ategh a _ igaqe ma ite kan _ igagh ani _ unguvallegh m _ , _ milugh tke aat _ naayvagh m _ kengh anun _ .
taagken _ esghagh agka _ qilag ragh aq llu _ nun agh r aghaq lu _ . _ qilag ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ nuna ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ kellii igh te kau uq llu _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ , _ Jerusalem - egh ragh aq _ , _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ qilagmel ngughmeng _ . _ negh ghllag _ yataagh qelluni _ ugiigh naqe lghii m _ ull ng aq ellgh atun _ ugi minun _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh gneng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghfig a _ yug nite uq _ ! _ kiyaghfig ke lleqe ai _ enkaam _ ellngit _ yug ke lleqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga _ katam _ ellngitnite lleqe uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aat _ .
quni igh lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ . _ tuqu u i lleqe a _ , _ qivghu u i lleqe a _ , _ qiya nga i lleqe a _ , _ talwa _ aqnigh qengng ii lleqaa _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ atuqe yagh kangit _ atuqe nanigh lleqe ait _ . _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gnite ngughk _ aqumutagh gni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ki qun _ , _ ulima aqe anka _ sa u aat _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nutaghagh u luki _ ! _ " _ whaten llu _ pi uq _ , _ " _ igaqe ki _ tamaakut _ apeghkagh nka _ elpenun _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ akuzite t _ ipa u ut _ , _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ O meg a- nguunga _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ , _ aki u na an _ meghsi lleqe aqa _ sengngugh lghii meng _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug meng _ megh meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kayaalqe i i lghii m _ allgegh lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ whanga mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ enkaam _ ellngit _ avaqutagh ke lleqe anka _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ quyughtagh lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ , _ seghl elleghpig aghneng _ seghleghqe lghiit _ , _ yug tagh tet _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ alignagh lghiit _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ iqlengagh lghiit _ , _ nekaghqagh at _ naayvagh u uq _ kumaghugh lghii _ kenegh meng llu _ sulphur- meng llu _ . _ Taananguuq _ tuungligh a _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ esleqnga lghii neng _ kinguligh neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ , _ ataasigh m _ taaku neng _ taku anga _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ ugiigh naqe lghii meng _ , _ nuliighqagh a _ Penniighaghaam _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ yaquleg m _ tugu lunga _ aglagh te aanga _ uusqagh lleghpigagh anun _ naayghagh m _ . _ tawani _ kelgute a _ Jerusalem _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ qilagmel ngughmeng _ .
K uuk gutng aghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighugh qellgh aneng _ . _ negh ghllag _ kuukgute uq _ akitu ghllag lghii tun _ uyghag tun _ , _ j as p er -etun _ , _ megh r aak eg tutk aghmi _ c r y s tal -etun _ .
uusqagh ghllag meng _ mingllute leg _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ll alg aat aq _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yaquleg t _ amig ghllagnite ut _ . _ Ataa sik aghtagh meng _ amig ghllag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ramke aneng _ Israel -em _ .
mingllu ta a _ ne ghllag m _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag leg _ , _ pi nga yu t _ asivagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aywaa ni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ ikevagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ pakfalla mi _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta a _ tunemagh igh kau uq _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ uyghag neng _ . _ Ataa sik aghtagh meng _ uyghag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle- nganeng _ Penniighaghaam _ .
yaquleg _ aleghqugh tek a _ gold-meng _ usputagh lgu uq _ usputagh na luku _ negh ghllag _ , _ amig ghllag i llu _ mingllu ta a llu _ .
negh ghllag _ ull uv iigh rakeg teftuq _ tagtal nga _ , _ p ategh tul ng atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ yaquleg m _ negh ghllag _ usp utagh yaqminigu _ : _ 1 , 5 00 _ mil es _ tagtale ke a _ , _ pateghtu lleg ke a _ , _ uusqaghtu lleg ke a llu _ .
mingllu ta a llu _ usp utagh yaqminigu _ , _ 2 1 6 _ fe e t- nguftuq _ uus qagh tul nga _ . _ yaquleg m _ usputagh llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ yug m _ usputagh llegh a _ .
mingllu ta a _ ulimaagh u uq _ j as p er -meng _ . _ negh ghllag _ ulimaagh u uq _ gold - ep ereg waaghmeng _ . _ G old -a _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ siqin wh aagh tun _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta an _ tunemagh i _ pinigh naagh qusigh luteng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ aki tughllag neng _ uyghag neng _ . _ sivuligh _ j as p er -nguftuq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ s ap ph ir e- nguftuq _ , _ pingayut ii ta at _ ag ate -nguftuq _ , _ estamat ii ta at _ em er al d -nguftuq _ ,
tallimat ii ta at _ on y x -nguftuq _ , _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ c ar neli an -nguftuq _ , _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta at _ ch r y s ol ite -nguftuq _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu ligh ta at _ b er yl -nguftuq _ , _ estam aneng _ inglu ligh ta at _ t o p az -nguftuq _ , _ qule ughte ta at _ ch r y s o pr as e- nguftuq _ , _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ii ta at _ j ac in th -e nguftuq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ii ta at _ am eth y s t- nguftuq _ .
qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag t _ pe ar l -nguftut _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ amig ghllag t _ ataasigh meng _ pe ar l -meng _ ulimaagh u ut _ . _ ne ghllag m _ tume i _ gold - ep ereg waagh uftut _ ; _ gold -a _ megh r aak eg tepig llegh ii _ siqinghwaagh tun _ .
ne ghllag mi _ esghaate nghite unga _ temple- meng _ , _ qayughllak _ temple- nga _ Atangh uuq _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ Penniighagh aag uqlu _ .
negh ghllag _ siq inegh sugh nii tuq _ , _ nalighmeng _ tanqigh ighsugh niite uq _ nighugkagh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ nighughqell gha _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighug ke kanga _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aq llu _ kenegh lghutagh ke kanga _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ nuna m _ yug i _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ nighug akun _ kuukgute nga lghii kun _ . _ nuna m llu _ umiileg ita _ aklungi teng _ tagite uute ait _ ne ghllag mun _ .
ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag i _ umeg naanghite ut _ aghnegh m _ naange nghaani _ qayughllak _ unug naagh nghite ngughk _ tamaani _ .
nuna m _ yug ita _ ne ghllag mun _ tagite uute lleqe ait _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ aklungi teng _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa u a _ seghlegh _ , _ talwa _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghnagh tun _ pi sta _ , _ nalighmeng _ iqlengiqe sta _ . _ iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ tamaaku ngin aghhaat _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh akun _ unguvallegh m _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ Penniighaghaam _ pi ke ai _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kiiw gneng _ maaqe lghiik _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ Penniighagh aam llu _ umiileg u sigh gkenka _ aqumutagh gkeneng _ . _ Unguv all elit ikayug meng _ me leg k _ , _ megh r aak eg tutk alghiik _ c r y s tal -etun _ .
maaqe nga lghiik _ qukaa kun _ tumang an _ ne ghllag m _ . _ kiiw k _ inglugtun _ uqfigtuqagh k _ unguvall elit ikayug neng _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ uqfig _ piite ste i kayugu uq _ f ru it - neng _ tanqigh inagh kun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mi _ , _ ququngagh it llu _ naallghute sigh u ut _ nunatagh anun _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekagh a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ , _ ne ghllag mete naanghite uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ Penniigh aghh aankuk _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh gket _ ne ghllag mete yaghqaa uk _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ qepghagh tengita _ manigugh lleqe aat _ .
gginagh a _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ ategh a llu _ qagugh itgun _ igaqe nga lleqe uq _ .
tamaani _ unug nanigh lleqe a _ , _ ken elgh utagh sugh niigh ulleq ii _ , _ nalighmeng _ siq inegh sugh niigh ulleq ii _ , _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ nighug ke lleqe aat _ . _ igleghte te i lleqe ut llu _ umiileg u luteng _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite t _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ ipa u ut llu _ . _ Atanghem _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i lghii m _ taghneghagh itneng _ uuknaliqiste mi _ , _ kayagtekaqe a _ yaquleg ni _ kelgu vik esqelluki _ qepghagh teni _ sa u aat _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh ni luki _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ quya stekau ut _ qaatke te lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqe nga lghii nun _ u kutgun _ igagh tgun _ . _ "
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ nagate kaqe anka llu _ esghagh kaqe anka llu _ tamaakut _ . _ nagaqugh aqe yamki llu _ esghagh aqe yamki llu _ tamaakut _ , _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh ani _ manigugh na luku _ , _ keleg u vike i steke _ tamaaken _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ whanga llu _ qepghaghte nguunga _ elpetun _ , _ ugpeqaalgu teg pe tunllu _ uuknaliq is testun _ , _ qaatke te lghii stun llu _ akuzi ta itnun _ ukut _ igagh t _ . _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ aksaqe gpenaki _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ ukut _ igagh t _ apeghkagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ pi lleghqagh it _ kaate yaghtugh ma ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi lghii _ nagnegh li _ seghletun _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ nukeggnagh meng _ sumegh ke lghii _ nagnegh li _ nukeggnagh meng _ suum qelluni _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughutngagh lghii _ nagnegh li _ elqughute nga luni _ , _ kina llu _ alngunak _ pelung ilnguq _ nagnegh li _ pelungite luni _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh nka _ kelqe lleqe anka _ nallangightugh na luki _ yug t _ kiyaghtaall ghistun _ .
whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ O meg a- nguunga _ , _ whanga _ sivulii unga _ kinguligh u unga _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga llu _ . _ "
quya stekau ut _ tamaakut _ atkuyaag teng _ aghvig ke ait _ iqangite te ste luki _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh yaghqaaghtekau ut _ piite stekagh aneng _ unguvall elit ikayug em _ uqfig m _ . _ itegh yaghqaaghtekau ut llu _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itgun _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag m _ esl at aan ilnguut _ qikmigh u ut _ , _ alignalghii u ut _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe i ste u ut _ , _ yugte aghte u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ maniguute ste u ut _ , _ iqlengiqe yuneghtu ut _ , _ iqlengiqe manginagh aqe ut llu _ .
" _ whanga _ , _ Jesus _ , _ kayagtekaqe aqa _ yaquleg ka _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvig nil ngughnun _ . _ apegh lleqe ak _ ukuk _ elpesi nun _ , _ ' _ whanga _ David-em _ kingunegh ke aanga _ , _ whanga _ nighug rak egt aagunga _ unaa ngu m _ ighaleqetaagh a _ . _ ' _ "
taghneghagh k llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii llu _ pi uk _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ nagate lghii _ pi li _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ tagi li _ ; _ tugukligh ligu _ aki ite ngughk _ megh _ unguvall elit ikayuk _ .
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ kelengas aagh yug anka _ nagate lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ u kutgun _ igagh tgun _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaraagh kaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ . _ ellnga nun _ ila lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ igaqe nga lghiit _ u kutgun _ igagh tgun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ikuvike gkaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ nengighqe ai _ piite stekagh t _ uqfigagh neng _ unguvall elit ikayug em _ . _ kiyaghte snaanghite a llu _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ ne ghllag mi _ . _ taake uk _ apegh nga uk _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
Jesus- nguuq _ apegh i lghii _ tamaaken _ qamagte luteng _ ipa u ni luki _ . _ pi uq llu _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ " _ amen _ . _ tea- ai _ , _ atanegh _ Jesus _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ . _ amen _ .
sangami _ qiighqagh _ sivuqagh meng _ atigh kau a _ 
sivuqagh m _ ungipagh aa _ 
nuna _ ulima nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ , _ ulimaghista _ megh nal ikaq _ , _ ulimaagh ni _ yuvghiigh qagh a _ .
Taaku m _ tung anga _ esghagh yaqminigu _ m er agh in aaftuq _ .
enkaam _ taaku m _ kellii n _ megh anun _ kagukagh _ .
megh m _ saamken _ teghh aneng _ nuna meng _ tugu tete luni _ sivuqagh a _ .
taana _ sivuqagh ni _ nuna _ llikagh a _ megh m _ qaye akun _ , _ qiighqagh ughtekagh _ .
tagtalmi _ qiighqagh _ nevugh ngekagh _ .
piite vikekagh a _ veg m _ , _ piitesigh aam _ , _ nunivag segh aam _ , _ ququng aam _ .
afsengagh t _ , _ sikig t _ , _ kaviigh t _ uugtekagh t _ qiighqagh mun _ .
aghvegh t _ , _ ayvegh t _ , _ neghsagh t _ , _ ulghaagh t _ , _ nanugh t llu _ tagikagh t _ qiighqagh m _ megh an _ tunganganun _ .
ila a _ uugte yagutekagh _ , _ ila yan _ nayugh ksagutekagh at _ .
ila a _ teghig ke sagh _ uksugh mi _ si kug nekun _ kaate kayug _ .
upenghagh mi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qagugh ak _ katelghaate yagutekagh _ , _ ighni laghate yagutekagh _ .
ila it _ uksughte aqe lghiit _ .
Kiyaghtaa llghem _ tagtale ani _ yugwem _ naalkekagh a _ qiighqagh _ .
nelikagh at _ kiyaghfig kekagh at _ .
qiighqagh _ esghaqaaluni _ llangaqa _ qetekagh _ ing lu pig aghmeng _ iigge meng _ , _ enkaam _ ategh ke a _ sivuqagh _ , _ Ulim agh istem _ sivuqagh a _ .
All aagh lluwh aq _ ayungkaghagh _ 
aasa m _ ungipagh aa _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ nenglu mete ngughk _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ellngin aghh aalghii _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh aghpag gaagh tekaq _ , _ anglu ighpagkagh ghhagh _ .
kaame llgagh u aqe lghii _ , _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh meng _ , _ ayumigh m _ kaa meng aneng _ ayngusikagh meng _ .
emta _ tawaten _ aane aqngami _ taakw eg kutgun _ qilaga t _ tulimagh ita _ kenle itgun _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh ni _ lli ma kanga _ .
lli luku _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ pamavek _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ tesqakmani _ an Ê¼g iq r iq luni _ , _ iiyagh m _ sani ngiighhagh ani _ .
tawaten _ nekevgha ghngaaghmi _ , _ an Ê¼g igh ngaaghmi _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te uq _ me meng _ .
tawaten _ nagate ghngaaghmi _ sa u a _ qama _ allgegh lghii _ me _ :
â _ Sak - maa - nii -nguuq _ sakma _ ,
Sak - maa - nii -nguuq _ sakma _ ,
unaagh _ ii- m aa _ negh iis tet
Aghulaq uu- si - m aat _ !
Iitgh el ten _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â
tawani _ nagate aghte luni _ aga _ aqfaasnaq _ ukig yalghiimi _ , _ ukig yalghiimi _ aga _ itegh uq _ , _ itegh uq _ .
iitghute kete luku _ esghaqu aghte yalghiimi _ megh gnun _ tawavek _ .
megh ma lghii _ taagken _ .
megh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ tamaani _ yuvghiigh luni _ esghapag luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ legan _ mayugh aqe lghii _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ .
pi laataghtugh ngugh _ qama _ :
â _ Sak - maa - nii -nguuq _ sakma _ ,
Sak - maa - nii -nguuq _ sakma _ ,
unaagh _ ii- m aa _ negh iis tet
Aghulaq uu- si - m aat _ !
Iitgh el ten _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â
legan _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aga _ aqfaasnaq _ itegh qaghte aqe lghii _ .
nenglu mun _ qamavek _ maaten _ pi llegh mineng _ elngaatall _ ivagh i uq _ .
taawa _ meghe nghite aghte igate ngughk _ , _ megh aqe lghii _ aghnagh aq _ .
tamaa na _ yuvghiigh aa _ , _ uumtagh m _ saamna _ asi a _ , _ tamaa na _ sa u a _ alngunak _ wata _ .
aane laatagh uq _ .
legan _ aane luni _ mayugh luni _ , _ mayugh luni _ qakmavek _ iiyagh m _ saaghw anun _ kaate luni _ nekeve uq _ , _ qama nguq _ pi laatagh uq _ tawatengwaaq _ legan _ :
â _ Sak - maa - nii -nguuq _ sakma _ ,
Sak - maa - nii -nguuq _ sakma _ ,
unaagh _ ii- m aa _ negh iis tet
Aghulaq uu- si - m aat _ !
Iitgh el ten _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â
legan _ aqfaasnaq _ esghaate naqe pigte luni _ maatenllaam _ aga _ elngaatall _ aqfaasnaq _ itegh qagh uq _ .
maaten _ tawani _ pingayut ii te kun _ meqsug nghite uq _ , _ megh k _ legan _ esghagh lukek _ avelghagh aak _ .
tamaani _ esghaqu luni _ , _ esghaqu luni _ , _ esghaghte yu gnite a _ iye gmi _ aag llegh gkeneng _ inga _ .
kii _ , _ ayungkaghagh a nguq _ whaa _ uqlughte aqe uq _ !
tawavek _ esghapag luku _ , _ esghapag luku _ , _ tekegh mineng _ imeg aa _ , _ imeg aa _ tespik apigh qaagh luku _ sakeqe a _ .
sakeqe luku _ taana _ sakeqe llegh a _ negh luku _ aane uq _ .
aane luni _ mayugh luni _ qaye anun _ tamaakagh _ .
elngaatall _ tamaa a _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmi _ pi laatagh uq _ maateghniineng _ alla pigu luni _ , _ llangaqa _ qengaghllug pigu luni _ :
â _ Sak - p aa- t ii- ku uq _ sak p a _ ,
Sak - p aa- t ii- ku uq _ sak p a _ ,
up-tu aq _ ii- p aa _ tegh iis - tek
Aghulaq uu- si - p aat _ !
Iitgh el tet _ peq sagh taa _ . _ â
aga nguq _ alla _ itegh qaghte te kete luku _ , _ nutem _ tutemqaghqagh meng _ pi luni _ test- pig ke na _ qamagte luku _ elngaatall _ iike a _ , _ liite kanga _ taan ang utanga _ akuzi i aghagh u aatagh lghii _ .
qamagte luku _ tug waa _ .
negh luku _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mayugh luni _ tespamavek _ tawaten _ tamaa te kete luku _ nagate yagh uq _ .
naagu _ alla _ pi nghite uq _ , _ avangite te uq _ .
tawaten _ aneghte lghii nguq _ taan ang uftuq _ ayungkaghagh a _ aghnaghagh m _ .
taawa _ alla llu _ pi nghite uq _ .
tefaay _ ! _ Al iingh aku un _ , _ amsanagh u keuute te _ !
ayungkaghagh ngllagh aqe ut _ upenghagh mi _ salin _ nuna _ anigu lgu luku _ .
meghutlugkwaagh ghhagh t _ nanigh m _ ellngaate aneng _ imigh luki _ laag utu aqe ait _ nuna kun _ anigu m _ tung angakun _ .
Taam _ megh ut l ugwem _ piiznga llegh an _ paye i _ uzimun _ qiigh luki _ kumagh taqagh it _ .
qiigh qiinagh aqe luki _ kumang as taaq iit _ kenlanga _ ellngaate t _ ilu llegh itnun _ , _ maatnegh m _ kum aghnegh aki _ .
En ragh ngam _ pateg llegh itnun _ kumang as luki _ taagken _ anigu mun _ kuuve aqe ait _ nengl is qelluki _ .
taakut _ anig um el nguut _ ayungkaghagh u ut _ .
amaa nkuk _ Meteghll ugw enkuk _ Il ugh aghn igh ullghii k
Ap aseng aam _ ungipagh aa _ 
amenam _ .
meteghllug ghllag nguq _ taana _ estaaghagh ma lghii _ .
naayghagh meng _ iggagmete lleghpigagh aneng _ anigu leg ani _ , _ suqlunqagh gneng _ asi tu m _ estaaghagh yalghiimi _ meteghllug ghllag _ .
Legannguq _ pi aqe uq _ estu laatagh nghmini _ :
â _ Ay a- y a- l uuk _ ,
Ay a- y a- l uuk _ !

K iil uum _ akmag a _

qenwat _ naa an _ maligte ma kanga _ .

akluma lleghpigagh _ quyanagh lleghpigagh _ kuusme _ 
ayuqligh m _ ungipagh ke llegh a _ 
kuusme m _ Pinigh y uug tes te llgha
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ neqamike aqe aqa _ kuusmeyaghtu nghaani _ esla _ quunpeng _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aliineghllug ghllag u aqe lghii _ naqam _ aqlagh ak eg llak _ enkaam _ qakma _ kinku t _ naghughte negh meggni _ piyug llegh it _ aghqiiwtu te _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ unang upig lluku _ aag negh mta _ qalghigh q itegh llaget _ tevragh naqe lghiit _ napi naqe lghiit _ qimugsigh meng _ .
Am san aam _ angtale aneng _ qilug llegh it _ , _ talwa _ ugw atang agh miit _ qikmigh at _ , _ al ir ugw ak eg llaget _ .
piyug meng llu _ piy aan neqeg s aataqut _ qaan ngw aat eng _ qamugh ke luki _ .
nalluniite aqe uq _ sivuqagh _ kuusmete yug nightu aqe a _ , _ kinku t _ esgh an em teki _ quya ma ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe te ghllag t _ .
tamaani _ naagu _ kinku t _ suume qaghte gpenaki _ aqimle meng _ meghe uute lleghqagh it _ , _ aqnighte lleghqagh it _ .
Qel an qen nem teggu _ ataata mta _ tagi lleghqagh a _ 
ataata ut _ qelanqe sag utagh uqagh ut _ pugughilegh meng _ tagi lleghqagh a _ qayughllak _ kuusme _ siv ut gh ulluku _ qimugsigh ghhagh meng _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
ataata ma _ qamite kek _ teghig l ugwem _ inglu aneng _ usi ii ghllag lutek _ tamaaken _ uksaagh mi _ agaghtekagh meng _ kin gh aag aghluteng _ kumlate luteng _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
awen _ apegh aqe kangat _ apa ka _ , _ ataata ma _ awtu anga _ , _ neqe ngllaghtu ni luku _ enkaam _ nagnegh te a _ at aat am aallu _ .
ataata ka _ n ut aagh ameng _ kineghkagh meng _ iqallug meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ qamiye gni _ usi luk eklu _ taawa _ ayuqe ak _ .
uksugh ghllag mi _ ilangakun _ neqangisag aqe uq llu _ .
amenqun _ laluramke t _ kuusme mi _ tab le- eni _ neqenghaghqe te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ whangkuta llu _ legan _ whaa _ taw aaten _ negh u lleqe ukut _ iwerngaqun _ qay ut igh luta _ nuna mi _ .
llaaghanwha _ neqe lgu aqe ukut _ ing av elq iin aqlu _ .

aanqaghte aatagh qu kut _ quya pigte luta _ .
nekefqaghte luteng _ qikmigh t _ uvegh taq iinkut _ ellngit llu _ esghagh nghmegtekut _ quya aqe ut _ .
ila i _ unglegh aqe ut _ entaqun _ megh n um _ qayughllak _ taake lghii _ tume _ pugughilegh meng _ .
qikmigh a _ makughqugh aqe aput _ , _ petug tegh um iita _ , _ neghqe aqe luki _ .
ila i _ naatghigh qugh te luteng _ qikmigh an _ kameg i _ ayuqe ut _ .
talwa _ qikmigh a _ kameg meng _ pr aas en taaq anka _ .
mamleg a qaa _ , _ qama _ g as _ l am p - p em _ qergese kun _ nighug kek _ nighug u te aqe uk _ salin _ sivuqagh _ ken ghi lluku _ .
iwernga _ g en er at or - esqugh h aak _ atugh aqe agput _ wetku _ uqug lgu negh mta _ .
ataata mta _ kameg i _ , _ allighte i _ , _ pig ingh i _ , _ atkug w i _ , _ temkagh i _ agaghte qugh aqe aput _ .
akmagtagh an llu _ imigh a _ nusug ragh tegh aqaput _ .
S uf lugw ii _ qesighte neghsigh luki _ sangighqugh luki _ , _ mesiighqe aqe anka _ .
Kav iigh siigh um aqelghii llu _ .
unaami _ ughug nghata _ afta aqe aput _ , _ niightugh aqe aput _ , _ kinegh nghata _ pinighsagh aqe aput _ av l aaw akun _ .
awen _ itegh qagh qu aqe ut _ ataata ma _ teghiglugtagh aneng _ aap s at _ .
tunqugh aqe ukut _ elngaatall _ .

ilangqughqu llegh ut _ 
enankin _ aange lghii kun _ ataata mta _ qamiye akun _ naayvagh meng _ ikellegh itneng _ taghnughhagh ni _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ .
B o il er -et _ , _ qalta t _ , _ salngagkwaagh t _ imightugh aqe aput _ .
naayvagh mun _ sukera aqe ukut _ atghii negh mta _ , _ nenglagh magh emta _ , _ il aag aam aamta _ , _ uteghmun _ weni _ qule mun _ siinge lqiinagh aqe ukut _ angegh lleg kellug kek _ qamiye gput _ .
kaate negh mta _ miigh aqe ukut _ ilangqugh meng _ .
tamaani _ qel egh teng ngu un aamta _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ .
aqlaghate ngugh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ kiyaghte llegh ut _

Unug mi _ qaam ngaamta _ qavagh aqe lghiikut _ .
aghneghmi _ ker os en e _ h e ate r -meng _ itagsi pigte luta _ atuqe aqe ukut _ .
sakighte uute luta _ nuna mi _ qavagh aqe ukut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ , _ sakighte uute negh mta _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ ro om - eng iighhaq _ esleq aqaghput _ .

iwernga _ aatkagh meng _ imigh u llegh i _ tamaakut _ kanagh f ikugh aqaput _ .
repall _ qivghuke kaqe anka _ amigh meng _ allighagh igh te lghiikut _ , _ itupill _ maqagh aqe yagh lghiit _ .
uglaghi yalghiikut _ alngunak _ sa meng llu _ ulig meng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ alla ii aghagh kau qu kut _ .
kiyang _ atkug mnneng _ iim waaghluki _ akite kaqe ukut _ puvite i _ qam an lluki _ ightugh qen nayuk aat a _ .

itegagh lghute put _ naa mta _ itegagh anun _ qerngughte te aqe aput _ qayughllak _ itegagh i _ maqagh ghllag t _ .

Yug mek aght at _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe ta i _ 
ata mta _ naken _ imani _ lipeghsagh ma aki _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ .

uqfig squghhagh ut _ 
awatkaghtagh _ qem tam es alghii _ uqfig _ naken _ ata mta _ saghn aagh a _ , _ N at i on a l _ G u ard -et _ tagi tke aat _ , _ ategh saqminigu _ pin e _ needle-ngi _ ifkagh te uute ma lghiit _ .
naken _ , _ wallu _ igaghvig meng _ nal ig kenka _ angayuqagh mta _ sungaghyug kegtagh meng _ c rep e _ paper- meng _ pi keng luteng _ tamaakut _ avayagh i _ iim gut f ii kugh yaq meg teg negu _ legan _ whangkunni _ uqfig lluwh aq _ .
kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ taw aa vek _ uqfig mun _ ll il aghtugh aap ut _ .
leganqun _ whanga mni _ laluramke t _ mangtegh iit nilnguut _ , _ c at al o g -en i _ esghagh aqe ke put _ taw aa tel nguq _ kuusme m _ uqfig ut _ .
All aagh lluwh aat _ ken ghet _ uqfig kun _ iim gut kay ugwet _ kumagh u negh meggni _ qallaqugh aqe ut _ , _ or n amen t- et _ , _ whangkuta llu _ igaghvig mi _ ulima aput _ uqfig kun _ 
agaghte uute ghllag luki _ , _ uqfig squghhagh _ esghaqaaluni _ ugh legh iigh teghllag luni _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanglleg nagh igh te a _ uqf iill eg aaghh aq _ .

iwernga _ nal iighh iin aghput _ qik egh qung igalnguq _ amig igh te ghllag ghngaita _ .
kuusme m _ Cards-ngi _ 
yughaghvig ut _ naken _ akmaken _ awtuqagh meng _ c ard s- eng aqelghii _ ayumigh ke te nghaani _ ategh it _ negig luteng _ iikekagh t _ .
nagaqugh aqe ukut _ pika _ tugulagh te ni luki _ .
Y im iy um teggun _ taglagh aghte aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ uglagh llag waaq elghii _ tugulagh te yagh uq _ .
Aku l angit gun _ iwernga _ tugutagh ke ukut _ .
quyake pigte luki _ atghagh te luki _ yuvghiigh aqe aput _ , _ ila i _ mingle kun _ neve ste qugh aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ pr aas en ta sim un _ ateligh sigh ke aqe aput _ , _ iyagh ngllagh aqe ukut llu _ ila i _ aflenga kaqe aput _ .
piniqumtaagh nka _ tamaaku nguut _ akmani _ nani _ s k ate - t iing elghiit _ naayvaghaghni _ .
aghni ut _ akughtuqagh meng _ qaasligh igh luteng _ .
qaasligh at _ nas aper aa ghit lu _ sa meng _ melqugh meng _ esn el aagh usigh luteng _ .
Iigg aghluteng _ m uf f -e meng _ .
anglikagh t _ taslugh kete te luteng _ s k ate - tel ghiit _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ qiighnite aghagh magh meng _ .
mangteghagh at _ qama _ puqlate sug nigh ghllag t _ nighug ghllag t _ .
Wh an i kun gh aani _ entaqun _ s k ate - te taqut _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh lgu aqe ut _ .
tamaakut _ s k ate - t iing ell ghiit _ quy am sug nigh llaget _ .
pinighnagh ghllag k _ qergese gput _ 
qergese gput _ estaa m aneng _ qergese ke lghiik _ q as pi qun negh ilnguut _ enkaam _ uksugh mi _ kanegh meng _ umeg igh qite ghllag aqe uk _ .
K aan gh i _ iwernga _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ .
Um yugw amkun _ elngaatall _ navek _ tamaa tu m _ uqfig m _ akul angani _ piyaa aatagh aqe unga _ .
tamaa _ legan llu _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ aliite aqe ut _ kanegh mi _ .
S ig ii qell ghem _ es negh r ugw i _ kumlate igate ngugh t _ kiig u ste aqe anka _ .
kumlu mnneng _ ighneghwaagh mnneng _ aneghnegh mnneng llu _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ qag aa vek _ esghapag na luta _ .
ilangakun _ qafsin Ê¼ gu lluku _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ umu ghllaget _ .
naqamllu _ esghaatepag igate ngugh u kut _ alungutellegh _ qakma _ .
repall _ whanga mni _ qergese k _ taake uk _ esghagh uqagh u lutek _ kuusmete yug nighllug tek _ ayuqe uk _ .
qantaghtugh i _ P r aas ent asi meng
ata ut _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ piraamsi negh ghllag _ .
talwa _ qantaghtu llegh i _ ayug w in naq epig lluki _ ila i _ tap ghagh p aw aaghmeng _ .
ila i _ sa u aat _ atugh qagh ghhaat _ nagh agh utet _ aatkagh t _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luteng _ qantagh aqe ai _ .
taakut _ qantagh llegh i llu _ leganqun _ pr aas en taa si w aqut _ .
neqamike aqa llu _ tamaani _ quunpeng _ ilughagh niigh te neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ .
ata ma _ ilughagh ni _ pr aas en taa _ qiipaghagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ iiggagh t _ , _ laluramke t _ iigge ait _ .
inglu inagh a _ mekestaaghhagh kun _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luku _ qantagh luku _ , _ inglu a _ aangeghllag kun _ sa kun _ pikraghniite luku _ qantagh luku _ .
naa mta _ ungipaghagh te aqe ainkut _ ingaghte uute negh mta _ qav ar ag kiigh esqell uta _ qantaghtugh na luteng _ .
qenwat _ naave ut _ tulughagh aqe uq _ whangkuta _ Kuus men aq em _ teng gh un iq em _ pr aas ent asigh q iitneng _ leg re yugwem _ qavagh lghaghtugh gpenaamta _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ P r aas ent asi t
whanga mni _ tegh igh na ghllag _ nengyugh ut _ iim gut angll aan nem teggu _ .
elngaatall _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ulimaaq aghput _ .
Qii p agh ameng _ , _ uyg iin aghmeng _ , _ mel qigh aghmeng _ k aki pig g aghmeng _ ulim al agh tegh aqaput _ .
ila i _ qafsina neng _ esteg lgu aqe luteng _ , _ z ipp er- el waaq luteng _ , _ nagtuqagh lgu aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ tuug tekayug wet _ .
Il aa kw aap ut _ ayapghaatagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ , _ allighte meng _ ul iim aam nneng _ pr aas en tal agh aaq aput _ .
ila i llu _ legan _ qiip apig g aghmeng _ whangkunneng _ ulima tete luki _ kaki iqe aput _ .
Ivagh il egh taag aqukut _ anglegute ke te lghii ni _ qantagh yaghqagh meng _ kinku nun _ .
sa tke igate ke put _ seghl eq esi sigal keput _ atuqe aat _ sa u aat _ pr aas en ta siq neghmeng _ liisimake luku _ taw aate tegh ng iita _ quyake lleqe kangit _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ tamaan leng ugh meng _ esghaqu sigh ghllag mnneng _ pr aas ent ataq ukut _ whangkunneng _ .
N aat ngwaagh l ut allu _ qantaghkagh meng _ uyghagsugnite ngugh meng _ c and y-meng _ sa n ta _ C l a us-em _ iiyagh mteggun _ kanaghte vike ma kanginkut _ .
taana _ qaam gg ung inaq _ ay gu ghi kaa qa _ .
yughaghvig mi llu _ igaghvig mi llu _ pr as en taa sit _ tunqugh aqe ait _ p ro g ram -en eghmeng _ taa qen gh aat a _ .
aange lghiit _ qiipaghagh t _ nasagh i llu _ aligh a llu _ qepe luki _ pr aas en taa si put _ aglagh te aqe ait _ .
ata mta _ quunpeng _ sa u aat _ igaqugh aqe kangi _ , _ talwa _ pr aas ent asi put _ naken _ pi u ta i _ igaqugh aqe ai _ akite yaghqagh t _ .
Qel aa negh nagh llak _ , _ iwernga _ tu r n - kagh taam ta _ iyaq ugh aaq ii _ .
R e d _ C r os s-em _ Sal ng aaw r ii
iyaghvig mi _ tunqugh aqe ainkut _ R e d _ C r os s -et _ tunusagh itneng _ .
Sal ng aaw aas qughh aat _ naqam _ imagh ghllag t _ .
imigh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u aqe ut _ , _ igaasigh t _ , _ r ul er -et _ , _ igaasigh mun _ ipegsagh sigh t _ , _ h and ker ch i ef -et _ , _ igaghyaghqagh ngestagh t _ , _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ iye it _ uum kay ugwet
nev egh lleghh iini _ , _ c ol or -et _ , _ taqughutagh t _ , _ mes un at _ , _ j ac k s -etlu _ , _ c om pas s- esqugh h aak lu _ taawa _ .
ata mnun _ tuune agka _ aqu pi legh sagh aatk eg kek _ ulimaagh minun _ atuqe na lukek _ , _ usput aasi qum aag kenka _ iyaq r aasi qum aag kenka _ .
mekelghiigh nun _ aghnaghagh nun llu _ R e d _ C r os s -et _ qantaghtuqagh u ut _ tamaakut _ .
M is si on-em _ salngag i _ 
Enkaangam _ yughaghvig meng _ seal- nga u uute aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ sivuqagh m _ family- nga _ .
mangteghagh m _ imigh a _ qamagte luteng _ aatkagh nge te aqe ut _ , _ sakenge uute aqe ut _ .
aatkagh it _ , _ j e an s- eng it _ nutagh aghll ugw aaqut _ .
ila it _ su it -em _ qaasligh a _ aang egh ngaata _ aataq aap ut _ .
ulig t llu _ quyanagh ghllag t _ qu il t- et _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
aklungi igh i ste aqe ainkut _ yugh aghv im taa llu _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh sighqagh t _ 
naa mta _ atkuy aang llagh tegh aqiinkut _ qiipaghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ igagh rakeg tellgh an _ av l aaw aat am _ qantagh aneng _ .
pinigh ghllagu aqe ut _ atkuyaag put _ .
enkaam _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ gg aat mengllu _ qull iiraagh mengllu _ .
naave ut _ angatughqe i aqe uk _ ilangakun _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kakisigh aqe uq _ aatk agh raagh iisqell uta _ .
alla _ naa mta _ nuyagh lghute put _ q ip ell eg agh tegh aqii _ qupughhughkagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng llu _ co f fe e _ c an -em _ qelpeghte llegh an _ savikenghaagh i _ igaghqwaagh meng _ 
qantagh luki _ .
igamsiqa yug llegh ka _ 
sa u a _ Kuus me y aq _ , _ pr aas en taa siq _ , _ laalighqwaagh te _ apeghiigh nghaani _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe te ni _ taawa _ kagpag tugh aqaghput _ .
kuusmeyaghkagh _ ataata ut llu _ pugughilegh mun _ agl an qig tu tuq _ .
taawa _ mangteghagh squghhagh ut _ nun aa tugh qw aag aa _ iwernga _ elngaatall _ pinighyug te ukut _ quya te ukut _ .
uteghmun _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ Kuus m ellegh put _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ qer ngaagh h aamta _ , _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ kayute ke teqaghte luta _ .
akluma lleg mnnun _ iilqe ste gpenaamta _ angayuqagh mta _ apeghtugh ma aqe ainkut _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ pivake luki _ aflengak ngwaagh luki _ .
kina _ alngunak _ kayusiite luku _ .
Taananguuq _ Kuus m ellegh put _ neqamike aqa _ pinigh ghllag _ .
pupig allugh _ mekelghiigh _ nulightugh lghii _ 
ungipaghagh ta a _ T ul iim
eltughagh ghhagh a _ taana _ pupig ghllag _ quunpeng _ kumeg aqe lghii _ , _ â _ g - g - g _ , _ g - g - g _ . _ â
Taag ken nguq _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ keveg aqe ma kanga _ aghn angll aa tesqell uni _ .
nenglutuqagh _ .
pi ma kanga _ eltughagh n _ , _ â _ aghnangllagh yagh uute nga _ . _ â
I quk lighpig aghnun _ aghnangllagh yagh ma lghii _ nengyugh a _ .
taagken _ kaate ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ â _ Qam aay _ !
eltughagh ghhagh ma nguq _ panig n _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu nakanga _ . _ â
â _ Nak aan nguq _ .
Sak esqell un inguq _ pi a _ .
aagra ligh u aghte ngugh lug ni _ ?
aante i ste u luni _ ? _ â _ akite ma kangat _ .
taagken _ sivugte ma lghii _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ eltughagh ni _ , _ â _ Sak esqell ut ennguq _ pi ziin _ ?
aagra ligh u aghte u luten _ ?
aante i ste u luten _ ? _ â
eltughagh ghhagh n _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ â _ ila itnun llu _ piigh ten _ aatak _ . _ â
ila itnun llu _ taglagh laatagh ma lghii _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
taagken _ sivuligh t _ saaqwligh ghhagh itnun _ .
kaate luni _ qineghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
pi laatagh ma kangi _ , _ â _ eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ , _ panig gpek nguq _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ â
pi laatagh ma kangat _ , _ â _ Sak esqell uni _ pi a _ ? _ â
Taw ateng waagh waaq _ sivuligh ghhagh m _ akuzillegh atun _ akite laatagh aat _ .
taagken _ sivugte laatagh uq _ .
atghagh laatagh uq _ .
kaate yan _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ ? _ â
nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ imatuq _ aghni lleqe aten _ .
qenwat _ anag ul egh tesleq aghpenga _ . _ â
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ , _ â _ whanga llu _ anag ul egh lleq amken _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ qamagte ma kanga _ nenglu _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh t _ nenglu t _ taku ma kangi _ .
Legannguq _ qineghte uq _ , _ yug nguq _ esghagh u aghagh a _ .
Yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ seal- gnun _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
nulighh a _ nuughqaghte ma lghii _ .
nuughqaghte luni _ pi ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ , _ â _ neqe leg nun _ pi ziin _ ? _ â
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nakaan _ , _ neqe leg nun _ pi nghite unga _ .
eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ .
P anig ennguq _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tugu naqe a _ .
atghagh lleqe uq _ , _ maligte lleqe aaten _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ ugw ii neghmeng _ ighsa luni _ .
naa an _ angegh te yu nghite kanga _ tawavek _ yaywaali mun _ , _ qayughllak _ pupig ghllag u lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
taagken _ itegh luni _ aghnagh aq _ aagra nun _ ayapegh ma yagh lghii _ .
vuvegh k _ aghipa ghllag u uk _ .
kangighagh ghhagh kun _ peghleghte ma lghii _ , _ ighu gni _ qantagh lukek _ atkug mineng _ .
qiya ma lghii _ , _ ugw ik aghq ani _ nagas aq minigu _ , _ kumeg yalghiimi _ , _ â _ g - g - g _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ , _ eltughagh ghhagh ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ ghhute gnun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
kelig ma kanga _ pupig a _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ pin iigh qw aamakanga _ .
esghaqaaluni _ nukalpigagh _ , _ pinighhalek _ !
taagken _ nenglu mi _ nategh a _ tanughqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nenglu ni _ tukegh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nanigh t _ kumagh qugh ma kangi _ .
nenglu _ nigh uwh alek _ .
nunivag m _ tung angani _ nenglu mi _ mii ng l utanga _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ , _ awergha _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ atg- ke uk _ , _ ilep gh aaq _ , _ qallevag _ , _ k apes eg aq _ , _ agaghte uute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ aywaa n _ tung anga _ , _ megh m _ tung angan _ mii ng l utanga _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ .
tanemlleqa _ aklungi _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
eltughagh ni _ taagken _ pilugug ma kanga _ ukileghyag meng _ .
quyngigh liigh ghllag ma lghii _ .
sagnegh ghllag t _ malghugnegh t _ pugnegh meng _ imigh ma kangi _ .
alegh kek _ mekestaaghhagh k _ qaye gkenkun _ tawaqapig t _ lli ma kangi _ .
aghnagh aq _ teghsagh ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ , _ â _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ , _ angayuqagh ten _ neqe meng _ taglaate ki _ . _ â
taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ ugw ik aghq aminun _ , _ esghagh yaqminigu _ nukalpigagh _ pinighhalek _ !
aghnagh aq _ nenglagh kau ma lghii _ , _ â _ T e h em _ , _ te h em _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sukate luten _ aqume i _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aqume luni _ aatkagh ni _ mataghte qugh ma kangi _ .
alla neng _ aatkagh neng _ tuune ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ .
qalleg vag ma lghii _ naayghagh _ ughug kestagh lghii stun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ , _ ukileghyag m _ angtalanganeng _ .
taagken _ k apes eg aamalghii _ qaye akun _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghiik _ ugw iku llghiik _ .
Sag negh paget _ tugu luki _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
kaate lutek _ mangteghagh mun _ , _ aghnagh aq _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ â _ Qam aay _ ! _ kenegh meng _ nuug te ngnga _ . _ â
aghnaghagh t _ anighqute _ kumaghllug qu _ nuug te ma kangat _ .
Esghagh yaq meg tekek _ ne k _ pinighhalek _ ! _ qimag ma lghiit _ .
itegh qaghtagh te ma lghiit _ , _ kenegh eng _ unite luku _ .
ungipaate ma kegket _ angayuq ag teng _ , _ â _ ne k _ sama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ ! _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi laatagh ai _ , _ â _ sukate lusi _ , _ kenegh meng _ tuune tengnga _ . _ â
kenegh meng _ aatghute ma lghiit _ .
itegh ma lghiik _ ugw iku llghiik _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh m _ saki ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nunalgute ten _ kelgugh ki _ .
Tag il agh all in nguq _ . _ â
tagi laghate ma lghiit _ .
Itegh aas ata _ ungipamsug te ma kangi _ pupig mineng _ qal m amineng _ .
taagken _ sagnegh pagem _ angenegh kek _ tawavek _ ellngit nun _ negh e simakek _ .
taagken _ qiliigh nagh meng _ tawaqapig meng _ q anegh mi qu umakangi _ .
taake uk _ ila kek _ sagnegh m _ saki minun _ tuune ma kek _ .
taagken _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
aghnaghagh t _ maligte ma kegket _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnaghagh t _ ayapegh lghiit _ amiwaagh kun _ repa ma aqe kangi _ , _ qayughllak _ angayuqagh ita _ ighleke kaqe kangit _ .
taawa _ nulightugh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
tefaay _ !
I is tu mii m _ tugukagh i _ afsengagh m _ negh kangi _ qamagte luki _ , _ siipte te aghte gpenaan _ uksuqun _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
seghleghyugkagh _ elngaatall _ .
iwernga _ nanevgagh _ afsengagh _ pi ke aq _ , _ â _ itagnagh uq _ ellnga llu _ kitum _ panike a _ . _ â
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ segheve tke a _ , _ neqamike yaghqaaghtekagh a _ allameng _ afsengagh t _ neqe meng _ naange te fqiita _ pi yaghqaaghtekagh _ .
Ugw ingan _ piniq sal ii tagh aqaa _ qayughllak _ ila ni _ sumegh ke sag u te kangi _ , _ nangllegtaghtekanga _ .
I is tu mii _ megnu nagh lghii meng _ liite lghii _ 
aasa m _ ungipagh aa _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ taa kun nguq _ aghnaghagh t _ tallimat _ .
aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ , _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ taag av eq aaghaq _ kaate luteng _ iigge llegh ghllag _ kaate ma kangat _ aange pigte lghii _ .
ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ kanagh ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ qelpegh saqminigu _ peknegh meng _ imigh ghllag luni _ .
tagsigh ai _ ila ni _ , _ â _ tagi tek _ , _ whaa _ naalkute unga _ . _ â
taakut _ aghnaghagh t _ tagi ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ I is tu mii _ , _ ila a _ ketngigtu ma ai _ , _ ataasigh _ Q ug tuq aghtu ur ugh mii _ , _ enkaam _ Aghvegh tugh mii _ , _ tallim aat _ U ll ung ag tu ur u _ .
taagken _ elngaatall _ nengighqe ait _ aghnaghagh t _ taakut _ kenigh megteggun _ tawan lluki _ , _ siq lugw aq _ av ang iit ngwaagh luku _ .
tawaten _ peghu vyiigh luku _ unite ma kangat _ .
elngaatall _ quya pigte luteng _ aglagh ut _ aghnaghagh t _ .
aglagh luteng _ ne meggnun _ , _ ugw inga _ I is tu mii m _ naken _ pi a _ , _ entaqun _ ama _ peknegh yaghkagh _ .
itegh luni nguq _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ elngaatall _ sumeghtaghagh ghllag _ .
Ugw ingan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iyatagh unga _ , _ siq lugw aghq u _ . _ â
taawa _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
â _ enta _ sukate luten _ iyatagh unga _ siq lugw aghq u _ , _ â _ pi laatagh aa _ ugw ingan _ .
alingughyug te inagh mineng _ aane luni _ siq lugw ani _ legan _ esghapagtu qiinagh luku _ unite ma kanga _ .
unite luku _ , _ ugw ini _ pi ma kanga _ :
â _ A ay _ , _ uq es qaghh aghma _ sa ite u unga _ !
I is tum iinkut _ , _ ketngigtu ma ainkut _ ,
Aghvegh tugh m iinkut _ , _ U ll ung ag tu ur unkut _ ,
qugtuqagh mii nkut _ naang sim iit _ ! _ â
legan _ ugw ingan _ tawavek _ , _ qezigh ni _ amqeghte aghte luku _ , _ siing yaqminigu _ legan _ aga _ nev aghmi _ ullegh uq _ , _ qe tegh aghtuq _ .
imani nguq _ pi a _ qiya magh mi _ :
â _ Mak e tengng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ !
Mak e tengng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ ! _ â
Taaw an leng ugh nguq _ ugw at angani _ nanevgagh ghllag _ , _ afsengagh _ .
Taam _ pi ma kanga _ :
â _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ ,
Q ugh rugh aam _ avaqutagh a _ ,
K uy ap eg rug aaghem _ eltugh aa _ ! _ â
makete ma kanga _ .
tawaten _ esghap agh ngaaghm igu _ legan _ siinge laatagh aa _ !
legan _ qiyaaqe lghii _ aghnagh _ :
â _ Mak e tengng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ !
Mak e tengng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ , _ ng aay _ ! _ â
Taag um _ pi laatagh aa _ :
â _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ !
Q ugh rugh aam _ avaqutagh a _ ,
K uy ap eg rug aaghem _ eltugh aa _ ! _ â
makete ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ aqum e simakanga _ .
taawa _ pinigh kau aghte a _ , _ aghyuugh kanga _ taam _ nanevgagh m _ .
taawa _ pinitun _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
tefaay _ , _ al iingh akun _ , _ amsanagh akun _ !
aa _ ggute ke a _ !
iyaa-kagh m _ ungipagh aa _ 
qaa ii te aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ gguusiqe ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ , _ W illu _ , _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ â _ ggute ka _ aqnigh ghllagu uq _ . _ â
W ill um _ ugw ini _ seat- a _ itegh yan _ pi a _ , _ â _ qaa ii te aq _ gguusiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ , _ Ggut l umun _ esghaghtesaghtugh ltegnegu _ , _ â _ sa ta m _ qaa ii te aq _ pi ma kanga _ .
aagra neng _ nategh mun _ ategh lutek _ sa ta m _ atkug ni _ aate a _ .
Yugw et _ atkug teng _ nategh kun _ agaghtekayugu kangit _ .
qamaken _ suug werng eneng _ Qii taam _ naange a _ nuug luni _ Qii taam _ nasaperagh a _ tuune a _ .
Qii taam _ nasaperagh ni _ aate luku _ , _ ata ke te lghiik _ aglagh uk _ Ggut lun kunun _ .
guygu u uq _ Ggut l unkut _ mangteghagh at _ .
kaate yaghtugh yalghiimek _ tepe a _ neqnigh ghllag _ naagh aa _ Qii taam _ , _ ov en -kun _ neqekrangllaghpag ni _ .
Qiit aankut _ ellngit _ egllu ite ngugh t _ .
nanigh meng _ gaaghusigh ke lghiit _ .
O v en -kun _ gaaqagh m _ tepe anga _ nallun iit ng waal ghii _ naagh yaqminigu _ neqnigh ghllag _ .
Esl akl iq _ amigh k _ qelpate uq _ .

â _ uteghvagh lusi _ .
aqume i _ taaggun _ , _ â _ ken iim aag kenka _ aqumutagh k _ .

itegagh mineng _ S iim iiy aam _ sa u ak _ tuk egh ragh aak _ .

â _ agitaghten _ , _ â _ Ggut lum _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ .

Ggut lum _ , _ Qii taam _ g gut anga _ qepghagh luku _ taaqe yamigu _ pi a _ , _ â _ taawa _ taaqe amken _ alla _ aqnigh naanghite uq _ . _ â
taaqe yan _ qaa ii te aq _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ neqekrangllagh ta ii sqesugh ghngaamken _ qaangh en _ um ugh qw aang alghii _ .

paper _ s ac k -a _ tuune a _ , _ imani _ tepe kegte uq _ .

Qii taam _ aglagh te kete luku _ naagh aqe a nguq _ tugumiigh ni _ , _ ov en -kun _ gaaqagh t _ neqekrangllagh t _ .
kaspig m _ paqnamiqe llegh a _ 
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ tengutkaleg nkuk _ ungipagh aat _ 
kaspig _ itegh yaghagh ma lghii _ , _ qayugh ghllag nge uq _ anuqe ghllag _ aqlagha ghllag _ , _ uksugh u lghii _ .
wata _ anuqligh kanga _ umegnegh ughte magh mi _ teghig niigh us kanga _ esla mi _ nagh aaq _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ pinigh y uug tuq _ nighugh lghii llu _ puq l al nguq _ nenge aat _ .
suupe liighpag ni _ naagh ma kanga _ .
naange a _ quyngigh meng _ suupe liigh aqe uq _ neqekrangllagh magh mi _ suupeliightugh sighqagh meng _ .
â _ kameg gken _ ufsug yaghtugh kek _ !
itegh kuvek _ agaghte nakegken _ , _ â _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ .
kaspig _ ategh luni _ saayguraagh mun _ ufsug luni _ , _ itegh luni _ kameg gni _ agaghte ma kek _ .
taagken _ taku ma kek _ anengagh ni llu _ nayag g anillu _ .
anengagh a _ atightugh aqe uq _ igagh neng _ li b r ar y-meng _ navghaghkagh mineng _ .
N ay aag g aa _ negikragh aqe uq _ taghnughhagh w aghmeng _ m ag az ine- mel ngughmeng _ .
apa _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ tab le- leg ni _ .
kaspig m _ taku luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Ap aay _ ungipaghagh te nakefkut _ ! _ â
taghnughhagh t _ nagas ugw aqegkangat _ apa eng _ ungipaghagh nghaani _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi _ taghnughhagh u luni _ naghaagh llegh meggneng _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi llu _ ayvegh niigh llegh meggneng _ , _ nanugh niigh llegh mineng _ .
piniqe lleghpigagh ke aqe kangit _ ungipagh ai _ mayeraaghpag t llu _ teghig ke sagh t llu _ akuz ikayug wet _ .
â _ ungipaghagh u lleqe amsi _ ighivgaqun _ mayeraaghpag meng _ unÊ¼g an leng ugh meng _ kellii ni _ , _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .
kaspig _ suupe liigh uute kete luku _ sumeghtagh amalghii _ qel angh umaghmi _ apa ita _ ungipaghagh u lleghqagh aneng _ , _ sa naqe lleqe a tuq _ mayeraaghpag _ !
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ egllu m _ saaghw ani _ aqume te ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ apa eng _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ungipagh aa _ . _ â
legan _ iiwen _ sumeghtaghaat keng ngin agh ngaaghm igu _ apa mi _ ungipaghagh qugh a _ , _ iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ .
apa at _ piinligh ma lghii _ , _ â _ apegh vagilgamkun _ kellii n _ mayeraaghpag a _ apegh naqe aqa _ naayvagh m _ yug nge sta _ .
ilangani _ nalluniite aqe uq _ qayughllak _ megh _ qaprag taqegkanga _ .
uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ siku yuwhaagh nghaani _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ siku igate ngughk _ .
ila a _ naten _ siku llghite kayug _ .
tamaakut _ siku llghite ngugh t _ ategh i _ negagh yu llegh ke aat _ .
Y us eng et aghhaam _ megh _ qaprag taqegkanga _ kumlate snanigh aqe kanga _ qayughllak _ naayvagh _ iingunagh mi _ siku nghaani _ naayvagh m _ ilu a _ mam legh qw aag aqegkanga _ qule mun _ esghapag nanigh aqe lghii _ .
enkaam _ aghtugh yagute llegh minun _ kenlanga _ neg ay ul qal g us naq aqegkanga _ . _ â
â _ Ap aay _ , _ sa aqa ngam _ negagh yu llegh ke i aghte te nghaani _ ? _ â
kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ Y us eng et aghhaq _ qefliqe ghllag aqe lghii _ enkaam _ kumlate snanigh i aqe lghii _ siku _ um ugh tes nanigh aqegkanga _ megh _ qaprag taq luku _ .
utaqa i aqe lghii _ kanagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ kanagh kata _ ila ke na luki _ siku m _ asi ani _ mamleg ghllag mi _ . _ â
â _ Saaq an ngam _ kanaghkagh t _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nalluke aput _ , _ enkaam _ pinigh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ kinku t _ kanagh kata _ . _ â
â _ N aten ngam _ pi lleqe sta _ , _ sa yaghqaa sta _ , _ ap aay _ ? _ â
â _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ pinigh uq _ .
kayute meng _ aqfate qaghte yaghqagh t _ .

â _ Sameng am _ sayug sigh ke lleqe sta _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
â _ ivagh i luni _ sa meng _ , _ uun gh ameng _ , _ taake lghii meng _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ talwa _ j ac ke t- tet _ aligh a _ q illgh uqu ulluki _ , _ sa u aat _ tafsi t _ , _ sayug sighqagh u luki _ tawavek _ kanaghkagh mun _ .
aqlagha mi _ nus ugw aghh naq saghq aalghiit _ kanaghkagh t _ .

â _ kelenga ghllag lleqe unga _ neg ay ul qameng _ .
wiin _ y us eng e taa mes unghi tunga _ mamleg ghllag mi _ .

â _ aa _ , _ â _ apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taana _ mayeraaghpag _ kellii nite ngughk _ wata _ seghlegh atagh aaguq _ , _ y akugh nagh atagh tuq _ .
umiileg ke a _ kellii n _ qamagtengngwaagh luni _ , _ siku yan _ , _ iiw em _ , _ tung y uum _ , _ maaqellegh m _ .
ilangani _ wata _ ugumi yagute ghllag aqe ai _ yugwet _ wataqaaghaq _ naayvagh m _ yungestagh aneng _ talwa _ . _ â
â _ sa aqa ngam _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ puughte aqe ai _ yugwet _ , _ â _ apa an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ puughte i sighqaghtu ghllag uq _ . _ â
â _ sangaawa t _ puughte i sagh i _ ? _ â _ kaspig m _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ anglegute ni _ nagate ma luki _ iye it _ nang llag rak etun _ .
â _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ sigugnegh _ .
alqime i an _ tamaa na _ puughte i sagh igh kaqe a _ .

â _ esnaghni ii te qugh a mi _ pinigh uq _ , _ â _ kaspig _ pi ma lghii _ .
â _ taawa _ ipa _ pi uten _ , _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .

enkaam _ esnev eq est iigh tes nanigh aqiit _ .
wata _ taghnughhagh t _ esnagh niigh snanigh aqe ait _ . _ â
â _ Ap aay _ , _ ungipagh aten _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .

â _ Ing agh saghtugh teg ngam _ ! _ â _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ eltughagh ni _ .
â _ unaami _ igaghyagh yaghqaa usi _ . _ â
â _ G o od nigh t _ apa _ , _ â _ kaspig m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sunanguq _ qavangugh ke nghite langi _ mayeraaghpag t _ . _ â
taagken _ ingaghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ .

unaami _ ell maa r aghq w aamakanga _ , _ siqi neghllug ughte ma kanga _ .
qayug nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kaspig _ aane luni _ ilakumtaagh ke te lghiik _ igaghvig mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aleghqugh tke magh an _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe gkan _ sa lleghqagh ek _ .
kaspig _ nag allaagh penani _ unaaghsi ma lghii _ .
Siqin ghem _ repall _ anigu _ nigh waag pag tagh qelluku _ qakma _ .
nighwaagpagtagh llegh t _ esghagh nghminiki _ llangaqa nguq _ pi aqe aat _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ aane i _ , _ naghaagh yagh a _ . _ â
kaspig m _ kellaag k _ esghagh nghminikek _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kek _ sa yamek _ nalleq _ sukangiite ghllag akek _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ imani _ .
qenwat llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ r ii saagh naq n im akangi _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ amig mun _ piyug ragkiighute ma lghiit _ .
aane luteng _ naligh ita _ kaspig m _ ilakumtaagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ esnagh mun _ pi lta _ , _ siku _ igleghte lghii _ esghapag yaghtugh lteggu _ . _ â
kaspig llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k llu _ maalghug _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
agigte yalghiimeng _ talwa _ kellaag igh a _ pinighnagh pigte uq _ .
sikuqwaagh ghhagh t _ aghuliigh waagh luteng _ llangaqa _ suupeliigh mi _ sal tin e _ c ra c ker -et _ puglegha lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ataasigh m _ pi ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ â _ kaangqwagh lta _ yeqay _ , _ siku t _ aghula i te u aghte ut _ ! _ â
kaspig m _ aag llegh gni _ aatqaghtagh te yayek _ siku mun _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenani _ ellnga llu _ qetgegh ma lghii _ .
kaangqwagh te ma lghiit _ , _ teghigniqe te ma lghiit _ .
Aw av anllegh pig aannaq usimalghiit _ .
kaangqwagh te ghngaaghmeng _ naligh t _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ ughhe aqe ai _ .
aragh ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ â _ H aak _ , _ uugh hiin ku ut _ ! _ â
qamagte luteng _ kelute mun _ qiive luteng _ aragh u aghagh taute ma lghiit _ , _ â _ U ughh iin ku u- ut _ ! _ U ughh iin ku ut _ ! _ â
qaasqagh mi _ yugwem _ angyagh meng _ qepghagh lghii m _ nag aqum akangi _ .
kayute meng _ piighaghte luni _ , _ d or y-meng _ atghagh te luteng _ aqfa ma kangit _ iv enr umeng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ awavagh te ghllag ma kangi _ , _ llangaqa _ esghaqagh u luteng _ qawaag gaat _ sikuqaagh mi _ .
mulu gpenateng _ kaate luki _ tugu ma kangit _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ ellmeggneng _ esghaqagh qu te magh meng _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh t _ iqenge aghte gpenateng _ , _ agh sugh waal uteng _ .
llangaqa nguq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh ni _ kelute mun _ muluugh ghllag lghiit _ .
llangaqa llu _ nun m aas qu veg aghhaq _ igleghte lghiit _ .
kaspig _ tuufsagh nge ghllag ma lghii _ apa ni llu _ mayeraaghpag a llu _ kellii n _ sumeghtaghaatk es aq min ikek _ .
qute mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .
Yugw et _ qaake ma kangit _ qute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ uugte ghngaaghmeng _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ mayugh ma lghiit _ qaasqagh mun _ igaghvig mun _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ alegh kek _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghiik _ , _ â _ sa meng tuq _ apeghtughiste mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ?

ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ 
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ taana nguq _ sik igg aq _ me teghll ugwem _ neghe vzigh qagh a _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ , _ meteghllug _ tengaa ma lghii _ pagani _ asitmun _ ivagh i magh mi _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
Sik ig ennguq _ ellnga ni _ elngaatall _ negh yugnagh lghiit _ .
esghaate yami _ yagtaghagh ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sikig _ riigte mineng _ aane luni _ navek _ pangaleg lghii _ .

taagken _ Sik igg aam _ itegh na luni _ puughte yuguma kanga _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ Meteghll uu y _ , _ aghula aqe ziin _ ? _ â

aghula _ . _ â

Legannguq _ Meteghllugwem _ itegagh ni _ quulv aghagh tegh r unegh minigu _ paag g uqagh aq _ .
Sik igg aq _ suk an ghh agh mitun _ itegh qaghte ma lghii _ taam _ aghula lghii m _ Meteghllugwem _ ighu gkenka _ akule gkenkun _ .

iwernga _ Sik igg aq _ itegh qagh uq _ sakeqe llegh meng _ papeg ligh luni _ .
meteghllug _ unite qaghte ma kanga _ papeg m _ sakeqe llegh aneng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aglagh te ma kanga _ .
riigte mi _ ilu ani _ ng illeg rug simaghmi _ iil qu malgh i _ papeg igh te ni luni _ .
qiive magh mi _ ataasigh _ avaqutagh ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ N atu ngam _ sik igg aq _ papeg ita _ ?
aatak _ veghte naqe yaghtuqagh ghhu _ paap g aqa _ meteghllug meng _ .
qikmigh m nguq _ iye aneng _ nav egh lleqaqa _ . _ â

saama llu _ qikmigh m _ iye aneng _ pitu unga _ . _ â
aglagh ma lghii _ sik igagh aq _ naa ni _ ungipagh saghtu ma kanga _ Meteghllugwem _ kiim si t anganeng _ .
â _ kii _ , _ n atu ngam _ sikig _ papeg ita _ , _ â _ ngillegte pigte luni _ sik igagh aam _ naange a _ pil at aamalghii _ .
â _ enta _ aatak _ ungip an neqig saghtugh h u _ neghsagh m _ iiyng an enguq _ nav egh lleqaqa _ papeg ka _ . _ â

taawanginaq _ waa ke pan ghill atagh tuq _ naavghute yaghqagh aneng _ Sik igg aam _ .
â _ yaghlegillu _ whaa _ iyetu unga _ , _ â _ Meteghllugwem _ pi ma kanga _ sik igagh aq _ .

Sik igagh aam _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ enta _ ungip as aghtugh h u _ whaa nguq _ nav egh lleqaqa _ maatenllaam _ neqnigh rakeg tameng _ .
ungipaate naken _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ tuune lleqe aqa _ . _ â
Sik igg aam _ avaqutagh ghhagh a _ aglagh laatagh ma lghii _ meteghllug mun _ ungipaate na luku _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ nav eghh naagh niluku _ paap gaq _ .
Meteghll uk r ugwem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ N av eghh naanghitaa _ papeg ni _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ , _ y eq ay tuq _ aa _ , _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ .
itupill _ tam an ameng _ nav egh tes naa yagh aqa _ ! _ â
aglagh luni _ sik igagh aam _ naa ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ wetku _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ nav egh lleq niluku _ papeg a _ .
naa ngiighhagh a _ iil qam iq ngwaagh luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ kaay _ seghleghhalek _ , _ nak en ngam _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ pi keng naq singa _ ! _ â
Sumegh y aligh tuq _ wata _ sumeghtaghaat keng ng iinaq _ .
â _ E maa y _ , _ â _ sik igagh aam _ naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangan mi _ ivagh i nanigh stuung _ me ke ta ghhagh meng _ uyghag meng _ yugwem _ iye atun _ ayuq esug nil ngughmeng _ , _ tawaten wha _ puugh h nay an ghis teggu _ meteghllug _ ! _ â
Sik igg aam _ avaqutagh ghhagh ni _ tuune ma kanga _ qaliqenghaagh ghhagh meng _ aqeftaghaagh meng _ , _ pi ma kanga llu _ saghna yigh sqellug qu _ iy esug nit aaghmeng _ uyghag meng _ .
uteghnigh yan _ aqef tagh aghhani _ esleqe luku _ uyghag meng _ , _ naa an _ keveg aqlaatagh ma kanga _ meteghllug mun _ .
â _ meteghllug _ , _ meteghllug _ , _ ang _ taawa _ piyukekagh gpeneng _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ tagite amken _ ! _ â _ kaate qaghte te kete luku _ sik igagh aam _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ .
E f qugh qw aamakanga _ elngaatall _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug nguq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ K g w ug g _ , _ tea- ma ken ta _ esgha _ negh yugw aqelghii nga _ ! _ â
Aku qw aam aan _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh _ sik igagh aghmun _ tuune ma kanga _ naa an _ papeg a _ .
aga _ sik igagh aq _ ne minun _ suk at ngwaagh luni _ aglagh aghte ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ E maa y _ , _ taawa _ papeg n _ ! _ â
naange a _ quy aapig lluni _ papeg ni _ aatqaghte ma kanga _ aga _ paperegte i inagh magh mi _ .
inga _ ne mini _ Meteghllug r ugwem _ qelpeghte luku _ qaliqenghaagh _ aqef tagh aghhaq _ nusug ma kanga _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ iyete yu gnite ngughk _ .
taagken _ iigge mini _ ull ghit aper eg waagh te simakanga _ .
Neq nigh yugwem _ angtale aneng _ qaan gha _ meghaaghtu qu ma lghii _ .
aga _ qaneghmig aghte a nguq _ , _ imani nguq _ aqnighnagh ghhalek _ , _ kang rug uteghllag umalghii _ C - R - U - U - U - N - C - H _ !
ayungkaghagh _ 
tamekestagh t _ yaagigh igate ngugh t _ , _ ughhe igate ngugh t _ ellngaate meng _ , _ mesiigh meng _ ulimaagh t _ :
â _ aghnagh aq _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ ayungkaghagh _ taana _ siipnegh _ tuune gu _ aghnaghaghhagh mun _ . _ â
qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun _ 
aagra m _ ilu yan _ paagna i _ , _ qulighnegh i _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ iiggagh ten _ qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun _ teghlegtekaqe anka _ . _ â
aneghte lghii nguq _ ( _ aneghte lghii _ )
maaten _ pi llegh mitun _ alla _ pi iigh aatagh lghii _ :
Sik igg aq _ neghe lleg mta _ neqekrag m _ kagimleghwaagh aneng _ negh luni _ riigte minun _ aglagh luni _ itegh luni _ aag nghmini _ tagi aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte lghii nguq _ esghapag aat _ .
uumtagh m _ ( _ uumtagh _ )
nenglu m _ ilu yan _ nunamel nguut _ , _ sa meng _ alngunak _ kanagh fik egkayug wet _ :
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pirugh t ani _ qawaag m _ qateg i _ tukrug aat _ uumtagh m _ asi anun _ kanaghte ma kangi _ .
tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ ( _ tut magh waaq _ )
uksaagh mi _ nuna _ kumlaregagh nghaani _ ne meng _ uyavagh ni _ afsengagh m _ siq lugw aaneng _ ivagh i lghiit _ nuna _ tutmagh aqe luku _ .
Siq lugw at _ akuuragh nghmegteki _ ketngig it _ nalighmeng _ pu tuk ghw it _ kanagh aqe ut _ :
aghnaghagh t _ ata eng _ tangigh sqellug qu _ pekneghtigh sqellug qu _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
kenigh megteggun _ ( _ kenigh t _ )
At kug w em _ , _ qaligh m _ , _ qiipaghagh m _ asi ligh neghi _ nuqutuqagh t _ gg aat meggneng _ qantagh ke lghii ni _ :
yuug _ esnagh mun _ agigte yalghiimi _ iqall ugw aq _ tepe qaghtagh ma kanga _ .
Yugwem _ ila i llu _ esnevagh luteng _ kenigh megteggun _ saghna te ma lghiit _ qantaghqagh ite ngugh t _ .
tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ ( _ tut magh waaq _ )
tutmaghwaagh ghngaaghmi _ sa lghii _ , _ nalighmeng _ tutmaghwaagh te kete luku _ sa lghii _ :
aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ aghula ma lghii _ .
ila it _ asa- ni luku _ , _ apagh aatagh ni luku _ taku ma kangat _ .
peknegh meng _ ( _ peknegh _ )
Pii te sigh aam _ pii k n angi _ co t t on- n esug nil nguum _ akugh i _ :
aghnagh aq _ peknegh meng _ naalkute nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ saqlagte luni _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ufsug yagh a _ ( _ uf s uk _ )
sa u aat _ aatkagh t _ , _ ulig t _ anigu i _ , _ pagula i _ , _ ifkaghte na luki _ kaag tul ghiini _ unagh siigh w aghmeng _ , _ alngunak _ sa meng _ anag ut aghq aghyug n ameng _ :
â _ kameg gken _ anigu ghllag u uk _ ufsug yagh a _ qakmavek _ , _ â _ naa an _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
nigh waag pag tagh qelluku _ ( _ nigh waag pag taq _ )
Saam _ ak is q aghnegh an _ nighug u uute aatagh ste llegh i _ :
aw ligh neghllug mi _ meghutlug lghute _ egte llegh ni _ siqin ghem _ ak is q aghnegh an _ nigh waag pag tagh qelluku _ esghagh aghput _ .
siq lugw aq
neqelghutagh _ nuna kun _ laag te luni _ , _ laag llegh _ mingllu luni _ qaye a _ aghvegh m _ agl aaneng _ takaghqughvike luni _ nevugh meng _ saapekagh _ umu luku _ iwerngaqun _ paye a _ .
isekinagh lghiit _ enkaam _ neqe mun _ aghu nigh ite ngugh t _ :
Siq lugw aq _ ukmangigh aqe luku _ imigh aqaghput _ enkaam _ imagh kegte aqe uq _ .
qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ ( _ qaghlu _ )
Tapgh aghneng _ pateghtuqagh t _ aqnigh nigh ite ngugh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ teghig l ugwem _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimakagh t _ qamugh sigh u luki _ qikmigh nun _ :
yuug _ nutaghagh meng _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ qikmigh minun _ .
iingunagh mi _ ( _ iingunagh an _ )
Qamagtengngwaagh luni _ , _ sa u aat _ ikuvike llghite ngugh t _ :
nengiighhagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh _ iingunagh an _ qaake naqe kangat _ esghapag yaghtugh ma kangat _ .
siku yan _ ( _ siku _ )
siku _ taana _ , _ n atu m _ saam _ siku a _ :
naayvagh m _ siku yan _ iqeghte a _ sungaghyug a _ ughug kestagh yalghiimi _ .
iiw em _ ( _ iik w _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne meng _ awavagh ghllag negh meggni _ llangaqa _ naange ghllag luteng _ :
Iiw em _ qalmesagh _ aw av an lenguq _ aliigh uute ghllag ma uq _ .
tung y uum _ ( _ tungyugh _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne mun _ taglagh ghllag negh meggni _ , _ uleve ghllag negh meggni _ :
angyagh _ esnev an lenguq _ tung y uum _ kaate ma a _ .
maaqellegh m _ ( _ maaq em _ )
kellii n _ megh an _ maaqellegh an _ saste llegh a _ nalighmeng _ maaqellegh m _ ayuq e tul nga _ :
maaqellegh m _ aghvightagh u aatagh llegh an _ siku _ nekeg negha _ allangughte aqe a _ .
alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ ( _ alqime i an _ )
uksugh mi _ naayghagh t _ , _ uusneghwaagh t _ , _ sigugnegh t _ , _ qag ur ugw it _ paagken _ anuq an neghmini _ , _ umegnegh _ suupe m _ anigu _ neve aqe uq _ awatmun _ pii z taquq _ qagughrug neng _ .
qaye mineng _ nallunagh lghii _ tuute lghii ni _ ayeme luni _ ifkagh u qagh yu k _ .
naayghagh ni _ alqime i an _ uglaghi nghmini _ uqigtughte nghmini _ ellmi neng _ ifkagh qagh yu k _ , _ lengke kayug _ : _ paagken _ anuqe _ mulu nghmini _ sigugnegh _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ .
nunaki aqe uq _ ( _ nuna ke i _ )
teghigniqe a _ , _ pinigh y uug ta _ :
yuug _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ alii neghllug lag mi _ kiiw m _ esne ani _ kum aq iluni _ , _ negh aqe luni _ , _ nulugh magh mi _ aghn elqusiq _ nunaki aqe uq _ .
uvegte luku _ 
Tawaninginaq _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ tukughagh ni _ aqnighte luki _ mulu magh an _ naa an _ c lin ic -mun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
H e al t h _ a id e- tem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uvegte luku _ tagite qaghte naqe gpenaan _ . _ â
atngaghute leg _ ( _ atngaghute t _ )
aghnagh t _ neghigh luku _ taat g it nilnguut _ terellegh t _ :
aghnalqwaagh _ atngaghute leg _ , _ taqugh kek _ igaghtuqagh k _ esghaqaaluni _ aghnalqwaagh sug ning it ngwaagh tuq _ .
ighwaaghtuute te n _ ( _ ighwaaghtuute a _ )
teghig ke sagh t _ anigu mun _ , _ nuna mun _ ingaghte aqe luteng _ nev egh taqluteng _ mingughhu te lghiit _ :
Yugwem _ qikmigh ni _ megh meng _ uugte yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tamaani _ ighwaaghtuute te n _ . _ â
qikmigh _ ighwaaghtuute luni _ nekeve luni _ efsug te yalghiimi _ yuug _ isiqaghte ma kanga _ .
waamte amken _ ( _ waamte a _ )
puughte i _ .
Am yugh waaghluki _ , _ ipa u nghite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi lghii ni _ :
aghnaghagh m _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag _ inga _ . _ â
qiya yan _ pi a _ , _ â _ waamte amken _ , _ nanugh u nghite uq _ . _ â
agghi yug neghllak _ ( _ agghi yug neq _ )
Piy uk ell ghii nagh mitun _ pi naqe ghllag _ , _ sagiqe ghllag _ :
mekelghiigh _ uksugh mi _ maqaghqe gpenani _ napi naqe ghllag _ angayuqagh mi _ maqaghqe sqe ghngaatni _ .
ata an _ aghy ugh umakanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ agghi yug neghllak _ !
esla _ nallu kan _ qakun _ allangughte lleghqagh a _ . _ â
kasug ma kanga _ ( _ k as uk _ )
qagi m _ sa kun _ alngunak _ tekite yuwhaagh llegh a _ isiqghuute ghllag qagh yu k _ :
mekelghiigh m _ elqwaagh t _ sigugnegh m _ asing anilnguut _ aqfaagh aghte yagh luki _ kasug ma kanga _ .
suflu u ma lghii _ ( _ suflugh _ )
ggute m _ aghu llegh a _ :
ggute nka _ ggu ut niigh tem _ yuvghiigh luki _ , _ ataasigh _ suflu u ma lghii _ .
aghqiiwtu te _ ( _ aghqiiw _ )
uksugh mi _ s apegh h n aghq w aan ghani _ anigu kun _ piyug lghii ni _ piyug llegh t _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiw i _ nagate aqe ke put _ :
qakma _ manughagh mteggun _ naghughte lghiit _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiwtu te _ piyug llegh it _ .
piy aan neqeg s aataqelghiit _ ( _ pi yu a _ ) _ Yugw et _ uksugh mi _ piyug meng _ 
siku gnun _ ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ unangniigh na luteng _ 
megh meng _ ivagh i yagh te aqe lghiit _ : _ siku k _ kaa suwh aan gh egkeni _ yugwet
piy aan neqeg s aataqelghiit _ .
ataata ut _ ( _ atugh a ta _ )
ata m _ angleg utanga _ yuug _ :
ataata ut _ quunpeng _ napi ghllag _ enkaam _ unange aqe lghii _ .
ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ ( _ ilangqughqu _ )
ilangqugh meng _ aqfate lghiit _ meghqagh meng _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangit _ enkaam _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ esla _ naafte ghngaan _ meghagh ite igate ngugh u kut _ .
b o il er -et _ ( _ boiler _ )
melghutagh t _ entaqun _ 1 0 _ g all on -et _ umeg leg t _ , _ tugutagh leg t _ takemriig u aaghet _ :
B o il er -et _ kagimlegh meng _ ilangqugh meng _ imigh aqe aput _ .
ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ ( _ ilughaghte ni uq _ )
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ am yugh waagh ullghiit _ , _ s ugw aag usi gal nguut _ :
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ maaten _ pi pagnanigh ut _ .
qaasligh at _ ( _ qaasligh t _ )
umuqagh t _ akughtuqagh t _ qaasligh u luteng _ ggateg ke te _ atughqagh t _ :
ukut _ qaasligh at _ mat- qaghte yug nigh ghllag u ut _ .
kaki sigh ghllag _ ( _ kaki _ )
kaki sigh kun _ kaki ghllag _ :
aghnagh m _ ugw ini _ , _ avaqutagh ni _ , _ an Ê¼g agh ani _ aatkagh ngllagh aqe kangi _ qiipaghagh meng _ k aki sig nekun _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ kaki sigh ghllag _ .
yupig m _ San qut anganun _ apeghtuusagh kekagh nun _ liite aghagh sighqagh t _ 
iyaa-kagh m _ apeghtu sagh i _ 
sa ngllagh yaghqagh t _ : _ T ugw eq _ nalighmeng _ uunghagh _ 
atughqagh t _ : _ atugh llghite ngughk _ igaasigh _ nalighmeng _ unaghsiighwagh _ igagh _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ x _ 2 _ inches _ kuynge mun _ ukmangiisigh _ nalighmeng _ paper _ c l ip -meng _ .
naten _ tug w eq _ ulima yaghqau a _ :
imeg te luku _ maalgh ugw egneng _ igagh _ am estaaghh aq _ igaasigh m _ iq ugw akun _ er as er-em _ tung angakun _ .
igagh _ neve ste luku _ igaasigh kun _ s co t c h _ tape- meng _ il ef kagh aghh nayukan _ .
kepe nakesi _ igagh _ imeg tke aq _ saqugmun _ nuv uk rug wa _ ipeg sqellug qu _ .
wayagh _ kepe luku _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inches _ tag kaan _ .
agughte luku _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ in ch -ngu luku _ uzive qaghtagh na yu kan _ igaasigh mun _ nekegtekuni _ .
agughtekagh _ wayagh _ neve ste nakesi _ s co t c h _ tape- meng _ igaasigh mun _ ig iil gh akun _ iq ugw akun _ 1 _ inch _ piiznga an _ .
agughte nakesi _ wayagh _ piiznga lghii _ nekreg u luku _ .
igaghqwaagh leg _ tuug gh uuq _ , _ nekreg aa _ alngunak _ sa mun _ atugh u uq _ .
akuzillegh t _ sa llegh mun _ uspute nga lghiit _ 
1 _ . _ tunag m _ qukaa ni _ .
efqughute nga lghiit _ , _ qaatke te ma lghiit _ , _ qepghaghtuqagh t _ , _ qepghagh tke ai ta _ , _ ilakwaagh ita _ piniqe pigtegkangit _ .
â _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ qaatke te nga te mineng _ tunag m _ qukaa nite uq _ â _ angyaleg an _ pi ma kangi _ yugwet _ .
2 _ . _ K aag k asagh ta _ .
E f qugh agh ta _ elngaatall _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa ni _ kaapelqagh meng _ awaligh ma kanga _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ tamaaken _ negh yuguma lunga _ kaag k as aghtagh pe nga _ ! _ â
3 _ . _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
puughte i lleg _ , _ peghqinegh _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ puughte luku _ dollar-nga _ sa meng _ nav egh simakanga _ .
naa ita _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ â _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ taam _ puughte laatagh ma uten _ .
4 _ . _ meteghllug ghllag _ .
puughhe negh kegte aq _ , _ nalluqagh _ .
naa an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ elpek _ legan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ tuune laatagh magh an _ d oll ar - en _ â _ .
5 _ . _ iye k _ miluqutagh ka _ .
alngunak _ esghaq waagh aght alghiini _ iye t _ qaprag sim iita _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ aangqagh ghhagh ni _ naal ken neghmeng _ aghtugh luku _ naa ni _ aapte yagh aa _ kayusi tesqell uni _ ivagh kanga _ yaghlegi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ amen _ iye gken _ miluqutagh ke kek _ , _ naalke lleqe an _ . _ â
quyngigh k _ maalghug _ sumeghneghtuqagh k _ 
Qaygegh haam _ ungipagh aa _ 
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ ighnegh leg _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ , _ panig leg llu _ .
taana _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ quunpeng _ quyngigh mi _ nayugh i aqe lghii _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ esnaghtagh t _ tannge t _ naghughte te kete luku _ taana _ quyngigh igh ghllag _ mekelghiightuumagh an _ tugu ma kangat _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tawani _ uksaagh u uq _ .
qenwat _ uksugh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ mekelghiigh _ ratamyaag luni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
naqam _ neghe ste aqe kangat _ , _ taawanginaq _ ilu ani _ qavagh igate ngughk _ !
maaten _ ilangani _ , _ esla mi _ qavagh naqe yan _ quyngigh k _ maalghug _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
ila a _ gginagh a _ aveg luni _ tagnegh lghii _ inglu a _ qategh lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ yugusigh a _ ukileghyag _ .
taake uk _ apa an _ qam ugh te kef taak _ .
taake uk _ ingaghte aqe lghiik _ akeleghraagh ke luku _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ghhuute igate kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ kiyaghtaallegh mi _ mengteghagh mii i _ ivagh i aqe ut _ .
aghnagh aq _ nayag a _ ivagh i ma lghii _ , _ naayghagh m _ am at anganun _ pi yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ tume ghllag t _ .
ataasigh meng _ unug yagu _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte yata _ aag llegh an _ quyngigh m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Taa kun is kuvek _ wata _ ikfiqe lleqe uten _ .
whaa _ maalghug gneng _ megh nal iku y eng _ kaate lleqe ut _ ne meggnun _ !
unaami _ aane gkuvek _ ingavek _ uyav aghp anun _ tume nun _ aglagh ghhaaten _ .
kaate kuvek _ ukavek _ ayuqe luten _ nekevgha lghaaten _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
negh te ma lghiit _ .
taaqe yata _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ , _ kaa sa mi _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ tume nun _ uyav aghp anun _ .
kaate luni _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
inga _ qaghluughi na luteng _ tagsigh ma yagh kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ .
Av elgh aqin aam akangi _ legan _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
ila ita _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ sa u luku _ tuqu li _ qaywaam _ ! _ â
taagken _ tuqutagh igh na luteng _ malighqugh ma lghiit _ .
sivuke luni _ quyngigh _ uzive ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ taake uk _ quyngigh k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ qavagh lgute kek _ uzive ma lghiik _ maligte te lutek _ .
pangaleg ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ .
mulu luni _ tazingavek _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh magh mi _ aag llegh a _ quyngigh a _ guughte ma lghii _ .
quyngigh m _ kaate yatni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ uughqaghte ma lghii _ sivutmute _ ayuqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pangaleg te ma kangat _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ malighqagh i ma yagh lghii _ .
uyavagh te luki _ quyngigh m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U meg negh sighh u _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ umeg negh sigh yaqenni _ .
umegnegh ughte ma kanga _ qanigtuumagh mi _ , _ anuqetu magh mi _ .
naqam _ kingu at _ umegnegh _ sivungagh t _ aliinegh _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ tuqu laghate ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ legan _ igatagh negh gpeni _ tuqute luki _ negh luten _ pegte luki _ igleghte aqe i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ igatagh nghmini _ tuqute luki _ neqagh luni _ pegte luki _ tam avek _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ima _ uksaagh _ tannge t _ metngegh tke aat _ , _ iglegh tengng iin aamaluku _ qenwat _ upenghagh u ma lghii _ .
ighni laghate te ma lghii _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ â _ legan _ ighninghhagh t _ unite aqe ki _ , _ malighqagh te aqe naagh ut _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ unite aqe kangi _ .
mulu luteng _ ataasigh meng _ qavagh luteng _ kaate aqe lghiit _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ quyngigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ una _ saam _ naayghagh ke agu _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ naayghagh _ esghapag yagh kete ni _ naayghagh eng _ asi mikun _ uusneghwaagh leg _ .
uusneghwaagh m _ aw atang anilnguut _ mengteghagh i _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ esgha _ taana _ naayghagh _ whangkuta _ naayghagh ut _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwenllu _ qemi meng _ teve naqe aqe uq _ , _ yugwem _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ ghhukaghagh _ kuuve yaghtugh ghhu _ up- ghhagh ghllag nge a _ . _ â
aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ ghhukaghagh _ tugu luku _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
kuuve luku _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kek _ maalghug _ quyngigh k _ teve lghiik _ uusneghwaagh meng _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma kangi _ qenwat _ ata an _ qama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nalleghiite ziin _ , _ nikimqun _ sa meng _ esghapag inagh uten _ ! _ â
itegh luni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aane lutek _ esghagh yaq egt eng _ quyngigh eng _ , _ qenwat _ uglaghi ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
Yug wa _ talugh nga lghii _ .
wetku _ mulu luni _ yug wa _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
esghagh yamegteggu _ quyake luku _ qiy ak luku _ .
yuug _ qavaghtuqagh _ 
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ ne mi _ tea- ma ni _ esne meng _ unegken _ kellii neng _ neqenge kayug ni _ uksugh yuwhaagh mi _ siku k _ mall eg yuwh aan gh egkeni _ .
Yugw et _ , _ nukalpigagh t _ ategh utu aqe lghiit _ , _ ayvegh aataq el ghit _ puglegh akun _ .
unange aqe lghiit _ maklagte aqe lghiit _ anglu akun _ .
tamaa _ yuwh aq _ ellnga llu _ piyaa aqe lghii _ unug ghllagu luku _ nighugte ste gpenaan _ .
sikuvag nun _ kaate nghmini _ vuuslegh t _ qung angit gun _ laag te luni _ uqiite luni _ aghn elqusiq _ qavagh aqe lghii _ ivagh i niigh gpenani _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ aghnegh m _ qukagh a llu _ naghughte luni _ , _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .
taglagh aqe lghii _ maligte te luni _ .
Yugw et _ ungipamsug te nghata _ , _ taana _ yuug _ pim aqelghii _ , _ â _ ii _ , _ el ngaat all -aa _ , _ esgh atagh tegpen anga _ naalkute aghte gpenanga _ , _ akuuraate aghte gpenanga _ anglu meng _ puglegh meng _ uteghnigh laatagh unga _ . _ â
ataasigh meng _ yugwet _ naligh ita _ esgh am akangat _ naten _ sa aqe ta a _ .
Esgh apag yaq megteggu _ , _ iis kugh saq megteggu _ vuuslegh t _ , _ sikuvag t _ qung ang itnun _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma aqe lghii _ .
Nul iighh anun _ apegh ma kangat _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ yuug _ yataagh qell aat amalghii _ .
Un ugw aghllag yan _ , _ nul iighh an _ kingu aneng _ tuumte ma kanga _ .
maligte ma kanga _ uy aav an lluni _ esgh aghn ayuk ang atni _ liigik nayuk ang atni _ .
llaaghanam _ sikuvag nun _ taku kum taagh minun _ kaate luni _ aghuliigh llegh ani _ tuvagh m _ , _ naagu _ talugh uq _ qung ang itnun _ tamaavek _ .
tawani _ esghapag llegh ke i i na ma kanga _ .
tazingavek _ taku k estam akanga _ iig kagh ameng _ .
elngaatall _ igkamsug luku _ pi yalghiimi _ taawa _ sanqut angi _ , _ uyiigh i _ , _ uunghagh i _ saaghw ani _ naqam _ .
qavagh ani _ uyiigh a _ tugu luku _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ ne mun _ kaate luni _ ugw imi _ uyiigh a _ iigh luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghan _ whan ikum aan _ taglagh luni _ yuug _ ungipagh yalghiimi _ , _ â _ ii _ , _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ angtughte yagh aqa _ sa u a _ maklag _ , _ ima _ sa aqe kete te uq _ .
saavgumiigh i uute unga _ .
taawa _ sanqut aaghh aanka _ ima _ aghulaqe te ai _ . _ â
taawa _ nul iighh an _ angegh luku _ sa meng _ pi nghite a _ .

nuliigh ni _ keveg aqe a _ , _ â _ ingavek _ kug w egh penun _ keveg aqe laken _ .

angegh luni _ nulighh a _ aane luni _ tazingavek _ kug w egh minun _ pi ma lghii _ .

sa meng _ pi nghite uq _ .
unaami _ un ugw aghllag laataghtuq _ .
maaten _ tawavek _ iighagh vig minun _ pi gpenani _ , _ anglu meng _ ivagh i uq _ .

llaaghanwha _ uka _ mayugh uq _ maklag _ .

kii _ , _ imani _ iknaqe uq _ elngaatall _ .
