maklagte lghii _ , _ anglu a _ nuqutughte a _ tawaten _ qaake yaghqaaghte luku _ .
naghigh yan _ sayug waa _ , _ sayug waa _ .
S ayug waa _ , _ sayug waa _ iiwenllu _ whaa _ aliigh naqe aqe uq _ , _ samaken _ nuughqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ yugwem _ negh qugh rug wa _ .
neghqughrug _ uughqaghte luni _ yuug _ taana _ qev ut qugh taam akanga _ gginagh a _ esn eg uugh lluku _ puufqellug qu _ .
Negh qugh r ugwem _ nuqnegh luku _ uyiigh a _ pi kaqe kanga _ , _ aga _ itegh uq _ veghute uq _ anglu mun _ .
yuug _ nekeve luni _ uyigh ani _ , _ sanqute ni _ imeg luki _ taglagh uq _ .
esghagh luku _ nulighh an _ aapte a _ , _ â _ kii _ sa ghllag ziin _ , _ sangavek _ gginagh igh te ghllag ziin _ ? _ â
â _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ . _ â
yugwem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ â _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ sa u a _ taaga _ , _ repall _ neng tem _ angtale aneng _ nuqnegh naqe m _ anglu m _ esne akun _ gginagh ka _ kaag ut aat am _ ggin iigh ut ngwaagh aanga _ . _ â
taawa _ angegh aqe kanga _ , _ sa meng _ pi igate kanga _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ gginagh ni _ pi niigh ghraagte yan _ , _ y atagh qelluni _ aghulaqe laatagh uq _ , _ piyaa laatagh uq _ .
unange uute aqe lghiit _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .

uka _ mayugh laatagh uq _ , _ nuug laatagh aa _ sugupag m _ .

qaake luku _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ maklag ghllag _ angtaagh ghllag _ repall _ nalluke a _ sa u ta a _ .

tefaay _ ! _ tagtale ke a _ taawa _ .

El q iil aam _ ungipagh aa _

taawa _ igleghte ut _ .

iimnanguq _ .

taagken _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ .

ima _ aviite uq _ .

aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila ni _ av iil ng aghy am iki _ qiyaaghwagh magh mi _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ .
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavaa ma luku _ tagh sagh r am _ taghtugh a _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ aghnagh ngugh _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ â

entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ .

aghnagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ nenge lunga _ qetngigh uq _ , _ ugw atanga _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqetu uq _ .

unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ , _ whani _ utaqa aqe nga _ .

tagtalmi _ kiyaghtaa llghem _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ apa gpenun _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ â

aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whaa _ qavagh yaghtugh unga _ .

apa gpek _ saama _ suum qen neghmeng _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
repall _ iye it _ iqaghtagh igh ma ut _ .

aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wetku qun _ elpek _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ â _ aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
â _ whaa _ apeghtugh naqe amken _ .
vuvalla mi _ egmightaatagh u uute kumeng _ kayaal qen naay uk angaten _ . _ â

aghnaghaghhagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ qayugham _ liite i ziin _ ? _ â

taagken _ aane yalghiimek _ nutaan _ uksaagh aqe a _ .
atghagh ma lghiik _ , _ atghagh ma lukek _ unug ma kanga _ .

ellnginagh gpek _ kaate lghaaten _ . _ â
aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uteghmun _ qiive yagh kete ni _ , _ kaynge _ aga _ maaten _ tumang itgun _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .

aghnaghaghhagh m _ tenglugtugh magh an _ amigh k _ qam ay aagh mig yaqenni _ taghtugh simakek _ .
qama _ pi ma lghiik _ , _ â _ kay _ , _ llangaqa _ eltughagh ghhagh mta _ me a _ ! _ â
â _ aaqun _ whanga u unga _ tagi unga _ !
enmis _ sukate lusi _ qelpegh te ngnga _ ! _ â
â _ kaay _ eltughagh ghhagh ut _ tagi uq _ ! _ â
qelpegh te ma kangat _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ qav aghl aaghi g allghem _ iqaghtagh igh luteng _ .
eltughagh ghhagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ aapqugh aagh yagh aat _ apa gkenka llu _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ aghul agh qul gut angita _ naken _ pi ta a _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ aksaq ngwaagh umalghii _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa a _ vuvall amalghii _ .
sughu ke aq _ tagi laghate te luni _ negh te nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ ungipaghagh te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ alla _ neghe uute luteng _ enraq _ egmightaatagh u te ma lghiit _ , _ alignaghtaagh te ma lghiit _ .
ila ita _ sungagh t _ kagim lluki _ saguyagh megteggun _ qaake luki _ saguyagh teng _ kall ag anegh megteki _ sungagh t _ iighwigh aqe ut _ .
enraq _ ila ita _ tugu ta i _ ayvegh m _ mengqugh tun _ ullegh qaghtagh aqe kangit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ whanga llu tuq _ egmightu aatagh lghiinga _ ! _ â
nutem nguq _ apa a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ , _ sa naqe aqa _ ? _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ Ellng all u tughnguq _ egmightu aatagh lghii _ . _ â
â _ legan mi _ sa aqa _ , _ â _ pi ma lghii _ apa a _ .
nutem nguq _ ila i _ sughukagh m _ aghnalqwaagh t _ pi ma lghiit _ , _ â _ yakugh ke luten _ !
Aghnagh aq ru wh aq _ agghi yug ne pi waa _ !
kimaawi ste i naqe uq _ ila itneng _ alignaghtaagh naqe lghii neng _ . _ â
aghnaghaghhagh _ ketfagh luni _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uka nguq _ suksug ghllag _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ pi aqe ut _ amig kun _ ug wa _ qagi t _ kasug ma lghiit _ ilu te mun _ nategh mun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ saguyagh gni _ kall agagh yaqenni _ qagi t _ iig w yalghiimeng _ , _ kii _ nategh mi _ tepe aq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ii gu simakanga _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nekeve luni _ sagnegh gneng _ tugu tete luni _ tamaaken _ tepagh meng _ imigh lukek _ sagnegh gni _ sughu ke aq _ tunqugh ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ tunqugh nghmeng _ enraq _ siklagh meng _ tungsigh ma lghii _ .
tuune yatni _ ugw at anganun _ aglagh luni _ mingle _ siklagh yagh kete ni _ kii _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tangegh iqe aq _ peksigaghte ma kanga _ .
itagnatun _ sagnegh k _ tugu lukek _ imigh aqe lukek _ tamaaken _ tangighkagh meng _ .
sughu ke aq _ uyegte ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ mumegh _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mingle _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ maaqe ma lghii _ mingle aneng _ .
meghute meng _ tugu tete luni _ megh sil aamakanga _ tamaghhagh an _ sughu ke aq _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ugpeq sal ii taat _ .
V uvall aneghmeggni _ aqfa aqe kangat _ nuna lgu ta ita _ .
qamagte uq _ .
qilughwaagh neng _ wayagh te lghiik _ 
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ puughhute m _ apegh llegh a _ 
ungipagh aq _ , _ anipaghllag _ nalug ma kestagh ma luku _ qilughwaagh ghllag ni _ naken _ meteghllug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ Meteghllugwem _ aapte ma kanga _ ,
â _ An ip aay _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ?
awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ , _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ . _ â
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ .
iqlengiqe uten _ ne ke nghite aten _ .
whanga _ ne ke anka _ , _ awite te n _ iqite te n _ taagken _ . _ â
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ Meteghllugwem _ ,
â _ entami _ tuqlugh qagh ki _ qilughwaagh t _ taakut _ , _ angegh kangaten _ taawa _ ne ke lleqe aaten _ . _ â
anipa _ qalghigh yagh uq _ , _ naagu _ sa meng _ pi aghte nghite ut _ .
Meteghllugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga qun _ nagate aghte nga _ tuqlugh qagh langi _ . _ â
qalghigh yalghiimi _ meteghllug qrug _ ,
â _ Q gh waagh w q _ , _ q gh waagh w q _ , _ q gh waagh w q _ ! _ â
ii _ , _ akiingqwaghte aghagh u i _ .
â _ qayugham _ angegh kangatnga _ esghaghhu _ , _ awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ . _ â
anipa _ tenge ghrug ma lghii _ ima _ .
U q it aq estagh ngaan _ aga _ tenge ste luku _ , _ meteghllug qrug _ nalug ma lghii _ taaggun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ metngegh tke aq _ Agh sig allgh aanun
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ ungazigh meng _ 
yuug _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh lgu ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ .
ataasigh _ panig a _ , _ ataasigh _ ighnegh a _ , _ tamaghhagh egmek _ mekestaagh staghhiinagh k _ .
yuug _ taana _ unange yu pigte lghii _ , _ unange aqe lghii _ neghsagh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ .
nulighh an _ neghsagh t _ unangkagh i _ afta aqe kangi _ mengteghagh mini _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ neq e kum aaqelghiit _ .
ilangani _ naghaagh ma lukek _ taghnughhagh k _ mengteghagh m _ uughqa ni _ esghagh ma kangat _ angyagh _ igleghte lghii _ megh mi _ ataasigh meng _ yug ke lghii _ .
legreliqe tke ma kangat _ taghnughhagh k _ kina u ta a _ tagi lghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nuyekligh u ma lghii _ uyughagh mineng _ , _ tamaaken _ naa minun _ apegh ma kanga _ sivuke luku _ ,
â _ U pag ugh naq aghput _ angyagh _ uukna _ nallukekagh ut _ . _ â
angegh ma kangi _ naa ita _ .
aqfaasnaq _ taghnughhagh k _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ kaate ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ taawanginaq _ uugte gpenani _ qute mun _ .
nayag an _ uyughagh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ talligh akun _ .
Yugwem _ aghnagh aq _ aapte ma kanga _ angyagh meng _ ,
â _ uyughagh n _ tagivagh nayagh nghite zigu _ tugumiiqe sqellug qu _ ? _ â
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ entaqun _ qiya lleqe uq _ . _ â
Yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ qiya kan _ tuune lleqe aqa _ .
aghnaghagh m _ tuune a _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ iiggagh nun _ yugwem _ .
Yugwem _ qaake luku _ angyagh minun _ taghnughhagh _ kete ma lghii _ kilgaa nun _ megh mun _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ siqin ghem _ tevigh vig anun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ naa minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
ungipaate ma kanga _ sa mun _ yug mun _ tugu ma ni luku _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ .
naange aat _ qiya ma lghii _ ighnegh minun _ saama _ alinge ma lghii _ ugw im ineng _ .
tagi ma lghii _ ugw inga _ mughu ta neng _ tusigate luni _ , _ uglagh u pigte luku _ unange ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
itegh luni _ aapte ma kangi _ ,
â _ naagu _ ighnegh ka _ ? _ â
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ ,
â _ Yugwem _ tagikagh m _ angyagh kun _ tugu ma a _ ighnegh ut _ , _ enkaam _ aghulaqe te ma a _ .
alangghu nagh ghhalek _ whangkuta _ !
ellnga n _ aghulaqe te ma a _ whangkuta _ ighnegh ut _ agh sig allghan _ tunganganun _ . _ â
Yugwem _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nallunagh llegh anun _ esnagh m _ .
mamleg pigte ma lghii _ .
Yugwem _ unite ma kanga _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ava u na an _ neqe u na an _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ al ngun ag an _ igleghte ma lghii _ mamleg mi _ .
qula ani _ qalghigh magh meng _ tengaa ma lghiit _ turiig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ qalghigh llegh itneng _ nagaqugh te luni _ alingyug ma lghii _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ mamleg mi _ .
negh ka nge i te ma lghii _ igatagh luni _ aligh ni _ nguug ragh luku _ lliigh ma kanga _ .
meghnugh ghllag yami _ asivaqun _ qavaa ma lghii _ temngi _ tamaani _ .
taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ma luku _ tafsi a _ ileme ma lghii _ .
tafsi a _ qughagh ghllag ma lghii _ qinuyugte ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nalluke ma kanga _ naten _ naallghute lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ esghagh ma lghii _ sivutmute _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sivu mini _ mek el engest aghhaq _ nigh uwh aq _ ak am k egt alghii _ ighaleqetaaghte yug nitagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ nigh uwh aghmun _ .
igleghte yalghiimi _ wata _ sivutmute _ nigh uug sim angin aamakanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ esghagh ma kanga _ tu r iigg aq _ .
T ur iigg aam _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
â _ tugu gu _ whanga _ amiiragh ka _ . _ â
enkaam _ turiig m _ qesug ma kanga _ yaqugh mineng _ taake lghii _ silug _ .
tuune ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ pi magh an _ ,
â _ qavagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ qavagh aqe i _ qagi t _ kelu kaghagh itni _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh aqe gkuvek _ esghagh aqe gkufki _ naayghagh t _ aglagh aqe i _ tazingavek _ .
Qay g eq lit kuvek _ naayghagh neng _ esghagh lleqe aten _ asi itni _ mengteghagh t _ .
ukig ggaaten _ enkaam _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luki _ aghuliigh ghhaaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ igleghte ma lghii _ tugumiiqe luku _ turiig m _ si lug wa _ .
aghneq _ qamagte yan _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ qagi t _ turiig m _ pillgh atun _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ esghagh ma kangi _ naayghagh t _ .
taku ma kangi _ kaate luki _ maye ii ma lghii _ qule mun _ .
qaygeghte luni _ llaaghanam _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh lghute _ naayghagh m _ awatangani _ .
ukig ma lghii _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luni _ mengteghagh nun _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag ma lghii _ .
turiig m _ iknaqughi te ma kanga _ .
ne mi _ tawani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pinitun _ negh e simakangat _ .
ne m _ yugw i _ qerngughte ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nanghiigh na luku _ .
aglagh ma lghiit _ pennagh nun _ .
asi akun _ pennagh m _ llilaghtugh ma kangat _ uglagh pigte lghii _ savig _ .
pi ma kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nal ugu tesqelluki _ awatghute luki _ savig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sivulii luni _ nalugute ma lghii _ qamagte luki _ savig t _ qayetghute ma kangi _ .
ila i llu _ nalugute ma lghiit _ , _ savig tgun _ tuute ma lghiit _ , _ uglagh llegh a _ tuquma lghii _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ mengteghagh mun _ .
taagken _ ungipaate ma kangi _ mengteghagh mii it _ , _ ila i _ yugw ita _ qetgegh aghluteng _ savig kun _ tuquma ni luki _ .
upugh ma lghiit _ iknaqe lghii meng _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
kayagte ma kangat _ aghulaqe sqellug qu _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ nay y gh amun _ esghagh ma kanga _ ne ni _ .
uteghnigh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag luni _ .
aqupilqe i llegh m _ Akil egh tus aa
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa _ 
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ yuwh agh nguq _ taana _ unang upig lluku _ es nighqw at aamalghii _ .
sigugnegh igh ghllag luni _ uusqagh pigte luku _ esnagh _ ayuqe uq _ .
tawaten _ yuug _ igleghte ma luku _ nak ennguq _ qikmigh ghhagh _ mulaagh qu aqe uq _ .
mulu luni _ qal ghil qwaagh aghaqelghii _ llangaqa _ aqnigh qw aaluni _ .
taawa _ taw a test aghh inaq _ naqam _ yuwh aam _ naan tul nga _ esghagh gpenaan _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ qenwat _ esghagh aa _ sigugnegh m _ esne akun _ pakineg kau te lghii _ .
sivuligh t _ itegagh ghhagh u i ni _ aliigh qagh lghiit _ nuqnegh naqe mikun _ taaggun _ ima _ aga _ este aghagh uq _ .
sama _ tekite luni _ qalghigh ghllag uq _ .
sama _ mul aqum aluku _ tawavek _ pakineg qagh vig anun _ upleg luku _ up-tu aqe a _ .
Y at aaghq eng ngwaagh luni _ whaa _ nalugute ghesnagh te _ akuqagh ma kanga _ , _ qaake a _ .
qikmigh ghhagh _ qaake yatni _ quy am _ ighwaaghtuute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yugwem _ ighu kek _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ paagh ma kek _ inglugtun _ .
paagh lukek _ taagken _ aga _ sivungagh ni _ pangaleg uq _ .
maligte nghite yatni _ uteghte luni _ paagh laatagh aa _ , _ naqam _ aga _ pangaleg aqe luni _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ qikmigh ghhagh _ aneghte uq _ .
qenwat _ elpeg yug luni _ yuwh aam _ malighqagh aa _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ unite luku _ ayuqe kanga _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ uteghte vike luku _ paagh aqe luku _ pangaleg aqe lghii _ .
qenwat _ yuwh aq _ suk aagh taa _ .
aawallu _ maateqwaaqun _ yuwh aam _ unite yagute a _ qikmigh ghhagh _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ kaate luku _ quy aal aataghtuq _ ighwaaghtuute laatagh uq _ .
taawa _ yuwh aq _ sukaghi ma lghii _ maateghhaq _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ akilegh tum akanga _ suk agh imeng _ .
tefaay _ al iingh akun _ !
kevgaaslug _ neghnavregagh _ 
V ir i _ V _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ataasigh _ yuug _ ellngin aq el t aghhaq _ .
nuna mi _ tung angani _ ava ite ngughk _ nuna lgu ta ite ngughk _ .
unangniigh llegh ke kanga _ taawanginaq _ sik igg iin aghmeng _ .
talwa llu _ sikig meng _ neqek elghii _ .
naqam _ quunpeng _ piy aan agh aaqelghii _ .
gaagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ negh luni _ , _ taaqe nghmini _ ingliigh luni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
unaami _ piyaa aqe lghii _ .
unange luni _ uteghnigh nghmini _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig t _ afta aqe luki _ .
aymaake i _ gaagh aqe kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ kinegh ngllagh aqe kangi _ ingleghqagh u luki _ naliini _ tanpeghqagh u luki _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ sivuke luni _ esnighqwagh na luni _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ esnagh m _ tunganganun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ igleghte ma luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ unguva lghii _ tepe nghhagh _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ .
taana _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ tugu luku _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
taglagh luni _ kangighagh ani _ mengteghagh m _ petugtu aq _ amigh _ up- yu aatagh a _ kepe luku _ ukig simakanga _ .
ukigllug qu _ item simakanga _ .
I tem lluku _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ qepute ma kanga _ .
qepute luku _ almesigh itun _ petug ma kanga _ kangighagh kun _ .
piyaa vig mi _ unange laatagh ma lghii _ sikig meng _ .
sikigtagh ni _ akmag iigh luku _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig _ lli ma kanga _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ .
lli luku _ akite kun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ neghnavregagh _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ enta _ sa aqe ziin _ , _ pis temni _ unangkagh ka _ afta gu _ ! _ â
unangkagh a _ sikig _ um yugw amineng _ qayuutagh mun _ uugte luni _ ellmi neng _ amiiragh igh ma lghii _ .
amiiragh ii nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi neng _ llaag t _ uglafqe te ma lghiit _ , _ ighneghagh igh ma lghii llu _ .
Ugl af qunegh meng _ taaqe yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pis temni _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
Yugwem _ esghapag yaqminigu _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ ugkellikagh i _ qulmesiite mun _ kanaghte uute ma lghiit _ ellmeggneng _ .
egllu m _ qula akun _ qulmesiite _ ellmi neng _ agaghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pis temni _ ingliigh te nga _ !
ingaghte naqe unga _ ! _ â
yuug _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ , _ mulu gpenani _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ungavig _ ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yami _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ .
Iiw ennguq _ qemi meng _ teve aqe uq _ meteghllug _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ uuk _ aqelqagh _ !
natmun _ igleghte aqe ziin _ ? _ â
Meteghllugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ temngi _ maani _ igleghte aqe unga _ . _ â
Yugwem _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ ,
â _ uuk _ weni _ whanga _ aqelqagh ke laken _ , _ atghagh ltung _ , _ negh yaghtugh ltung _ ! _ â
taagken _ yugwem _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ mengteghagh minun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itegh lutek _ yugwem _ upugha te ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug _ utaqa i ma lghii _ aqume luni _ sikig m _ amiiragh akun _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pis temni _ , _ aqelqagh _ gaagh te gu _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ ellmeggneng _ ketfagh luteng _ ugkelli aqe lghiit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ ellmeggneng _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula akun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ .
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ esgh an neghmeng _ .
kitum _ yuug _ apeghiighsagh te aqe agu _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ ungavig mun _ .
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ , _ negh lutek _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
Yugwem _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ piyaa naqe unga _ , _ elpek _ navek _ pi naqe ziin _ ? _ â
Meteghllugwem _ akite ma kanga _ ,
â _ whanga _ aki yan _ tunganganun _ ivagh i aqe unga _ ne meng _ . _ â
taagken _ pellegh utu te ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ aki yan _ tunganganun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ pengughqagh meng _ talughte luni _ , _ yuug _ iigh te luku _ esghapag ma kanga _ , _ talughte neghsigh ma kanga _ .
talughte yan _ qemi meng _ meteghllug _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ yugwem _ mengteghagh anun _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
yug tun _ ellnga llu _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ enta _ pis temni _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
neghnavregagh m _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ iwernga _ wata qun _ .
qenwat _ aghtugh luni _ meteghllug _ qefliqe ma lghii _ .
uzimun _ mengteghagh _ ivagh i vike ma kanga _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ esghagh kanga _ kangighagh mi _ petug luni _ amigh _ iim w aqaq _ .
Meteghllugwem _ ketfagh luku _ item simakanga _ .
S aag saqminigu _ esghagh ma kanga _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva lghii _ .
meteghllug _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ Unang waaq seng alghii _ yugwem _ kayute anga _ . _ â
Meteghllugwem _ neghnavregagh _ qesugragh luku _ amigh mun _ imeg te ma kanga _ .
ne akun _ petug luku _ aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
yuug _ unange luni _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ unangkagh ni _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ lli luku _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ sa aqe ziin _ pis temni _ , _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ â
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
alla _ pi laatagh aa _ .
aghtugh ma kanga _ .
mataawi tete yamigu _ amigh _ ketfagh luku _ saag saqminigu _ imeg tekagh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ qesugragh luni _ .
taagken _ almesigh liite laatagh ma kanga _ kiyaghnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh luni _ lliigh laatagh ma lghii _ .
Al iingh akun _ amsanagh akun _ .
tefaay _ !
Tung yuuk _ , _ Iiw ek _ , _ maaqellegh k _ sivuqagh mi _ 
Aku l k im _ apegh llegh a _ 
maaqnegh ughte nghaani _ tung yugh aqaa _ .
quunpeng _ tanqigh _ naqenqaghqe nghaani _ tung yu pag llag aqaa _ .
tawani llu _ maaqellegh k _ iknaqe pigte aqe uk _ .
A siv agh atagh aam _ nalighmeng _ qu ung v aam _ tung yu pag testaq aa _ .
kiyang _ six _ ho ur s -mi _ maaqellegh k _ aghvightagh ke ak _ .
I kev regh aaghh neghani _ iiw aqe a _ .
tepe aghte nagh uq _ esnighqwagh lghii ni _ iiw mun _ ayuqe luku _ .
tepe aq _ iighh w taqaa _ tung y unghani _ .
Iiw mi _ iqanengenaaghte nagh a qaa _ qalmesaghtu llegh ani _ esne mi _ .
kayute nagh aqe uq _ iqanengenaagh meng _ nayigh itni _ taanÊ¼g ani _ qalmesagh ni _ .
aywaayage m _ iiwpag ste aqe a _ .
I ip aghll anghani _ ell maa r al qin aan aq aquq _ .
Sulpik
T uu g _ â _ ghi m _ apegh llegh a _ 
Mekelghiighh agh nguq _ taana _ Sulpik _ , _ aange ghllag nghite ngughk _ , _ q ugw in t ar kag gaq _ , _ angl in as uwh aq _ elngaatall _ .
Ig g aar k it aagh aqelghii _ ilangani _ piyug nghmini _ .
elngaatall _ iye kek _ nang llag rak gu utaq elghiik _ ilangani _ .
nasaperaghpag qaghte luni _ ayuqe lghii _ army _ c ap -meng _ .
atugh kek _ j ac ke t- eghllag ek _ , _ nag tuq aghp alg ek _ , _ aligh kek _ taake lghiik _ ellnga ni _ .
atuqe aqe lghii llu _ qull ig llag egneng _ segesqugh kek _ ilaagh ghllagkagh gneng _ , _ kameraagh ghllag gneng llu _ singigh a _ singigh gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ legra aqe lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ sa meng _ esghaghkagh mineng _ .
Am yugh waa tuqaq _ am yugh waagh usi q aqegkanga _ uglagh lghii _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ni _ ilakumtaagh minun _ .
quunpeng _ teghigniqe u lghii _ nenglagh aqe lghii _ .
nenglagh kaqe kangi _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh ni _ .
sumegh ke igate kanga _ talwa _ esla m _ allang ughh rakeg tul nga _ ne meng _ uyavagh nun _ piyutagh u nghmini _ .
Am yugh waagh ngaaghmi _ pinitun _ pingwaagh ke lghii _ .
ilakumtaagh an _ piyuke aqe kangat _ ila u luku _ qayughllak _ um yugw aq egtaq _ .
sa lleghqagh meng _ suum qaa ll atanegh mini _ nul qav iigh sim aaqelghii _ , _ aghul iil k iq nan im aaqelghii _ .
kiyang _ nenglaghnagh luku _ sa u a _ esgh am aaq egkanga _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ sa meng _ ila minun _ neng lagh t illegh qameng _ um yugw amikun _ sumeghtaghagh ma aqe lghii _ .
kaagkagh _ qell uug ta _ .
kaagkagh t _ qell uug taat aneghmeggni _ qesug yugwem _ .
â _ atugh lghiit _ qesug nagh pigte ut _ aghula te ghllag t _ repall _ kaagkagh ka _ qell uug taa _ .
qenwat _ aghula unga _ , _ â _ aghnaghagh m _ ilakumtaagh ni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
S A N G U LL U U K _ qemi mi _ 
Sivuqaghh m iitlu _ , _ sivungagh mii t llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ ulimaagh at _ 
Sulpik _ taana _ qemi mun _ mayugh kusiigh ghngaaghmi _ sa meng _ allakaayagh gmeng _ esghaate igate ngughk _ .
alla _ maaten _ mayugh luni _ , _ agigte luni _ , _ yug sugh ay alghiimi _ sa u a _ allake ma kanga _ esghagh igate kete ni _ tespam an lluku _ , _ elngaatall _ iye kek _ nang llag rak guu simalghiik _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sa u a _ taana _ esghagh luku _ elngaatall _ egtugte pagte ma lghii _ .
Tawaten nguq _ egtugte pagte te kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ ,
â _ K a- a- ay _ ! _ â
Esghagh yaq min igu nguq _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ angqaperug kegte aq _ , _ uka llu nguq _ taku kestagh aqe a _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ â _ pi ma lghii _ Sulpik _ .
Esgh an qeg si t kes aq min igu nguq _ iye ghllag kek _ , _ ggute ghrugllag i llu _ .
Ag it aghq eghllag luni _ ellng aghll ugw in aanun _ ayuqe uq _ .
nanugh m _ melqw atun _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ ayvegh m _ tugu ta atun _ tulughyag ghllag kek _ , _ iye ghrugllag kek _ legan _ kilgaa ni _ miluqutagh ke kek _ .
Nun m aas qugh haq _ uka _ taku kestagh aa _ .
alingruugh ghllag luni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qimag na luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ enraq _ pi yalghiimi _ aling r uu pag llagem _ ighu kek _ kayaali ste qugh u aghagh ma lghiik _ .
iitek nguq _ talligh gni _ aghul asim aag kenka _ pi yagh uq _ ,
â _ H u y _ ! _ H u y _ ! _ â
alike aghte nghite a nguq _ .
taagken _ s l ing s ho t- egni _ suumqagh u te ma kek _ .
nusug lukek _ uyghag ligh lukek _ qiinghute luku _ guute naqe yagh aa _ , _ guutepagningite uq _ , _ talligh kek _ ung eleg teghllag em _ .
En ragh nguq _ s l ing - eng an _ ru b b er- kek _ aghy um _ kepe kaqe ma lghiik _ .
â _ A - ay _ ! _ â _ , _ pi uq _ Sulpik _ .
Tawate tegh ng aag kenka _ inglu inagh u ghngaan _ qiinghute luku _ guusagh aa _ , _ manu ngiighhagh akun _ uyghag a _ tekite uq _ .
sumeghtaghagh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ .
â _ sa meng _ milugh qaghte lakun _ ! _ â
tamaavek _ esghaquaghaghte yalghiimi _ uyghag nguq _ whaa _ saaghw ani _ , _ akuqagh aa _ tawavek _ milugh na luku _ .
uqliite luku _ , _ nekefqaghte magh mi _ miluute kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Aa- aa _ ! _ â
aragh te lghiit _ nagas aq miniki _ llangaqa nguq _ igaghvig mi _ ilakumtaagh i _ ,
â _ Aq nigh n naq aghpe ku ut _ alla _ milugh pen aam taa _ ! _ â
pi yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ taakut _ pi nga yu t _ igaghyagh lgute i _ amiiragh ghllag m _ asi aneng _ aga _ qimagugh te ma lghiit _ .
Sulpigem _ malighqagh luki _ kaate yamiki _ qeleqetaaghtagh ma kangi _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ alinge ma lghiit _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ wata _ su w ag uluni _ .
A ke qu ugh taat _ seal- i qugh naqe ni luku _ , _ savig teng _ , _ uunghagh teng _ , _ qamiye teng _ tuune aqe ni luki _ sa u a _ ipa _ akequsagh keqaghte litgu _ .
wetku _ akequ ugh tengngwaagh yat ni _ qel eq e tan eghmeng _ taaqe ai _ .
taagken _ agl am alghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ akequsagh teng _ tagite uute ma kangit _ Sul pig mun _ .
aane te kete luku _ Sul pig en ku neng _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ allameng llu _ am yugh waagh naanghi taghput _ .
qakimallu _ suf lugw al waaq li _ ! _ â
iye _ inglupigagh _ 
angyagh na mi _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ egtug nagh mi _ ug m estaaghh aluku _ qavagh lghii ni _ .
Yugw et _ pi aqe ut _ ,
â _ T eng _ â _ gh un aaguq _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ unugmi _ qavagh naqe ut _ . _ â
S U L P I G E M _ pilaataqu llegh a _ 
W am iy aam _ apegh llegh a _ 
â _ Sul pii k _ !
Sul - P I I K _ ! _ â
Sulpigem _ naa an _ tuq l umakanga _ ,
â _ Sulpik _ , _ tagi aghten _ , _ tagi ragkiigh qagh a _ ! _ â
Sul pig nguq _ igleghte te kete luku _ Honda- megteggun _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ whaa _ aghyuugh naqe aatnga _ . _ â
legan _ naa an _ inegh qugh waagh waagh aa _ honda-k _ met ng egh u tef qaay ek _ pi sqellug kek _ .
ineghtekau ghngaaghmi _ nuqennegh me nguq _ aghtugh uq _ , _ metngegh yug ghllag _ , _ esnighqwagh yug ghllag _ qenwat _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
naqamllu _ esnighqwagh llegh a nguq _ una _ aghyuu ll ngunani _ aghqe aghtekagh _ .
esnighqwagh vigkagh minun _ kaate luni _ , _ qagughrug kun _ Honda- g ni _ aghula i aghte lukek _ , _ ategh luni _ piyug meng _ esnagh mun _ atgh aam algh i _ .
taakwani nguq _ tepagh meng _ saghna yalghiimi _ .
qagi igh ghllag nguq _ , _ saveg ii aghte luni _ megh _ un _ â _ ga _ , _ imani nguq _ qagitu uq _ .
Sulpik _ saghna pigte ghngaaghmi _ sivugte yalghiimi _ neghsagh _ qagi m _ ayeme te aqe a _ , _ repall _ nang llag pag tuq _ .
quya pigte luni _ nalla anun _ aglagh aghte luni _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh luku _ kelevagh ma kanga _ .
iiwenllu _ kel ev aghq agh aqaa _ nengulgha llegh neng _ sivugte yalghiimi _ ila a _ neghsagh m _ kana _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
legan _ taana _ peghhe qagh luku _ ila a llu _ teskana _ takuaghaghte luku _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh aa _ .
imange i nguq _ aangwaagh uq _ .
P eg nek an iq _ sayug waa _ .
alla _ qingsig qagh yalghiimi _ qagi nun _ , _ paninang _ pi nga yu a _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
â _ wiin _ allameng _ qingsig naqe nghite unga _ ! _ â
elngaatall _ quya uq _ .
â _ taawa _ aghyuugh naqe nghite aatnga _ honda-k _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ â
salin _ kayaal nguq _ enraq _ nuna _ kuml aluni _ qiighnagh ghllag _ enkaam _ qam ull gin naq _ .
qiighnite nghmini _ nuna mun _ gginagh a _ mateg qaghte vzigh aqe lghii _ .
iwernga _ neng leng el tagh aqelghii _ quy am _ neghsagh meng _ .
taagken _ pegnem _ ataasigh _ kaat ute qaghte luku _ Hond a-mi _ uvite anun _ ila i llu _ aqfa i _ .
elngaatall _ piyaqli aqe aq _ qayughllak _ mekestaaghhaa lghii _ .
Q iigh n itagh amikun _ taaggun _ qamagte qaghte luki _ pegnem _ kaat ute te luki _ Honda- g minun _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
Sumeghtagh amalghii _ ,
â _ seghleghhalek _ naten ngam _ q akugh naq si ngi _ , _ aglagh te naqe zingi _ . _ â
aghliigh yug yagh luni _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ ,
â _ iitek llu _ uteghpagtagh lleqe unga _ , _ ataasigh t _ k atu lluki _ ila i _ aqfa aqe luki _ pi lleqe anka _ . _ â
meghnaali yami _ ataasigh _ qaake naqutke ma kanga _ Honda- minun _ .
tugu luku _ kevegsigh u aghagh a _ ima _ peghhe qaghaqe a _ qayughllak _ uqigtu ghllag _ .
ila i llu _ nan ghi qw agh sim ay aq angi _ mataawi te ma kangi _ .
Sulpik _ yug sugh ay alghiimi _ , _ h iik _ , _ maalghug _ es nighqw ak _ esnevagh aqe uk _ .
ukapighqaagh yayek _ tagsigh ma kek _ .
arekull _ nulighh ghqu te uk _ elkek llu _ es nighqw ak _ .
uka _ tagi qrugtugh ngugh _ yuwh aq _ .
Y uwh aam _ kaate luku _ upugh ma lghii _ ,
â _ kii _ , _ unang sam aten _ ! _ â
Sulpik _ quya pigte lghii _ , _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ T ep u ghii _ taaggun _ elngaatall _ uygute luteng _ ! _ tea- te te _ â _ g avek _ esghagh negh mni _ aku r aghaq anka _ ayeme te lghiit _ , _ kelevagh aqe anka _ legan _ . _ â
taagken _ yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ una _ am sak engh at _ qaake naqe aqa _ Honda- g penun _ qayughllak _ honda-gken _ me ke ta ghhagh k _ . _ â
iwernga nguq _ tun u teg ken kun _ qaake luku _ asighte te vyigh aa _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ yugwem _ ,
â _ maalghug _ taake uk _ qaake lleqe agka _ honda-gka _ aange uk _ , _ saama _ iknaqe uk _ . _ â
Yugwem _ quy aku llu _ aga _ iglegh qaat ngin am aghmeng _ .
angayuqagh an _ Sulpigem _ peng _ â _ gun- ii te aat _ av iit ng waal ghii _ Sulpik _ .
liigike kangat _ metngeqagh u lghii _ Honda- g nekun _ .
Sulpigem _ naa an _ ugw ini _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ naagu _ Sulpik _ , _ navek _ pi a _ , _ peng enghi si guu _ ?
ivagh yaghtugh naqe gu _ ! _ â
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ ,
â _ navek _ mekelghii q ru wh aq _ aghulaqe laatagh a _ !
whaa _ legan _ aghyuugh mig taan aqng waaq a _ ! _ â
ata a _ yataagh qelluni _ ila gkenkun _ Hond a-m _ aghulaqe uq _ .
iiwenllu _ igleghte lqinagh aqe uq _ uka _ key- nghhagh at _ , _ mamlegte yaghtugh lghii _ .
Honda- ng ighh aat _ taakwavek _ tume tgun _ san iv aqun _ iglegh at _ , _ taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ liisuqe a nguq _ Sulpik _ uka _ Honda- ng iighh aag nekun _ tagi lghii _ .
taagavek _ qiive qaghte luni _ amig im akangi _ .
Tugh waagh yaq miniki _ piyaqminiki _ , _ kii _ , _ neghsagh meng _ usi lug teng _ .
kaate luki _ aghuliigh uute ma lghiit _ .
Sulpigem _ ata a _ p uygu ugh nguq _ ima _ aghyuugh mig naq ngu yaq anga _ Sulpik _ .
Sulpigem _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ata ni _ ,
â _ qivghu pigte unga _ elngaatall _ metngegh lghiinga llu _ Honda- klu _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ aa-a _ , _ wiin _ aglagh kumta _ aleghqugh lleqe amken _ . _ â
wetku _ kaate luteng _ ne mun _ Sulpigem _ nengllug utangi _ pi yalghiimeng _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pi nga yu t _ neghsagh t _ Sulpigem _ mallu ke ai _ .
qamagte luteng _ quya te ut _ elngaatall _ .
pi nga yu a _ taana _ neghsagh m _ us iit il ghi mun _ tuune ma kangat _ , _ kayusigh i lghii _ qayughllak _ .
naange a _ elngaatall _ afta ma lghii _ .
afta nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ uyegte ma lghii _ awalightu ma lghii _ uv iq lim eggnun _ , _ quyagh llagem _ angtalanganeng _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ , _ Sulpigem _ naange a _ neghsagh liigh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute neghsigh te kete luki _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aleghqugh ma kangat _ Sulpik _ qaatke te nghite llegh aneng _ , _ metngegh llegh aneng _ , _ Honda- g neng _ metngeghute i llegh aneng _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ Sulpik _ !
qakimallu _ uqiigh te aqe i _ , _ naav utaq li ten _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ tenpe te aqe i _ .
iwernga _ aneghneghte uten _ mallu nge ughtagh u lghiiten _ . _ â
alaghrang _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ aghulaqe naqe negh gpeni _ navek _ aap utng waaq agh luten _ pi aqe i _ !
ungipaate aqe luta _ , _ enkaangam _ pengeg fqaamta _ pi aqe lta _ !
aapute aghte manginagh lukek _ honda-k _ atugh aqe i akek _ . _ â
taawa _ Sulpik _ liite uq _ aapute yagute naqe uq _ .
akeqe ma kangi _ angayuqagh ni _ ,
â _ quunpeng _ neqamike aqe lleqe aqa _ n api yug llagh ngaaghma _ sivuke lunga _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ .
whaken _ kenlanga _ elpetegnun _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ . _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ elngaatall _ aviite yaghqagh ghllag _ taawa _ allgegh sim aan _ .
taana llu _ ilate luku _ atuqe gkuvgu _ qaatke te ma llegh _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ , _ quya te aqe lleqe ukut _ . _ â
siingvallagha _ 
Q ugw ay unghi tem _ , _ efqugh y unghi tem _ me t _ aanes qagh tameng _ akuzi lghii ni _ .
mekelghiigh _ naa mi _ megh tiis qes atni _ naa ni _ pi a _ ,
â _ aa-a _ , _ pi lleqe unga _ ! _ â
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
â _ siingvallagha igate ut _ , _ me n _ ayghigh lleqe uq _ . _ â
naayghagh _ taku ste na nigh ke aq _ 
Q ir g eng aaw ete m _ apegh llegh a _ 
Sulpigem _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kaay _ , _ megh iitagh ke ukut _ ! _ â
â _ meghtagh lleqe unga _ ! _ â _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ Sulpigem _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ taayughqe ma lghii _ meghtagh na luni _ .
aate ma kangi _ uqig allugh ghhagh k _ kam eraagh pag g aag nillu _ j ac ke t- tegh pag g aag nillu _ .
tespamavek _ kiiw gnun _ piyug meng _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
aghneghmi _ tawani _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh ghllag _ .
elngaatall _ nguuy ng agh aat _ qinuyugte ma kangat _ Sulpik _ .
malghugnegh neng _ qalta ligh luni _ kiiw gnun _ tespamavek _ meghtagh ma lghii _ atuq rugh waagh umaghmi _ ,
â _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa _ . _ â
â _ Kaa -aa _ ! _ â
Aq nighqw aamalghii _ elngaatall _ .
arekull _ vegtaagh m _ kaape ma kanga _ aghenqignegh akun _ ullungag akun _ .
qiya vzigh ma lghii _ aqnigh qw aam _ angtale aneng _ .
Iigg ell uwh agh mineng _ q ugw in pay uwh aghneng _ ef lugh w aghagh simakanga _ kaape lleg ni _ .
kiiw gnun _ kaate luni _ qalta ni _ imigh ma kangi _ .
Atgh amun _ qalghigh te lghiit _ piyaqminiki _ leghllegh t _ aga _ tespamavek _ kiiw m _ tunganganun _ pi aqe ut _ .
tumangani _ qalta ghhagh ni _ lli luki _ meghnaal im algh i _ .
nekevgha te kete luku _ tawani _ esghapag ma kanga _ naayghagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ apegh qumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh mini _ .
awen _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kanga _ ungipaghagh mi _ taana _ nateghtu langa _ naayghagh _ sangami llu _ taku snanigh kau ta a _ .
taagken _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiimi _ mangteghagh mun _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ peng g aaq eftuq _ uteghpaarkitaagh magh mi _ esghagh naqe magh an _ uka _ qemigh a mi _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ Sulpik _ elngaatall _ pengegsigh uten _ ! _ â _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
Sulpigem _ iqenge te yagh aa _ nengyugh ni _ , _ pegnem _ inglupigagh meng _ iqenge te a _ qayughllak _ ullungag a _ puuve ghllag nga lghii _ .
â _ ukavek _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ gginagh n _ !
kii _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ ?
sullevneghhaleg _ una _ !
kitum _ pi uten _ ? _ â _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
Sulpigem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ nakaa _ , _ vegtaagh m _ taglagh ma lunga _ kaape kaqe aanga _ pamavek _ meghtagh ma lunga _ ! _ â
piniqe pigtekanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ tawan igh lluwh iinaq _ ukmangigh aghte ma kanga _ ullungag a _ .
Ighivg aghyan _ , _ negh te nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ , _ Sulpigem _ taku yuguma kangi _ ilakumtaagh ghhagh ni _ kiiw gnun _ pikagh t _ .
taagken _ piy aat aagh luni _ kiiw gnun _ sa u a _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
nagasugni yalghiimi _ llangaqa _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ , _ nalighmeng _ kaynge _ , _ nanugh _ .
nagaqugh ma kangi _ akuzite lghiit _ kiig w em _ esne gkeni _ .
piyaqminiki _ aragh kaqe te lghiit _ arekull _ ilakumtaagh i _ naghaagh te aqe ut _ .
â _ Sulpik _ , _ sukate luten _ tea- ai _ ! _ â _ aragh ma lghii _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
â _ kayusiite aghte kut _ iqallug _ una _ tug unaq utk aqaghput _ . _ â
Sulpik _ sukate naqe pigte luni _ piy ull un aagh umalghii _ enraq _ ighu k _ takestaaghhagh m _ suka ighlliqe ma lghii _ .
â _ Sulpik _ aghuliigh i _ nagnegh aghte lleqe uten _ esnevaghpag kuvek _ ! _ â _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
siingenllu _ Sulpik _ uka _ ull ghit aper e waagh aqeftuq _ aragh magh mi _ .
aga _ isiqghuute ghllag uq _ ! _ naate naagh a nguq _ iqallug _ tugu naqekagh at _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ tak w aghagh lluku _ Sulpik _ kayusiite luku _ nekev e simakangat _ .
qute mun _ taslugh luku _ uyghag m _ saaghw akun _ aqum e simakangat _ .
kameraagh kek _ anighaaghte lutek _ uqig tugh qw aamalghiik _ megh m _ imigh yaq min ikek _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ iqallug _ kameraagh an _ ilu ani _ .
taagken _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ Sulpigem _ iqallug _ tugumiiqe luku _ .
Sulpik _ un iq agh aa simakangat _ qayughllak _ agh ir aam _ sukangiite ghllag lghii _ .
nagate laatagh ma kanga _ taana _ qawaagte yu gni _ qalghigh lghii _ llangaqa _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ .
U p um _ angtale aneng _ elngaatall _ iqallug _ qete ghllag ma kanga _ .
Sulpik _ ne mun _ kaate yalghiimi _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pengeg aqlaatagh uq _ .
â _ kaay _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ sangavek _ aghitqe ghllag ziin _ !
P ugw im aghyagh sii n _ ? _ â
Iq ligh mi _ Sulpigem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
â _ Es tugh aghll unga _ kiiw gnun _ aghitqe unga _ ! _ â
â _ kii _ , _ Sulpik _ uyuq _ q akun ngam _ liite naqe ziin _ ! _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ aghy uniigh umakanga _ .
Unug mi _ tawani _ amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ .
tanqigh _ elngaatall _ nighugtu te _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ aliigh kestagh aqe uq _ .
Sulpik _ aane yuguma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ mayugh luni _ am aa ngu yug simalghii _ .
â _ A aa- r uu u _ ! _ â _ mulaagh ma lghii _ .
â _ paamyuq _ unug waa _ itegh i ngam _ , _ â _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ amig meng _ eslate mun _ qineghte luni _ tuqlugh aa _ .
Sulpik _ qetgegh yalghiimi _ qakma _ miiguute ghllag uq _ manughagh kun _ .
Sulpik _ itegh yalghiimi _ aagra ita _ ilu a _ nighug ghllag _ qayughllak _ nanigh at _ qetngigh lghiit _ .
All ighi gh waagh luku _ nuna kun _ yataaghq ut ngwaagh luku _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ayuqe a _ .
â _ Ap aay _ , _ alla _ ungipaghagh te aghte nga _ ! _ â
Sulpigem _ aapte a _ nengyugh ni _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ â _ nengyugh an _ angegh ma kanga _ ,
â _ emta _ nagate lghaaten _ naghaagh gpenang _ aghuliigh waagh luten _ ! _ â
Sulpigem _ piniqumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh an _ atugh laatagh aa _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ , _ tanqigh m _ yugw i _ .
Sulpik _ nagate u ghngaaghmi _ aghsaan _ aapqugh waagh llak _ .
qenwat _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ ungipaghaate mete nghite ngugh meng _ ,
â _ sangami _ allaaghlluwh aawa _ naayghagh _ piikna _ ? _ â
nengyugh an _ kiim simakanga _ ,
â _ kitum _ alngunak _ taku igate a _ test- pig ke na _ naayghagh _ ! _ â
â _ sangan _ ? _ â _ iq lim yug waagh umaghmi _ Sulpigem _ aapte a _ .

atghagh yata _ Governor - r a _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ M y _ w if e _ and _ i _ w o ul d _ l ik e _ t o _ c om men d _ M r . _ and _ M r s . _ G g ii lu _ f or _ ra i si n g _ a _ v er y _ in tell ig en t _ yo ung _ s on _ and _ f or _ h is _ s m ar t _ m oun ta in _ p up p y _ .

uksaagh aqe a llu _ Qii taam _ ata a _ itegh luni _ ungipaate a _ nuliigh ni _ igaghvigraaghagh _ taaqe ni luku _ , _ yuvghiigh yagh te aqe ni luku _ .

ukaagh _ 
iglegha llgu uq _ aghneghmi _ nunaagh mnnun _ nasqagh mun _ itghagh naqe lghiikut _ .
amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ qilagigh luni _ naqam _ iglegha nagh uq _ .
maaten _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ nasqaghte aqe ghngaamta _ , _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ kiig ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ itghagh aqe yalghiikut _ .
angyat mnnun _ uugte naqe te inagh _ , _ â _ t v v v v _ â _ l ev ek lugw an _ ivenruute m _ , _ megh m _ kasughqu llegh an _ kaate ragkiigh yug ste aqe kanginkut _ nasqagh mun _ .
ataasigh meng _ kaate naqe te inagh _ teskiwavek _ aag kaqe te lghii gni _ , _ Aq etlu _ , _ aqfaasnaq _ esnagh meng _ uusnegh u aq _ mayugh aghp ung _ .
naangngwaaghagh ta lgu lghii _ qel angh aqelghii kung _ kaate lleghqagh mnneng _ nunaagh mnnun _ .
â _ Aq et _ , _ ii-i _ !
naangngwaaghaate m _ utaqa aqe ainkung _ ! _ â
pekagh magh ma _ pi aqa _ .
Aq et _ naa ngwaagh at agnun _ aqume qaghte te kete luku _ kayagte aanga _ , _ â _ aaga ste nga _ . _ â _ aaga ste aqa _ qevute lugh u i aghagh te kestaamaan _ aaga llegh igh inagh u kete te _ .
qevuute luni _ aaga yalghiimi _ taqughte ghllag kek _ qagh leg aght aagh aak _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ napaqagh kek _ aghvegh m _ agl uq saq ek _ , _ tapghagh kek _ aqumutagh igh lutek _ unaghsigh meng _ .
ilangani _ aaga ghllag negh mta _ napaqagh kek _ qaprag aqe lghiik _ aaga llegh inagh mteggun _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ asi i _ iime luteng _ itegagh mnneng _ pakig qaqu nghmeng _ aaga naqe m _ .
Taan angin aanghituq _ piiq eg kefut _ nasqaghte lleg mnneng _ kenlanga _ pi w all emnnun _ sivuqagh mun _ igaghyagh na luta _ .
ila a _ teghig nal kum taagh put _ p ugw im an emta _ naayvaghpag mi _ nasqagh meng _ qantaghan lenguq _ .
liite naqe aqe lghiikut _ p ugw im ameng _ aghqestaallegh ani _ esne ani _ .
ivegh aqe lghiikut _ kenlanga _ megh _ tamlu mnnun _ kaate llegh anun _ .
megh m _ asi ani _ nuna _ piyugkagh ut _ maatnegh aqe lghii _ qetustaaghhagh u magh mi _ itegagh mnni _ .
ila a _ teghigniqe sigh ut _ iigge mnneng _ ila put _ i si qagh tan em teki _ kenlanga _ ghhuu te m _ ungelegte luta _ lliigh lleg mnnun _ .
taagken _ itegagh raaghinagh m ta _ vegaaghtuqagh kun _ piyug aqe lghiikut _ .
ataasigh meng _ Aq et _ qetgegh uq _ aragh magh mi _ , _ â _ kaa _ ! _ â
tuute qaghte yalghiimi _ sikughllug kun _ .
taagken _ seng elq ameng _ uteghpaarkitaagh uq _ all agh lluwh aghmeng _ nutaghagh meng _ tuk aleg alghiistun _ .
â _ kelenga luten _ , _ â _ aragh aanga _ , _ â _ ila i _ tamaakut _ vegaagh m _ ipeg pigte ut _ .
aqnighnagh pigte ut _ tuute qaghtekufki _ . _ â _ iwernga _ ilangani _ mangteghagh mun _ iitqagh s ugw aqelghii kut _ aqfaate aqe lghiikut _ vegaagh m _ qaye akun _ leganqun _ sikig stun _ kaviigh meng _ qimag lghii stun _ .
aliineghllug mi _ piyutagh u aghagh qu kut _ esnagh mi _ ivagh i aqe ukut _ tepekagh meng _ aqimle lghutagh meng _ , _ negaghpag m _ pug nat nganeng _ .
mulu gpenaamta _ uglaghi ghllag aqe ut _ saghn aput _ enkaam _ es tug wagh iiraagh utaq ukut _ mangteghagh mta _ tunuqagh ani _ .
U gh ar r ameng _ pi e- y es qung llaagh aqukut _ akume luku _ qen aav z egh aghmeng _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ ququng aghmeng _ .
aki kaghqagh lug ke i _ es tug w amnni _ lli aqe aput _ .
ata mta _ il aak waagh a _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ tamaan lenguut _ uviqligh ke ke put _ .
mangteghagh at _ n ut aaghaq _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ tunemagh a _ nuna mun _ tuute nga lghii _ .
ellngit a _ mangteghagh at _ nuna meng _ tuute nga nghite ngughk _ unagh sigh pag meng _ neng k il aghluni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ataasigh meng _ n ell iq r uug em _ kaate ainkung _ .
Aq etlu _ aaghh w meng _ itegh lutung _ mangteghagh m _ asi anun _ naalkute ukung _ laag waagh llagmeng _ tesamani _ .
U q f il qaagh meng _ takaghqughvike luku _ saap aghp ung _ vegaagh meng _ ququng aghmeng _ .
S aap saq ef ung _ nallunagh ghhalek _ nuna mun _ ilat ngwaagh luni _ .
taagken _ esghagh aghp ung _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ naghugh lleghh i _ , _ tuqlugh aghp ung _ , _ â _ tea- ai _ naghaagh lgusigh yaghtugh kung _ .
whani _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aaghhe uq _ sa kun _ waakaghte gpenani _ kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh mnnun _ .
â _ Th un k _ ! _ â
K al ef kag tuq _ laag waaghmun _ .
Neng l apag llagem _ repall _ aqsa ligh negh ka _ aqnigh n aghq w ag aa _ .
kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh ut _ pi niigh pigte yan _ nanghii qwaaq aghput _ taghnughhagh itnun _ iglegh at _ .
Wh an ikumi _ siqinegh _ tevigh ste gpenaan _ , _ Aq etlu _ aqfaate aqe ukung _ asitmun _ uusneghwaagh mi _ esnagh mun _ .
Suk er aghllagem _ iqu aqe lghiikung _ ullghitagh magh emtung _ asitmun _ nenglagh te magh emtung _ .
wetku _ iq ungh an _ ingyaghaghte aqe kegka _ nategh anun _ iqu nghite negh mni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ meghnag liigh qu kung _ esghapag magh an _ siqinegh _ tevigh lghii _ .
elngaatall _ allaaghlluwh aghyug naghtuq _ esghapag kau luni _ .
qilag a _ kumgayaaghte luni _ iqeghta meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
Q il aa waaghet _ llangaqa _ si lugw et _ angighhekagh t _ kumgayaagh m _ iqeghtagh atun _ .
ataasigh meng _ emta _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ taglagh lutung _ mangteghagh mnnun _ ingaghte qughtu kut _ .

sivuqagh m _ uyghag i _

kestekau nghite ngughk _ uyghag _ tutmagh kaqe a _ 
tea- ma anun _ igleghte te ikagh t _ .
iimken _ ima _

uyghag t _ maakut _ ulim ghus ii kat _ .
liite tke ait _ apeghtu sagh neng _ 
uuvganeng _ atugh u lghiit _ .

qaatke te nghmeng _ naa minun _

nengleg ketu te _ segh h es leng luteng _ unugmi _ ,

Am s aan aghllug llagmi _ .
kestekau nghite ngugh t _ uyghag t _ ukut _

alpa m _ manig i _ 
Aw it aam _ apegh llegh a _ 
whangkuta _ maaten _ ataasigh inagh u gpenaan _ upenghagh mi _ pen nagh tekayug utem m neng _ liisimake ke put _ alpa m _ manig i _ , _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ mekestaaghh aag w aqluteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
enkaamllu _ alpa t _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ ighni aqe lghiit _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
ayumigh _ laluramke t _ kaate llghite luki _ sivunegh put _ upengh anghani _ angyaghtu nghmeng _ taaqe negh meggni _ pennagh nun _ kiig sagh tu qay ugwet _ .
enkaam _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ manig nii qay ugwet _ .
tawatete kayugu te meggneng _ liite tke ait _ alpa m _ manig i _ naten _ sa kayugu ta i _ .
whaten _ enkaam _ ungipamsug kaqe ait _ , _ ighn i yug waagh lu te nguq _ tugu luki _ manig it _ utegh aght iluteng _ sivuligh meng _ mani gmeggneng _ mekestaaghh aag w aqut _ manig it _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ pingayut igh nghmegteki _ nalighmeng _ estamat igh nghmegteki _ utegh aght ill eteng _ , _ manig in nguq _ inglugtun _ nuv ug yug taqut _ .
tallimat igh nghmegteki nguq _ utegh aght ill eteng _ qenwat _ manig it _ inglugtun _ nuv ug yuk gu ugh taqut _ .
ipa _ tawatete yaghqaa ut _ , _ qayughllak _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ alpa t _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ ighn ikayug wet _ .
enkaam _ inglu inagh anun _ nuv ug yug tengng aku meng _ , _ ifkagh yug n amel nguut _ ifkagh aat am _ avaquti naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
naqamalla _ inglugtun _ nuv ug yuk gu ugh te kumeng _ uzive llegh i _ nengigh inagh meggnite luteng _ lliigh yaghqagh t _ .
taawa _ avaquti yaghqagh t _ .

ulima llegh a _

2 _ . _ kuynge m _ uk m aang ii sii _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ in ch es - n gh uluku _ kepe luku _ .

taawa _ uunghagh _ taaqe uq _ .
nekreg a _ alngunak _ sa mun _ a tug uq _ .
Ig uq wa _ igagh leg _ unegh waag mun _ kepekagh meng _ tuug gh uuq _ .
mughute kayug _ tamaghhagh mi _ tug w eghmeng _ kelqe aqe uq _ mughute negh meggni _ .
savikenghaagh leg _ nuv ug yuk eg tameng _ ( _ igagh _ unegh waag mun _ kepekagh _ ) _ siku mun _ um ut al es uu sig uq _ .
siku _ ugmestaaghhagh u kan _ nalighmeng _ qetustaaghhagh u kan _ tug w eq _ sufluqaghte te yaghqagh _ siku mun _ .
mughu ta m _ liisimake yaghqagh a _ kanagh nagh ta a _ .
angyagh mi _ kangqwaaghtuqagh mi _ tuum k aghq amel ngughmeng _ siku mun _ ay aghqu siq egkayug wet _ .

unangkagh t _ siku m _ esne anun _ kaate nghata _ nekreg luki _ qaake aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag men t _ pilag lghii ni _ u ngu ut imun _ atu qay ugwet _ .

leghllegh _ 
leghllegh t _ upenghagh mi _ kaawtu ta itneng _ iingtagh lug ke i llu _ unake naqe kayugu ut _ .

qikmigh m _ Il akum taa llegh pig aa
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat _ 
Ayum ir ugllak _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ qikmigh _ uqfigtuqagh mi _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ .
qikmigh _ amaa mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Am aay _ , _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
â _ A -aa _ , _ sa aqe stuung _ legan _ , _ â _ akite ma kanga _ amaa m _ .
qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
tagtalmi _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te luni _ qilug ma kanga _ .
â _ ii-i _ qilug gpenang _ , _ â _ ineghte ma kanga _ amaa m _ , _ â _ kaynge _ tagi lleqe uq _ , _ neghe lleqe ainkung _ . _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Kay ng aw h a _ whangku teg neng _ iknaqe nghite a _ sangan qun _ amaa m _ alike agu _ . _ â
taagken _ qikmigh m _ ivagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ kaynge _ .
naalkellug qu _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ â
â _ A -aa _ , _ â _ angegh uq _ kaynge _ .
llaaghanam _ qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ qikmigh _ qilug laatagh ma lghii _ .
kaynge m _ aghy uniigh aa _ , _ â _ saa _ una _ , _ qilug gpenang _ ! _ Yugwem _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
qemall _ tagi luni _ pi teg qagh lleq iinkung _ ! _ â
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ awilleqa _ yuug _ iknaqe lleghpigagh u lghii _ .
sangan qun _ uum _ alike laatagh agu _ . _ â
ivagh yaghtugh luku _ naalke ma kanga _ yuug _ .

Yugwem _ angegh aa _ .
kiyaghte lqinagh lutek _ , _ ataasigh mi _ unugmi _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te laatagh luni _ qilug ma lghii _ .

tugu gu _ , _ tugu gu _ ! _ â

tefaay _ !
alpa _ 
alpa t _ megh m _ qawaag ke ai _ .
qawaag m _ ila atun _ uq eghh mun _ aghulaqe igate ut _ uksugh mi _ .
uksugh mi _ megh ughte negh an _ angyagh n aghh neghani _ esghagh aqe ait _ .
upenghagh mi _ esne mun _ taglagh yagute aqe ut _ .
alpa _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ pennagh ni _ megh mi _ nalug ma uute aqe uq _ .
paninang _ uglagh ghllag _ tengaa te aqe uq _ .
alpa t _ pennagh ni _ ighni aqe ut _ .
manig i _ kiyang _ ataasi w aqut _ , _ ila i _ maalgh ugw aaqut _ .
manig i _ tugu lghii ni _ alla _ ighni aqe ait _ , _ utegh aght iin iiqiit _ .
pennagh ni _ piyaqnagh u i llegh ani _ yugwet _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ mayugh luteng _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ tugulagh te aqe ut _ .
P al as qugh haq _ tug waaq aat _ .
uglagh ghllag _ piyaqnagh llegh anite ngughk _ tugu igate uq _ .
alpa m _ negh kangi _ negh aqe aput _ , _ nutaghagh at _ inikagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
tukrugtekagh t _ gaagh luki _ nalighmeng _ ilangani _ tawatete luki _ negh aaqut _ .
amighqwaagh i _ atkug kaqe ait _ .
yuginagh _ qula _ siipnegh ke luku _ alpa m _ amighqwaagh a nguq _ naama aqe uq _ atkug u luni _ .
tunusagh t _ kumag nun _ 
Tag i kaam _ ungipagh aa _ 
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh _ , _ umiileg at _ paallghu nkut _ , _ qetgegh y aankut _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ mel ngu unkut _ .
umiileg _ taana _ qam ar ilak ayuk _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ nunalgute ni _ taakut _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ Qam ar il an aqunga _ , _ qerngughte te k _ ! _ kina _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ san qu tel illeq aqa _ ! _ â
llaaghanwha _ paallghu nkut _ , _ qetgegh y aankut _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ mel ngu unkut _ qerngughte te ma lghiit _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ qamarila m _ ay aav iigh a _ qiighw nge ta leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ , _ saaghw akun _ lli ma kangi _ sanqute t _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ qetgegh y aankuk _ paallghu nkuk _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ nuna _ uzive tegnegu _ . _ â
Enkaangam _ mel ngu un kuk _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ kayagte ma kek _ , _ â _ elpek tek _ naayghagh _ uzive tegnegu _ , _ taagken _ uteghnigh ghhaasi _ whavek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ qetgegh y aankuk _ paallghu nkuk _ sivuke lutek _ igleghte ma lghiik _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ iigh ma lghiik _ .
iigh lutek _ pinitun _ meghnaal ing waagh umalghiik _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
kaate yamek _ nguuyngaaghagh _ pi ma kangat _ , _ â _ tagi ukung _ nuna _ uzive luku _ ! _ â
apayepayiigh ghhagh nkuk _ mel ngu un kuk _ uzive ma kangat _ pengughqagh ghllag _ .
qesiqun _ uzivekagh at _ pengughqagh u nghite uq _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ .
apayepayiigh _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh mun _ .
melngugh _ nun maa wh t apag em _ kinguligh u luni _ kaate ma lghii _ .
katelghaate yata _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ sanqute meng _ tunqugh ma kangi _ .
paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ atkug w aneng _ qatelghii meng _ .
A as aq minigu _ taagken _ kenlanga _ paallghu t _ qategh simakangi _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ apayepayiigh t _ negaghpag niigh yagute ma lghiit _ sugukelengiigh meng _ nguuyngaaghagh meng _ .
qetgeghyagh _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh mineng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qetgeghyagh t _ qet g enegh tugh simakangi _ suk aagh sim aghmeng _ .
melngugh _ tuune mangite ma kanga _ qayughllak _ nun maa wh taq aq _ .
quunpeng _ sumeghtagh aghllag ugh simalghii _ .
enkaam nguq _ melnguut _ igleghte yagute ma lghiit _ naasqugh teng _ qugh agh lluki _ .
qamagte uq _ .
P ag r ugw aq
P ag r ugw aat _ tamaakut _ pinigh rak egtat _ qawaag t _ sivuqagh mi _ .
uksaagh mi _ aghulaqegk ayug wet _ .

Tag i kaam _ ungipagh aa _ 
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ungazighmii _ aghnagh _ ugw il ek _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh leg k _ .
tagtalmi _ ugw ingigh aamalghii _ .
sighineg mii m _ yugwem _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ ugw ing iill ghii _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
taana _ yuug _ aklung ilnguq _ .
tagtalmi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ enkaam _ sighineg mun _ aglagh te ma kangi _ .
taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ atakaghqagh ita _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ â _ qagavek _ alngunak _ ilate qaghtagh gpenatek _ , _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ amyuutke lleqe i istek _ . _ â
Puugh sim aqeg kek _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ ulape sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ ulape aqe lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ uks uum _ unang uluku _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
uteghnigh lutek _ nagnegh ma lghiik _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ awaligh pig aagh llutek _ nefkagh aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh lutek _ taglagh aqe lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ taglagh uute lghii _ naghughte qugh luku _ kaate aqe lghiik _ ne mun _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ uksulqusigh _ .
ataasigh meng _ unaangu luku _ tungtuqu yagh laatagh ma lghiik _ .
tungtute lutek _ atghagh ma lghiik _ aghneghtu ghllag luku _ .
tungtu kekagh tek _ kaat ute te luki _ nagnegh laatagh ma lghiik _ yuug _ tamaa na _ maligte luku _ esavghagh ma lghiik _ .
ata ita _ awaligh pig aagh tes nanigh aqsaq ek _ .
tawani _ aghtugh ma lghiik _ ayveghagh nghmeng _ .
tamaakut _ ila i _ ayveghagh te luteng _ taglagh uute ma lghiit _ elkek _ ayveghagh naqe ma lukek _ .
qenwat _ whan ikum akanga _ .
ayveghagh qaghte lutek _ iiwenllu _ yataaghqe aqe ak _ uyughagh a _ kelute mun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghaate ma lghii _ puyughpag meng _ .
anengagh ni _ aragh u aghagh a _ , _ â _ I ii _ , _ iike te ainkung _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ ayvegh _ pegte luku _ kelute mun _ kilgaaqu ma lghiik _ .
esne anun _ siku m _ kaate yalghiimek _ nutem _ amel tugh qw aaluni _ .
naqam _ iiwleng _ tea- te te _ â _ g avek _ siku _ saag r uk egtaq _ .
tamaa na _ saag r uk egtaq _ siku _ anuqe mi _ legan _ megh m _ teve yaghqagh a _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ .
uyavagh ghllag lutek _ kaate ma ka ak _ iighwilngugh ghllag _ .
sikuvag nun _ mayugh lutek _ tespamani _ qaye itni _ laag te lutek _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ weni _ tuqusigh naqngu nghite kumtung _ sa naqe i _ ! _ â
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ nuyekligh _ tunag mineng _ saguyagh igh luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uyughagh n _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ uyav aghp aneng _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ â _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ â
uyughagh n _ nagaq utegh ngaaghmi _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite unga _ . _ â
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ meteghllug _ qalghigh laatagh ma lghii _ uyav aghp aneng _ , _ iwernga _ maateghniineng _ qantaghan lluni _ .
uyughagh ni _ aapte laatagh ma kanga _ .
maaten _ uyughagh a _ nagaq un n imalghii _ .
nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ nuyek lii mllu _ alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ alla _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ qantaghan lliigh aghluni _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ nagaqugh nghite aqa _ ! _ â
iwernga _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qakma _ uq eghh mi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q uq quq quq quq quq _ . _ â
anengagh an _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ awii _ .
whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ pi aqe uq _ whanga inagh ma _ taglaate na lunga _ . _ â
qakma _ qalghigh laatagh uq _ meteghllug _ , _ â _ Q uq quq quq quq quq _ ! _ â
anengagh an _ pi a _ , _ â _ A aa _ , _ nanghiiqu naqe i _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ meteghllug _ ? _ â
anengagh an _ akite a _ , _ â _ whaten _ pi aqe uq _ , _ â _ â _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ maalghug u lutek _ .
taawanginaq _ uka _ tume mi _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uusqagh lghii _ â _ . _ â
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ qemqagh u aghagh a _ aan al utek _ .
aane lutek _ uyughagh ni _ nev egh tes qumakanga _ .
N ev egh san _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ kenigh mineng _ saape ma kanga _ .
taagken _ me teghll ugwem _ ghhatagh te ma kek _ igleghte ma lghiit _ quulv aqun _ .
igleghte luteng _ , _ igleghte luteng _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ meghnaali ma lghiit _ .
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ nev egh tesqell aat aamakanga _ .
N ev egh san _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ saape luku _ kenigh mineng _ ghhatagh laatagh ma lghiit _ .
mulu luteng _ nal ugl aat am alghiit _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ me teghll ugwem _ megh nal ivig kun _ naayghagh mi _ alungutellegh leg mi _ uyghag kun _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ taawanginaq _ naayghagh _ mayughvig ite uq _ .
anengagh an _ ila a _ tughneghagh- ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ .
amiklug _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
anengagh an _ aleghqugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ , _ â _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ â
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ â _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ â
anengagh an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ â _ pi aqe aanga _ whanga inagh ma _ may- te na lunga _ . _ â
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ wetku qun _ whanga _ sivuke lunga _ mayugh te linga _ , _ taagken _ elpek _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ amik l ugwem _ sivuke luku _ uyughagh a _ may- te ma kanga _ .
taagken _ uteghte vike ma kanga _ anengagh a _ .
qaygeghte lutek _ ne mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ ne mii it _ ilag aan neqeg s aataqelghiit _ .
qagugh m _ nunalgute m _ alignalghii ngiighhagh a _ ilag aq ay u whaa _ ilagagh te aqe lghii _ .
ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ un _ â _ ga _ tuquma ni lukek _ nag aqum anil uteng _ .
ata at _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ llangaqa _ whaa _ siku m _ ilu anite lunga _ ilagagh unga _ , _ iqlengiqe unga _ weni _ ! _ â
alla _ ilagagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghma _ me teghll ugwem _ pi unga _ ghhatagh te na lunga _ .
aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ukung _ .
igleghte lutung _ aghuliigh lutung _ siku kun _ meghnaali ukung _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe laatagh ukung _ .
aghuliigh ukung _ ingani _ me teghll ugwem _ meghnaali vig ani _ .
weni _ iqlengiqe unga _ . _ â
kaate lutek _ mekelghiigh k _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte lutek _ nagate ma lghiik _ .
qama _ ata ak _ ilagagh aqe uq _ .
ilagagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ â _ taagken _ meghnaali lunga _ amik l ugwem _ mayugh te aanga _ .
qaygeghte yamtung _ tagi unga _ .
kaate yama _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh unga _ . _ â
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ .
nukalpigagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ â _ enta _ qakmavek _ iiyagh mun _ agigte yaghtuqagh tek _ . _ â
nukalpigagh t _ aane yalghiimeng _ paaghqite uq _ .
qayughllak _ mayugh naqe yata _ awatmun _ mekelghiigh k _ ullghitagh ma lghiik _ .
itegh luteng _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .
mekelghiigh k _ nenglu m _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghiik _ .
ata ak _ ellmi neng _ aane luni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
itegh sqe ma kek _ .
quyake ma kegket _ .
ata ita _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ sa lutek _ uugte lugh stek _ ? _ â
â _ taanegken _ ima _ tak aghpag ll elg aat aaftuq _ .
Y ullegh pagkun _ qutenge ukung _ . _ â
ata gkenka _ pi ma kek _ , _ â _ llaaghinaan _ tak aghpag ll elg aat aam aaq _ ! _ â
uyuqligh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ llaaghinaan _ elpek _ iye llgagh u uten _ ! _ â
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ awavagh ghllag nanigh ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh k _ .
qamagte uq _ , _ tefaay _ !
tekeyiighagh _ 
apegh aqe ait _ sivuqagh mi _ tekeyiighagh at _ upenghagh mi _ kingulighpigagh lug teng _ kaate luteng _ sivuligh pig al uteng _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ aghulaqe aqe lghiit _ .
tekeyiighagh at _ ighn ikayug wet _ qen agh millu _ qenaavzeghagh mi llu _ im qagh llegh ani _ .
Qaw aag gaat _ tea- ma kut _ tenge qaghte luteng _ mang tagh meggneng _ ukig aghtagh vike aqe kangit _ yugwet _ naghughte lghiit _ , _ mang tagh meggnun _ pinagh yu kata _ .
ilutuqagh _ Afseng aagh aghhaq
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat _ 
ilangani _ , _ aane ma lghii _ unaangu luku _ afseng aagh aghhaq _ .
Aghn elqusiq _ aviite luni _ uteghnigh uq _ ighivg aam aan _ .
nengyugh ni _ ungipamsug te a _ afseng aagh aghhaam _ , _ â _ whanga _ iknaqe llegh u unga _ , _ pinigh q allgh uf tunga _ , _ nangyiite llegh u unga _ nunivag mi _ . _ â
â _ naten _ liigike ziin _ ? _ â _ nengyugh an _ aapte a _ .
eltughagh n _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ aane lunga _ riigte meng _ igleghte yalghiinga _ kaate unga _ megh mun _ .
yakugh yug gpenanga _ p ugw im ameng _ aghvigh unga _ inglu anun _ . _ â
â _ liisimake aqa _ taana _ megh _ p ugw im egk an _ , _ â _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ â _ quyngigh m _ tuumke a _ .
qantaghaqun _ naghughte ma uq _ quyngigh _ , _ tum angi _ me u ma ut _ . _ â
nengyugh ni _ pi laatagh aa _ afseng aagh aghhaam _ , _ â _ nagaten _ .
esghagh aqa _ naayghagh _ enmis _ naghughte aqa _ . _ â
â _ liisimake aqa _ , _ â _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ â _ taana _ temke u uq _ naayghagh u ni ken _ . _ â
Afseng aagh aghhaq _ wata _ ungipagh uq _ , _ â _ pi yalghiinga _ pillugute aqe uk _ kaynge k _ , _ tagnegh lghii llu _ qategh lghii llu _ .
alinge gpenanga _ peglleghqute agka _ . _ â
nengyugh an _ pi a _ eltughagh ni _ , _ â _ kaynge u ni kegken _ taake uk _ nguuy ngaagh aan ku nguuk _ yaq elleng et aankuk _ . _ â
N allgh ugh qaat aghy atni _ qiya uq _ afseng aagh aghhaq _ .
nengyugh an _ nengl aqluku _ pi a _ , _ â _ iwernga _ elpek _ alinge ma ite ngugh u te n _ , _ ipapik _ iknaqe uten _ , _ pinighqe aghte uten _ . _ â
taawa _ itagnaghi uq _ afseng aagh aghhaq _ .
tefaay _ !
sangameng _ quyngigh t _ Aghul i sigat at
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat _ 
ilangani _ , _ quyngigh m _ nallagh ma kanga _ afsengagh _ .
afsengagh _ peghqin gh umalghii _ .
afsengagh m _ aapte a _ , _ â _ quyngigh _ , _ navek _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ â
quyngigh m _ akite a _ , _ â _ vegaagh meng _ megh meng _ ivagh i qu nga _ . _ â
afsengagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ wiin _ iighaate aghte ltung _ . _ â
â _ A -aa _ , _ â _ angegh aa _ quyngigh m _ .
â _ quneghte naqe unga _ sivuke luten _ elpek _ iigh i _ ivagh lleqe amken _ , _ â _ afsengagh m _ kayagte a _ .
quyngigh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaaghtuqagh mun _ .
taawanginaq _ sighunegh kek _ aliite uk _ .
afsengagh m _ m aatgh aq _ naalke a _ quyngigh _ qayughllak _ sighunegh kek _ esghagh kek _ .
quyngigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ H aa _ , _ el peg ngam _ iigh i _ ivagh naqe amken _ . _ â
quyngigh _ quneghte yan _ afsengagh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaagh mun _ .

atughqagh t _ 
igagh meng _ meghutlug meng _ ( _ O at s- m _ , _ meghaatagh ngllagh yaghqagh m _ qantagh aneng _ )

pumsukegtagh te meng _ , _ savig meng _ mek estaagh aghmeng

C on st ru c ti on _ paper- meng _ suflu kaghqagh meng _ , _ umeg mun _ tugutaghqagh meng _ 
ulima llegh a _ 
1 _ . _ kelgute llegh tun _ , _ kepe i uute kek _ qantaghqwaagh k _ naten _ th re e _ nalighmeng _ four _ in ch es -ngu lukek _ uus qagh tul kek _ .
taagken _ qiigh vigkagh _ negig te yaghqagh _ .
negig llegh a _ egllu kaghqagh m _ angtal kek _ nasiqute lukek _ .
plastic _ umeg _ qaye gkenkun _ nekegte yaghqagh _ .
2 _ . _ qiigh vig _ umeg ngllagh yaghqagh _ egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh gkeneng _ .
U um waagh ng as qell ukek _ umegkagh _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ aange luku _ q iig vig kameng _ uzimun _ iike yaghqagh _ .
kelgute llegh tun _ reghighsaghqagh _ umeg m _ asi ligh negha _ t ri ang le- nguluku _ me lug kegte sqellug kek _ egllu k _ .
Tap e- p esaghq aq _ tugumavigkagh _ umeg mun _ .
egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh k _ asiliqutagh u lukek _ ulima yaghqagh k _ .
egllu ngllagh lghii m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ uus qagh tut kaag kenka _ kepe lukek _ .
3 _ . _ kepe yaghqagh k _ maalghug _ uniistaaghhagh k _ waya k _ nalighmeng _ kuynge m _ ukmangiisigh aneng _ 2 _ in ch es -ngu lukek _ .
igaghqwaagh meng _ qantagh leg t _ way aaghh aat _ t r as h _ b ag - m mun _ qeputagh t _ pinigh ut _ .
peghte lukek _ waya k _ qukagh gkenkun _ Tap e- esaghq ak _ umeg mun _ kepellegh m _ tunge kek _ .
1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ pii z ng aag kenka _ pegh ng allghem _ tung anga _ umeg meng _ .
agughte yaghqagh k _ piiznga lghiik _ agaghte yaghqaa lukek _ egllu m _ esne gkenkun _ qiigh vig m _ nalla akun _ .
4 _ . _ Taam _ qantaghqwaagh m _ uumgagh kun _ angqaperug kegte luku _ teregh yaghqagh _ 1 _ in ch -ngu luku _ d i am ete r _ esne aneng _ tung angakun _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ aw av an tut kaan _ .
taana _ angqaperug kegtagh ngllaghkagh _ pilag yaghqagh _ qukaa kun _ .
taagken _ aveg llegh k _ taake uk _ qukagh gkenkun _ pil aag aatagh yaghq ak _ .
angqaperug kegte aq _ estam aghq esaghq aq _ .
Es tam agh qellgh et _ alla _ qukaa ii kete te _ aveg yaghqagh t _ .
taagken _ enraq _ qule mun _ agughte qugh yaghqagh t _ .
suflug mun _ aates vig kaag ut . Eg llu m _ qaye akun _ umeg te yaghqagh _ .
5 _ . _ imeg yaghqagh _ angqaperug kegte luku _ c on st ru c ti on _ ap pe r _ suflug m _ ukimallegh an _ es leg tal ng atun _ .
S co t c h _ tape- meng _ neve ste luku _ saagaghte na yu kan _ suflu ligh vig mun _ iqug a _ kanaghte yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ suf l ul igh vig melnguut _ qule mun _ agughte qughkagh t _ qaye itgun _ suflug t _ aate stekayugu yagh ut _ .
igaghqwaagh u lghiit _ ukut _ uniistaaghhagh u ut _ suflu k _ nuqnegh naanghite aat _ .
Sulpik _ naapte lghii _ kaviigh meng _ 
T uu g _ â _ ghi m _ apegh llegh a _ 
Sulpik _ quunpeng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ un ku s en iigh meng _ kaviigh niigh meng _ uksugh mi _ .
uspeqe aqe lghii _ neqesghagh ightugh na luni _ temngi _ tamaagun _ nunivag kun _ uyav an teghllag penaan _ ne meng _ .
piyug meng _ kaate yugnagh luki _ sii f q aghnal uni _ .
Sulpigem _ kaviigh meng _ naapteaghaghte lleghqagh ni _ sighimake gpenaan _ sii f qaq aalghii _ .
unaami inagh _ esghagh yaghtugh na luki _ unkuse ni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
ata an _ repall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ legan _ siifte uten _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe yu ikagh i _ ? _ â
Sulpigem _ ata ni _ qingsig qagh luku _ yuk em sug simaghmi _ aghulaqe uq _ .
kaate yaghtugh yamigu _ unkuseniigh vig ni _ eg tug r uug tuq _ .
sivuligh t _ unkuse ni _ qantaghan lliigh aghy am iki _ wata _ egtugnegh a _ suk aagh taa _ .
Kaa saq miniki _ avangite ut _ .
â _ temngi _ egtugte ma unga _ av ang ir rug neng _ ! _ â
Sulpik _ uniigh miqe pigte luni _ pi ma lghii _ .
â _ maaten _ un ku s em a _ tuungligh ghhagh itnun _ kaate yaghtugh kuma _ emta _ eg tug r uug g naanghitunga _ , _ â _ Sulpik _ ellmi neng _ akuzite ma lghii _ .
kaate yaghtugh yami _ ima _ nuq et mikun _ taaggun _ egtugte laatagh uq _ .
elngaatall _ quupkagh ma lghii _ unkuse ni _ esghagh yaq miniki _ kav iighh agh nguq _ taawa _ naapte ma lghii _ .
iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ , _ ungelegte magh mi _ esghagh luku _ naa p t ani _ .
â _ N aten ngam _ tuqute naqe zikun _ kaviigh ii qu na _ , _ â _ Sulpik _ pi uq _ , _ â _ entaqun _ atuute yagh kumkun _ , _ ilagaate yagh kumkun _ aghula magh ma _ aghuliigh nayagh uq _ amqeghte naqe nayagh nghite te aanga _ . _ â
taagken _ atugh uq _ aghula magh mi _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ aghuliigh luni _ esghapag aa _ .
maateqwaaqun _ elngaatall _ ang al kell aataghtuq _ , _ iike te naqlaatagh uq _ .
Sulpik _ en ragh ngam _ aragh magh mi _ talligh gni _ aghul asim aag kenka _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
paninang _ kaviigh _ aghuliigh nghite uq _ angalke uq _ elngaatall _ .
ima _ unaangu luku _ esghagh yaghtugh kaqe kangi _ unkuse ni _ .
Aghn elqusiq _ tuqute naqe m _ tagtale ani _ kaviigh _ , _ elpek nge yalghiimi _ mamlegte yaghtugh aqe a _ .
iighwziig magh mi _ , _ quneghte magh mi _ , _ qesigh kau magh mi _ taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ niinghute vikekagh a _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
qenwat llu _ tuquteqaghtekagh a _ .
esghagh yaghtugh nghite ai _ ila i _ unkuse mi _ qayughllak _ mamlegtekanga _ .
Sulpik _ kaate yan _ kaviigh ligh luni _ ne mun _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aghyugh aat _ muluugh ghllag lghii _ peng _ â _ gin niluku _ .
sangan _ muluugh ta a _ ungipaghsugh aat _ .
Sulpigem _ ungipaate ai _ piyaqli i llegh mineng _ tuqute i naqe m _ kaviigh meng _ .
ata an _ aapte a _ , _ â _ naten mi _ tuqute zigu _ ? _ â
Sulpigem _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ ilagagh unga _ , _ aragh unga _ , _ talligh gka _ nengug te lukek _ aghulate agka _ , _ tukagh unga _ aghuliigh sqellug qu _ ngiigte na luku _ . _ â
ata an _ apeghtugh aa _ kaviigh meng _ tuqute i llegh meng _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ unaghsiighwagh ghhagh _ qaangh anun _ kanaghte luku _ amqeghtekagu _ up- lleghte luku _ tuute naken _ igh saq ghw an _ nalla akun _ .
aga _ sukate pigte luni _ tuqu lleqe uq _ . _ â
