Sulpik _ I il qay ugw igalnguq
Anag ut aam _ apegh llegh a _ 
Qal ugy aam _ ighnegh ghhagh ni _ , _ Sulpik _ , _ ungipamsug te aqe kanga _ ullghitag igh te luku _ qimugsigh meng _ iglegh usi qaq saghn iluteng _ .
apegh aqe kanga llu _ ghhavegh _ , _ pingay uwh aghneng _ qikmigh ke luni _ tevragh kayugu yagh ni luku _ .
Qal ugy aankut _ qikmigh leg t _ ataasigh meng _ , _ qam is lu ul get _ , _ ullghitag leg t _ .
Sulpik _ qimugsigh naqe ma lghii _ t ob o gg an - n ek _ qamite kete lukek _ .
qikmigh eng _ pot _ , _ uyate te igh luku _ qiipragh ut eneng _ s nap - pe tii _ t ob o gg an -mun _ .
igleghte na luni _ aqume qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ yeghlegi _ qikmigh m _ uughqaghte aqe kanga _ .
qenwat llu _ qikmigh _ kilg aan lenguq _ P o t- tem _ esghagh luku _ malighqagh ma kanga _ ugw avek _ aatnegh mun _ .
Sulpik _ taklagh an _ t ob o gg an -kun _ qam umakanga _ .
aantagh ni _ pot _ aghuliigh luni _ aantagh niigh uq _ .
Sulpigem _ qam ugh taagh naqutk aa _ igleghte na luni _ , _ aghtugh aa _ .
Sulpigem _ neghnagh igh lleg lghutagh _ plastic _ b ag -a _ naalkellug qu _ P o t- mun _ naagh ste luku _ maghyaghqugh aa _ ne meggnun _ .
kaat ute qaghte yamigu _ petug waa _ .
itegh naqe yami _ kameraagh ghllag gni _ iteg migh qut ngwaagh aak _ .
saayguraagh mun _ itegh luni _ amig m _ saaghw akun _ nekeve ste lukek _ qamavek _ ilu te mun _ itegh uq _ .
paaghqite ut _ .
Sulpigem _ suf lugw aghhani _ agaghte vig aneng _ ateghte luku _ suf lugw am _ mesiigh aneng _ , _ sangighqugh sigh meng _ , _ igh ll ugh w aat meng _ ketfagh te uq _ .
sivuke luku _ suf lugw aq _ sangigte luku _ taagken _ igh ll uugh wagh aa _ .
ighlluughaate ni _ mingllite naqe luku _ mesiilghutagh ghhagh k _ aagute lukek _ kuuve ma kek _ .
mesiilghutagh ghhagh k _ makete qaghte naqe lukek _ en ragh ngam _ suf lugw ani _ ullegh aghte ma kanga _ .
mesiigh _ kuuvekagh _ nepsag luku _ paper _ c up -ng iighh aghmun _ sivugh luku _ enkaam _ agha lghutagh ghhagh gnun _ mesiilghutagh gnun _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
S uf lugw ani _ mesiighqe ghngaaghmigu _ esghagh ma kanga _ sivuqligh _ nakeghsagh ta a _ naate naagh a _ ayemkagh ma lghii _ ullegh aghte aqngami _ .
nakeghsaate a _ pin - n et ng aftuq _ .
suumqagh u te a _ j ac ke t- mi _ esteg ani _ th re e _ penn y- ng iighhaq _ tuquuqagh _ naalkutaagh ni _ .
taagken _ tuquuqagh meng _ aan e simakanga _ pin- nga _ .
alquutagh _ tab le- leg neng _ tugu luku _ puu a _ usp us aq minigu _ nakeghsaatetu te _ um ut atk aftuq _ .
Ulim gh usi l ghut ak _ ketf am akek _ .
P um s ugw eg nekun _ alquutagh _ amqeghte ste luku _ puu aneng _ h ac k s aw -meng _ kepe te ma lghii _ .
ayemekagh _ nakeghsaate _ uspute aqe luku _ nakeghsaate ngllagh u aghagh a _ suf lugw ani _ .
alquutagh _ kepekagh ni _ walamnaag meng _ neghuvaghsagh luku _ sayug w aat agnun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
I iiw enllu _ ulim gh usi t _ kanaghqutagh ke ai _ angayuqagh kek _ itegh aa tuk _ .
naa an _ kuuve llegh _ mesiigh _ esghagh luku _ ukmangigh ste a _ Sul pig mun _ pi magh an _ , _ â _ sangan qun _ kelenga luten _ pi igate ziin _ ! _ â
ingaghte uute luteng _ Sulpik _ qavagh nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ .
quunpeng _ Qal ugy aam _ ungipam s ugw i _ qimugsigh naqe lleg ni llu _ sumeghtaghagh tke ai _ .
allamenguq _ alquutagh ghhagh m _ p uun g _ kepekagh ni _ nakeghsaate u luku _ naten _ apegh lleghqagh a _ nul qaa v iigh utkaa _ .
Sulpik _ liite yaaghagh uq _ sa u aat _ sumegh mini _ piyaqnagh u i tesugnite ngugh t _ eltugh y alget _ katam _ qimugsigh naqe aqe nga a mi _ .
Sulpigem _ pinighsagh kaqe ghngaaghmigu _ nakeghsaate _ , _ aligh u u ma lghii _ qayughllak _ naa an _ kepe negh ke uq _ alquutagh _ naalke gkunigu _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe kanga _ .
Um yugw agni _ ataasiighte ak _ unaami _ aghtekan _ naa ni _ ungip an naluku _ .
aga _ qavagh inagh magh mi _ .
S U L P I K _ nulugh yagh lghii _ 
tengutkaleg m _ apegh llegh a _ 
aghvaghllug ghllag _ siqi neghllug ghllag _ .
Sulpik _ manughagh meggni _ pilagtugh vig gni _ aqume luni _ sav ighh waagh aq aanguq _ unaghsigh ghhagh _ .
Negh sang ll aghnaq utk aq ugh nguq _ a ta mi _ naangqugh meng _ neghsagh ngllagh llegh atun _ .
savighhe llegh a _ ifkagh aqe lghii _ qenwat _ kam ell uu wh aghq eklu _ savighhe llegh ghllag ughte uk _ .
â _ Al iin es ag gaq _ nulugh yagh yagh kuma _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ nulugh yagh kuma _ iqallugte nayagh nghite zinga _ . _ â
semqatwhali gni _ imeg lukek _ esteg mig lukek _ a ta mi _ nuluusigh a _ ivagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
â _ Sameng am _ iqsag ke naqe zinga _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ saghya lghutagh mi _ naalkute nayagh nghite zinga _ . _ â
ivagh i yalghiimi _ iqsag _ naalke ma kanga _ .
nekegte ma kanga _ nuluusigh kun _ .
â _ una _ iqsag _ aghsaan _ aange pigte a _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ iwerngaqun _ sa meng _ alla _ pi langa _ , _ entaqun _ iqallug ni _ iwernga _ takumsunaghte uq _ . _ â
esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ , _ iggaarqitaagh magh mi _ ighu ngiighhagh kek _ takestaaghhagh k _ , _ es leg m ar ug g aak _ .
nuluusigh _ uyamig a _ piiste ghllag luni _ iqsag a _ piyug llegh akun _ aghulate magh mi _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ miluute ma kanga _ iqsag ni _ .
megh _ qateghllug ghllag _ iqsag a _ awavagh qagh a qun _ tekite ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
qagi vzeghagh ghhagh t _ ayeme aatagh llghite a _ , _ siq ingh emllu _ maatnegh an _ qavaghni sta _ .
â _ qavangsi yagh kuma _ , _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ â _ Iq all ugw et lu wha _ qavaa te aqe nghite aat _ . _ â
qavagh luni _ qavangugh ma lghii _ aang elleghpig aghmeng _ iqallug meng _ esghagh aqeg kem mineng _ .
elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ .
Q ak em kuni _ , _ iqallug naa qung iighhaam _ uzivgagh aqe a _ iqsag a _ .
iqallug ghnaggagh m _ kaate yaghtugh aa _ iqsag ghrugllag a _ , _ papasqitagh llegh an _ megh _ imaghllugte a _ repall _ .
taagken _ nalugute vike ma kanga _ iqsag a _ .
Sulpik _ up um _ taghtugh aghte ma lghii _ .
elpek nge yalghiimi _ nekevgha uq _ , _ saam _ sayug wagh simakanga _ nekefqaghte ste luku _ .
â _ U wh ii y _ ! _ â _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ iqallugte yagh kuma _ , _ saamna _ entaqun _ qavangugh ke kaqe a _ iqallug pag llag uuq _ .
S ayug w aat aatk allgh uugh umalghiik _ .
S ay uv legh aq aghnegh minigu _ , _ iqall ugwem _ sayug wagh teghllag aqegkanga _ .
qenwat _ qagi vzeghagh ghhagh nun _ kaate yaghtugh uq _ .
â _ ugumi _ . . . _ â _ akuzimleghagh uq _ , _ â _ Iq all ugwem _ yeghlegi _ whanga _ entaqun _ negh naqe aanga _ . _ â
iiwenllu _ megh mun _ kaate naqe aqe uq _ , _ esghagh ma kanga _ ilakumtaagh ni _ , _ alleg te aq _ , _ ukig aqe uq _ esnagh mun _ Honda- g mikun _ .
â _ alleg te aagh _ !
sukate pestaagh luten _ tea- ai _ !
kayusiite nga _ ! _ â _ aragh ma kanga _ .
A allg ut aam _ esghagh yaqminigu _ Sulpik _ sayugsigh u lghii _ , _ tazingavek _ sukera vike ma kanga _ .
â _ sukate luten _ ! _ â
Sulpigem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ petug ggu _ una _ ullghitagh gpegun _ . _ â
Ik naq ng iighh atek _ qamagte luki _ sayug siigh umakangat _ , _ petug qaghte ma kangat _ ullghitag nun _ .
ughhe qaghtagh te lutek _ iglegh te simak egket _ ullghitagh k _ .
mayugh te kete luku _ esnagh m _ uusneghwaagh anun _ uteghmun _ esghagh ma kangat _ gginagh a _ megh mi _ kay ull un aagh llagem _ .
â _ iqallug u nghite uq _ ! _ â
A allg ut aam _ pi ma kanga _ Sulpik _ , _ â _ sangaawa tuq _ ? _ â
S ayug yaq meg negu _ , _ ggute leg ghllag u uq _ .
iye ghllag kek _ neghsagh m _ iye atun _ angka lghiik _ elkegkenun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
S all u ugwem _ qaan ghani _ , _ g gut angi _ tawaten _ pilag tu usigh pagem _ g gut ang atun _ ayuqe ut _ .
â _ entaqun _ taglaate fqaan _ pi yagh kumtegnegu _ . _ â
A allg ut aam _ pi ma kanga _ Sulpik _ , _ â _ neqniite sug ni te pigte uq _ . _ â
Sulpigem _ taawa _ kayutagh mi _ neqnigh a _ sumegh ke nghite kanga _ .
taku yu nghite u aqe a _ .
aleghquute ma lukek _ , _ sall u ugwem _ aglu gni _ tagh p agh teghllag lukek _ umeg aghte ma kek _ .
U s kugh wat _ sakeqe ma lghiit _ .
upugh luni _ A allg ut aam _ iglegh agh tes lukek _ ullghitagh k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ qe tegh agh tev z iim alghiik _ .
naagh llegh u aghte pagte yamek _ uteghmun _ esghagh yaq meg negu _ , _ sall uuk _ aga _ naghullgute aqe uq _ ang tugh h aa stun _ niinghute lghii stun _ .
megh kun _ tekite yalghiimi _ siqfallag u uute ghllag ma lghii _ .
â _ seghleghhalek _ ! _ â
alleg te aq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ ima _ anag iigh pung _ . _ â

mekiitlegte ghllag ma yagh lghii _ !
S uf lugw amun _ Qan t angll aqlu _ Ak m ag t angll aq
iyaa- ka _ 
atughqagh t _ 
igagh meng _ 
Tap ghagh p aw aaghmeng
tape- meng _ 
S uf lugw amun _ qantagh ngllagh llegh _ 
liighqe te aagh _ nekegte luku _ igagh kun _ teregh nakesi _ uzimun _ .
negikragh luku _ terellegh kun _ qukaa kun _ peghhe nakesi _ liighqe te aagh _ terellegh ngeltagh tgun _ .
tasig ligh vigkagh t _ uki qugh luki _ tap e- pen nakesi _ qaye a _ qantagh m llu _ uumgagh nun llu _ q illgh ut fig kaa _ .
umeg a _ tap ghagh p aw aaligh nakesi _ .
Ak m ag t angll aq
liighqe te aagh _ nekegte luku _ igagh kun _ , _ teregh nakesi _ uzimun _ .
negikragh luku _ terellegh kun _ peghhe nakesi _ liighqe te aagh _ ter ell eg el t atgun _ .
negikragh tekek _ maalghug _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ â _ b y _ 1 _ â _ ig aa meng _ tasig ligh vigkagh k _ .
Tap ghagh p aw aaghmeng _ kepe te lghaaten _ tasigkagh meng llu _ umeg mun llu _ q illgh utu sighqameng _ .
Tap e- pen nakesi _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag _ 
Me ke ngam _ apegh llegh a _ 
ungipaghagh ni _ imanagh i _ , _ mayeraaghpag ghllag nguq _ taana _ aange pigte lghii _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ mangteghagh leg ghllag _ nenglu leg ghllag _ .
Tallim ag yag et _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ inghu yagh ma lghiit _ .
inghu ma luki _ mayeraaghpag ghllag m _ taku ma kangi _ .
qimag te ma yagh lghiit _ malighqagh luki _ kaate luki _ ratamiiragh gminun _ kan aghqu simakangi _ .
paye kek _ tap ghaghmeng _ qilleghte lukek _ uyamig lukek _ aga _ navek _ aghulaqe uq _ .
kii _ , _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ alingruugh te ma lghiit _ .
ataasigh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ navek _ pi naqe inkut _ ? _ â
Pii llgh aghqun _ ataasigh _ qineghte yalghiimi _ unaghsigh _ napaqagh ghllag _ inga _ taku aqe a _ .
uya mini _ kaat ute te luku _ ateghte luku _ taana _ napaqagh ghllag _ aleghquma kanga _ , _ â _ Un naa q ek angaa _ , _ un naa q ek angaa _ uun naa qe pil ugw at gi _ ! _ â
napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ma lghii _ qukagh mikun _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ taaggun _ ratamiiragh gni _ napaqagh m _ iq ugw akun _ asighte te ma kek _ ayug w illuku _ .
apeghiigh luni _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ Un naa q ek angaa _ , _ un naa q ek angaa _ uun naa qe pil ugw at gi _ ! _ â
kii _ , _ tak laagh agh salghiimi _ napaqagh ghllag _ pikaa rug llaak _ quulv aghp ani _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag _ aglagh luni _ ne minun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
kii _ , _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ alingruugh te ghllag t _ qaprag qagh gpenateng _ ifkagh na yukagh meng _ .
qiya aghte te ngeltagh te ghllag t _ qiya mreghagh te ghllag t _ .
elngaatall _ taw aani _ qen w annguq _ iye it _ puuve uute ghllag ut _ qiyaagh w aghllagem _ al iing em _ ifkagh na yukagh meng _ .
Taw aaten _ qiy aam aluki _ uk im allgh aghqun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ ataasigh _ sama nguq _ afsengagh ghhagh _ asi itni _ naghughte naqe aqe uq _ .
taagavek _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ afsengagh ghhagh _ aag y uuq _ llaaghan _ yuwh aay eng alghii ten _ ileme teqaghti kut _ . _ â
afsengagh ghhagh m _ qule mun _ esgh am akanga _ , _ â _ Il em ute qaghh naanghi tam sii _ aamta _ whaa _ negh n iim sug um aluta _ milugh pag aatagh aqagh pesi kut _ tuqutagh qagh zikut _ ! _ â
aga _ naghughte uq _ .
kingu aneng _ legan _ qiya aghte te tete laatagh ut _ .
tawaten _ pi ma luki _ kaviigh ghhagh _ enraq _ uka _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte naqe yan _ ataasigh m _ pilaat am akanga _ , _ â _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aag y uuq _ llaaghan _ yuwh aay eng alghii ten _ ileme teqaghti kut _ . _ â
uka _ tagi i ma lghii _ .
legan _ quya uute ma lghiit _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh t _ ukig gnaq egkangi _ .
â _ naten qun _ il em ull amsi _ pik ar ugllak _ ? _ â
kaviigh m _ qule mun _ aapte ma kanga _ .
â _ mayeraaghpag _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ legan _ , _ â _ Un naa q ek angaa _ , _ un naa q ek angaa _ uun naa qe pil ugw at gi _ ! _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ aatakqun _ napaqagh _ aleghqugh yaqminigu _ , _ â _ Un naa q ek angaa _ , _ un naa q ek angaa _ uun naa qe pil ugw at gi _ ! _ â
sunami _ napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ghllag naagh a _ .
pakreg aghte yan _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ taana _ tapghagh a _ iq lug saqminigu _ , _ iq lug saqminigu _ qenwat _ il em taa _ .
Il em sagu _ aanleghaate ma lghiit _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ estamat _ .
ataasigh _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tegh tugh h neghmeng _ mataawi te aat _ qiy am _ qav angh um ill agh qelluku _ sama _ tegh ghhagh ani _ ratamiiragh m _ .
â _ aa _ , _ tawan ll i _ qavagh li _ ! _ â _ ataasigh m _ qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ ila ni _ .
aghnaghaghhagh t _ taakut _ un in naq ngaam egteggu _ ingh uk aghh aat eng _ katag luki _ ratamiiragh gnun _ vegaagh ghllag meng _ imigh lukek _ tawan niluteng _ pisqell uteng _ qilleghte ma kegket _ .
petug lukek _ napaqagh kun _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ aatak _ aragh ut _ , _ â _ Un naa q ek angaa _ , _ un naa q ek angaa _ uun naa qe pil ugw it gi _ ! _ â
napaqagh ghllag _ tak laagh agh teghllag yalghiimi _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pika _ ellngin aghhaghmi _ qavagh _ .
qimagugh te luteng _ uyav aghp anun _ elngaatall _ iiskughte ma kangat _ mayeraaghpag _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe ma kangi _ ulaagh ghllag ni _ tugumiiqe luku _ , _ â _ naa ke i _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe anka _ . _ â
mayeraaghpag m _ taku luki _ kaate luki _ napaqagh ghllag _ aleghqugh laatagh aa _ , _ â _ Un naa q ek angaa _ , _ un naa q ek angaa _ uun naa qe pil ugw it gi _ ! _ â
napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ghllag yan _ ulaagh mineng _ pil agagh saq min ikek _ ratamiiragh k _ vegaagh _ pagunghagh _ ifkagh qu uute ma lghii _ .
aviite yata _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ qefliqe luni _ wata _ pil agagh tagh yaq min ikek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ iq elq wa _ kepe qaghte ma kanga _ .
â _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ !
K umak igh tek aghnagh aghpenga _ , _ kum ak igh tek aghnagh aghpenga _ .
enta _ kumakigh naqe amken _ , _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ qiya magh mi _ pi ma kanga _ .
â _ huk _ aa-a _ , _ â _ mayeraaghpag _ kaag k asagh sag g aghneng _ .
ingaghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ kumakigh aa _ .
afsengagh _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh _ , _ melngu _ , _ kingu k _ , _ sa u a _ kumag ke a _ .
Legannguq _ tuqute aqe ai _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag _ qavagh uq _ nun ak im _ .
qavagh yan _ iye kek _ p aar gh ul iigh aak _ inglugtun _ .
taagken _ mayeraaghpag _ qavagh luni _ , _ qavagh luni _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi magh an _ tegh tugh simakanga _ , _ â _ uyuq _ pikavek _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â
mayeraaghpag _ esghagh naqe yalghiimi _ aghtugh uq _ .
â _ Sang aam ek _ iye gka _ sa uk _ . _ â
â _ saa _ , _ qavagh gpeni wha _ nevuute ma nghite ak _ , _ â _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ taslugh naqe amken _ pikavek _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ â
amenam _ tas l umakanga _ maye raagh ghllag _ .
kaat ute te luku _ kiiw gnun _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ uuhuk _ megh i _ , _ megh i _ ! _ â
mayeraaghpag _ megh yalghiimi _ , _ megh yalghiimi _ , _ megh yalghiimi _ kiiw k _ qamag aghll ukek _ .
kii _ , _ nekeve naqe yalghiimi _ aqsa ghllag a _ meghllag meng _ imigh luni _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ pikavek _ yeqay _ us negh waaghmun _ aghula yagh a _ atugh u lleqe amken _ taslugh naqe amken _ . _ â
iye kek nguq _ natengiighhaq _ qel p ereg aaq estagh aqef tuk _ .
T as l umakanga _ tespikavek _ .
kaat ute te luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ U h uk _ , _ aghula _ ! _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ atughtu a _ elngaatall _ .
qetgegh kau magh mi _ yaagpagte yagh uq _ aqsa a _ qu p agh teghllag tuq _ .
piyaqminigu _ tuqu ngwaagh luni _ maye raagh ghllag _ .
aqsa aneng _ aanleghaate uq _ qayugh te aq _ , _ sagnegh _ , _ savig _ , _ ulaagh _ , _ sa u a _ .
ila i _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh at _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ kayagte ma kangi _ ellngit llu _ tugul aa tesqelluki _ .
quya uute magh meng _ atghaghtu te ma lghiit _ .
tefaay _ !
yaywaali _ nulightugh lghii _ nanugh meng _ 
Ap ang al uum _ apegh llegh a _ 
kiyang _ uglagh u pestaagh lghii m _ taz ing ke rugllak _ imagh a _ nanugh t _ yugu yagh na iqe kangit _ .
taana _ nagate kaqe a _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ , _ nanugh t _ yugte yug nightu ta i _ yugw estun _ nangaghnegh i _ ayuqe ta i _ .
elngaatall _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ , _ pinigh lghii _ sa kun _ all aaghh in aghqun _ .
ilughagh ghhagh a _ yay w aling iighhaq _ yug ugh tek est aq _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ne ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ .
aflengake u kanga _ ilugh w aghhani _ pinitungwaaq _ iwerngaqun _ am yugh waaghem _ saaghw akun _ agh saagh mi kaat k aqegkanga _ .
enkaam _ uksaagh mi _ siku k _ tag ingh egkeni _ yataaghqe te ghllag aqe lghii _ yuug _ unangniighusighqagh meggneng _ .
uunghagh _ , _ uyiigh _ apeghiighsagh aqe kangat _ qayughllak _ siku k _ kaate kayek _ piyaa uute yaghqau aqe lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh _ sumeghtagh aq ay uug lleghhii _ yugughte lghii _ .
ellngagh a llu _ uunghagh ghhagh meng _ ulimasigh u ma lghii _ .
luuraq _ maligte te luni _ nengigh yaghqaaghte na luni _ kayute ughte na luni _ tawavek _ nengllugute minun _ .
leganqun _ yugwem _ ilughagh ni _ esghagh aa _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ qinuyug a _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ ilughagh ka _ uunghagh ngllagh aqe uq _ sa u a ngam _ aqsaqugh u naqe a _ , _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe ukut _ whaa _ . _ â
elngaatall _ taan as t aghhiinaq _ qaangh an _ ima qaa _ .
qenwat _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ kitumun _ uun ghii t angll iisqell unga _ pi zinga _ , _ naangilngugh nge a _ nulighh ite ngugh nge a _ nayag ite ngugh nge a _ wetku qun _ nuliigh gpek _ uunghiitagh ngllagh nakanganga _ . _ â
kii _ , _ yuug _ wata _ saghiighqe uq _ , _ qinuyug a _ ilugh w ani _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
qenwat _ whan iku yan _ meghnugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ kagtaghte ma lghii _ aane ma lghii _ .
tespikani nguq _ kelutagh nge i te ni _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ ellngin aghhaat _ .
tespikegkut _ uqiigh ghhagh itnun _ uq itagh yaghtu malghii _ .
iiwen _ whaa _ kaate aqe uq _ up- qite vigkagh minun _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ mengqughte te ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ .
Esghagh agh saq miniki _ amigh k _ qelpegh aqe uq _ aghnagh _ whaa _ qineghte uq _ , _ elngaatall _ ineqsunagh ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ sangavek _ nanglleg n aghq e sin _ sa qu ziin _ aqlagha ghllag mi _ ne mete kestagh ghngaaghpek _ ? _ â
mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ , _ â _ elngaatall _ ilughagh ma _ qinuyugte aanga _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
wasiwa _ kitum _ uunghiitagh ngllagh lleqe aanga _ . _ â
â _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ utaqa i yagh a _ uunghiitagh ngllagh naqe amken _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ne u uq _ .
taawa nguq _ kelut angani _ nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ esghagh aa _ .
elngaatall _ aghnagh m _ pugnegh iigh te a _ sa meng _ akughtu te a _ .
Aku tun neqeg sagh luku _ apeghiigh yaq miniki _ sagnegh ghllag k llu _ sag n es qu veg aghh aak lu _ iigge m _ imagh ghhagh kek _ imightugh ma kangi _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ atghagh a _ .
Q in u yug ll ataq angaten _ nungyaghagh gneng _ qiigh negh ke i i nagh luten _ aragh ghhaaten _ whaten _ â _ U un ghii tamaan g _ , _ uun ghi tameng _ . _ â
tuune lleqe amken _ .
taake uk _ angenegh ghllag kek _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ lli nakegken _ , _ tea- ma anun _ negh sqellug kek _ .
taake uk _ sag n es qu veg aghhaak _ ilughagh gpenun _ tuun ak egken _ .
whaten _ pi naken _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ taawa _ uun ghi tagh taa _ elngaatall _ . _ â
taaqe gkatki _ enkaangam _ aane te naketen _ tugu naagh anka _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
legan _ itegh uq _ ilughagh n _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ uun ghi taghtugh naq u kutlu _ entaqun _ keleg yaghtu ma a _ uun ghit angllagh tek aghq ani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ kitumun _ uun ghii t angll iisqell unga _ pi zinga _ , _ ava ite ngugh nge a _ sa ite ngugh nge a _ ? _ â
Yugwem _ tawan lenguut _ pi a _ , _ â _ seghleghhalek _ maa kugh si _ negh laagh pen aasi _ kepsugh yaghagh lleqe usi _ uunghagh ite aq _ seghlegh ghllag u naqe uq _ ighivg aghmi _ whani _ . _ â
qinuyugte lqinagh yatni _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh ni _ tawavek _ pi a _ , _ â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ sullevneghhaleg _ ! _ â
mekelghiigh _ taawavek _ piig w aghluni _ nuug ke i nagh luni _ nungyaghagh gneng _ aragh uq _ , _ â _ U un ghii tamaan g _ , _ uunghiitagh meng _ . _ â
whaa _ iiwen _ aghnagh _ .
sagnegh t _ tuune ai _ .
mekelghiigh m _ itghute ai _ .
kii _ , _ sagnegh ghnaggagh k _ nategh m _ qukagh kun _ lli uk _ .
â _ esnevagh lusi _ taake uk _ neghe tekek _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ tamaakut _ kayagte ai _ .
taake uk _ sag n es qu veg aghhaak _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh minun _ aglagh te ak _ , _ â _ ang _ , _ ukuk _ elpek _ neghe kek _ .
elngaatall _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ sa aqe ziin _ . _ â
ilughagh n _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ â _ kii _ , _ ugumi ke pigte ma zinga _ mek el engest ay uwh aak _ ukuk _ kepe yutekaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh k _ tagivagh agken _ . _ â
â _ legan _ qalleg gpenang _ negh i _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ .
esnevagh uute luni _ negh un neqeg saa tut _ .
taana _ ilughagh a _ sag n es qu veg aghhaag neng _ tugu tete luni _ negh lukek _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe lukek _ .
amawha _ tugu tete luni _ negh luni _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe aqe kek _ .
M ataa w it ngwaagh aak _ naang te qaghh neghmeng _ .
iwerngaqun _ kepsugh ghllag ghngaaghmi _ negh yagh aak _ .
aghtugh yamikek _ , _ â _ Ii- h i- h i- h i- h ii _ , _ kepsugh unga _ .
taawa _ uun ghii taghtugh qagh pe nga _ , _ il uu y _ . _ â
â _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe aqe luten _ sa aqe ziin _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ aghsaghte ma kanga _ .
â _ yeghlegi llu _ weni _ kepe yu ma unga _ , _ â _ Yugwem _ sagnegh squghhagh k _ tuun um aag kenka _ pi a _ .
mekelghiigh m _ tugu lukek _ qamagte luku _ imagh a _ kanagh a _ qanegh minun _ .
aane te luki _ sagnegh t _ itegh uq _ .
iiwen _ ingaghte aqe uq _ mekelghiigh _ ilughagh n _ taku a _ .
kii _ , _ enraq _ qinuyug a _ qem qagh waagh aa _ asute na lutek _ .
â _ liisimake kevnga _ nulighh ite ngugh u nga _ , _ naten _ pi na luten _ pi ziin _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ .
â _ kitum i _ uunghiitagh ngllagh aten _ ?
nulighh ite yagh kuvek _ avangite nayagh uten _ .
whaa _ nuliigh lgu uten _ esghaghhu _ , _ â _ ilughagh n _ pi a _ .
Qav agh tes neghit ngwaagh aa _ mekelghiigh _ ilugh w aan _ .
qenwat _ qavagh ste naqe nghite te yatni _ aane luni _ tespikavek _ taglagh laatagh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh aghte te laatagh aa _ .
â _ sa laatagh aten _ ? _ â _ aghnagh m _ aapte a _ .
â _ elngaatall _ qinuyugte aanga _ qavagh ste nghite aanga _ ilughagh ma _ as un aluni _ , _ asute na lutung _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ .
â _ legan _ atghagh luten _ whavek _ kayagte gu _ tagligh sqe gu _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ kayagte a _ .
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
itegh yan _ ilugh w aan _ pi laatagh aa _ .
â _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ kii _ sullevneghhaleg _ .
enta _ pikavek _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh a _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ tagligh sqe a _ .
â _ ii _ , _ nutem qun _ peq liq ut aaq aghpenga _ pi leg ghllag u ghngaaghpek _ , _ â _ yugwem _ pi a _ .
pilugug ragkiigh luni _ aga _ tagl in aamaghmi _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh te a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ aghnagh _ pi nigh _ kaki iqe uq _ taawa _ .
Yugwem _ ing aghh un naqutk es aq minigu _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ piiq sagh anguq _ , _ â _ Q in u yug tagh pe nga _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ , _ ingaghte luten _ qavagh a _ .
Ing agh fik naanghit ngwaagh amken _ . _ â
ii _ , _ yugwem _ qinuyug a _ .
pi laatagh aa _ aghnagh m _ , _ â _ Q in u yug tagh pe nga _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ naqam allameng _ ugw ing ighh aqa _ kaana _ nuliigh pen is aq an _ ingaghte vike nayagh amken _ .
maaten _ kana _ aav ng aaq _ ne mini tuq _ , _ iqite nga uq _ . _ â
â _ temngi _ pi uten _ aleghqugh ghllag luku _ nuligh qa _ taglagh unga _ .
qavigh sqellug kek _ pi kaqe aqa _ , _ â _ yugwem _ pi a _ .
â _ tagi aghten qun _ kelgu vik agh llak en _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
nanilghagh gni _ mak reg saqminigu _ reghigh uq _ kanavek _ nenglu mun _ .

nuliigh ni llu _ esghagh aa _ ellngin aaftuq _ .
â _ enta _ sa u lukek _ pi zikek _ allakagh mete uk _ test-kagh nkuk _ .
whangkutung _ allakagh mete ukung _ .
ingaghte ltung _ , _ â _ yugwem _ sagiqe te a _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh _ talligh akun _ tangyegh akun _ tugu luku _ sayug siigh luku _ lliigh aa _ yugwem _ .
â _ kii _ , _ yuug _ una _ qinu na pigte ma a _ , _ â _ aghnagh _ pi uq _ .
nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ aghnagh m _ aate luku _ yuug _ ugw iighh aa _ , _ tuqute a _ .
taagken _ yugusigh a _ mingllite luku _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ tawan tuq _ .
taagken _ unaami _ qenwat _ nighugte a _ .
ilughagh ni _ itegh yaghqagh _ mekelghiigh m _ qelanqe a _ .
mulu inagh yan _ qenwat _ aane luni _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh uq _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ whaa _ amig m _ qelpegh te a _ .
â _ naagu _ ilughagh ghrug ka _ pengeg luku _ qenwat _ esghagh yaghtugh aqe aqa _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ aghnagh _ aapte a _ .
â _ esgha _ taana ta _ ilughagh n _ , _ â _ aghnagh m _ keleg u vike a _ , _ â _ ilughagh ke ken _ legan _ qivghuke yu kuvgu _ qivghuke yaghqaqe ken _ .
qinuyugte yanga _ taawa _ qin uku um aaqa _ .
whanga _ yugu nghite unga _ esgha _ taana _ amiiragh ka _ .
aygugh lleqe unga _ ne mnun _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh kayek _ , _ maani _ kii kaat kag unga _ .
saama _ nanglleg ke luten llu _ aghuliigh vike amken _ whani _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ maligte naqe amken _ kitum qun _ aflengake linga _ .
taawa _ qinuyugte aqe naagh aatnga _ maa nte kuma _ .
elngaatall _ nangllek istek amken _ elpek _ . _ â
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ â _ maligte naqngu kuvnga _ sa meng _ sanqut aaghh aghmeng _ gu un niigh ukagh aghmeng _ avelghagh gpenang _ kelqe lghaaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ atghagh luni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
amennguq _ mekelghiigh _ ughluvegh llgagh u uq _ .
ughluvegh ni _ , _ saningughtagh ni _ tugu luki _ taglagh uq _ .
Taam _ aghnagh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ agh iq ngwaagh aa _ qayughllak _ atuqe naqe kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ aa saqminigu _ amiiragh _ leganqun _ nanugh ghllag u uq _ .
taawa _ unugmi _ aane lutek _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe uk _ .
esnevagh yamek _ mekelghiigh _ nanugh m _ sigute gmi _ akule gkenkun _ aqume ste luku _ p ugw im utaa _ .
P ugw im ut aaq egkanga _ , _ p ugw im ut aaq egkanga _ siku mun _ kaate negh megteni _ uugte lutek _ piyug meng _ lliigh aqe lghiik _ .
igatagh negh megteni _ nanugh ghllag _ unange ni nghmini _ neghsagh meng _ unak eng aqelghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ mekelghiigh _ neghe ste luku _ aminaqekagh i _ ellnga n _ qamagte luki _ negh aqe kangi _ .
Taw aaten _ kiyaghtekagh k _ .
tagtalmi _ si kug nit ku llaagh llag lutek _ qaallgute a _ nanugh m _ , _ â _ amenam _ taawa _ meghnugh unga _ .
Megh n ut amken _ , _ tuqlugh i naqe unga _ kug w emneng _ paay gh esqell u tung _ .
imani _ aliigh kata _ ku u g _ â _ gh enka _ tallugh yug yaqunang _ kakave yaqunang _ .
payegh naketen _ gginagh it _ quk as aleg luki _ esgh am ak luki _ sa naanghite aaten _ taw aaten _ pi kuvek _ . _ â
nanugh m _ taawa _ vuuslegh t _ uqiigh at _ anigu a _ iigge a _ .
S ug r ugw egni _ kanaghte lukek _ taw aa vek _ kii _ ugw in ighllag aatagh luni _ sivugte luni _ igleghte uk _ .
Taz ing an iq aaghaq _ taw aa teng waaq _ alla _ pi laatagh uq _ .
pingayut ii ta ani _ taw aaten _ pi llghem _ kii _ sivungagh t _ aga _ pengetaagte ghllag aa _ qaprag te ghllag _ aliighte yu gnite uq _ .
â _ taakwa _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ , _ kug w egh ma _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ .
aatak _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ pi naqe lghaaten _ , _ â _ nanugh m _ pi a _ .
tughwaagh yalghiimi _ kii _ , _ nan ul ghutegh llaak _ pangaleg te aqe uq _ .
legan _ mekelghiigh _ taagken _ nanugh m _ saaghw aneng _ aqfaasnaq _ pi sqe llegh atun _ paayghi a _ sumeghtagh am aghmi _ , _ â _ siingenllu _ tuqu kau lghiinga _ neghigh pigte luku _ . _ â
kii _ , _ kaat ute te luteng _ mekelghiigh _ quyak saq megteggu _ nanugh t _ nagun _ ipa _ sugrug mig aqe aghte litgu _ alunge aghte aqe luku _ .
nayag eng llu _ taana _ kaate luku _ quy aa kaat _ .
mekelghiigh _ elngaatall _ nanugh m _ qaye inagh akun _ aygugh uq _ .
ne meggnun _ kaat ute aat _ .
nanugh lghute ghllag nguq _ tamaa _ .
ataasigh igh ngugh _ taawa _ aange pigte uq _ .
itghute aat _ ne meggnun _ mekelghiigh _ .
atkug teng _ m at aghqugh yaq megteki _ yugughte uute ut _ .
uglaghyagagh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
Ugw atang an ite f tughnguq _ taawani _ nanevgagh ghllag _ sa na nigh ke aq _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh _ , _ â _ Ugw ik aghq algu nga _ qaga _ .
nagaqugh unga _ ugw ik aghq am anguq _ aqelqaghniigh naqe aaten _ , _ tuqute naqe aaten _ nuliighqagh ni _ wayagh naqe ni luku _ .
whaa _ un am inginaq _ legan _ keleg naqe aaten _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ , _ â _ qayughllak qun _ pi langa _ .
elpek _ nangllek es teng iighh aqa _ maligtekaqe kemken _ tuquma te kete na luten _ .
legan _ yugusigh ka _ pegte luku _ ayuqe aqa _ . _ â
unaami _ qakma _ mayugh ai _ iiyagh itnun _ .
K elg iyagh tu m _ pi a _ , _ â _ naagu _ mekelghiigh _ tesqamna _ aqelqagh i _ nuliigh qiigh naq egk aan nguq _ keleg yaghtigh sqe a _ aglagh li nguq _ aaghqutaate naqe a _ .
â _ aa-a _ , _ aglagh naqe unga nguq _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh aa _ .
mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ ugw a teg nil nguum _ qaallgute a _ , _ â _ kameg gka _ ukuk _ aate kek _ qiighnagh ite ngugh k _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ esghagh yaq min ikek _ ii _ , _ nanugh m _ ighu ghllag i _ itegaghtu magh meng _ .
â _ N aka _ whatete ghngaaghma _ pi naqe unga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ pi magh an _ aane uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ malig llegh aat aat _ aghnagh m _ kug w elghut angan _ .
ii _ , _ yug ghllag u uq _ qerngugh taagh vik _ kangllu te ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh ghnaggagh _ tallu i kek _ naflugh mun _ kenle ke lukek _ melqiite ghllag ke ak _ .
Q ugh sat kugh naag g aaftuq _ utegh p aar k it aghaqeftuq _ .
El qun ev rag llagek _ taawa _ saaghw ani _ .
mekelghiigh _ ellnga _ legan _ wh ategh llug waagh ulghii _ qughsatku ghllag _ kaate yaghtugh luku _ aghuliigh uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ qughsatku ghllag m _ pi a _ , _ â _ tamaa ke raaghinagh _ nuliighqagh ka _ wayagh ste nghmeng _ pi lunga _ tagsiqligh amken _ .
taawa _ nan ghi qagh luki _ wiin _ aghnaa igh naqe ait _ .
enankin _ nanghiigh te aghte lutung _ entaqun _ itagnagh yaghqaa lghiikung _ .
kayaalqe gkuvnga _ taawa _ aghnaa igh lleqe kevnga _ .
aamtaam _ whanga _ kayaalqe gkumken _ paninang _ whanga _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ . _ â
qughsatku m _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ â _ kelenga te i unga _ aangqagh ghhagh mneng _ whaken _ milugh naqe amken _ . _ â
taagavek _ aglagh qagh luni _ miluyagaghpaghqu yalghiimi _ uka _ aqf ay ngwaagh yalghiimi _ .
kaate lukek _ elqunevraag k _ talligh mineng _ p a teg yaq min ikek _ uka _ leveklugtu te _ mekelghiigh mun _ tagi stek _ .
â _ naten qun _ pi langa _ siingenllu _ kayaalqesaghqagh ke kanganga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ .
Taakw an taagh agh lukek _ p aas qam aag kenka _ itegagh mineng _ ak iq agh yaq min ikek _ elqunevraag k _ pel im n neqeg sagh lukek _ kagim tengngwaagh lukek _ .
legan _ kagimleghwaagh ghhagh u lutek _ ifkagh uk _ .
kii _ , _ aga nguq _ iis qam su whang un ani _ aglagh uq _ ne minun _ mangteghagh minun _ qughsatku ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ kayaal qen niluku _ qughsatku ghllag _ mekelghiigh mun _ elngaatall _ esghapag y aq _ aragh te ghllag uq _ .
aghnagh m _ kug w elgh utangi _ ne meggnun _ aglagh ut _ mekelghiigh llu _ taana _ .
itegh yata _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ taaw um _ aapte ai _ , _ â _ Qayugh w am _ nateghtu ta k _ ? _ â
â _ aangqagh igh ma a _ mekelghiigh m _ umiileg ut _ tazinga _ .
angegh kakek _ kagimte ma uk _ , _ â _ naligh ita _ kiimsigh aat _ .
â _ taawa _ yuwh aat _ tea- ma kut _ m aal ghu wh aghneng _ ighu llgagh at _ , _ inglu u nghite ut _ . _ â
taakwna nguq _ legan _ me ke a _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ , _ â _ inglu u nghite ut _ ! _ â
unaami _ qakma _ keleg laatagh aat _ mekelghiigh _ , _ â _ Y uwh agh nguq _ esqamna _ aqelqagh ghhagh i _ aglagh li _ aghniigh naq egk aan nguq _ este aghagh te naqe a _ . _ â
mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ â _ ahaa _ , _ aglagh naqe unga _ .
natete naqlaatagh a _ este aghagh vig _ . _ â
nanevgagh m _ ungipaate a _ , _ â _ este aghagh te naqe aaten _ megh mun _ ayuqe lghii mi _ pennagh mi _ .
Tes aam a _ megh m _ teghh an itut _ pi nga yu t _ uygh aag et _ .
ataasigh _ teghig lugw estun _ angka uq _ , _ ila a _ qet g agh waagh testun _ , _ enkaam _ pi nga yu aat _ angtaagh ghllag stun _ .
Taz ingu m _ umiileg m _ taana _ qukaqligh _ megh meng _ aliigh ste aghte aqe a _ pal aghhaghmeng _ ayagaghte nghminigu _ tegh ghhagh aneng _ samaken _ . _ â
nanevgagh _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ â _ nukalpigagh u lunga _ whanga inagh ma _ qukaqligh _ taana _ weni _ ghh atagh tegh pag aqaqa _ megh eng _ .
aatak _ naten _ pi naqe lghaaten _ .
ayapghaatagh gka _ ukuk _ aate kek _ . _ â
mekelghiigh _ pi uq _ , _ â _ yeghlegi llu _ taw aate tegh ngaaghma _ alla _ pi naqe unga _ . _ â
taawa _ aglagh laatagh uq _ .
pennagh m _ qag ugh r ugw ani _ utegh p aar k it aghaqeftuq _ qughsatku ghnaggagh _ .
Taw aa teng waaq _ pi laatagh aa _ qughsatku m _ , _ â _ kayaalqe gkuvnga _ aghnaa igh lleqe kevnga _ , _ aamtaam _ whanga _ kayaalqe gkumken _ pan ineng _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ .
esghapag nga _ tawaten _ pisqell uten _ magh yaghq unnaq amken _ . _ â
qughsatku _ pennagh neng _ aga _ estu uq _ megh mun _ .
legan _ aga _ naagu _ talugh qagh uq _ .
esghapag te ghllag m _ esghagh aat _ qet g agh testun _ uyghag _ angka lghii _ aw ligh qagh pigesnagh luni _ aga _ kaleve uq _ .
taawa _ nuug luni _ uugg tuq _ .
â _ H aa _ , _ el peg ngam _ , _ â _ kayagte a _ mekelghiigh _ .
â _ giniwan _ whanga _ pi naagh nghite ngugh nge a _ tawaten _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ .
iwerngaqun _ asighte luni _ qepe qaghtugh luni _ estu uq _ .
aghveqe te m _ angtale aneng _ samavek _ teghh anun _ kaate qaghte yalghiimi _ taawa _ uyghag t _ pi nga yu t _ .
taana _ maaten _ aligh kaghtekagh a _ qughsatku m _ kef kagh yaqminigu _ imani _ uqegh ngestagh ghhagh u uq _ .
taana _ angenegh ghllag at _ angtaagh ghllag stun _ angka lghii _ aatakqun _ ayag agh saqminigu _ qule mun _ megh meng _ ghh atagh teghllag aa _ .
aghnagh m _ ku u g _ â _ ghw ita _ ukig aghte vike luku _ mayu utng in am aan _ mekelghiigh _ .
taawa _ iisqagh ngunani _ ag laagh aqelghii _ kayaalqe nghatni _ qughsatku _ .
taawa _ ighivg aghy agu _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ qaallgute a _ mekelghiigh _ , _ â _ unaami _ pi qaghte naqe aaten _ entaqun _ . _ â
â _ qayughllak qun _ pi langa _ neghigh pigte luku _ tuqu kau lghiinga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh _ akuzi laatagh uq _ .
unaami _ qavagh luteng _ aghte yagu _ keleg laatagh aat _ mekelghiigh _ .
â _ tesqama _ aghnaa igh naqekagh an _ ingum _ aqfa sqe a _ aglagh li nguq _ wawernga tete naqe a nguq _ .
â _ ahaa _ , _ aglagh naqe unga _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh ai _ .
â _ taawa _ pi qaghte naqe aaten _ , _ â _ nanevgagh m _ pi a _ .
â _ sullevneghhaleg _ atkug ka _ una _ aate naqe i agu _ enta _ qiighnagh lghii _ . _ â
â _ yeghlegite lugh u _ , _ itagnagh unga _ tawatete ghngaaghma _ , _ â _ mekelghiigh _ pi laatagh uq _ .
U gh luv ghh ani _ yataaghqellug qu _ kelqellug qu _ aglagh uq _ .
kii _ , _ pinqusigh mineng _ pagsinga _ uglagh uq _ imani _ .
taawa _ elngaatall _ nanugh _ utegh p aar k it aghaqeftuq _ saag r ukeg llagmi _ sang ighh iil ngugh mi _ .
kii _ , _ inglugtun _ yug llag uf tuuq _ pagsinga te ghllag _ .
taawa _ kaate luni _ ughluvegh ni _ taana _ yataaghqe a _ mekelghiigh m _ .
â _ Kingu lighpig ag uq _ una _ pil qa _ .
kayaalqe qaghtekumken _ taawa _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ whanga _ , _ nuligh qelleq egkegka _ .
Kay aal qell aataq uv nga _ sa lunga qun _ pi langa _ , _ â _ qughsatku m _ pi a _ .
Taw aaten _ pi luku _ mekelghiigh _ ii _ , _ taz ing apigh qaq aghluni _ qughsatku ghllag _ ugw iin ighllag luni _ , _ ugw iin ighllag aataq aghluni _ sughug yaqminigu _ uka _ elngaatall _ .
legan _ ulmighte te luku _ utaqalgigh u aghagh a _ mekelghiigh m _ .
liisimake u aqe anga _ ang v an gha _ regh ilnguq _ .
iwerngaqun _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luni _ qughsatku _ agitaghte magh mi _ ighi gh n naq ngan _ ang v angh akun _ pitegte a _ .
leganqun _ aaygu a _ aga _ itegh qagh uq _ .
nagnegh yalghiimi _ aga _ sivutmute _ ullghitagh uq _ .
Tuqu ngwaagh luni _ aghuliigh uq _ .
taawa _ tuqute a _ .
kii _ , _ pin qusigh meggneng _ pagsinga lghiit _ elngaatall _ aragh aat _ .
mekelghiigh nkut _ aghnagh m llu _ ku u g _ â _ gh i _ aglagh yata _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ aapte ai _ , _ â _ Qayugh w am _ aa _ nateghtu ta k _ ? _ â
â _ tuqute ma a _ , _ mekelghiigh m _ tuqute ma a _ .
umiileg igh te ma ukut _ , _ â _ ungipaate aat _ .
nanevgagh _ akuzi uq _ , _ â _ H iik _ , _ taa waa _ m aal ghu wh aghneng _ ighu llgagh at _ yuwh aat _ inglu u nghite ut _ .
tugumiigh ghhagh it _ guu tut angit _ suvinaghtu ut _ aqnighnagh ut _ .
sa mig ke nghmegtekut _ ilangani _ malighqugh nghmegtekut _ iye put _ tagitug ughte ste ghllag aqe luki _ aaw meng _ qe si testaq luta _ taw aaten _ aneghtekau unga _ whanga _ anglinghhagh u lunga _ . _ â
Anag iku sigh llag uf tughnguq _ arekull _ .
ii _ , _ pilugugtugh uq _ nanevgagh _ .
aane luni _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ mayugh luni _ aragh qu uq _ , _ â _ nunalgute mni _ maani _ nagate te ngnga _ , _ nagate te ngnga _ .
umiileg igh te ma uute yu ai _ amyuqetaatk este z i _ kagpag ma a _ aqelqagh m _ .
pinighi yu lghii _ pinighi lghaaq _ , _ aklungi igh i yu lghii _ aklungi igh i lghaaq _ .
S all gu ghi yul ghii _ legan _ iteme uq _ taawa _ .
avangite te usi _ , _ amig igh waagh teng ii tusi _ . _ â
Taw aaten _ akuzi luni _ itegh uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ nangllek iste mineng _ nulightugh uq _ .
tagtalmi _ ighnegh nge ma lghiik _ .
naqam _ enraq _ veghute naqutke ghllag aat _ mekelghiigh _ ne anun _ nulighh a llu _ ighnegh h allu _ maligte te lukek _ .
enkaam _ qani ma kangit _ sakighagh ita _ aglagh te ma kangit _ .
nanugh t _ yugu luki _ mekelghiigh m _ kiyagh ilg utkegk aqegkangi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yugw estun _ ayuqe nigh ke kangit _ .
tefaay _ !
yupig m _ homonym-ngi _ 
uzive a _

2 _ . _ sa u aat _ saam _ uziv engh aki _ .

yupig m _ homonym-ngi _ 
qikmighwaagh a _ 
1 _ . _ ayvegh m _ , _ maklag m _ , _ neghsagh m _ neghqwaagh i _ si p sam el nguutlu _ , _ gg ay eg mel nguutlu _ .
â _ neghsagh m _ qikmighwaagh a _ whanga _ pi lleqe aqa _ naghaaghute u luku _ , _ â _ pi a _ naa ni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .

â _ eight- nghma _ qikmighwaagh a _ naasqw igh agh simaaq _ . _ â
yupig m _ homonym-ngi _ 
iye a _ 
1 _ . _ Yugwem _ teghig ke sagh m _ , _ saama _ al nun ak _ iye leg m _ in lu pigaq _ esghaate yu ai _ .
â _ U um _ qikmigh m _ iye a _ saa _ ? _ â

â _ Iy eg aat ma _ iye a _ av ituq _ . _ â

â _ U um _ sikugh m _ iye a _ kagpestaagh pigu uq _ . _ â

ungipaghagh t _ 
imlaa ngiighhagh t _ 
Im l aang iighh aa s _ tamaakut _ .

maana _ . . . _ amiir aaghh ii _ ghh atagh lluki _ .
taagken _ ghhuugh aqe aput _ .

ugtinghagh _ 
Ug t ingh as _ tamaakut _ .

aqlagh nghata _ kaki aqe aput _ .

sukilpagh _ 
Suk ilp aghh aa s _ tamaakut _ , _ pennagh ani _ , _ anaavag luki _ kii ite u aqe ut _ .

aghsugh aqe ut _ .

qaye aneng _ entaqun _ .

ighneghllug _ 
Ighnegh llug es _ tamaakut _ ayvegh m _ ighneghllug i _ maklag m _ ighneghllug i _ maklag uug ut _ ategh i _ .
ii- u na ghllag i ta _ qilu i _ nat angi _ iwerngaqun _ avelghagh luki _ qilu i _ entaqun _ .

ughvugh aqe ait _ qaan m angi _ megh kun _ .
megh meng _ kuuve luki _ imigh luki _ ughvugh aqe ait _ .
U gh vugh waaghluki _ qayugh te a qun _ saag lluki _ ayvegh m _ ighneghllug i _ tamaakut _ .
qaye i _ k d igagh aqiit _ ughvig kun _ .

taaqe nghmegteki _ keligagh nghmeng _ uus luki _ ilepenghaagh i _ .

siighnagh _

qaye i _ sivuke luki _ qapigh aqe ait _ savig meng _ .

akitu pigte ut _ maani _ elngaatall _ .

kiig mi _ sivungagh mi _

uksaagh mi _ mughute magh meng _ .
uqlighsagh magh meng _ , _ unange negh meggni _ amiiragh it _ saghna luki _ aki ngllagh aqe ait _ .
Neq angi s _ tamaakut _ ilangakun _ neqetu negh meggni _ agaghte luki _ aqlaghsigh aqe ait _ .
nutaghagh yug negh meggni _ nutaghagh u luki _ gaagh aqe ait _ .
taana _ elngaatall _ megnu nagh pigte yagh uq _ .
awaligh uute aqe luteng _ ava ite ngugh nun _ ne nun _ .
awalightugh aqe luki _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ neqe _ quunpeng _ ila meggnun _ tuune luku _ ayuq aqsagh aghput _ yupig g aghni _ whangkuta _ .
laluramke t _ pill ghitni _ sh ar e- el uku _ yug lgute mnun _ ava ite ngugh nun _ .
neqe pig _ 
afta luki _ neghsagh t _ unang enghata _ , _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ . . . _ ugkelli luki _ , _ megh t _ taghyugh ligh luki _ , _ ilangakun _ aghipsaate luki _ , _ ilangakun _ k itegh qelluki _ d ep en d s _ on _ naten _ piyuke llegh stun _ .
enkaam _ ayvegh t llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe aput _ , _ maana _ nutaghagh u luki _ maana _ ugkelli luki _ manguna t _ , _ kemekrag ligh luki _ .
qilu i _ ughvugh luki _ uus luki _ , _ ilangakun _ ighsaqugh t llu _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
aghipsaate luki _ piy un em teki _ k itegh qell ukillu _ .
uuk _ , _ maana _ ilangakun _ neghsagh t _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ aqlagh nghata _ ama _ gaagh aqe aput _ , _ neghs at i u _ tamaakut _ .
inglu t _ legan _ agaghte aqe ke put _ aq liis qelluki _ .
aa-a _ , _ taawa _ .
neqekrangllagh _ 
sivuke luku _ m as h _ b o w l -kun _ , _ qayuusigh _ maatneghraag _ kuuve luku _ , _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ sak ar ameng _ , _ ang ur gh aall ukek _ sak ar a _ .
kuuve nakegken _ maalghug _ package-k _ ye ast- ak _ tawavek _ maatneghraag mun _ megh mun _ .
qallaqugh neghsigh ma luku _ , _ pal aq an ii luku _ qayuusigh meng _ sak ar a _ sagnegh mun _ tawavek _ kuuve luku _ .
para meng _ tawaten _ pi nga yu t _ peng ugh ugh lluki _ al qu utagh paget _ tawavek _ ilate naken _ sak ar amun _ .
enkaam _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ taghyugh meng _ .
maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ ug uq nagh llagmeng _ megh meng _ kuuve nakegken _ tawavek _ para mun _ , _ par an kugnun _ sak ar an kugnun _ kenlanga _ para _ ughug llegh anun _ .
ughug kan _ enkaangam _ ang ur gh aalluku _ , _ ilate naken _ maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ mamagh meng _ , _ f r es h _ milk- meng _ nalighmeng _ dr y _ milk _ mamagh ngllagh qagh luku _ .
taake uk llu _ maalghug _ manig k _ , _ ilate lukek _ tawavek _ ang ur gh aall ukek _ , _ ye ast- allu _ ilate luku _ .
enkaam _ elngaatall _ nun maa wh aq _ avlawa ligh luku _ egg b e ate r - elgu kuvek _ nalighmeng _ el e c t ri c _ b e ate r - elgu kuvek _ .
Nun maa wh aq _ avlawa ligh magh an _ ang ur gh aan naken _ , _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
aghtugh yagute kan _ el e c t ri c _ b e ate r -meng _ , _ iigge gpeneng _ taana _ akuute naken _ .
avlawa _ ilate naken _ tawavek _ akuutagh mun _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
igughtekan _ tawani _ sagnegh mi _ mesiigh ligh luku _ taana _ akuute an _ ghhuughsigh naken _ saape luku _ sangighqugh sigh meng _ veg ll umeng _ kenlanga _ ghhuu llegh anun _ .
ghhuugh kan _ enkaangam _ gaagh naken _ mesiigh kun _ .
tawaten _ mesiighquute tke aat _ neqekrangllagh t _ kenlanga _ qamagte llegh gpeneng _ taana _ akuute aq _ .
mangteghapig _ 
neghigh luku _ mangtegh apig g aaluta _ mangteghapig put _ ef lu ug alget _ nategh leg t _ angyagh m _ amu iqe yagh ka aneng _ ategh i _ vuvegh t _ .
Enkaangam _ mingle t llu _ quyngigh m _ amiiragh i _ , _ sang wat _ allighaghqagh t _ , _ aagra t _ .
iwhani _ taakut llu _ , _ maana _ , _ sang aaw at ii _ , _ puyg aanka _ ima _ ( _ suugernge t _ ) _ .
tawaten _ eng kaangam _ , _ nanigh lightugh luteng _ nanigh m _ p uyuq er ug aqegkangi _ puyuqe aqe kangi _ entaqun _ .
maana _ aagra ten _ tamaakut _ tanughqe aqe kangit _ .
Tan ugh qelluki _ maan aaq luki _ sa meng _ iwhani aqe luki _ ( _ sategte luki _ sallegte aqe kangit _ ) _ .
E ng kaangam _ aqlagh agh raag mi _ qategh rak etun _ kinegh na iqe kangit _ su pel g aghluteng _ vuvegh teng _ tamaakut _ .
ama _ tan ugh qeng ngwaagh aqegkangit _ .
neghigh luku _ ila it _ nekegte ghllag na iqe kangit _ legan _ whangkutestun _ maaten _ nekeg sagh waagh aqelghiit _ .
temkagh ak _ 
sivuke luki _ nazighagh at _ temkag ngllagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ qafsina t _ pi nga yu t _ estamat _ angtale akun _ amiiragh m _ .
Enkaangam _ sivuke luki _ af tan em teki _ aghvig aqe aput _ amiiragh t _ elngaatall _ ukmangigh sagh waaghluki _ , _ mes ii ghii t ngwaagh luki _ .
maana _ kiig mi _ aane ste luki _ , _ sa kun _ tefte luki _ nalighmeng _ c l oth esl ine- kun _ , _ melqw i _ kinegh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ niigh tugh aq h iki _ .
uksugh mi _ anigu kun _ tuute aqe aput _ .
tuute luki _ ufsug luki _ niightugh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ enkaangam _ ( _ niighigh luki _ esne igh luki _ pellug aqe aput _ ) _ pellug luki _ , _ pell ughi ki _ , _ pi nga yu t _ , _ estamat _ nalighmeng _ pell ughi ki _ aghvig luki _ aane ste luki _ .
maana _ upenghagh mi _ qafsina neng _ qavagh ste luki _ itghute luki _ aqlagh ma nghata _ ulug aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ nenge qagh luki _ pellug meng _ taawa _ liigh qelluki _ temkagh u luki _ kaki aqe aput _ .
amiiragh t _ , _ maalgh ut _ ighu ke luki _ ataasigh _ naal kak luku _ .
Enkaangam _ maaten _ z ipp er- eligh luki _ ugh fig i _ paagkut _ ( _ paagna i _ ) _ qiipagh aghh agl imeng _ iwhani luki _ kakivike luki _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe ait _ ( _ n ungigh sigh aqaput _ ) _ .
kaankut llu _ tukughagh i _ enkaangam _ n ungigh sig l iluki _ maana _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ ulima aqe aput _ temkagh at _ .
Il ep gh aaghet
Q ull ig et _ maakut _ ilep gh aaghet _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ ulima aqe ke put _ .
amigh t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ entaqun _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe atki _ , _ year l ing -et _ .
tamaaken _ ilep gh aang llagh aqut _ .
maana _ aghu iqe luki _ sa ta i _ agh iq ngwaagh luki _ .
imeg luki _ lli luki _ yu ku tagh raag g neghata _ pe t lug aqiit _ .
pellug luki _ pellug luki _ yu ku taqluki _ imeg luki _ lli luki _ , _ itghuugute nghata _ ketfagh luki _ ulug aqe ait _ elngaatall _ ulug luki _ esne i _ maana _ tukegh aqe ait _ , _ nengte aqe ait _ , _ unite te lugh u i aghagh aqe ut _ tukegh nghmegteki _ .
tawaten _ lli luki _ ketfagh aqe luki _ ulug aqe luki _ kenlanga _ unite te lugh u i aghagh llegh itnun _ .
unite te lugh u i aghagh nghata _ taawa _ kavigh v aag meng _ kavighte aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tea- ma uten _ kaviigh igh yagh te lghiikut _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ qaye akun _ mesiigh ghhagh meng _ mesiigh qelluki _ ( _ angighhe aqe ait _ ) _ .
M aan an ayuk ata _ kavighyaag i _ gheve na yu kata _ ( _ ifkagh na yu kata _ ) _ .
tawaten _ ulug aqe luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ lliighqagh ke ait _ ilep gh aaghet _ .
L liigh qell ghiit _ nalluk ek anigh anka _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ entaqun _ tu ung gh ugh lluteng _ ayuqe ut _ tem kaa stun _ .
tawaten _ tukughagh i llu _ kaankut _ , _ qukagh i llu _ esn el aag usigh luki _ qiipagh aghhagh me a g _ n ungigh sigh aqiit _ .
Il ep gh aagh es _ tamaakut _ tem kaam _ ilu akun _ melqw i _ qam an lluki _ kemegmigllug ke i _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
kameg _ 
amalleqa _ tamaakut _ neghsagh t _ amiiragh t _ , _ kam eg mi m _ atuq naq nemteki _ , _ neghsapig t _ unÊ¼g avek _ mugh uniigh mun _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
qazigyagh t _ quyillegtagh u aqe ut _ .
ategh it _ qu iy ill egtat _ .
qazigyagh meng _ ulima aqe aput _ 
Enkaangam _ , _ neghsapig t llu _ qazigyagh t llu _ .
Enkaangam _ amalleqa _ neghsapig t _ tamaakut _ amiiragh t _ qigugh luki _ , _ mel qigh at _ atigh kau luteng _ .
M elq igh as _ tamaakut _ amalleqa _ mughunniigh mun _ atugh aqe ut _ kameg t _ .
Sang aaw at ii _ ategh it _ , _ akugh vig aw aaqut _ .
kelulighagh ke aput _ maalghug gneng _ megh mun _ itegh yaghqaa fqiita _ ( _ taape yaghqaa fqiita _ ) _ .
Enkaangam _ mel qigh as _ tamaakut _ ama _ iwhani u aqe ut _ ipigkingwaagh u aqe ut _ .
ipigkingwaagh mun _ kaamwaagh ke ut _ ipigkingwaagh at _ takestaaghhagh t _ tukughagh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ ipigkingwaagh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
Enkaangam _ kaam g es _ tamaakut _ uygaagh meng _ uygu aqe aput _ .
paagna i _ kalef tagh luki _ n ungigh te ligh luteng _ ( _ n ungigh te ligh luki _ ) _ .
Enkaangam _ singig ligh aqe aput _ ama _ uygaagh meng _ singigh ghqusigh luki _ .
Quyill egt as _ tamaakut _ singigh ghqusigh aqe aput _ ug tin ghaghmeng _ .
nalighmeng _ mel qigh aghmeng _ .
ilangakun _ mel qigh aa s _ tamaakut _ ( _ ilu i _ ) _ qaam n angi _ esl aligh neq luki _ .
Enkaangam _ , _ mel qigh aa s _ tamaakut _ akughvigagh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
upenghagh mi _ an yaghtu mi _ atuqe aqe ait _ kaam g es _ tamaakut _ .
tawaten _ legan _ uygiinghagh meng _ uygu luki _ n ungigh sighluki _ maalghug gneng _ kelulighagh ke aput _ .
maana _ megh mun _ itegh yaghqaa fqiita _ ( _ taape yaghqaa fqiita _ ) _ .
Enkaangam _ ipig king waagh es _ tamaakut _ ama _ mel qigh aaw aqut _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kaame kaqe kangit _ .
maana _ ipig k est aghh aaluki _ ipigkingwaagh t _ ategh it _ .
uygiinghagh meng _ uygu luki _ , _ singigh luki _ , _ uygiinghagh meng llu _ .
maklag m _ amiiragh aneng _ natigh aqe aput _ egte luki _ .
Enkaangam _ ila i _ kameg m _ ratamyaag t _ .
ategh it _ ratamyaag u aqe ut _ .
kiig mi _ kameraagh ighllug qu _ atuqe aqe kangit _ .
taape neghllug t _ piyug mi _ megh mi _ .
aghinagh mi _ atugh aqe kangit _ .
iwhani _ kameg t _ atugh t _ mughunniigh mun _ angyaghtugh sigh mun _ atugh t _ .
melqugh igh aat _ kameg ngllaghkagh t _ mel qigh aa s _ tamaakut _ qigugh luki _ akughvigagh ke aqe kangit _ .
Aku gh vig as _ tamaakut _ taaqe nghatki _ atugh nghmeng _ uus luki _ sa ta igh aghte llegh igh a _ qigugh llegh an _ ilaagh luki _ .
kelu ligh luki _ maalghug gneng _ mesiigh qelluki _ taape neghllugte yagh luki _ natigh aqe ait _ tamaaken _ mel qiigh aghmeng _ singighte luki _ .
enkaam _ kiig mi _ atuqe aqe ait _ piyug mun _ .
quyngighniigh negh meggni _ atuqe aqe ait _ ivagh i yagh te negh meggni _ .
uksaagh mi _ es nighqw at aan neghmeggni _ sa mun _ legan _ atuqe aqe ait _ enkaangam _ .
sanaghte a _ 
kamegkagh t _ amiiragh t _ .
quyillegtaghqagh t _ kamegkagh t _ .
M elq w i _ esla anite luki _ pellug aqe aput _ sivuke luki _ pellug luki _ mes iiv regh aght enghata _ melqw i _ b r us h - aqaput _ s o ap - eligh luki _ megh mun _ .
B r us h - el uki _ kinegh ngllagh aqe aput _ melqw i _ .
kinegh nghata _ sa ta i _ aghu iqe luki _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ yuq utagh tesqelluki _ .
Y uq ut aghh neghata _ taawa _ liigh qelluki _ atuqe aqe aput _ kameg mun _ .
Enkaangam _ alla u ut _ temkagkagh t _ allighte kaghqagh t _ .
nazighagh at _ san aghh nemteki _ pellug luki _ aghvig luki _ esla kun _ agaghte uute luki _ .
aqlagh nghata _ kinegh nghata _ itghute luki _ ulug aqe aput _ .
ulug aqe luki _ ulug aqe luki _ taaq nemteki _ nenge qagh luki _ taawa _ liigh qelluki _ kaki aqe aput _ temkagh u luki _ nalighmeng _ allighte u luki _ .
enkaam _ melqw igh aa s _ tamaakut _ qigughkagh t _ melqw i _ .
neghsapig t _ .
pellug luki _ sa ta i _ pellug luki _ taaq nemteki _ tan ugh qelluki _ .
melqugh igh ai _ ama _ sa ta i _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ yuq utagh tesqelluki _ .
taawa _ itghuugute nghata _ liighqe aqe aput _ mughunniigh mun _ kameg u luki _ aghinagh mun _ akughvigagh t _ .
uygaagh _ 
Enkaangam _ uyg aaghq as _ tamaakut _ .
neghsagh t _ nayug luki _ afta aqe aput _ .
nayug luki _ , _ am ii iii _ yugusigh aneng _ iik nemteki _ uus luki _ uqiigh aqe aput _ .
uqiigh luki _ taagken _ itegagh i _ ii x i _ tawan lluki _ sagnegh mun _ kanaghte aqe aput _ .
Taaq nemteki _ uqiigh nghmeng _ uqugh aneng _ saape aqe aput _ taakut _ uygaaghqagh t _ nayugkagh put _ .
Enkaangam _ navek _ lli aqe aput _ maatnegh ghraag llegh mun _ meqesigh aqe aput _ .
meqesigh luki _ meq enghata _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kelenga kaqe aput _ .
M eq enghata _ meqete luki _ sivugh sigh ngllagh aqe ukut _ unaghsigh meng _ .
Maalgh ut _ unaghsigh t _ sivugh sigh ke aqe aput _ .
maalghug u luta _ aghnagh ni _ sivugh aqe aput _ mesughllug i _ .
mesughllug i _ siv ugh waaghluki _ taagken _ ughvugh luki _ .
ughvugh luki _ taagken _ s o ap - eligh luki _ me h gh luki _ lli iqe aput _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ tawaten _ kenl ang ang waa ll ghit _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ qiipe aqe luki _ qipugh luki _ qipugh luki _ megh i _ simigh aqe luki _ .
ilangakun _ anigu meng _ taakut _ kevigh aqe aput _ ghhute t _ .
Enkaangam _ . . . _ ughug negh meggni _ ugh sigh aqut _ tamaakut _ uygaagh at _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ tawaten _ sivugh aqe luki _ qipugh aqe luki _ kenlanga _ gh ev ngw aan ghata _ suugh te nanigh nghata _ megh i _ .
taagken _ suugh te nanigh nghata _ sug g ellgh elgu ut _ tamaakut _ uygaagh at _ kaki aqe aput _ .
itegagh i _ sivuke luki _ gh ef e igh naq nemteki _ kepugh aqe aput _ iigge i llu _ .
enkaam _ gh ef si neghmeng _ taaq nemteki _ itegagh i _ taakut _ k akil aghaq aput _ .
iigge an llu _ , _ aa _ , _ itegagh an llu _ uk im allgh elg ell ghiit _ .
K akil aghluki _ uyaqugh t llu _ pikegkut _ naasqw i _ kepellegh m _ k akil aghaq aput _ .
K akil aghluki _ qaam kung itneng _ qaam ku nganeng _ uygaaghqagh m _ taam _ .
K akil aghluki _ uk im allgh elg im ayuk ata _ yuvghiigh waaghluki _ .
kaki sigh m _ qii pan ghut aghh aaneng _ gh uu qu sighluki _ gh uugh aqaput _ .
kenlanga _ tamaakut _ awataghpag t _ uygaagh t _ .
Ghh uugh waaghluki _ aane te luki _ kuml asigh aqaput _ .
kumlate te nghata _ uug n angi _ uy aq ughh i _ ukut _ kel agh lluki _ kaki llegh it _ unaghsigh kun _ sa kun _ qengagh m _ unaghsigh akun _ nuuve te luki _ .
tuquuqagh te aqe aput _ nalighmeng _ asighte luki _ .
uksugh mi _ anuq am _ suupe aqe ai _ tawan taqut _ aqlagha mi _ uksugh mi _ .
tanqigh _ sa u a _ atugh aqaghput _ .
taagken _ suu p ngw aan ghata _ saye akun _ asitmun _ pilag luki _ tall ii ghii tgun _ tapghagh mun _ nuuve luki _ .
ilangakun _ inillghaatagh ke te _ inglugtun _ qilleghte uute aqe ait _ .
tawani _ k iingh waagh testaq aput _ .
suupe u aghte ste aqe aput _ .
seggekagh t _ uygaagh t _ amiiragh t _ seggekagh t _ uv ghii nemteki _ gh ef sighluki _ tawaten _ .
Gh ev ngw aan ghata _ amiiragh m _ niightuute ka qun _ niightugh luki _ aywaa n _ tung angakun _ tung atgun _ lli aqe aput _ nalighmeng _ mangteghagh m _ sani akun _ .
sivuqagh m _ U N G I I P A A
Aku l k im _ apegh llegh a _ 
Aku waaq _ qaye ii lleghte aqngamta _ , _ taam um _ ila yan _ ategh i _ liite aput _ .
kinku u ta i _ taamani _ kiyaghtekagh t _ ayumigh _ liite aput _ .
ukut _ igagh t _ pill ghitni _ , _ ayum ir ug llaak _ sa u a _ 1 1 ,000 _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ uukna _ alaska _ salin _ ugpeqe llegh meggni _ qute u luku _ pamavek _ .
sivuligh t _ kiyaghtekagh t _ , _ ukani _ alaska- mi _ , _ kiyaghtekau lghiit _ esne mi llu _ , _ qungevagh ni llu _ pagani _ .
iqallug meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ neqek luteng _ .
S c i ent is t- tet _ ugpeqe llegh itni _ O n i on _ P or tag e- en Ê¼nguq _ 1 0 , 5 00 _ uksughtu tke aagh _ .
ayumightagh ghllag u uq _ .
whani _ igagh ni _ whaa _ ila i llu _ ategh i _ :
T angl e _ L ak e _ , _ H e al y _ L ak e _ , _ taana llu _ kukuleg _ , _ maan lenguq _ qiighqagh mi _ , _ taawanginaq _ kiw an lenguq _ sivungagh mi _ .
taana ta _ G e is t- am _ , _ ar ch e ol o g ist -em _ , _ Un iv er si t y- ng anun _ Al as k a-m _ , _ iig fik egkaa _ mangteghagh ngllagh luteng _ aange lghii meng _ .
qepghaqagh u uq _ tawani _ uglagh lghii _ ayumiqullegh _ .
I ig lluteng _ liigikekagh at _ yug t _ kiyaghtekau ni luki _ 1 0 ,000 _ ayumiqullegh _ .
En tag un _ 1 00 _ year s- ngugh tuq _ paaghqagh ite u te mineng _ .
ipa u uq _ whanga mni llu _ .
Taam _ kukuleg m _ angtal nga _ apegh ma kangat _ ; _ 8 00 _ feet _ tagtal nga _ , _ 1 4 0 _ feet _ iq e tul nga _ .
tawaten _ angka ni luku _ apeghkagh at _ .
asivagh nun _ samavek _ laag ke aat _ esghagh na luku _ naten _ aghy uqagh tul nga _ .
Nal ku saaq at _ elngaatall _ tawani _ .
M aate meng _ kenlanga _ tazimavek _ , _ 2 00 _ ayumiqullegh _ .
ila i _ naalkutaagh it _ liigike nayagh anka _ nateghtu langi _ , _ naken _ tagi kau ta i _ .
mayughwaagh mi _ qafsin Ê¼ gu ut _ nenglullug t _ maa _ .
ataasigh _ naayghagh m _ iinwaagh anite uq _ .
liigike lleg mni _ sivulighte aq _ na _ neli yuwhaagh ke aq _ , _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ , _ ategh ke ait _ iinwaagh mii t _ .
ayumightagh ghllag t _ , _ aghyugh qagh lleghpigagh at _ naal kutaagh en Ê¼nguq _ maani _ uugte vig meggneng _ pi u ut _ .
N aatgh anilnguut _ taakut _ naayghagh m _ mayughwaagh mii u ut _ , _ maalghug gneng _ q as pi qu llghii neng _ neli llegh it _ ataasigh t _ pungughmii t _ iglegha lgutke ait _ .
Taam _ asi ani _ naalke lleqe asi _ san quut aa ghit _ ayumightagh t _ agavek _ â _ O l d _ B er ing _ S ea- gh mii nun _ . _ â
ayveghyage mii t _ taakut _ ama _ ne t _ , _ aygugh ghhagh itni _ mayughwaagh mii t _ .
ayuqligh m _ ila yan _ salin _ atigh aqe ainkut _ ayveghyage mii neng _ .
Siq luw aghy ag miit _ taakut _ naayvagh m _ aygugh ghhagh anite ut _ , _ taakwavek _ kete mun _ .
sume mni _ taakut _ Siq luw aghy ag miit _ entaqun _ 2 00 - 3 00 _ year s -ngu t _ .
iwernga _ taakwani _ naalkutaagh t _ pungughmii stun _ ayuq ek anigh tut _ .
ila i _ naalkutaagh m _ aghyugh ghllag aqe luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
unegkut _ ne mta _ aking anilnguut _ nenglullug t _ entaqun _ 1 5 0 _ year s- nguut _ , _ wallu _ ing avaq aan tat _ .
wata _ unÊ¼g an lenguut _ , _ maaten _ qagi m _ naafqekagh i _ , _ 19 00 -em _ nat angani _ ne u yagh lghiit _ : _ An ang t inkut _ , _ Taa ng yat ent kut _ , _ kinku t llu _ .
taawa _ liigik egh raag aghput _ nani _ kiyaghtekau ta i _ yug t _ , _ qavngaghtagh u ta i llu _ .
tawani _ O l d _ B er ing _ S e a _ T w o -mi _ allangughte ut _ igaqragh llegh it _ .
whanga mni _ qamagte luteng _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
ila i _ igaqragh llegh it _ qaay v an taqluteng _ qukagh itni _ .
punguug _ taake uk _ malgh ugh qell utek _ ayuqe uk _ :
sivuligh k llu _ , _ punguug _ , _ kinguligh k llu _ punguug _ .
P u nguum _ culture-nga _ mingite te luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
sivuqagh mi _ maani _ ulu ii ma uq _ naalke aqe aat _ pungughmii stun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ketngipalag ni _ naalkute kau unga _ uugte vig stun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
taagani _ nuugtekagh t _ uugte vig neng _ taakwavek _ D r . _ B and im _ iiggekagh anun _ , _ taagken _ nuugtekagh t _ tekeghagh anun _ .
sivu ligh aat _ taakut _ Ket ng ip al am _ peng waa k rag anilnguut _ .
naalkutaagh put _ tawani _ uugte vig stun _ aghyugh qaghtutka ut _ .
sivuligh m llu _ P u nguum _ pi atun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ pi lgu uq _ tazikna _ .
ila i _ piniipig taa qut _ .
naalkutaagh mteggun _ ilg g nemta _ liigike aqe aput _ naken _ c ul tu re meng _ pi u ta i _ ulima llegh itgun _ .
uugte vig _ taana _ sivuligh t allegh piig aaguq _ maani _ . _ naalkutaagh mnni _ terellegh it _ maalgh ut _ saaqwligh igh qutagh lghiit _ . _ terellegh t llu _ qam av negh tuqat _ .
uugte vig _ taana _ 2 00 0 _ year s- neng _ ing av an tuq _ .
uugte vig mii t _ ul iim aa ghita _ terellegh it _ sam av negh tuqat _ , _ awalighnegh i _ terellegh t _ qaay v an lenguut _ , _ angqaperugtagh llgagh u aqe luteng _ .
tuungligh kek _ uugte vig k _ taake uk _ O l d _ B er ing _ S e a _ O n e- nguuk _ .
paninang _ uksughtutka lghiik _ tawaten _ 2 00 0 _ year s _ .
O l d _ B er ing _ S ea- m _ igaqragh llegh an _ terellegh i _ sam av negh tuqat _ agughte magh meng _ .
taamani _ ulim ay iit kan it _ , _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ igaqragh llegh i _ .
whaa _ maaten _ tukfigh tugh tet _ tukf ii ghi naa q utegh li aq uut _ taghnughhaghwaagh meng _ , _ naas qugh waaghmeng _ , _ ila aneng llu _ pinigh lghii meng _ sa meng _ allaaghlluwh aghmeng _ .
tamaakut _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ uugte vig nun _ kaate luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
kiyang _ taw a tek an iq _ ull im allghi _ ayuqe te ut _ .
ila i _ taghnughhaghwaagh m _ ull m allghi _ Egypt- eghm iit _ ul maa ghistun _ ayuqe ut _ .
Naas qugh waaghem _ enkaam _ ila i _ I n d i an -eghm iistun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ igaqragh llegh it llu _ tawatengwaaq _ ayuqe aqe ut _ .
S I V U G A M _ K I Y A GH T AA LL GH A _ ayumigh _ 
Uv im _ ungipagh a _ 
elngaatall _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ liite llegh ma _ kenle aneng _ taagken _ mangtegh api p ereg waaq _ .
nenglu m _ ulima llegh anun _ nuugh uute kau unga _ .
nalluke anka _ enkaam _ .
iwernga _ iigna llu _ Qaygegh t aankut _ mangteghagh ita _ uk akagh aan ilnguq _ waamte uute te m _ allgegh vike a _ .
sallghite kanigh luku _ n atanga _ , _ k atu mllu _ neq elghut al ug g amta _ nalla ani _ , _ kaay _ , _ naav ngwaa ll ghilnguut _ , _ qak em n allu _ peghukagh _ naav ngwaa ll ghi teftuq _ .
taakut _ esghagh u _ .
mangteghapig ghllag u uq _ , _ ila i _ sama _ megh mun _ lliigh uute ut _ esghagh llegh nka _ , _ kiyang _ maalghug _ .
Taa ng yat en kutlu _ , _ An ang tin kutlu _ teskan an lenguut _ .
An ang t igh llak _ , _ paa- a _ angli stekagh a _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ kan an saghpe tukut _ angyilghagh mnni _ .
enkaam _ ugw akagh amnni _ Tem ker uun kut _ .
ingate kaghagh itni _ Qan engu unkut _ , _ qeghagh lug t _ tazingkut _ kete kaghagh itni _ N em aay aankut _ , _ unÊ¼g an tu sagh tut _ .
qaasqagh _ unÊ¼g ar ugllak _ .
uughqaghtagh ughte aqe ghngaaghmi _ pi igate ngugh t _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ , _ tesam an teng ngin aghaqut _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ allangugh tem llu _ aas kell i kaalghii _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ akil ighnegh ani _ Taa ng yat enkut _ sama _ samavek _ lliigh ma ut _ .
kelu kaghagh itni _ An ang t inkut _ .
enkaam _ kelu kaghagh itni _ Ay m erg enkut _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ taz ik an iq aaghaq _ E gh qaagh aankut _ , _ maaten _ ikegkut _ I ir gun kut _ angyaghwaagh lghutagh ita _ kete kaghagh itni _ .
Uk akagh iitni _ enkaam _ Siiv aghh aankut _ , _ M aas q em _ ata a _ .
enkaam _ taag egkut _ qiwaaghmii lghute u ut _ .
nalugvig m _ amenqun _ uyghagagh u ta t _ taag egkut _ .
ilagagh te ma nkut _ , _ U qeng el iigh aankut _ , _ N gu ung ay ankut _ esghagh tegh anka _ .
mangteghapig it _ taag an tu saghpe tut _ , _ llangaqa _ maaken _ aafte aghagh luteng _ taagavek _ .
enkaam _ taakwna _ entaqun _ uzive te yu ainkut _ esghagh lleg mni _ ug a _ mangteghagh it _ aghula i te ut _ , _ nay aa s _ taana _ .
kelu kaghagh at _ up- ke na nga _ p aq eq ragg ii saghtuq _ , _ mangtegh aq ragg ii saghtuq _ , _ nunatu ghllag yagh uq _ .
kiyang _ uk an tus alghiit _ , _ iwerngaqun _ taaw an iq aaghaq _ S aav l an kutlu _ , _ aghillug nkut llu _ , _ taawani _ maaten _ ayapghute m _ nayugh ani _ .
taakwani _ saaqwligh igh qutagh luteng _ taanÊ¼g ani _ im utem _ qaye ani _ iwhani _ , _ M in aankut _ .
tazingani _ A s unagh aankut _ , _ P iin teghll ankut _ , _ U w etel enkut _ , _ Qu waa r inkut _ , _ Kingu waaghh aankut _ , _ Qen aagh aankut _ .
U w al iit _ uw ani _ maaten _ angyilghagh vig it _ taawani _ .
tawatete yagh lghii _ taakwna _ nunaghllag _ .
iwerngaqun _ taawani _ At ay aghhaam _ guygu an _ nalighnegh ani _ K uul unkut _ tawan tut _ ellngin aghhaghmeng _ .
ketfaghkagh ani _ tamaani _ mangteghagh t _ tamaa _ esghagh tegh anka _ .
taagani _ aghneghte neghtugh kanga _ , _ A yu w ighs aat en kun illu _ , _ Negh yug en kun illu _ .

Mangtegh api p ereg waaq _ .
ayumigh m qun _ tanpigh kayug i _ , _ tamaa na _ .
aange lghii m _ whangkuta qun _ aange ghllag lghii _ mangteghagh ut _ .
Tallim aw aaqut _ tanpeghh et _ .
saye t _ uugkut _ amenqun _ qiipaghagh ghllag u aqe lghiit _ .
Aghv il qelluki _ saye t _ taaw egkut _ .
tawatete aqe ut _ .
Tallim aneng _ whangkuta qun _ tanpegh ke aqe ut _ .
Tag sigh aper u waaghmeng _ niightugh lghii stun _ tawaten _ putu t _ ataasigh t _ aflu ke aqe luki _ niigh tugh tegh aqegkangit _ .
kisaate i _ sa i _ uyghag meng _ uqig ku sighluki _ , _ qayughllak _ upengh anghani _ kuug igh negh mun _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ masaaghi nghaani _ tuquuqagh tke aq _ tamaa na _ niightugh vig a _ makregaghte aghte aqe uq _ .
kii _ , _ kuug igh negh mun _ sayug i _ entaqun _ iknaqe pigte ut _ .
tamaakut _ malighqutagh ma t _ uyghu iqe aat _ itagnagh ma aqe lghiit _ uyghag t _ atugh it _ .
nenglullug u yagh lghii _ iigna _ naghaagh vig ghllag _ , _ ul ap naa r iq fig llak _ uyghagtuqagh _ tazigna _ qellinegh _ .
qerngughte vig u yagh lghii _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ qelli ghllag luni _ naghaagh vig m _ ul ap naa r iq fig a _ nukalpigagh m _ .
whangkuta qun _ mal ik r uut aghtaq unga _ mek est aanghi tgun _ tamaa kutgun _ pi aghte aqe ukut _ .
esgha _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ aange pigte aqe ut _ , _ neghqute m nguq _ tagite kaqe aqe ai _ .
entaqun _ iknaqe pigte uq _ .
kuule t _ estamat _ esgha _ maakut _ aang ep aagh ru llegh pig ii _ akmag kayugu ai _ , _ entaqun _ h un d re d _ p oun d s- nguut _ .
amavek _ ivgagh naqe nghmini _ mangteghasqwaaghqagh ni _ sivugnagh mete te _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ akm ak ayug waa _ .
kii _ , _ iknaqe pigte uq _ taawa _ .
Ing an lluki _ esghaqagh ma aqa _ naten _ imani _ tullumeg t _ esl egk ak aat _ .
aywaa neng _ anuq lin Ê¼ghani _ amiiragh t _ iq ug ikun _ petug luki _ , _ sa aqe aki _ ulug aqe aki llu _ .
kii _ , _ aghnegh h utk aqii _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
qayughllak _ uvinegtu pigte uq _ .
inglu anun _ aghvightagh ke luki _ aghnegh tengngwaagh aquq _ .

tawaten _ ukavek _ nuugtekau ukut _ qag ing ugh tegh lluni _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ aghsaan _ pi ste ghllag gpenaan _ salin _ .
taakwavek _ nuugh qugh te kau ukut _ .
tagi ukut _ taakwavek _ kelevagh uute kau ukut _ tamaani _ tawate tu saghpe tukut _ .
elngaatall _ amalka _ piniqe te ghllag luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ , _ upughatu tete luni _ kiyaghnegh at _ .
nagaqugh lleg mni _ salleg mni _ , _ n ell iq r uug un nem tallu _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ aghyuugh esqell uta _ , _ ata mta llu _ taag eg ku ghh mii nun _ .
yimi ke gpenaamta _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ aghyuugh esqell uta _ .
ukut _ kiyang _ a ngam ta _ , _ Negh yug enkuk _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkuk _ , _ naa mta _ kugegh kek _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
taakwani _ allangughte kestagh magh mi _ angli llegh a _ mangteghagh a _ ugl aaghi k estaa m aghmi _ .
taakwna _ imiite ghllag _ mangteghagh qaqu _ allg ereg aamaghmi _ .
una llu _ pinigh yagh lghii _ iigna _ igaghvig _ una _ ukaligh _ naafqe llegh m _ kenle a _ taana _ , _ pinigh ghllag yagh lghii _ .
kii _ tawani _ aqfaqugh te ghllag aqe yagh lghiit _ .
ilulighnegh itgun _ whangkuta _ mekestaaghhagh ni _ .
E x er cise- est i _ ev er y _ d ay - kan iq _ .
Negh yaghtu neng _ igaghyagh neng _ aag negh mta _ puq legh aag g neghani _ uksugh mi _ , _ whaa _ aqf aqut _ .
legan _ aag negh mta _ ilate aqe lghiikut _ .
ilangakun _ puq legh aag g neghani _ , _ tapgh aghq unnaq un Ê¼nguq _ .
taakwagun _ U uy neq _ kenle ke ma aqe kangat _ .
sukalqagh msiigh _ tamaa na _ .
whangkuta _ ukav aneng _ ukegken _ .
taakwani _ saag g uteghllag aqut _ .
qamaggute aqe uq _ , _ mekelghiigh iighpag ni _ whangkuta llu _ .
kaate negh meggni _ tughumgh an neqeg s aataqut _ .
aamta _ sariigh te lghiit _ , _ qemqagh uute lghiit _ tamaakut _ aqlagha _ yakugh ke igate aat _ .
Igh en naq un _ esghaghtu pigte aqa _ .
sa meng _ s ate reg aatkat _ taan anguuq _ qemqagh uq _ , _ esghaate na luteng _ .
naligh _ menutu kan _ alik sal iis aghq aa _ taam _ .
qaatke sag liite yaghqagh a _ .
tawatete uq _ .
sa meng _ naqam _ seghleliigh meng _ avangite uq _ .
ghhuute igate ai _ , _ tughumgha te aqe ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ ineghte aqe ait _ .
kumlaaghqe lleqe aisi _ tawaten Ê¼ngam _ pi tek _ .
aamta _ ar an Ê¼ghata _ sate luteng _ taawa _ aghulaqe uute aqe ut _ , _ kilgaaqu te sqe aqe kangit _ seghleliigh te laatagh naqe ni luki _ , _ sa naqlaatagh ni luki _ .
legan _ qel ell ghistun _ , _ qaat kum taagh llag it _ , _ whangkuta llu _ repall _ .
alingnaghte luteng _ repall _ nagate lleg mnni _ angeneghte aput _ tamaakut _ .
ii-ii _ esghagh lleqe aaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ , _ esgha _ esghapag lghii _ tazigna _ .
tawatete yaghpete ut _ , _ llangaqa _ sa meng _ itagnagh nghite ngugh meng _ kelengaruugh luteng _ .
qamugh te nghata _ tawaten _ kiig w ken _ , _ alngunak _ legan _ aghulaqe aqe lghii ni _ .
kina _ qamugh te na luku _ .
amalka _ qetgegh aatagh te kanigh luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .
nani _ ug ani _ piyaqli i lghiit llu _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete ait _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
tawaten _ sa lghiit _ pillugute lghiit _ , _ nan Ê¼ ghii ghu testaq iit _ .

taawa _ ava iitagh ke ai _ .

siivanllegh t _ igleghte te i u ut _ tamaani _ .

tawani _ utaqa i te aqe ukut _ kaate negh mta _ .
nula ghllag negh mta _ tawani _ nukalpigagh ni _ taawa _ ivg aghyagh ameng _ guu tu taqut _ tes k ig w ken _ .
tawaten _ unaangu luku _ esla _ seghleghu nghaani _ , _ tawani nguq _ uyghagte te naqe ut _ .
uyghag meng _ ategh leg t _ .
Tugh umgh an neqeg s aataqut _ taaku ni _ kinku ni _ mangteghagh ni _ , _ aagra itni _ .
uyghag u te meng _ ategh leg t _ .
anigu _ um ughh neghani _ naghaagh vig _ ulima aqe aat _ .
itegagh m _ naam an Ê¼gh atun _ nuqutupag fqaan _ .
qellughqagh vig k _ taz ing kuk _ qellughqagh vig ghllag u yagh uk _ , _ igaghvig m _ saaghw ani _ napaqagh k _ .
sa u a _ legan _ agleghnagh lghii _ sa u a _ uksugh mi _ tamaani _ pi igate kangat _ .
sa u aat _ sariigh t _ , _ nagh aall qu siigh em _ sariigh i _ agleghnagh ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ pi snanigh llegh it _ .
naqamalla _ k iin Ê¼gh anillu _ , _ u pen Ê¼gh an Ê¼ghani _ taawa _ sa u a _ reghigh aqe uq _ , _ amalka _ sariigh _ .
K iin Ê¼gh agu _ tawaten _ test- pig ke na _ maaten _ pi whan inkut _ , _ Mang taq ul inkut _ mangteghagh vike yagh kangat _ , _ ila ngllagh vig ghllag _ .
pika _ ayaviileg t _ atgh an Ê¼ghata _ keleg qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ .
T iig unnaq un Ê¼nguq _ .
ayaviileg t _ kel eg tet _ amalka _ yugpag t _ .
tiig te naqe ut _ !
elngaatall _ kemeg migkagh inagh meng _ sa meng _ aate luteng _ .

taawa _ tugutagh ke ut _ .
tanemlleqa _ tughumgh an neqeg s aataqut _ .

iknaqe lleg leg t _ .
uuvganeng _ taana _ iknaqughi kestaghkagh _ , _ Sun aaghr uk _ taana _ .
iknaqe lleghpigagh u yagh lghii _ Am agu _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ pamaken _ .
anglegute ke te lghiik _ yuk egh qen gh ek _ , _ sa meng _ qu uf tin aqluni _ whaken _ village- meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
qule ii naqe k _ anengagh ke te lghiik _ , _ may- u kau uq _ anengagh a _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ , _ ii-i _ Sun aagh rug em _ kaate a _ , _ kaate luku _ , _ ii-i _ sa nanigh uq _ saste nanigh aa _ .
qalepangi ghllag kek _ sa kek _ , _ kep sigh aak _ .
taawa _ kaate a _ kitugh aa _ sa nanighqe a _ .
llangaqa _ n atanga _ iimna _ aghsaan _ lliighqagh a _ sa mi _ village- mi _ whani _ yuk egh qen naq ellgha _ .
taawa _ kitugh aa _ .

aghnagh t _ ighivg asi s nanigh waa qay uw iit _ , _ pi igate u aghte ut _ aghneq _ naten _ lliigh nghaani _ .
awatiiteg neng _ akequsagh leg t _ .
aane ste gpenaki _ aatkagh igh luki _ sakagh t _ ighivg aghmi _ pikagh t _ sakagh t _ .
enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ sa u aat _ kelenga luteng _ .
iwerngaqun _ ugw iiq as _ tamaakut _ itupill _ taawa _ itagnagh ut _ .
enkaam _ sa meng _ p egg meng _ avangite kanigh yagh uq _ .
unaami _ entaqun _ pi nga yu _ , _ estam a _ aflu _ aghh mun _ tuungsagte nghaani _ elngaatall _ aanleghaate aqe lghiit _ .
nukalpigagh _ sa aqe lghii _ iimna _ yuvghiigh aqe kangat _ sa aqe kangat _ .
qetgegh aatagh te luni _ ayuqe yaghpete uq _ .
whanga llu _ sa lghii nun _ piyaqli lghii nun _ pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .

taawa _ aghyuugh llegh ke a _ kilgaaqu _ .
Taananguuq _ aghy uul eq _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ , _ whanga llu _ ilate aghtekau unga _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ aga _ ii-i _ qayughllak _ alinge ste luta _ qelegh luta _ .
Yug ugh tek as _ tamaa kun Ê¼ngam _ wata _ .
ila i _ ii-ii _ pin qeg sag g aghneng _ ayuqe ut _ esghapag lleg mni _ whanga _ .
qaatke te ma ghllag t _ esghapag lleg mni _ .
ulape luteng _ iknaqughi aqe ut _ .
unaghsigh meng _ sa meng _ aa _ , _ navek _ naayghagh leg mun _ mayugh luteng _ ukig aqe luteng _ , _ tawaten _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ meghnugh pagllag gpenateng _ taaqe kayug t _ .
taqayuqe na yukagh meng _ taqayuqe gkumeng _ iknaq ughi mun _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghqagh t _ , _ taaqe lleqe ut _ , _ avangite te lleqe ut _ .
Igh en naq _ esgha _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ .
T aq ayuq em _ avangite tke aq _ .
Aku l gh aagh tesluku _ kilgaaqu ste aqe kangat _ .
Tamaan agh lag em _ taqayuqe stekagh _ .
kaate nghaani _ tanpeghh ek _ tespikagun _ qellinegh kun _ angayuqagh ita _ n aku tlu _ angag ita _ aagkut _ k ii- ii _ , _ neqenghaghqe te aqe ut _ .
whangkuta _ neghe lleghqagh ite ngugh ni _ , _ nanevgagh i i na ut _ neqnighqutagh ke ut _ neqenghaghqe te ghllag aqe aat _ Igh en naq _ taana _ kiyang _ is gh all emni _ .
Aku l gh aagh llagluni _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
U ku m _ pi i _ qateghrakegtagh t _ , _ tagnegh lghii _ , _ qateghrakegtagh _ .
entaqun _ maavek _ segesqugh mun _ akughtu tke aat _ .
llangaqa _ umupag nghite ngugh t _ sa u aat _ maklag t _ teghiglug t _ .
tuye inagh t _ ukut _ naflugh leg t _ , _ pamavek _ qakeghllug ke i _ pie- aghagh te aqe aat _ . _ tawatete ut _ , _ pinigh nagh sal get _ nat angi _ sa lget _ igaqragh leg t _ .

qalepgute magh ita _ kilgaaqu te kete naqe nghmegteki _ pi aqe ait _ .
qalepgute magh meng _ entaqun _ suka mun _ pi sigh t _ .

ayuqe yaghpete ut _ taawa _ .
K ii- ii _ , _ llangaqa _ sa meng _ itagnagh nghite ngugh mun _ pi lleghqagh meng _ nanevgagh t _ iis kugh t iir eg at _ .

taana _ aghyuutagh lleghpigagh u uq _ ifkaghte te _ , _ tamlu nkut _ ata at _ .
me a _ qaay v an lenguq _ , _ iknaqe u aq _ .
nuughtugh kanigh anka _ , _ iitek _ tughumgha kayugu luki _ .
iknaqe pigte uq _ ifkaghte te _ taana _ .
Y aavg aghs iinkut _ , _ egmigh u aghte te nkut _ iknaq ngwaagh uyagh pe tut _ ivenrugh ta nge i tete luku _ tamaani _ .
angu ghllag kaqe a _ , _ atuq egh l ak aqaa _ , _ ayghigh te luku _ whanga qun _ meghnugh igate unga _ , _ ayghigh te luku _ .

taawa _ elngaatall _ unaagh ghhagh aneng _ amsanagh u nghaani _ taawa _ y aav uqu meng _ .
Kay ung lluta _ , _ kay ung lluta _ , _ neghaali aqe luta _ .

A ngwaagh ataq uut _ .
ila i _ , _ kii _ sukate pigte aqe ut _ .

pisagh lghiikut _ , _ ii-ii _ , _ aga _ nusug kestagh ainkut _ taakut _ ighneghqagh an _ taam _ .

maalghug gneng _ nanghiigh aqe aqa _ .

nanevgagh m _ aag us aq min ikut _ yaavuquute put _ taakw an leng ugh ni _ yaavuquute itnun _ pill g ill iq asim aghmeng _ .

ii _ , _ esgha _ seghleghllug u ma lghii _ yuug _ taana _ .
aagken llu _ ivenruute _ allgegh kestaamaan _ , _ Uz iv us iin kutgun _ angwaaghtugh lunga _ , _ ivenrugh magh emta _ , _ telaananga magh emta _ , _ aga _ sivu mnni _ , _ aga _ amu aqe aput _ , _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh aput _ , _ aga _ iivagh yalghiimeng _ .

A Q E LL Q A GH N I I Q
Ap ang al uum _ apegh llegh a _ 
neghigh luku _ sa u aat _ yug t _ naken _ kaate nghata _ maakumiu u nghite ngugh t _ aqelqagh t _ .
sivuqagh m _ iglegh neghani _ tamaakut _ aqelqagh t _ kaate nghata _ nanghiigh yaghqau aqe lghiit _ , _ iknaq e tul ngi _ , _ suk atu l ngi _ .
kiyang _ ungazigh meng _ pamaken _ pangeghte aat _ pi nghata _ , _ taaku nguut _ aqelqaghniigh yug aqe kangit _ , _ tea- ma anun _ pagsinga na lghiit _ .
tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pinaghvig mi _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ angutughvig mi _ pangegh t _ kaate nghata _ pamaken _ angyagh t _ , _ ilangakun _ family-tuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ akilpegagh na luteng llu _ , _ pirughte na luteng _ pangeghte aqe lghiit _ .
iwernga _ taan anguuq _ aange lghii _ aqelqaghniigh llegh _ , _ talwa _ ilangakun _ aqelqagh t _ neghe ste gpenaki _ piinligh qagh yu k _ .
tawaten _ piinligh qagh yu k _ , _ yuug _ mat- ke ma ai _ ayaviightuumagh mi _ qellinegh mun _ esnevagh aqe uq _ .
tawaten _ yug meng _ esgh h aan neghmeggni _ liigike aqe aat _ sa naqute anga _ .
aqfaqugh vig mi _ uzivgagh aqe uq _ , _ nul angll ameng _ ategh leg _ .
kina _ alngunak _ yuug _ ateghaate aqe uq _ aqf aquq _ piinligh nghaani _ .
nukalpigagh _ iingunagh mi _ avelghagh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ tawavek _ .
siivanllegh t _ iiskughte i aqe ut _ kina _ avelghagh na yu kan _ .
kina _ nukalpigagh _ avelghagh kuni _ repall _ kayngu nagh lgigh a _ .
tawani _ aqfaqugh te lghiit _ nula ghllag negh meggni _ suk aagh sim aghmeng _ lliigh aqe ut _ .
paghyugh lghii _ tunuvagh magh mi _ , _ qenwat _ qafsin Ê¼g gaagh taqut _ .
paghyugh uute luni _ tunuvagh uute nghaani _ taana _ paghyugh neghllug _ kayaalqe i i aqe uq _ .
sivuqagh _ qamagte luni _ pagsinga aqe uq _ tawani _ , _ qellinegh mun _ tagilagh aat egh lag aquq _ aqelq aghniigh mun _ esghapag yagh te aqe uq _ ingl uks uug ullghii meng _ .
aqelqagh t _ aqelqaghniigh aqe ait _ , _ naligh t _ pinigh ta i _ .

peghleghte luni _ utaqa i aqe uq _ teskan ani _ .
taana _ tughumgh ameng _ ategh leg _ .

qenwat _ iknaqe llegh t _ siipte aqe ut _ taawa _ taana _ kina _ ategh ta igh te nghmini _ kayaalqe i i aqe uq _ .
neqamike lleg mni _ maa kum iin Ê¼nguq _ kayaalqe sigate ut _ .

ama _ tughumgha te mi _ , _ iknaqe lghiit _ , _ tughumgha lleg t _ yug iq eng egkayug et _ .

sa u a _ puyg aagh lluku _ tamaghhagh mi _ teghigniqe te aqe uq _ tawani _ .
sivuqagh m _ K I Y A GH T AA LL GH A _ 19 3 0 - N I
Aku l k im _ apegh llegh a _ 
tamaani _ us iis teghllag em _ kiig nghaani _ saghya _ kaa tut kay u wa _ .

estamagnegh t _ dr um -et _ usi ke kayug i _ enkaam _ tapghagh meng _ qaamqaghte luki _ yug t _ uglagh te luki _ sayug aqe luki _ , _ enkaam _ qute meng _ up- llghite aghtagh luki _ tunuvagh aqe luki _ .

C AA - t _ sivuligh _ mangteghaghqagh at _ qamughtugh ghhagh m _ , _ ategh a _ B o z o _ , _ tagite kaqe a _ maavek _ b ar g e- e kun _ .

aga _ mangteghagh t _ nekefte qugh na aqe magh ita _ pi kaqe ait _ .

Pel aa sim _ apegh llegh a _ 
mangteghasqwaagh t _ sivuke naqe anka _ kiig mi _ atugh t _ . _ Uglagh tal estun _ angka i ta _ ulima aqe lghiit _ .
ungavig u ut _ amigh t _ ighivg anghani _ nekegte luki _ qavaa te kayug ni _ , _ nanigh ligh luki _ .
ila i _ mangtegh as qwaagh aqut _ inglu ke te luki _ ten t- astun _ ayuqe luki _ , _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ kiig mi _ nayugh put _ .
aghte nghaani _ ung avig es _ taakut _ , _ taghnughhagh t llu _ taghtugh qu uute nghata _ , _ iike luki _ uteghmun _ petug aqe ut _ .

iwernga _ kiyaghfig t _ kiilqusigh _ .

aghveghaqetagh u ut _ qukaa n _ pi i _ .
taakut _ ateghte luki _ sivuke luki _ qeghagh t _ unaami _ atughqagh t _ .

alla neng _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh luki _ .

taakut _ aghveghaqetagh t _ sivuke luteng _ napaghte aqe ut _ , _ siiv an taqut _ qukaanite nghite ut _ .

peghu luki _ petug tegh luki _ estam aneng _ .
