Tawaten Ê¼nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ pi aqe kangat _ , _ 
Ii _ aghnaghagh penaagh u luteng _ ellngit _ aghnagh all eg aat _ entaqun _ .
ii _ pi neghmegteki _ , _ aghnaghagh llegagh t _ ellngit _ ang vig apig tut _ 
kiyalighagh mii t _ pi nghmegteki _ atku gu lluteng _ , _ yug i _ angvigagh pigte ut _ 
pi nghmegteki _ tagtalmi _ atkug te luteng _ , _ aate kau uute luteng _ tes q aga _ 
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ nagh uy am enguq _ atkug pag ulluteng _ .
pi nghmegteki _ T ul iinkut _ naligh negh it _ atkug ghpagte te luteng _ entaqun _ 
esgha _ , _ nalighnegh it _ maaten _ entaqun _ kiwatangaghmii t _ ukut _ 
qangeghsagh mii t _ , _ P ung ugh miit _ kiwatangaghmii t _ elngaatall _ 
kiwatangaghmii u na iqe ait _ , _ pungughmii t _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
Pin aay am _ nuyek lighpig aan iiq aa _ P et g enghh aq _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ 
Mekelghii gh uluteng _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ petgegh nghhagh _ aag na _ , _ aw lug ke i _ aamta _ entaqun _ 
mekelghiigh u luteng _ whaten _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aagna _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aamta _ entaqun _ seghleghllug u ma yagh uq _ met ng egh ull aat aamakanga _ 
Qaw aag yagh yagh luteng _ whaten _ E gh qaagh aam _ gu ut qagh f ikum akanga _ taana _ anengagh mi _ , _ Sivuqami _ qawaagniighusigh at _ 
qawaagyagh yagh luteng _ Sivuq am elluni _ ungipaa _ guute qaghte vike ma kanga _ taana _ aw lug ke i _ 
Taawa _ sivuqagh mete luni _ ungipagh a _ S iqu v eklu _ aghnaghagh u luni _ ugl aghn iiq sagh aa _ 
taawa _ sivuqagh llu _ tawaten _ sa igh kuvek llu _ nagate llegh mini _ uglagh na iqe yagh aa _ .

tanemlleqa _ N gu ung ay am _ nuyek lighpig aan iiq aat _ yug t _ peleghqe kau nghata _ aghnaghaghhagh u luki nguq _ atiiqe aqe yagh ait _ .

enkaam _ whanga _ pi aqe unga _ , _ Pedersen _ tawaten _ , _ tugumiightugh luki _ ighn ist ikayug ulghii kut _ .

Enkaam _ quyngiq _ upenghagh mi _ taawavek _ ivgagh mun _ ighni ste i yagh te aqe lghiit _ , _ 
tawaten _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kanaghtekayugu lghii _ tamaani _ quyng iq a _ 
enkaam _ quyngigh _ keste nghmegteggu _ , _ quyngightutala _ liisima kaqe kangat _ .
tawaten _ ayumiqullegh ni _ , _ repall _ quyngigh ka _ tawan lluki _ , _ 
legan _ naa itnite luki _ nughagh at _ unit qagh lluki _ ighninghhagh u luki _ nalluniigh aqe aput _ apegh iin em teki _ 
naa ita _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ avaqut aghy unegh tuqat _ repall _ unite igate ait _ il amnnun _ nagh pigh tes luki _ manu itnite luki _ inag itnite luki _ nalluniightugh aqe aput _ , _ ighninghhagh ghhagh u luki _ avaqut aghy unegh tuqat _ 
aamta _ ila ita _ angayuqagh ita _ unite qaghte luki _ 
ila i _ tamaakut _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ 4 00 -ngugh tuq _ , _ ila mnnun _ naghpigh ste luki _ nuqnegh ste luki _

four _ sagh l ig angy uq at _ quyngigh ka _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ pinegh mni _ kiyang _ saghligagh meng _ ighni aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ saghligagh nge yuqagh t _ nula rakegte na pigte ut _ quy nigh tuqat _ 
esghaghhu qun _ tawaten _ tuyugh i i aghagh ta mi _ quyngigh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu lghiit _ uksaagh nghaani _ .
seven _ tamaakut _ $ _ 7 00 . 00 -ngugh sim aaqelghii _ tamaakut _ 
Esgha _ taakwavek _ ukavagh magh mi _ 
quyngightuqagh t _ tamaakut _ ig ug iq ameng _ tu yu ghi kayug uy alghiit _ akmavek _ 
esgha _ tawatete laatagh ma lghii _ kayusighi kaaguq _ 
Wetku _ apegh iin ghata _ igug ighkagh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu yagh lghiit _ akmavek _ akilpeg aghn ii neghmeng _ taaq nemta _ unaghsigh u luku _ Boxer _ Jul y mi _ unaghsigh ghhagh u luku _ tagilagh aataq ukut _ , _ umiileg kesagh kanga _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh ghllag kau lghii _ kayusigh i kau lghii _ .
pedersen _ taawa _ kayusigh i kau uq _ sangwaa _ ilanga _ akilpegagh niigh qagh yu k _ nemun _ 
wetku _ apeghiigh nghata _ tamaghhaan _ pedersen _ kelengak nguk angat _ akilpegagh niigh nghmeng _ 
kiyang _ ighn ist i _ nalluke kegka _ sa u a _ ila a _ tagil uta _ ne mun _ taakut _ kiyang _ , _ qayughllak _ aqf aaq luku _ 
taakut _ tuunglighh aat _ tamaghhagh an _ quyngigh igh kut _ 
wetku _ ighni ste i _ unaami _ , _ ne mun _ tagi luta _ unaami _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh ke luteng _

N el illeq _ taakut _

neli llegh _ igaghvig ligh llegh _ 
Qer ngugh utut _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _

qerngughte te ut _ meeting- aat _ tawaten _ 
igaghvig _ whaa _ qaake naqe kangat _ .
Naqam _ quut f aghmeng _ tawaten _ umeg negh ugh taqegkanga _ ayvigtegh _ 
ayvigtegh _ sa nigh ite ngughk _ piyaa nigh ite ngughk _ piy ugh ngaagh megteggu _ 
naqam _ suu p utng in aghn ayuk ata _ quunpeng _ umegnegh ughte aqe kanga _ 
ivgagh _ taawna _ nuna kegte aq _ pi yu ghngaaghmegteggu _ atg- ghhaghte neghtuqagh _ suu p uteghllag um aaq egkangi _ 
mangteghagh t _ suupe te inaghte na yu kata _ qenaagh u ta aneng _ nak mi kaat _ 
qayughllak _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ Sivung aq _ kii _ m aag un _ suupute ghllag ma aqe kangi _ qenaagh u lghii _ 
maana _ mesagtu ghngaan _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ nakmike aat _ anuq liq ayuk _ .
aghuliigh aat _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ maagun _ pi naqe aat _ naaf qelluki _ 
aywaa meng _ anuqlighpag igate ngughk _ maana _ ikevagh ghhagh inagh meng _ anuqligh qagh yu k _ quyngigh qwaaghet _

tagi ut _ taghnughhagh teng _ 
taawanginaq _ nani _ tanqigh mi _ puygu ma aqa _ igaghvig _ .
igagh ngllagh llegh mete ngughk _ piy uwh aagh aqng ami _

igagh a _ pi yuwhaagh aqngami _ entaqun _

azigutagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _

Tamaaken _ egll ung ll aghy ag utut _ up- lleghte na yu kaki _ suf lung llagh luteng _

tamaaken _ egllu ngllagh yagute ut _ .

kepugh luki _ ulima kayug it _ .

llaaghanwha _ legan _ Pugughi llgh aghmun _

Maalgh ut _ usi kaa tagh aput _ igaghvig m _ quyng ikun _

ungagagh t _ tamaakut _ talligh ma _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ wetku _ negh yaghqaaghte ma aqe lghiit _ .

negh luteng _ , _ angyagh u aatagh luteng _ taawa _ igleghte ut _ , _

seghleghhalek _ Qet iin a _ enraq _ seghleghu naqe ut _

nuyekligh teng _ entaqun _ naasqugh ke luki _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ tu yuq aghaq iinkut _

esgha _ , _ siqlugagh t _ taakwegkut _ tu yugh aqaat _ .

paninang qun _ salin _ maana _ agh ingh waagh uniiq iit _ .
uziva nkut _ salin _ entaqun _ angyeghetagh _ sa u a _ atuqe u luku _ .
mangtag _ pi r aam si lluku _ qasugh iqe aq _ sa u a _

sanqute t _ Ang l inaq ellgha

eghqwaagh uute aqe luteng _

siknegh _

nalluqagh nge a _ .

kukuleg _

iitek _ qikmigh ghhagh t _ Pugughilegh miit _ angyagh ghhaat _ repall _ qukfighute ste aqe ait _

nasiqe aghte aqe ut _ aga _ piiwagh uute aqe ut _ .

kaviigh meng _ tukfightugh magh mi _ , _ sa meng _ tugute meng _ .
kaviigh niigh llegh _ 
naligh ni _ taakwani _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kaviigh _ akitu pigte uq _ aag aqat _ 
akitu lleghpigagh at _ lii tem llu _ saam _ p iitk eg sim llu _ kaate qaghte luteng _ 
qenghaghtu t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ ayumiqu llghem _ ilangani _ siipngaan _ wallu _ ilangakun _ kaviigh yag llag aqluni _ .
tamaani _ unangsagh yagute magh ma _ iig sagh aat allgh estun _ kaviigh iigh nigh ughte ngughsi magh ma _ kaviigh niigh utegh llak _ , _ 
kii _ kaviigh t _ pi naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ unake neghllug u laatagh ma ut _ tug ut lug gnaq eghll all emtestun _ 
iitek _ malig unnaq aqs alghiinga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ nagun _ aag aqe aat _ .
tagtalmi _ liite te m llu _ , _ kii p aghq enghani _ , _ 
tawaten _ kaviigh niigh aatagh llegh mi _ .
maaten _ katam _ iigsagh aatagh llegh stun _ 
kaviigh nge naqe te perewaagh ghllag _ iwerngaqun _ katam _ maaten _ tugutlugte naqe ghllag lleg mtestun _ um ellgh anun _ 
amenam _ maligte te nagh kaqsagh lghiinga _ 
aghulaqe uute aqe uq _ elngaatall _ F eb ru ar y _ naang ellgh anun _ .
uuvganeng _ yataaghqesagh te aqe uq _ sii f qall ghem _

Nan uq
U uv g aneng _ legan _ nan ugh tuuq _ naangellegh anun _

maaten _ .

Ay w aanun _ qituk _ aange pigte uq _ .

naqam _ tume t _ tamaa _ esghaate gpenanga _ qiiv umalghii _ 
Nan umeng _ esghaa sigal nguunga _ 
aywaa nun _ teve yaghtugh negh mni _ uteghte aqe lunga _ uqig llak _ 
aga _ aywaa n _ esne a _ aliinegh mkun _ uteghte aqe unga _ tesamavek _ 
tawaten _ alla _ esgha _ , _ taana _ esghaa tegpen anga _ .

nanugh meng _ esghaate igate ngugh u nga _ .

wiin _ ama _ esghaghluku _ llaaghinaan _ ama _ q itu k _

amu a ngam nguq _ pike a _ nan uq _

nutem llu _ tughwaagh ma kanga _ ggin aq ulluki _ 
A allgha _ liigikngwaagh luku _ nanugh _ aallgha _ liigik laagh penaan _ 
paninang _ esghaate na qaghte aqe unga _ , _ aviite u aghte ut _ negh n iim sug llak _ 
naqam _ satun _ el peg y uk _ .

salngagkwaagh u ni lukek _ yeghlegi _ , _ aange pigte uq _ Entaqun _ entaqun _ maaqute kanga _ , _ kezemtagh ghllag _ taana _ . _

waaknanigh ukut _ kenleng is aghtuq _ tagi ukut _ .

Tawaten _ yugkagh megteggun qun _ pi na iqe kangit _ kenleng is aghtuq _ .
Upengh ami _ neqnigh u llegh at _ 
ggayegllug m _ apegh llegh a _ 
neqnigh u llegh _ kenle ite yagh uq _ 
iwerngaqun _ unake yu llegh megestun _ whaten _ unake kayugu yagh aat _ ayuq s alghiit _ 
tawaten _ nate t kan igh mi _ unake lleghqagh meng _ kenle ite yagh uq _ yu pag ilnguut _ 
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ angyaghtu negh meggni _ naamakaghte na iqe lghiit _ ang yaq ayug uyagh tut _ pi nga yu neng _ 
ayveghagh llegh m _ uglaghtala a _ uglagh tal anga _ neghighluku _ .
yupig ii negh ghllag u aqe yagh lghiit _ angyagh yuwh aagh tunga _ 
ila i _ aamta _ whaten _ yug pagite aqe luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ , _

aamtaam _ , _ pi lghii ni _ neghqugh na lghii _

Aghnam _ paye a _ kenegh meng _ aane uten _ .
qaaqagh m _ tawaten _ milugh lghii stun _ pi aqe luta _ alleg luta _ amsik aghagh taak _ kaam g egka _ , _ ii kagh agh taak _ taawa _ kayag taanga _ alligh amun _ ilakwaagh i _ 
tea- ngatu llu _ whangkutung _ yug ghllag m _ negh naqunga _ aglagh te ainkung _ esneng iighh aakun _ .
kaa llu ta _ itegh ukut _ el ngallu _ 
yug ghllag m _ tu ku pung _ nughagh ak _ maalghug _ 
atkug igh lutung _ itegh unga _ .

aane ukung _ taghtugh t iinkut _

Quyill get _ ungazigh _ 
teghigniqe ukut _ kiyagh sim aluta _ Quyill g aaghh aq _ naghaagh lqusiigh aqe luta _ , _ 
mulu ukut _ tespamani _ anguugh ainkut _ mumigh quut aqegkangat _ .
iwernga _ aghyuqe vig ite ngughk _ tu kumta _ m umig utaq iinkut _ elngaatall _ 
taawa _ pegge nanigh lunga _ , _ maligte te lunga _ tukugh mnun _ qavagh yagute unga _ .
tukugh nka _ taakut _ pi niigh pigte ut _ , _ 
quyilleg t _ kaate ut _ 
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ quyillgaagh ghhagh _ kaa tuq _ mangtegh anun _ qikmigh tuum aghmeng _ taku ugh aghaq eftut _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ 
akuzi igate ngughk _ whangkutestun _ naqam _ 
ungipamsug nghaani _ waa ken ghis atgu _ tukugh mta _ mumigte te aqe ainkut _ neng iighh aak _ 
tea- magh an tuq _ ellnga llu _ tu saq igal k egka _ liite ghraag unga _ 
ila i _ neqamike anka _ paninang _ , _ ila i _ taakut _ quyillgaagh t _ akuzillegh it _ qagh l aaq anka _ 
taana _ atuute llgagh u uq _ enraq _ atugh yaghtugh uq _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ nani _ ken igh aa _

tungsigh niigh llegh it _ tawatete na ait _

nuna an _ alii taqelghiit _

naayghagh i _ naaygh aneng _ p aagken _

metghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ qawaagniigh llegh ke ut _ aan emta _

A as ameng _ , _ aag negh mta _ taakut _ pi inkut _ imani _ Quyill get _ qayugh yagh a _ .
manguna _ whangkutestun _ 
quyngigh t _ awatkaghtagh t _ aqii nghhagh t _ uks ul qusigh llak _ awatangani _ 
Uksumi _ tun uv aghaq luteng _ elngaatall _ awatkaghtagh t _ , _ 
aqii ma aqe lghiit _ tawate teftut _ taagavek _ aki anun _ angyagh kun _ 
naken _ tasigh meng _ tamaakut _ avate meng _ yug nge aqe luteng _ 
aate yameng _ usigh llag luki _ aki anun _ taagavek _ 
quyngighqwaagh t _ quk aanun _ 
P aam na _ quyngigh eng _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ uksulqusigh igh ghllag _ .
uksugh mi _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ pagavek _ mugu aqe luteng _ alig asim aaqelghiit _ quyngigh eng _ negh manginigh sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
atigh llegh i _ tawatete ut _ nuugte naqe negh meggni _ 
enkaam _ m ug un qig sim aaqelghiit _ tamaakut _ upengh aq es tan ghani _ .
iwerngaqun _ usi igh ghllag luki _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ tukf ighi luteng _ 
nunivag m _ qukaa nun _ pamavek _ uksugh mi _ akik luki _ entaqun _ negh vig kegtagh mun _ quyngigh eng _ aghulaqe te aqe luku _ tap ghagh pak _ .
paamna _ ungazigh _ aange pigte lghii _ nuna _ 
tespagani _ uksughte luteng _ tukfigh aghteng _ esne mun _ aligate ma aqe lghiit _ kiiw t _ pinagh lleghqagh i _ 
quyngigh meng _ qikmigh ke luteng _ nategh qaq _ 
taawa _ mugu nqigte ma aqe lghiit _ 
taawa _ tamaaken _ neqenge ma aqe lghiit _ tukfigh i luteng _ , _ tuugte aq _ nas aper ameng _ manguna _ .
manguna t _ tuugtagh u lghiit _ ukut _ co ll ar - ngi _ akike luki _ tanpegh _ qikm iir aaghet _ uyiigh _ iingun iita _ co ll ar - k aqiit _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike ma aqe kangat _ quynginge natke ma aqe kangat _ i wh anil uki _ 
quyilleg t _ tamaakut _ tukfighagh eng _ tapghagh _ quyngigh meggnun _ qall uk aghmeng _ tem kal waa qut _ 
sanqute ke aqe kangat _ m aq aan iiqiit _ nateghqagh _ kameg meggnun _ , _ 
ungazighmii t _ , _ 
esghagh yagh kufsiki _ ungazighmii t _ aatkagh it _ akuz ikayuk _ ilanga _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ nasaperagh meng _ nasagh ke lghiit _ 
taawanginaq _ nagat aqaa _ ukut _ collar-ngi _ maaten _ katam _ qikmiiraagh t _ entaqun _ iingunagh ita _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwavek _ qule mun _ iwhani luki _ nasaperagh meggneng _ taagken _ sigutngiitagh leg meng _ qepe nghmegteki _ legan _ puvite leg t _ .
kameg it _ , _ tawaten _ ila i _ esghaghkagh nka _ at ill qum si llgh atun _ temkag lgu aqe ut _ .
sa u aat _ maqagh u na iqe ait _ aatkagh t _ ama _ imun _ wallu _ atkug ghllag t _ tamaakut _ tawaten _ 
liite qugh yagh unga _ naay ghii tuq _ ungazighmii t _ akuzillegh it _ , _ ila i _ kiw ar ugllak _ talwa _ entaqun _ Kuku leg meng _ 
avate meng _ kenle ke luni _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ 
qiteve a _ nagate aqe a _ tespamani _ , _ aleghquute aqe ut _ katam _ whangkuta _ whaten _ aleghquute negh mta _ estu w ii saghpe tuq _ 
ungazigh _ taana _ ikevaghllug mun _ 
Elngaatall _ iq a _ tawaten _ atigh llegh a _ sivuqagh m _ .
aatnegh leg _ tamaani _ uughqa _ 
taawanginaq _ naayghagh ite uq _ ungazigh _ tam lagh qu llghiit _ neq meggneng _ ukigyaghagh ghhagh inagh _ angyameng _ talwa _ entaqun _ kukuleg meng _ uyatu uq _ naayghagh m _ kenle a _ uughqa neng _

ugriilegh mun _ qimugsigh meng _ akilpegagh yagh te aqe ut _ 
sivuligh mi _ pangeghte aqngama _ kan uug tegh llakat _ 
elngaatall _ iqa _ piniqe aat _ seghleqe igate aat _ tamaani _ .
pelungighsagh yug pagigate yaghpete ut _ tamaani _ sivul iq _ 
tawani _ esghapag aqe yamki _ angyagh t _ esgh aqegka _ neqe meggneng _ 
manguna t _ ugkellikagh t _ putu itgun _ tugu luki _ , _ miluute luki _ taagken _

apeghiigh luteng _ tamaakut _ .

teghigniqe kau unga _ nuna _ alla _

ellngit a _ tawaqa it _ alqegkagh stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ tawaqapig it _ 
K ag im yug um at _ ayuqe ut _ .
pinigh llegh i llu _ unagh sighh aat _ sungaghyug kegtagh u ut _ kayaate llegh i _ 
iknaqe llegh i _ tamaakut _ kiiwhtagh stun _ tawaten _ iqeghtagh atun _ ayuqe ut _ angyaghpag aneng _ llangaqa _ isaah- iqe aghtagh lghii stun _ suq aghmeng _

melugyaghqagh it _ tamaakut _ qellistekagh ghhagh u ut _ taakut _ 
maaten _ entaqun _ .

kuynge ngiighhagh it _ unaghsigh ghhagh t _ ulimaagh ghhagh t _ .

neqenge nanigh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ Elpek _ sivuk luten _ kum ak igh l aken _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh meng _ pi yagh kuma _ entaqun _ negh nayagh ukung _ ighivgaqun _ kum ak igh aa _ .

kii _ sama nguq _ usingigh yalghiimi _ neqe ghllag _ ug ke nga _ qaake ma kanga _ qall aq ughllak _ 
I ilq wa _ pennagh m _ saye aneng _ taakwegken _ aghnagh _ aane luni _ kayusiite luku _ 
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ iq ragh qelluni _ ll ang aq anguq _ igh yaghq es alghiimi _ taameng _ .
kaate yan _ , _ aqum ev yiigh tesluku _ , _ pell ukaa _ sangavek _ neqenge yu igh te ziin _ iigg eng ii _ pii f luki _ 
Un ill uku u _ esgha _ sangama _ tak lagh lluni _ keleng akum akanga _ qay aghhaq _ 
taagken _ aghnagh _ quunpeng _ taglagh yalghiimi _ tamaghhagh an _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ pi ghllag ughte uq _

S ugh ugwet

nenglu _ S iqu vek _ uglaghraag _ qaya _ paamna _ nenglu ligh vig ite ngughk _ tangeghtu ghllag _ .

Negh llak _

sa igh kuvek _

aliigh te nghminigu nguq _ pika _ , _ apeghiigh luni _

aaw yagh ghllag _ imani _ naasqugh ghllag a _ .

utaqa i ni _ pennaghtagh neng _ .

I w emg aqun _ ef lugh waagh aqluki _ uyghag igh tegh waagh aa _ 
Nek eg r aam siigh luni _ kenigh akun _ tukegh lleghtagh ghllag ni _ pin iigh salghiimi _ legan _ ava igh lleg ke ainkut _ quunpeng _

angli naqngu lunga _ 
Nagh aagh u tel guu kut _ apegh llegh a _ 
kiig mi _ tesamani _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ pi c ku p _ 
kii _ sangwaat _ ne mete igate ukut _ .
pennagh ni _ kiyaghte luta _ aga _ nasiqe negh meggni _ qawavek _ naayvagh mun _ .
G uyg umun _ whangkuta _ kuyag nge ma gni _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ neqamik aqa _ 
alpa _ sa u a _ qem tagh llagmi _ pi iqagh ut _ kiilqusigh _ tawani _

Entaqun _ Pedersen -meng _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh ukut _ 
aglagh aqe luta _ tesam an tagh taqluteng _ piiwagh qagh luta _ anglegut mini _ 
angyaghpag kun _ aglagh qaghaqe luta _ tagi aqe luta _ enraq _ 
tagi luta _ qenwat _ ilangi _ ayuqligh _ igaghyagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tuungligh ka _

sivuqaghte negh mta _ nagat ngwaagh nanigh singa _ .
angyaghpag t _ pugughilegh mete luta _ kaate aqe lghiit _ nag ategh llag luki _ .

A mal ka _ piiwagh luta _ aglagh te ainkut _ taaggun _ e x er cise- es teghllag um aaq inkut _

igaghyagh llghite unga _ entaqun _

guygu mun _ whangkuta _ lliigh ukut _ , _ neqamike aqa _ saam _

iwernga _ megh kun _ pugughilegh m _ negh ka aneng _ anagkagh t _ entaqun _ , _

taakut _ itghagh tke ai _ aki vig nkut _ , _ tagnegh linkut _ panig ni _ ila i _ , _

nanevgaghtagh mta _ ungipagh iqe te igate kanginkut _ , _ 
Qaat gi _ pugughilegh mun _ piyug uute ghllag negh meggni _ upenghagh mi _ .
sagnegh _ pakegtekagh _ atu ug ut _ akmag ke luku _ qayugh te aq _ allak aghmeng _ 
sukilpagh mun _ atkug wet _ qawaag m _ amighqwaagh anun _ 
kiyang _ aate kau yaghpete ut _ 
esghaghteqagh nka _ angayuqagh ma _ naa ma _ ulima aqe kangi _ qaas liq luki _

naghuyagh t _ kavigh lluki _ ngelqagh stun _ taakut _ , _ 
sukilpagh t _ aat kay ugwet _ .
akmaliighagh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ sang ita _ atkug u luteng _ naligh negh ita _ upengh aan negh at n inguq _

Pugughilegh miit
Pugughilegh mi _ ngelqagh at _ angayuq akek _ naghuyagh t _ Iteghyagh aankuk _ 
qateg i _ ukut _ atugh aqe ut _ qamagte luteng _ 
qateg i _ allakagh meng _ atugh u ut _ , _ salleg i _ allakagh meng _ 
pinighhalek _ Atgh aang ankut _ maqagh ghhalek _ Aglugh aankut _ 
ghhuu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh t _ taakut _ 
aghsughtagh ghhagh meng _ kiigh mig luki _ nayag i _ ngelqagh at _ qaasligh ke luki _ T aq aang ankut _ 
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ sak aa _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ amigh t _ taakut _ megh mi _ tuqukaq _ , _ pinighhalek _ Ag aam llu _

sa eng _ nayag eng _ taana _ 
talwa _ esghaghkagh nka _ tawaqapig i _ avii tut _ 
sungaghyug kegtagh ghllag t _ ququngagh ghllag t _ iknaqe ghllaget _ tawaqa t _ qawaag t ateng _ 
ila i _ sungaghyaag u aqe luteng _ agh ip a tuumaghmi _

pugughileghmii t _

qule u yaghpete ukut _ pi nga yu t _ siipnegh ke luki _ .

taku luku _ aaggun _ uyavagh qu te _ 
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ avii tu lluta _ , _ alinge yu ke gpenanga _ tea- ai _ taku nga _ .

pi niigh luni _ ungipamsug kekagh a _ kingu liigh aq _ 
lengaaghsi magh mi _ iim na _ qelmeghte magh mi _ .

Taghnughh aq _ taakwani _ kiig mi _ qikmigh at _

nenglu i _ estamat _ yugtu ghllaget _ Pugughilegh mun _ 
aatghute ghllag negh meggni nguq _ K uk iy anga _ unite luku _ .

tesamani _ esnagh mi _ naghaagh te ghllag aqe lghiit _ .

Ag aq _ taghnughhagh ghllag _ .
Iteghyagh aq _ n ayuq eghllak aqaqa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ 
taamna _ taghnughhagh igh vig _ tagh tuq aagunga _ naghaagh vig it _ 
taghnughhagh _ naghaagh yagh te ghllag aqe lghii _ taamavek _ , _ 
esghaghhu _ taakut _ kaave ghllag ma ut _ qula at _ ellngani _ 
sama _ taghnughhagh a _ qavagh laatagh lunga _ peghu ghllag qagh a _ naghaagh vig at _ .

ayapghute m _ apegh llegh a _ 
whanga _ ayapghute u unga _ malghug neghet _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ panig a _ taakut _ ping ayuq luki _ panig a _

ayumiqullegh _ ataasigh _ whang aqun _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh kanga _ 
napaqagh ghhagh meng _ 1 7 _ year s- ngugh sim aghma _ maavek _ 
tesamani _ liite unga _ enkaam _ 
Sameng _ agh angil ngu ulghiit _ tesamani _ , _ 
sivugh qaghte luni _ sivuqagh meng _ maaken _ 
qikmigh ghhagh inagh ghhagh a _ aglagh aq luta _ piigh aataq ani _ apegh kaqe a _ 
napaqagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ liite unga _ , _ 
liisagh lghiinga _ maaken _ neqeng llagh luteng _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut llu _ .
taakut _ mangtegh ii sagh tukut _ allakagh mete ut _ 
Taz ik na _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ I vig ugwem _ 
itegh yagh aq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ M aay aankut _ 
Upengh ami _ aghuliigh yaghtugh magh an _ taghtugh kau unga _ , _ 
taawa _ ingaghte luni _ qinuyug u uq _ un akugh aqut _ ighu a _ uki nga lghii _ sa u aat qun _ 
iwerngaqun _ manu ani _ tawani _ qavagh aqe lunga _ ellnga ni _ .
Tapgh aat _ tawaten _ qavagh laatagh lunga _ taghtugh yalghiinga _ nuugte ma kangatnga _ kel ev ulluteng _ 
pi yalghiinga _ tuquma lghii _ .
Wh ateng waaq _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke aat _ keleng ar uugh ni _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ nan ugh tuqaq _ 
liite lleg mni _ ne t _ malghugnegh t _ iwerngaqun _ atghagh u yankut _ taakut _ 
tawaten _ kiyaghtekayug ni _ uksughte aqe luta _ kiigtagh ke luta _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh aqe luki _ .
sivuqagh m _ , _ whanga qun _ nalluke yagh aqa _ taana _ 
whanga qun _ igh leg yag ut aqegkanginkut _ , _ maavek _ lliigh kau unga _ iis kugh taq egk anginkut _ 
Qayughllak _ neq emnneng _ enkaam _ maavek _ sivuqagh mun _ tawaten _ agha leg nun _ 
sa meng _ agha ite ngugh u lghiit _ tesamani _ .
maapi i aghagh u aatagh llegh ut _ liisimake aqa _ kay nga _ 
maapi luta _ aglagh aqe luta _ pi iigh aataghkagh ni _ kingu lighpig aagh tekat _ 
Taawa _ aqfa aqe kanginkut _ Sivuqamun _ lliigh waagh tuq _ iil qay uk anil ghii _ yugw ii tem _ 
enkaam _ maaken _ neqe ngllagh luteng _ aglagh te aqe luta _ nuy aaghq iin ayuk amta _ 
maani _ mangteghagh ite yagh ukut _ al iighh negh agu _ 
tazikna _ kitum _ nengy um ta _ ungipamsug wa _ Iteghyagh aam _ 
taakut _ liisimake anka _ angyaghpag et _ kaalluteng _ te ach er- k aghqaq _ alike magh ita _ esghagh kaqe anka _ .
upenghagh mi _ neqe niigh aqe ut _ esavghagh luteng _ esgha _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ 
Napaqaghh aankut _ elngaatall _ tawani _ Nek reg ut enkut _ inwa _ ghhuugh ghhagh mun _ nagnegh luteng _ 
kuuvragh kun _ negaghpag kun _ maagun _ .

Mangtegh as qwaagh mi _ uksulqusigh _ ayag yul ighluki _ 
akuute luki _ taakut _ ayag yu put _ 
Aghnegh taq elghiikut _ pi ghllag nghatgu _ qay ung ll aghaq luta _ tengertagh igh yu neghtu ghllag _ 
tengertagh t _ tenge kayugu na iqe kangit _ eslallug mi _ taawanginaq _ 
A lii negh mi _ uglagh ghllag t _ qag ani _ 
sagnegh u aaghet _ takeriig t _ tamaagun _ tengertagh meng _

tenge ma na ait _ naqam _ liis alghiinga _

nalighmeng _ mesiigh i _ naayv aq _ nalighmeng _ , _ anagte lghii ni _ tawatete ut _ mangtegh aghtu utaqut _ 
ila i _ ghhuughpagtagh pigesnagh luteng _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ , _

Uy v as aghq a

kii _

uyvasaghqe a _ 
uyvasaghqe a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u uq _ qan in aqelghiit _

qani _

entaqun _ imani _ maligte luteng _

kiyang _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ megh mi _ qinegh sagh tuumalghii _ peleghqekagh t _ atiiqe aqe ait _ aghnagh ghhagh u luki _ nap aghluku _

kiyang _ ategh t _ yeghrat _ taake ghllag lghiit _ takelli luki _ ugh neg mi _ asinganun _ 
amalka _ kuug g Ê¼gh aan _ iv aamakanga _ taake yagute luku _ makigh meng _ tuqlughagh ta m _ qenwat _ ateligh te a _ taana _ ategh _ pi z igu _ mat- ke i _ â
taghnughhagh t llu _ salin _ akuzi yaaghte gpenateng _ atigh llegh it _ ila ita _ 
katam _ sag iqu lluku _ ategh _ elngaatall _

pi nga yu a _

ategh ik _ aqef tagh aaghh ani _ nusug luku _ am sigh qu ugh tegh umakangi _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _

ilughagh ghhagh a _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ m ev lu ug tet _ nagat ii _ aatkagh kegte aq _ piiq unnguq _ pinitun _ kiyaghte aagh _ kaki ghllag _ quunpeng _ , _ 
taana _ taghtugh saq unaan _ meghnaal il i _ . _ â
alla _ tawaten _ kaki ma luku _ , _ kaam g etlu _ taakut _ avii tut _ .

aga _ aane magh an _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ naten _ tekegh ni _ qenwat _ asi liit _ ten- ke i vike luku _ .

Ungipagh aninguq _ imani _ , _ mekelghiighh aan kug nguq _ maaten _ sivuligh meng _ aagken _ elngaatall _ siqinegh _

iiyagh ghhagh inagh leg _ 
Umiileg llagmun _ apegh llegh a _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh nkuk nguq _ taake uk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ nenglu mi _ kiyaghte aaghek _ enkaam _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane igate ngughk _ sa luni _ aane li _ aatkagh ite ngughk _ â _

quunpeng _ tawaten _ kiyaghte aagh _

alla nguq _ tawaten _ taz inga _ , _ umiilgem _ maalghug _ aghnagh aper ug waaghmeng _ aag llegh a _ .

qaywa nguq _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ighleke yagh aa _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aate luten _ angyagh naqe ziin _ , _ enkaam _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ .

tawavek _ qaak luku _ esnevagh ma lghii _ aghveng y ii teghllak _ yaywaalingiighhagh _

siinge luku nguq _ aga nguq _ kete aqe ut _

Taawanguq _ anagutagh mete te _ neghigh luku _ apegh llegh a _

anipa ghrug _ angegh ma lghii _ 
Ungipagh aninguq _ ketfagh ma ka ak _ .
N em inguq _ taana _ nanigh m _ ellngagh ta aneng _ angyagh u utaqelghiit _ qulmesiite m _ puyugh aneng _ akuutekagh meng _ 
anipaghllag nguq _ tamaan teftuq _ ne mi _ tamaani _ repall nguq _ qavaa ma lghii _ ighnegh ilnguq _

taaqe luku _ yugw is ag aqelghii _ qayughllak _

tugu luku nguq _ miluute a _ angyagh m _ neng lung anun _ , _

akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ akmag ke luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ nuqe simalghii _

yug m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ â _ K ay _ , _ w al en qakun _ !

allameng _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ â _ Umiileg put _ neqmeng _ aglaat igu _ , _ el qwaagh meng _ ugi ke yukagh nghite zinga _ . _ â

A min aq umalghii _ ataasiq _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ 
nayag an _ aanqute ma kanga _ Aghhaghhangaaw raq _ 
liisimake a _ taaq luku _ amiir igh penaan _ ayag nge i yu a _ iteghluni _ year- nge i yanga _ .

nagu _ aghula stekaghqagh ka _ teghla _

tefaay _ taaq luku _

ila a _ qayaghtu luni _ .

maaten _ ilangani _ aligh umakanga _ .

aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ aapsimakanga _ taku ma kanga _ â _ 
kaate luku _ pi ma kanga _ q ug il igh ll alghiinga _ , _ enta _ qeteghten _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh _ qeteghte ma lghii _ mengtegh aghllag mun _ 
qeteghte yan _ .
tuqute yamigu _ amiiragh ghhagh a _ qapigh ma kanga _ pimakangi _ 
qapigh yamigu _ taghnughh aq ulluni _ aate ma kanga _ . _ 
aate luku _ ellnga tun _ kel gugh aa _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ yuug _ qineghte ma lghii _ . _ 
pi ma lghii _ aq nil ghii _ esghagh yaqenni _ naagu _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ anegh taq eftuq _ ken eghmeng _ 
Mul unghituq _ akite ma kanga _ nunalgut angit _ tagilaghaa simalghiit _ taawa _ 
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ nanevg aq ulluteng _ aghnal qwaa qu lluteng _ aqfa amken _ leg anqun _ 
umiileg ut _ inga _ aqnigh aqe uq _ En tan an iq qaam teggu _ 
aglagh qagh a _ aghnam _ nan iq _ 
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ aglagh nayagh unga _ taawanginaq _ â _ Enta _ kayusigh tengnga _ 
Kina _ amagh laken _ ilagaat mineng _ ilag aghl i _ 
Iiwen _ aa-a _ temngi _ ar aghl i _ 
taagken _ aan qus kuma _ nekeve ma lghii _ . _ 
nekeve yan _ yug m _ amagh ma kanga _ aan qu tuq _ 
amagh yagh kete ni _ uqigtu uq _ ilagaat meggneng _ 
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
Ar aasim aluki _ qayughllak _ qugili ghllag lghiinga _ aq nil ghii _ saama _ alignagh m _ .
yug m _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mengteghagh ghllag mun _ .
itghute ma kanga _ aan qagh simalghii _ 
taagken _ taagken _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kangi _ 
qamagte luni _ taghnughhagh ke te luni _ tagi laghate li _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kelgugh aa _ qamagte luku _ itghu simakanga _ 
It gh ulluku _ kumagh simakanga _ qamagte aqa _ 
Ug ini _ aqnigh lghii _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ .

ata an _ tapghagh _ .
qenwat _ naayghagh mun _ talughsi ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ata an _ amu ma kanga _ 
tamlag ma lghii _ atghagh laat aamalghii _ 
tamlag yalghiimi _ unaagh nge ughtagh ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _

unaami _ taglaamalghii _ aapute ma lghii _ 
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ sav in aakun _ 
Nal ug luni _ sagiqe ma lghii _ it qagh te simakek _ 
ata an _ angegh ma kanga _ 
Taagken _ tagl ar ag kiigh umalghii _ 
alla _ ata an _ aaghhe ste laatagh ma kanga _ .
Megh nugh yay ek _ temngi _ taagavek _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ iitgh atagh aamalghii _ 
qenwat _ talugh qaghte ma lghii _ in qun am en _ 
T aglaamalghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ 
Iglegh utkelluku _ taku yagh aa _ megh n uum alghiik _ 
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ naallgh unnaq sagh aak _ 
mulu luni _ uyavagh qu te _ puug ma lghii _ 
puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ taana _ 
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ .

puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ puug laatagh uq _ aangghumakanga _ 
taku kestagh ghngaaghmigu _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ aghulaqumalghii _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh ma luku _ sukilpagh _ savinagh akun _ qaya m _ nalug uq _ 
nalug luni _ kaa simalghii _ yuuk _ sugrug gni _ pil ug uk elghii _ 
Qayaqsighvik _ naqam _ 
taagken _ taglagh ragkiigh ma lghii _ pil ug uk elghii m _ 
Yugem _ aglu kek _ meghnugh ma lghiik _ pimakanga _ 
meghnugh yayek _ igh uni _ sukilpagh _ wata _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ uullgh aghsimalghii _ 
Yugem _ pimakanga _ , _ itegh na yu kan _ P ig penanga _ 
taglagh ma lghii _ taa qumakanga _

naallghute na lukek _ aglu gni _ nekev yalghiimi _ sukilpagh _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ pang alg aqeftuq _ taawanginaq _

Taam _ sagiqe ma lghii _ aapsimakanga _ 
ata an _ llaaghanwha _ angegh ma kanga _ . _ 
llaaghanwha _ yug rukutaaghllak _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .

aqumga ma luku _ kaate ma lghii _ yuug _ 
Qayaqsighvik _ naqam _ naatghigh lleg leg _ 
yug m _ savikenghaagh neng _ 
yug m _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii m _

Nanevg aghhaam _ taaqe ma kanga _ tagl aasimakanga _ 
taagken _ yug m _ pilugug ni _ tuune ma kangi _ tuqu sigh waal ghii _

ila i _ unange uute aqe lghiit _ nekevluni _ 
ila ngam _ yuug _ taana _ mughute ma lghii _ .

afsengagh ghhagh _ 
iimnanguq _ ilag agh laataghtuq _ afsengagh ghhagh _ meqsaghtugh ma lghii _ naayvagh m _ qukaa nun _ kan akiii _

Allameng _ ilag agh laataghtuq _

Qamagtuq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ 
Aghnagh aghhaat _ tallim at _ sikig _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ taku m akangi _ ketfagh a _ 
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ kan aghqu u simakangi _ .
papegtu uten _ pe tugum akangi _ .
Taaq luki _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ , _ 
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ .
Un illuku _ aglaamalghii _ ukazigh _ 
sunanguq _ taana _ ukazigh ghhagh _ ketfagh a _ naghugh simalghii _ 
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aag y uq _ llagh an _ awite te n _ item ute qagh tikut _ 
papeg n _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ yug pesi _ unak naq aqiinkut _ 
ukazigh ghhagh _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ aag na _ 
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ naghugh simalghii _ .
â _ Me tegh llu r uk _ kaynge _ llagh an yugg ay eng aalghii ten _ , _ item ute qagh tikut _ . _ â

ketfagh te kete luku _ afsengagh ghhagh _ pateg ma kanga _ . _ 
papeg a _ kepkagh ma kanga _ naghugh simalghii _ 
tawaten _ kaynge m _ afsengagh ghhagh _ kayusigh ma kanga _ yugg ay eng aalghii ten _ 
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ . _ 
mayeraaghpag _ 
aghnaghaghhagh t _ tallimat _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ â _ 
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ â _ 
kaate luki _ ag ugh aghsimalghii _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ 
unaghsigh ghllag mun _ petug ma kangi _ 
taaqe luki _ pi yagh kete ni _ 
unaghsigh _ tagh s anegh em n g _ aghtugh luku _ 
unite luku _ aglagh ma lghii _ qil ev ri meng _ 
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ aga _ kaynge ghllag _ naghughte ma lghii _ 
Kaalluni _ kaynge ghllag _ aagyuq _ pilag umakanga _ .
P ag ungh aat _ if aquu simalghiit _ yug gpesi _ 
â _ sa qrugte aqe uq _ aagna _ iy er uug et _ ! _ 
aga nguq _ pilag yaqenni _ naghughte ma lghii _ iq elq wa _ 
Enkaam _ qiy amalghii _ aagyuq _ â _ K ek a _ iteme teqaghti kut _ kum aghqugh tek elleq aghpenga _ ! _ 
â _ iteme teqaghte naanghite amsi _ uv eg lluten _ 
aantagh ni _ itghu simakanga _ .
aga _ kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte ma lghii _ aan aghll anga _ 
â _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aagyuq _ llaaghan _ ? _ iteme teqaghti kut _ 
â _ iteme teqaghte na aqe amsi _ atkug llag en _ aall ukek _ 
taku luki _ aapte ma kangi _ uy at iigh luku _ .
aghnaghaghhagh t _ apeghtugh ma kanga _ yugg aak _ tapgh ami _ pi gu _ uqfig _ 
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Yug g agka _ al iighh agh tuk _ aa aa _ 
unaghsigh igh ghllag _ Pan ik ell em aay _ sameng _ 
iteme te ma kangi _ Aat ak _ 
aanleghaate ma lghiit _ yugek _

taake uk _ .

aglagh te luku _ itghute ma kanga _ qiip umalghii _

taagken _ yug k _ 
mayeraaghpag m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ nuligh qullghiik _ .

qimag inagh ma luki _ kaate yaghtu ma kangi _ .

Llaaghanwha _ taglagh yalghiimi _ naten _ .

itghute ma kangi _ yuggaq _

Llaaghanwha _ naange yan _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ piyaa ma lghii _ pennagh m _ matagh simakanga _ .

nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ unaami _ qatelghii ng iighhaq _ 
yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ aglaamalghii _ .
nategh mun _ tawavek _ itegh i _ ungipagh su umakanga _ , _ 
â _ pi ma kanga _ penn am _ tung anganeng _ gaagh te gu _ aqelqagh _ 
llaaghanwha _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ itegh ma lghiik _ 
ugke t _ ugute yata _ aghnagh m _ itghute luki _ negh ma lghiit _ nuliil ek _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ pi ma lghii _ tukugh _ 
sukate lunga _ itegh naagh unga _ upugh a simakanga _ iitgh es qum aan _

maateqwaaqun _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ .

Meteghll uk nuug umalghii _ .
sangan _ aate zigu _ nengl aghq w aamalghii _ 
sagiqe ste pigte an _ aq el qam i _ 
esleqeaghaghte an _ !

Agl aamalghii _ pi ma kanga _ pirugh t angun ani _ .

Qav aghluteng _ unaami _ qageghqugh lukek _ unite ma kanga _ .
kingu aneng _ amaa m _ qatelghii m _ .
U nun gh agu _ aghuliigh luni _ 
qategh lghii _ ayaa luni _ panegh luni _ tuquma lghii _ iq un igh sim aaqelghii _ 
qamagte uq _ iq un igh llegh amun _ 
aghnagh aq _ uyughagh leg _ 
aghnagh aq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ uyughagh leg _ taam _ 
mekelghiigh _ aane igate ngughk _ quunpeng _ qem imeng _ .
nayag a _ quyngighqwaagh aqe lghii _ aag umalghii _ 
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh luni _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ .
aghnagh aq _ quyngigh mun _ aghulaqe nghmini _ quyngighqwaagh te kete luku _ ulape aqe lghii _ tungang anilnguut _ 
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh niigh aqe lghii _ saama _ pilugug meng _ ukini aqe lghii _ .
uyughagh ni _ qelegh aqe yagh kanga _ waran _ taagken _ aane aghte aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga llu _ mekelghiigh _ suk ate llegh pig aa _ aghnaghaq _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnaghaq _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
miite ta lgigh a _ seghleghu lghiiten _ kay alq aqegkangi _ 
taawa _ whaa _ kay alq iil ghii _ ifla naqngu uq _ nulightugh yaghqaq _ 
saama _ elpek _ langetaq _ mengteghagh igh te naqe uten _ .

avangite unga _ 
Kiyagh simalghii _ weni _ ilagagh a _ nunami _ qaagkut _ av angilnguq _ nunalgut angilnguq _ .

nutaan _ anagu naqe yagh aat _ piy an iigh aqelghii _

G aagh nii neghmeng _ saguyagh k _ kallagte ma kek _ kallagte tkellug kek _ aanqute yalghiimi _ ing liigh luni _ qav aghaqelghii _ .

talwa llu _ sikig meng _ akit kun _ aqumumalghii _ 
naqam _ quunpeng _ negh nav reg aq _ pimakanga _ 
piyaa vig meng _ kaate nghmini _ ellmi neng _ gaagh niigh aqe lghii _ â
gaagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ negh luni _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ ingliigh luni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .

unange luni _ uteghnigh nghmini _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig t _ afta luki _ aymaake it _ gaagh aqe kangi _ amiiragh it _ kinegh ngllagh aqe kangi _ ! _ 
ingleghqagh u luki _ naliini _ tanpeghqagh u luki _ ay im simak anganga _ 
U ugh qaghlluni _ maaten _ kan aghqu usimalghiit _ taghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ eg llu m _ esnighqwagh na luni _ agagh simalghiit _

taana _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ 
taglagh luni _ yuuk _ mengteghagh m _ esl amun _ amigh _ 
ukigllug qu _ iitghumalghii _ .
Iteghyalghiimi _ ung av ik _ unguva an _ apeghiigh s aamalghii _ .
kepe luku _ almesigh tun _ petug ma kanga _ 
taagken _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ kilgaa nun _ .
piyaa vig mi _ qem ineng _ sikig meng _ meteghlluk _ 
sikigtagh ni _ akmag igh luku _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ â _ 
kaate luni _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig _ lli ma kanga _ 
lli luku _ ellnga _ akite kun _ aqume ma lghii _ . _ 
aqume luni _ imeg tekagh ni _ neghnavregagh _ pi ma kanga _ Uuk _ w eni _ enta _ sa aqe ziin _ !
Atgh aal ta _ unangkagh ka _ 
unangkagh a _ sikig _ umyugagh mineng _ 
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi neng _ llaag it _ uglafqe te ma lghiit _ ama _ ighneghagh igh ma lghii _ 
Kaa lluteng _ taaqe yan _ yuug _ 
yug m _ yugem _ sikig m _ al qel q ani _ ellmi neng _ .
uughqaghte luni _ qulmesiite mun _ kanaghte uute ma lghiit _ amiir aakun _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghii _ pis temni _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ â
itegh naqe unga _ sikig em _ neq angit _ 
ellnga _ yuug _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ agagh simalghiit _ 
mulu gpenani _ itegh ma lghii _ qiiv aq waaq elghii _ 
itegh yalghiimi _ ungavig _ ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh ma lghii _ kitum _ 
itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ iitgh umalghiit _ 
unaami _ taghtugh yami _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ negh luteng _ 
Yugem _ qemi neng _ teve aqe uq _ meteghllug _ esghagh ma kanga _ Whanga _ 
esghagh luku _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ ? _ â
natmun _ igleghte aqe ziin _ ak ingan _ tunganganun _ 
Taagken _ temngi _ maagun _ 
yug m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ aghulaqumalghii _ .
atghagh lta _ ak ingan _ 
negh yaghtugh lta _ peng ugh qameng _ talugh lluni _ 
taagken _ yug m _ 
kaate luteng _ itegh ma lghiit _ meteghlluk _ 
itegh luteng _ yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ aqumumalghii _ meteghllug _ 
meteghllug ke te aqe i ma lghii _ aqume luni _ sikig m _ amiiragh akun _ â _ 
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ iw em ga _ w at aqun _ sa aqe ziin _ 
aqelqagh _ gaagh te gu _ meteghlluk _ qe il iqu malghii _ 
llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ taana _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula anun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ 
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ esghaate nghmeng _ kitum _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ itegh ma lghiit _ â _ 
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ negh luteng _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ .
yug m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ .
elpek _ navek _ pi naqe ziin _ aghulaqumalghii _ .
Yuuk _ whanga _ aki yan _ .
taagken _ pellghute ma lghiik _ eg llu m _ 
yuug _ ! _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ 
meteghllug _ aki yan _ 
meteghllug _ pengughqagh meng _ talughte luni _ 
talughte neghsi ma kanga _ .
talughte yan _ qemi meng _ meteghllug _ taayughqe ma lghii _ yug m _ mengteghagh nun _ qesug ragh luni _ 
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh luni _ 
yug tun _ ellnga llu _ pi ma lghii _ .
Tefaay _ !
